Who TF eats Stouffer's chicken? What even is Stouffer‚Äôs chicken? Gross. No, magic unicorn. Just add more food to choose from. You know you can. Do. It.

title: Love & Feature Request
body: I have 4 other similar apps on my phone, two of which have paid subscriptions. I find this is the one I come back to and use, because it‚Äôs so easy and doesn‚Äôt take 15 minutes to look up and enter information into. It‚Äôs very nicely organized and gives the info & feedback I need to help me stick with it.  As a pre-diabetic I wish the developer would add the ability to track blood sugar information. If it had that I‚Äôd be able to delete at least 6 other apps that I have to fumble with daily. Thank you for a great intuitive pleasant to use app, and please consider adding other features, perhaps as an alternative app, or with subscription options.

title: App is great!
body: I've been using it for a little more than a week now (free version) & I'm really finding it helpful. Even though I've been tracking some of this on paper for years, this seems to work better somehow?! I like the exercise component & being able to log my exercise & have it "count". Ditto for water intake. I've set my calorie goal about 100 calories less than what I was doing before starting the app & so far I've kept close to it...even my daily average was slightly less for the week üòÄ! I do allow myself treats  & I'll probably take a day off once in awhile but this app is helping me stay on track & I don't feel "deprived". Kudos to the MyPlate team & keep up the good work! üòâ
response: Hi there! Thank you so much for your review. We're happy to hear the app is working so well for you.

title: So many improvements since I tried it last
body: I am vision impaired and I have been using this app for over a year. I have used both the free version and the upgrade, and both are excellent. In addition, I have contacted the developers about features in the app that were not accessible. They have written me very courteous responses and have fixed most of the issues willingly. I appreciate their efforts for inclusion. I would like to suggest that in the fractional pop-up menu for less than whole quantities of a serving that I add smaller quantities then 1/4 serving. I would like to be able to log smaller amounts such as 1-3 ounces, teaspoons, or tablespoons. I would strongly recommend both versions of this app.
response: Hello and thank you so much for your review and continued feedback! We're so glad that you have found MyPlate easy to use.

title: Latest Update Disappointing
body: I‚Äôve been using MyPlate for nearly a year now as a Gold Member.  With the help of this app, I lost 55 pounds. My BMI is 25 now. Great app!
response: Thanks for your review and feedback. We‚Äôve just released an update to the app addressing these concerns. Please update to version 5.31.0. If you still have questions or concerns, please send us an email at¬†support@livestrong.com.

title: Not bad but not ok
body: This app is a great app the only thing that I think that‚Äôs wrong with it is that there is no reset button because I wanted to lose a little bit of pounds so I downloaded this and maybe I‚Äôm wrong I only had this app for a couple of hours like two or three so yeah I was doing my daily workout and then it doubled what I was supposed to get and now I have too many calories so I had to delete the app and now I‚Äôm looking for another app and I tried to re-download it to see if everything was reset but nothing was and I still had a bunch of amounts of calories so I looked at everything to see if it there Was a reset button but I did not see one I‚Äôm not the best with phones maybe there is one maybe there isn‚Äôt but I did not see one
response: Hello! When you exercise, you are given extra calories to consume. The goal is for your net calorie number to be as close as possible to your daily calorie goal. Please email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions!

title: Macro nutrients are crazy wrong
body: Developer responded quickly and effectively to the the problem I detailed below. Love this app especially now that the problem is fixed. Thanks for the speedy response!
response: Hello! We're so sorry for the momentary inconvenience! This issue should be resolved, but please email us at support@livestrong.com if you're still seeing these numbers.

title: Love this app
body: I was seeking a calorie counting app to supplement my diet objectives. I‚Äôm very active and am only seeking to lose 10 lbs to improve my competitiveness.

title: I love it but I have some suggestions.
body: I love this thing but honestly I would like more workouts to be recorded especially when I‚Äôm doing lat pulldowns or anything that requires a machine. I know, its quite impossible to record a human body going through the said weight but I feel like if we focus then we can find a estimate.
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage at our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Great, effective food journal and workouts
body: I had been using a popular app for food tracking and found the food items to be inaccurate a lot of the times. This solved that problem, for the most part. There are still some foods other people have entered into the food lists that have incorrect nutrition information, but fewer of them. I wish the food plans they provide would take into account what macro percentages you want‚Äîthe options are limited. That‚Äôs my biggest gripe since I had wanted to use it to help plan my weight loss. The workouts the app provides are fun and effective. I really like them. Overall, a seriously well-designed and functioning app.

title: Poor Registration Experience
body: Created an account through the app (rather than the website) and accidentally typed in the wrong email. I also used a one-off password that I intended to add to a password manager. I noticed the mistake in the email immediately after signing up, but found out it can‚Äôt be changed using the app. Went to the website to try to log in and fix my email address there, but it seems I also had a typo in the password I used to sign up. I can‚Äôt send myself a password reset request because of the typo in the email I used. I‚Äôm still logged in to the iOS app, but with no way to change any of my login settings. It‚Äôs not a huge effort to make a new account and consider this a throwaway, but it‚Äôs a frustrating first experience that could have been avoided with either an email or password confirmation field, or the ability to change email or password via the iOS app.
response: Hi there. We're so sorry that you had such a frustrating start in the app. We'd love to make it right for you and to assist you with any remaining registration issues. Please email us at support@livestrong.com. Thanks so much.

title: Amazing App
body: So I‚Äôve been around the calorie counting circuit for a while. I‚Äôve used MyFitnessPal and hated it right off the bat (ads and struggling to find certain foods). I‚Äôve also tried SparksPeople which at first was great and I lost 40 lbs with it. However now, it‚Äôs become ad city and for whatever reason, when I use the app, I severely reduce my calorie intake because I would have my macros ate at 1300 calories and that was maddening to see. With MyPlate, I don‚Äôt have those worries of MyFitnessPal or SparksPeople. The ads are exceedingly manageable compared to the other services and it gives you healthy recipes to try out based on the amount of calories you have left for the day. 10/10 I do recommend!
response: Thank you for the stellar review!!

title: Annoying
body: I have ADHD and have to have all non necessary notifications turned off (email, TickTick, calendar and messages only) in order to go about my day without distractions. I was so glad to see that in the settings tab of this app, there is a toggle button that allows you to turn off notifications. It‚Äôs a load of crap. I have them switched off and MyPlate still continues to send me at least 5 notifications ‚Äútrack your breakfast track your lunch please come back don‚Äôt for get this this and that blah blah blah.‚Äù It normally would not be a big issue because I could just go and disable them from Apple settings. I am just annoyed because why offer the feature if you‚Äôre still going to blow up my phone daily with notifications?? App is good otherwise. Nice UI and I love the nutritional breakdown.
response: Hey there! Can you please send us an email at support@livestrong.com so we can look into this for you? Thank you and apologies for the inconvenience!

title: Needs some tweaking
body: Overall pleased with the app, there library of foods seems to have most items I have needed. I have not found where you can set up that you want to loose weight so how many calories should I be eating. What if I want a High protein Low carb plan what should my percentage of protein or carbs should I be eating.
response: Hello! To adjust your calorie goal, tap the silhouette icon in the upper left corner of the app's home screen. Tap your profile picture. From this screen, you can change your Weight Goal and Activity Level as needed, and your Calorie Goal will change automatically. Or create your own goal by tapping "Calorie & Macronutrient Goals", and then "Calorie Goal". Toggle the button next to Automatic to the off position, then enter the goal you want.

title: Simple, but inaccurate
body: I like the app. It‚Äôs easy to use and very simple. The biggest downside is it‚Äôs not accurate. When you scan the barcode, more often than not, the calories it shows on the app is more than what it shows on the nutrition tab on the box/bag. If you do workout, it‚Äôs impossible to put in what you lost unless you have one of those expensive smart watches that tells you all of that or you‚Äôre knowledgeable in fitness. I work on my feet all day, walking a lot so I know I do burn through calories, but am not sure how much I burn, so that adds to it being inaccurate. I recommend maybe preset exercises put in based off of the average amount people burn calories doing that workout/activity. May not be 100% accurate, but way more accurate than it is now.
response: Hi there! Thanks for the review and feedback. We do not recommend tracking your daily activities (e.g. work) in the app. These calories are accounted for when you select your Activity Level.

title: Useful!
body: This app works great. I like that it gives you detailed information beyond simply calories. The reminder to drink water helps too. Some of its advice won‚Äôt fit every person‚Äôs body/needs (I *wish* I could eat that many calories and still lose weight!), but that‚Äôs just life. My only minor annoyance is that for a lot of the foods I eat, if you try to log them you‚Äôll get forty results with contradictory information... I generally  just give up and type in the info myself. But that‚Äôs not a big deal.
response: Hi dudemcmcdudestermeister! Thanks for your feedback! We‚Äôre glad you are enjoying MyPlate and happy you've found the customizable goals useful. MyPlate uses a comprehensive third-party food database, which is a collection of listings from the USDA and some food manufacturers. Unfortunately, we're not able to add or remove items from this database as it is managed by Nutritionix.

title: Version 5.20.1 still Slooowwwww
body: Your latest update really didn‚Äôt do any good. It didn‚Äôt fix as stated in the response to my previous review. This app, has turned to a buggy useless app. It takes ages to enter data once the app is launched. I would say on average it takes 8-10secs to, for example tap Breakfast and wait for that to open then again that long to look for food and save... it‚Äôs really annoyingly slow that I‚Äôm looking into if the apps provided by others are a better alternative and jumping ship.
response: Hi there. We're so sorry for the continued frustration. Our team is working on this issue right now. We hope to have a solution for you ASAP. Please feel free to check in at support@livestrong.com with any questions.

title: Love and hate
body: I LOVE the lay out of this app. I love the bubbles you have to fill in every day, and it makes me want to make sure they are all competed by the end of the day. I feel like food tracking is so much work though. I have to make a lot of meals because I cook a lot, but you have to figure up an individual serving. That‚Äôs kind of crazy. I cook for 4, so I know how much I use for a whole meal, but to break it down to 1? No. Also, I wish you could select multiple foods at once for meals. I find I skip logging my food because it‚Äôs so time consuming, and when I‚Äôm at work, or out to eat, I don‚Äôt want to take 10 minutes to log 1 meal. I don‚Äôt want to go back to my fitness pal, because I love this lay out so much, but I‚Äôve considered it specifically for the ease of logging food.

title: Love it but.....
body: I have absolutely loved this app. After years of not being able to lose any weight, I stumbled on this app. My life has been changed, I eat better, walk more and can still have room for sweets when I want. At 59, I now dropped 22 pounds and wear a 34 waist down about 5‚Äù. Here is the problem I have experienced recently.  My walking calories are not registering which I really depend on. I had a problem with my iPhone 6+ when the tracking quit working.  I got a replacement from Apple but was surprised to see that the walking calories still are not sinking up even though I have enabled it in the settings. Thank you for this powerful app!
response: Hi Emerald! We're aware of this issue with the tracker and we're working on a fix. So sorry for the inconvenience but glad to hear that you've found such success so far!

title: No editing capability
body: I‚Äôve recently started using this app after a long hiatus. I used to be a big fan until recently. One thing I found, is that there is no editing capability to remove an exercise. Normally a user would be able slide the unwanted item either left or right to delete it. Not so with MyPlate. If by accident, you add an exercise, that‚Äôs it, you‚Äôre locked in. I haven‚Äôt tried removing a food yet. The usability in general has become a bit wonky. The search feature tends to aggregate and sort items sometimes arbitrarily. I went to the Livestrong website and noticed a lot of opportunity for improvement there as well. It would be great to sit down with the dev and walk through usability improvements. The foundation is there it just needs to be polished.

title: Great way to hold yourself accountable!
body: Before I got this app, I used to try to mentally track my nutrition. However, I was far less successful than I have been using My Plate. I have lost about 25 pounds since downloading it. The coolest feature is the way you can scan a barcode from a food package and the nutritional info is automatically recorded. Most foods I‚Äôve scanned have been in the database, but it‚Äôs also easy to manually enter the info if needed.

title: Best tracking app
body: I‚Äôd been using Lose it for a year but I felt like I was stagnating with it. So I decided to try this one out, and it‚Äôs so much better. I love how it breaks everything down for you in terms of how much sodium and whatnot you‚Äôre eating, not just calories. And it allows you to track water intake as well without charging you to do so, Lose It requires you to go premium to do that. This app also connects rather seamlessly to the health app that comes on your iPhone, and gives you an idea of how many calories you‚Äôre burning instead of just saying ‚Äútake this many steps and get a calorie bonus‚Äù like Lose It does. I find this feature much more useful.

title: Good but misleading
body: Stick with the free version. I paid to upgrade so that I could adjust my daily nutritional limits (carbs 70, fat 60, 400 cholesterol etc.) it shows where to do this. but it won‚Äôt change, goes right back to what it was. After several messages back & forth (there is no phone number listed) I was told I can change the daily % but cannot adjust each individual goal. I wanted to set daily limits based on a keto plan but can‚Äôt. So at the end of the day I see I had 70% carbs 20% protein &10% fat. I wanted to see the adjusted breakdown 85 g carbs, 45 G protein, 30 g fat, 1600 sodium, 450 cholesterol, 10 g sugar, etc. why offer a means to change something if it doesn‚Äôt work.  (All numbers or percentages are for explanation only). Not happy with paid upgrade. Not happy with the means to contact them.

title: Much Needed Change
body: I‚Äôm T2 Diabetic, and lost 120lbs five years ago to help reduce the complications and severity. I‚Äôve been using both Lose It and My Fitness Pal religiously (MFP, and then Lose It for the last three years) with success, but after downloading my plate just to try it out via a recommendation of a friend, I‚Äôve completely switched. The app interface is much more user friendly, portions are more accurate and I have found the goals and nutrient options to be the best yet. Also, the app provides amazing meal ideas based on current calories available which really cuts down on my day when I‚Äôm too exhausted to get creative with food.
response: Hi upyrgirl! We appreciate you taking the time to leave a review. Congratulations on your epic success. We're so glad we can be a part of your fitness journey.

title: Great, but Scanner & Stronger Meal Plan could be better.
body: I love this app, but I find it to be tedious sometimes due to some items after scanning not being updated in a year or two. I now have to manually input everything I buy after the trip to the store, as most scanning items aren‚Äôt correct on calories or the micros. Another thing is since applying in the app for the Stronger Meal Plan, the emails haven‚Äôt worked. I signed up, waited for the Sunday before the start date to receive my email, and received nothing. After checking my spam for almost a week, I signed up again and waited for the emails. I finally received an email, but it‚Äôs the one for day 3. I hope these things get fixed.
response: Hey there, we're so sorry that you've had this experience. We'd love to investigate this for you. Would you mind sending us an email at support@livestrong.com? Thanks so much!

title: Micronutrient Tracker Upgrade, Please
body: I‚Äôm wanting to see micronutrients like calcium, iron, biotin etc and vitamins like B12, A, D, K etc. I want to see how much I need for the day and when I am low on vitamins/minerals to include notifications suggesting what foods I could eat to get those daily values.
response: Thanks so much for this valuable feedback, Tim! As we are always adding new features to the app, we love getting feedback as it helps guide our designs and tools moving forward. Thank you!

title: MyPlate changed my health and fitness game
body: I give a 10 star rating to this wonderful app. I know that I was certainly committed to change in terms of my health and fitness habits as well as to loose weight and get back to my healthy weight. However I don‚Äôt think I could have done it without the help of this life changing app. I have been tracking my portions and food choices, as well as my exercise and water intake since January 2019 on this app, and I am thrilled to have already lost 20+ lbs and have just 2 to go to reach my healthy weight goal!! I thank you MyPlate and recommend it to everyone that is looking to make a change for good in your health!
response: Great job Melyjen!! We're thrilled to hear of your success!

title: Good but, could be better!
body: For a person like me, gaining weight is already so hard. So, when I use this app I feel like I'm an outcast. There's no discussion categories about gaining weight so I don't get much advice from real people. Even the upgrade says "Gold members lose twice the weight." However, I'm not tying to lose anything. So upgrading would be a waste. Overall, I know majority of people are focusing on losing weight but, for an app that pulled me in stating it can help me gain weight it is really lacking the features for my situation. The only reason I still use the app is because I do love the tracking calories interface and how you can scan your food on the go. I just hope more improvements can help me in they future. Otherwise great app! üëç
response: Hi YupPresh. Thanks so much for your feedback! We understand that not everyone's health & fitness goals are the same. Were you able to set your calorie goal correctly in order to gain weight? Please email us at support@livestrong.com for help with that! We also encourage you to post your questions in our community! Although we do not yet have a board dedicated to losing weight, there are many members like yourself on the boards daily. Try posting your questions on our Support & Motivation or Health & Fitness boards. Thanks again!

title: A few frustrating bugs that really hinder functionality
body: My "recently performed exercises" list includes a billion variants of "iPhone daily steps." It's completely worthless to include an exercise that I would never manually record so I don't understand why it's there at all. For a while now its inclusion has only made it difficult to find the exercises that I routinely do each morning, but for the last week it has stopped listing any other exercises altogether. It's now just an endless sea of "iPhone daily steps." Frustrating, but I can deal.
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage at our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Love this app!
body: This app is so very helpful to me and is also keeping me very motivated to actually track my meals.....which is usually not what anyone really likes to do.  Makes it so easy to enter my meal info and I really like the barcode feature.  The reminders are also very helpful because I get busy with my day and sometimes forget to enter my info and then a reminder pops up which is awesome. I am currently on a Keto-type meal plan and would like to see more Keto foods listed. Thanks for a great app and I look forward to seeing it improve and expand even more as the food search portion grows. A very user-friendly app and easy to use.

title: Great App, could be a little better
body: Love the layout and the ease of searching foods and adding things to the different meals of the day. If I can‚Äôt find something, there‚Äôs usually something else that‚Äôs at least close in nutritional content that I can add. However, my only ‚Äúissue‚Äù is when I click to add my own food and manually input fat, protein, etc, it doesn‚Äôt work well and shows up with weird low numbers like 0.03 g fat, etc. Not sure if this is b/c I use the free version and that is a feature for gold members. However I can add a ‚Äúquick‚Äù food and it works with the numbers I put it but with this can only enter fat, carbs, and protein. Would be nice to also track sugars, etc of manually entered foods.

title: Great for calorie counting, wish it could sync with Fitbit.
body: I love MyPlate to count my calories. I‚Äôve used it a few times before and had luck with losing a bit of weight. I am getting married in four months and have been trying my hardest to lose a decent amount before the wedding. Only thing I wish they would work on is being able to connect with Fitbit. I use that for my activity tracking since I don‚Äôt constantly have my phone on me and it doesn‚Äôt accurately keep track of what I‚Äôve burned. (I know Fitbit doesn‚Äôt either but it‚Äôs much closer than my health on my iPhone) I will probably end up switching to another app soon to properly track caloric intake vs calories burned.

title: Bariatric Surgery Compatible
body: Approximately 18 months ago I began using the free app because of my decision to have Bariatric surgery. It was necessary for me to follow the Bariatric guidelines (3 meals/day, no snacks, 64 oz water, no simple carbs) prior to surgery and this app is perfect. Surgery was last year and I am down 72 lbs. My BP medication was cut in half, plus I had been taking 1500 mg of Metformin for Type II Diabetes for 14 years and now without taking that glucose regulating drug I am free of the disease. My A1C (90 day glucose average) is now 5.4 - NORMAL!!!  MyPlate continues to be a daily help for me. Love being able to track food, water, protein, carbs and exercise right on my iPhone. It keeps me on my healthy living path. Thank you MyPlate!

title: App Problems..But Worth It
body: The app keeps signing me out every time I close it. It allows me to sign back in with ease, but it gets annoying to have to sign in ever time I enter food. Overall, I really like the app! It‚Äôs super nice, tracks with my Apple Watch. The only thing is the suggested meal plan has REALLY bland food. I wish there were more ethnic options (like congee for breakfast, dim sum for lunch etc). I also wish they added ‚ÄúIf every day was like today you would weigh ___ lbs in 4 weeks.‚Äù This could give me another reference on how well I am doing. Otherwise I enjoy it! I paid for the gold membership and I really enjoy it. The app design itself could look more minalistic modern but that‚Äôs just my preference.
response: Thank you so much for the feedback, Bela! We're glad to hear that you're enjoying MyPlate, and will use your feedback to make it even better. Please feel free to send us an email at support@livestrong.com with any further questions or suggestions.

title: Seamless design
body: This is the best app I have ever used in my entire life! This app is extremely seamless and so incredibly easy to use! I literally scan everything that I consume!!!! And I really like that it syncs with my fitness Apple Watch, so that way I know how many calories I have burned through exercise and how many calories I have consumed!!! I wish I can give this app 10 stars!!! It also really puts into perspective how much you are truly consuming in a day! I would recommend this app to anyone that is trying to lose weight or even maintain weight for that matter! This app is so versatile! So grateful that was recommended to me by a friend!!
response: Hi there! Thank you for that incredible review. We're so happy to hear MyPlate has been so beneficial.

title: I‚Äôm really, REALLY enjoying this application!
body: I‚Äôve been making a transformation in my health recently and considered several different tools to help track my food intake. Most are ‚ÄúOK‚Äù but are either too intrusive, or not robust enough, or they cost too much for what I need.
response: Hi Btowers! We appreciate your thorough and informative review. We appreciate your feedback and I have passed along your comments to our product development team. Thanks again!

title: This app turned my life around
body: I downloaded this app once I was diagnosed with diabetes.  My supportive family downloaded the app as well.  We use the app to keep track of our meals and calories.  We get meal ideas and other tips. It uses the data from our Apple watches to show calories burned from our workouts.  This app empowered and educated me and my family.  It keeps me from quitting.  I have only lost 12 pounds so far, but I have gained tons of confidence and knowledge. I have gained support from my family, and I have gained the support needed to be healthier from this app. Once you download this app it can help uplift you into a healthier you.
response: Hi chocolatechip007! We're happy to hear MyPlate is helping you to make progress toward your goals. We're constantly looking for new ways to improve our site and apps, and we love getting feedback as it helps guide our process moving forward.

title: Like But...
body: I really enjoy this app the only problem I have is the exercise videos that you‚Äôve got preloaded are absolutely ridiculous they are not medium those are extremely difficult especially if you are just getting into the weight loss experience you need to put something in there that is more for those that are just starting out very easy and medium not extremely difficult like You have on there now and especially perhaps doing something age-appropriate for someone of a mature age also I‚Äôm 55 and I couldn‚Äôt do those if I had to thank you for your app though it is really beginning to help me

title: Almost Great but Frustrating
body: Among the best apps available, easy to use and tracks most of what you need for a Keto diet with some frustrating flaws. Doesn‚Äôt directly track ‚Äúnet carbs‚Äù, although you can get to the information. The database lookup of foods is often wrong, especially for generic raw ingredients like unbranded spinach or onions.  Sometimes food quantity is listed as ‚Äú1 serving‚Äù and it‚Äôs hard, if not impossible, to tell what quantity that is. Adding a recipe is cumbersome and the data doesn‚Äôt always add correctly. Adding a ‚Äúnew food‚Äù often doesn‚Äôt correctly catch the info and cannot be edited - for example, I added a food with 12g of sugar, it listed as 0.12g sugar and it cannot be changed.

title: One of my favorite Modern Weight loss tools!
body: I love this app it's keeping me on track it has been a great helper and my weight loss and giving me the right tools to not over eat every day but I wish it would give non-golden members (for free) more information about the micro nutrients consumed and nutritional information on not only how much you should eat but what to eat for each vitamin and mineral needed in each body. However I am extremely satisfied not only with the practical and easy way to use this on a daily basis & with the overall layout of the app and I love that there are exercises and recipes available which is super cool.

title: These results are amazing
body: I‚Äôm about to go to Basic Training for the Airforce and I‚Äôm over weight according to the height weight ratio of being 5‚Äô4‚Äô‚Äô I‚Äôm supposed to be 152 pounds and I was 157.8 I'm on my 5th day and I‚Äôm at 154.0 pounds I‚Äôm losing body fat and keeping my muscle and it‚Äôs amazing I‚Äôm starting to gain my confidence back and I‚Äôm so amazed at these results in the few days I‚Äôve don‚Äôt this I just want to thank whoever made this app personally you saved me from not being able to go into the Airforce and become a security forces officer and I can‚Äôt express how much that means to me I will be able to go into the Airforce and make my career that I‚Äôve always wanted

title: Wow
body: I have nothing but great things to say about this app. I started working out January 1st and I lost about 2-3 pounds. I was new to this lifestyle and didn‚Äôt know how to diet, so I found this app and downloaded it. When I started using it in February, I was immediately made aware of all the empty calories I didn‚Äôt even know I was consuming. It has helped me so much and made me more aware of how to live a healthy lifestyle. I started using this app February 7th weighing 152, with exercise and the help of this app, it‚Äôs now March 26th and I weigh 134. I really love this app and it‚Äôs so simple to use, and I highly recommend this app to anyone looking for guidance in a lifestyle change.

title: You can now eliminate weight watchers
body: This app allows you to set goals, track your food, calories ,exercise ,water intake, follow your fat intake sodium intake,etc and it links to your health app on your Apple iPhone . it‚Äôs truly amazing and carefree. If there is one app that will help you to lose weight and live a healthier life it‚Äôs my plate. I love this app!!!!!!!!!

title: Liked it at first but...
body: I‚Äôve used it on and off for 2 years. It‚Äôs frustrating to use. They don‚Äôt really have an extensive food library. I love the barcode option to scan store bought food...but that only goes so far. They barely have any restaurant food. It‚Äôs so annoying to type in different key words OVER AND OVER to try to find what I‚Äôm looking for‚ÄîFOR 5 MINUTES STRAIGHT and not find ANYTHING! And I know there‚Äôs an option to add my own food. Well I can‚Äôt very well ask a waiter how many grams of protein and carbs are in their signature truffle mac and cheese and expect them to have a clear answer can I?! And why would I just add something ‚Äúsimilar‚Äù if I can‚Äôt find it? Those aren‚Äôt accurate results. I‚Äôm done with this app and hope to find a better one. Sorry MyPlate, you‚Äôve frustrated me more than helped me...

title: Been using for 4 years
body: I have used this app during all of my fitness / health kicks over the past four years and I‚Äôve tried others like it and I can safely and assuredly claim that no other free nutrition tracking app is as good as this one. It helps you stay motivated, the recipes and caloric targets are fun and helpful, and the overall interface is so user friendly. Most foods I have ever wanted have already been put into the system, save for one specific type of brownie, so it‚Äôs easy to just jump into because of that, too. LOVE THIS APP!!!!!! I recommend it to all of my friends that are concerned with their diet or general health.
response: Hi CandyMac18! Thank you so much for the stellar review. We really appreciate your feedback and your recommendations.

title: Really helpful!
body: I'm recovering from an eating disorder and this hs been really helpful for trying to lose weight safely. It's reminded me how important it is to get enough calories each day. I really like the water feature, it's fun to swipe up lol. There's so many choices for foods and I love the fact that it has helpful recipes!
response: Hi kei2129! We're happy to hear MyPlate is working for you. You can manually enter calories by tapping the Exercise button and tapping Enter Calories Burned. If we can help with anything else, feel free to contact us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Had problems gaining weight
body: I always suffered from gaining weight until my doctor put me on an anti anxiety med and her assistant showed me an app that was really good for keeping track of your daily calorie intake. And that is how I found MyPlate! I have used it since July 2019 and have found that this is the only calorie tracker app I need! I‚Äôve gained almost 20 lbs thanks to the app (and my meds.) I took one star off because I have noticed a glitch where for some reason under shepherds pie in the search engine, everything like protein, carbs and fats shows up in the thousands instead of their normal numbers. Not sure why that‚Äôs the case. Please fix. I‚Äôm unsure if it‚Äôs only the shepherds pie affected by this.
response: Hello! We're so sorry for the momentary inconvenience! This issue should be resolved, but please email us at support@livestrong.com if you're still seeing these numbers.

title: Easy to track
body: This app has been super helpful to me. The notifications are so encouraging and make it easy to stay on track. The scanner works really well, even on products I wouldn't expect. I also love that you can add your own products from recipes or unrecognized scan codes.

title: The *only* calorie tracking app that consistently writes to Health
body: I‚Äôve tried MyFitnessPal, Lifesum, and LoseIt!, and all three at every inconsistent with writing calories and nutrients to the Health app. Some do the initial logging correctly, but if you edit or remove entries they don‚Äôt consistently delete. I‚Äôve been back and forth with Support for every one of these apps several times.

title: Disappointed, MyFitnessPal is better
body: I really wanted a fresh look/something different for tracking my calories. So I always see the Livestrong app competing with MyFitnessPal. So I thought, Great! Fresh look to keep me motivated some new perks to keep it going. (I lost 50lbs on MyFitnessPal...but wanted a new look for the last pounds)
response: Hi there! You do not need to upgrade to Gold to pull data from Apple Health. That is a feature that is available on the free version of the app. Please email us at support@livestrong.com if you have any questions about this!

title: Needs one more thing
body: I love this app it‚Äôs helped me lose 85 pounds. I am however frustrated with one thing I wish it did. I wish I could input my recipes in here without having to do all this math to figure out exactly what I ate. I cook for a family and I make a meal for a family and 90% of the time it‚Äôs from scratch. So I feel I should be able to put down all the ingredients in my meal into one place. Plug in how many servings it was and then have that saved to my meals with all the calories and info I need. It would be a better time saver then entering 30 ingredients every single time I eat pasta sauce. Instead of going through and saying I had 3 cups boiled Roma tomatoes and 1/4 of an onion and 2 cloves garlic and yada yada yada Every time  I want to ah I ate spaghetti sauce.
response: Thanks for the feedback and we're glad that you're loving the app! We are working on bringing a custom Recipe function to the app and hope to include this in a future update!

title: Love it, but I have a suggestion.
body: I love this app, I have been using it on and off for a few years. I love the how easy it is to use and it really helps keeping me in check. The only thing that I don‚Äôt like is that I can‚Äôt put everything that I make into a meal and then be able to add different servings for it. Right now, whatever you put into the meal, that‚Äôs how many calories it will make you have for that meal. Example: I‚Äôm making a jambalaya and it says it‚Äôs 9019 calories, but it al makes enough for about 20 people. So, it would be a lot easier if we could make into servings.
response: Hi there! We appreciate your feedback and I have passed along your comments to our product development team. We are working on bringing a custom Recipe function to the app and hope to include this in a future update! In the meantime, please note that you can create custom Recipes on our desktop site at https://www.livestrong.com/myplate/dashboard/. By creating a recipe, you can specify how many servings it makes and log only the servings you eat. Log into your account using the same username and password that you use on the MyPlate app. Scroll down past the meal periods and click on "My Recipes" and then "Create A Recipe". Enter the specifics and don't forget to save everything! Once you've created a recipe, you can click on it and press Track to add to your tracker. When you're finished, please close and reopen your mobile MyPlate app to sync everything and add the item to your tracker!

title: User friendly
body: I always love this app it shows me a real breakdown of foods, calories and fats.  It helps me understand my target daily goal in order to accomplish my big goal.  I used to track all calories in a book and now (large again). This is way easier and I like that I don‚Äôt have to go to several websites to get a breakdown of my BMI and needed calories to reach my goal.  I‚Äôm a little suspicious of my sweet tea being too forgiving on this site but it‚Äôs all good.  I hope in future it has more breakdowns of popular recipes for diets using restrictions.  I have to cook all foods to be corn, wheat and dairy free which generally lines up with paleo.

title: Helpful, Intuitive and Effective!
body: I downloaded this app before my first ever ‚Äúreal‚Äù cut - I lost 25 healthy pounds in 3 months. I‚Äôm now on a bulk and am steadily increasing my weight with the app‚Äôs recommendations and meals. The notifications are motivational and helpful in reminding me to track when I eat, the exercise connects with my Apple Watch and gives accurate readings, and I‚Äôm overall pleased with the results in my health and body that I‚Äôve seen. I have been (and will continue to) recommend this app wholeheartedly to my friends and family. Totally worth the download - that is if you have the motivation to start your own journey.
response: Hi there! Thank you for providing that amazing review. We're happy to hear you are enjoying the app and appreciate your support.

title: Awesome app
body: I love this app. I was on and off with the my fitness pal app. As I was going to download that app again, I seen this one and figured I could give it a shot. Soo glad I did! Can track more specific details- tracking food as little as 1 berry, and logging exercise such as light walking in the house. This provides ease of use and being a busy person it has made me want to continue use it and I can definitely see it changing my life down the road. Thank you!! üëèüèºüòá
response: Hi fgrvblast! We really appreciate you leaving a review. We're happy to be a part of your healthy lifestyle.

title: LIFECHANGER/FAVORITE APP OF ALL TIME
body: There are a bunch of people I know trying to find a fitness/calorie tracker that has quirky content... LOOK NO FURTHER! This app has a wide range of things, fitness sessions telling you have many calories you burned, calorie tracker, recommended food recipes and their calories, a chat room to talk to other people and hangout, and SO MUCH MORE!
response: Hi Aristyn! Thank you for that amazing review. We appreciate your support. If you have any questions regarding the app, please reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Easy To Use‚Ä¶Not The Most Accurate
body: The app is easy to use which is nice, but they don‚Äôt offer family sharing which I hoped was included for the price.  Has a good range of food items in its database, but it‚Äôs not the most accurate.
response: Hi RisqEM! Thank you for your review and feedback. We apologize for the frustration. MyPlate uses a third party food database called Nutritionix. If you can please send us the UPC codes for the items you have found to be incorrect, we can send them along to Nutritionix to be updated.

title: Note Section Please!!
body: I‚Äôve never been much of a calorie counter, but I am loving this app! Especially the diagram of what you‚Äôre putting into your body the most. The only thing I wish it had was a section to keep notes.
response: Great idea Maikimouse! We will definitely pass this one on to our team. We're really happy to hear that you've found success with the MyPlate app. Thanks for the awesome review!

title: love the app but it seems to not be working anymore!
body: i‚Äôve had this app for two days now and i absolutely love it! it helps me keep track of how many calories i‚Äôm eating and how much calories i‚Äôve burned off. but today, for some odd reason when i go to search an item i‚Äôve ate, i click search and it says ‚ÄúNo Results‚Äù when i know there should have been a list of results. the app won‚Äôt let me add anymore of my meals and i‚Äôm pretty sure it‚Äôs a bug or something. so i synced my information and logged out and then deleted the app, and now it won‚Äôt let me log back in! it keeps telling me there was a network problem or something and i really need for you to fix this asap plssss and thank you!!!!!
response: Hello! We are so sorry you faced this issue. We have been experiencing some technical difficulties on our servers. The team has been working hard to get it back up. Thanks so much for your patience. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Get It!
body: I love this app. So easy to use, tracks my exercise on my Apple Watch and my weight on Fit Index. I take medicine that makes me gain weight in the past it made me very cautious of what I ate. Which mean I ate far less than I should have been eating. This app helped me live a healthier lifestyle and worry less about gaining weight I know how many calories and carbs I‚Äôve had and how many calories I still need to reach my daily goal. My family thought I was nuts tracking every meal but now that I lost weight and am not starving myself they are joining me on the app! Thank you so much for creating this and making it free. Ya‚Äôll rock!
response: Hi Paige! Thank you for your incredible review. We're so excited to hear the success you've had with the app.

title: Almost perfect.....!
body: I have enjoyed this app in the last 7 weeks. The only thing I would like the change is that many of the ‚Äúverified‚Äù foods that pop up after scanning barcodes have the incorrect nutritional information.   That can be a little frustrating. But, all in all this app have really helped me track what and more importantly how much I am eating. I have lost almost 10 lbs in 7 weeks.  It would be nice if the workouts offered in the gold membership would have more options. There are 10 short workouts that are nice when you are in spicy and don‚Äôt have time to plan anything out.  I would pay a little more to get more.
response: Thank you so much for this feedback! We're thrilled that MyPlate has helped you reach your goals and we hope to include a more extensive library of workouts in the future.

title: Good way to track macros
body: Definitely accurate. Most macros are calculated by users it seems and you can customize your own ‚Äúfood‚Äù for an entry. If you eat similar items you can record what nutrients are in each food and quickly enter them later for each day which is very helpful. Overall a very well made app with many useful features, even if it‚Äôs just used as a visual representation of each day to make sure you are hitting your nutrient goals. You can even search menu items you order at restaurants which are spot on accurate. Overall this is a great app.

title: Incomplete
body: I really want to love this app. The user interface is SO much easier than MyFitnessPal by a mile, but unfortunately it‚Äôs mostly unusable. If you want to log your food, it has to have a barcode or be in the VERY limited data base. Even worse, you can‚Äôt create recipes and determine total servings then log how many servings you ate. That‚Äôs a nightmare for people who meal prep or make leftovers at dinner.
response: Hi cameopierce! Thanks for the review and feedback. MyPlate uses a comprehensive third-party food database, which is a collection of listings from the USDA and some food manufacturers. Unfortunately, we're not able to add or remove items from this database as it is managed by Nutritionix. If the item you'd like to track is not in our database, we recommend creating a custom food entry in the app.

title: Good Quality, but frustrating buffering
body: This app is honestly extremely helpful. It let‚Äôs you keep track of all the foods you ate, water you drank and the calories you burn throughout the day. The only problem I have with this app is the constant buffering throughout the app. Whenever I try and add a new food so that it could track what I‚Äôd eaten throughout the day, it says it couldn‚Äôt be added after it‚Äôs loaded for about a minute. This is extremely frustrating and honestly makes me wanna download a new app every time it happens. It‚Äôs especially frustrating because the rest of the app is really well put together. If someone else has experienced this and has any solutions it would be appreciated.
response: Hey there! We'd love to look into this for you. Can you please send us an email at support@livestrong.com? Thank you!

title: Great for the most part, but...
body: The only issue I have with the app is the search function itself ‚Äîyou know, a core part of the app. Searching for something specific always is ridiculously more complicated than it needs to be. Unless I want to go digging in the trash to scan a barcode, it‚Äôs a crapshoot whether or not I can find the thing I‚Äôm searching for because no matter how many words I input in how many different orders the results are always the same ‚Äî it searches each word individually instead of the whole phrase so whatever you‚Äôre looking for gets buried under irrelevant. Good luck finding that sparkling blackberry & plum French lemonade under all the blackberry pie, plum wine, and French onion soup results.
response: Hi there! Thank you for the review and feedback. If you are unable to find a specific item in the database (e.g. sparkling blackberry & plum French lemonade) we recommend utilizing the custom food feature.

title: Really good, could be even better
body: I truly find this app helpful and easy to use thanks to its simple design. If you could just tweak the app a little bit I think it'd be even better
response: Hi Gustav! Thank you for your feedback. Many items in our database offer different serving size options! You just need to click on the Serving Size button in the item to see what is available. Please email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions.

title: I can only give this three stars for a horribly fatal flaw in an otherwise 5 star app.
body: Developers, please, I beg of you, properly explain the net calories vs remaining calories. The website has two conflicting pieces of information and it‚Äôs impossible to tell which one to use.
response: Hi Scott! We're so sorry for the confusion. The calories left number indicates the number of calories you have left to eat for the day. Your net calorie number is the number of calories consumed minus the number of calories burned. At the end of the day, your net calorie number should equal or come close to your daily calorie goal. Please email us at support@livestrong.com with any other questions.

title: Big Boost to Control Diet
body: I have been using this application to count my calories and to stay on task; the app help me in portion control and counting calories in and out.  I have lost 80 lbs and still losing another 40. Yes, before this app I was a quarter toner with fries. While my diet and doctor have helped me, this application has made it easier to take control of my food instead of my food taking control over me. Entry is easy, logical and the reports keep you psyched. It boils down to calories in versus calories consumed. This product makes you think before ingesting something you may not need. Good luck! Simon

title: Great app for Keto or any macro tracked diet
body: Love the app. Love you can set your macros and track them. Few things to make it six star:

title: MyPlate & Apple Watch Activity/Workout/Health app & Intermittent Fasting.
body: Hi. I‚Äôm using MyPlate for weight loss in conjunction with Intermittent Fasting. I have MP synced with the Health app on my iPhone X, and with the Activity and Workout apps on my Apple Watch (Series 1) and everything is working well together. I had to disable the iPhone‚Äôs Step Count feature to insure the apps weren‚Äôt adding steps from both the phone and watch in MP. I understand this set-up isn‚Äôt going to give perfect diagnostic accuracy, however it does provide me the ability to document and monitor my activity well enough to see progress and stay on track.

title: Everything was going well until
body: Everything was going well until I lost all of my data. I thought it was something I had done. So, I uninstall the app and reinstall the app and uninstall the app and reinstalled the app. Thank goodness for the cloud! I finally looked at these comments and realize that there was a server issue!!! Ughh! I was finally losing weight utilizing the meal plans üò©.  As I read back in further notes I found this isn‚Äôt a one time incident. Now I‚Äôm not sure if I should wait for this to get fixed or move on to a different calorie counting app. I would love to come back if there‚Äôs a way I can retrieve all of my information once this gets fixed, does anyone know how that is done ??

title: Works for me
body: I‚Äôve used an app for many years.  There was a problem.  I looked to see the apps considered their competitors.  Not even close.  This one looked good but I wasn‚Äôt keeping my hopes up.  I like it.  I can enter my meals.  I can see the percentages of fats, protein, carbs.  It‚Äôs what I need to at least try to stay on track.  Thanks.  Btw the other app had a security breach...not a problem for most of us...sent an email requiring we change our password...my email was outdated...locked me out...lots of emails back and forth later all my input was lost.  Please don‚Äôt let it happen to My Plate.

title: Wrong values for so much food.
body: The app is fine but for some reason on just about all the foods I attempt to track it lists thcholesterol and sodium values as zero which is really bad particularly for someone attempting to watch their sodium and cholesterol intake. Please fix this, as this issue has been happening for quite some time nop
response: Sorry to hear about the bug affecting your app. The team is working of a fix for this now! Keep an eye out for updates coming soon to absolve this error.

title: So far so good
body: I started my weight loss journey 3 weeks ago. I was feeling hungry all the time, following diets protocols, doing 1 hr cardio every day, and feeling tired all the time. I was looking into the app store for an app that can help me count my calories and my Macros and micros so I can eat and not feel hungry and here is this app. Amazing I love it. It is more easy for me to not overeat and feeling full. I don‚Äôt have an amazing story yet but for sure I recommend this app if you are trying a better eating habit and a better lifestyle. Of course you do have to exercise but what you eat is important too.

title: Maybe change the tag line
body: I love the app! So far, it recognizes just about everything that I scan and my favorite feature is the pie chart. I‚Äôm trying to eat more fats and I need loads of protein. And this app has shown me just how many calories I‚Äôve been intaking. However, on the days that I don‚Äôt log I get the message that says something like, ‚Äúyou didn‚Äôt log today, do it - it‚Äôs easy!‚Äù And I‚Äôd like to suggest maybe saying something like, ‚Äúyou got this!‚Äù Instead of ‚Äúit‚Äôs easy!‚Äù Because on some days, eating right isn‚Äôt easy. And the last thing we need to hear is that it‚Äôs as simple as logging. Maybe try something that‚Äôs more encouraging!
response: Hey there! Thanks so much for this feedback. We're working on updating our food reminders to ensure that they are positive and encouraging for everyone! Please feel free to share any more feedback with us at support@livestrong.com. Thanks again!

title: Dont install
body: I installed it, deleted after not using.  They got me to register with my email.  Big mistake.  I unsubscribed, but, they continued to send spam.  I asked to be deleted and they continued to send me emails.  I filed CCPA requests to be deleted.  They 'confirmed' but still sent me emails.  The only time they listened is when I filed a complaint with CA AG. Wow, I got a response from the CA and their attorney.  The company 'blamed' me that I was doing stuff wrong.  All I am doing is following the privacy link and following their procedures.  They have multiple 'sites / apps / companies'.  They don't have a good process to track what request is coming from where.

title: Best Free Meal tracking app!
body: I absolutely love this app.. I‚Äôve been using it for about 2 weeks now. I downloaded several other meal tracking apps together with this.. but this one stood out.
response: Hi Jaura868! Thank you for that amazing review. We‚Äôre glad you are enjoying MyPlate. We're constantly looking for new ways to improve our app, and we love getting feedback as it helps guide our process moving forward.

title: Helpful App
body: This app is fairly easy to use. It doesn‚Äôt seem to have that huge list of foods that I‚Äôve seen with other apps but is sufficient and the searches are quickly relevant. Also, the free version allows you to use a lot more features compared to some other apps I‚Äôve tried. For instance, another app wants close to $4 a month to log water. Yeah, no.

title: This app is great!
body: So far it‚Äôs been working out GREAT! I track everything with this app, my calories, my fitness, my weight. It‚Äôs been super helpful tracking how much calories I consume how much I have left (depending on your goal) BUT not only that! It also, with your calories, tracks how much protein, carbs, and fat the foods you consume have and how much you‚Äôve consumed in all. I love being on top of what I eat and knowing exactly what‚Äôs in everything I eat and this app helps me do just that. I would definitely recommend if your someone looking for an app that does all the above. üòâ

title: Can‚Äôt search keywords or scan barcodes food
body: The Good Stuff: This app is beautifully designed. I love the colorful circle checkboxes for meals, water, and exercise.  It‚Äôs as nice to use as the Weight Watchers app. There‚Äôs a lot of data for free. The cost of upgrading is very reasonable. I nearly cancelled WW until...
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage at our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Subscription a bit overpriced
body: I was hoping that if I paid for the subscription, I would have access to additional workouts. I was disappointed when it only have me 5 or so additional workouts. I can see this getting boring and not very challenging over time. I do love the UPC scanner and feel like most things are in the database so this makes it more accurate to track calories. I will be canceling at the end of their year unless there are some exercise routines that are updated. I love being able to follow along a few short videos through out the day and think this would greatly enhance the customer experience if developed appropriately. Thanks!

title: Instrumental
body: This app has been instrumental in my weight loss. The paid version gives me access to all the information I need to ensure that I'm meeting my nutritional and energy intake needs. I just finished a human nutrition course with a 97 grade and this app has really helped me implement the things I've learned. It's easy to find existing food and easy to add new foods. The only reason I don't give it 5 stars is because the meal plan that comes with the bought version is ridiculously bland and lacks creativity and flavor. Also I wish it had complete nutritional information at least for common vegetables that includes all vitamins and minerals.
response: Hi GBs thanks for your feedback! Just a note, the meal plan is part of the free version of the app and is not a paid feature.

title: Really Cool App!
body: I really like this app. It has a lot of food options for what you consume and it does what I needed it to... It tracks my food calories which has been eye opening. Other users add foods too and I can see that and use them.

title: Amazing App!!!!
body: I have tried countless calorie tracker apps but this one is the best one. You can track how much water you‚Äôve drank, find the foods you ate and how may have calories were in it, you can set goals, there‚Äôs multiple recipes, and more. Best of all, it‚Äôs mostly free! Other than having to upgrade for a few things, the stuff available for you without the upgrade is great. Other apps didn‚Äôt let me use much without having premium but this app does. If you‚Äôre on a weight loss/gain journey, download this and it‚Äôll change your life I promise :) good luck!

title: Stuck with it daily and seeing results
body: I‚Äôve tried and stopped a bunch of different things. I‚Äôm 25 out of college and gained a lot of weight since my schooling. Within a week of managing my intake I felt more awake. I didn‚Äôt need my afternoon coffee and my back didn‚Äôt hurt as much. At the end of my first month I was down 12 pounds but feeling way more genuinely AWAKE. So excited to see next month. You have to be honest with yourself about how much you eat and use this every day to get the full benefit. It‚Äôs EASY and QUICK to log your food and take back control of your life!!

title: Encouraging, accurate, and extensive!
body: I don‚Äôt think calorie counter is the best title for this app, it does so much more. It suggests fun recipes and workouts, helps me keep track of my water intake and exercises, and shows the progress of my weight loss after calculating my goals. It‚Äôs like my own tiny personal trainer! It asks so many questions about things I never even considered could be effecting my health goals, I‚Äôm delightfully impressed the more I learn and the more the app learns and adjusts my plan. I‚Äôm much more confident continuing on my journey towards a better me with MyPlate by my side!
response: Thank you for the wonderful review! We are so happy that you're enjoying MyPlate!

title: Macronutrient breakdown could be improved
body: I like the app overall and have paid for the year subscription. However I wish it could separate the good fats and bad fats. And tips based off the nutrient goals you‚Äôre not meeting and the ones you‚Äôre exceeding. Also I‚Äôm a bit confused about the way my calorie bar grows when I burn calories as if I should eat more to make up for it, but the breakdown doesn‚Äôt adjust to it. Is that just supposed to show my calorie deficit and I shouldn‚Äôt go above the goal? More coaching with the app would be a major improvement! Continuing my subscription because I like it better than other apps and in hopes improvements will be made.
response: Hi Natasha! Thank you for your review and feedback. The calories adjusted with your calories burned to maintain a consistent calorie deficit. If you do not consume the calories burned you will have a greater calorie deficit than your goal. Bear in mind, you should not be including extra calories for daily activities, only deliberate exercise.

title: Love app but not blinking message
body: Enjoying using this app and it‚Äôs helping me at least stay on track or do I need to be better. As of tonight though, I‚Äôm getting is blinking message indicator on phone app that keeps trying to get me to click on it get a free Walmart gift card. I decided to go through the process figuring I wouldn‚Äôt give them any sensitive or private info and the next thing I know it, I would have to agree to getting phone calls etc. after answering a bunch of research questions. I clicked out before agreeing. In any case, it won‚Äôt go away now, just keeps coming up blinking and it‚Äôs very distracting.

title: My only concern
body: I LOVE this app. The only concern I have is a lot of the calorie counting is off. When I scan something the app shows a different amount of calories than the item says on package. It‚Äôs close most of the time so I just make the adjustments but wish it was more accurate. But it‚Äôs not that big of a deal but makes me wonder when I don‚Äôt have it to scan is it correct? And then I wonder if my counting is way off?  But I have been doing great using it and it has helped me a lot!! In two weeks down 17 pounds!! Can‚Äôt complain there!
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage at our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: 60 lbs lost and maintained, my success LIVESTRONG MYPLATE
body: Great app.  I use with my Apple phone and tablet, along with my laptop.  Ability to scan and or look up items is simple.  Being able to review the summary of Fats, Sugars and Sodium daily is a game changer for me.  Putting in (my meals) saves time.  - One note, haven‚Äôt figured out how to update vs rewriting a meal.
response: Thanks so much for sharing your review and your incredible success!

title: Great been using it for years!
body: It‚Äôs an awesome app love the interface and how it syncs with my watch. Would love to be able to correct some of the scans that come out with incorrect information compared to what‚Äôs on the back of the item nutrition information. I‚Äôd also like to see a feature where you can plan your day and food ahead of time and the. Check off if you ate it and if you did not then you can delete and actually then put in like normal. The planning feature would really separate the app from others!!

title: Absolutely Love This App
body: So far I‚Äôve used this app for 1 month and have it synced with my Apple Watch which makes it so convenient for monitoring calories burned per day. I love the barcode feature when entering the foods and snacks you eat and how it automatically provides it‚Äôs nutrition facts. This app has helped me lose 10lbs in 30 days the healthy way. I recommend this app to anyone and everyone who needs assistance on calorie intake. I also enjoy reading the email newsletter. It includes helpful tips and their food recommendations that include ingredients are very appetizing.

title: Long time user disappointed!
body: I have used this app for years, in fact I‚Äôve used this app more than any other app from the iTunes Store. This is a great app! I can easily track my food, make custom food entries, scan barcodes, track my fitness, get nutritional advice etc. What is disappointing is paying for the ads-free app,  which worked for years, then when the app developer updated the software to a new pay by month premium version, doesn‚Äôt grandfather the old users into the non ad version. These ads are annoying, I don‚Äôt think paying $9.99 a month is worth it, especially when I‚Äôm not looking for any other features. If you had a business model that your users purchased, you should honor that purchase, don‚Äôt force your users to re-pay.
response: Thanks for the loyal support, and thank you for the praise! Sincerely sorry to hear about the loss of your ad-free version of the app. This feature should have remained on your account despite the service being retired. At your convenience, please contact us at support@livestrong.com, and we'll gladly work with you to remove those ads.

title: Works great for me.
body: This is my first calorie tracking app and the service has really helped me. Many products I eat can be scanned directly into the app, it works with my Apple Watch to track my exercise, and through the premium membership I can keep track of what I eat in great detail with my own plan. I give the app considerable credit in my losing weight each week throughout my first month using it. I would definitely recommend this app to anyone who really wants to know what they are eating and and change their habits.

title: New update confusion
body: I love the app in general and have been using it for some time now. That being said, the new update is a pain. I liked how when I create a wick add for a food all I had to do was put the macros in. Now it has the option to put everything in, which is fine, but when I put in the macros, the name, and serving size (if there is one specifically) I get an error message telling me the information is put in incorrectly but doesn‚Äôt tell me how to fix it. This leaves me frustrated and not able to track my macros. Please do something about this or go back to the way it was before.
response: Hi there! We'd love to help you with this. Please send us an email at support@livestrong.com so our team can assist you. Thanks!

title: Only tracks net calorie progress
body: Why does this app only track your "net" calories progress? Is there a way to disable the app from tracking my burned calories if I've got an apple watch?

title: Life changing
body: I used to live an unbelievably unhealthy lifestyle, eating well in excess of 4500+ calories per day with tons of sugars,fats,simple carbs and all around trash for food, this app has helped me closely log my calories for over 4 months and i have lost almost over 55 lbs. the calorie burning feature in this app helps a ton and really helps you get you caloric goals to an exact. My life has changed for the better and i still use it to help maintain my positive eating and exercise habits. A major thanks to the developers, you guys are awesome! Thank you for this amazing tool! - Ranger

title: Grocery list
body: I like that the app reminds you to track you foods,snacks and it syncs well with my Apple Watch. But when it comes to the meals and sending out the grocery list Sunday mornings. Well that didn‚Äôt happen. I reached out to them through the community like other users who also didn‚Äôt receive the email and still never received it.  Considering they have a countdown on how we as users should be prepared maybe they should as well with al least send the list out more than 24hrs ahead before meal prep starts(since issues of getting list out to users as promised time)üòë. Especially considering that food intake is an important part of weightloss. Anyway my two cents of the ten dollars I paid. Hopefully this gets resolved. Otherwise my money can be spent elsewhere
response: Hello. We're so sorry for this! The grocery list should be sent upon signing up for the meal plans, and our team is looking into why this did not happen for a few users. Please email us at support@livestrong.com if you have still not received. Please note that the grocery list is also available in the app by tapping Meal Plans and then the grocery basket icon located in the upper right corner. Please also note that our meal plans are free to use for all users. Our upgraded Gold membership is a separate option.

title: Excellent App
body: I‚Äôm so glad I came across this app when I was desperate to what kind of diet to follow to shed 20 pounds. I never tried calories count for a diet and this app based on your goal, age, weight  and type of food gives you a daily goal of how many calories you are supposed to eat a day along with daily meal plans if you want to get some ideas. I‚Äôm doing my own meals based on the calories allowance. It‚Äôs only been a week now and I lost 3 pounds while my goal was 1 pound/ week. My hunger urges also subsidized. Will definitely continue using this App.

title: Great Food Diary/Calorie Counter
body: This app is very user friendly. I‚Äôm trying to lose 20 pounds or so and it helps keep track of everything. It even syncs with your Apple Watch to keep track of how many calories you‚Äôre burning and it subtracts from how many calories you ate. On a 1200 calorie diet and it helps visualize how much I have left to eat for the day.
response: Hi paruml1000, we're so happy to hear that you've had such great success with MyPlate!

title: Great weight management tool
body: I love it that the app calculates my statistics and my goals and puts together the plan, right down to the grocery list. I‚Äôve recommended the app to a few co-workers. Meal plans are great, but would be ideal that when i open a can of ‚Äòsomething‚Äô another recipe follow up in the same week to use the other portion so theres no waste or build up of food in my fridge. Otherwise, app is easy to use and offers many features that in the past i‚Äôve only seen apps with only a few quality features you have here.

title: Great for macro counting
body: I like this app! It‚Äôs a lot like my fitness pal in that you can track your food, scan it in, and it has a lot already saved in there. The best part is that, unlike my fitness pal, it shows you your macros without you having to upgrade to the gold membership. It has lots of recipes that are easy, budget friendly, and has the calorie and macro info already done for you so it makes logging easier! The only thing I wish was different is that I wish it were compatible with Fitbit! That would be amazing!! But otherwise, this is a great app and I recommend it!

title: Almost perfect, one request
body: Please add the ability to drill down on where the fats, proteins, and carbs are coming from by making the daily macro clickable (tap‚Äôable), where when you tap ‚Äúfats,‚Äù you get the list of all foods in that daily macro that had fat in them, sorted in descending order.

title: Love this app
body: I used one other food tracker before this (MyFitnessPal) and like this one so much more. The interface is much cleaner and no pesky ads. The only improvement I‚Äôd request is the inventory for scanned items. But admittedly I get a lot of food from Asian grocery stores which probably aren‚Äôt as popular. I‚Äôve been surprised though when some of those even work! :) Oh one other feature request would be to save the serving I last inputted on items I eat repeatedly. But I guess there‚Äôs the option of saving it as a meal too.
response: Hi Diana! We very much appreciate your feedback and I have passed along your comments to our product development team.  As we are always adding new content and features to the site and app, we love getting feedback as it helps guide our designs and tools moving forward.

title: Great for calorie tracking, not so good for progress tracking
body: Overall a user friendly app even without the paid features. A couple months ago I would have given more stars but they changed how you see progress tracking. Now when you look at tracking there are difficult to read bar graphs. Previously weight was tracked with a line graph on a much smaller range making it easy to see how I was doing. Now it all looks the same- considering healthy weight loss generally happens in smaller increments the current graphs are useless. The calorie counting feature is helpful so I plan to continue using it for that purpose.
response: Thanks for your review and feedback. We‚Äôve just released an update to the app addressing these concerns. Please update to version 5.31.0. If you still have questions or concerns, please send us an email at¬†support@livestrong.com.

title: Simple and effective
body: I only use this to track calories and I love it. Easy to input what you eat. It lets you repeat items if you eat the same thing or drink your same two cups of coffee with cream every morning. The scan feature lets you use the barcode of food to input calories. I‚Äôve had a few things not work, but almost all foods do. I‚Äôve lose 7 lbs this month. Not a ton, but I think the amount of calories it calculates for me is sustainable. Thank you guys. I would recommend this to anyone looking to count calories.

title: Unable to calculate proper grams
body: This application, has a serious flaw. It calculates your gram intake up to 1,000 times more than it actually is. To be fair, it does seem to calculate calories correctly, If you can find the food you‚Äôre consuming and it‚Äôs database. But if you‚Äôre looking to track grams of proteins, carbohydrates, fats then this is not a good program to use.  Worse than the above, when customer services contacted about this flaw all that is given is excuses!  Weeks of excuses. This is not a terribly difficult problem to resolve. But it seems as though the developers intent is to rope in as many paid customers as they can rather than build the best application they can. My suggestion? Use a different application. There are many that are much better.
response: Thank you for your review. We've been in communication with you on this issue, and we're sorry that we haven't been able to resolve this yet. As we explained, there are no other users experiencing this, so it's been difficult to reproduce. We will continue working on this for you and hope to have a resolution soon.

title: Good, but
body: Huge flaw. As best I can determine the only way to add new items (food and exercise) is to use the track function. Need to be an independent editor. Also editing/deleting previously entered data is not easy and definitely not intuitive. Basically this app doesn‚Äôt provide any really useful edit functions. Simply providing a Delete function is not by any means a real Edit Capability. Putting these issues aside, it a good app and the web site is an excellent bonus with valuable health/fitness information. Remember that there are large error margins in data you enter and that provided by apps like this; results should not be taken as absolute. However they may be useful in determining macro trends.
response: Hi jwb45! Thank you for your review! You can create custom food and exercises in the app!

title: Great app
body: I have really enjoyed using this app. Considering it is free it‚Äôs hard not giving it 5 stars. It does what you need and that is tracking what you eat. Is it 100% not really especially if you go out to eat a lot it‚Äôs harder to track. They still have loads of foods make/model you should be able to find something close.  If i could have something. I‚Äôd like to be able to track my weight as well.  I can track my calories weekly/monthly.  Everyone should have this app because after you see how many calories certain foods are you will decide you aren‚Äôt hungry.

title: Free version is üëçüèΩ
body: I recently started following a keto lifestyle, I have lost about ten pounds without trying very hard and now I am trying to maintain. Hands down, I would not have been successful without this app. I downloaded a couple of different apps to track my macros, but found that the free versions were very limited. I find nothing lacking in this app. Not only is this app very user friendly, especially when finding foods and exercises in the database, but you can customize your goals to fit the lifestyle you choose.

title: Lost weight and found a New Lifestyle
body: I started using weight watchers using the free month and paid a little I think. It helped in being able to see good calories and bad calories. It set me up for my nest purchase of Thrive by Le-Vel. This is a supplement that fills your nutritional GAPs. I used the Thrive which gave me the energy levels to get up and Thrive. I‚Äôve been using the app to track my daily intake and it helps me form better habits. Well that an a lot of other things. I recently signed up for High Performance Habits too. It‚Äôs turning out to all run great together.

title: I like having meal plans
body: My only issue is that you can‚Äôt see the meals until the first day. I work so being able to plan and prepare some things ahead would be nice. Also I have very little desire to eat meat replacements. I would prefer to have an option about that when selecting what type of eater we are. Maybe it‚Äôs better for my weight loss, but if I‚Äôm not going to eat it, it‚Äôs unrealistic to include it as part of my plan. I‚Äôve never been successful in the long term planning to eat things that I don‚Äôt enjoy. Much of the meals look great and I‚Äôm excited to try them, but no tofu or soy patties for me!
response: Thanks so much for this helpful feedback! :)

title: Been using for 3 months
body: I‚Äôve been using the free features this app has to offer for three months.
