The visual layout daily of nutrient distribution between protein, carbs, and fats is easy to analyze as well as the weekly/monthly progress charts. One great feature is the scanner which allows you to easily input food to check nutrition before consuming. Started with a goal and the calories change as you progress towards said goal. Highly recommend for anyone wanting an easy way to track their progress.
response: Hi there! Thank you for your review. We're happy to hear you are enjoying the MyPlate app.

title: I really love this app
body: I love that this helps gain and lose weight! Not everyone needs to lose so that‚Äôs a huge plus for me. I‚Äôm trying to gain weight and while I thought I was eating enough calories per day, I CLEARLY was not after using this app. I realized I was eating far less. This app helps with everything! I‚Äôve gained 5 pounds so far and it has every food option possible! You can even take a photo of the barcode and it will automatically find what you scanned and it will add your calories. NO BETTER APP OUT THERE! Thank you so much!!!! ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

title: can not measure up
body: I have been using the most popular app in this category for years however it has recently become very buggy and difficult to use so I tried to switch to myplate.
response: Hi Jac18281828! Thank you for contacting us! We very much appreciate your feedback and I have passed along your comments to our product development team.  As we are always adding new content and features to the site and app, we love getting feedback as it helps guide our designs and tools moving forward.

title: It Worked For Me
body: I had pretty much given up on losing weight on my own and was ready to go on my first-ever formal diet. I saw this, decided to give it a shot and I lost the 12 lbs I was unable to shed. I went 4 lbs beyond my goal, which is okay. I don't monitor food and exercise currently, but will do so if I put on those 4 extra pounds I lost.  Losing 1 pound a week was an easy, healthy way to go. And you can have a bad day now and then, as long as you can get back on track. It involves taking maybe 15-20 minutes a day and was worth it for me.

title: A nice resource
body: It‚Äôs nice to be able to track what you‚Äôre eating and to be aware of what‚Äôs going in your body(how many carbs, proteins, and Fats) and to know what your diet is ultimately made up of. I haven‚Äôt had drastic change myself in my body weight yet, but I am now aware of what I‚Äôm eating and how I can make a change and I have lost a few pounds so far. It‚Äôs also nice to have a free platform that not only tracks your food, but also tracks your water intake, exercises, weight, and gives healthy food options, as well as simple exercises

title: Love it but doesn‚Äôt track calories burned accurately
body: First day using this app & I really like it. Very user friendly & does a great job of keeping track of your food intake. I would‚Äôve given it 5 stars if it calculated my calories burned more accurately. That part of the app doesn‚Äôt sync with your Apple Watch or have a feature to turn it on while you actually workout to calculate the calories burned. I had a full day of work & worked out for 45 minutes & it only calculated that I burned 97 calories for the whole day. My activity app calculated 241 calories just got the exercise portion of my day.

title: Amazing App!
body: An amazing app. Hard to find an app that so accurately helps me track my calorie count daily. Plus the addition of chat forums for advice as well as complimentary workout videos only makes it 10X better. I love it and it's really helping me in my journey to achieve my fitness goals. I find no matter how many times I try another calorie counting app, I always come back to this one because it‚Äôs so user friendly, is easy to use, and had one of the biggest catalogs of food to choose from when searching for foods.
response: Thanks so much for your feedback and review, CosmicSkies143! We're thrilled to hear you're enjoying MyPlate.

title: Simple and Accurate
body: I love this app. It‚Äôs very easy to use and simple to follow when it comes to documenting your macros. I‚Äôve been on a stricter diet and workout schedule, and I‚Äôve definitely since improved changes because of how efficiently I‚Äôve learned to manage my macros. This app includes multiple food options for accurate measurements, and it‚Äôs a great tool overall. Thank you for improving it, and I hope you continue to add new food/edible products for measurements. I also love the design. It‚Äôs friendly and easy to read!! :))

title: Super functional but could use some design improvements
body: This really does the job of tracking and the best feature by far is the barcode scanner.
response: Thanks for trying out the MyPlate app! We're happy to hear of you and your husband's weight loss success, and we're glad to be part of the journey!

title: I love this app! There‚Äôs one thing I would like added though
body: This is the only calorie tracking app I‚Äôve really enjoyed. The only thing I would add is being able to add people on the app/follow people. My friend and I are both trying to eat healthier and lose weight and it would be awesome if there was an ability to follow other people and see what they‚Äôre eating, etc. Other than that there is a small bug when trying to create your own meal and the app crashing after scanning a second item in. Other than those two small things this app is flawless!

title: Love it! But would make one change...
body: I really love how easy this app is to use. I love that you can find most everything you eat in the list of foods. The ability to scan items into your menu is amazing!

title: Simple but powerful
body: I have found this app to be very simple, but powerful. I didn‚Äôt find it intuitive in the beginning and was disappointed to find little in the way of online instructions, but I eventually figured out what I needed to do by trial and error. The one time I emailed with a question, I got a helpful reply, but by then had figured it out on my own. I‚Äôll be sticking with Streaks. I like it and It has been very helpful to me. It‚Äôs amazing how many of life‚Äôs ‚Äúissues‚Äù can be corrected by establishing good habits or eliminating bad ones.
response: Hi there! We appreciate you leaving a review. We're happy to hear the app is working for you. Here is a Get Started Guide you may find useful:

title: Best calorie counting app ever
body: I highly recommend this app for anyone who is trying to lose weight. Calorie counting has made a BIG difference in my weight loss journey.  I don‚Äôt work out as much as I should (mainly because I work full time and go to school) and I still am losing weight! I also love that I can see how much carbs, fat, and protein and I am consuming. I noticed a trend and quickly changed certain things and I can honestly say I am seeing results! Anyone out there who struggles with their weight, I just want to say this tool is great.

title: Results! Results! Results!
body: I was using a basic calorie counter app that really didn‚Äôt have a lot of capabilities to track the actual food I was eating. Between not being able to get the correct quantities and the correct food I found myself guessing on a lot of my entries.

title: Recent ‚ÄúProgress‚Äù App Updates are Terrible
body: I would have rated this App 5 stars but due to the latest App update where they have completely changed the ‚ÄúProgress‚Äù section is making me want to delete the App and never renew. It is not user-friendly. The fact they have gotten rid of the red to indicate where your over your daily calories (now over and under calories is the same color: Turquoise). The interface in this section is hard to read and confusing. I simply don‚Äôt understand why it would be changed his this when it was so clear to read before. Terrible UI/UX experience with this section.
response: Thanks for your review and feedback. We‚Äôve just released an update to the app addressing these concerns. Please update to version 5.31.0. If you still have questions or concerns, please send us an email at¬†support@livestrong.com.

title: MyPlate Wins
body: The calorie burn count is extremely buggy, please fix. Took a star... I downloaded MyPlate and lose it! at the same time and did both for three days. I like this one better for several reasons: 1. You can save foods that u eat every day, like coffee. 2. You can graph not only weight but calories BMI fats etc. 3. You can track water without upgrading 4. It tracks your exercise when you bring your phone, like an exercise app. The only thing I liked better about Lose It! Was that it's food database seemed more complete. And it gives you 200 more calories a day for the same goal üò´ Note that I used the free versions. Good luck!
response: Hi Emile! Thank you for your review and feedback. Our team is aware of the issues with calories burned and is working on a fix. We're so sorry for the inconvenience.

title: Good app
body: Well it‚Äôs free and it‚Äôs help me lose weight. It helps you track your carbs, proteins, and fat intake so you can see what you‚Äôre lacking or getting too much of. Many of us are creatures of habit want to comes to food and I really like how they keep your most common foods for certain meals at the top so it‚Äôs much easier to account for your daily food. I have been recommending this app to my friends and family. Whether your goal is weight loss weight gain or just to live a healthier life this is a good food tracker app for you.

title: Great guide
body: I like the set up of how it shows your activities and what you ate. And remind you to put in what you had for the day. Plus it gives you guidance in meals, you just set it in what you eat ( what I mean by that is if you eat any animal products or your a vegetarian or vegan. Also you can sign up for their exercise programs answer some questions about yourself they send you exercise videos that would fit you. You don‚Äôt feel alone in what you are working towards. That where the community comes in.

title: Needs improvement!
body: There is no way to edit/correct the nutrition information after adding a new product- very easy to make an error and impossible to correct. I also found that most of the items that I scanned were incorrectly entered when comparing the package‚Äôs nutrition panel to what the app showed (this is after scanning a barcode).
response: Hello! You can edit a custom food by doing the following: Select ‚ÄúBreakfast‚Äù, ‚ÄúLunch‚Äù, ‚ÄúDinner‚Äù or ‚ÄúSnack‚Äù from the Track tab. Tap on "My Food".  Tap ‚ÄúEdit‚Äù next to any of your created items to edit the information within. Delete foods in meals by swiping from right to left and tapping ‚ÄúDelete‚Äù. To add items to a meal, click ‚ÄúAdd food‚Äù at the top of the edit screen. Be sure to tap ‚ÄúDone‚Äù at the top to save your changes.

title: Count your calories!!
body: Years ago, I was resigned that I would just be 220# for the rest of my life. At 6-1, that‚Äôs kinda heavy, especially if I want to keep up with my buddies on mountain bikes. Talking to people and reading, I figured out that it doesn‚Äôt matter how hard you work out, if you‚Äôre exceeding your calorie output with your input. Time for a change. With the help of this app, I lost 28# in about 5-months. Now if my weight starts to creep up over the winter, I hit the gym a little harder and go back to ‚ÄúMyPlate‚Äù for an eating tune-up.

title: Best food tracking app available!
body: I absolutely love this app and it‚Äôs features. I lost 20lbs with the help of this app. I have a habit of binge eating and this helps to keep me accountable. I love that it includes your exercise and will deduct your burned calories! If you struggle with overeating and want something to help keep you accountable with your calorie and nutrition intake, this is the app for you! I do wish it had the capability to track supplement intake such as iron. It would be awesome to know how much daily iron and other vitamins I am taking in through food.

title: User friendly
body: I‚Äôve tried a few other apps, but have always had the most success using MyPlate. It‚Äôs incredibly user friendly and has all of the components needed to take charge and keep track of healthy habits. I‚Äôm three months back in and nothing helps me plainly see and organize my meals, weight, and benefits of exercise. I highly recommend to everyone looking for a straight-forward app that isn‚Äôt high maintenance or overwhelming with data. Always an A+ in my grade book, which is why I keep using it.

title: So far...
body: *Sigh* tons of issues with the synching to health and Garmin. For the first few days it was automatically adding calories burned from my Garmin 735 as well as iPhone steps. Now it's all over the place...don't even know where it's getting the numbers.
response: Hi there! Thanks for the review and feedback. We'd like to take a look at what you are seeing with the macro counter. This is the first report we've heard of this. Please reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Fast Food Tracking with a clear interface
body: Overall I really like MyPlate. The interface is fast and you can input food quickly. Seeing your progress for the date is very easy too. Just a great interface overall.
response: Hi there! Thank you for your review and helpful feedback! You can actually add custom foods and meals by tapping a meal period, and then tapping My Food or My Meals. This saves you from having to scroll and wait for the prompt! After you've added an item, you can always find it under the My Food or My Meals tabs. We've shared the rest of your feedback with our team. Thanks again and please email us at support@livestrong.com with any other questions or comments.

title: Wish adding foods was more streamlined
body: I love the app - I wish it was easier to log foods though. I would like to have one list of ALL foods scanned and manually entered - and be able to add it without having to add it to ‚ÄúI ate this‚Äù and then take it off the eaten list.
response: Hi there! Thank you for the review and feedback. The foods you have recently logged will be in your Recent Foods list. Here is a Get Started Guide you may find useful: https://www.livestrong.com/slideshow/1011166-myplate-calorie-tracker-app-guide/  If you have any questions, don't hesitate to reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Frequent glitch
body: I really like this app: the concept, the workouts, the community. But for some reason every time I open up the app, my ‚ÄúActivity Tracker‚Äù toggle has been turned off. I checked in my iPhone settings to see if maybe sharing was turned off there, but it‚Äôs not! The app just automatically turns off my activity tracker.

title: Best of the best!
body: I was looking for a SIMPLE TO USE app to monitor my current calorie and nutrition intake,  to help pinpoint areas I could improve and an app that I continue using without taking too much time or effort. This app has met those needs and gone far beyond my expectations! I use the app on my iPhone and iPad mini.

title: Love it!
body: Super easy to track calories and macros.
response: Awesome!!! Congrats on your success so far! We're so glad to be part of your journey.

title: 4 stars, I just wish...
body: I have been using this app for about a week now, after trying a few others. I was recently diagnosed with Diabetes and love that this app syncs with all my other ones in my apple health. I can enter my food here, my blood sugar there and my sleep etc over there and they‚Äôre all right there in one place.  If I had a wish it would be also being allowed to see the total carbs for each meal as well as the accumulated total for the day.  I‚Äôm sure more foods/restaurants are forth coming as well.
response: Hi laeaglefan! You can view macronutrients by meal by upgrading to our Gold membership. Please email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions!

title: Unlike everyone else
body: Unlike everyone else. I‚Äôm using this app to ‚ÄúGAIN‚Äù weight and it‚Äôs actually synced with my Apple Watch along with a fitness app and I will tell you the journey has been great. Even as a vegan using this app it‚Äôs been great. I don‚Äôt believe the Upgrade is actually worth the price. Unless you‚Äôre looking to track your macros than, okay.

title: Best food tracking app
body: I‚Äôve tried several different food tracking apps both recently and in the past. This is by far the best. It has the widest variety of food. Another big advantage is the adding a recipe (must be done on the site) or adding a recipe to ‚Äúmy meals‚Äù on the app make it easier to get more accurate calorie/nutrient breakdowns of the food you cook at home without having to re-enter all the ingredients in a recipe every time you eat the leftovers or cook that meal. The macro nutrient breakdown is a nice feature too.
response: Hi there! Thanks for your feedback! We‚Äôre glad you are enjoying MyPlate. We're constantly looking for new ways to improve our site and apps, and we love getting feedback as it helps guide our process moving forward.

title: Amazing app that has everything you need!!!
body: I have never wrote a review on an app before, but I need to give credit where credit is due. This app is, hands down, the best app I have ever used. With a weekly grocery list emailed to you weekly, and your meal recipes emailed you to daily, you don‚Äôt even have to think about tracking food. It‚Äôs literally like having a nutritionist completing all your planning for you. And I super appreciate the vegetarian recipes, which are all amazing. My biggest down fall has always been coming home from work to a bare fridge and  feeling exhausted. Then I binge on crappy food.  Now I don‚Äôt. With a bit of meal prepping, I have everything I need. This app is amazing!!!
response: Hi there! Thanks for the review. It's exciting to hear how well the app is working for you.

title: I recommend this app to everyone
body: I was 5‚Äô4 and 149 lbs and I wanted to lose 15 lbs when I started using this app to lose weight . I ate the easy to make meals on the meal plan and did the workouts that were recommended. I lost about 1 pound a week. It has now been 6 months since I first started and I have surpassed my goal and lost 30 lbs and I feel great!  Everyone comments on how good I look and ask me how I did it. I tell them I am using this app.  This is a healthy way to lose weight and I highly recommend it.

title: Good, but servings are weird
body: I wanna love this app, but some of the math when it comes to logging the amounts of food don‚Äôt make sense to me. For example, some foods just have ‚Äú1 serving‚Äù as the amount. How much is a serving? It doesn‚Äôt say. Some foods have ‚Äú1 serving (3 ounces)‚Äù which is great that the serving size is quantified, but I find it odd that my only other denomination for amounts are either in pounds or grams. Why can‚Äôt I choose ounces?

title: Good at first
body: At first this app was great, I loved being able to track my meals and it helped me lose weight. I also loved how it made me more conscious of what I was eating, so in a way it also helped me choose healthier options. But after barely a month, it started to get really buggy. Adding a food became a challenge, I would repeatedly get told that my request timed out or the data wasn‚Äôt in the correct format. So if I wanted to be tracking my food, I could only track foods I had already added. This was especially annoying because I‚Äôm a person who loves to try new foods and I just couldn‚Äôt track them. But it was good at first, and everything else works fine.

title: Really strong app missing some very minor features
body: Really great app!  Been using MyPlate since before LiveStrong acquired it, I use it everyday and it really helps me with tracking my daily needs!! My only one regret is that since I weigh everything on a scale, I typically don‚Äôt end up being exactly 1/4, 1/3, 1/2 etc of a portion and instead would love the ability to add decimals to truly represent accurate caloric measurements
response: Thank you so much for your review and suggestion Dragosmore! We understand that many of our users weigh their food so this is definitely a feature that we are thinking about. You can still add new foods in the app! Please tap My Foods and then Create New Food to do so. Please email us at support@livestrong.com with any other questions!

title: Could Use A Calorometer
body: I would like to see a calorometer that keeps me on track with my calorie goals. I like to picture a bar that grows each time I add food, and if I'm not adding food at the right intervals, it gets on me about it. I.E. Kyle, you were doing so well this morning eating all that oatmeal. What happened? Now you're going to have to eat three chicken breasts to make up for your ignorance this afternoon.

title: Something final working
body: This is so simple. I‚Äôve haven‚Äôt made any life style changes, yet.  So easy to keep track of my food intake. In three weeks I‚Äôve lost 6 lb.  you do need to buy a good scale so you can weigh yourself every morning at the same time, that is important. Once you start seeing a half lb gone then a lb gone. ITS YIPPY FOR YOU. And yes I put in the 8 oz glass of wine and in stead of a mix drink I just get vanilla whisky, just as good. Even with all that I‚Äôve been losing weight. Looking forward to when I can add workouts into the mix.

title: Love!! But won‚Äôt load food searches :(
body: I downloaded this app a couple days ago and everything was running smoothing I absolutely love it! But now it won‚Äôt load any food searches and keeps telling me no connection but every other app on my phone is running smoothly and I am connected to the internet. It keeps failing to scan bar codes as well :( I don‚Äôt want to delete the app and re-install it because I don‚Äôt want to lose all of my data. Is anyone else having this issue?
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage at our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Can‚Äôt connect
body: I‚Äôve tried it. My friends have tried it. No one can even sign up for it. It won‚Äôt load, then it‚Äôll crash. I‚Äôm super bummed, because i really wanted to try this app. I‚Äôm hoping the problem can be addressed quickly.
response: Thanks so much for your patience and updated review!

title: Life changing
body: I started using this app a few weeks ago. I was completely lost on the whole tracking your macros lifestyle. This app makes it so incredibly easy and actually fun. I recently got an Apple Watch and to my surprise it automatically tracks how many calories I‚Äôve burned throughout the day. Being able to visually see where I‚Äôm at throughout the day with diet & exercise has helped me so much. I have had zero problems with the app crashing as I‚Äôve seen in other reviews.

title: Love it!
body: I‚Äôve never reviewed an app before but I‚Äôve been enjoying this one so much. I‚Äôve been a hardcore MyFitnessPal user for over a year now. MyPlate is much better. The interface is beautiful, easy to use and very sleek. I haven‚Äôt been able to test out the meal plan option yet.
response: Thank you so much for the awesome review and feedback, parrjj03! We're so happy to hear that you're enjoying the MyPlate app!!

title: LOVE so far‚ù£Ô∏è
body: Okay, so I had another one like this. I got tired of it real fast! So I downloaded this one, it is so EASY to USE! You can put in something if it is not there. It has meal plans for you, and exercise videos from all different levels. A community you can talk to. Transfers my health app on apple to one another! I just really love this app, and I‚Äôm not even paying yet and it has all of this for free!! I need an app like this so I know not to over eat or under eat( which I‚Äôm really bad about under eating!). Thank you‚ù£Ô∏è

title: Charged $48 without warning - no response to emails to support
body: The app is nice but I was suddenly subscribed as a‚ÄùGold Member‚Äù $48 year-long membership and I not notified until the payment confirmation. I have requested a refund via email but it‚Äôs impossible to talk to a live person. There‚Äôs no phone number.
response: Updated response 10/18/19- Hello! It looks like we replied to both your support email and app store review. We're so sorry if you did not receive these responses. We take customer service very seriously. Please do reach out to us at support@livestrong.com if you need further assistance.

title: Try this app if you‚Äôre looking to improve your life!!!
body: This is my first ever review of anything, that‚Äôs how much of an impact this tool has left on me. This app is awesome. Just started my caloric deficit and this makes it amazingly simple. The fact that you can scan nearly any barcode and have the nutritional info automatically uploaded is astonishing. Can‚Äôt wait to try some of theses recipes. If I had to make one critique it would be that you don‚Äôt have the opportunity to save the meals you want to try.
response: We are so honored to be your first review! We're happy that you're enjoying MyPlate and appreciate your feedback. Our team is working on the ability to save recipes from our recipe feed so stay tuned! Thanks again!

title: Lost 20 pounds in 4 months
body: There‚Äôs a paradigm shift that occurs when committed to writing down each day‚Äôs food consumption that just doesn‚Äôt exist when simply ‚Äòwinging it‚Äô.  By making myself accountable through My Plate, not only did I improve my diet, but I continuously strive to do better - to eat better foods and to space smaller meals out across the day. It‚Äôs also caused me to give up both dairy and gluten, two areas that were keeping me from shedding weight.  I‚Äôm 48 and haven‚Äôt been this light since I was a teenager!
response: WOW! Thanks for sharing your story with us! We are so happy to know that MyPlate helped you achieve your goals. Keep up the amazing work!

title: My
body: I‚Äôve tried other apps but I always come back to this one because it‚Äôs simple and uncluttered. However there are a few annoying issues.
response: Hi Holly! We've just released an update that will resolve this issue! Please go to the app store to download. Apologies for this brief inconvenience!

title: awesome app
body: This app can literally find any food of any kind anywhere and give you the exact serving you had. for example, if a full serving of butter is 1 tbls, but you only had 1/4 of that tablespoon, this app will recognize it and put the exact amount of calories, carbs, fat, and protein consumed. If you‚Äôre trying to lose weight, it will put you on a fat, carb, and protein calorie intake plan and it‚Äôs working wonders. it also tracks any movement you‚Äôve made to burn any calories and calculates your net. I will use this app FOREVER. FIVE STARS!!!

title: It simply...works!!!
body: I have a co worker that asked ‚Äòhow long are u gonna keep using that app‚Äô. She sees me using it and realizes that it is almost an obsession with me. But I told her ‚ÄòI will stop using it when it stops working‚Äô. It really does do the job I need it to.  When I have gotten lazy in the past and drifted away...the weight drifted on.  So I know it works and I think it is very robust with lots of documented data that makes tracking easy. And the extra tracking tools and community support seem top notch also!

title: Fantastic App
body: This is a fantastic app. So simple to use, even if you‚Äôre not consistent with it (like me). It‚Äôs easy to come back to and pick up where you left off. Excellent option for when you want to set some caloric goals for yourself; and it will show you how far off you were from your daily goal if you didn‚Äôt reach it. It‚Äôs also great for just tracking what you‚Äôre eating in general. I can‚Äôt say enough about how easy and useful/helpful this app is. Highly recommend.

title: This app is awesome!
body: I‚Äôve lost 138 lbs in the last two years and for 18 of those months I‚Äôve been using this app! My husband found out about this app in a weight loss class through Kaiser and told me about it. I couldn‚Äôt get passed the hump of losing my first 50 lbs because I can‚Äôt exercise due to chronic pain caused by fibromyalgia so monitoring what I eat and losing weight through diet has been the only way to go for me and this app makes that process so much easier to track. Thank you! God bless you!

title: Love this app!
body: This app has been so helpful to me for portion control and eating more than just carbs all day to help me stay full and not snack/overeat. I‚Äôm glad they finally added the option to edit the meals you can create in the app, but I wish they‚Äôd also make 1/8 of a serving an option. When cooking, I don‚Äôt always use a lot of an ingredient and I want to be able to track that correctly. But other than that, this app has everything you could need, even in the free version!

title: My favorite app
body: I‚Äôve been using this app since I was 13 and I love it, and will always love it. 21 and going strong and I live for the updates and I adjust as it adjusts and I‚Äôm thankful that it‚Äôs a part of my life. The tracker is great, the recommended workouts are great. The recipes give me new ideas to try (though if you‚Äôre African you gotta add some spices to most of them). Sure the community is a little annoying sometimes, but it‚Äôs like any other family.  Overall it‚Äôs pretty great. Thank you Livestrong!
response: Hi there! Thank you for the review and feedback. We appreciate your continued support.

title: Weight loss tool you must have.
body: Most people watch what they eat and keep a journal. I used this app and was able to Lois 80lbs. I stopped using this app and tried doing it on my own and gained 30 back. I am now back on here and plan to loose another 50-60 lbs. I live this app. It helps you understand what to and what not to eat. It helps me track not only my calories but carbs fats and protein to makes sure I get the amount required for me to loose my weight. Wish me luck as I continue my journey.
response: Thank you for the awesome review and best wishes on your journey. You got this!

title: Great app that will keep you accountable
body: Love this app, been using it for 2 months now and it‚Äôs worked great. I‚Äôve lost 25+ lbs and it keeps me in check. The pairing with my Apple Watch to track activity and calories burned is great as well. The one main item I wish would be updated to get this to 5 stars is in the food tracking portion. Being able to search by specific store or restaurant would be a huge plus. If you type ‚ÄúChipotle‚Äù it brings up a million things not related to the most clear thing you are searching for.

title: Good, but has some minor issues.
body: This app has many good features. It allows you to scan qr codes to easily log your foods nutritional information. It is also convenient that it has foods from popular restaurants. A problem I have is that when you first log a meal it will give you several serving options(cups, tablespoons, teaspoons etc.), but after logging a good for the first time those options go away. Furthermore some of the nutritional information is wrong. When I scan creamy peanut butter it gives me the wrong information.

title: Too many bugs
body: I have used MyPlate perfectly for over two years and it has been a great success. However in the most recent update, I can't scan products, search products, or even type my own in. This basically makes the application unusable. I've had to resort to apps that don't track my macros for free, which is really an inconvenience. Please MyPlate, fix these issues.
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage on our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Not bad
body: I like that I can sync my active energy (kcal) from Apple Health and is the main reason I use this app because of my non-name brand step tracker.
response: Thank you for your feedback!  We‚Äôre glad you are enjoying MyPlate!

title: It‚Äôs crazy how this app is free!
body: This app is beyond helpful, I‚Äôm 17 and 4 months deep into the process of working out. My friends around me tell me a I have dad bod, until I take off my shirt. But I‚Äôd like to look more thin. So I downloaded this app to help me count calories and it is incredible. The amount of food options there is, is unmatched! And the fact it gives me healthy food options and recipes is an incredible bonus! Absolutely love! Would recommend to any friend or person looking to cut a few pounds.

title: It works!
body: I‚Äôve been using the app for years whenever I need to lose a few pounds. There‚Äôs nothing more important than keeping track of what you eat. If you‚Äôre honest about portion size, you‚Äôll see exactly why you‚Äôre gaining or losing. Nearly every food I want to enter is already in the database so it‚Äôs very easy. I enter my weight to see my progress chart which motivates me. There are tons of other features I don‚Äôt need or use that are probably valuable to others.
response: Hi there! Thanks for the review. We're glad MyPlate is helping you to achieve your goals.

title: Dave
body: Get app easy to use and works well with my Apple  phone and watch.  My goal was to lose 10 pounds. By using the app I can stay focused on my calorie count. it forces my to evaluate everything I eat and makes me second guess taking extra food or eating snacks. It hard at first but then it becomes normal behavior. Now I try to go under the calorie goal each day to lose weight faster. If I didn‚Äôt know the numbers it would be impossible to do.

title: The best food tracker I‚Äôve found yet!!
body: This app, am I‚Äôm talking about the free version, is by far the best out there. It‚Äôs easy to add your meals; for the most part every food I‚Äôve ate is already programmed in the barcode. I have full intentions on paying for the gold service just to track more than my calories, example carbs and sugars. I haven‚Äôt found where I can sync my smart watch to the calories burnt, but I‚Äôm ok with just adding it in. That is the only issue I‚Äôve found so far. I LOVE this app!!
response: Hi SkyySober! We're happy to hear you are enjoying the app. Data can be imported from devices you have linked to the Health app. If you have questions regarding this, please reach out to us at support@livestrong.com. We're happy to help.

title: How do I cancel my Stronger meal/workout plan?
body: I got started with using and signing up with the 8 week stronger plan while getting emails.  However I workout so much and eat well enough already I don‚Äôt need the Monday emails/Stronger tips anymore.  How do I cancel the plan?  I only know how to restart it but I don‚Äôt want to use that part anymore.
response: Thanks so much for your review! You can unsubscribe from the Stronger emails by logging into your account on our desktop site and modifying your email subscription settings. Please email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions.

title: Great app, but it‚Äôs been annoying lately
body: I love this app. It is beautiful, user-friendly, and has everything I want or need. Thank you to anyone who made it! However, since I got the Apple Watch things got a little annoying. The app, for some reason, gets info about the calories I burned from my watch AND my phone. In most cases, I have them both with me, so it dramatically overcounts (usually almost x2). Deleting exercise proved useless (as it just pops back up in 2 seconds) and I cannot find a way to ‚Äúunsync‚Äù just my phone from the app.
response: Hello! We apologize for the double counting. Our team is aware of this and is working on a solution. In the meantime, we recommend turning off activity tracking in the MyPlate app. This will allow the app to sync only with your Apple Watch. To do this, please do the following:

title: Used to love this app- now, not so much
body: App used to work great and included your micros. Now they want money for micros. I could understand if they were adding micros to an app that didn‚Äôt have them but they have taken away.
response: Hello! It is still completely free to track micronutrients. We have not taken this feature away, nor have we made it a paid feature. We're sorry to hear about the issues you're experiencing, and we'd love to help. Please send us an email at support@livestrong.com.

title: Good overall, but...
body: Pretty good app overall, but I‚Äôd like to suggest adding 1/8 serving size when logging food. The lowest is 1/4, and other competing apps go down to 1/8 serving. Also, when creating a meal, I‚Äôd like to be able to divide that into serving sizes. Right now you just add food to the meal and it gives you the total calories for the ENTIRE meal rather than letting you divide it into servings. Laatly, when creating a new food, I‚Äôd love it if I could add saturated fat, sugar, sodium, and fiber instead of just macros. If these things were added I‚Äôd definitely give it 5 stars!

title: Best of the bunch
body: I hate wasting time logging my food when I first start a food tracking app or when you haven‚Äôt been on for a long time because you have to start from scratch with all the info on everything you eat. Not this one. Right off the bat you start typing a few letters of what you ate and it automatically brings up possible choices, click to see specifics and presto you see exactly what you ate and click. Super easy, super fast. Loving it.
response: Awesome. We're so glad to hear you're enjoying MyPlate!

title: Exercise tracking
body: 6/1/18 Rating updated from 2 to 4 stars for the prompt reply on how to fix my issue with fitness tracking. App would update exercise automatically from my Apple Watch/ health app/ activity app but since MyPlate updated two days ago it no longer logs any exercise from my watch despite all setting on my phone being that same. So now have no choice but to manually enter at end of day to get total net calories consumed which doesn‚Äôt help at all Throughout the day when you don‚Äôt know consumed vs burned vs net.
response: Hello! Please confirm that activity tracking is turned on in the app. To do this, please tap the white silhouette icon in the upper left corner of the screen. Then tap "App Preferences". Be sure that the button next to "Track My Activity" is toggled to the green on position. Please email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions.

title: Great results, a little buggy
body: I put in a goal if 1.5lbs a week and that‚Äôs exactly what I‚Äôve been losing.
response: Hi! Thanks so much for your feedback! We are very happy that using our app is helping you reach your goals! We want you to know that we are also committed to improving your experience with the app. Please reach us at support@livestrong.com with any bugs you may find and we'll gladly work to crush them!

title: No Sync?
body: I have been using the older version of this app and it automatically upgraded me last week to the new version which I don‚Äôt find as appealing. I do like that I can now enter my own food but it is very basic info. Also, anything I enter in my iPad does not sync with the app on my phone and vice-versa (sometimes). I can physically sync my phone, watch and iPad for exercise/activity but not food. This is the first time I am experiencing these issues. It seems that since I‚Äôm logged into the same account, it should read it and although it did a couple of days ago, that data has disappeared on my phone version in pieces (some is still visible there).

title: Love it!
body: I love this app and have been using it for years. It is easy to use and I am always amazed at how many foods they have in their data base to be able to log. I also like the fact that you can add foods if you can‚Äôt find what you‚Äôre looking for.

title: Great way to keep track when dieting!
body: I have used MyPlate to keep track of my food intake, calories and salt for several years. If you‚Äôre counting carbs it does that, too. It‚Äôs a way to diet and eat healthier in a more conscious way. If you can‚Äôt find one of your foods and/or the scan doesn‚Äôt recognize it, you can enter the info yourself. It also keeps track of how many calories I‚Äôve burned off by activity and exercise. It connects to my Apple Watch as well. I just love this app!

title: went crazy after getting an AppleWatch
body: This is a fun app to use and I found it very helpful to track my Macronutrient intake on my iPhone.  However, after getting my Applewatch and inputting data via the watch,

title: Over the Moon...Super App
body: I have been using this app for two years now, and find it to be excellent.  Although things in my busy life tend to make me get off track, this outstanding app has sweet reminders to keep me ON track.  Congratulations to the folks that provide this super app for free.  As soon as I learn how to pay for the whole application I will download it.  Not computer savvy, but this app is easy to use.  ITS A BIG 10 STARS FOR YOU GUYS AND GALS.  Thank you so much.  You are all Gods and Goddesses.  Greatful in Nevada City, Ca.
response: Thank you Sandi! We are so happy that you're enjoying MyPlate!

title: I would give this app 5 stars but
body: It keeps logging my height as 157cm. I am not that short.
response: Hi there! We really appreciate your review and feedback. I'm sorry your measurements are not sticking. This can probably be resolved by changing your units from cm to in. Input your height in inches and your calorie goal. After doing so, switch your units back to cm.

title: Adding food item
body: I have noticed that when I add a food item, many of the nutritional numbers default to a smaller amount or a decimal after I ‚Äúsave‚Äù the item. I am using information from a restaurant‚Äôs website. I thought that it was just a temporary glitch that would correct itself overnight, but I see that some items are still in the glitch status several days later. The calories are correct, but all the other items, carbs as an example, are not. Please check this out.
response: Hi Big MC2! We have identified a bug with the green pop up button that you're using to create a custom food. The team is working on a fix for this issue right now! In the meantime, please follow the steps below to create a custom food item:

title: Great App
body: Great set of features. I like that it pulls the full calorie burn from the Apple Watch (not just the exercise ones). The only thing I wish it had on the watch is the ability to quickly add food from recents or favorites, instead of dictating it through speech-to-text - it looks weird to randomly name food items into your watch. Would be great if it pulled workout sets and associated calories burned into the appropriate tab on the iPhone app as well. Oh and an alcoholic drink counter (separate from nutrition and calories) would be great ;).

title: Love the app, very user friendly
body: Love this app, very user-friendly. I love the variety of foods already built into the app database and all the tools to monitor my diet. One feature I would love to see if the ability to move foods from one meal to another (I accidentally enter food for the whole day under breakfast on a regular basis), without having to delete it all and start again under Lunch or Dinner. Overall, fantastic app, very handy. I‚Äôve shared with friends and highly recommend.

title: Great app
body: I‚Äôve been an iOS user for over 8 years and I‚Äôve never rated an app. However, this app really deserves a 5 star rating. It is very user friendly and does everything go you would like it to do and MUCH MORE. It‚Äôs unlike any other app in this category, this app does not try to rip you off. Having every detail for every food and recipes for delicious healthy foods. I lost 15lbs of fat very quickly and I‚Äôve been the healthiest and leanest I‚Äôve ever been in my life. Thank you MyPlate

title: Great App
body: I have been using the app for many years off and on.  I‚Äôm back on again for the past couple of months.  It was good before but has really improved from the last time I was keeping it current.  Ease of use and finding food items has greatly improved. All the support libraries and menus, workouts are great additions (maybe they have been there all along but now they are integrated in very nicely).  Thanks for keeping MyPlate alive and well.
response: Hi there! Thank you for your awesome review. We appreciate your feedback as it guides our designs moving forward.

title: Love it!
body: I absolutely love this app. It has everything you need, from tracking calories, fat, and protein. To tracking weight, water intake, and vitamin intake. It is super easy to use and great for working out, since it tracks how many calories you have burned too! I don't have to worry about if I had too much to eat because I can finally understand what i‚Äôm putting in my body. I also love the recipes they give you! I can‚Äôt wait to see how they improve the app!
response: Hi VinnieMcNugget! Thank you for your feedback. We‚Äôre glad you're getting so much out of MyPlate's features. We're constantly looking for new ways to improve our app, and we love getting feedback as it helps guide our process moving forward.

title: Good App
body: I‚Äôve been using this app for 4 months and I find it great I‚Äôve gotten into the habit of putting in my food at different times during the day.

title: Some suggestions
body: So far I‚Äôm loving the app for calorie tracking. Paired with My Health, it takes into consideration calories burned and lets me see at a glance where I am for the day.

title: Improve ‚ÄúMy Meals‚Äù
body: Loving the app - user friendly but needs one major upgrade. Would like if I could import recipes from websites or other and then select the portion of the recipe I‚Äôve eaten. The current set up is such a hassle having to manually enter each ingredient and do the math to come up with amount of each ingredient per serving rather than just entering the entire recipe and the having the option to adjust how much of that I ate. My Fitness Pal is definitely way better when it comes to this feature.
response: Hi there! We are working on bringing a custom Recipe function to the app and hope to include this in a future update!

title: Difficult to navigate/change
body: The app is good at arithmetic. That‚Äôs about it. Navigation and entering data is cumbersome. I know how many calories I can consume to not gain weight. Therefore I know how many calories to consume to lose weight. There is an option to assign your goal calories if you don‚Äôt want to use the preset number that has been chosen for you, the app shows that my goal calories are almost 3,000 daily. When I turn that option off it reverts to 1,200 calories. I want to choose 1,400 calories. It doesn‚Äôt allow that. So I use the 1,200 calories it doesn‚Äôt allow. As a result the comparison algorithm really doesn‚Äôt apply to me.
response: Hi Hank! We're so sorry that you're having trouble saving a manual calorie goal. Our team is looking into this, but we'd love if you could send us an email at support@livestrong.com with these details. Thank you!

title: Amateur hour of software development
body: App is buggy and the user experience is terrible. You run into issues that any software development team with any pride or QA testing would not have let ship to customers. Simple or stuff like entering in a meal and all the vales are 2 decimal points off (eg 2 grams becomes .02 g), random blocks on the screen not properly formatting, crashes, freezing, etc. put in a support case in after 10 days have not heard anything back.
response: Hi Texanmutt! We're so sorry for the experience you've had. We've resolved the formatting and crashing issues with our latest update, released on Friday. The decimal point issue is something that our team is aware of and is working to fix. In the meantime, you can create a custom item with correct macros by tapping My Foods and then Create New Food. We don't see a support email from the email we have on file for your account. So sorry about that! Please send us another email so that we can assist you further.

title: Really Effective
body: This app has helped me to lose the weight I have been wanting to lose while being able to enjoy food and manage what time of day I should be eating each meal or snack. When I exercise the calculator provides me with how much I have done for the day and gives me extra calories to eat with if I choose to do so. I am losing the weight just as the app has showed me. Love this app and it has changed my life for the better and I'm getting healthier.

title: Otherwise ideal app for weight control beginners if not for the exercise tracking problem
body: Generally, this is a very good app for tracking calorie intake. However, the calorie for exercise does not sync well and disappears all the time. While there is option for manual input, I don‚Äôt think as a weight control beginner, I‚Äôm able to reach a full level and the manual input for exercises searched might be inflated. Still wish to have a reliable estimation of my exercises. feel quite discouraged and frustrated when seeing calories jump to zero after a long walk or exercise
response: Hi hippotomice! Thank you for your review and feedback. We are aware of this issue and we're working on a resolution. We're so sorry for the inconvenience and any frustration this may have caused you.

title: Almost perfect
body: The app is really easy to use, and makes sticking to your diet a LOT easier. It‚Äôs fairly easy to find the food you ate, though most of the newer stuff from restaurants isn‚Äôt on there. The only thing I don‚Äôt like it that it doesn‚Äôt let you delete anything under your exercise, and it doesn‚Äôt really contain any ‚Äúregular‚Äù workouts that you would do like online. (i.e. crunches, squats, leg raises, donkey kicks, etc.) but, surprisingly it includes everyday things like walking, standing, etc. Overall, it‚Äôs a great app

title: Great app
body: It‚Äôs very user friendly and easy to understand. I love that you can scan the barcode instead of entering everything manually... only reason I didn‚Äôt give 5 stars is it would be nice to be able to forward my food diary. I work with a nutritionist and would like to be able to send her the information. It would also be nice if the app allowed you to track the time you have each meal. My work schedule varies and it would make it easier to stick to somewhat of a schedule.

title: Great app! So easy
body: I decided, two weeks ago, to start tracking my food. After three months of lockdown, I had put on a few lbs. I found this app and LOVE it! So easy to use and it has really helped me to track not only calories but, sodium.

title: Good but could use improvements
body: This is a good basic app. What‚Äôs frustrating is that the basic version and even the gold version don‚Äôt allow you to customize your macros. It goes in increments of 5%. That‚Äôs not ideal when you‚Äôre precisely tracking. I tried a free trial of the gold version, and backed out of it then next day because it‚Äôs not customizable.
response: Hi there! Thank you for the review and feedback. To delete a custom food, under the "my food" tab, swipe left on the food you will be given the option to edit or delete. If you would like to reach out to us with any other questions or suggestions, please contact us at support@livestrong.com.

title: I use this app everyday several times a day
body: It‚Äôs super healthful. I have a fitness photo shoot in July and this has been a relief off me to ensure I‚Äôm intaking the right amount of food and keeping track of hydrating as well. I‚Äôm already feeling and see every bit of a difference in my body. People keep asking me what I‚Äôm eating, and I didn‚Äôt change my diet at all. Thanks to this app, I love it . Btw this is my first review like ever. I never do these but I‚Äôve felt obliged to let the people know lol.

title: Great Keto App
body: I just got this app but already I really like it. I am especially pleased with the macro ability to know the percentages of fat, protein & carbs. This is especially important when you are doing a Keto lifestyle. The app is very user friendly. The food search is excellent. I am very happy to be able to put my own food info as well. The ability to track food, macros, exercise & water consumption and be able to track your progress is fantastic. Thanks for a great app!

title: Hate the new tracker graph
body: I had been using the free version for a while and kept at it even though it didn‚Äôt work well for my keto diet (it says I need 120 grams of carbs, doesn‚Äôt show net carbs on free, etc) but I found some of the macro features helpful and the graphs really motivated me. Last week I went to update my weight and it‚Äôs now a bar graph instead of a line graph and you can barely see any difference in the numbers now and progress looks like nothing. I‚Äôve lost 20 pounds so far and I loved watching that line drop. Now it looks like nothing. It sounds silly but it took all the wind out of my sails and I just skip using the app now.
response: Thanks for your review and feedback. We‚Äôve just released an update to the app addressing these concerns. Please update to version 5.31.0. If you still have questions or concerns, please send us an email at¬†support@livestrong.com.

title: Can‚Äôt search new foods or scan barcodes
body: This started a day or two ago. MyPlate can no longer search previously unused foods, or bring up results from barcode scans, or do anything internet-related.
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage at our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Thank you...just...thank you
body: The most resourceful, convenient, and useful app to be made. Health is so important, and with this app, those who are misinformed of their health needs are given the accessibility to begin a life-long health journey. You don‚Äôt even NEED a gold membership for the app to be good, I would MOST DEFINITELY recommend this as a starter health tracking app for those with health and fitness goals. I hope this app continues to do amazing things. Yes I put five stars; I‚Äôd put ten if I could.

title: I‚Äôm making progress!!
body: As much as I hate tracking calories, this app makes it pretty easy. I often just scan the barcode and adjust the serving amount.

title: I want more workouts!
body: I wish there were more guided workouts in the app, even the paid service seems to be lacking.  There are only two medium workouts and there could be so many more... please please please add more.

title: My food!
body: I love the app and I have lost weight. I like trying the recipes but I think some of them are not always good for you I really don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs a good idea to give a recipe for pizza and tell an over weight person to only eat 1 slice. And I think when they give you your menu for the week  maybe if they looked at some of the things you was eating. Like if you eat a lot of chicken add in recipes with chicken but that are healthy for you. But it is a great app to let you know the foods that are not really good for you.

title: Doesn‚Äôt Accurately Track Data
body: I scan the labels, put in my serving size and it doesn‚Äôt accurately track my sodium intake at all. I am so frustrated and disappointed by this. No matter what I put in, the app tells me I‚Äôve only had 1.3mg of sodium, which is completely inaccurate.  If the app is going to say that it is tracking it, then it needs to track it and not mislead me. The only thing is seems to actually track is calorie intake. However, at this stage I‚Äôm not convinced that the calories are accurate either. If it isn‚Äôt able to calculate the sodium correctly how do I know it‚Äôs tracking the calories correctly. Or anything else. I am just super frustrated by this. Please fix this!
response: Thanks for giving MyPlate a try! We've actually identified and fixed the bug causing sodium and cholesterol to track inaccurately, and will be rolling out a fix in the next update for the app. Please keep an eye out for updates in the App Store, as this fix should be available soon. We apologize for the inconvenience this glitch has caused, and thank you for your extended patience while we work on correcting this and making our tracker as accurate as possible.

title: I‚Äôve lost 40#
body: This help is so helpful in tracking my intake and exercise that I have lost 40# just by making small changes and using this app to track it all! I love that is syncs with my Apple health app and my running app so that I‚Äôm not over eating or starving myself depending on how much activity I‚Äôve been doing That feature that gives recipes and meal ideas according to how many calories or carbs you are to your goal is wonderful. Thank you so much.

title: I love this app!!
body: I‚Äôve been using MyFitnessPal for the longest time and then I came across this app. I like it because the layout and the food diary is so helpful showing the percentages and such. The only thing I‚Äôm confused on is when I scan certain foods it won‚Äôt work?? It says they don‚Äôt have that food in their log. It‚Äôs pretty frustrating to have to sit and enter all the nutrition facts for what I eat. I hope there‚Äôs a way to fix this because scanning the food you eat is so convenient but not if it doesn‚Äôt work
response: Hi Bubbles43! Thank you for your review and feedback. MyPlate uses a comprehensive third-party food database, which is a collection of listings from the USDA and some food manufacturers. Unfortunately, we're not able to add or remove items from this database as it is managed by Nutritionix. If you have any questions please reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Ok, but disappointed
body: I was excited for this app because it thought it would be a wonderful tool to help me get my BP on track by being able to see my sodium intake vs my potassium intake. I purchased the one month subscription and was disappointed to discover that ‚Äúverified‚Äù products didn‚Äôt list all the macronutrients that they do on the packaging and the app wouldn‚Äôt allow me to add them to the ‚Äú verified‚Äù product or going in a creating the food item myself.
response: Hi Virgo72! Thank you for your feedback. Unfortunately not all manufacturers have provided micronutrient information to the database that MyPlate uses. However, I am pleased to say we will be rolling out updates that allow users to add micronutrient information when they create Custom Foods in the app.

title: Very good!
body: This app is very helpful and also how you can chat with other people makes it even better. You can post pictures of your food and write about it! When you have problems you can write a message and people are going to help you out. It has workouts too! Being able to go on a journey with other people is amazing! Losing weight is a big thing in my mind and this app is helping me lose weight and gain muscle
response: Thanks for the awesome review!

title: Finally a simple way to reach desired weight!
body: So simple. Just enter sex, age, height and weight then how much weight you want to lose or gain a week. This app tells your calories to eat as well as the ratio of carbs, fats, and protein. Tracking is so easy. The community support helps keep you on track. The progress feature tracks nutrition and weight loss over time. Lost 33lbs and have managed to keep it off. I recommend this app to anyone wanting a healthier life style.

title: Great but can‚Äôt sync Health app for iOS
body: Easy to track and great layout but won‚Äôt sync with my iPhone‚Äôs logged activities for the day. I‚Äôve tried everything and haven‚Äôt been able to find a way to sync the activities. If that issue was fixed I‚Äôd definitely be giving a 5 star review. This is the only tracker I‚Äôve used that didn‚Äôt make me feel like I couldn‚Äôt reach my goals. I have ADHD and PTSD and will forget to eat so having that reminder pop up is essential for me. Great app other than not being able to get that correct data into my activities log.

title: Really great app
body: This app makes it so easy to track your calories! It takes just a few moments to input your data and everything you need to track is right there at your fingertips! I‚Äôve lost 12lbs in just over 3 months and it was easy. It is also helping me change my eating to have a more healthful diet. I might add that I have had to use customer service a couple of times and they were fast and very helpful.
response: Thanks so much for the review, Rod! We're so glad you are enjoying MyPlate :)

title: Great app but it has a really annoying bug
body: I‚Äôve been using this app for a few months now, and it was great, but it suddenly stopped letting me see anything when I search. It says I‚Äôm not connected to the WiFi and I can only add things I‚Äôve added previously. I checked thoroughly and I am definitely connected because I can do everything else but use this app. I also tried a different device but the same thing is still happening. It‚Äôs very frustrating because I can‚Äôt use the app.
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage at our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Great App!
body: I really enjoy using this app to track my meals and exercise. I find that this app is the most reliable source when it comes to finding foods that you don‚Äôt have a barcode to scan for (restaurant meals, drinks, etc.). I also like the ‚Äúcreate my food‚Äù section. That saves a lot of time when you make your own foods. One click and your done, vs adding each time individually. **I am on the KETO diet, so if you are on the same diet (or LCHF), this is the app for you!**

title: Great app!!
body: This apt allows you to select weight loss, weight maintain, or weight gain. I had lost 15lbs due to a bad reaction to medication and I needed to gain it back. This is the only app that has an option for weight gain. The scanner is a great way to get exact nutrient values. Most foods can be found already preloaded in the app! This app is absolutely amazing! The only thing that isn‚Äôt perfect is that it‚Äôs difficult to track calories burned unless you have an Apple Watch. Amazing app tho

title: Almost perfect
body: This app is the third app that I have used to count calories and it definitely exceeded my expectations, from the easy to use platform to the cool graphics and the break down of what I eat, even the free version is outstanding. The only thing, however, is that there is no option for being pregnant. I feel that this app would be over the top fantastic if there were an option on how to eat during pregnancy based on my specific body. Overall, wonderful app though.

title: Tracking is the key
body: I‚Äôve used MyPlate for several years.... intermittently ... when that dreaded 5-6 lbs creeps on... when your not looking. I find the best way to lose those lbs is to track everything I eat. Not only does it help to see what I‚Äôm eating and calories associated it has helped me understand what foods can be included in a healthy diet whether I‚Äôm in weight loss mode or just trying to maintain a healthy weight.
response: Hi there! Thank you for your review. We're glad to be a part of your healthy lifestyle.

title: Helping me be more aware!
body: This app is really helping me be more aware of what I eat/ do day to day. You can track your exercise and daily calories which is nice BUT even better is the macros tracker that tells you the breakdown of fats, carbs, and protein of each meal. I don‚Äôt eat meat so I have been struggling to calculate how much protein I get each meal and this app has made it so much easier. I have a much more complete understanding of where I can adjust my carb/protein/fat intake. I‚Äôm a fan!!
response: Thanks for the awesome review, Jerri!

title: Undecided if I like this or not
body: I tried other apps first and settled on this one, paying the subscription price, hoping for some help with losing some weight.
response: Hi there! Thank you for providing a review and feedback. If you do not consume dairy, I recommend setting your dietary preference to "vegan."

title: Historical Foods Not Properly Registering
body: Excellent App but ‚òùüèΩ, most times I need to search a food item as if it‚Äôs the first consumption/found because and saved item doesn‚Äôt properly re-populate once it‚Äôs selected.

title: Easy to use
body: I like that you can search for foods so quickly and that it saves your frequent food items. I also like that it breaks down the macros and how much of each you should be consuming based on activity level and goals.
response: Hello! We're so sorry for the inconvenience. Please email us at support@livestrong.com for assistance.

title: Loved it until....
body: I love this app... really love it. I‚Äôve been tracking my calories successfully for 3 weeks and it‚Äôs so easy to use. By far the most user friendly calorie app out there, but this week the food database doesn‚Äôt seem to be working. I can only log foods that I have previously eaten. When I try to search new foods, I consistently get a ‚Äúno results‚Äù answer. I tried updating with no success. I‚Äôve also tried two other weight loss apps, but I like this one best... if the data base would work.
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage at our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: The app is great but experiencing issues...
body: The app itself works very well and is very convenient. But as for right now, the app has been giving me many problems. I can‚Äôt track my food, I can‚Äôt log my exercise, and it‚Äôs been like this for two days. Before this all happened, I loved how easy this app made it to keep track of my every day activity to make sure I‚Äôm on track for my goals. But now I‚Äôm looking at other fitness tracker apps because it has almost been 3 days since I‚Äôve been able to track anything on the app. I‚Äôm very disappointed.
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage on our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Livin for it
body: I really like this app as it helps me keep track of the foods I eat and push me to eat healthier and drink water. The only thing I am not a fan of is when putting in exercise instead saying how many miles you walked that do you just put in hours which to me is not the most accurate thing to a person if they had been walking around a bit during different moments of the day. I feel like saying how many miles you have walked that day would be a lot better.

title: Best app ever!!
body: Before finding this app I was always so lost about how to begin getting healthy. I was eating everything that came my way with no thought which led to complications. And when I decided to get better I had no idea what to do or even where to start. But ever since I found this app I have become so much more healthier and happy. I honestly don‚Äôt know what I would do without this app. This app has helped me so much. I definitely recommend!

title: I Love this app!
body: It really helps me stay on track. I love the scan feature and exercise log. I scan everything I eat. If I get fast food I take the time to input the nutritional information so it‚Äôs available for the next person to easily log (I kind of enjoy it). It tracks my water intake too!! I‚Äôve tried other apps as well as Noom, but I always come back to this one.  I even got my friends on board with it and they love it too :)
response: Hi there! Thank you for that amazing review. We appreciate your support.

title: Portion sizes
body: Mostly the app is great but there are some things I wish it could do. Sometimes a food that is logged would give a portion size of say 21 pieces but you only have 6 of it. It won‚Äôt log what that amount would be in calories. Sometimes the portion is 3/4 cup of something but there is no conversion to tablespoons and it is hard to judge the exact amount of calories one eats. I wish the app could adapt to other measures so that a very accurate calorie count can be had. But the rest of it is very good.
response: Hi there! Thank you so much for your review and feedback. Our team is aware of an issue with some measurement units not being displayed as a serving size option. The team is working on a fix for this issue. If you have any questions or additional feedback, don't hesitate to reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: ‚ù§Ô∏è
body: I am really enjoying this app! I enjoying logging in all that I eat and it makes me aware of all the food I don‚Äôt want to eat because I have to log it in. I told all my family about this app, so now we have challenges! Only thing that I wish I could do is log with the barcode food items from Aldi. I shop there mostly. However.....I can still track them on my plate!
response: Hello and thank you for your review! MyPlate has a barcode scanner located in the upper left corner of each meal period! Please email us at support@livestrong.com if you have any trouble finding it.

title: Great app so far but there‚Äôs one thing that need to be fixed ASAP
body: Okay so the app is great for tracking calories and macros and the issue I have is with the workout routines. I am not able to play music while doing them because the workout videos override my music even though there is no audio in the videos. This seems like a simple fix but it needs to be done quickly because I can‚Äôt ever see myself using this feature if I‚Äôm not able to listen to my music

title: pretty good, basic
body: I wanted to see what i ate and track my macro nutrients. I really miss my old samsung health app because it would track vitamins and minerals and macros really well, and overall customizable. I still can‚Äôt find a good app for that, and this app also doesn‚Äôt track micronutrients, which is a shame. this app has a lot of foods in the menu which is nice.
response: Hello and thank you for your feedback! Our team is working on a feature that will allow you to track vitamins, minerals & micronutrients. Stay tuned for that! Please note that after you sign up, you can change your calorie goal to "maintain weight" by going to Account > Edit Profile > Weekly Target. Please email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions!

title: Great app!!
body: I like ‚ÄòMy Plate‚Äô because it ‚Äòreminds‚Äô me to record my meals! It also tells me when I‚Äôve been good that I can have dessert!! It‚Äôs simple to understand and it stores what I have eaten in the past so when I eat it again I can click on that food item and not have to retype it.  There‚Äôs a place to record your water intake, your weight and even your exercises!  My favorite thing about it is the ease of use!!

title: Great for BodyBuilders
body: As a physique competitor, I am always skeptical about where I get my nutrition information. This app allows me to add food at ease and even create the food with the exact macros if I can‚Äôt find it. Personally, I only use the Track tab, but it also has a tab for Progress, Meal Plans, Workouts, and Community. I highly recommend.

title: The apps great, though it could be enhanced
body: I enjoy this app very much. It does the job right I love how they show all the nutrients and things like sugars, fats ETC. But I think it would be good if along with a meal plan they could give us a workout routine as well since I myself have absolutely no idea how to properly work out. And when searching for workouts to register as exercise it‚Äôs kind of limited.
response: Hello! Our Stronger meal plans do come with workouts! Your daily workout is sent along with your emailed meal plan. You can then track the workout in the MyPlate app. Please email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions!

title: App no longer functions properly - UPDATED
body: The developer fixed the issue and the app works well now.  Still has some inaccuracies when scanning bar codes but overall a great app.
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage at our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Very successful with MyPlate
body: This app is great! I was stuck at 220 no matter how much exercise I did. About 5 years ago I was stuck at 210. I started using MyPlate about 40 days ago and it helped me go from 220 down to 208! I broke through my last 2 plateaus in a little more than a month. Knowing that you are going to log whatever it is you put in your mouth, makes you really think twice about it. I only have the free app and it works great.
response: Thank you for the fantastic review! We're so glad to hear you've had such success with MyPlate!

title: Love this app!
body: So helpful in tracking your calories and how much you burn off. Great selection of food and drinks when it comes to entering it in your food diary. Wish there was an option where I could select a higher amount of weight I want to lose each week, as the maximum is 2lbs. But it‚Äôs realistic and helpful and easy to understand. Looking forward to try the suggested recipes and workout videos included with it.

title: good for general idea
body: i think it‚Äôs really great for getting a general idea of calories and macros. i mean i had no idea i was eating 2500 calories and 175 carbs a day before this app! just being aware has helped my cut those down a whole ton. one complaint. the sugars are ridiculous. i selected the 1200 calorie plan so i get 24 grams of sugar a day. that should be ADDED sugar though. unfortunately this app considers all sugars into that 24 grams. meaning an apple would be my entire days sugar intake! natural sugars don‚Äôt count towards the 24 grams!!!!!

title: Small addition
body: When tracking my daily food, it would be nice if there were a ‚Äònotes section‚Äô so that I can put additional information in there. For example, for several days I was unable to drink, exercise or eat as much as I should due to having the Covid shot. It would‚Äôve been nice to be able to add that to my notes so I know in the future that I was not off track that day.
response: Hi Carol! Thank you so much for the review and feedback. I've passed your suggestion to our product team.

title: Doesn‚Äôt sync up correctly
body: I really like the app because I can track my food and macros along with the calories I‚Äôve burned.
response: Hi there! Thank you for your review and feedback. MyPlate syncs with the Apple Health app. If it is not syncing properly with Apple Health please reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Great app!
body: I prefer this app over the others because it gives me a graph of the overall view of my day. Calories, carbs, protein, and fat whereas most other apps only give you the calorie intake. This app is linked to other apps on my phone to show calories burned vs calorie intake. This makes it much easier for people like me who are trying to limit my carb intake. And it has a lot of foods in its data base to give a more accurate calorie count.

title: Sme70
body: I have been using the app on and off over the past two years. It has made tracking my nutrition,weight, and exercise very quick and easy. Many of the foods I eat are in the system. Every now and then the barcodes I scan can‚Äôt be found or I have to search a bit harder to find my food. I like the option of creating my own foods and recipes

title: It‚Äôs okay
body: Like I said, the app is okay. I do like how it shows you the calories you‚Äôve consumed, the ones you burnt off, and the net of those too, but I wish I was able to put in my own calorie count instead of it automatically tracking the calories off my Apple Watch.
response: Hi daleyc96! You can enter custom calories burned easily! Tap "Exercise" from the Track tab. Select ‚ÄúCustom Exercises‚Äù, and tap the ‚Äú+‚Äù symbol. Then, give your exercise a name and enter hourly calorie burn rate. Please email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions.

title: Love this app
body: This app has made me track how much calories I need to gain weight and even though I slacked on it at one point in time I was gaining weight. I‚Äôm back at it again as I know it works. Love how most stuff are already recorded, or I can scan the barcode or manually enter it myself. Definitely user friendly and I hope with me being consistent I see results. The fact they also have recipes too is awesome.

title: Awesome app but-
body: Can you help the food adding process? You can‚Äôt edit meals, so if you have a meal with multiple ingredients, it takes a while, then if you forget an item you have to start all over again. It would also be nice to have a ‚Äúsearch by restaurant‚Äù feature on the app, since if I type in ‚Äúchipotle‚Äù, it comes up with everything that has chipotle in the name, versus the restaurant being the main result.
