response: Hello and thank you for the review! It is possible to edit a custom meal by swiping left on the meal name under "my meals". From there, you can add a food item to the meal, or delete an item by swiping left. Thank you for your feedback on our search results, we're working on improving this! Please send us an email at suppot@livestrong.com with any other questions.

title: Good app, could use some more functionality
body: Overall, I like this app. I like that it focuses on actual calorie tracking as opposed to that being a small part of an overall fitness app that gets too cluttered. I also like how daily macros are easy to view without having to click anything.
response: Hello and thank you for your review! We have some exciting updates coming soon regarding micronutrient tracking, stay tuned! As for the 1200 calorie daily minimum, we implemented this as a safety measure. This is commonly considered the lowest a number of calories a person can eat in a day without doctor supervision. Since most of our users do not check with a doctor before taking on such a goal, or are unable to do, we implemented this as a safety feature. Please feel free to email us at support@livestrong.com with any other questions or concerns.

title: Big fan.  Intuitive and quick.
body: Tried myfitnessPal and this one at the same time and I found myself never opening the other app.  This one tracks macros and displays them right on main page of the app with out having to spend a whopping 20 bucks/mo unlike the other.  Barcode scanner makes it easy to add food I stead of finding the ‚Äúeh close enough‚Äù option. 10/10 would recommend.
response: Hi amlutzy! Thanks for your feedback! We‚Äôre glad you are enjoying MyPlate. We're constantly looking for new ways to improve our site and apps, and we love getting feedback as it helps guide our process moving forward.

title: Excellent fit app
body: Best for use in keeping count of your macros to calories proteins and carbs! Also tracks water excersize and snacks. Has a great supportive community within app and keeps you on goal by letting you know if you can or should eat more/less to reach your goals. Also has workout ideas and barcode reader so you can accurately track the macros for all your food!!

title: This is actually really good
body: But why 4 stars? Some of the recipes they‚Äôll give you calories for aren‚Äôt accurate, but the app tells you when it is and isn‚Äôt accurate so it it‚Äôs verified that means your pretty in the clear probably accurate but if it says ‚Äúrecipe‚Äù where it should say verified then it‚Äôs a 50 50 shot that it‚Äôs even close. This probably could be 5 stars but there‚Äôs a few little glitches that could be fixed, but overall would recommendüòÅüëç

title: Great App: One aspect I would add
body: This app has great features. It‚Äôs awesome that many supporting apps can connect to it and share  activities and Apple Watch data. If I could add one aspect, it would be the option to have a daily caloric intake setting for specific days of the week.

title: Not what expected after I paid for Gold membership
body: It seems as though most of the items I eat are not in the data base. I have to manual add and for 3 times a day it takes too long.  I located another program that does it all for less than half price and less time. Will not renew next year. Just had ap a few days and wish I could get a refund. When a person has (CKD) it takes a long time to prepare the food and cook differently for my husband. Then to manually have to add items, makes it not all worth it. Plus the other application I can print out for doctor to review.
response: Hello! Please contact us at support@livestrong.com so that we can provide you with instructions for requesting a refund.

title: Great App
body: I had had a heart attack about 2 months ago and my cardiologist recommended to watch the food I eat. I am not overweight and was very athletic and always watched my diet. This app really helped me to correct my mistakes in my diet and keep track of my calories, sugar and other counts. Very easy to use and gives very detailed information. I am very happy and would recommend this app all to all health conscious people. Definitely a  Five star.

title: Great App
body: I love this app! Fairly easy to use and I love the layout. Everything is together and I don‚Äôt have to constantly go from page to page. The only thing that I am having an issue with is that when I go to create a meal, I will input all the necessary information but the numbers will not translate properly when I hit done. I don‚Äôt know if I am doing something wrong but so far for me, that is the only step back.

title: Lost 145 pounds
body: I couldn‚Äôt have done it without this app! I‚Äôve lost 125lbs from March 6th, 2017 to March 6th, 2018 and 20 more pounds since then. I would like to lose around 10 more to be at a healthy weight. I recommend this app to absolutely everyone that asks me how I did it. It‚Äôs a wonderful tool if you use it every time you put anything in your mouth. A lot of work? Not at all...takes seconds to log and has gotten my life back.
response: Hi Kathy! Thank you for this amazing review! We'd love to hear more about your journey. Please email us at support@livestrong.com if you'd like to share!

title: So easy!
body: It‚Äôs makes calorie counting soooo easy. It counts you macros for you. It‚Äôs has most food I don‚Äôt have to add anything. The barcode makes everything easier. Helps with follow your weight!

title: Macros need I sat more
body: I‚Äôve tried several tracking apps like this. This is SO easy to use and gives me a great quick view of my day so I can stay on track. A lot of other apps do not have a good database to grab nutrition from or only include calories and not the carbs, protein and fat that are really important for me as a T1D.  Beautiful app with an easy to use and intuitive layout. Would give a bonus star if it was available.

title: Recipes!!
body: The only thing I don‚Äôt like about this app is that after filling out my info, saying that my goal is to gain weight, I would expect the meal ideas provided to be high calorie but there are only low calorie recipes. I‚Äôm sure that most people use the app to keep their calorie count low but it‚Äôs a little frustrating because I would love to find some recipes that are high calorie since that‚Äôs what I need. Otherwise, I‚Äôm really enjoying it and the information it provides!

title: Eat healthier
body: This is a great app to eat healthier and lose wait. It keeps track of what you are every day so you can go back weeks later and see what you ate and how it helped you have energy or drained you. I had surgery and gained a lot of weight after since I couldn‚Äôt work so this app has helped me keep track of everything so I am more accountable for what I eat and how much I worked out which is hard with 3 kids.

title: Changed the content of the calories I was eating
body: I was struggling to lose a few pounds, although my calories were in check. The meal / macro tracker helped me see the challenges with my current diet, and I finally started to move down the scale. Wish the app had a way to save recipes that show up in the meal feed. And I cook for one, so the weekly grocery list fir the recommended meal plan is impractical (e.g. a list that is 75 items long of items like one clove garlic, 6 green beans, 1/2 potato, quarter cup broth, 1 clementine...).

title: Great app!
body: This app is awesome! I‚Äôve always hated counting calories and sucked at it, but this app makes it easy. Not only that, it also is able to track your exercise and lets you add an exercise or a food item if they don‚Äôt have it in their database. My only want from this app is if there was a half size serving option or something along those lines. Other than that, would highly recommend.
response: Thanks for the great review! You can change the serving size of a food item by tapping on the servings widget within the food itself. Please email us at support@livestrong.com if you have any questions!

title: Simple and easy to use
body: I am a mom of 4 into bodybuilding, and this is a simple and effective app for me. I can't stress the simplicity enough, it's what got me. I love that I can track and scan as I go, and the calendar set up is really easy to remember and navigate. I like that I can add and customize my dietary needs as I gain weight. I'm able to get in my macros and count my calories at the same time and keep at it consistently. I really enjoy this app.

title: Best tracker if you use Apple Watch
body: After using My Fitness Pal for several years, I‚Äôm finally switching.  The main reason is this app really gets ‚Äúactive calories‚Äù.
response: Hi Red! Feel free to email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions about your Gold membership! Thanks for your review and feedback.

title: Love the app! Looking for the website?
body: I absolutely love the app interface. The graph is really helpful, and I like that I can see everything I've logged. I find the food database to be great, too!
response: Hi KazandraK! You can log into your MyPlate profile on our desktop site at www.livestrong.com/myplate. Please email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions!

title: Love it but....
body: I love this app but the only downside is that it is synced to my Apple Watch and it counts my steps from my watch and my phone. So this makes the calories burned incorrect. It‚Äôs actually doubling my burned calories. I didn‚Äôt figure this out until recently, so if you are like me and always have your phone on you and your watch, just remember to deduct one or the other so it is not misleading. Other than that, I love the app!
response: Thanks for trying MyPlate, and thanks for the comments! Our team is aware of this and is currently working on a solution. In the meantime, we recommend turning off activity tracking in the app. This will allow the app to sync only with your Apple Watch. To do this, follow these steps:

title: Very Helpful App
body: I had used MyPlate daily for two years and lost weight (60 lbs) and was in great condition again. I thought I had figured out my routine and stopped using MyPlate. Six months after stopping, I find I have put on 30 lbs and am not feeling good. I did not realize how being so committed to my daily consideration and tracking of meals and exercise would remain important for me to be healthy. I‚Äôm going back to this app today.
response: Hi there! Thank you for your amazing review. We're so happy to be a part of your commitment to health and fitness.

title: Very Helpful!
body: This app is perfect! It helps you keep track not only of what you eat and how many calories but how much you‚Äôve exercised and how many calories burned. It also helps you keep track of your water drinking by adding ounces in pacts of different amounts of ounces. At the bottom when you scroll down they even have healthy recipes! If you are interested in keeping healthy, this is the app for you!

title: Great app
body: I have issues remembering to write my calories on a piece of paper.  This app makes it so easy and they remind you which I really appreciate!   It‚Äôs great to know how many calories I need to shave off my eating intake. With the app I know how many calories I am eating.   The good bad and the ugly.   They have loads of foods already in their library that I haven‚Äôt had the need to upload anything yet.   Thank you for an awesome app.   I appreciate it!
response: Hi todaytomorrownever! Thanks for that awesome review. We're glad the app is working well for you.

title: Easily track and adjust macros!
body: This is a fantastic app! I‚Äôve used this and several other calorie tracking apps and this is one is one of the best. The only reason I didn‚Äôt rate it 5 stars is it can be difficult to find the food item you‚Äôre trying to log without a barcode. I can typically find something that‚Äôs in the general range of what I‚Äôm looking for but can sometimes be a challenge. The pros far outweigh the cons and I would 100% recommend this app!
response: Hi there! Thank you for your review and feedback. If you are unable to find the exact food you are looking for, we recommend creating a custom food. Please let us know if you have any questions. You can reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Best fitness app
body: I‚Äôm using this app to track how many calories I‚Äôm eating because im trying to gain weight because I am a lot of pounds under what I‚Äôm supposed to be do to my very fast metabolism. At first I tried myfitnesspal I deleted it within the first 3minutes because it was to confusing. I love the fact that u can set ur ideal weight and things like that. GREAT APP although I do wish that I could change how much calories I need to eat because I‚Äôm supposed to be eating 3000 or more mines is set at 1980
response: Hi deedee! Thanks for the review. To input a custom weight goal tap the person icon in the upper-left, tap your username, tap where it says "Calorie and Macronutrient Goals," tap "Calorie Goal," turn off Automatic and input your desired calorie goal. If you have additional questions feel free to reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Great app for tracking
body: I like how easy this app is to use however I would like to be able to create a meal and then just choose 1 serving. It‚Äôs difficult to calculate one serving of a whole recipe when the nutritional information isn‚Äôt provided. I have to use another app to create the meal and calculate the calories for one serving and then just manually enter the calories into MyPlate.  So I lose the fat, carb and protein tracking. That‚Äôs my only wish for this app. Otherwise it‚Äôs a great app.
response: Hi there! Thank you for your feedback and review. We hope to bring a custom recipe feature to the app in the future. If you have additional suggestions, feel free to reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Great app - easy to use!
body: In general I like the app and find it easy to use. Main area for improvement is the food list - need an advanced search - for example searching ‚Äúchipotle‚Äù brings up every meal with the word chipotle when I really just want an item from Chipotle‚Äôs menu - no way to find it!

title: Food tracking improvements
body: Really love using the app, helps me feel like I‚Äôm in control of what I‚Äôm consuming daily. My only comment would be the way you add new food items. Often when I am eating I don‚Äôt have time to find and record all the nutritional information to track it. I would prefer to be able to enter known food items at my leisure and add those to my foods without having to click ‚ÄúI Ate This‚Äù which would save me time throughout the day

title: Love it but...
body: Hey MyPlate, I love the app, and it helps me manage my diet in many ways. But, there are two things I wish you would add. First off, when you add in your weight for the day, it changes the amount of calories needed for all days, including past recorded days. This makes it difficult to look back and reflect on how you‚Äôve progressed and such. Second off, I don‚Äôt know if this is in gold, but if it‚Äôs not, could you add in some sort of way to watch vitamins, minerals, fruits, and vegetables or something along those lines? Thank you!
response: Hi Gwibble! Thanks for your review and feedback! We'll gladly pass your feedback on to our team of developers!  As we are always adding new content and features to the app, these comments help guide our designs and tools moving forward.

title: Needs a little improvement
body: I really like this app and it‚Äôs helped me to count calories and calculate steps/calories burned, however, the calories burned keep changing to a lower amount than what it says initially. The steps do not match up with the steps taken by my walking app on my health app. It does during the day and then for some reason, it doesn‚Äôt later on. Today, I had 5,000 steps logged and MyPlate had it noted for awhile and then I went to open it again before dinner and it now says 185 steps. Where did they all go??

title: I love to eat right now!!!
body: Finally a guide I can follow a road map if you will.   I haven‚Äôt screwed up yet it‚Äôs black and white and if you find yourself cheating it‚Äôs almost funny. I direct self infliction. I have one complaint!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  There is no favorite button where you can put your regularly used items with out having to select days. Just a frequently used button instead of recently added. 9 3/4!!

title: Great for tracking progress
body: I wish the macro balances supported keto diets, but still really great. Excellent interface and compatibility with Health Kit. I've never bothered tracking my diet, water or exercise before because it seemed like a huge hassle, but I now see how important it is for consistent progress on a diet. I tried this app and within just a few days signed up for the year on the premium option. Was kind of a "am I doing this or not" moment for me, and I do not regret it.

title: Best layout in a tracker
body: The occasional hiccup where it won‚Äôt load well, but other than that, it is amazing! I‚Äôve tried a few calorie/macro trackers and this is my favorite. The layout on it is the best one, very user friendly! You also don‚Äôt have to pay an extra fee for tracking your water, which is great! I recommend this app over others to anyone looking for a way to track their health habits.

title: Easiest Calorie Tracker
body: I have been looking for a way to keep track of how much calories I was consuming daily. I downloaded like 10 different apps and this one is the only one that stuck! It‚Äôs so easy to use and the best part is they don‚Äôt throw in ads that take up the whole screen or have in-app purchases. Best app if you are looking for an easy way to keep track of what you‚Äôre eating daily.

title: I hate counting calories
body: Counting calories is like torture to me. This app definitely makes it easier for me to track my calories, activity, and how many calories you have left. They also break down how much carbs protein and fat you eat in each meal and daily. If any food is too high in sugar or sodium you can see it on the consumption break down.

title: Great app the give training clients!
body: Love this app so much! As a personal trainer, it‚Äôs important that my clients track their macros. So far, this has been the easiest and most organized app to recommend! They have everything on there! And you can enter your own meals if you eat the same meals a lot, you can also add in food that isn‚Äôt in the system yourself to share with others! So grateful for this user friendly app!

title: LOVE LOVE
body: I absolutely love this app! Been using for a week and it is so easy to track food! Used the weight watchers app for years and found many problems with it making frustrating to stay on plan but I have not experienced that with this app. I just love it and feel so good when finding such helpful tools as this! Haven‚Äôt synced to my Apple Watch yet but the weight watchers Apple Watch app never worked correctly.

title: Love this app!
body: I really like how easy and fun the design of this app is. It makes it easy to track your food, water intake, exercise and your progress! Another thing I really love is the workout feature, it has multiple exercises you can do at home which only help you to achiever your goals faster. Lastly, the 8 week meal-plans available are great; lots of good, new recipes to try out. Overall this app is fantastic!!

title: Small feature to add
body: Only thing I would add is a way to delete certain foods under the ‚ÄúRecently Tracked‚Äù section. I‚Äôve been using this app for over a year and my ‚ÄúRecently Tracked‚Äù foods is so full of foods I don‚Äôt eat anymore that it makes it hard to find and log the foods I do eat. There might be a way and I‚Äôm just missing it. I know how to delete a food after it‚Äôs logged in ‚ÄúTracked for Today‚Äù but not from the ‚ÄúRecently Tracked‚Äù section. Still a great app that I use daily.

title: Password fail
body: I used to love this app. Recently tried signing back in, and realized the password recovery system is totally useless. Completely unable to login via Facebook either, as it loops you in a endless cycle of ‚Äúsign in with Facebook ‚Äúok‚Äù then right on back to ‚Äúsign in with Facebook‚Äù.
response: Hi Yepp! We're sorry you've had this experience. Please email us directly at support@livestrong.com so we can reset your password for you.

title: Good, but barcode reader stopped working...
body: The app itself as a functional calorie tracker is very good, minimalist, and works well. However, after a year of using it, the barcode scanner stopped picking up food items. It would no longer scan items no matter how many times I tried with different methods. I‚Äôm not sure if the app is at fault or if I did something, or maybe it‚Äôs even my phone camera. Either way, 4 stars for a good overall app
response: Hi Tommy! If you are using a newer iPhone the barcode scanner is centered differently than previous iPhones models. You will need to move the device slightly up when scanning. This should place the line of the bottom scanning window right on the barcode. Doing so will yield better results.

title: Some success with this app, but too many prepared foods.
body: This app has a wide selection of prepared and packaged foods, but lacks a lot of ingredients for people that cook.
response: Thanks for trying the app, and thanks for the review! We're working on improving the recipe function in the app. In the meantime, creating custom foods and grouping them into custom meals may help improve the accuracy of the nutrients tracked. Thanks again for giving us a try, and feel free to contact us at support@livestrong.com if you have any other questions or concerns!

title: Great app to track food and calories!
body: I started using this when I was pregnant to track what I eat. My doctor had told me to be on a high protein low carb, and this app helped me keep track of everything! If you can‚Äôt find the food in the search bar you also can scan the barcode and it adds everything for you. Im still using it now after having my baby. It‚Äôs simple and great
response: Hi frannilla! Thanks for the review. We're happy to hear you've found the app so useful.

title: Missing 1 feature
body: This is an easy to use app, but I wish it had 1 key feature. I get a lot of my meals delivered to me by food prep companies. On the packages it doesn‚Äôt have how much of each food is in my meal but they show macros in each meal. I wish you could just add the macro numbers into the individual meals. Currently I just sit here any play with serving sizes until the numbers line up. Not convenient or enjoyable.

title: Love it!
body: I‚Äôve tried Noom I‚Äôve tried weight watchers I‚Äôve spent a lot of money in the past year with nothing to show for it
response: Hi there! Thank you for your review. We're happy to hear you have gotten so much out of the app.

title: I‚Äôm not eating enough!!
body: Okay so I love the app the system is great buttttt I‚Äôm 13 and it says I should be eating 1200 calories!! The average calorie intake of a 13 year old should be 2200!! So I didn‚Äôt pay any attention to it and went on with eating around 1200 calories a day... soon I became not energized at all and soon started to shake on a daily basis! This was not healthy and I could barely eat a meal without going over the limit. So after the bad experienceüòïI just tried to ignore the limit and eat around 2000 calories why still tracking my food.

title: Works Great!
body: I was looking for something easy to use, and I found it with this app. It is very user-friendly; it has 95% of the food I normally eat in its database and it‚Äôs a matter of typing in a couple of letters, er voila, it gives you a list of options to select from. The info is accurate (as I‚Äôve double checked product info online and on the product itself). Scan function couldn‚Äôt be any easier also. Highly recommended!
response: Woohoo! Thanks for the awesome review! We'd love to know how we can make MyPlate a 5 star app for you!

title: Exactly what I expected.
body: I originally I joined weight watchers and they go by a point system to help people that are maybe beginners. I canceled the same day. This provides all the info I need to know and keep track of everything. I was never into counting calories but after doing this for a few days it is very helpfully and useful specially for someone who competes at a high level. By the way I never write reviews.
response: Thank you so much for your awesome review! We are thrilled to hear that you've found success with MyPlate!

title: Great support!
body: I love how we can scan most foods to get accurate calorie counts. You can also add custom foods! This has helped me realize just how much I was over eating and target the foods that I had to stay away from. It also lets you track what nutrients you get in a day!

title: Ridiculous menus & grocery lists
body: I followed their menu and grocery lists for one month. I ended up spending 4x what I usually spend on groceries with most of it going to waste. I constantly had to sub ingredients because we don‚Äôt all live in LA. What‚Äôs the likelihood that I‚Äôm going to find fresh figs in my midwestern grocery store in  February?  Come on people. There were numerous errors in the recipes and lots of ingredients on the grocery lists that weren‚Äôt used in the recipes. I was so frustrated I stopped using the app completely and forgot about it. Six months later I got charged for an auto renewal and guess what? They are unable to process a refund.
response: Thanks for giving MyPlate a try, and sorry to hear about your frustration with the meal plan program. We've made a note with editorial team to review these recipes for any errors.

title: Good enough
body: This app is good enough if you‚Äôre serious about tracking, but not so serious that you don‚Äôt mind it being off by maybe 50-60 at the end of the day. After using it for almost a year, I found most of the foods I scanned were off in calorie counts by at least 10, sometimes more. Ended up adding my own food based off the label on the actual item. Wish there was an update or something that would fix it.

title: Outstanding app! Just hard to navigate.
body: The features on the app are wonderful. It allows me to put in specific data to keep track of even the tiniest things. Except trying to learn how to use it and all the features I can use is actually rather difficult. I have to ask the community constantly to help me find where things are and how to use it. I wish the app could help me find everything when you first download it.

title: My plate is awesome
body: This app is so good I just started but it‚Äôs very helpful you don‚Äôt realize how much you are eating unless you track it usaly I have so many calories a day and I wouldn‚Äôt realize this is already helping and it has every food ever I tried a app before this that didn‚Äôt have any of the foods I ate it was not helpful at all but my plate works and is very easy and it helps me not focus on food all the time
response: Hi Lori! Thank you for the review. We're happy to hear MyPlate is working so well for you.

title: I‚Äôd like more features
body: It would be great if I could note the time of each meal.
response: Hi there! We very much appreciate your feedback and I have passed along your comments to our product development team. At this time, recipe creation isn't available in the mobile app, only the desktop site https://www.livestrong.com/myplate/dashboard/. If you have additional questions, feel free to reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Phenomenal Calorie Counting App
body: I normally don‚Äôt write reviews, but I just had to let you know how impressed I am with this app. My favorite part about it is the meal planning. It makes it so easy to lose weight when you don‚Äôt have to brainstorm grocery lists and weekly meal plans. This app automatically generates a grocery list and meal plans suited for your specific diet, and the best part is it‚Äôs free! I‚Äôm in love with this wonderful app!üòç
response: Hi there! Thank you for your amazing review. We're so happy to hear how much you are enjoying the MyPlate app.

title: Pay for what you want
body: I was a Noom subscriber and I really liked it, but it didn‚Äôt think it was worth the amount of money I was paying additionally I wasn‚Äôt using many of the features, so I looked around for alternatives‚Ä¶this was the winner.  It has all the basic calorie/nutrient tracking capabilities of Noom, but it‚Äôs free and if you want some of those extra features then you‚Äôll pay for those.
response: Hi there! Thank you for your review. We‚Äôre so happy you‚Äôre enjoying MyPlate and would love to give you the opportunity to explore our Gold membership! Please send us an email at support@livestrong.com for details.

title: Good but some problems
body: It‚Äôs a good app for tracking food, however there are some bugs in the exercise track. I hooked it up to my motion tracker on my iPhone so that it automatically shows how many calories I burn, but it only works sometimes, even if I‚Äôm out walking and moving a lot it glitches out and always says 0 calories. The health app that comes with the iPhone tracks the number of steps I do so there‚Äôs nothing wrong with the motion tracker

title: Easy to use and SO helpful
body: I really love this app, it makes it so easy to track nutrition and activity throughout the day. The scanning feature is KEY and allows you to log food practically instantly; I love it. I‚Äôm just starting to track macros and calories and such, which can seem like a real chore, but using MyPlate makes it hardly any effort! Would recommend to anyone looking to keep track of their diet!

title: Great update!
body: The developers are finally getting things right!  Probably the best food/exercise tracking app on the market. I would give it 5 stars if the app didn‚Äôt constantly switch off the ‚Äútrack my activity‚Äù function!
response: Hello! We're so sorry for the inconvenience. Please email us at support@livestrong.com for assistance.

title: Just what I needed
body: At 49 loosing weight had become what felt like an impossible task. I only wanted to loose 10lbs but for a year I‚Äôd tried without success as I was fighting peri menopause hormones all the way.  After finding this app and setting a goal of a half pound a week I‚Äôve found success. I‚Äôve reached my target weight and continue to use the app to maintain it. At my age, slow and steady really does win the race. LOL üòä thank you My Plate!
response: Congratulations!! We are so happy for your success :)

title: Love this app!
body: This is the best app for tracking calories, water, and weight. I‚Äôve used three others before but this is the best so far. Besides calorie tracking, it also gives you a weekly groceries list and shows you your daily menu along with the recipe for each dish. The only improvement I recommend is having pre-programmed calorie burn for different types of activity.

title: Lacks features
body: This app has the best GUI of all the macro trackers but it needs more features! Not being able to quickly add macros without logging each item and each items macros. This would be hugely helpful when you go to a restaurant and the meals total macros are given but not for each item on a plate. I‚Äôm stuck using MyFitnessPal because of this single but crippling issue. I would love to use this app as I like it much much more but need to be able to add macros without needing to create food items!

title: Food log timestamp
body: I think it would helpful for some of us if there was a timestamp on the food log, sometimes I forgot what time I ate and would like to have the log to turn to for that information. If it would just automatically collect the time as we click I ate this and complete the meal would be great. Maybe have it available next to each food we log.
response: Hi TabbyStarr! Thanks for the review and feedback. I have passed your suggestion on to our Product Team. If you have additional suggestions, feel free to reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Progress Update Tragically Flawed
body: The progress view has become useless in the latest major update. At a glance the graph used to show a plot versus time appropriately scaled. Now, for instance, bar charts from zero to the data show no easily discernible information for something like weight. Fractional pounds also disappeared from the numerical data formatting.  The progress plot was one of the most motivating features and now we have to rely on syncing that data with another app to view.  After more than 10 years using this tool, it may be time to move on.
response: Thanks for your review and feedback. We‚Äôve just released an update to the app addressing these concerns. Please update to version 5.31.0. If you still have questions or concerns, please send us an email at¬†support@livestrong.com.

title: Double counts exercise
body: I am a swimmer and water Aerotics fan. I wear an Apple Watch track calories burned. I carry the iPhone when not swimming. The problem with this app is, it tracks calories on the iPhone and the Apple watch and suns them. The calories on ‚ÄúActivities‚Äù right now is 1273, but my plate has 1416 burned, which is the watch while doing water Aerotics plus 71 at home while programming. The watch collected the 71, too, and this app sums them together. There needs to be a way to turn off calories from both sources. This app should track calories burned from just the ‚ÄúActivities‚Äù source.
response: Hi Mike! Thanks for your review.

title: Hard to use & confusing
body: I rarely write reviews but get so annoyed while using this app I had to write one. Literally none of the food I eat which isn‚Äôt uncommon is never under the food when i search, making it annoying to have to write in all the calories and nutrition for my food. Especially if you‚Äôre someone who has a busy schedule and can‚Äôt spend 30 minutes a day tracking your food do not download this app. It shouldn‚Äôt be this difficult and makes reaching my weight loss goals so much harder. MyFitnessPal is 100x better and easier and I will be sticking with that app from here on
response: Hi there! We're so sorry for the frustration you've experienced. We'd love to help if you're willing to give us another shot. Please send us an email at support@livestrong.com.

title: Great tool to stay in shape
body: I absolutely love this app!

title: Good but glitching for me rn
body: This is a pretty good app. It makes keeping record very simple and straightforward so it‚Äôs easy to follow. These past few days though, it‚Äôs been glitching where when I try to search for food that has been inputted by other users with nutritional information and calories, it will say ‚Äòno results‚Äô. It also says that my request cannot be processed at this time when I try to manually input those foods. Please fix this soon I would really like to continue to use this!
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage at our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Eat the food, lose the weight....
body: This has been a true lifesaver for me. By watching my carbs and portion sizes I‚Äôve lost 25 pounds in three months.

title: #endorsed
body: I‚Äôm a strength/conditioning coach, and am always on the lookout for easy, intuitive, minimally fussy tools to supplement training programs and help my clients get where they want to go in terms of body fat and overall nutrition. I downloaded the MyPlate app just to test it on myself, and so far I‚Äôm hugely impressed. It‚Äôs certainly the best one of its kind that I‚Äôve tried, and I‚Äôd recommend it to athletes and ‚Äòcivilians‚Äô alike. Two thumbs way up!

title: Repeating food glitch?
body: I absolutely love this app, and I‚Äôve used it for years. I tried the trial of the gold, but decided against it. Ever since then the app doubled up my repeated daily items. So every day I have to go in and delete the doubled repeated items. I‚Äôve tried deleting the app, I‚Äôve tried logging out, and I‚Äôve tried changing the repeating settings‚Ä¶ A little frustrating, but over all a great app.
response: Hi there! Thank you for the review and feedback. Please reach out to us at support@livestrong.com so we can take a look at the issue you are seeing.

title: Amazing App
body: This is an App I used to use as an athlete (5-6years who)  and now that I am trying to lose weight again I knew I had to download it.  I recommend this to anyone trying to lose weight, 1 it‚Äôs so easy to use you can scan products,2 you can sync with your Apple Watch to keep track of calories burned 3 you can track your trends.

title: New progress tab has reduced functionality
body: Overall a great app with fantastic support.
response: Thanks for your review and feedback. We‚Äôve just released an update to the app addressing these concerns. Please update to version 5.31.0. If you still have questions or concerns, please send us an email at¬†support@livestrong.com.

title: Good app
body: The app has a nice interface, easy to understand. It doesn‚Äôt have the best pantry, but if it isn‚Äôt exact you can always get real close to what you had. One annoying thing is that it gets data from my garmin watch for my exercises, but the calories it imports are always wrong. I‚Äôm not exactly sure where it‚Äôs getting the numbers from. Today the calories matched exactly my step count, but that isn‚Äôt always the case. ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

title: Easy to use however...
body: This app is great! I wanted to start my New Years resolution early so I downloaded this app. So far everything has worked very well however, when I track my water on the Apple Watch app, pressing the ‚Äú+‚Äù 20 times every time I drink water is quite annoying. Maybe in a future update, allow the user to use the ‚Äúdigital crown‚Äù to adjust the water intake. Other than that, everything is perfect!
response: Thank you very much for this feedback!

title: Great but one annoying little thing
body: I love it‚Äôs calorie and food tracking, the scanning feature is really convenient. Dig the fitness tracking and the link to the Apple fitness tracking. One super annoying thing is that they show you all these beautiful recipes, but there‚Äôs no way to save them anywhere. It‚Äôs like they think when you are using the app you will spontaneously decide to make that. Nope, I‚Äôd save it for later...if I could.
response: Hello and thank you for the review. We're working on an update that will allow you to save these delicious recipes! Stay tuned :)

title: Love it but..
body: Update: I was able to fix the issue with help and have adjusted my review, this app is great.
response: Hi Liz4310! Can you please confirm that Activity Tracking is turned on in the MyPlate app? Tap the silhouette icon located in the upper left corner of the app's home screen. Tap "App Preferences" and confirm that the button next to "Track My Activity" is turned to the green on position. Please email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions.

title: Makes counting calories easy
body: I like low calorie diets because you don‚Äôt have to cut out any food groups. But it can be a hassle trying to figure out how many calories you just ate. This has the calorie count of, not only of everyday foods like a banana or egg, but it has most of the brand name foods listed with their nutritional breakouts. A couple of key taps and you‚Äôre done. I‚Äôve lost 30 lbs in 90 days.

title: Good but needs more
body: First, I'm following the IIFYM flexible method. I've been looking for a good replacement for my current app and while I like this one is not enough to make me switch. Yep things I think I definitely needs...1) Ability to set macros to specific grams instead of 5% increments of total and 2) Ability to set specific portion sizes instead of 1/2, 1/3, 1/2, etc. Sometimes I do a snack with just 3 of 5 pieces which doesn't equate to any of the possible portion sizes in the app.  Give this app more flexibility and maybe I'll switch.
response: Thanks for giving MyPlate a try, and thanks for the feedback! We're constantly working towards improving the app to provide a better experience for the community, and the suggestions and feedback really helps us keep on track. We encourage you to watch for updates, as improvements to the recipe creation function will be coming soon! Thanks again for the review!

title: MyPlate versus Lose It!
body: Before I had downloaded MyPlate I had used Lose It! for a day or 2. I then found out that Lose It! didn‚Äôt give me everything I wanted, so I looked for another app. When I found MyPlate and downloaded it, it was way better than Lose It! and provided everything I wanted. I would definitely recommend this app to anyone looking for ‚Äúthe full experience‚Äù.
response: We're so happy that you're enjoying MyPlate! Thanks for the awesome review.

title: Works if you use daily
body: Hard to do.  I exercise like crazy.  Did not lose weight until  I reminded myself of the calories of the food I was eating compared to the energy I was expending. I‚Äôve had to do this multiple times and daily plate always works to get me ‚Äúa grip.‚Äù  It seriously over estimated exercise calories and I have to always be aware.  But it is good to know what you eatüôè
response: Hi there! Thanks for the review. We're glad you like the app.

title: Simple but effective!
body: I‚Äôve only lost about 5lbs so far, but this is the first time I‚Äôve actually seen my weight finally start to tick down after a long time of trying. I love that it also counts your steps and calculates how many calories you burn that way as well! And of course, I appreciate the notifications cheering me on to put in my lunch (or even a desert ;0). Thank you for this great app!

title: No, it‚Äôs not for me!
body: There is so many frustration with this app, even I tried to be so patient with it for 2 days. First, the bar scanner doesn‚Äôt work so well all the time, and when I checked with another app still worked.
response: Hi Hannahtran1702! I'm sorry you experienced issues with the app. We are aware of an issue wherein the barcode scanner does not produce feedback to indicate that the barcode is not in the database. We are working to resolve this. If you have questions regarding how your macros and calorie goals are calculated, we'd be happy to help. Please contact us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Calorie Tracking a Mess with Newest Update
body: Guys, this is a must have app for me but the recent update stopped tracking my Apple Watch calories? Beyond frustrating. I can‚Äôt figure it out and it‚Äôs frustrating as it didn‚Äôt do this before the update. Please fix ASAP
response: Hi there! To reconnect the sync with your Apple Watch simply log out and back into your account. This will force the app to serve you with the button to sync your Health Data on the track tab. Please send us an email at support@livestrong.com with any questions!

title: Great app!
body: This app has helped me tremendously with portion control and taking note of my calorie, protein, fat, and carb intake. I also love how it provides a suggested calorie plan based off of weight, sex, and age. The only reason I gave it 4/5 stars was because I wish it gave a couple of free workout videos. You have to pay to get workout videos and healthy recipes. But other than this the app never really tries to force you to get premium and overall is great!
response: Hey there! We're so happy to hear that MyPlate has helped you. Just a quick note, we offer 5 FREE workout videos under the Workouts tab in the app! Our meal plans and recipe feed are also completely FREE! Please send us an email at support@livestrong.com with any questions.

title: Soooo sllllooooooowwwww after update
body: Recent update made tracking food (add or edit) functions very slow (2-3seconds after pushing the relevant meal or waiting for save etc. Please fix.
response: Hello! Our team is working on a fix for the slow response time! This should be resolved with our next release, which we hope to put out soon. Please email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions .

title: So disappointed
body: I was excited for this app as I am trying to gain weight. Unfortunately it does not help you understand the full nutrition of your food and just looks at Fat, Carbs, Protein, and Calories. If you cook most of your own food good luck finding it within their app. If you want to add in your own food you better know all of the calories, fat, etc. I was also very disappointed to discover I was unable to add my own workouts so I‚Äôm not even accurately tracking how much I am burning and what I need for recovery. Pretty weak app coming from a company like Livestrong.
response: Hi mc629493! We're so sorry that you've had this experience! Please note that you can view the full nutrition of your food by clicking the "i" to the right of every food item. This will show you the full nutritional facts. You're also able to add custom workouts in the app by tapping the Exercise button and then selecting Custom Exercises. Click the plus sign to add an exercise name and an hourly calorie burn rate. Please don't hesitate to email us at support@livestrong.com with any other questions!

title: Great App.
body: There are a few things I would like to say. Not sure why some say ‚Äúrecipe‚Äù.  Have not been able to find the actual recipes which would be nice.

title: Great except between devices
body: This app is great. No frills and easy to use. Keeps track of all the right things in a way that is easy to interpret. Does not transfer well between devices though. If I enter things in on my iPad, some will show on my phone and some not. Same issue vice versa. I don‚Äôt understand why this is since I‚Äôm logged in as me on both devices. Means you really have to commit to using just one or things get messy.

title: Kind of a let down...
body: I was super excited about this app at first but now that I‚Äôm trying to use it I‚Äôm realizing that it‚Äôs not all it‚Äôs said it would be.

title: Great!!
body: For what it‚Äôs worth. I have never written a review however this app is so good I felt compelled to write one. I‚Äôm starting a keto  diet and watching your macros is important. This app makes it so easy to enter what you ate. It has tons of popular foods, restaurant meals, combos. I honestly have just scratched the surface I‚Äôm sure. Interface is intuitive which I have had problems with other apps. Can recommend this enough.
response: Thanks so much for the review!! We're so glad you're enjoying MyPlate!

title: Great freaking app
body: I have been using this for a few days now with my new Apple Watch and it has been truly a game-changer. It‚Äôs helped me ensure I stay below my calorie limit by tracking my exercise and food. Even if you can‚Äôt find the food you are looking for, you can create it through the app. It‚Äôs really great and I highly recommend for tracking your calories.
response: Hi Abel! Thank you for leaving a review. We're glad you're finding the app so useful.

title: Honest opinion
body: It needs to have supplements and vitamins added in to the system. I‚Äôve scanned all the barcodes to mine and not one was entered in the system. It‚Äôs a great app, if there were more foods entered in and entered correctly. I‚Äôve had steak show up in the system incorrectly showing zero protein?!
response: Hi there! Thank you for your review and feedback. I have passed your comments to our product team. MyPlate uses a comprehensive third-party food database, which is a collection of listings from the USDA and some food manufacturers. Unfortunately, we're not able to add or remove items from this database as it is managed by Nutritionix. If you have any questions or further feedback please reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Great app
body: I really love this app.  I use it daily to track all my food.  Really easy to find foods to log and almost every everything is available.  I can‚Äôt comment on other things available on the site as I use it for food only.
response: We are so glad to hear! Thank you for the review and feedback!

title: A great tool!
body: This app is great. Simple to use, tracks macros & calories easily. You can change your weight & macro goals anytime.

title: Very helpful app
body: I had been using a different app which got too complicated fir me. I just didn‚Äôt have time or the inclination  to deal with it. This app is easier to use and does what I need, no more, no less
response: Hey there! We're so glad you're enjoying MyPlate! You can change the time of your meal reminders by doing the following: Tap the white silhouette icon > App Preferences > Daily Reminders. Then just tap Time on each meal period to edit. Please email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions!

title: I really enjoy this app but I wish it was Fitbit compatible
body: I really enjoy this app I discovered it while doing the stronger challenge I use it often but I really wish it was compatible with my fit bit I downloaded another fitness app because it is compatible with my fit bit so it‚Äôs hard to track on this one because I have to track on my other one. Other then that I have found success with this app

title: Great app for counting and keeping you on track!
body: I absolutely love this app they give you so many options for all the different foods that you‚Äôve eaten. They give you the restaurants or you can even make your own food item. Gives you the option of breakfast lunch and dinner even a snack I don‚Äôt even give you your exercise options. Totally will use this app forever.

title: Trouble logging new foods
body: I love the app and it‚Äôs a great way for me to have an idea of the amount of calories I consume per day. However recently I have been having trouble searching for new foods...I type it in the search bar and it says no results and this tends to be for everything even when it‚Äôs as simple as searching ground chicken. I‚Äôm not sure what to do as I‚Äôve tried on different WiFi‚Äôs and data options for my phone.
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage at our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: There is an issue on iPhone
body: Look I love using this app, however, there is an issue on iPhone 8 version 11.3.1 where it sometimes won‚Äôt bring up any food when searching. I‚Äôm talking simple food like almonds, and things of that sort. I tried closing the app, restarting the phone, and nothing happened. This goes with scanning food as well. Now, I tried the same stuff 3 days later, and it started working. The issue keeps happening though. Please fix and I will give 5 stars.

title: Great Start!
body: I‚Äôm off to a great start with MyPlate.  After the first day, I had an accurate snapshot of my daily intake.  Immediately the community of MyPlaters (?) took me under their wings and outlined a plan for success. By dinner of Day 1, my diet had changed!  I‚Äôve used MyFitnessPal, and hands down, MyPlate is superior in every way!  Plus, you‚Äôre surrounded by MyPlate users who have lost 200 pounds, 95 pounds, 10 pounds, you name it.  It‚Äôs very motivating.
response: Awesome!!! We are so glad you have had such a great start. Keep up the good work, you got this!

title: Important real time info for my Dr
body: I have a new ver innovative Dr who actually cares and wants to help me with my weight. He isn‚Äôt resigned to saying it‚Äôs just menopause. Tracking my food and exercise diligently is essential to my success. This app makes it so fast and easy. I do not lose information. I am finally hopeful and excited. I have motivation and help to hopefully pinpoint exactly where my problem lies
response: Hi there! We appreciate you leaving a review. We're happy to be a part of your fitness journey.

title: Great for tracking calories and exercise
body: I‚Äôve been using MyPlate for about a year now.   I chose it since it‚Äôs compatible with Apple Watch, so it automatically pulls calories burned. The food tracking options are much improved since they added the ability to adjust portion sizes by decimal values (previously it only provided a limited number of fractional options).

title: New Visualizations are terrible
body: Weight loss. A fluctuating number over time for most people. Often oscillating between 4 miserable points out of 100 to 300. These dimwits desired to use a bar chart to represent that. So unless you have a ruler and a magnifying glass, there‚Äôs no way to see your progress over time.
response: Thanks for your review and feedback. We‚Äôve just released an update to the app addressing these concerns. Please update to version 5.31.0. If you still have questions or concerns, please send us an email at¬†support@livestrong.com.

title: Where is my activity?
body: Hi! I have been using this app for a while now and it‚Äôs been working great! I love that I can easily find the food that I need and track it very easily. However, the past couple of days, my exercise hasn‚Äôt been tracked. I don‚Äôt know how this happened because I‚Äôve been using this app for a while and it has always tracked my activity from my Apple Watch. I made sure that everything is still synced and being shared with this app but nothing has worked.
response: Hi pgmollyrs! We are aware of this issue and working hard to find a fix. We're so sorry for any inconvenience! In the meantime, if you have any questions, please send us an email at support@livestrong.com.

title: THIS APP IS AMAZINGGG
body: I‚Äôve struggled with gaining weight for a long time because I never had the proper tools to keep track of what I‚Äôm eating and how much progress I‚Äôve made. This app has so many useful features and the best part is that they are free. I set my calorie goal and it has an entire submitted library so I can just search up the item that I ate and how much to figure out my calories. I‚Äôm so satisfied

title: Love it
body: I just download this app, so far I'm loving it.. it has everything you need to record your daily meals and activity..üò≥ this app really help me keep track of what I eat.. it has most of the food that I eat.. when it comes to portion size, I'm having a hard time figure out how to manually add the exact amount that I eat. I just put an average amount.. but it's working well..

title: It used to be better why?
body: Had this app since I switch to iphone back in early 2016, worked great. Now the scanner is useless, I used to scan anything and got the info in less than 2 seconds. Now it doesn‚Äôt pick anything, not even the most commercial items. Can even add it as my own food because the macros get all mess up. Even if I type the exact same ones, ones there saved don‚Äôt show other macros. Seriously thinking about switching to my fitness pal.
response: Hi aczinob-We're so sorry for the trouble you're having. Please email us at support@livestrong.com for assistance!

title: Best tracker available
body: This app is amazing. It actually will email you what ingredients to get for the weeks and then give you these amazing recipes, simple and healthy. I am so happy I found this app this year.

title: THE BEST APP
body: Honestly, this app is by far my favorite of all the hundreds of calorie counter/weight loss apps out there. Trust me- I‚Äôve tried them ALL, and I ALWAYS come back to this one. It‚Äôs easy and fun to use without it taking up my time. Entering food, exercise, and other info is so straightforward. I love the new recipes that they added too! I owe this app so much, and I won‚Äôt ever use another one again!

title: Some glitches, good customer support
body: After using this app for a little over a week, I got a couple glitches(it erased my data, and when I put in new foods it put crazy high numbers for the macronutrients). I contacted customer support about the numbers issue, and they responded quickly and even retrieved the data I had previously tracked and lost. Very helpful!

title: Would Highly Recommend
body: This app is the most simple, easy to navigate and understand fitness app EVER. I‚Äôve tried multiple apps like this and none compare! I‚Äôve been using this for about four weeks, watching my calorie and sugar intake and drinking a lot of water, and I‚Äôve lost about 15 pounds. I‚Äôm closer to my fitness goal then I‚Äôve been in a few years. Thanks, MyPlate!
response: Hi AriaHope27! Thanks for the review. We're so glad we could be a part of your fitness journey. Congratulations on your success.

title: Great App
body: Loving the app so far.  Has a really good data base of food to help you track what your eating.  Only improvement I see so far, is when you add a meal it should allow you to calculate the whole meal as one calorie count.  This way if you only eat half (or whatever portion) you don‚Äôt have to try and calculate how much you ate of each ingredient.  That makes it a bit difficult.  Other than that it‚Äôs super easy to use.
response: Hi there!

title: Used to be a good app before changes to progress tracking
body: The latest upgrade of this app, with its *revamped* progress section has rendered it useless. I‚Äôve been using it for years and found the detail for tracking progress over time, especially for maintaining weight, quite helpful. I often go long periods of time without entering information, and the app used to provide the ability to check in once in a while and be able to maintain a record. The *simplified* and utterly truncated visuals and timeline are not worthless. I will be looking for another tracking app.
response: Thanks for your review and feedback. We‚Äôve just released an update to the app addressing these concerns. Please update to version 5.31.0. If you still have questions or concerns, please send us an email at¬†support@livestrong.com.

title: Highly recommend MyPlate
body: This is the best calorie tracker app hands down. It has almost every food imaginable already in their system. It is easy to use and just as easy to track your progress. I recommend for anybody who wants to watch what they eat; regardless of whether you are trying to lose, maintain, or gain weight.  You will not regret using this app.
response: Thank you for the awesome review!

title: Calculation issue
body: Please add a way to type in desired gram/ounces and have the app calculate the calories and macros accordingly.
response: Hi Scugoza! We appreciate your feedback. MyPlate uses a comprehensive third-party food database, which is a collection of listings from the USDA and some food manufacturers. Unfortunately, we're not able to add or remove items from this database as it is managed by Nutritionix.

title: Precise & easy to use, Thanks "LiveStrong"
body: I turned 50 this year & I wanted to watch my calorie intake since the metabolism has been slowing down. I found this app while researching on Google a question & this app was displayed near the "LiveStrong" webpage. This app is very precise & easy to use. I'm enjoying it! I love to scan feature. I may consider upgrading to the Gold after awhile, too! I recommend!

title: Just what I needed
body: It‚Äôs amazing how this tool not only tracks your caloric intake, shows the breakdown of protein/fats/carbs, lists calories burned using iPhone data, and more, but I‚Äôm finding that I eat less because I have to log everything (accountability) that I eat. Luckily this app makes logging everything pretty simple...while making it obvious how many times I reach for a snack.

title: Stopped working
body: I was very happily using this app, liked it even with some quirks it has when looking up some foods, then it started freezing during logging calories and I‚Äôd have to go out then come back in a couple of times before it would work. But yesterday it said I needed to log in with user name and password, forgot password and tried three times to have it sent. Even deleted app and restored it but no dice! So today I say goodbye and hello to a new hopefully better app.
response: Hello slenderdoodle, we're so sorry for this inconvenience. Please email us at support@livestrong.com so we can help you get logged in.

title: Great App
body: I love that you can keep detailed list of things you eat. Not just counting a meal. It let's you pick every item on your plate and counts the calories for you. I do wish it had a pregnancy option on it and count just calories instead of weight management. With my problems in having I have to keep track of calories not weight. I will definitely continue to use this after I have the baby.

title: Love this so much!!
body: This app is perfect for whatever you are trying to do with your diet, whether it‚Äôs eat less, eat more, or just track what kinds of food you‚Äôre eating. Personally, I was not eating enough for months and was very undernourished and now that I‚Äôm trying to eat more and gain muscle, this app really helps motivate me to eat more calories and more protein. Thank you for this app!!!!

title: Ok but...
body: The barcode scanner doesn't work all the time. You should be able to add and edit food while your not in the middle of adding a meal. Like after you eat and have time. Also if basic info was in there for ‚Äúplain steamed spinach‚Äù then I could build my food from there by adding ingredient ie tbs salted butter.

title: Amazing Calorie Tracking App!
body: I downloaded a couple calorie tracking apps to try to find which one would help me the most and majority wanted me to sign up for a subscription to go any further. With MyPlate, I can track my calories, it gives me workouts, and I can meal prep too for free! I‚Äôm on my second week of calorie tracking and I‚Äôm noticing a huge difference already!

title: You will gain weight on this app
body: I have been tracking my data for 25 years. I know my numbers. Any app that tells you that you can eat 2000 calories a day and lose weight is just broken. I would consider keeping it if I could adjust my own caloric goal but I can‚Äôt figure out how to do that. The tracking features are sufficient but I can‚Äôt see a weekly report anywhere.  My Fitness Pal is what I used for years and then one day, it just kept clocking instead of logging me in. I thought all these apps would have the same type of features but that is not the case.
response: Hi there! I'm sorry that you input your information incorrectly and did not know how to correct it and did not contact support or utilize our online Community. We'd be happy to assist you with that.

title: It‚Äôs alright
body: It seems like it could be a pretty good app but I haven‚Äôt started really using it yet because I can‚Äôt figure out how to use it exactly. Idk if it already has this as an option but it would be really nice if I could make my own meal and name it, for example if I wanted to make a smoothie which has a ton of different things in it that that would be really nice. It would just be really cool if the app could actually show you how to use it before it just throws you in.
response: Hi there! Thanks for the review. Here is a Get Started Guide you may find useful: https://www.livestrong.com/slideshow/1011166-myplate-calorie-tracker-app-guide/

title: Saved my life!
body: This program, with its sweetly worded reminders, has kept me on track for almost 3 months. I have been able to find practically all the foods I eat & exercises/activities through its search engine. Seeing my daily intake is a great motivator; seeing how exercise affects my daily calorie goal is inspiring! It's so handy & I think that's the key. I really commend the designers for developing a program that does exactly what it promises to do!
response: We're so glad to hear that MyPlate has helped you! We'd love to know what we can do to make this a 5 star app for you :)

title: Community Problems
body: This app is good and all but the people in the community are down-bringers and are so self centered. They basically tell me I can‚Äôt lose weight and everything is unhealthy for me to try? The community is a piece of trash and i recommend not using it. If your 16 and under really stay away from the community because the people are toxic and dont like us ‚Äúkids.‚Äù

title: Deleted all of my data
body: I‚Äôve been using this app for a while now, and it did everything it was supposed to. I was able to keep track of all my stuff really easily and input all of my food options. But after the latest update, the app logged me out, then deleted all the data I‚Äôve been collecting for the last almost three months. There‚Äôs no calorie data or any of the custom meals I created, only the weight, and that doesn‚Äôt help with what I‚Äôm trying to do.
response: Hi Yedusolo, we're so sorry for this inconvenience. Please email us at support@livestrong.com so we can assist you with recovering your data.

title: Can‚Äôt create an account.
body: The app keeps insisting that there is a network error, and it will not let me connect through Facebook or create an account on my own. I‚Äôve tried using WiFi and data but neither are working. It kept indicating that my email was not recognized even though I tried four different emails, and it was being super picky about a user name (I tried several of those as well). This is super frustrating as it won‚Äôt even let me get started. I tried yesterday as well and the same thing happened. Probably just going to have to try a different app.
response: Hello! We are so sorry you faced this issue. We have been experiencing some technical difficulties on our servers. The team has been working hard to get it back up. Thanks so much for your patience. Look forward to having you around in our app! If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Calorie cycling
body: I love everything about the app, especially how it links with my Apple Watch that monitors the amount of calories burned. The only suggestion I have is that it would be super helpful if you could change the amount of calories per day (for calorie cycling) instead of just having the same amount. I‚Äôve been wanting to begin calorie cycling, but I won‚Äôt be able to use that plan with this app.

title: Not 100% Keto friendly app
body: My husband and I are on the Keto diet. He is using MyFitness Pal and able to change his to show how many fats/carbs/proteins he wants to have each day. I have used this app to track my calories for years and yet I am disappointed that when I have been advised to change my diet I cannot have this app reflect it. It would be nice if the developers kept this in mind as people have diabetics and other issues that may cause them to need to change set goals.
response: Hi there! You can easily change your macronutrient goals.

title: Easy to use, would be nice to track specific things.
body: I think this app is fairly intuitive. However, I think it would be good if you could track specific stuff not just predetermined by the app. Like, if there‚Äôs a certain food you are trying to have more or less of, it would be nice to be able to type that in and see all the times you last had it.

title: User Friendly
body: I downloaded several calorie counting apps and this is the best one. With it already having generic entries of food that you can select, it makes it much easier to log your calories and it‚Äôs fast.

title: Better than any other cal tracking app
body: I used to use my fitness pal but decided to try out this app. I have to say my favorite part is the social aspect of it. Everyone is so supportive and it‚Äôs fun and encouraging to post your healthy meals or progress and have people cheer you on that are doing the same thing. It makes going on a weight loss journey not feel so lonely.
response: Hi audreytude! Thank you for leaving a review. We're happy to hear you are enjoying the app and the Community.

title: Rating the App
body: I have been shopping for an App to assist me in a calorie counter. I‚Äôve seen and tried many others. Upon finding this app and exploring it, I‚Äôm very excited to try it out and put it to good use. It seems to be an easy way of keeping track. I also love the fact that I can get examples of what I can make since I am new at this. I will share how my progress is doing and excited to start. Thank you
response: Hi there! Thank you for the review. Here is a Get Started Guide you may find useful:

title: Adjusting macronutrients and calories
body: This app is awesome for tracking calories, foods, goals, and looking up the nutritional info on foods. I am struggling figuring out how to adjust my macro nutritional goals daily. I am trying to carb cycle and eat specifically for a endomorph body type. I want to be able to plug in a different caloric goal and daily macros, but can‚Äôt figure out a way to. HELP!!!!!! If you know how HELP!!!! Haha then it would be perfect. I paid for the gold membership and feel like I should be able to do this
response: Hi 1981Russ209!

title: Almost perfect app!
body: I love this app! It does 99% of what I need. It is so easy and user friendly tracking more then Judy calories but fat, carbs and protein as well.

title: An Ok App That Needs Work
body: Tried this out for a while, and overall is a nice app, but needs some work to really shine.

title: Excellent Food Tracking
body: I‚Äôm at the weight I want to be and this easily used tracker app keeps me honest. It‚Äôs a great daily habit that can keep a conscientious person from overindulgence and will help a motivated one to lose weight. The food selection database is good and the scanning abilities are great. It‚Äôs rare that I can‚Äôt find what I want. The ability to re-select an habitual choice of breakfast is excellent.

title: Great menu but after a week couldn‚Äôt track
body: I started using this app a week ago and started the meal plan this Monday. First, I did get the shopping list in time but had no idea on the meal plan and recipes until the morning that I started. This is the 3rd day and now I am unable to view the meal plan and add new foods to track. I am disappointed. It worked great until this happened. I can‚Äôt even go to the website following the links for my daily plan from my email. Now I have a fridge full of food but no idea what recipe to follow.
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage at our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Great Tracker
body: Love the simplicity this app offers.  Easy to track your eating, and the scanner option is great for getting the right product.  I also like that you receive daily emails with articles to help you on your health journey, from fitness to meals to simple medical research.  My only qualm is the cost to upgrade to Gold.  Other than that, I highly recommend this app for anyone wanting a basic daily meal/calorie tracker.

title: Love app
body: Really love this app and the advertisements are not at the top which makes it more user friendly. The only thing I don‚Äôt really care for is how it adds my calories in when I work out or the calories from the day. I feel like I don‚Äôt need to add back in all of my activity or I won‚Äôt lose the weight. Overall good app. Syncs with apple watch easily

title: Loving it!
body: So far I am definitely loving this app. I haven‚Äôt been using it very long. I love the fact that it‚Äôs easier to use than other ones I have used. Enjoy that there are recipes for you to make. I also love that you don‚Äôt have to focus on everything such as sodium, sugar and carbohydrates. You can just focus on calories if that‚Äôs what you are tracking.

title: Almost
body: I have used MyfitPal awhile ago, tried to use it again recently, but found that it requires you to surrender you data to be sold to any commercial vender anywhere in the world with out limitations on privacy laws or lack there of.

title: Download for accountability
body: This is a really good app.  I wondered why I wasn‚Äôt loosing weight when eating ‚Äúhealthy‚Äù this app helps you manage and identify an estimate of carbs, proteins and fats you eat per meal.  It even has a scanner where you can scar your food barcode for a more detailed outcome. After two weeks, I can see a difference on my body shape, weight and overall feeling.

title: Great for maintaining weight, too
body: I just started college and have been using the app for a few week. I knew I wasn't eating enough and was experiencing a lot of nausea and black outs. I track all my meals and snacks in the app to ensure I am reaching my caloric goals for each day. I also love that I can see my overall macros (carbs, protein, and fat) for the day. It makes it easier to plan a smart and nutritious next meal which will get me to my goals.

title: GREAT!
body: This is a great app! Works well and haven't had any problems with it! It tells you home many calories you have ate in a day and it also give you a percentage for how many carbs, proteins, and fats you should be eating! Really helps me think about what I'm eating! Also, I love that I can scan the barcode on items and not have to try and find it by searching!

title: Nutritional Stats All Wrong
body: This app has accomplished what I got it for, which was losing a few pounds. Unfortunately, the nutritional stats on half of their stuff is wrong. You have to read very carefully before you just use the stats they have provided, and eventually you find yourself having to log in most of what you eat manually at least the first time. Whoever is watching over this app needs to go through and delete all the wrong information.

title: Good app!
body: Very helpful app for tracking calories. Nice interface that tracks calories, carbs and fat on the front screen, and other nutritional values as well. I've been using in for a few months now and have lost almost 30 lbs. My only gripe is ever since the last update, I've been having issues getting the barcode scanner to work, so I end up having to manually search for the food.

title: Repeat User
body: I love how the app guides me with daily recipes so I can eat the right combination of foods.  I have gone through the free 8 week plan 3 times so far to help me maintain healthy eating habits. I see My Plate as a long term accountability tool for my eating habits, but know that as I continue to restart the 8 week plan the recipes will be the same. A change in the recipes for repeat users would be nice. Other than that, My Plate has been a blessing to me.
response: Hi Traveling Annie, we love to hear that you've been using our Stronger meal plans! We hope to include more meal plans in the future! Stay tuned :)

title: App is buggy, doesn‚Äôt let you customize food easily vague answers about fixes
body: A lot of the entries for food or listed incorrectly. You can‚Äôt skill foods by gram weight. Entering foods customized does not produce accurate protein or carbs counts. This makes it very hard to measure your food which is the whole point of the app. I work around but they‚Äôre using doesn‚Äôt allow you to enter fiber and other nutrients. For the paid version of this app, it‚Äôs a little disappointing. Responses do not provide repair times, just a vague promise they will be fixed.

title: Disappointed by latest update
body: The latest update for the free version removed a valuable feature. Before, you could get your nutritional breakdown based on your unique calorie goal and now it‚Äôs set to 2,000 calories. This makes the app almost unusable for me, a diabetic who relied on this feature to accurately calculate carbs and fiber. Please bring this back. It makes no sense whatsoever to move this formerly free feature to premium only and now I don‚Äôt want to upgrade at all!
response: Thanks for updating, and thanks for the feedback! Although the nutritional breakdown in the "Food Diary" does have a feature locked behind membership, you should still be able to view your tracked nutrients in relation to your personal goals in the Progress tab. We apologize if the change in interface has caused any misunderstanding. Thanks again for taking the time to try and review the new MyPlate update!

title: Love the app but there‚Äôs an issue popping up.
body: My wife and I have been using this app to log every piece of food we eat and over the past year we‚Äôve lost a total of 75 pounds. Had no issues with it but suddenly certain days show Food Diary numbers super high. For instance, Fats shows 9535 g/22 %. Any ideas how to fix the weird glitch?  Protein shows in the 10s of thousands. Lol

title: Calories counter
body: This app is a genius ,for Everthing you eat ,it‚Äôs so simple to track your Calories to simple put in your food it gives you free works out and even recipes,the my plate App made it simple to loose the weight you want,and it‚Äôs compatible with the health app from your iPhone or Apple Watch! Thank you My Plate App for making my life so easy to loose weight!
response: Hi there! Thank you for that amazing review. We'll really appreciate your support.

title: Really good until it‚Äôs not
body: I‚Äôve depended on this app for tracking absolutely everything I eat. I love the barcode scan (however sometimes the recorded serving sizes differ) and it remembers my previously recorded foods. However, sometimes the app doesn‚Äôt display my metrics at all - ads and their promoted recipes appear fine, just not what I actually need. Today the app has been down for hours, and I‚Äôve had no other option but to download one of their competitors.
response: Hi there! Thanks for the review and feedback. The app wasn't down on Friday. We'd be happy to assist you if you have any questions. Please reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Great app! But...
body: I really enjoy using this app to help me maintain my weight and track calories and my workouts. However, I have a small complaint about tracking my exercise, if I accidentally hit something and input the wrong information on one of my workouts there‚Äôs no way to go back into that specific workout and change something. Perhaps a later update will fix this?

title: Great
body: This is an amazing app, it helps sooo much and even with the minor restrictions and how you need to buy some things, it‚Äôs pretty good! It‚Äôs cheap too, the prices.
