The app still shows you how many calories are burned and most of the things it has. It‚Äôs not one of the apps where you have to buy a premium version to even be able to use it. This is great!!!

title: !!!!!!!GREAT APP!!!!!!!
body: I got this app to help me lose weight as I really didn‚Äôt know what factors to consider in regards to my diet. I downloaded it, entered in my information and goals and made an effort to be as accurate as I could everyday. The result after  9 months of using this app? 71 pounds and many inches lost!!! This is a great tool and I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS APP!
response: We're so happy to hear that you've found success with MyPlate, DoninCNY!! Thanks for the great review.

title: Amazing!
body: Love love this app, helped with keeping me accountable and I love the personalized application to my life.
response: Hi Jeremy, thank you so much for your review and feedback! You can add or remove foods from custom Meals by clicking the "edit" button next to the meal name. Please email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions!

title: Great app
body: I have had this app for less than a day and so far it‚Äôs great. You can gain weight or loose weight with this app, you can keep track of the food you eat. And my favorite part is that you can ask the community questions and most of the time you get a response! Love this app totally recommend it to anyone looking to gain or loose weight!!

title: Great app.
body: Been using this for several years. Thought it might be interesting to try NOOM. Bad choice. This app does everything Noom does and MORE and its FREE. No comparison.  Face it‚Äîultimately one‚Äôs  exercise, food intake, and weight loss are his/her own responsibility. This is a terrific app which helps a person achieve the weight loss maintenance goals.  Not spending my money on over advertised/expensive hype.
response: Hi there! We‚Äôre so happy you‚Äôre enjoying MyPlate and would love to give you the opportunity to explore our Gold membership! Please send us an email at¬†support@livestrong.com¬†for details.

title: Awesome
body: I‚Äôve been trying to gain weight for awhile and I never realized how little calories I‚Äôve been eating until I used this app. It really helps me get closer to my goal by helping me keep track of how many calories I‚Äôm eating in a day. I gained 13 pounds over the past year and it literally would not have ever happened if I didn‚Äôt download this app lol. Thank god for it
response: Hi Daisy5813! Thank you for your feedback. We‚Äôre glad MyPlate is helping you to achieve your goals. We're constantly looking for new ways to improve our app, and we love getting feedback as it helps guide our process moving forward.

title: Excellent App for Calorie Tracking!
body: This app is by far the best app for tracking calories. It is really great to see the Macronutrient Breakdown and Daily Goals. It makes tracking calories feel like game and I am really able to stay consistent with my health and fitness goals. I have tried many of the other calorie tracking apps and MyPlate is my absolute favorite!
response: Hi Jvfl92! Thank you for your feedback! We‚Äôre glad you are enjoying MyPlate. We're constantly looking for new ways to improve our site and apps, and we love getting feedback as it helps guide our process moving forward.

title: Unexpectedly Valuable
body: If used correctly, it will force you to think about how much you‚Äôre eating in a way that would be difficult without the tool.

title: My first time!!
body: This is my first time doing a calorie counter and honestly I like it already. After putting in (so far) the snacks that I‚Äôve eaten, I see how much calories I‚Äôve eaten. I do eat a lot of snacks and it was pretty shocking to see the number of calories and the things I eat. I really think that I can accomplish my weight goal with the use of this app and my mindset.

title: So disappointing. Still broken
body: How disappointing, even after today‚Äôs update on September 30, 2019 you are still having the same issue. Months ago I setup certain foods to reoccur. Then I change my diet and deleted those foods and turned off the reoccurring feature. Yet they still continued to reappear. Every day I have to manually delete a bunch of items. I have reached out to you two different times. Each time you say you will delete one months worth. And that‚Äôs all you can do. Are you honestly telling me your tech guys did not address this bug yet??
response: Hello! We're sorry for this inconvenience. A member of our team has reached out to you regarding this issue.

title: "EDITitable" for edibles
body: Update 31-AUG-2017: not into the motivational wallpapers and I don't eat DelMonte foods. But I like the idea of partnering w/food corps. Please partner with health foods corps...soon.

title: Needs a few things
body: It‚Äôs a good app, most of what I eat can be found, if it isn‚Äôt found I just take the average number I find. However it needs a way to add workouts that aren‚Äôt included in the app or that aren‚Äôt tracked by your phone. I tried to email support about this but after I typed the email out there was no send button, so that‚Äôs also something that could be changed
response: Hi Firesidezeus! We're so sorry for the lack of send button. While we work on a fix for this, you can still send us an email by tapping the space where the send button should be. As for adding a workout that is not in our database, you can do so easily! Tap "Exercise" from the Track tab. Select ‚ÄúCustom Exercises‚Äù, and tap the ‚Äú+‚Äù symbol. Then, give your exercise a name and enter hourly calorie burn rate. Please feel to email us directly at support@livestrong.com with any questions.

title: Loved this app, but lately not so much.
body: I started using this app a year ago and have been very happy with it. I‚Äôve lost weight and have become more aware of what I‚Äôm eating. But the last two weeks I‚Äôve been logged out a few times when I load the app. It wasn‚Äôt really a problem but when I logged in just now all my information was gone. It‚Äôs like I have to start all over :( Not happy.
response: Hello kimmysue02, We're so sorry for the inconvenience. Please update the app to version 5.14.4. This update solved a bug that was causing some users to be logged out unexpectedly. Your data must be safely stored in our servers. Please email us at support@livestrong.com for assistance with this.

title: Downgraded Features...
body: I‚Äôve used My Plate for over five years‚ÄîI‚Äôm beginning to feel that corners are being cut on the free app to ‚Äúencourage‚Äù users to sign up for a paid subscription.
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage at our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: User friendly
body: I prefer this app over similar food tracking apps because it allows me more control over what I want to track. I use it to keep my fats, protein, and carbs at specific levels. I only use the calorie guide as a ballpark. There are lots of foods listed and the best thing is you can add a food yourself and save it or just scan the barcode!

title: My Guide For A Better Life
body: This program has helped me track all the food I am eating.I couldn‚Äôt understand why I wasn‚Äôt losing weight but with the tracker I now know it‚Äôs because I eat too much food and the wrong types of food. I also realized I wasn‚Äôt drinking enough water. All in all this program has really helped me to take control of my life.
response: Hi Annmarcaf! Thanks for the review. We're glad MyPlate has been so helpful.

title: Good app with robust food database, though searching can be improved
body: Sometimes difficult to find items, particularly ones from restaurants. An advanced search would be helpful. Also would be nice if food you add could be applied at a later date to a different meal time meal and not just for the meal you ate, e.g. tracking foods from breakfast for lunch.

title: Great app
body: MyPlate has a great speed and interface. I like that the app shows visually (i.e bar, pie chart) your macros and how many calories you have eaten that day/week/month etc. I also like looking through the recipes provided in the app, as well as the motivational reminders to track calories. I‚Äôm super happy with the app and have lost 5 pounds in 3 weeks so far!

title: Good But Disappointing
body: Being disabled and not able to walk quickly, I thought I discovered the perfect app. There is ‚Äúwalking with crutches,‚Äù ‚Äúwalking pushing a wheelchair,‚Äù ‚Äúwalking for pleasure;‚Äù I have never seen such variety for disabled people.
response: Hi there! There are two options to save foods that you eat frequently! Once you track an item a few times, it will be added to your Recently Tracked list. To track the item again, just tap the plus sign. You can also create a custom food entry and save it to your My Food list. This will allow you to track the food item frequently. Please email us at support@livestrong.com if you have any questions.

title: I really want to love it
body: I really want to love this app, but I‚Äôm getting tired of having to create every meal I eat because when I scan the items in, the nutrition information is completely wrong. Even when I search for the items, I usually can‚Äôt find what I‚Äôm looking for. There needs to be a way to correct certain parts of an item in your database because having to create a whole new one every time is kind of ridiculous.

title: Great except for calories burned
body: The app is very useful and is what I would expect from a calorie counter, and then some. My only issue is with the calories burned feature. It‚Äôs meant to take the pedometer data from the iPhone health app and calculate calories burned from there, but it‚Äôs incredibly inconsistent. I had walked about 4.5 miles one day and it said I burned over 4000 calories, and another day I ran 11.5 and it said I burned 0

title: Thank you !!
body: I have struggled with my weight all my life, I am 57 now. I have lost hundreds of pounds but haven‚Äôt been able to keep it off. I have discovered this app to be a great tool. So easy to keep track and know where I‚Äôm at daily on all my nutritional goals. No more pen and paper, calculator or spreadsheets !!  Yes, I am that nerd !!!  Thanks again for creating such a great tool !!
response: Thanks for the awesome review, lauraleeb! We're sooo happy you've found success with the MyPlate app.

title: Favorite Food Tracker App
body: This is one of the best and most frequently used apps on my phone. It‚Äôs not only helpful for tracking calories but macros as well. The emails Livestrong sends you once you sign up are always interesting and informative. I thought I was a healthy person before, but this app has changed my relation with food for the best!

title: Great idea, but with inaccurate information.
body: Love the idea of tracking my calories and micros, but the issue comes when you read the nutritional material on a few common brands, and they don‚Äôt add up to the same calories, or the same facts.
response: Thanks for giving MyPlate a try! We very much appreciate your feedback and have forwarded your comments to our team.As we aim for accuracy with the content and features found in the site and app, we love getting feedback as it helps guide our designs and tools moving forward.

title: Very impressed
body: This surprised me a lot! I‚Äôve tried a few different food diary apps but this it by far the best one I‚Äôve tried. It is easy to use and has a lot of features. The free membership gives you access to enough features to successfully use the app and the upgrade was reasonably priced. Still new it but so far I am very impressed.

title: Love it!
body: This app keeps me focused and in control of what I eat. I love that so many different foods are available to input; that makes it very easy to use. I also enjoy that it links to my Health app on my iPhone. I‚Äôve been using it since the second week of January and lost 25 pounds so far. I do not think I would have had as much success without it.

title: Great app! Just lacking a Notes section
body: Love this app. Have tried several others including My Fitness Pal and this remains my favorite. Intuitive, easy to follow display. Customizable macros with the paid version. My only complaint is there‚Äôs no Notes section for me to track how I‚Äôm feeling or sleeping, how my workout went, if I‚Äôm sluggish in the afternoon etc. so I can look back and adjust my calorie or macro goals.

title: Perfect calorie tracking app for me
body: I‚Äôve started to track my foods to keep myself accountable and learn more about what I put in my body. I have the free version and it has everything I need. Calories, proteins, carbs and fats. It tells you if you‚Äôve gone over your limit and let‚Äôs you know how many grams you have left. Love this app 10/10
response: Hi Satasoda! Thank you so much for your review. We're happy to hear you have found the app so useful.

title: Review
body: Amazing! I love it so much. The only thing that could be better is the portion tracking. I would like if they had the option to input food in the oz amount. They have this for some things, but not most. It would be very helpful for veggies, as it is easier to weigh broccoli than try to see how many cups you have :)

title: Sharing component needed
body: I really do enjoy this app. It is simple to use and accurate. The only reason for the minus one star is because of one thing. I have a friend to keep me accountable for my calorie intake, and me for him. It would be helpful to have a way to share your screen, so friends that you have authorized could see how you are doing for the day/week. Similar to find my friends with iphones.

title: Great for tracking food... Needs work on integration with other apps
body: Has been a great app for tracking calories, carbs, fats, and protein.  Adding food you can't find is easy, and functionality of the app makes it easy to use.

title: Only tracking app that's worked for me!
body: I love this app! I love that it tracks my daily walking and how many calories I'm burning from that. I like that it shows how many calories I've taken in how many I've burned and then my net. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because I do have to add my own food a lot, BUT it does scan barcodes better than other apps I've used! I'd definitely recommend it!

title: Great app! Two changes needed.
body: Would like to see calories consumed instead of clicking Calories and getting the Net in the progress tab. Also when I add water oz throughout the day, in the Apple Health kit, the ounces of total water is incorrect. It is duplicating the total ounces each time making it incorrect and recording more ounces than actually consumed. Would be a 5 Star app with those two things fixed.
response: Hi plking! Thank you for your feedback! I believe we resolved the issue with water tracking for you, but we've also passed your feedback on the Progress chart on to our team. Thanks again!

title: Pretty Good
body: Has been very helpful with my first month on the Ketogenic diet...however have had several instances where I have either enters a new food or gone through the trouble of entering a new recipe only to receive an error message ‚Äúcannot save new food item or recipe at this time, please try again later.‚Äù Very frustrating. Otherwise, I enjoy the app and use it daily. I would be happy to re-evaluate my review if that little issue was resolved.
response: Hello Butter4Life! We have identified a bug with the green pop up button that you're using to create a custom food. The team is working on a fix for this issue right now! In the meantime, please follow the steps below to create a custom food item:

title: Can we get more detailed manual food entry?
body: Overall I like this app because it‚Äôs functional but also looks very good.

title: Getting better every year
body: I‚Äôve been logging my food using Livestrong since before Lance Armstrong was humbled. There are things that used to work on the laptop but now I can do pretty much everything on the phone app without having to sign on to the laptop. This app just keeps getting better all the time!

title: Helpful for Weight Gain
body: I have been trying to gain weight after an illness. The app tracking calories spent and providing the adjustment for that is very helpful. One thing that isn‚Äôt helpful is that the push notifications are for losing weight. Like ‚ÄúEat vegetables they are low in calories.‚Äù It would be nice if those prompts fit better to the different kind of goals this app can be used for. I‚Äôve also never been able to get a recipe to open.

title: Great for tracking Macros
body: I really like this app for tracking macros. Really trying to get adequate protein in my diet daily and this app kinda makes you hold yourself more accountable. I know every entry isn‚Äôt 100% accurate but it is way better than the guestimations I was doing. Summer is coming, it is helping me reach my health and fitness goals more quickly.
response: Hi Max! Thanks for the review. We're glad MyPlate is helping you to achieve your goals.

title: Success!
body: Easy to use and similar enough to the weight watchers app I had been using but better! I love the reminders during the day and appreciate being able to easily add new foods or look through foods others have added. This app help me get over a wait plateau and since I started using it I‚Äôve lost another 15 pounds.

title: Nice app
body: I do love the app.  I use it purely for tracking calories in versus out.  Adding food is easy.  Couple of improvement ideas that would make it a 5 for me.  Ability to create a meal from food previously eaten.   Have to rescan now.  Copy option to copy lunch from other day if I eat again rather than rescanning pieces.  I suspect like me many people repeat meals.   Nice job though!  Would certainly recommend!
response: Hi fksimon! Thank you for the review. We appreciate your feedback and I have passed along your comments to our product development team. Currently, the copying of meals from one day to the next can only be done from the desktop site. https://www.livestrong.com/myplate/dashboard/

title: Simple, intuitive, and detailed
body: The app has a lot of great info available for free. It's the first time I've used one of these apps longer than one week. I'm not really a fan of keeping track of my food but this app presents my data in a way that makes me curious to compare data from previous days. Thanks and keep it up!

title: Great program
body: The app has almost everything I need to keep track of what I eat, what calories I burn not just exercise but household chores, and many other activities that burn calories.

title: Great with one drawback
body: The app is comprehensive and easy to use. The only suggestion I have is to make all previous foods consumed available under each category of consumption. For instance, if I had a boiled egg entered under breakfast and later open the snack category I cannot find boiled egg on the list of previously consumed foods but must enter it there. If I had one for lunch, same thing. Please eliminate this need for redundancy.

title: Glitch....
body: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS APP!!! It‚Äôs perfect to track how much you eat and I‚Äôm already losing weight!!!! Just a few weeks ago I noticedThat when you go to track your exercise it must have a glitch because it says you only burn 1 cal per hour doing things that should not burn 1 cal per hour this is probably just a developer mistake and I‚Äôm still using the app just wondering if anybody else is experiencing this?
response: Hi there! We'd love to look into this for you. Can you please email us at support@livestrong.com? Thanks!

title: Great app
body: I‚Äôve used this app for years and it‚Äôs an easy, quick, and simple way to track your calories, carbs, etc. I like that you can quickly select pre-entered food items or enter calories for a new food if you cannot find a specific item. Water and exercise tracking are a nice touch as well.
response: Thanks for the great review! We're so glad you're enjoying MyPlate.

title: Love it!
body: I love everything about this app! It‚Äôs free, you can scan bar codes to create a food, find foods, and put all the information about a food. I love that it connects to my health app, and that I can track how many calories I have burned. I want to lose weight so I can feel better about myself, and this app has helped me to do that. ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: A Wish
body: I love the set up a look of this app. I‚Äôve used several different food tracking apps but none of them offer what I need as far as tracking food. I have a medical condition that requires me to track the histamines and related things in my diet. So right now I‚Äôm having to use several different apps to manage my disease and I wish there was just one app that could do it all.
response: Hi there! Thank you for the review and feedback. If you have any questions about the app, feel free to reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Need a way to edit fitness tracked
body: This app is great id love to give it 5 stars easily but I‚Äôve been getting annoyed by it tracking my iPhone fitness and my Apple Watch calories leading to an incorrect reading this along with no way to edit fitness calories makes this feature useless I really don‚Äôt want to switch to my fitness pal because I love the interface of this app but if this feature continues to fail I may have to as it‚Äôs app breaking.
response: HI there! We're so sorry for the double counting. Our team is working hard on a fix for this. In the meantime, we recommend turning off activity tracking in the MyPlate app. This will allow you to only track activity from your Apple Watch. Please follow the steps below:

title: Good tracking app
body: I like the app, the functionality, it‚Äôs easy to use. I love that it synchronizes to my Apple Watch and adds my exercise stuff.

title: Makes trying to put on weight easier
body: This app is fantastic! It makes eating into a game, which is good for people trying to add and subtract from the scale. Eating 4000 calories to try to put on some weight as a skinny kid is impossible for me, but this app keeps me eating throughout the day. Goal is to get another 20 and this app has already gotten me 25! Thank you!

title: Great Calorie Counter, Confusing activity tracker
body: This app is exactly what I was looking for to track my meals but I am a bit confused on how it tracks activity. I use the Apple Watch and it counts my calories burned with that. However, then it also tracks my iPhone step counter. This seems redundant to me. There should be a way to choose the activities for which the app keeps track of calories burned.
response: Hi mf_ferry! We apologize for the double counting. Our team is aware of this and is working on a solution. In the meantime, we recommend turning off activity tracking in the MyPlate app. This will allow the app to sync only with your Apple Watch. To do this, please do the following:

user_name: What can I do to fix my app?
title: Updated my app, now I can‚Äôt get in
body: I updated this app this morning.  I tried to log in and it keeps telling that there is an error and try back later.  I tried through Facebook same problem.  I thought maybe I forgot my password and tried to recover my password.  Gives me the same error.  I have been using this app for a couple months and have recommended it to everyone.  I thought about reinstalling the app, but I don‚Äôt want to lose my information. I wish I wouldn‚Äôt have updated.  Everything was working fine.  What can I do?
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage at our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Easy to use
body: Love this app gives me all I need... You can track all your meals, the good part you don‚Äôt have to calculate absolutely nothing the app will provide the calculations for you...total amount of macronutrients based on your weight, total amount of calories based on your needs lose weigh, gain weight maintain weigh..  I recommend it 100%.

title: Much Improved!
body: Wow! I use to use this app four years ago and it was great then just a tad time consuming. The new features such as the scanning of bar codes and input history per each meal section makes entering calories super zippy. What can be faster?! Maybe taking a photo of my food and AI assessing its calories? I‚Äôm sure Livestrong is already on it :)

title: Keeps me on track!!!!
body: I keep coming back to this app! It‚Äôs so helpful to have consumed calories, burned calories, and net calories all considered when logging food. I also love how this app keeps track of macros and percentages. I only wish that when adding weight it wouldn‚Äôt round to the nearest pound. Other than that, 10/10 recommend!

title: Amazing App!
body: My 16-year-old daughter turned me onto this app and I am addicted I was writing down everything in a journal and now it is so easy to track everything I eat also tracking my exercise without having to do anything is amazing!!!! Highly recommend for losing weight and keeping track of what you‚Äôre eating.

title: Synch Issues
body: I would give a higher rating, but sometimes my entries synch between my iPhone and my iPad and sometimes they don‚Äôt.  I have to delete and reload the app on whichever device did not synch.  It happens relatively often on both devices.  Annoying.
response: Hi there! Thank you for the review and feedback. If this happens, we suggest using the in-app Force Sync button. I apologize for the inconvenience. If you have any questions or additional feedback, please reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Easy to use !
body: I have used other apps to track my calories but this one seems to exceed on my daily tracking ! Others apps are complicated and hard to use , not appealing background and lack of softwares . If you want a good calorie tracking then this is the one for you ! Good user interface!

title: The recipes!
body: Have been using MyPlate for a few years.  Have always loved the app as it keeps me accountable for what I eat.  It has a large inventory of common foods and allows you to scan barcodes for less common foods not in the database.  Most recently, I have enjoyed the recipes that are both tasty and nutritious.  A nice complement to an already wonderful app.

title: I really like this so far
body: I would give 5 stars if this app linked to Fitbit, or had a more user friendly search. The search for food can be frustrating. You can type something like ‚Äúcrab legs‚Äù expecting the most simple result to be at the top, but you have to scroll through ‚Äúimitation crab meat‚Äù,  ‚Äúcrab leg seafood salad‚Äù and a dozen other similar things before you get to just plain old crab legs.

title: Great App
body: I am very satisfied with this app.  It allows me to track my daily diet, calories,  protein, weight, etc.  It has good graphic displays for tracking by day, week, month, and year.  Another great aspect is the access to a  comprehensive food database.   For someone trying to lost weight or eat a healthier diet this is a wonderful tool.  My congratulations to the developers.
response: Thanks a million erictico!

title: Awesome
body: Keeps my notified if I forget to put in my food intake. I have seen result because I am more conscious calories. It can be alittle annoying when I keep getting notification but in a good way that makes me want to put in the info so it can stop. I have found more of my food just by scanning the barcode. Super easy to use.

title: Awful app. Just deleted all my data
body: I've been using it for over a year. A few days ago, I think after an update, the app started demanding that I log in. For some reason it didn't recognize my email. Their tech support was less than useless. Kept repeating that they can't find my account. Doh. Didn't I just tell you that I was using your freaking app for over a year. Anyway, eventually I was able to start it up but now all my collected / customized food data and other records for over a year are wiped out!!! Great job whoever wrote this thing!
response: Hello, we're so sorry for the inconvenience. Please email us at support@livestrong.com for assistance.

title: App can‚Äôt connect to Internet
body: The first day I had this app I loved it, I could search food and look at posts on the community tab. But not it won‚Äôt connect and will load forever when I search for a food. 5 stars without this issue

title: Love it!
body: It has so many calorie counts already built in and verified. The barcode scanner makes it even easier to add items if they don‚Äôt happen to have the info built in already. Easy to use too! The only improvement I could think of is to have a recipe builder that can calculate calories for each serving.

title: Bring back the RDA analysis
body: This app has gone backwards over the years.  It has gotten less analytical and filled with more fluff.
response: Thanks for the review, and thanks for being a long-term member of the MyPlate community! We understand the frustration that comes when features are reworked or relocated, and we want to assure you that while the view is not identical, you can still view your daily consumption and progress as far back as a year in the graph on the Progress section of the app. As we work towards improving the user experience, we encourage you to keep an eye out for updates. Thank you again for the review, and thanks for trying MyPlate!

title: Amazing and Practical App
body: This app is awesome.  It is simple to use and will work for everyone.  Has different levels of losing weight whether it is fast or a slow that you desire.  It will show you the ratio of Carbs to protein to fats that you intake and what you should have.  I have already lost 15 pounds on this app and I haven‚Äôt had to starve myself!!

title: Best calorie tracker and I‚Äôve tried many!!
body: I am very happily leaving this review because MyPlate has become an app that I have been using everyday for almost 2 years now. I am very pleased by the simplicity of the app and database of all the foods I can find. The scan feature makes my life even easier too! Great job on this app MyPlate team !
response: Hi BetoEats! Thank you for your amazing review. We appreciate your support.

title: A mainstay
body: I‚Äôve used trackers off and on for a while now. This one is intuitive and easy to use. I love the layout of it. Everything I need is right where I want it. There‚Äôs no annoying messages or ads getting in the way.

title: Great but one complaint
body: It‚Äôs a great program most of the time! I‚Äôve lost 30 pounds following the plan and the recipes. I have one complaint, if I don‚Äôt have the specific foods on hand because of living in the northeast part of the country and also the time of the year certain fruits and vegetables aren‚Äôt available, I will look of the suggestions at the bottom of the screen, the only suggested food are breakfast food  items.
response: Hi Corytimo! The recipes on your feed should change meal periods throughout the day. Please email us at support@livestrong.com if this is not happening!

title: Please fix!
body: I love using this app for my macros. I‚Äôve been using it for about 3 months and have lost over 20lbs. There is one minor issue that has become rather annoying. The app logs me out about once a day and I have to go back in and once I re log in it gives me the tutorial all over again. If this was fixed I‚Äôd give the app a 5/5 stars. Otherwise the app is amazing.
response: Hello! We're so sorry for the inconvenience. Please email us at support@livestrong.com for assistance.

title: MyPlate
body: This app really helps me in seeing what I‚Äôm truly eating on a daily basis. The only thing is I wish all the food would show up on all food times. A list under breakfast lunch dinner snacks. Because I might eat for lunch what I do for dinner sometimes vice versa. Thank you
response: Hi there! Thank you for your review and feedback! You can adjust your calorie goal easily! Tap the silhouette icon in the upper left corner of the app's home screen. Tap your profile picture. From this screen, you can change your Weight Goal and Activity Level as needed, and your Calorie Goal will change automatically. Or create your own goal by tapping "Calorie & Macronutrient Goals", and then "Calorie Goal". Toggle the button next to Automatic to the off position, then enter the goal you want.

title: Probably going to upgrade!
body: I've been using this app on the free version for about 2 or 3 months now and I absolutely love it! It's so easy to log in food and I love that it remembers my past foods so I don't have to scan the same thing more than once. This app has helped me to figure out healthy eating habits that work for me. Thanks!
response: Great to hear, KelGold! So happy that MyPlate has been working so well for you! Please email us at support@livestrong.com if you have any questions about upgrading to Gold.

title: Decent app for estimating calories
body: This is a good app for keeping track of meals but so tedious for breaking down items for calorie count. When you meal prep, you tend to make multiple portions. It‚Äôd be so much easier to be able to create a meal and select the number of servings it makes then add a serving to your food. Having to break it down for each portion, I seem to always have to increase amounts because the portion I use isn‚Äôt an option.

title: Small tweaks would make a big difference
body: It would be helpful to be able to adjust macronutrient ratios by 1 percentage point rather than only increments of 5. (Lifesum allows this.) Also, an indicator of approaching/surpassing a macronutrient amount, such as showing grams remaining and then turning the progress bar red, would be clearer. Finally, the barcode scanner often takes two attempts, with the first giving a connection error alert.
response: Thank you for trying MyPlate, and thank you for the recommendations! Since we're always working on improving these features and the general MyPlate experience, your feedback is greatly appreciated.

title: Love it.
body: I love that you can create your own foods, this has really been helping me keep track of how many calories I really am consuming. I only wish that I could sync with my family that way the foods I have created I can share with them so they don‚Äôt have to redo all the work, but other than that it is great!

title: Best calorie counter app
body: I absolutely love this app!! It is very simple to do everything, making it quick and easy to do after a meal. Easy to add foods if they aren‚Äôt already there, but most are.
response: Hi nrmj! Thank you for that amazing review. We're happy to hear you are enjoying the MyPlate app.

title: 5.30 update is junk
body: Recent changes no longer display important nutritional data with the granularity we enjoyed before this last update.  As someone with type 2 diabetes losing detailed carb data is a problem.  The app also used to flag days when daily targets were exceeded by changing the bar data from green to red.  It no longer shows daily granularity and now provides a useless bar graph. I‚Äôll have no choice but switch to another app since i cant view last 90 days in detail for my A1C tracking.
response: Thanks for your review and feedback. We‚Äôve just released an update to the app addressing these concerns. Please update to version 5.31.0. If you still have questions or concerns, please send us an email at¬†support@livestrong.com.

title: I have been steadily losing 1 pound a week
body: I could not have done it without this app. It makes it so easy to know what you can eat and when you have to stop eating. I have lost 15 pounds in 15 weeks and I‚Äôm hoping to lose another 10 pounds and do it slowly at 1 pound a week. I love this app I can‚Äôt recommend it more highly!

title: Simple
body: This app is so easy to use! The meal planning/exercise routines are awesome. I‚Äôll definitely be incorporating these in between sessions with my trainer. She suggested counting my macros and I thought it was going to be a hassle, but this was so simple - I did it after a hour workout session at 5:30am, running around with my baby, then working 8 hours. Good night üò¥

title: Nice, clean app
body: I like this app because of the clean interface, large food database and customizable macros. Other apps link to exercise apps (this eliminating the need for manual input) however I don't mind manually entering exercise. I leave the exercise apps for what they are good at - recording exercise- and leave this app to what it does well - calories, macros and nutrition.

title: Fantastic app with a big problem
body: *** updated to 5 stars!
response: Hi Ckm1977! We're so sorry, we never received your email!  If you are using a newer iPhone the barcode scanner is centered differently than previous iPhones models. You will need to move the device slightly up when scanning. This should place the line of the bottom scanning window right on the barcode. Doing so will yield better results.

title: Nice App
body: This app is very easy to use and I like the way the dashboard is set up.

title: You can‚Äôt even use it
body: This app use to be great. I used this app once with no problems. Now I can‚Äôt log in. No matter what I do it say ‚Äúemail address already in use‚Äù. Which is BULL because I created a brand new email account specifically to use this app. I thought it was my fault, that I must have done something wrong the first time. So I made the new email. But nope! This is the most infuriating app. There‚Äôs no point in it if you can‚Äôt even use it! Don‚Äôt waste your time. What‚Äôs the big secret that you have to keep our weight loss under lock and key anyway?
response: Hi madashell654, we'd love to help you with this. Please email us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Ok but needs some tweaking
body: I just started using the app. Overall, it‚Äôs ok. I wish there was a way to keep my calories for the day without them changing when I log exercise. More specifically, I use a Fitbit and I can‚Äôt log my steps. Instead, I enter the reading for my calories burned. When I do that, it increases the calories I‚Äôm allowed for the day but it‚Äôs really not what I should be doing. I should stay within the original calorie level.

title: Disgraceful.
body: I accidentally hit the wrong exercise. I went to delete it, which should not have been as big of a hassle as it was. The touch sensor on this is atrocious. Once I was able to unlock the delete screen, it kept adding calories burned rather than reset it to the proper number. Fix this at once.
response: Hi guyfranklinted! Thanks for reaching out. We have not had any other users report what you are describing. We'd like to gather more information regarding your issue so we can resolve it. Please contact us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Awesome and easy to use!
body: Was using an app provided by my health insurance.  It was hard to use, the calorie counts were mostly off.  The last time I used it the database was down for most of the week.

title: Easiest way to Track Food
body: Title says it all! Love this app so much. I have tried myFitnessPal and Weight Watchers and prefer MyPlate above them all. The only thing I‚Äôd love to see added would be a section to put what time you eat the meal but otherwise it offers everything you‚Äôd need to track food. Even has recipe suggestions!

title: The ‚Äúrepeat‚Äù function
body: The repeat function doesn't work well. If i eat something monday and eat the same breakfast the entire week, sometimes it well log it in the same week other times it puts on the following week and i can‚Äôt select the date i am repeating so i have to select the current days of the week up top.
response: Hi there! We'd love to look into this for you. Please send us an email at support@livestrong.com.

title: Working after update
body: If someone can please tell me, I enter my data and when I am done the box freezes I can‚Äôt get out of it unless I close the app completely.  Please advise what‚Äôs happening.  The app is working correctly I am pleased with it I use it to track my food to see if I may be allergic to something.
response: Hello! Please make sure you are updated to version 5.20.2, this should resolve the issues with speed and the done button. If you have updated and are still experiencing these issues, please don't hesitate to contact us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Fantastic
body: This app helps me be accountable for what I eat. Sometimes it‚Äôs hard to be real and honest about what we consume.  This app makes it easy. You just have to be dedicated and honest. The barcode scanner is so handy! It does the work for you. For example, IÔ∏è made a sandwich today and barcoded the bread, meat, and cheese along with the mayo and mustard. Hey, mustard has zero calories! Mustard on. ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Forget MyFitnessPal, this is the tracking app you want!
body: II lost the 10 ‚ÄúCOVID‚Äù pounds I had gained in 3 months with this app. It synchronizes with my fitness apps, adding exercise kcals automatically, and even tells you how many calories you should consume to lose or maintain your weight. This is by far the best food tracking app I‚Äôve used!
response: Hi there! We‚Äôre so happy you‚Äôre enjoying MyPlate and would love to give you the opportunity to explore our Gold membership! Please send us an email at¬†support@livestrong.com¬†for details.

title: Most recent update frustrating
body: Edit: I got contacted by the developer and they informed me they are bringing back the line graph so you can track your weight. Thanks!
response: Thanks for your review and feedback. We‚Äôve just released an update to the app addressing these concerns. Please update to version 5.31.0. If you still have questions or concerns, please send us an email at¬†support@livestrong.com.

title: Very Helpful
body: This app is really helpful. I like the scan function, but sometimes what comes up when you scan a barcode doesn‚Äôt match the label. Other than that, it has helped me lose weight, make better choices and make me more aware of how many calories are in common foods that I eat.
response: Hi twidle-bug! Thank you for leaving a review. We're glad you are enjoying the app and have passed your feedback on to our development team.

title: Easy to use
body: I really like this app.  I find it easy to use and love being able to see what calories I eat vs what I burn.  I have to admit I am inconsistent due to my own fault.  It‚Äôs fun the days I work out, but not so much fun the days I don‚Äôt work out or don‚Äôt take time for good meal prep.  Could you include a personal cook?  Oh and for free?   That would be awesome!!!

title: Good but could be better
body: I have been using my fitness pal for about 9 mo this and it‚Äôs been super helpful and a really good resource. I decided to switch because I wanted a cleaner interface which this app certainly has. Although the app has many good features, the lack of being able to log things larger than 100g is annoying and converting serving sizes between different units of measurements makes using the app unbearable.
response: Hi Warlightfanatic! We very much appreciate your feedback and I have passed along your comments to our product development team.  As we are always adding new content and features to the site and app, we love getting feedback as it helps guide our designs and tools moving forward.

title: MyPlate is the best!
body: Over the last couple of years, I have tried several weight loss management apps, including most recently, MyPlate. Hands down, MyPlate is the best I have used, because it is so easy to use and navigate. The app also has great visual appeal, which adds to its ease of use. I have no hesitation to giving this app 5 stars.
response: Thank you for the awesome review! :)

title: It works!
body: I have been using this app on and off for years. It works and I loose a lot of weight as long as I stick with it. Over the holidays and vacations I tend to fall off the wagon and gain back a few pounds. Then I get back on the program and loose the weight.

title: Love the app, though...
body: It would be awesome if I could create foods/meals with 0 calories. It forces me to make it 1 calorie, which isn‚Äôt accurate. If you could update it so 0 calorie items are acceptable/allowable that would be helpful!! Thanks!

title: It‚Äôs Simply Great!
body: It is the easiest way to track your food. I really appreciate the desktop website and app sync, too. The Gold level is great also depending on how deep you want to go. I‚Äôve become a believer that despite the contradictory advice out there, you track what you eat and you become healthier. It‚Äôs that simple.

title: Can‚Äôt log in food
body: I started out with the app for a couple of days and it worked perfectly. I loved tracking down the food and it was very easy. On my fourth day, I was unable to put in any new food. Whenever I typed in a food, it would show up ‚Äúno results‚Äù. Even for the simplest foods like steak, carrots, corn, chicken, and pancakes there would be no results. I make a lot of my meal decisions based on how many calories I‚Äôve already eaten and when I can‚Äôt track them, I don‚Äôt know what my limit is.
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage at our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: The app has not been working
body: I have tried to contact the developer about the app not working. It has been more than 25 hours and every time I try to open the app it reads error. I deleted and reinstalled- rebooted phone - nothing has worked
response: Hello! We are so sorry you faced this issue. We really appreciate you contacting us. We have been experiencing some technical difficulties on our servers. The team has been working hard to get it back up. Thanks so much for your patience. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: App Fails Everytime
body: I‚Äôll start off by saying, maybe it‚Äôs just me. I‚Äôve used the MyPlate website numerous times in the past and liked it a lot. But I can‚Äôt get this app to log into my existing account (from past use of the site), nor can I get it to create a new account for me. It gets to what may be the last step in the process and I hit NEXT and it throws an error. I‚Äôve tried this several times with the same result which makes me insane for expecting something different I guess. Maybe it‚Äôll be a great app for you but it‚Äôs a no-go for me.
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage at our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Continues to crash
body: I have tried to get back into using the app after using it successfully for a while until it crashed on me. It just happened again for the second time in recent weeks. All data I entered is mysteriously missing within hours of entry today. So disappointed. It takes work to track your food and when the app you are using loses all of the time and effort you put in, it can be extremely frustrating.
response: Hi P7165, our team has resolved this issue. Please email us at support@livestrong.com so we can assist you with recovering your data.

title: Needs work
body: I do enjoy this app and the design is easy to understand and allows for tracking of macros per meal and during the day (at least with the paid version). However the scanning utility is TERRIBLE! Having come from the ‚Äúother‚Äù big tracking app, they had great barcode scanning where this app thus far is garbage. Please fix this feature as it is the only negative point I can see currently with the app.

title: LiveStrong App
body: It has a lot of good features but I find that your manual food entry does not cross over from category to category. For example I eat a smoothie for any of my meals but if I enter it under breakfast, and I have a dinner, I have to re-enter it under the dinner menu. I suggest to the developers that they make it open so that whenever you enter a food you could grab it in any category.

title: Great app
body: I have been trying gain weight as well as change my diet into a more vegetarian, which has a been a little different. However, MyPlate has simplified this transition and has been very helpful. A feature I would like added is a nutrition tracker. As a vegetarian it‚Äôs important to get the vitamins and other things I need.

title: Pretty good
body: The database of foods is pretty good on this app, although I wish serving information was more detailed, especially when creating custom foods.

title: Needed for wanting to lose weight
body: I have just started my weight loss journey and this app is amazing. It is so simple to track my calories. The app has made me realize that I am over eating. I also have an Apple Watch and the app uses the data from my watch and makes my weight loss journey a lot more simple.

title: Best Food App
body: I have tried several different food logging apps, and this one it by far the best. It works great with the health app and it is so easy to log food by just searching it up or scanning the price tag. I would recommend this app 10 times out of 10 if someone asked me for a great food app. Thank you My Plate!
response: Thank YOU for the awesome review! We're so glad to hear that MyPlate is working for you :)

title: Not good for people who weigh food/accurate counting
body: I ended up deleting this app as soon as I downloaded it. It‚Äôs not ideal at all for people who weigh their food by grams. The serving size does not accommodate that and only goes to 20 or so.

title: serving size input problem
body: This program is great overal and has too many advantages over its rivals.

title: It‚Äôs messing up again
body: I can‚Äôt enter in my exercises‚Äîwhen I try to it says ‚Äúloading‚Äù and never finds them, also, when I enter in a food it says ‚Äòno results‚Äù even when it‚Äôs a good I know it‚Äôs had in it. This has been going on since yesterday and no the problem is not on my end, I checked my WiFi via my other apps and Safari, the problem is the app. I love this app and normally it‚Äôs the best weight loss tracker but I‚Äôm getting tired of these bugs every few months.
response: Hello 121540! We are so sorry you faced this issue. We have been experiencing some technical difficulties on our servers. The team has been working hard to get it back up. Thanks so much for your patience. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Love it but...
body: Some of the items that I eat comes in mixed in a container, for instance, I eat a store-made strawberry with kiwi. Not there. Also, after scanning the barcode of what I eat it does not add up with what the label says. I mean I don‚Äôt mind those issues but it does get somewhat annoying trying to find the item that I eat, also, I tried my hardest to find Honey Crisp brand apple and no luck.
response: Hi! We'd love to investigate these discrepancies. Can you please email us at support@livestrong.com with a few examples? Thanks so much!

title: YES.
body: I was honestly skeptical of getting this app, but I'm so glad I did. It helps you manage your diet for free. Most health and fitness apps make you pay but claim they're "free" ,which is so annoying, but this app is for real free and actually works!! But you need advice on how to manage your diet and watch your calories this is the perfect app to get:)
response: Hi there! Thank you for your amazing review. We're glad you have found the app so helpful.

title: Change back
body: Hey please fix the latest update. It used to show how many calories I ate each day of the week or month or previous 3 months and now it just averages it. I‚Äôve been working for months and now I can‚Äôt see my progress the way I‚Äôve been checking it. Pretty please put it back or at least add it as an option. I don‚Äôt care what my average is, I want to see the choices I made day to day. Thank you!
response: Thanks for your review and feedback. We‚Äôve just released an update to the app addressing these concerns. Please update to version 5.31.0. If you still have questions or concerns, please send us an email at¬†support@livestrong.com.

title: New Update: Lost all of my weight progress
body: Instead of a line graph with every single day of recorded weight, they replaced it with every week, and now using a bar type graph. I have been recording my weight every single day for years on this app and now it is all gone. The line graph visualized my weight loss as well as calories and macronutrients and the new graph shows nothing. Very disappointed. If the graphs return to the old way I will take this review down because this has been a LIFE-CHANGING app for me. Hope this message reaches the developers!
response: Thanks for your review and feedback. We‚Äôve just released an update to the app addressing these concerns. Please update to version 5.31.0. If you still have questions or concerns, please send us an email at¬†support@livestrong.com.

title: amazing app
body: I've been using this app for 2 months, and all the reminders it gives are super useful! I have had 2 other tracking apps and they were terrible for me, i would put off tracking my calories. Ive lost 20lbs so far, and i plan to lose more! whatever i havent lost is on meüòÇ
response: Hi Zambobino! Congratulations on your progress. We‚Äôre glad you are enjoying the MyPlate app.

title: This app works!
body: I used this app for four years during college, and it prevented me from gaining the ‚Äúfreshman 15‚Äù and I even lost weight. I got lazy and stopped using the app for a year and have gained some weight. Back on the app for a month and have lost 5 pounds with light exercise- slowly but surely. It helps me manage my daily calorie intake.

title: Deleting exercises
body: I love this app so much. Just tracking my calorie intake is making me have a more balanced diet. But I find it really annoying that I can‚Äôt delete custom exercises. I mistyped a few custom exercises and now I can‚Äôt delete them and it‚Äôs annoying because I keep clicking the wrong one and it‚Äôs just very annoying.

title: Started Out Great
body: This app worked great at first but then it stopped calculating calories. Sometimes it wouldn‚Äôt do it all and other times it would give me double or triple the calories. I reported it to tech support 2 months ago but nothing has been fixed. I miss the accuracy of this function as it has kept me on track with my eating. Everything else is great with the app. I hope they can fix this bug.

title: Tracking food is easier than I thought it would be.
body: First time using an app like this and it has gone better than I thought it would. T Cali g food and meals is easier than I thought it would be. And I like the help with how many calories I‚Äôve burned. Overall it‚Äôs all about burning more than you take in and this helps you track that. Thanks!

title: Love it!
body: I have been looking for something to help me manage and loose weight and this has been perfect. Out of all the apps i have tried, this was the easiest to navigate. I didn‚Äôt go gold but am still having a great experience! I truly have nothing bad to say. Paring this app with the Asana Rebel app has greatly improved my life!!!

title: So far very pleased
body: I started using this app a few days ago. I‚Äôm older and underweight. My doctor made it clear I need to take gaining weight very seriously. Most other apps only address losing weight, but this one allows me to track calories, protein, etc. with a goal of gaining weight. It‚Äôs easy to use. I‚Äôm thrilled!! Thanks!

title: Great app!
body: I love this app. Such a simple UI and very appealing.  I want to quickly see what my cals and macros are and this does it. I‚Äôve searched high and low for one!  It would be great if you can add a Notes section. I‚Äôm diabetic and would love to store my blood glucose reading in your app. Also it crashes sometimes when I try to make a new meal.

title: Awesome app!
body: I love love love this app! If you‚Äôre trying to gain weight or lose weight, this is your app. They do offer a paid version but the only reason I haven‚Äôt upgraded is because it doesn‚Äôt sync with my Fitbit. The stronger challenge is great, literally changed my eating habits! I started seeing results almost right away.

title: Helps me stay on track!
body: This app has been a great addition to my fitness journey and I‚Äôve recommended it to many of my friends who are looking for accountability. I had no idea I was getting way too much fat in my diet and that‚Äôs why I couldn‚Äôt drop body fat percentage. I‚Äôve dropped 3% since I started using this app!
response: Hi Ash5333! Thanks for your feedback! We‚Äôre glad you are finding success with MyPlate. We're constantly looking for new ways to improve our site and apps, and we love getting feedback as it helps guide our process moving forward. Thanks again!

title: Not working well with Apple Health
body: I track everything on this app, including water. I noticed today it wasn‚Äôt carrying my water over to Apple Health accurately. Just to be sure, I dbl ckd what I entered. Then went back, the number changed!  By at least 12 oz more. I drink aprox 110 oz/day. I checked the day before on Apple Health. It is showing 435 oz!!
response: Hi Cliodhna1! Thanks for the review. We'd like more details regarding what you are seeing. Please contact us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Everything is great, I just have a question
body: Overall I think this app is great but I do have one simple question. I have a Fitbit so my Fitbit keeps track of everything and I don‚Äôt use my Health app or anything to keep track of my steps. I was just wondering how do you connect the Fitbit app to MyPlate to have all the information. If you can‚Äôt, I understand. This is a great app.
response: Hi mbaaydjf! We're glad you are enjoying the app. Unfortunately, at this time, FitBit integration is not an available feature. Currently the MyPlate app can sync with Apple's Health app. If you have your FitBit synced to the Health app your activity can be logged that way. To sync MyPlate with your mobile device's health app, be sure to tap the button on the MyPlate app's home screen that asks you to connect with Apple Health. If you do not see the button on the home screen of the MyPlate app that asks you to sync with the Health app, please log out and back into your account. Doing this will force MyPlate to serve you with this option again.

title: Game changer!
body: Can‚Äôt believe what I was eating! This app is so awesome! You scan the barcode from food you want to buy. It shows all of the nutritional value. The app is easy to use and makes you eat the right foods. Best app ever! My stomach feels better, making the right healthy choices now because of this app! Thank you!!!!!!!

title: Good but needs another category
body: I‚Äôve been using this app for a few days now and love it. It suits my needs and works as expected. I want to make a suggestion and see this in a future update... please put a drink category! I like the water category but I‚Äôd like to see another one just for other drinks so they don‚Äôt have to be put in the breakfast, lunch, dinner or snack categories.

title: Many food items don‚Äôt exist and can‚Äôt add
body: I tried to add my dinner and didn‚Äôt recognize the barcode so I searched. Not in the system so I added it. Added all the fields and it says you can‚Äôt add items. So it seems that if you want to track what you eat this isn‚Äôt the tool you want. Tried MyFitnessPal and although the ads are annoying their database is rather complete and if something is missing you can add them.
response: Hello and apologies for the inconvenience! We have identified a bug with the green pop up button that you're using to create a custom food. The team is working on a fix for this issue right now! In the meantime, please follow the steps below to create a custom food item:

title: Really GREAT APP
body: Love this app SO much. Such a helpful tool for wellness. You have accurate knowledge each day about how healthy you are eating, moving and hydrating, and for weight loss and maintenance there is no better tracker in my opinion. I feel it has changed my life.
response: Thank you so much for the awesome review! We're so happy that you are enjoying MyPlate!

title: Great App! Just doesn‚Äôt let me create own food
body: The idea of this app is really cool and it‚Äôs super useful! I use it every day and it helped me lose almost 10 pounds. The only complaint i have is that for some reason the app will not let me create my own food and pops up an error message every single time. I think it would be useful if you guys could fix it!!!
response: Hello! We have identified a bug with the green pop up button that you're using to create a custom food. The team is working on a fix for this issue right now! In the meantime, please follow the steps below to create a custom food item:

title: Very food for tracking daily
body: I really like the ease of use. Simply entering my food items daily. I like the summary page I can see where I am with calories and water at anytime during day and adjust where needed. The workout part of the app needs more pre- loaded common exercises . I found this area to be most difficult to find correct entries.

title: So far so good!
body: I used this to replace my old calorie counter, and I love it! Super easy to use, a lot of the foods on my diet are already on here, and it‚Äôs a nice layout. Haven‚Äôt had a lot of time with it, but I do think it suits my needs perfectly and would recommend it to anyone tracking their calories, water, and weight.

title: Allergies
body: I love the app and how easy it is to use. My only suggestion would be to give us a way to put food allergies. I get my shopping list and there are several items that I can‚Äôt buy because I am allergic to them. I have a nut allergy, as well as bananas, tomato‚Äôs, mushrooms, etc.....  If there were a way to mark down allergies to exclude meals with these ingredients this app would be perfect.
response: We're glad you're loving the app, and we appreciate your feedback! We're focused on improving the user experience, and every bit of feedback helps keep us on track; thanks!

title: Doesn't Show Calories from Health Right
body: If you use Apple Watch, Livestrong My Plate doesn't show total calories used, only active calories. In my case, it might report that I need 1800 calories when in I actually need 2800 to 3000. This is a massive error.

title: Great App!
body: I started using My Plate in April and have lost 15 pounds in two months. I find it much more user-friendly than the weight watchers app I previously used. I much prefer counting calories as opposed to points. I love that I can keep track of carbs and fats so easily. I‚Äôve recommended it to several friends and everyone loves it!
response: Thanks so much for your support! We're so happy you're having success with MyPlate.

title: Great app
body: Love this app it counts your calories all you have to do is scan the barcode of the product that you eat and how much of the food you eat and it counts your calories for the day and week and so on. This app also tracks how much you work out! It a great app I highly recommend it! Thank you such a great app
response: Hi bridgezones! We appreciate your review. We're glad you've found the app user friendly.

title: Great App. easy to use
body: I have been using this app for about 3 years on and off. lost 27 lbs in one summer using this. It‚Äôs really easy to use, UI is simplest one. Lot of food database and all kinds of foods.

title: Great way to track
body: I was doing weight watchers but I didn‚Äôt like the new changes. I gave My Plate a try and really like it. It is easy to use, you can track water and exercise. I find most of the items that I am eating and it is easy. I am losing weight slowly and this gives me the tools to do that.

title: Love it
body: I had surgery and my doctor thought I was eating too much I found you app and use it religiously at the next doctors appointment I showed them your app and they told me I was not eating enough food I do good to eat 900 calories a day but I Feel like all I do is eat it even helps my diabetic doctors in monitoring my food and medicine adjustments

title: One thing I‚Äôd change
body: This app is great at scanning food using barcodes. I can easily look up non-barcoded items. The one flaw is that I can‚Äôt view breakfast, lunch, dinner and snack statistics separately. I count carbs because I‚Äôm a diabetic, and it would be very helpful to view meals separately instead of lumped all together for the day. Tracking food is a huge help with blood sugar control and weight loss.

title: Awesome! Very helpful!
body: Ever since I‚Äôve downloaded this app I‚Äôve been easily able to watch what I eat and eat a much more balanced diet and control my portions! I‚Äôve become so educated from this app, and the community is wonderful! Thanks to this app, I‚Äôm healthier and I feel better than ever about my body! 10/10 recommend!

title: This one is a lot better
body: This one is a lot better than ‚Äúmy fitness pal‚Äù. It also adds the calories from my Apple Watch, and calories seems to be more accurate and to search for the items is a lot easier not some random stuff (like ‚Äúmy fitness pal‚Äù does)
response: Hi there! Thank you for your amazing review. We're happy to hear you are enjoying MyPlate.

title: Works If You Are Serious
body: I‚Äôve been using the app since mid December. I‚Äôve lost a total of 34 pounds so far with about 16 to go. Although it can be a pain entering the info I would assume you would have to do that with any app. At 70 years old I have done what I set out to do and that is get off my blood pressure medication.
response: Way to go!!! We are thrilled that you are reaching your goals with MyPlate!

title: New user
body: I just started using this app after years of using another.  I like easy access to the recipes (when you are stuck and want something new) and the ease of logging your food (scanning works well) for the most part.  I‚Äôm still on the fence on if I will continue using this app but so far it seems quite easy to use.
response: Hi ksherman2! Thank you for taking the time to give us a review. We're constantly looking for new ways to improve our apps, and we love getting feedback as it helps guide our process moving forward. If you have any questions feel free to reach out at support@livestrong.com.

title: My life changed
body: I started using this app about 9 months ago. Since then I have lost 50 lbs. It‚Äôs not easy, but it‚Äôs simple. I merely had to reduce portions and be mindful of what I was eating. The ability to track calories consumed, calories burned, and daily weight allowed me to track and see progress easily. The weight charts were enough to keep me motivated.
response: What an awesome story! Thanks so much for sharing with us. We're glad to hear that MyPlate had a part in changing your life :)

title: Love this app
body: HOWEVER, there needs to be a way to delete foods from the ‚Äòrecents‚Äô list. You can un-track items after you‚Äôve logged them under your meals, but there‚Äôs no way to edit the entire list of recently tracked foods. Aside from that this is definitely my favorite tracking app. Super convenient and it‚Äôs quick and easy to navigate.

title: Love it!!
body: I‚Äôve been using this app religiously for about four months. Because of the app, I have been more aware of everything that I eat and drink. Everything that goes into my mouth gets recorded. I‚Äôve lost 42 pounds so far, and I know continuing to use this app will help me reach my ultimate goal.

title: Ideas to think about..........
body: This app has helped me soooooooooo much. I am so glad I found it. It pushes me to achieve my goals so much easier. I love it but, I was wondering about the serving sizes could you maybe make it to where you can type it in yourself instead of it app controlled. I would love if this was changed ‚ù§Ô∏èüíó‚ù§Ô∏èüíóüíó‚ù§Ô∏èüíó
response: Hello! Thank you for your suggestion! We've passed this idea on to our team for consideration. We are glad to hear that MyPlate has helped you!!

title: Tracking issue
body: I have been using this app on and off for a few years. I have been really motivated this last month / 2 months. I have noticed at least once a week I am getting signed out of the app and loosing all my progress/ information. My saved food, meals, used most frequently, and my step data has been lost. I am starting all over. In the past I have never had an issue but I am now. For this reason I will be trying a new app.
response: Hi lilmama41908, we're so sorry for this inconvenience. Please email us at support@livestrong.com for assistance.

title: My favorite!
body: I‚Äôve been using this app for months and feel it‚Äôs the best. I have tried other apps, just to delete them within a few hours. I had a little glitch with it at one point and was frustrated, but it got resolved. Myplate connects to my health app and Yumani scale, as well as having a great database!
response: Hello! We're so sorry for the inconvenience. Please email us at support@livestrong.com for assistance.

title: Love
body: I really love this app, easy to use and I love that you can track water intake. The only thing I wish it did was a steps goal/tracker, I know it tracks calories burned from steps but I want to know actual steps and have a daily goal on it. Otherwise I really love it I‚Äôve had this app for a couple years now.

title: Love this app
body: I wanted an app that I could track what I eat and how it is affecting my weight loss goal. The app helps me track how much I am eating and automatically adjusts calories according to my current weight. I can also enter exercise and activities. I love that it gives recipe ideas and short exercise routines.
response: Thank you for the review! We're so happy you're enjoying MyPlate.

title: Awesome app
body: I‚Äôm 16 and I‚Äôve always been kind of skinny fat where I don‚Äôt look fat in clothes but I‚Äôve got some stubborn fat all around my body. It‚Äôs only been a month and a half since I started using this app to calorie count and I‚Äôve lost over 10 pounds and my body fat percentage has gone down 4%! Great app to use.
response: Hi there! Thanks for the review. We're glad you like the app.

title: Slowly Lost 30 LBS!
body: Never have tried to lose weight before. Saw this application and decided to give it a try. It was effortless to enter items. I was amazed at how many calories were in the food I ate. I have been able to maintain my new weight for the last four months. Thank you, MyPlate!
response: Hi BigAl! Thank you for your feedback and congratulations on your achievement. We're constantly looking for new ways to improve our app, and we love getting feedback as it helps guide our process moving forward.

title: Happy
body: I am happy my daughter found your app. This is going to be a great help to me to keep track of what I am eating. Very user friendly. I love the feature where you can just use the barcode.

title: WOW WOW WOW
body: That‚Äôs the MINIMUM I can say about this app. I am an overweight diabetic. I was referred to this app by a dietician. I tried to lose weight so many times. Since I started using the app, only then have I realized why I am overweight. I was simply over eating. This app has brought my issue to the surface. I now am encouraged to do the right thing and eat properly.
response: We are so happy to hear that MyPlate has helped you! Thank you for the awesome review and best wishes!

title: Go-To Food Tracker
body: I‚Äôve been using MyPlate daily for 4 years now! It has CHANGED my life. Tracking food is easier than writing in a journal, and you can set meals and food to automatically track on a recurrent basis. This option is great for busy people. MyPlate is much better than MyFitnessPal, in my opinion.

title: Lots of Improvement In the Last Year
body: I have been using this app for quite a while. This app has made lots of improvements in the last two years and I really enjoy using it. The developers continue to refine the app and continue to make it better.

title: A great and simple way to keep track of your macro nutrients
body: I find this as a wonderful and easy way to keep track of your macro-nutrients for FREE!

title: Password issues and no help
body: I have an account, and just purchased the gold package, and I‚Äôm getting emails. However my password is not working and needs a reset. Customer Service says they can‚Äôt find me. I am having trouble finding the change I joined. I‚Äôm so frustrated with this app. I hope someone will reach out to me and let me know how I don‚Äôt have an account when you took my money and are sending me emails, and I‚Äôm logging meals etc I need to log on via PC because the online Articles are too small to read.
response: Hello! We're so sorry you've had trouble accessing your account! I believe you have an open ticket with our customer support team. Please be sure to keep working with them so we can resolve this for you.

title: Great for tracking calories
body: I‚Äôve lost weight using this app...about a pound a week which is what I was looking for. I wish there were some way to print or copy the recipes they offer though. It‚Äôs frustrating to find a great recipe but have no way to save it. Or am I missing something?

title: Good App
body: i‚Äôve lost 15 pounds tracking my calories along with the workouts. the workouts are fun an intense. the only complaint i have is i‚Äôm not longer able to listen to music on bluetooth while working out. if this doesn‚Äôt change i‚Äôll have to find another workout app. i have to have music. please please fix this!!

title: Love it, however offline support?
body: I love this app, it‚Äôs great for tracking and seeing trends. However I‚Äôm in the military and live on a ship, typically I don‚Äôt have access to WiFi or data. This means I can‚Äôt add my own items offline, I would understand if it was just for searching, but it‚Äôd be great if I could add my own items.

title: Set up for success
body: There is simply no way I would have successfully stuck to a diet without the ease of interface and the full available data of this app. I have lost 15 pounds in 2 months and I have gotten such an eye-opening education about how I used to eat vs how I should. Thank you so much!

title: Very precise and easy to use
body: I haven‚Äôt really been looking for an app like this until recently. I found this one mainly for tracking my food but the exercise feature is great! It‚Äôs nice that most of the features don‚Äôt require premium but I‚Äôm tempted to get that too. It‚Äôs awesome, very precise and easy to figure out. I love it!

title: Good, different from other
body: I have tried many diet trackers and this one has most that I need as a free app. I am looking what I can do with a Gold membership. It seems allot is good for is to remove the ads.
response: Thanks so much for this feedback! It can definitely be hard to juggle your phone and the food item, so we suggest setting the item on a table or countertop while scanning. Please email us at support@livestrong.com with any other questions or concerns!

title: I love this app!
body: This app is absolutely awesome. The best calorie counter app I have encountered. It syncs with my Apple Watch 2, so I don't need to enter my exercise. The app takes care of it. It is easy to use, very intuitive. I love this app! Of course the people who made this are not perfect because entering water is stupid, but everything else I give 100%!

title: It‚Äôs good overall
body: Overall, I found this app very helpful and good! But, unfortunately when you go to add a new food that isn‚Äôt already in their system it has you enter in all of its nutritional info, and after you hit save it reverts everything you just put in to .01, I‚Äôm not sure if it‚Äôs just user error or if it‚Äôs a kink they just haven‚Äôt worked out. Other than that one little issue I like this app a lot.
response: Hi! We have identified a bug with the green pop up button that you're using to create a custom food. The team is working on a fix for this issue right now! In the meantime, please follow the steps below to create a custom food item:

title: Loving this app!
body: This app was just what I was looking for to track what I am eating to help me eat a more balanced diet, lose weight, and be healthy. I wanted one that scans nutrition labels and this one fits the bill by scanning barcodes. I love it!!!

title: Limited exercise tracking
body: I have to turn on ‚Äútrack my activity‚Äù at random. I cannot tell which of my fitness tracking apps this one is linked to. When I use two different apps on a bike ride, the activity is doubled. I would prefer to control which apps were communicating with this one for that reason. (This maybe an issue with the setup on my phone and not the app itself)

title: Simple, effective, fabulous
body: Years ago, I used myfitnesspal.  Now that ap is ad city, and I hate it.  My plate is perfect.  Easy to use, clean format, no extra junk.  And for $0.99 you can get rid of the ad that really wasn‚Äôt a big deal to begin with.  If you want a really good calorie and macro counter, My Plate is it.  Two thumbs, way up!

title: Amazing app
body: I wanted to try out this app because nothing else was working for me, but now that I have a set calorie goal, thanks to this amazing app I know exactly what I‚Äôm eating, and what to eat more and less of. From the beginning I have loved the concept and I hope this is the one that finally works! Fingers crossed! üòÑ

title: Love this app
body: They‚Äôve come a long way!  The barcode reader isn't working for me but I hardly eat processed food that comes with bar codes anyway.
