I like that most food and exercise are "checked" for accuracy, unlike some diet tracking apps that have calorie counts supplied by users- often wildly inaccurate.

title: Like it
body: Overall I do really enjoy this app. I have noticed though that sometimes when I scan an item the information is wrong so I have to manually put everything in. So far that is the only ‚Äòcon‚Äô I have really noticed. If it could somehow be updated to put the correct information I would give this 5 stars.

title: Great App even the free version
body: Really enjoy using this app, it‚Äôs super easy to use and convenient. If your trying to build muscle, lose weight or even maintain your weight this is definitely a great help. The free version is pretty awesome but gold gets a more in depth with your whole nutrition if that‚Äôs what your looking for
response: Hi Brian! We truly appreciate your review. We're glad you have gotten so much out of the app.

title: One recommendation
body: The only recommendation I have is to an option to remove the net carb display.  I have to stick to a set caloric intake regardless of how many calories I burn.  Having a way to take away that part would be very helpful.  Other than that it‚Äôs a great app, I don‚Äôt have the premium version, but the free is still great and can do everything you need.
response: Hi there! Thanks for your review and feedback. If you have additional suggestions feel free to reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Best calorie counting app I‚Äôve used
body: I‚Äôve never had a calorie counting app that I stuck to you, but I like this one. Easy to use and connects to your Apple Watch. I subscribe to Blue Apron and most of the meal kits are not in the system. Luckily there‚Äôs a way to add them myself since Blue Apron also sends full nutrition information cards with every meal.

title: I love this app‚ÄºÔ∏èüíô
body: It‚Äôs so straight forward and rivals NOOM in that it lets me clearly know what food groups I‚Äôm eating too much of and what foods I need more of. Better than My fitness pal as that app has so much info and I often had to search foods 2 or 3 times as some list  different info. I‚Äôm
response: Hi Sanchez1971! Thank you for that amazing review. We're glad you are enjoying MyPlate.

title: Lost 35 lbs in 100 days
body: This app has made me way more mindful of the food I‚Äôm putting in my body. Using this app to stay on track with my diet and making the effort to be more active of a person has shown me incredible success! I recommend it to everyone who has seen my transformation.
response: Wow! Congratulations on your incredible success!

title: This is a MUST HAVE App For Weight Loss
body: This is a MUST HAVE App For Weight Loss. Amazing to be able to see what you are actually eating. You don‚Äôt realize until you see it in front of you how many calories, grams of sugar, fat, carbs etc you are consuming. It also has a community of App users for support which is a nice benefit.
response: Woo hoo! Thanks for the awesome review. We're so glad you're enjoying MyPlate!

title: My child can‚Äôt use
body: My child has to gain weight so I decided to download this app to help her track what she is eating and track her calories. I was very disappointed when we put in her birthdate and it said that she is not eligible to use the app. I feel like you should be able to use this at a younger age as some parents need something to help their child track calories for weight gain. I will use this if they add this feature but I suggest using a different app if you need a calorie and weight gain tracker for kids.

title: Don‚Äôt fix it if it‚Äôs not broken
body: I‚Äôve had no problems with the app until the recent update. The recently tracked doesn‚Äôt have anything that‚Äôs actually recently tracked. Also when creating and entering your own foods the app won‚Äôt accept certain names like Banana. It‚Äôs still a great app, better than any I‚Äôve used, but I hope they change things up or go back to before the update.
response: UPDATE 9/26/19: Greetings! We wanted to let you know right away that our developers have resolved this issue, and update 5.20.1 will be available in the app store within the next few hours. Thank you so much for your patience while this issue was being fixed. If you have any further questions please email us at support@livestrong.com. Thank you!(9/23/19: We're so sorry for the frustration brought on by our recent update. Our team is working hard to resolve the issue with the recently tracked list. We hope to release a fix for this soon. We'd also like to investigate the issue with custom foods that you've mentioned. If you can please send us an email at support@livestrong.com, we'd greatly appreciate it. Thank you!)

title: Grocery List
body: Love this app...it helps me make better food choices. Which comes in handy when your seated for 8hours. I only ranked 4 because I haven't gotten my shopping list for my meal prep. I received an email though telling me to throw my junk food away and the grocery list should have been received but no meal prep grocery list. Anyways really good app though
response: Hi there! Your shopping list will be sent the weekend before your meal plan begins :) Please email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions or concerns.

title: User Friendly, Versatile
body: This app could not be anymore user friendly! It is easy to navigate and has many features that can provide focus on a myriad of fitness goals. Wether eating better, tracking macros, building muscle or losing weight there is a way to utilize the app to reach the health goals!
response: Hi hillmarla! Thank you for the awesome review. We're glad you're enjoying all of the benefits of the MyPlate app.

title: Easy & Useful
body: I switched from My Fitness Pal because I was sick of the adds the multiple paywalls. This app is easy to use and more aesthetically pleasing. I‚Äôve been able to find most food items that I eat and the app makes it easy to create your own meals. Highly recommend.
response: Hi Eej! Thank you for leaving a review. We appreciate your support.

title: Disappointed in recent update
body: I‚Äôve used this app for at least 5 years. One of the features I most appreciated was the ability to see my weight loss progress via the line graph. With the most recent update, that feature has been removed (or I‚Äôm unable to navigate it correctly) and now an average weight is all that can be seen. Please bring back the line graphs!
response: Thanks for your review and feedback. We‚Äôve just released an update to the app addressing these concerns. Please update to version 5.31.0. If you still have questions or concerns, please send us an email at¬†support@livestrong.com.

title: Wrong macros calculations
body: Sorry for the misunderstanding. That‚Äôs exactly what I did. I entered it as a new food and no matter how many tries, the macros will come out wrong after I click on I ate this. The database doesn‚Äôt contain large inventory of food items like MyFitnessPal
response: Hi Chinicin! Thanks for clarifying! Can you please email us at support@livestrong.com so that we can investigate this? We apologize for the frustration and would like to resolve this for you!

title: Great
body: I was skeptical about this app, but I found that logging my daily food really helped me to stick to goals and lose weight. The app is super easy to use and there are so many options for foods. I also liked how the pie graph shows you how much proteins, carbs and fats you consume and how many you should consume.

title: Limited Keto use
body: I was told this app is great for keto diet so I paid for a year of gold membership. Found that I can not track net carbohydrates with this app. I requested a refund from Apple within hours of paying just to be told a refund is not available for this app. I‚Äôm not happy that I‚Äôve paid for an app that claims to support macros but does not give the option to track net carbohydrates. I definitely will not continue my membership after what I have already paid for.

title: App stopped connecting-Fixed
body: App stopped connecting to system starting yesterday afternoon.
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage at our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: First rate app!!
body: Use this app correctly and you WILL loose weight and feel great. I‚Äôm a 62 yr old female and this has helped me so much. No foods are prohibited, but because you see your fat/carb/protein levels you are more accountable. Walk or exercise and earn more calories for your daily intake! Just love this app, highly recommend!!

title: Lost 30 lbs
body: I‚Äôm a new me!  I knocked down with tracking exercise and food through the summer and I consistently lose one pound a week.  This app has really helped me to stay the course. This app has been super helpful.  I love the reminders.   I love checking  my progress.  I love seeing the ratios of what I am eating.  Great job.
response: Hi NotSoCookieGirl! Thank you for the amazing review. We're happy to be a part of your fitness journey.

title: Love this App!!!
body: I tried at least 6 others Apps before this one. This is by far the best one!! Well designed. Super easy to understand. A wide database with all the food I eat! By counting the calories I was finally able to lose weight by realizing how many calories I was eating!!! I am losing weight, and I love it :-)
response: Hi E27-45! Thanks for your feedback! We‚Äôre glad you are enjoying MyPlate. We're constantly looking for new ways to improve our site and apps, and we love getting feedback as it helps guide our process moving forward.

title: Good app which could be better
body: Over all I like the app, but there are two points in the UI which are very frustrating.
response: Hi bobily! Thanks for reaching out. We very much appreciate your feedback and I have passed along your comments to our product development team. In the meantime, I would suggest creating Custom Foods if you do not find what you are looking for. You can do so using the following steps: Select the meal you'd like to track the custom food to (Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner, or Snack), tap "My Food", and select "Create New Food" to create a custom food item.  Enter the specifics of the food, and tap "Done" in the upper right corner.

title: Diet buddy
body: This app helps me keep track of the things I eat. As long as I can remember i‚Äôve been told to keep a diet diary. Did I ever do that? Oh heck now no. This app makes it easy to track what I eat, nutritional value, and exercise. I can also check how much water I had to drink. Everything in one place. Thats god for me.

title: Love the app!
body: Only issue is there‚Äôs no search option for recipes, so whenever I find one I like o have to scroll through and sometimes it doesn‚Äôt appear. Even when I search to add it to my meal, it doesn‚Äôt let me see the actual recipes. Every recipe I have used has been delicious!
response: Hello and thank you for the review! We will definitely pass this feedback on to our team. We hope to add the ability to save and search for recipes in the future. Thanks again!

title: Overall good app for people who want to track their diet
body: This app is easy to use and doesn‚Äôt take much time. You don‚Äôt have to search for the calories yourself, as the app provides this information. I like the pie chart display, because it clearly displays what you‚Äôre eating.

title: Great app
body: I don‚Äôt like diets per say. What this allows you to do is make you more aware of the foods you eat everyday and what their values are in your everyday meals. It pushes you to exercise a bit more to balance out your overall caloric intake. My wife and are both losing weight eating normal foods. We both love the app.

title: Great
body: I was a myfitness pal person for a long time since I changed its way better then it I been using this since April after I had my last 6 month check up and I needed to track my food and it tracks my workouts with my Apple Watch also .. love it
response: Hi there! We‚Äôre so happy you‚Äôre enjoying MyPlate and would love to give you the opportunity to explore our Gold membership! Please send us an email at¬†support@livestrong.com¬†for details.

title: What a clean, thorough app!
body: I have used several food tracking apps over the last 6-7 years and this one is by far, hands down the cleanest, most user friendly app I‚Äôve used! It‚Äôs very intuitive and well-organized. Kudos to the designers for a fantastic product!!!!
response: Hi Rmilti! Thank you for that awesome review. We're glad to hear you are enjoying MyPlate.

title: So disappointed
body: I was so upset when the weight tracking graph changed to a bar graph and was relieved to see the developers response to complaints and their plans to restore it. Well, I just updated to the new version which was meant to address the issue and was very disappointed to see that the old line graph is not back. It is a new line graph that essentially looks and functions just like the bar graph. Its almost impossible to visualize my progress with these graphs and I just want the old one back.
response: Hi Maggie! Thank you for your review and feedback. I'm sorry to hear that you do not like the new graph. Can you tell us specifically what about the graph is difficult for you to visualize. Please reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Don‚Äôt like the new UI
body: The latest update to the user interface  is awful. It‚Äôs too hard to find progress elements. Also, when I did figure out how to get more than just the calories progress, the weight graph isn‚Äôt detailed enough to show progress of a pound or two so it is demotivating. I have been using this app for years and absolutely love it except for these new changes.
response: Thanks for your review and feedback. We‚Äôve just released an update to the app addressing these concerns. Please update to version 5.31.0. If you still have questions or concerns, please send us an email at¬†support@livestrong.com.

title: Love this
body: Love the scanning feature. Makes it so much easier to track calories correctly. I would like to make a suggestion. It would make it so much easier if the food consumed for one meal would be available to repeat at any meal. I eat left overs from dinner for breakfast sometimes and I dislike having to rewrite everything. Thanks, Linda
response: Hi les-ada! Thanks for the review. That's a great idea. We very much appreciate your feedback and I have passed along your comments to our product development team.

title: Recommended for losing weight!
body: I‚Äôm an aspiring model (wow how unique) so I‚Äôm trying to get in shape, also trying to lose weight just for myself. I set it to lose one lb a week, and I‚Äôve lost ten since starting! It does take a little while to get used to it, but I‚Äôd def worth it if you stay on track.

title: Good
body: It‚Äôs pretty good, it has most foods and you can type in the amount of calories you ate in case it doesn‚Äôt have it. You can write how many calories you burned, the reason it is 4 stars is because it doesn‚Äôt add your BMR (Basal Metabolic Rate) which is how much your body needs to function correctly, other than that, great app and I‚Äôll continue using it
response: Hi there! We're so glad you're enjoying MyPlate. To calculate your calorie goal, we use the Harris Benedict Equation, which uses your BMR. Your BMR is calculated using the information you provide during registration. Please feel free to email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions!

title: Accuracy of Calories
body: I LOVE THIS APP! my only complaint is that sometimes the calories in the app aren‚Äôt accurate to what is on the package. For example, I just scanned an item that says a serving is 140 calories. After I scanned it, the app said it was 120 calories (not that big of a difference but I‚Äôm just using this as an example lol). other than that, the app is great! :)
response: Hello! We apologize for the frustration. The discrepancies are occurring because of new mandatory dietary guidelines from the FDA, in particular changes around nutrition labels.

title: Big choice list
body: I love that this shows your total number of carbs, fat, and protein for the day. Also that it has such a huge inventory of choices because everyone is scanning things in. I also like that it sends me a Reminders to logging my food for the day‚Ä¶ Keeps me accountable in a way. Lol

title: App was very helpful üòäüëç
body: I am about 5 2‚Äù and only 70 pounds my goal was actually to gain more weight because my doctor said it was getting very unhealthy. I gained more weight through this app. (Not bad fat weight but muscle and good fat weight) I am very grateful for this app because otherwise I might have ended up in the hospital!

title: Thought of Everything!
body: I love this app! You can find just about every name brand and restaurant food on here with ease. But I have one problem...I need to print out a copy of my daily diary as ‚Äòhomework‚Äô for a fitness class I am taking. Is this possible without having to take screenshots?

title: Update
body: Still trying to find a way to make changes to my calories I'm allowed. I did purchase the Gold Edition and still cannot track my potassium and/or my phosphorus intake
response: Hi GPD13! You can adjust your calorie goals easily!

title: Love  the app
body: This app is very useful and easy to use. I love how you can just scan the meals or items you eat as you go. It tracks your calories and sets goals for yourself. It‚Äôs great for someone that has a lot in their plate and really just wants to rapidly track down their daily numbers.
response: Hi there! We appreciate you leaving a review. We're happy to hear you have easily incorporated MyPlate into your lifestyle.

title: Interesting
body: Easy to track intake and activity especially for those who eat take out, packaged meals or the same foods consistently, but more challenging for those who cool from scratch.
response: Hi there! Thank you for your review and feedback. Our team is aware of an issue with some units of measure not being displayed as a serving size option. The team is working on a fix for this issue right now. If you have any question please reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Very useful
body: I use this app to track how many calories I‚Äôve burned from walking, how many I‚Äôve consumed, what foods I ate, etc. I also love that you can put in Your water intake as well. It‚Äôs great that they have recipes and workouts that you can do whenever you please! It really is a great and useful app.

title: Calories in and calories out?
body: I just want to know if I let‚Äôs say eat 2000 do I need to log that I watched tv for 12 hours that day which burned 1500 cal. Which would leave me with a balance of 500 in the plus .. it then will say I have 1500 remaining again for the day. ??? Huh??? Do I need to go eat another 1500 to reach 2000 or will that cause weight gain.. can I get a good explanation on this.
response: Hello! We typically recommend only logging calories that you burn through deliberate exercise. MyPlate already accounts for the calories you burn through daily living when it calculates your calorie goal. For a more detailed explanation of calories in vs calories out, please send us an email at support@livestrong.com. Thanks!

title: Goodbye MyFitnessPal
body: How a fitness app like MyFitnessPal can exist on an ecosystem like iOS and not properly support apple watch is unfathomable.

title: Great app! Totally helps with weight loss!
body: I lost 30 pounds so far using this app! I was diagnosed with diabetes and this app helped me to track everything and religiously stay on my prescribed 1200 calories per day diet! Definitely a keeper!! Best app out there! I‚Äôve been using it for years but it came through for me for this!

title: Good app / One issue
body: I like this app a lot but I don‚Äôt like how difficult it is to add a new food that doesn‚Äôt come up with the search. It won‚Äôt let you add until you have the breakdown of the food content. Many times I only have the calories, and I don‚Äôt have time to look for the content info (protein, carbs, fat). It needs a quick add update.
response: Hi Dannygurl! Thanks very much for your feedback! We will definitely pass your request on to our team!

title: Good app one problem
body: It‚Äôs a great app only problem is when you click the exercise circle and u scroll through the workouts if you click one it automatically adds it to your workout cal count even if you don‚Äôt click ‚ÄúI did this‚Äù
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback and review. We are aware of the bug with adding exercise and apologize for the inconvenience! While we work on this, please follow the steps below to erase these incorrect entries:

title: Finally!
body: Super easy to follow and use. Macros done for the user. Helping me look at ALL my data not just my weight. Makes me feel more in control.

title: Great site!
body: Site tracks one‚Äôs consumption of meals and converts them to calories. It‚Äôs database is huge so difficult not to find correct food consumed. If one cannot find a correct name of food then one can create one. One can also set notifications to remind one to record day‚Äôs food consumption. I‚Äôm impressed!

title: Counts macros with ease!
body: This app has a massive list of foods to get info from and the ability to utilize bar codes on packages is super helpful too! I‚Äôve been using this app for 4 months and am very pleased! I do wish I could ‚Äúset‚Äù the macronutrient percentages, but it‚Äôs fine since it lists what they are as you go!
response: Hi HisLily! Thanks for your review! It is easy to change your nutrient goals!

title: Amazing!
body: I used this app and lost 30 pounds several years ago. Recently I noticed too much wine and eating out had lead to  weight gain. I logged back in and all my food tracking was there!  I‚Äôve tracked my food for 3 days and I‚Äôve already lost 1.5 lbs!  It stops mindless snacking and huge portions. Love this app!

title: I think this will work!
body: I‚Äôve been looking for a replacement for the USDA MyPlate app since they discontinued it. I‚Äôve only recently started using this app but I like the features, it seems to have data on most of the foods I eat, and it‚Äôs simple to use. I don‚Äôt know if you can build a meal yet, but maybe I‚Äôll figure that out as I use it more. So far so good...

title: Healthy habits
body: Most kids my age wouldn‚Äôt care for an app like this but I love it! I can track what I‚Äôm eating, how much exercise I get, and how much water I drink. I‚Äôm pretty fit for my age but this app helps develop good habits! It‚Äôs also fun to scan things and you feel guilty eating bad things so it‚Äôs helps develop good eating habits as well.

title: Latest updates SLOW IT DOWN
body: The last update fixed the ‚Äúrecently tracked‚Äù issue, but the app is still lagging. When I tap on a meal, it takes three seconds for it to open up. I use an iPhone X. It shouldn‚Äôt be that slow. In the the previous versions, the app responded instantly. I don‚Äôt see any   new features that warrant lagging responsiveness. This is basically an app containing only text and numbers, it should be a lot faster. I‚Äôm disappointed.
response: Hi there. We're so sorry for the continued frustration. Our team is working on this issue right now. We hope to have a solution for you ASAP. Please feel free to check in at support@livestrong.com with any questions.

title: Love Myplate
body: Works with the Zepp and reminds me to log food which reminds me to eat when I haven‚Äôt. Wish it had more foods but it‚Äôs not difficult to add new foods and the info is usually online. The workout tab doesn‚Äôt get used as often as it shouldn but is also a valuable resource.
response: Hi there! Thank you for providing a review. We're glad you are enjoying MyPlate.

title: Amazing app!
body: I just started using this app last week, and I can‚Äôt believe how useful is the free version!! It helped me realize I was eating too man carbs and now I  able to track my macros since I just started Keto. I highly recommend it. I am even thinking of getting the paid version.

title: Weight Loss
body: I quit smoking a little over 1 year ago, and quickly gained 40 lbs. After trying a few ‚Äúfad‚Äù diets without success, I downloaded this app and lost 20 lbs in 10 weeks. I have another 20 to go, but I feel confident the weight will come off simply by making healthier food choices. That‚Äôs why this app is great. It made me accountable to myself!!

title: Disappointed
body: I got the app for free and love it. Easy to use but a lot of work. The big thing that I don‚Äôt like was that I paid $45 to become a gold member and the only thing that changed was I had more of their work outs to choose from. I still don‚Äôt have a macros chart or anything else they said I would have. So I would recommend this but I would make sure and tell that person to save their money. If I could get a refund I would!
response: Thanks for trying MyPlate, and thanks for upgrading to Gold! We apologize if your gold membership is not reflecting on your account after upgrading. Your upgrade should have given you updated options in your Food Diary and Nutritional Facts charts, as well as additional breakdowns in the Progress tab, access to the community forum via mobile, and the ability to track additional nutrients. If you're unable to view any of these features after upgrading, please let us know at support@livestrong.com, and we'll work on restoring proper membership access.

title: Easy to Use
body: When I ended my Noom subscription, I wanted to continue logging food and tried MyFitnessPal. It‚Äôs cumbersome. Tested several others until I found MyPlate. I love this app! It‚Äôs intuitive, easy to log food and has many features I haven‚Äôt even tapped into yet. Soooo glad I found it!
response: Hi there! Thanks for the review. We're glad you like the app.

title: App not syncing
body: Trying to change my daily calorie intake I changed it in settings and pressed force sync and it‚Äôs still not working. Idk what to do ); love the app tho!!! Super great for my very restrictive cleanse (Candida cleanse) where I can‚Äôt have any sugar or over 60g‚Äôs of carbs bc they convert to sugar. Love what y‚Äôall are doing here please keep it up (:
response: Hi Selena! Please send us an email at support@livestrong.com for help with this. Thank you!

title: Been using this for a couple of years.
body: I have enjoyed tracking my food, exercise and weight with this app. They have recently changed the way they do charts and I don‚Äôt like it as much as the old style, so I‚Äôm looking at alternative apps for tracking with clearer charts. I sure wish they would have left it as it was.
response: Thanks for your review and feedback. We‚Äôve just released an update to the app addressing these concerns. Please update to version 5.31.0. If you still have questions or concerns, please send us an email at¬†support@livestrong.com.

title: This app is great
body: I love this app. It is easy to navigate and you can look up almost any food from anywhere on here. The barcode scanner is also really cool asset! On top of logging calories from food it also logs for any type of exercise as well. 10/10 recommend this app.

title: Good, needs some key improvements
body: Thanks for the quality app. At its core, really sound, but some key things detract. One, standardizing on measurements by weight (including metric always) versus volumetric measures. Second, please add ways to report inaccurate nutrition facts. I just ran into one where there‚Äôs a 20% difference between the app and what is on the food label. Three, add a way to provide this sort of feedback via the app. Thanks!
response: Hi number four! Thanks for reaching out. We very much appreciate your feedback and I have passed along your comments to our product development team. MyPlate uses a comprehensive third-party food database, which is a collection of listings from the USDA and some food manufacturers. Unfortunately, we're not able to add or remove items from this database as it is managed by Nutritionix. If the item you'd like to track is not in our database, we recommend creating a custom food entry in the app. If you have any questions/comments we're happy to assist you. You can contact us via support@livestrong.com. Many thanks!

title: App Wont Let Me Register
body: I have gone through the setup process three times now and it won‚Äôt let me create an account. I get an error message saying there is a registration /server error. Would be happy to give a better rating if I could even just try the actual app.

title: Really really helps
body: I‚Äôve had this app for a month and I‚Äôve already lost 6 pounds. It doesn‚Äôt have you stare yourself, allows you to eat a reasonable amount of calories. It syncs to my apple watch so it shows how many calories I‚Äôve burned! It‚Äôs really helped me stay motivated. Highly recommend.

title: Amazing
body: Honestly helps keep track of ur diet so well, also the community for questions and for motivation is fantastic!! The only downside is if u want all the features u need to pay but even without it, it has helped me lose weight and just be overall healthier.

title: Review
body: Love this app! Very easy to use and shows the information very clearly.

title: Love it but it‚Äôs buggy
body: I love this but it‚Äôs got a lot of bugs, it glitches a lot and doesn‚Äôt let me enter in my Dinner & also when I erase the calories I burned off my Iwatch (because I don‚Äôt want to count them) it won‚Äôt let me it will erase it but then it will reload them again .
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage at our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Can‚Äôt login
body: I‚Äôve been using this app on and off for years now and love it.  The problem is there will be random times when it won‚Äôt log me in no matter what I do.  It sits in a never ending loading state and then eventually times out. I‚Äôve forced closed the app, restarting my phone, uninstalling and reinstalling.  Nothing fixes the issue.  I‚Äôve even tried creating a new account instead of using FB to login and it still won‚Äôt work.  Would love to get this resolved so I can go back to using it!
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage at our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Nice!
body: I tried this after the other calorie tracker I was using for months got buggy. Glad I did - so far it‚Äôs a lot cleaner and easy to use. Adding food is quick, database is thorough, and the main screen shows you everything you need in an uncluttered display.

title: Disappointed, can‚Äôt trust iPhone version
body: Doesn‚Äôt give full info on my iPhone. One example: when I looked up egg on my eye iPhone the nutritional value for cholesterol count said 0. This misinformation could be dangerous if one has high cholesterol and it was some other food that is not so obviously wrong. On the computer app it had right info 186.5. That is quite a difference. On foods I‚Äôm not familiar with their specific nutritional info I can not trust this app. How unfortunate. Hope you fix this, it could be dangerous.
response: Hi LynneSB! We're aware of the issue with cholesterol tracking and we're working on a fix. We're so sorry for this inconvenience.

title: 90% there
body: Great app. Has helped me track my food intake. My only criticism is that it doesn‚Äôt do homemade mixed dishes well,such as broccoli salad, spaghetti, etc. That‚Äôs Understandable considering the different ways you can make dishes, but it‚Äôs still a stumbling block.  To get around this I add each component separately.

title: Love it
body: I have the free app so I can‚Äôt say if the buying the app is worth it. However, I love the free app. It allows me to track my food and compare how much I eat to days/months past. It even sends me reminders to up date my log. Easy to use with multiple chose of food to pick from.

title: Really works
body: I‚Äôve been using it since December. The sync with my Apple watch is brilliant, seamless tracking of my activity vs calories burned. I‚Äôve stayed on my plan and have dropped almost 20 lbs since December. I feel much better overall , will stick to it to reach my target goal.
response: Hi Lilmumbles! Thank you so much for the review. We're happy to hear you are enjoying the app.

title: Grateful
body: I‚Äôm grateful for this app.  It keeps me on track, is easy to use and has recipes and workouts you can browse through.  I have tried quite a few other apps but keep coming back to this one which is user friendly.  I‚Äôm here to stay.
response: Hi listenlynn! Thanks for leaving a review! We‚Äôre glad you are enjoying MyPlate.

user_name: what man is cool i am
title: Almost perfect
body: 1. Make an option to subtract dietary fiber automatically, or just make an option to quickly show carb and calorie consumption when its subtracted.
response: Hi! Thanks so much for your review and feedback! Weight tracking reminders are a great idea! We will pass your comments on to our team.

title: Do this
body: Do this, it really helps. I like that it syncs with my fitness pal, Apple Watch activity and more! I like that you can view your weight graph too to check out progress. Very well developed app. I also like that the developers take the time to read reviews and respond. Thank you!
response: Hello and thank you for your review! You can view your weight loss graph by tapping the Progress tab and changing the "Chart My" button to Weight. Feel free to email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions.

title: Love this App... one feature missing.
body: I love this App and had been sharing with my friends and relatives. Works great. Simple to use even for my 70 year old mom. I wish that when I create a meal - manual food , I can search the ingredients from the database. I end up downloading an app to build my food and enter the nutritional info that I want to track.
response: Hello! When creating a meal, you must search our database for the items! Please email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions.

title: Tracking made easy
body: I never imagined myself tracking calories to lose weight. It seemed like such a chore and impossible to find all the foods I eat. This app makes it so easy!! It‚Äôs also sync d with my Ihealth so all of my exercise get recorded. Losing weight has never been this easy.

title: C Naylor
body: I can‚Äôt get the login to work went through Facebook when I joined and today the app quit working and will not let me reload due to my email being on file I tried to get new password but the will not work either I love the app but today it is not working
response: Hello! We're so sorry for the inconvenience. Please email us at support@livestrong.com for assistance.

title: Using it for 2 days
body: I love this app. It‚Äôs free and very easy to use. I was paying weight watchers and it became too expensive and in the end not very useful. I prefer the calorie countdown. My goal is to lose 25lbs. I already lost 3. Whether it‚Äôs fat or water, it‚Äôs nice to see it working.  Every bit helps. Thanks!

title: Great app
body: I love that this app helps me track what I eat, but the only thing I don‚Äôt like is how it tracks your water intake. I drink out of either a 500mL water bottle or a 1L Nalgene bottle and I rarely drink water from a glass, so I really wish you could input your exact intake. At the very least, I wish they had options for 500mL and 1000mL, rather than conversions from imperial units.

title: Nice Updates!
body: I have been using this app for a few years and the biggest frustration was not being able to repeat meals.  That is now a feature!!  So, when I make a large batch of baked oatmeal for lunch for the week, I can put it on repeat for the whole week and not have to search each ingredient every day!

title: Love this app
body: I have been using this app since 2008 or maybe earlier. It has helped me to track my fitness and food. It is easy to look up foods because the inventory is really thorough. I have used weight watchers and my fitness pal as well and still prefer the no frills of this tracker.
response: Hi ZZtopheavy! Thank you for leaving a review. We appreciate your support.

title: Nutrition Info Routinely Incorrect
body: It‚Äôs fine if you plan to manually enter your nutrition info, but do not trust their nutrition database. Even when it‚Äôs occasionally right, it has a total like fat or sugar wrong. I also have a terrible time with the website version login. It never syncs with the app, even if I clear cache. It‚Äôs useable and has some great features. I‚Äôve used it to lose 54 pounds. I‚Äôll keep using it, but I do hope they fix database going forward.

title: This app is a lifesaver!!
body: I absolutely could not be successful in my keto diet without this app. It has kept me on track and I have lost nearly 100 pounds already and only have about 20 to go!!! I recommend this app for anyone who is trying to lose weight and eat healthy!!!
response: Hi there! We appreciate you leaving a review. It's exciting to hear of your amazing success. We're glad we were able to play a part in it.

title: Great motivation
body: I lost 20 pounds in 52 days with the help of this app.  It gives you weekly and monthly comparisons and if you have your phone with you, will track your calories lost when walking.  Wonderful app for helping keep me accountable for what foods and how many calories/portions I consume.
response: Hi there! Thank you for providing a review and congratulations on your amazing success. We are pleased to be a part of your fitness journey.

title: The BEST!
body: I have been using this app for almost 2+ years and I absolutely love it! It allows me to keep myself accountable with my health goals. I frequently recommend this to my friends and family. Thank you for making this app very user friendly and very reliable.
response: Hi Julie! Thank you for your amazing review. We appreciate your support.

title: Solid tracking app
body: I have used several. I am mostly interested in macro and micronutrient tracking (ie. sugar, fiber, protein, sat fat) It does this well, but a distinction between sugar and added sugar would be nice. It would also be nice to click on, say, fiber, in any given day, and see the breakdown of where it came from. Overall, though, it is great free app.
response: Hi Roccitylisa! Thank you so much for the review and feedback. I'll pass your suggestions to our product team. If you have any other suggestions, please feel free to reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Missing just one thing
body: This is by far the best calorie counter app I‚Äôve come across but the only thing that hinders me personally, I wish you guys had the ability to subtract dietary fiber from your net carbs for those on Keto diets. Once that change is made I promise I‚Äôll change to five stars!
response: Hi Qomedy! Thank you for your review and feedback. Net carb tracking is a MyPlate feature available with a Gold subscription. If you have other suggestions, don't hesitate to reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Easy to use
body: I have tried so many different apps for tracking macros and have ended up deleting most apps with in a day or two. I would get so ‚Äúover it‚Äù I just would quit looking.
response: Hi mlarson5! We appreciate your feedback and I have passed along your comments to our product development team. We are always adding new content and features to the app and your feedback helps guide our designs and tools moving forward. Thank you.

title: Unable to use app
body: I have several problems, first is that I downloaded the app sometime ago and registered but didn‚Äôt get around to trying to use it until now. So I don‚Äôt remember my password, I‚Äôve gone through the forgot password process five times and still no email and yes I checked the junk folder. Second and most frustrating is that since I can‚Äôt log in I can‚Äôt get anywhere to contact someone regarding the problem which leads me to coming here to complain
response: Hi there! We're sorry to hear you are experiencing issues logging in. Please reach out to us at support@livestrong.com and we'll take care of it right away. Thanks!

title: A wonderful app
body: Been using this app for a few years now, and I enjoy it. It does the job, and does it free of charge, which I appreciate. The only improvements I‚Äôd like to see are options to add more meals to a day (other than breakfast, lunch, dinner), and a day/time stamp when you enter info.
response: Hi JMNPC! We very much appreciate your feedback and I have passed along your comments to our product development team. As we are always adding new content and features to the app, we love getting feedback as it helps guide our designs and tools moving forward.

title: MyPlate is the best-designed calorie tracker
body: This app is beautiful and simple to use. The food database isn‚Äôt as complete as other apps, but it‚Äôs 80% of the way there. The thing is: the app is so well designed and such a pleasure to use that I don‚Äôt even care‚ÄîI‚Äôm willing to create new foods not in the database as I go.
response: Thanks a million!

title: Really loved this app
body: I really loved this app, really helped me with keeping track of my health and etc! But I decided that I don‚Äôt need to keep track of my health because god has plans for me in the future. When it‚Äôs my turn to shine it‚Äôll comeüôèüèΩ god got me. Anyways I really recommend this app!! Loved it!!

title: Amazing!!
body: I have seriously been loving this app! I upgraded to the gold membership and l love it!!! I can‚Äôt wait to get my grocery list in a few days!! The only thing I wish they would send you a grocery list when it‚Äôs requested not Sundays. I am sure it will be worth the weight!

title: Easy to use
body: I wish when you checked your exercise for the day it would list everything you did throughout the day. Other than that, it‚Äôs easy to use! Don‚Äôt know if I‚Äôm losing weight yet since I haven‚Äôt been using it long enough yet.

title: Great Food Diary
body: Very helpful and easy to use. Was able to lose 30lbs and stay on track to reach my goal. The reminders to log food are great to get back on track. Love the app, it is very helpful and an amazing tool, but ones will and determination will determine ones success.

title: We love it !!!
body: My sisters and I have been using this App for a month we all lost weight it is the best one out there. I love how it keeps track of everything. We recommend this for anyone who has tried to lose but gave up. Thank you developers for helping us.

title: Using it for months
body: I love this app.  It helps to keep me focussed on the amt of calories I consume daily and helps,with portion control.  But I‚Äôve found that the app works differently on my iPad vs the iPhone and I can‚Äôt get the company to correct the situation so,that I can sync the two devices.  So I enter the info twice every day...on my iPhone and on my and then on the iPad

title: Awesome but needs work on desktop ver
body: I‚Äôve been a loyal Gold member of this app for years.  Really helps me adjust and stick to healthier eating patterns. My only issue is slow tech response on the desktop MyPlate client.  Still unable to set customized nutrient goals!  Been months with no fix.  It works on mobile but not desktop where I need it. :)

title: 5 star app with room for more potential
body: This app is great! The barcode scan option works incredibly fast. The layout is super easy to follow and enjoyable to use.
response: Hi there! Thank you for your review and feedback. I will pass your suggestion on to our product team. If you have any other ideas, feel free to reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Good App to track Nutrition
body: The app is well designed to track food. I would appreciate if it can have the ability to edit meals and items in the meals . Definitely a  5 if it has the ability to share the daily intake nutrition records to friends .

title: Easy to use

response: Hi there! We appreciate your feedback. If you don't want to track your activity, you can disconnect MyPlate from the Health app. To do this, please do the following:

title: CHALLENGE YOUR ENVIRONMENT
body: I finally started losing my last bit of weight after using this app. I was once 315 pounds. I lost my weight on my own but not matter what I've done I could be lose my last bit of weight. I found out I wasn't wearing enough, thanks to this app. I love this application.
response: Hi Rugged and wild! Your success is amazing! We‚Äôre glad so glad we could help.

title: No way to tell them updates are needed on food items
body: This is a pretty nice free app. Gave me exactly what I needed until my protein powder increased its protein. I found out you have no way to notify on the app that the nutritional value is no longer correct. When counting macros 5g protein does make a difference. Hope to see a way to fix it soon!!

title: Amazing app!!
body: I‚Äôve had this app for almost 2 weeks, and I‚Äôve lost almost 10 lbs., just by calorie counting and portion control. I‚Äôm not very active on a day to day basis, but to see the results by just changing my eating habits? It‚Äôs amazing! I‚Äôve recommended this app to a lot of my friends already!

title: Forgot Password
body: I‚Äôm disappointed because I opened the app last night and I was logged out. Why? So, I tried to log back in and it won‚Äôt go through. Then I clicked the ‚Äúforgot password‚Äù and it won‚Äôt send me the email. I tried to sign back up again and live with loading my data from before and it said my email is is use. I can‚Äôt win. Very frustrating and I don‚Äôt know how to get ahold of anyone to help with my problem!
response: Hi there! We're so sorry for the inconvenience. Please email us at support@livestrong.com so we can assist you.

title: Really good
body: I love this app! I think it‚Äôs really helpful. I am using it to gain weight and just for fun, so I really don‚Äôt have a say for losing wight. I put it on easy because I don‚Äôt feel doing it any harder. I would recommend it to anyone who wants to use it to actually help them or just for fun.

title: Beneficial to a beginner
body: This app has everything and more I‚Äôve ever asked of it. With its ability to sync to my Apple Watch and charting of my iPhone health connection, I am so happy to use this app on a daily basis. I would recommend to anyone looking to chart their intake and fats, carbs and proteins for a daily log.

title: 10/10 üëåüèº
body: THIS IS HONESTLY THE MOST CONVENIENT HEALTH APP EVER!

title: Love this app more than #myfitnesspal
body: Great app, easy to use, and they have virtually any food you could imagine. You can also find tasty recipes, workout routines, and so much more! I know I‚Äôll be using this app throughout my whole weight loss journey. Definitely worth checking out.

title: The most accurate app to track your calories
body: Using this app allowed me to lose over 10 pounds, it‚Äôs so amazing! It‚Äôs also has some recipes that you can easily make at home. Even workouts and meals plans. I just loved it. One of the best app that I have in my phone üòÉ

title: Best app out there
body: This app is like magic! You just scan or type in the name of your food, and it pops up and automatically does all the calculations for you. I love the visual style of the app, it makes hitting my diet goals so much more enjoyable. Would give this 10 stars if I could!!

title: Downloaded for Gestational Diabetes Management
body: The app is honestly nicer, easier to manage than MyFitnessPal, but it‚Äôs harder to track certain things like carbs per meal, etc

title: It was working perfectly until ‚òπÔ∏è
body: I burned 470 this morning and then Logged back to rechecked to make sure I put my water in and my calories burned kept going down and now it's down to nothing so I did another quick workout for 5 minutes to see what will happen and it's still down‚òπÔ∏èüò°

title: Great app!
body: I really like this app, it makes it easy to track my macros for the day instead of writing them down! My only concern is there isn‚Äôt an option to change my macro goals, I eat low carb, so I‚Äôd like the option to edit. Is there a way for me to edit this field?
response: Hi Sqqui! Thanks for your review and feedback! Tap on the person icon located in the upper left corner of the app's home screen. Then, tap your profile picture. On the next page, under "Nutritional Goals", tap "Calorie and Macronutrient Goals". Tap any of the macro goals to adjust! Feel free to email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions.

title: Easy to use, not very accurate
body: Even though this app is easy to use, about 98% of the nutritional information is off, at least all that I have put in. I would also like to see it give you a time frame for your goal too. I have two different weight loss apps on my phone, one for myself and one for my son, who cannot do it on his own. If I could have the same app for us both, I would use the other.
response: Thanks for giving MyPlate a try! Sorry to hear about the inaccuracies in nutritional information with tracked foods. We're addressing some issues with inaccuracy and certain macro/micronutrients tracking incorrectly in the next update, and encourage you to give it a try once the update is live. Creating custom foods and meals can serve as a work-around for inaccuracies from searched or scanned foods, since you're able to manually input your nutrient values. If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to contact us at support@livestrong.com as well! Thanks again for trying out the app!

title: junk food ads while you're trying to lose weight!
body: this app is presumably for people who are trying to lose weight and you see ads at the bottom for junk food! adding foods that don't have barcodes is also difficult and  Time consuming. not sure the calories are accurate for some of the foods I suspect they are user-supplied
response: Thanks for installing MyPlate! Sorry to hear about the difficulty regarding adding foods and meals to track. The following instructions can possibly alleviate some frustration and reduce time spent by creating custom foods and meals to track:

title: Very easy to use.
body: I‚Äôve browsed and checked out many of these types of apps. This is by far the best. It‚Äôs easy to use. I eat a lot of the same foods each day, and for me, it‚Äôs so easy to make duplicate entries. Very logically set up. Very easy to locate foods in the database. Definitely a 5-star app.  Thank you.

title: I love this app
body: This is a very good app it doesn‚Äôt matter if your already skinny trying to lose the last little bit of fat or if you are obese and are trying to get in shape. The only thing I would ask for the developers to do is add a feature where it tells you what time you ate/ logged your calories.
response: Thanks for your review and feedback!

title: Basic calorie counting app
body: Good for beginners learning to record food log; however not advanced enough for macronutrient counting. You can‚Äôt specify exact macros by gram, only by percentage. Also you can‚Äôt log food by as precisely as MFP does. My plate logs by serving size-2 1/2 pancakes-but you really need to know how many ounces or grams of batter goes into 2.5 cupcakes to be exact. Room for improvement but basic functions are present.

title: Frustrated after one day
body: I felt like everything I tried to track was incorrect. I would be looking at the nutrition facts on the label and the app is telling me all different numbers. Also when you search something basic to track it brings up such random items! I was trying to track a plum (like a real plum, a piece of fruit, actually food) and I had to scroll through multiple plum flavored drinks and snacks before I could find it. It should be the other way around.
response: Hello! We apologize for the frustration. MyPlate uses a third party food database called Nutritionix. As food manufacturers continue to update the nutritional labels on their products to meet new FDA-required guidelines, Nutritionix is working hard to make the changes on their end as well.

title: Watch out for automatic Renewal!
body: Once you purchase the full App there is no way to get out! Deleting the App does not stop your renewal. There is no easy way in the App to Cancel. Once the Parent Company LiveStrong has your account number they never ask your permission or alert you that they are taking another $30 a year later. What kind of unscrupulous Buisness does that. No phone number to call, no ‚ÄúCancel Anytime‚Äù option within the App. Oh ya but they sure make it easy to buy their products in the App.
response: Hi Mike! We're so sorry for any confusion. You are alerted to the auto-renewal of the subscription during checkout. To cancel, please do the following:

title: Really Great, but could improve 1 feature
body: In myfitnesspal, I was able to track the amount I ate at the 1/8 of a fraction scale. This app only lets me track in 1/4 of my food and sometimes that‚Äôs not quite realistic when I‚Äôm trying to be as accurate as possible.

title: Keeps me in check!
body: I love this app, because it makes record keeping a breeze. It is very efficient. I actually WANT to track my food intake, exercises, and water. If only I could register pics of the food I cooked, from the suggested grocery list from LIVESTRONG; that would complete me.

title: 400 days straight
body: Today is my 400th day straight in using this app to track my food and fitness. For me, it has been the most consistent app to cover such a variety of food options and restaurants. Following my caloric intake Helped me to drop almost 50 pounds this past year!
response: Hi Running Preacher- CONGRATULATIONS! This is a huge and exciting accomplishment! We would love to hear more about your story. If you'd like to share, please email us at support@livestrong.com and just be sure to note that you wrote to us in the app store first :)

title: Love this app but would love more integration
body: I love MyPlate!  It has some of the best tracking tools and interface.  The food library is extensive and it is easy to add your own food, not just the brands and restaurants that they include.

title: My plate
body: I absolutely love this it easy to get around also when looking for food product type it in and list come up. Excellent job on the app looks like the developers took the time to make it a great app. I have told my friends to downloaded and use it. Kudos

title: Resets my Macros goals every time the app updates!
body: Every time this app updates my macros ratios get reset to the app defaults. This is so annoying! I‚Äôll log in one day and my ratios are completely wrong and I didn‚Äôt even know until I realized late in the day. You are messing with people‚Äôs diets. Until this is fixed this is a completely useless app compared to MyFitnessPal. Please correct this issue.

title: When you want to lost weight this is a real everyday app from peanut butter to eggs
body: What I love about this app is that I wanted an app to help me loss weight with right foods I‚Äôve heard of, don‚Äôt take 3 hours to prepare on my schedule and the options are amazing!!! Finally a real down to earth app!!! Thank you, amazing!!!

title: Close to perfect
body: I do love this app and I think even the free version is giving me almost exactly what I need. My only complaint is that it doesn‚Äôt like to my Fitbit and I can‚Äôt manually enter my steps. Maybe that‚Äôs just the iOS version not sure but it‚Äôs going off my apple steps which aren‚Äôt even close to accurate.

title: Perfect for counting calories!
body: I have been using this app and love it!...
response: Hi Klra22! Thank you for your review. Congratulations on your progress. We're glad MyPlate is able to be a part of your healthy lifestyle.

title: Love this app
body: This app is easy to use and it gives you nice descriptions on how much calories you are eating and the different types of calories. It tracks mine well and also how much water you drink and exercise you burn. Recommend it! It also has recipes!
response: Hi Mariyah1923! Thank you for that awesome review. We're glad you like the app.

title: Needs better water tracker
body: I enjoy this app. But really dislike the water tracker, it needs work. I drink anywhere from 30, 14, 20 ,10 oz cups of water and it doesn‚Äôt let me add that in directly.  My only option is to click the options given or just drag the amount that I can‚Äôt control on my own. Would rather just insert the amount I drink throughout the day.
response: Hi AACQjn! Thanks for reaching out. We very much appreciate your feedback and I have passed along your comments to our product development team. As we are always adding new content and features to the site and app, we love getting feedback as it helps guide our designs and tools moving forward.  In the meantime, the app allows you to add water in 1, 8, 12, and 24 oz increments. These increments can be summed to equal the quantities you would like.

title: Lack of Flexibility
body: Response from the developer was that I can create my own workouts including calorie burns for the workouts.  If I had this information, if I knew all of the calorie burns for my various exercises, what would I need this or any other nutrition / fitness app for?
response: Hi ds715. You can enter custom workouts easily! Tap "Exercise" from the Track tab. Select ‚ÄúCustom Exercises‚Äù, and tap the ‚Äú+‚Äù symbol. Then, give your exercise a name and enter hourly calorie burn rate.

title: mistakes
body: this app seemed great! until i wasn‚Äôt able to log any types of food unless they had a barcode, especially in the lunch and dinner department. I was able to log breakfast, snacks, and water but lunch and dinner never would log anything unless I had a barcode on it. seems like it has potential to be great but there‚Äôs just too many issues at this point :(
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage at our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Great App!!!
body: This app has all the features and benefits I need.  I love how it tracks all my steps when I have my iPhone with me.  Thank you to the developers.  I also love how it tracks carbs, protein and so forth this coincides with my complete health plan I am doing with my company‚Äôs biometrics plan.  Thanks againüòÄ
response: Thank YOU for such a great review! We're so glad to hear you're enjoying MyPlate!

title: Very helpful!
body: Absolutely love using this app to help track my diet; definitely recommend to people who want to change their lifestyle and bad eating habits. The more you see and write what you eat, the less you consume those bad foods and start eating for what YOUR body needs.

title: Nothing better!!
body: I‚Äôve looked at multiple apps to help me loose weight but none have been so easy to use as this one. So easy to log in food and see progress. I can‚Äôt think of anything I would change about the app... seriously!!

title: Life Giving!
body: The best tracking layout and community support.  Meal and workout suggestions are on point.  Highly recommend! This is the only tool that is actually working for me. I only wish it had a vitamin button and fasting alerts.  Thank You!

title: Efficient
body: I really enjoyed using this app because it was extremely easy to control the amount of calories that I consumed and the barcode option made it a lot easier to find the food items

title: Missing Paleo or Keto type diet
body: This app is good but it is not complete. The only diet type it has is Vegetarian, Vegan, Gluten free and Omnivore. It is missing Keto and Paleo diet. Also not sure why in all it‚Äôs diet programs it has the highest carbohydrates which is one thing that should be less in dieting if you want to lose weight and follow a healthy diet. If they fix these issues it would be the best since it provides free exercise programs.

title: Good but can improve
body: I like mostly everything about the app. They need to improve the database of health foods and there should be a whole separate category for supplements. It is synced with apple health and other fitness apps seamlessly. If you are forced to make a new food entry it would be nice to take a picture of the nutritional facts to auto populate the metrics.
response: Thanks so much for your review and feedback!  As we are always adding new content and features to the app, we love getting feedback as it helps guide our designs and tools moving forward.

title: Awful or out of date
body: The app is either out of date or awful.  Close to half of the products I look up have the wrong nutrition information.  This is as often true of the verified entries as the user submitted ones.  I have resorted to entering the information in the ‚ÄúMy Food‚Äù section.  A time taking enterprise.
response: Hello! MyPlate uses a third party food database called Nutritionix. The discrepancies are occurring because of new mandatory dietary guidelines from the FDA, in particular changes around nutrition labels.

title: My Plate
body: The reason I gave this app the rating I did is because time after time I cannot find my food so when I go to enter my food and after I fill out all the details and select ‚Äúsave‚Äù time again I get the stupid dialogue that says ‚Äúcan‚Äôt save at this time, try later‚Äù. After this happens 4 or 5 times you lose interest in this app and wasting your time.
response: Hi Kipp125! Thank you for your feedback! We have identified a bug with the green pop up button that you're using to create a custom food. The team is working on a fix for this issue right now! In the meantime, please follow the steps below to create a custom food item:

title: Really wanted to use this app
body: Tired of the auto transfer to ads on my other App so looking for annew one. Installed. Really like the interface but it wont sync with my garmin without a subscription. My other app is free and syncs. Im willing to buy an app like this outright but i‚Äôm not subscribing to something continuously. Pretty disappointed by that. Deleted and went back to my old app. I‚Äôll keep looking.
response: Hi No.1smrtaas. We're so sorry for any confusion! The MyPlate app will sync with the Apple Health and read any data you have synced to that app from your fitness trackers. This is a free function for all users. Please email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions.

title: Awful start! Not an app for a healthy lifestyle...
body: If you already have a healthy lifestyle and diet this is NOT the app for you. To even start you have to choose if you want to gain or lose weight.... well that means this app only applies to people who fall into those categories. I already like my diet, weight, body, exercise, just want to track the things I put in my body to make sure I‚Äôm staying nutritionally balanced. Why do we have to base all our consumption on discontentment? Very disappointed livestrong.
response: Hi Elizabeth! The option to maintain your weight is available! To change your goals, please tap the person icon in the upper left corner of the app's home screen. Tap your profile picture. From this screen, you can change your Weekly Target. The option to maintain will be located at the very top of the list. Please feel free to email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions!

title: Using this is my main tracking tool to look 100lbs
body: So far all the features are on point!  Especially the community tab- connecting you with people in the same boat or who are further along who can help support you.

title: Good app but...
body: It‚Äôs a good app. Well thought out and seems pretty safe. Everything seems pretty solid, but I keep getting these scary pop up ads. I don‚Äôt really know what this tells about their company, but honestly don‚Äôt want to get in any sort of issue. Any body else experiencing this? Hope they can fix it because it‚Äôs getting a little worry some. Any way... I guess it‚Äôs a good app.

title: Wow!!!
body: This app is special because when you or your family or your friends is trying to loose fat. You can show this to them. It is a VERY VERY helpful way to loose fat. Keep track of height and what you eat. It mainly helps with what you eat and how you feed yourself. IF I WERE YOU I WOULD GET THIS ,AND AT LEAST TRY IT!!!

title: Helped me lose 60lbs.
body: No app or trainer or fad diet will ever make you drop weight without any effort, but this app makes it so much easier. Counting calories, counting the calories I lose from exercising, automatically counting steps and how many calories you lose from that, I love this app.

title: MyPlate
body: I‚Äôve tried a few calorie tracking apps and this one works really well. I haven‚Äôt seen any need for the premium version for my uses. If you‚Äôre more socially oriented or sports oriented you may want to invest in the paid version. All I‚Äôm trying to do is manage my intake.

title: Dennis
body: I am trying to maintain.  I am supposed to have 2100 calories to maintain.  Each day, because of workouts, the required calorie intake count is increased to around 3100 calories but the Fat, Carb and protein count remains the same.   Fat - 70g should now be 16% of 3100 instead.  Would make life (counting calories) easier.
response: Hi there! Thank you for your review and feedback. I have passed your comments to our product team. If you have additional feedback you would like to provide, feel free to reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Great app
body: I really like the app but sometimes I can‚Äôt find the food I‚Äôm looking for and some foods you only have  for measurement choices of just cups and the food says you can measure in other units.  Sometimes the listed calories in your app are different from what the can says and I don‚Äôt know how to report the error.
response: Hi Antho76783! We're glad to hear you're enjoying MyPlate. Our developers are aware of the measurement issue and are addressing it. The label discrepancies are occurring because of new mandatory dietary guidelines from the FDA, in particular changes around nutrition labels.

title: Great app to track diet
body: I use to track calories and macronutrients. Works well for this purpose. Appears to be an error when tracking cholesterol. Individual meals are stated in mg although the seem to be measured in grams. Factor of one thousand off, so percentage of target usually reads 0%. When you look at progress bar graph this is corrected and unit reflects mg.

title: Survive / Thrive
body: I used this app in 2009 and lost 74 lbs in 7 months. I‚Äôm back after a couple of NHL relapses more chemo and a Stem Cell Transplant in 2015. Well, I‚Äôm still here cans do much but I would like to lose 15lbs maybe 20 in 90 days and eat better. The app is still so #EasyToUse and has everything I need. Thank you

title: Great app
body: This app is very useful when tracking daily calories. Can‚Äôt wait to reach weight goal! It even comes with exercises and workouts tells you how many calories you burn. you can add workout to your diary very great app will continue to use.

title: Love the update
body: My husband and I are using apps to develop healthier eating habits and to lose a little weight. The recent update made me want to write a 5 star review. Love that you listened to everyone‚Äôs suggestions. Shopping lists and menu support is always appreciated. Thanks for a fantastic tool.

title: Keeps Me In Check
body: I love this app! It sends my reminders in case I forget to log a meal, tells me the calories of items I scan, tells me how much protein, fats and carbs I‚Äôve had, and gives great recipes based on my diet as well as the amount of calories I have left for the day.
response: Hi honeyblub! Thanks for your feedback! We‚Äôre glad you are enjoying MyPlate. We're constantly looking for new ways to improve our site and apps, and we love getting feedback as it helps guide our process moving forward.

title: So Useful And Easy
body: This is a great app to track your nutritious eating goals. The photo barcode feature is wonderful and accurate to use. This helps immensely when linking to the exact foods you are eating.
response: Hi 5tampede! Thanks for your feedback! We‚Äôre glad you are enjoying MyPlate. We're constantly looking for new ways to improve our site and apps, and we love getting feedback as it helps guide our process moving forward.

title: Please Read
body: This app functions well. It works well for whatever it may be used for. But PLEASE be careful. Apps like these can be used to promote Eating Disorders or like behaviors. Make sure to be consuming a healthy amount of calories and staying safe, and make the healthy choice :)

title: Just one problem
body: For some reason I can‚Äôt seem to fix an automatic repeat of calories already entered in my breakfast calories of one specific food every morning. No matter how or what I try to do to eliminate the auto entry it‚Äôs there every morning!

title: The best tracker out there!!
body: I‚Äôve been using the app for a few years now. I love it. However the last update for the food entries have seem to slow it down a bit. But I still wouldn‚Äôt use any other meal tracker. Just be careful with the upgrades that you make as not to alter it in a negative direction.
response: Thanks for your review and feedback Rob! We're SO happy that you're enjoying the MyPlate app!

title: Had Basic Version But Billed For Premium
body: I never purchased the premium version yet somehow I‚Äôm getting billed for this. Even weirder is that it wasn‚Äôt in my subscription list before this month. I just dowloaded this as a simple macro counter, nothing extra. Is there any way I can get a refund?
response: Hello! It sounds like you may have accidentally upgraded. We'd be glad to help you with this, please email our team at support@livestrong.com. Thanks!

title: Best App After Long Search
body: I worked my way through so many food tracking programs, but this app has finally been the answer. Inputting food and syncing up activity from phone and Apple Watch has been really easy.

title: Teacup5560
body: This app is awesome it have the support I need ,it keep track of all my food intake it remind you when it‚Äôs time to track your meals ,it keep track of your weight and exercise,it have everything you need to be successful, Thank you for an awesome app

title: Good, when it works
body: Works fine on my laptop, but the mobile version won‚Äôt open at all on my iPad or iPhone. I guess I should get a new phone? Wait, the iPad is brand new. No updates needed - in fact, it stopped working with the last update. I need it to sync (there were bugs in this area, I‚Äôm a long term user and I need it to work. Very sad to be finally switching to another app, but in the end, I need it to be mobile.
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage at our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: The constant reminders haven‚Äôt deterred me yet
body: The reminders that pop up almost every 20 mins surprisingly haven‚Äôt allowed me to throw my phone in the garage. It‚Äôs a good app and it allows you to plan ahead and write for future days. I like that! So all in all, it‚Äôs not terrible.

title: Great start, but needs improvements
body: I like this app so far, but I wish it had some more features like:
response: Glad to hear you're enjoying the app, thanks for the review! We're constantly looking for suggestions and feedback from our users to help us move forward on the right track, any and every word helps! Additionally, you can export and print your data on the website version of MyPlate: www.livestrong.com/myplate . If you log in and scroll down the tracker, the export widget should be located on the lower right side of the page. Thanks again for taking the time to review and recommend!

title: My plate
body: Easy entry and edit features. Adds consumed calories. Tracks progress.
response: Hi there! Thank you for that amazing review! We're glad to hear you are enjoying MyPlate.

title: Latest Update: Very Disappointing (Wt. Graphs Gone!)
body: Removal of weight progress chart is a show stopper.  Been using this app for years but this recent updates ‚Äúdumbing down‚Äù may force me to look for another replacement app.
response: Thanks for your review and feedback. We‚Äôve just released an update to the app addressing these concerns. Please update to version 5.31.0. If you still have questions or concerns, please send us an email at¬†support@livestrong.com.

title: Very impressed
body: The free version provides so much detailed info. It allows you to search brands and restaurant menu item‚Äôs calorie content which is so helpful.  This app helps you become aware of what you are actually taking in and hold yourself accountable!
response: Hi Earl! Thanks for your feedback! We‚Äôre glad you are enjoying MyPlate. We're constantly looking for new ways to improve our site and apps, and we love getting feedback as it helps guide our process moving forward.

title: Great app
body: I love how easy it is to use and how you can sync your workouts with this app as well I use 3 different workout apps and the calories I burn sync into this one. If only they included more brands and more authentic Mexican food would be great other than that it‚Äôs amazing!

title: Life Changer
body: I wasn‚Äôt seeing the results of my workout and now I know why. I was consuming waaay too many carbs. Had a 1200 daily calorie goal but I was also consuming way over that without realizing it. Thanks to this app I can now keep my macros in check

title: Losing weight made easy
body: I enjoy the easy to use meal plans.  I don‚Äôt have to think about what I‚Äôm eating or count calories cuz it‚Äôs done for me.  A grocery list is even included!   I‚Äôve used other weight loss apps before but this one makes it the simplest.

title: Having to keep logging in
body: For the past 2 weeks the app keeps kicking me out to where I have to log in again. It‚Äôs very frustrating because I lose my data and have to input my information in again. AND, I lose my custom exercises. It‚Äôs been doing this ever since the last update. Please fix the issue since the last update because whatever you did caused another issue.
response: Hello! We're so sorry for the inconvenience. Please email us at support@livestrong.com for assistance.

title: Glitchy
body: The app was great for the first few days, then it totally crashed. It stopped loading my meal plan and workouts. I couldn‚Äôt log my meals either. My WiFi is usually great. I tried reloading everything and even deleted the app and made a new account. Nothing worked. I tried to find somewhere where you could contact the people but was unable to. Would recommend if it actually worked
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage on our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Love everything about this app!
body: From logging exercise to water intake to food... this is everything I need. I really think twice about my food options after noting how many calories some things have that I THOUGHT were healthy.

title: I want to love this app but..
body: It has a lot of bugs in it. Recipes don‚Äôt load. It doesn‚Äôt let you create recipes with ease. This planner is almost perfect. I want to be able to enter receipes, count calories, and make a grocery list... the shopping list it the thing that is missing from all the apps that excel at calorie counting. It would also be great if I could import recipes.

title: Having Problems
body: It was working really great just a few minutes ago and now it is all of a sudden not letting me change the serving size. It will just say serving and I‚Äôm not sure why. It was showing it before, around 10 minutes ago. I can‚Äôt put the right amount of calories since it isn‚Äôt working properly anymore.
response: Thanks for tracking with MyPlate, and thanks for the review! We're sorry to hear of an error preventing you from editing serving size. At your convenience, we encourage you to contact us at support@livestrong.com regarding this matter, and we'll work on resolving this error for you. Thanks again for the comments, and thanks for using MyPlate!

title: My Favorite
body: I have tried all the food logging apps and used to a Lose It! premium member. I like My Plate now the best of all of them. Food logging is subtle and My Plate is really helping me stay on track. If you want to lose weight you have to log. It‚Äôs is the way.
response: Hi there! We appreciate you leaving a review. We're glad MyPlate is working well for you.

title: Fantastic App!
body: This helps me be more conscious of what I am eating and staying under the calorie count for the day.  Has delicious recipes to try.  My husband and children love the recipes I‚Äôve been using too.  I‚Äôve already lost 8 lbs and it‚Äôs only been a few weeks!

title: Great App For Beginners
