body: Very Easy To Log Calories && Even Includes Food Options That Others Have Logged With The Correct Calories Or You Can Add Your Own. Let‚Äôs You Track Your Water Intake & Every Meal. EVEN YOUR EXERCISE !! SUPER EASY To See How Many Calories You‚Äôve Burned , Eaten & Have Left. Holds You Accountable . I Credit It For My Weight Loss .

title: helpful but..
body: this app does help set a healthy diet, as well as track your caloric and water intake. however, you can only select one set portion versus half, or double portions. If you‚Äôre like me where you don‚Äôt usually finish a full portion, having a way to set an amount of a certain portion would be helpful.

title: Search function lacks a bit
body: Like the tracker but the search function is somewhat aggravating. Search for a specific and it won't be at the top of the list ... it's well on down the list.  And if you were going to adjust this, consider a search near me....

title: Good but could be great
body: I‚Äôve switched back and forth between MyPlate and MyFitnessPal. I like the layout and options better on MyPlate BUT more serving size options for foods AND especially if I could do 1/8 etc of a serving rather than 1/4s - those tweaks would make it 4 stars. Being able to sync to my Garmin account without having to pay would make it 5 stars.

title: Log in issues
body: Just got the app, decided to upgrade after setting up my account but now can not get into my account. I‚Äôve tried having my password reset but haven‚Äôt received the email even though it‚Äôs been sent several times. The app recognizes my email as in use if I try to set up another account so my email has to be correct. Pretty much just paid for nothing. Was really looking forward to using this but am simply frustrated now.
response: Hi there. Please email us at support@livestrong.com so we can reset your password for you.

title: Tracking Steps
body: This app would be so much better if it was able to sync with FitBit. I‚Äôm not allowed to carry my iPhone on me at work, so I wouldn‚Äôt be able to track my activity that way, and when I am at work is when I do the majority of my walking for the day. I would like to get credit for the amount of steps I take each day.

title: Frustrated!!
body: I have used this app for just over a week. Twice in the past 4 days, it has lost data. It logs me out and suddenly a meal or two have disappeared from the log. Or it will lose one part of a meal. It will not stay connected to the health app on my iPhone, so it does not keep track of calories burned. I lost 5 pounds over the first few days, so I know it helps, I just wish it would work consistently.
response: Hello, we're so sorry for this! Please email us at support@livestrong.com for assistance.

title: Fantastic App
body: I love this app. You can search a database of foods or add your own. You can make custom meals for faster additions later.
response: Hi Sia! There is not yet a way to enter your food allergies for the meal plans, but we hope to include this feature in a future update.

title: Excellent
body: My first day, so I may just go back and give it a 5 star rating. Easier to use than most apps. Just use the search app for food you eat. Then, in one click, add it to your daily intake . Very easy to edit and track progress I‚Äôm not a tech person so if I can do this you can as well.

title: Way better than the other meal tracking apps I‚Äôve used
body: I really like how it just works and doesn‚Äôt charge you the majority of your food intake. The health app integration is nice and I like the encouraging reminders. Overall would recommend.

title: Worth it
body: Highly recommend this app for anyone trying to lose weight!! I‚Äôve never been able to keep a ‚Äúdiet‚Äù but this helped me track my calories and lose 22 pounds!! After 5 months! So be patient and log daily!!

title: Amazing app
body: This app has helped me so much with my fitness goals. It‚Äôs easy to use and navigate while also providing detailed information about the food you track. This app can be used for weight loss, bulking, or cutting, it can do it all!
response: Hi monte.carlos! Thank you so much for your review. We're happy to be a part of your fitness journey.

title: Great app, very useful!
body: This app is great! I'm on a weight loss journey, have lost 30 pounds since may, and have been struggling with that last 15 pounds. It's super helpful to see how many calories I'm taking in, I've found a lot of things have more than I was aware!

title: Very easy to use!
body: I am so far please with it! I‚Äôve only used it for 4 days but it makes it super easy to log everything. The only thing I wish it would do is track my steps by just having my phone in my pocket.

title: Needs work
body: I would love to see more accurate proteins and fresh veggies listed. I wanted to put in grilled organic chicken tenders without breading and it doesn‚Äôt exist. I also find that you don‚Äôt have a saved section for meals. Only repeat meals on certain days. I don‚Äôt know which day I‚Äôm eating the same thing again.

title: Great tracker!
body: I love this app and you can literally put in everything you‚Äôve eaten thru out the day. I would give it 5 stars if they had a Fasting option so that when you click on that option it won‚Äôt send me notifications that i missed my breakfast, lunch and dinner. Just a thought.
response: Thanks for the feedback! This is definitely something to consider. We'll pass this along to our team!

title: Great for meal tracking and easy to use
body: This app is excellent. I‚Äôm using it to help track what might be spiking my glucose and it‚Äôs good for that but it would be nice to be able to add meal times and glucose readings before/after meals instead of tracking them in another app.
response: Hi JuliAckerman! At this time glucose tracking is not available in the app but is available on LIVESTRONG. https://www.livestrong.com/myplate/dashboard/  Select "Settings" from the menu and then click "MyPlate Settings" in the upper right.  Under "Track Glucose and Insulin" make sure that "Yes" is selected. Enter the information requested and this tracking tool will be added to your MyPlate dashboard.

title: Measurements
body: I love the user interface, but find that the products available don‚Äôt have measurements to match up with the food. For example, green beans had an option for fluid oz, but not grams. Solid foods should always have grams or ounces option for their measurements because that is how most food scales offer units.
response: Hi toastmaster2000! Thanks for your review and feedback. Our team is aware of an issue with grams and other measurement units not being displayed as a serving size option. The team is working on a fix for this issue. If we can assist you with anything else, don't hesitate to reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Great! But hate the paid option
body: Love the app and it has been great for me, but I would like if they just had like an app that you could buy instead of a monthly fee because that‚Äôs a lot of money for a calorie tracking app.  But it‚Äôs great!

title: My plate
body: Great app. Easy to use and great way to track meals and exercise. My weight has been pretty steady since I have been using it. One thing I have noticed is that if I scan something the calories are usually less than what is on the package.

title: True to Myself!
body: This App lets me be truthful to myself on what I eat & portion size.  Working out is great, but diet is the foundation to health, wellness and for me, a happy state of mind.  I still have to input the information, but the way the App provides simple feedback allows me to maintain my lifestyle.  Thank you!

title: Recent update
body: I love the app but the recent update has made it so I have to do a search for my coffee that I have EVERY morning. It is more difficult to find recent items because you have to search for everything.

title: This app is so amazing
body: I love this app because it helps you keep track of your weight and what you eat as well as many other things . You also get a lot of support from other people that are losing weight too. I love it so much

title: Serves the purpose I need it for
body: I use this for calorie tracking and maintaining my macro nutrients appropriately. It works great for these two things. I appreciate that I can set my macro percentages at what I'm shooting for and not just the recommended based on my weight, weight loss goals, etc.

title: Good but has some ui issues
body: Navigation is a bit wonky, a lot of back and forth. I also can‚Äôt figure out how to delete or edit an exercise I put down; it just shows recent. (Update: you can delete and edit but not through the blue circle area like you do with food, why thooo??)
response: Hi kimmipanda95! You can delete a custom exercise once it's been added to your tracker.  To edit or delete a tracked exercise, please scroll down the main page of the app, tap on the exercise you've mistakenly entered. The option to edit or delete that tracked item will appear. If you need to do this for another day, just tap on the calendar first and choose the day that needs to be altered, then follow the same directions.

title: Bug?
body: I would love to give it a 5 Star, but after just having this app for 2 days, I can‚Äôt seem to search for food anymore. The food search shows nothing. Let‚Äôs say I type In ‚Äúchicken‚Äù, it would only show recent things I've eaten, but no new option. Can this please be addressed?
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage at our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: A little disappointing....
body: I have been using the free version of this app less than a week. The first few days were great, then suddenly it stopped connecting to the server. I emailed support and received a prompt response ‚Äúthey knew and were working on it‚Äù. Today is day two and still having the same issue. I would like to continue using this app, but may start looking for different one.
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage at our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Mr.
body: Works great on food. Exercise is good, except under frequent and recent I can‚Äôt get rid of exercises, like walking, and other actual frequent types don‚Äôt show up. What‚Äôs with that? I circuit train three times a week and it doesn‚Äôt show up for either. I think my very fit pro app has messed with the system.

title: My Plate Review
body: I have used several of the other apps for this purpose, this app is the one that works best for me. It is easy to use and has a good amount of information in the data base. I have been the free app for over a year, this help me use a lot of weight!

title: Love the app
body: This app has been a total game changer for me. Ive lost weight by setting my intake goal and tracking and I feel better than I ever have! The list of foods is so thorough that I‚Äôve never eaten something that wasnt already input. Great app! I would recommend to anyone!

title: It works ok
body: I like the app. Being tied to Livestrong is a plus. It is tops for food and nutrition. I am not happy with the way it links to exercise functions for workouts. I walk everyday, it shorts my time and length by up to 1/2 hour and distance is all over the board, which adds or deletes caloric burn and is just not accurate.

title: Reminders
body: Works like most tracking apps, but I really like the reminders ;) After awhile tracking is tedious. This morning I received a reminder saying, ‚ÄúHave a little dessert after breakfast, we won‚Äôt judge!‚Äù Loved it ‚ù§Ô∏è and made me stop and track.

title: Not for losing weight :(
body: I love the format of this app; it‚Äôs easy to use and navigate. However, I ended up gaining about two pounds in the week and a half that I used MyPlate. I do Air Force ROTC, I workout five times a week, and I eat pretty healthy, but I was still gaining weight. I do think this app is great for maintaining weight or building muscle, but for trying to slim down, MyFitnessPal is still my favorite.

title: Good app
body: It is a very good and well set up app. I keep track of everything I‚Äôm eating and my exercises I do and then tells me my calories and how much I‚Äôve burnt. The only thing I don‚Äôt like about it is it says it for ages 4 and up but if you are 12 and younger it will not let you use the app. It is a pretty great app to use!
response: Hi there! We're so glad you're enjoying MyPlate. The 4+ rating is given by Apple, and just means that our app contains no objectionable material. However, we are legally unable to allow anyone under the age of 13 to create an account. Please email us at support@livestrong.com if you have any questions!

title: Protein Counter
body: I use this app to keep track of my protein to carb ratios for the diet that I use.
response: Hi Vrazysadie! Thanks for the review. We're happy to hear the app has helped you.

title: The best calorie counting app
body: I like this app because it allows me to track my calories accurately without nagging me if I go too low (which myfitnesspal does). It has helped me lose about 30 pounds and maintain my goal weight for many months since.
response: Hi there! We‚Äôre so happy you‚Äôre enjoying MyPlate and would love to give you the opportunity to explore our Gold membership! Please send us an email at¬†support@livestrong.com¬†for details.

title: I lost 58 pounds!
body: I have been big my whole life and I thought losing weight was never going to happen. I would diet, exercise and I just never lost anything as significant as this. With the recipes on the app and the calorie counter I finally did it! 258lbs to 200lbs!!!

title: Weight Tracking
body: Second time I‚Äôve had to write this review since the first one was apparently deleted. The app no longer shows daily progress for items like weight, calories, etc. You could previously view a line graph to track numbers each day going back a full year. Now that line graph has been replaced by a bar graph that only lists these metrics in averages. Extremely unhelpful change. Makes the app almost useless.
response: Hello! Apple does not allow us to delete reviews, so apologies if you're unable to find your original review. We have not removed daily tracking for any metric, and have returned the weight graph to a line. It looks like you're using the most recently updated version of the app, so be sure to check that out! You can view your daily progress for any data point by holding your finger down on the graph and dragging along to see each daily number. Please email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions.

title: Great App!!!
body: This is one app that gives me all that I need and more!

title: LOVE THE ACCOUNTABILITY
body: I started using this about a year ago and got serious with it the last 2 months. I love the ease and accountability reminders it send me when I start to slack offüòä. By tracking my food and daily exercise I‚Äôm down 10#....working on the last 20#üòä.

title: So far so good!
body: So far I really like this app, however, I wish there was an option to switch times of meals/days for night shift workers. I work only night shift so my ‚Äúbreakfast‚Äù is at 5pm, lunch at 12am, and dinner at 3-4am. Idk if it‚Äôs possible, but it would be nice to have a personalization option for off shift workers. Otherwise I really like it. Thanks!

title: What happened?!
body: I loved this app. Use it every single day. But the last few updates have made it horrible. After clicking on a meal, it takes sooo long for the window to open. And if you put too many foods under one meal, you can‚Äôt see them! And the swipe feature is gone to remove foods. I don‚Äôt like the new updates at all.
response: Hi there. We're so sorry for the frustration with the speed of the app. Our team is working on this issue right now. We hope to have a solution for you ASAP. With version 5.20.1, we have restored the swipe feature to remove tracked foods. We've also resolved the bug that was not allowing you to see all of your tracked foods under one meal. If you're seeing something different on your end, please send us an email at support@livestrong.com.

title: Fabulous app to help lose weight
body: Best app. I've used for several years. It keeps getting better. Tracks food intake, exercises, easy to use. Very large food database, even has various restaurant meals.

title: Crashing
body: Everyday every time I open it shuts off 3 times before staying open.
response: Hi there, we're so sorry this is happening! Please reach out to us at support@livestrong.com so we can assist you.

title: No longer functions correctly
body: I have used this app for over a year and it's always worked up until about 1-2 months ago.  The issue is it no longer accurately tracks my activity to tell me how many calories I have burned.  It now displays the latest tiny movement I made, so maybe 5-45 calories for an entire day of activity including walking my dog about 3-4 miles.  It's really annoying and I wish it would function correctly again.
response: Hi Cash68- we're so sorry for this inconvenience! We are aware of this issue and we're working hard on a fix. Thank you for your patience!

title: AMAZING APP
body: I Love this app.  I didn‚Äôt realize how much Sugar, Carbs, salt, water, and the many other things this app shows you about your diet and nutrition, that I was consuming each day. Now that I am down to the weight I would like to be this app totally helps me maintain my health and my weight!

title: How To Set Goal
body: When I initially got the app I set a goal for certain weight at a certain rate, but when I decided later to try to change the parameters, I couldn‚Äôt find any way to do it. Is this because I have the free version and I need to upgrade in order to be able to set a new goal?
response: Hello! To change your profile settings, please tap the white silhouette icon located in the upper left corner of the app's home screen. Then, tap your profile picture. You can change you settings on the next page. Please email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions.

title: Problem with app/server
body: It worked great for 2 months. But last night it just stayed on the loading screen and wouldn‚Äôt work. I logged off, and it wouldn‚Äôt let me log back in. I‚Äôve tried multiple times, restarted my phone, and redownloaded. Still doesn‚Äôt let me log in- just give me an error message. I tried to make a new account but it says that it can‚Äôt connect to the server :(
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage at our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Easy to Use-but might need update
body: My family has been using for the last several weeks, love it verse others, however after the last IOS update, we can no longer search new foods outside of what we use previously prior to the IOS update.  Thanks
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage at our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Would be a 5
body: I love this app 100% recommend it to anyone who wants to be more conscious of their intake and their exercise. My factory feature is the scanner where you can scan your foods and have all the info immediately. However, lately I can't get my scanner to work! I've tried refreshing, redownloading, updating and nothing. Please fix this!
response: Hi Llama, we'd love to help you get this resolved! Please email us at support@livestrong.com for assistance.

title: Been keeping track for a while! Love it
body: I discovered this app years ago and no matter what other app I try, I always come back to this one! I love how easily I‚Äôm able to make my own foods and easily find the things that I routinely eat! Love love love this app.

title: Great for counting calories and setting goals.
body: I have been using this app as a food journal to keep track of calories and it has helped me tremendously.

title: Love
body: I‚Äôve been using this app going on 2 weeks. I absolutely love it. It‚Äôs easy to use. The barcode scanner is a huge plus. Even if it‚Äôs something that‚Äôs not in the database it‚Äôs super easy to add. I have already recommended this app to a few friends.
response: Hi there! Thank you so much for your review. We're excited to hear how much you are enjoying MyPlate. Thank you for your support.

title: Nearly perfect
body: I love everything about this app. The only thing I would love for it to add is integration with the workout part of the apple fitness app. If you offer workouts in your app the apple fitness app should be able to track it.
response: Hi BittyCommittee! Thank you for the review. We appreciate your feedback and I have passed along your comments to our product development team. We are always adding new content and features to the app and we love getting feedback as it helps guide our designs and tools moving forward.

title: Easy peasy!
body: I‚Äôve downloaded several similar apps and always end up deleting them bc they are complicated and I don‚Äôt want to spend a lot of time recording my meals. Love that I can save my meals and just repeat when necessary!  Thanks for such a great app!

title: Wish i could list ingredients/recipes of homemade food for accuracy
body: I really like this app. It helps hold me accountable for my caloric intake and nutrition.
response: Hi Musser Mom! Thank you for your review. We are working on bringing a custom Recipe function to the app and hope to include this in a future update!

title: Would be good if
body: Would be a good app if you could just add your recipe in and it calculates the calories for you. I can‚Äôt add in my recipe because not all the measurement options are in there when you scan every item and I would have to figure out the math each time. Just let people choose their own measurements cup, tsp, tbsp. Have every measurement for every food item available for every food item.
response: Hi Ya113! We appreciate your feedback and I have passed along your comments to our product development team. We are always adding new content and features to the app and your feedback helps guide our designs and tools moving forward. Thank you.

title: It‚Äôs good
body: Update: The inaccuracies in food nutrition values and difficulties in logging by mass really hold it back.
response: Hello and thank you for your feedback! We'd love to investigate the bugs you're referring to in the barcode scanner. Can you please send us an email at support@livestrong.com with a few details? Also please note that you can edit custom meals by swiping left on the entry under "my meals" and selecting edit. Thanks again!

title: Love it!
body: This app is very user friendly and makes recording your food intake quick and easy. I also love that it syncs my activity data from my Apple Watch and then readjusts my calories based on activities preformed throughly out the day!

title: Great app
body: This app has everything I need to stay on track with my fitness goals. I track my weight, track my calories and water intake, and track my workouts. It also has recipes if you‚Äôre interested.

title: Meets my needs perfectly
body: So far this app has been great.  I needed to track my protein intake more so than calories.

title: Weight loss
body: I‚Äôm so happy with this app,it has helped me track my food every day. I found out I was eating over my calorie intake and my goal is to lose not gain. I just started three weeks ago and I will let y‚Äôall know what my out come is in a month. I believe I‚Äôm on the right track now. Pray for meüôè

title: Fantastic App
body: This app has helped me maintain and lose weight just by measuring everything I do on a daily basis. The ability to mark down calories as well and create new food options helps where other apps don't.

title: Great info - easy to use
body: LOVE this app!  I work in a gym and recommend it to everyone!  Easy to use - and gives lots of great info - including macro %. Love the scanner for input and I have yet to scan anything that was not already included in the food library! Awesome!

title: Not worth your time
body: It seemed pretty decent at first but does not have a large amount of foods/recipes. You can add your own though. Going to switch back to MyFitnessPal. Also it would randomly sign me out but when I signed back in all my info was still there. Then it did it recently and some wasn‚Äôt there. Now my whole account disappeared. So frustrating and annoying. Don‚Äôt use this app.
response: Hi there, we're so sorry for this inconvenience. Our team is working hard on a fix for this and we hope to have it resolved soon. Please email us at support@livestrong.com so we can help you recover your data.

title: Good app to be conscious of calories and content but just stopped
body: Have used the app diligently to track calories and food content along with my weight. It has really helped me understand and be knowledgeable about how much and what I‚Äôm eating. Unfortunately it has recently stopped searching for food when typed or scanned in. If this is not fixed the app will be useless to me and I‚Äôll need to find a replacement.
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage at our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Very Good App!!!! üòä
body: I like this app a lot. It has helped me begin my weight loss journey. It‚Äôs fairly easy to use. One frustrating thing is that on the progress page you need to ‚ÄúUpgrade to Gold‚Äù to see how many calories you have burned... a bit frustrating. Other than that I think it‚Äôs a great app. üòä

title: Love this app but where is the dessert????
body: I love the simplicity of using this app and the wide range of food in the database. I use this app everyday and I like that I have become more conscious on what I‚Äôm putting in my body. The only complaint I have is that there is no tab to put desserts into. Other than that this app is amazing

title: It‚Äôs very easy, it‚Äôs free, it‚Äôs Great!
body: Been using it to track my calories and carbs and works great, rare to find a product not there. The only thing I would suggest is an option to track net carbs but I‚Äôd rather track my total carbs anyways so not an issue for me.

title: Awesome
body: This app is a great way to bring awareness to how many calories you intake a day, and also keep you motivated stay on track with any dietary goals. The food tracking system is great, only a few barcodes that haven‚Äôt been noticed (freshly meals).
response: Hi ATCook21! Thanks for the review. We're glad you are enjoying the app.

title: Best tracker
body: This app is perfect if you are trying to loose weight. You can easily track food, calories, and fat. It helps you do workouts and different healthy recipes to try out. Everything about this app is great and it really helps.
response: Hi gareterag! We appreciate you taking the time to leave a review. We‚Äôre glad you are enjoying MyPlate. We're constantly looking for new ways to improve our app, and we love getting feedback as it helps guide our process moving forward.

title: Updates have made this app so great
body: This app is so good for tracking calories. It would be nice if they included grams more often in the servings for food. It would make it much easier to track certain things!
response: Hi Zayzay9582! We very much appreciate your feedback and I have passed along your comments to our product development team. As we are always adding new content and features to the app, we love getting feedback as it helps guide our designs and tools moving forward. Thank you!

title: Great!! But..
body: I turned to this app to get my snacking habits under control (and it's doing a wonderful job!) but I'm finding my entries for carbohydrates are fairly inaccurate because they don't take into account FIBER. Can you please make it track NET carbs instead of total carbs? That's the only thing keeping it from being perfect!
response: Hi ketofriend! Thanks for your feedback! We will definitely pass this along to our team!

title: Serious connectivity issues
body: Don‚Äôt use this app.

title: Need to add more foods
body: The user interface is so much better than my fitness pal, but my fitness pal has a much more extensive food internal database. I find myself going to my fitness pal just to see how many calories are in an item and then coming back to MyPlate to enter it. Restaurant foods especially are needed.

title: It really works.
body: I‚Äôve been counting my calories for the last few weeks and it really does work on helping you lose weight. It‚Äôs simple to use and I‚Äôve already started to see results.

title: Amazing App
body: This is a great app because it helps me with my cholesterol choices and sugar I‚Äôve been eating healthy for the past week it I also like how it tracks you water and it has so many foods put in the system!! This is the best app ever for what you eat.

title: Need to add picture of the food
body: This app is amazing it helped me to lose 20 pounds but the only problem is that there is no picture of food so when you search the food it is hard to find it I hope they really solve this problem because this app is awesome

title: Extremely helpful app
body: I love this app so much. It will help me keep track of everything that I eat. Sometimes I forget to track but they do have notifications which you can set to whatever time you want!!!

title: Great app!
body: I love this app and the visuals it provides for macronutrient intake (bar graphs, pie charts, etc). It's also very easy to add a food that doesn't already exist in the database! I do REALLY wish that I could input specific macro numbers instead of only being able to choose percents by 5% at a time. Please add this feature!! ‚ô•Ô∏è
response: Hi Katybells92! We very much appreciate your feedback and I have passed along your comments to our product development team.  As we are always adding new content and features to the site and app, we love getting feedback as it helps guide our designs and tools moving forward.

title: Not worth the money
body: I enjoy using the app and it has helped me stay healthy, but there are a few quirks. For instance, the sequence of the exercises is strange and the meal plans are (while healthy) a bit obscure. Most of the foods require ingredients that I won‚Äôt have around the house and am not willing to buy for one meal. Great tool, but the premium features are not worth the money.

title: Great for food, ok gps tracker
body: The food selection and custom entry is fantastic. The ease of adding and revising entries has also improved. High quality app construction. The only complaint is the ‚Äúfree‚Äù side of the app is quite lacking with the gps tracker or ‚Äústeps tracking‚Äù. Says you do less than you actually do.

title: Great app to keep me on track!
body: I really use this app as a tool to track my calories. I definitely need to keep track or else I will eat 2000 calories a day without realizing it. I am eating healthier options and losing weight slowly and sensibly.

title: This is a dream
body: I used MyPlate years ago. The site was pretty inconvenient. So when I decided to do something about my Covid weight, I looked at other apps first. Once I gave the latest version of MyPlate a try, I discovered what a breeze it is. Felxible and complete. I love it.
response: Hi there! Thank you so much for your review. We're happy to hear you have made MyPlate a part of your fitness journey.

title: Try It! It‚Äôs worth it!
body: I love it! I‚Äôve been using this app for 3 weeks and have lost 5 pounds and counting. I just realized today that it can track your calories burned by syncing with your steps that your phone tracks! Awesome and it really works!
response: Hi Nicci! Thank you for leaving that awesome review. We're glad you are enjoying MyPlate.

title: Needs better accuracy
body: I've only been using this for a few weeks, but I have had it happen a few times per week where I scan a package and the calories are off by anywhere between 10 and 50 calories. And finding foods by searching is a pain...you can type in "apple" and get ten things before you actually see an apple. I do like the appearance.
response: Hi jrs91616! We appreciate you leaving a review. We apologize for the frustration. Many of the discrepancies are occurring because of new mandatory dietary guidelines from the FDA, in particular changes around nutrition labels.

title: really good app over all
body: This app is easy to use and very helpful. It‚Äôs also free pretty much. Some workouts you need to pay for but otherwise all free. Only reason it gets a 4 is because for weight loss it says 1200 calories. But you need more then that a day. Even to lose weight
response: Hi Brownkey19! Thanks for the review. The calorie goal set in the app is based on your height, weight, and how aggressively you would like to gain, lose, or maintain weight. You can also input your own custom calorie goal. We apologize for any confusion. If you have questions regarding this, please reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Must get this!!
body: This app is so well set up and everything is easy to find, and it really adds motivation that I‚Äôm keeping track of everything that‚Äôs going into my system and it‚Äôs pushing me farther in my weight loss journey.

title: Amazing
body: I think it is the most amazing thing I track what I eat and for me is not about losing weight it‚Äôs more of just wanting to see the flaws in my diet and I never really realized how like much junk o eat until I saw it and I was like üò± and it‚Äôs just the best

title: Great app for runner losing those stubborn last 10 lbs!
body: Set the goal to 0.5 lbs per week and 50% carbs.

title: Lost 15 pounds
body: I like how easy it is to track calories by UPC symbol on food. It also saves the most popular items or ingredients on top. I like how easy it is; it‚Äôs like keeping a food diary too. It‚Äôs also great to keep track of calories every day.

title: Excellent intuitive app
body: In 6 weeks I‚Äôve lost 13 pounds just by changing my eating habits and eating clean. Lots of good recipes, exercise videos and community forum to help motivate.

title: Good App
body: This App is much simpler than others I‚Äôve used before. No complicated stuff like writing a daily Blog, useless Fitness games, points systems and no freakin drama! It‚Äôs only a guideline for your goals and your Macros (if you follow them like I do). Sometimes the simplest things works best than other ‚Äúbells & whistles‚Äù so-called weight loss Apps. üëçüëçüí™üí™

title: What is measured, improves
body: I had no idea how many calories I was eating every day!  This app makes it easy to track daily calorie intake and make better choices. Figuring exercise also really helps keep track of overall health.

title: Room for improvement
body: I got this app because I really needed to focus on my macros. I was able to enter in the macros as my body needed however many of the foods that are in the system or not correct. When I tried to add my own food the nutrients did not show up there for throwing off the macros. Also would like to see more ways to add food such as ounces or grams as well as more options for serving size.

title: buggy
body: used this instead of my fitness pal because the interface looked prettier and it did the same functions.

title: Great way to track- missing one feature
body: I love this app. Especially the fact that you can scan barcodes and have all the information entered. This app is just missing one VERY important thing. Net Carbs. If the carbs displayed showed net carbs, I would be using it more often than Stupid Simple apps.

title: Rating MyPlate
body: Very good app please add more dishes

title: I‚Äôve loved this forever...
body: I‚Äôve used this app for several months each year for the past few years when trying to track nutrition or lose weight. I‚Äôve loved it! Super easy.
response: Thank you for your review, Julzlovesawesomness!

title: 3lbs. In 1 week!
body: This is an easy, very informative app.  It gives you daily recipes.  Which is great for me who is constantly on the go.  It has reminders to let me know when to eat.  I love this app.  I wish I would‚Äôve found it sooner.

title: Great App Easy to Use!
body: Love this app! Can track not only my food but also my weight, my activity, my workouts and water intake all in one place. And now that I have an Apple Watch it syncs to my Apple Watch and downloads my Activity automatically!

title: Not sure yet
body: Its a bit confusing, can't figure out if the stats are what I've consumed or what I have left to go? I'm guessing left to go. Also, there should totally be options for motherhood -carrying and lifting a baby off the floor is a lot of work! This isn't at all in the list of exercises but reclining on a couch with a baby is????? Who has the time to do that üòÇ

title: Difficult
body: I just bought this app and spent several minutes trying to add an 8 oz. bottle of coke, which makes this way to time consuming to use. Also, creating meals or food is complex and when adding food the user has to put in the calories. I was looking for an app that would help me count my calories for food. This app probably excels if you eat a good amount of prepackaged food

title: Very useful
body: I've been using it off and on for a while. I think it's easy to use, has a strong database of recognized foods, and allows for some helpful shortcuts to make it easy to upload data. I like that it pipes to apple health too

title: Loved but stopped working
body: I loved this app but unfortunately after the Apple 11 update its not working.  It no longer tracks the calories burned and now loooking up food sometimes doesn‚Äôt work and sometimes deletes food entries.  Been waiting for update.  Have deleted app and have downloaded again, but still not working.
response: Hi T! We're so sorry to hear of the trouble you're having. Please email us at support@livestrong.com so that we can assist you!

title: New Update Causing Crashing
body: Normally 5 stars, but the latest update won‚Äôt let the app run for longer than a few seconds
response: Hi Sooner! We've just released an update that will resolve this issue! Please go to the app store to download. Apologies for this brief inconvenience!

title: Great app!!
body: This is an excellent app for counting calorie intake and calories burnt. Offers a very long list of verified and user submitted foods to choose from when you‚Äôre inputting your daily foods. Also allows your to manual input foods. This app is very user friendly.
response: Hi there! We appreciate you leaving a review. We're glad you are enjoying MyPlate.

title: Essential Info
body: The nutrition info and consumption tracking info you get in MyPlate is absolutely essential to managing ones health. Without that info you will struggle to achieve goals for weight management or ensure that you‚Äôre getting the right amounts of nutrients for YOUR body.
response: Hi 5280fan! We appreciate you leaving a review. We're happy to hear you are enjoying the app.

title: Best App!!!
body: This is one of the best free meal tracking apps I have ever used! I especially love the recipes that are actually healthy. The last thing I love about this app is the facts that they have so many brands, and if its not on there, you can just create your own.
response: Hi there! We appreciate your glowing review. We're glad you are enjoying MyPlate.

title: Navigation is a problem.
body: There are many things I like about MyPlate. The one I don‚Äôt is the difficulty of moving around the app. The icon says it‚Äôs where I want to go but tapping gets me nowhere or somewhere else. Hopefully I can find enough things I can use to make MyPlate worth while.
response: Hi there! Thanks for the review. I don't quite understand the issue you are describing. However, we'd be happy to assist you with any questions you may have. Feel free to reach out to us at support@livestrong.com. Here is a Get Started Guide you may find useful: https://www.livestrong.com/slideshow/1011166-myplate-calorie-tracker-app-guide/

title: 5 year member leaving - took away ability to track progress by day.
body: Was a great app, until they took away the ability to track weight by day (now can only review results on a weekly basis (avg for the week). At least be smart and give members an option. For me I like to see daily process - this is much more motivating for me.
response: Thanks for your review and feedback. We‚Äôve just released an update to the app addressing these concerns. Please update to version 5.31.0. If you still have questions or concerns, please send us an email at¬†support@livestrong.com.

title: I use this app all the time!
body: I recently force synced the app and there‚Äôs stuff I don‚Äôt want on my ‚Äúplate‚Äù. It‚Äôs like it‚Äôs on repeat but it says it is not. I can‚Äôt keep deleting 12+ things every time I launch. This really makes me not want to use the app.
response: Hi joouuy! Thanks for reaching out. We're glad MyPlate has become a part of your routine. We'd be happy to take a look at the issue you're describing. Please reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: iPhone daily steps
body: This app is great and all but the one thing that bugs me is that my iPhone daily steps keep on changing. Sometimes they will go down and then go back up again and then go down and so on. Is there a reason for this? Am I doing something wrong?

title: Easy to use!
body: This doesn‚Äôt have most foods or exercises but you can custom make them in the app! For example I‚Äôm a massage therapist so there is a ‚Äúmassage work‚Äù option for burning calories. I highly recommend this app, I use it every day!

title: Great way to keep healthy.
body: It synchronizes between my different devices and pulls exercise information from my iPhone. It is very helpful to have a running log of dietary information in order to track unhealthy habits.

title: Better than map my plate
body: I‚Äôve used this app for years and love it. It‚Äôs easy to use, has macronutrients avail. I‚Äôve tried the other apps but this one is by far the best! Also uses data from my garmin to help adjust calories.

title: MyPlate is the best meal tracker
body: I have tried many other, and if you are looking for a app that tracks your macros without paying money, this one is for you. Even better, it‚Äôs smooth and detailed like the other premium health apps.

title: Serving size options limited
body: This is a pretty good app for tracking calories. The food options are kind of limited, but the main reason I only rated 3 stars is because the serving size measurements are difficult. It would be so much easier if there were more options such as cups instead of just ounces, etc.

title: Love MyPlate!
body: We use MyPlate in nutrition class and I just recently found out they have an app!!
response: Hi Kales9616! Thanks for your feedback! We‚Äôre glad you are enjoying MyPlate. We're constantly looking for new ways to improve our site and apps, and we love getting feedback as it helps guide our process moving forward.

title: Love it!
body: It doesn‚Äôt tell you exactly what to eat but it does guide you to the right choices and I love that.

title: Weight loss maintenance
body: I started using My Plate app a year ago. I was within normal weight range (I‚Äôm 62 and have battled with my weight forever) I track my food intake daily and have stayed within 3 lbs up or down...it is so easy to use...thank you My Plate!

title: Minor Issue
body: I like this app, however I have a small complaint. The macro calculator does not adjust for total calories consumed. For instance I am on a 1,600 calories diet but if I burn 500 calories I actually consume 2,100. However my macros are still set at a percentage based on 1,600 therefore I always end up going over
response: Hello and thank you for your feedback! This is something we hope to address in a future update. Please email us at support@livestrong.com with any other concerns!

title: Imputing sugars when adding a food
body: There needs to be a section to add all the nutritional information so we can track items that we need to input manually due to the food not being in database. This is especially needed if you need to watch sugars due to being a diabetic.
response: Hi dwardo01! Thank you for your review and feedback! We are working on an update that will allow this! Please watch our community and the app store for news.

title: I love this app
body: I went vegan and this helps me make sure I‚Äôm meeting my nutrient goals ! Plus keeps my carbs and fats in check ! I used this app before going vegan to help keep track of what I was eating. I‚Äôve used this app for years highly recommendüôåüôå
response: Hi goldieelocxx! Thank you for your amazing review. We're glad MyPlate has been so useful for you.

title: Like the app
body: App is easy to use and helpful. In the beginning the app was tracking my workouts from my watch, but now its not updating calorie burn. Is there away to get it back. I do have it to sync from phone.
response: Hi K. De Luca! Thank you for writing in with your report, your feedback helps a lot and is much appreciated. The team is working on a fix for this issue right now! Please watch for app store updates and posts in the community for further news.

title: Love this app!
body: It‚Äôs so easy to input food in here! I love the water intake feature! The scanner has been having some trouble, but it‚Äôs so easy to add the nutritional facts. Very happy with this in helping me make sure I‚Äôm eating enough while taking phentermine! It‚Äôs amazing!!
response: Hi NicoBrim! We very much appreciate your feedback and I have passed along your comments to our product development team. As we are always adding new content and features to app, we love getting feedback as it helps guide our designs and tools moving forward.

title: Over forty, pre diabetic
body: I‚Äôve lost over 60 pounds in 8 months tracking calories, eating vegetarian (mostly) avoiding sugar and bread and being more active.

title: nice app
body: this is probably the best apps for tracking calorie intake as well as having a goal for a set weight telling you how much calories you need to consume. only thing is they don‚Äôt have the workouts i do like ‚Äúsquats‚Äù, ‚Äúlunges‚Äù, ‚Äúpush-ups‚Äù etc. It would be great if they added more excercises
response: Hi lesliemendoza! We very much appreciate your feedback and I have passed along your comments to our product development team. As we are always adding new content and features to the app, we love getting feedback as it helps guide our designs and tools moving forward.

title: Too many bugs and not user friendly
body: The main bug I‚Äôve encountered is when you try to update any of your info or especially calorie goals in your profile it doesn‚Äôt save. Also, a lot of the food in their database is way off on the macronutrients and whenever you scan something a lot of the time what comes up on your phone doesn‚Äôt match the package. Also the community space is horribly toxic
response: Hello and thank you for your feedback! Our team is working on a fix for the issue you've reported with saving Profile info.

title: Good but needs 1 change
body: Not an issue but more of a suggestion. It would be great if there was an option for inputting any number of oz, grams, etc instead of a serving. For example I can‚Äôt put I ate 7 oz of chicken. I have to put I ate a serving (3 oz) and figure out how to add 4 oz to that with the limited options (1, 1/2, 1/4, etc).

title: Best fitness app
body: This is like the best app I‚Äôve ever used. It does have in app purchases, but you can still use it without them. I don‚Äôt have the subscription and it still gives you a grocery list on sundays and recipes. I love it!

title: ‚ù§Ô∏è this app!
body: I love that this app syncs to my iPhone & iwatch which makes it so much easier to keep track of movement/workouts. It‚Äôs very helpful for me to be able to track my calories and see the daily percentage breakdown. Very easy to use! üëçüèª

title: 1st question
body: The first question when setting up the app profile is do you want to ‚Äúlose weight‚Äù or ‚Äúgain weight‚Äù ...... this isn‚Äôt always the reason for tracking daily nutrition. I deleted the app at this point because maintaining weight and having an understanding of my nutrition levels my goal. If another option was available or I was able to skip this part then I would consider using. Thanks for your time.
response: Hi there! The option to maintain your weight is available in the app! We hope you'll reconsider and re-download! To update your goal, you can tap the white silhouette icon located in the app's upper left corner. Tap your profile picture. On the next page, click "Weekly Target" to update your goal to maintain weight. Please email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions!

title: Great app
body: I am enjoying using this app.  The e-mails for the weekly grocery lists are helpful; however, I was unable to see or modify my meal plan from the app before my 8 week challenge started. Maybe this is available online, but I would like to see it in the app.  Otherwise it is awesome.

title: Love the scan feature!
body: As a personal trainer, I recommend this app to all my clients.  I especially like how the carb/protein and fat ratios are listed throughout the day.  I also like that you can add your workouts in and it automatically adjusts the caloric intake.

title: Won‚Äôt process
body: For a little bit I really liked this app, but for a full week now every time I try to enter calories it says it can‚Äôt process. Waste of space on my phone if it won‚Äôt do what it‚Äôs supposed to.
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage on our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Can‚Äôt turn on ‚Äútrack my activity‚Äù
body: There doesn‚Äôt seem to be a way for me to turn on the ability to track my activity on this app. When I try to turn it on it sends me to the settings, but not to the right place. When I manually go to ‚Äúmotion & fitness‚Äù, this app is not available to select. I‚Äôm not exactly sure what I‚Äôm supposed to be doing here to get this to work.
response: Hi Diane, we responded to your customer support email address regarding this issue!

title: I use this App everyday
body: I have really enjoyed this app. I use it daily to count my calories. Had a technical issue causing some problems but that has been resolved and the app is functioning great now. Thank you
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage at our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Separate my food menu
body: Currently adding or creating in the my food tab is segmented to be a day by day thing it‚Äôs ineffective and time consuming. The ‚ÄúMy food list‚Äù that i manual create and enter should be my own list that gives me access to apply to any day of the week to speed up the effectiveness and follow through with the app.
response: Thank you for installing and reviewing MyPlate! We appreciate your feedback on the custom foods list. Comments like these help us smooth out the tracking experience as we update our app. Thank you again for tracking with MyPlate!

title: Workouts sessions
body: Everything is great and all but the workout sessions examples won‚Äôt show up when I click on them. I try even going out of the app and then go back in. It still does not show, only shows up once in a while which is not really great when I want to workout using the steps from the app.
response: Thank you for trying the app, and thank you so much for writing a review! This comment has been mentioned to the dev. team, and they're currently investigating the slow load times for the workout examples. Your feedback is greatly appreciated, and we encourage you to contact us at support@livestrong.com with any other questions or concerns that may arise. Thanks again for choosing MyPlate!

title: Great!
body: I thought I liked My Fitness Pal, but this app has very useful features. Such as taking a photo of what you're actually eating!  I think that's motivating and accountable. Also offers workouts and recipes per your selection.

title: Great App
body: I totally recommend this app if your looking for a healthier lifestyle.  Since I started using this app about 5-6 months ago I‚Äôve lost almost 40 pounds. Some walking, light jogging and counting my calories with this great app made it possible.  Thanks.
response: Hi Hawker! Thank you so much for your review and congratulations on your success. We're glad we could be a part of your fitness journey.

title: Very useful with tracking macronutrients but terrible with micronutrients
body: Every time I look at the details where it displays not just macros but things like sodium and cholesterol, sodium is never correct. I scanned a verified protein shake that has 250 mg of sodium. MyPlate app details show only 1.62 mg of sodium for the whole day and I‚Äôve input about five other foods that has at least more than 1.62 mg.
response: Hi Alissaturn- thank you for your report! Our team is aware of this issue and is working on a fix. We apologize for the inconvenience!

title: It's OK but still I liked the old version
body: This app is OK -- all right, pretty good -- but it still has some less than obvious paths (at least to me). Haven't tried the "my meals" function but the last version was difficult for me. All in all, OK.
response: Hi Drag0nLady! Thanks so much for your review and feedback. We'd be happy to answer any questions you may have. Please feel free to email us at support@livestrong.com!

title: Better platform than Myfitnesspal
body: Simple & easy to use. Also much cleaner and easy to navigate than Myfitnesspal. The only Cons is that The carbs is calculated not in Net Carbs. Also would like to see more of the micronutrients as well but the latter might be a stretched! ü§ôüèΩ

title: Great App
body: Awesome ! This app is helping me to achieve my health goals. Easier to update on mobile app and no need to log on to the website. Notifications to update food log feature really helping to maintain the food log.

title: Best meal tracker I‚Äôve ever used!
body: When I first downloaded this app I didn‚Äôt think I was going to use it as much. It‚Äôs really helped me keep track of my calories better than expected! Really happy! And the weight is falling off!

title: Helpful and motivating
body: This app has really helped, even with just 2 days of use, making sure I don‚Äôt go over my calorie limit. It also has been very motivating for me to exercise, even if short.

title: ACTUALLY losing weight
body: I am in LOVE with this app. I have used food trackers in the past, but not any that are so user-friendly. I appreciate the recipe suggestions they share‚Äî and they are actually very tasty! I‚Äôm ACTUALLY losing weight for the first time in a long time.

title: Better than the rest
body: I‚Äôve been using this for years and after trying some alternatives a couple times, I can say this one is the most complete free way to track.

title: App is fine but....
body: The same foods are listed over and over. When I do a search I‚Äôm scrolling through the same entries.

title: Please add Fitbit connectivity!
body: I love this app so far and find it very useful, no matter what membership (gold or not) you have. I enjoy all of the information it contains! Two things could make it perfect:

title: Good but not great
body: The app does a great job of helping me keep track of my nutritional goals, but I am frustrated by the fact that if you manually load what you have eaten from a recipe, you cannot load any values other than calories, carbs, protein and fat. Why can't I load the rest of the data too (like fiber, sugar, cholesterol, etc.) Please fix this!!!
response: Hi Dreamsinflight! Thank you for your review and feedback! We are working on adding micronutrients to your custom foods! Please watch our community boards and the app store for news on future releases. Thank you!

title: Best App for Tracking
body: I use this app to formulate and track my entire diet. Nothing I‚Äôve seen that does it better or makes it anymore simple. Extremely customizable and easy to follow your goals
response: Hi there! We appreciate you leaving a review. We're happy to hear MyPlate is helping you to reach your goals.

title: Steps Calculator Issue
body: I love this app so much but I‚Äôve been having many issues with my smart watch calculating my calories burned. I woke up and my watch says I‚Äôve burned 37 but the app says I burned over 1,000. I don‚Äôt understand why this is happening but I want to fix it. I cannot figure out how to delete the logs coming from my watch app ‚ÄúVeryFit‚Äù
response: Hi there! Thank you for your review and feedback. To delete a tracked exercise:

title: Great
body: The app is really awesome for tracking food really makes it fun. Being able break down the macros is also neat. Some features cost money though such as the vitamins tracker but I take a multivitamin everyday so it‚Äôs fine.
response: Hi Solotheman! Thank you for your awesome review. We're glad you are enjoying the app.

title: Fantastic App
body: I absolutely love this app and how it not only tracks your calories and macros but it also subtracts how many calories you burn off from exercising. Being able to see my net calories has helped a lot.

title: Highly recommendable
body: I have downloaded so many apps counting calories/tracking food/ Marcos and this is by far my favorite! So easy to use and 99.9 percent of the time has what you are trying to log!!! I love it üòç Thank you

title: Almost the perfect app
body: I absolutely love this app! The only thing I wish is that we could rearrange what we would like to see on the main page so I don‚Äôt have to scroll around everyday to see what I mainly use. Other than that NO complaints. SUPER easy to see and use!

title: Iove this app!
body: i love this app!! it gives me lots of structure and the reminders keep me motivated. i can see what im eating and how much i should eat. I love this app so much i would definitely recommend to anyone looking to change or maintain their weight

title: Conscience
body: Does this app have One? just Yesterday i entered my calorie count and the app crashed on me. After all the money that‚Äôs asked for a membership, I‚Äôm not so sure that this isn‚Äôt a legal scam. i don‚Äôt know How this App makes money. Very much wish that didn‚Äôt have to cancel my subscription. i can‚Äôt get Eeven a single
response: Hi there, we'd be glad to help you with the technical errors that you're having. We're so sorry that the app wasn't functioning as it should for you. If you're having trouble on our forums and feel that members are violating our Community Guidelines, please send us an email at support@livestrong.com! Thanks.

title: Great, But Needs Some Adjustments
body: I love the app but I wish that when you add a meal as your own, that you could set it up for how many servings the recipe is. I added a green bean recipe but it‚Äôs 4 servings, there isn‚Äôt a good way to add that custom meal and change the serving size from 4, to 1, from what you added as a recipe.

title: Calorie tracking made easy
body: I needed a fast way to track my calories and I found this app. It's so easy to use and doesn't take a lot of time. It also links with my Activity app on my phone.

title: Great app, easy to use
body: I like this app because it takes very little time to track. It has a great forum and workouts, and syncs to Apple Health. Tracking food may seem like a chore, but if you‚Äôre used to it it‚Äôs super fast, especially on MyPlate.

title: Does not track sodium correctly
body: I am watching my sodium intake and this app does not track sodium correctly.  I can look at a label and see the sodium content and then scan the container and see an entirely different sodium amount.  This is on every food I have scanned.  I have no faith that the nutritional content is being tracked correctly.  Why would I get the premium content when I don‚Äôt trust the app?
response: Hi there. The team is working on a fix for this issue right now! We're so sorry for the inconvenience.  It can take some time to fully diagnose and resolve bugs, we greatly appreciate your patience while we work on resolving this issue.

title: Few issues
body: I‚Äôve been having trouble using the app. Every time I attempt to do anything, the app had a loading sign. None of the other apps on my phone have this problem and I‚Äôve already tried to delete the app and reinstall it. Don‚Äôt get me wrong, it‚Äôs usually great but it‚Äôs been acting up lately.

We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Great!!!
body: I really really love this app! The only problem is lately when I try to add foods, the search bar comes up with no results at all.
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage at our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Perfect app!!
body: Love this app, even thought tracking my food is making me hate myself üòÇ Has all the features I‚Äôve been looking for in a food tracker app, except for photo taking. The barcode scanner is very helpful.

title: GreatÔºÅ
body: It‚Äôs so nice‚Äîkeeping track of the calories of my meals has always been a hard thing to do. I realized how much calories I was taking in every day and the app also allowed me to link other exercising apps with this app.

title: Has some issues
body: This is an overall good app, but it won‚Äôt let you delete exercises. This is a problem if, say, you accidentally tap on an exercise you didn‚Äôt do and suddenly you‚Äôve burned 803 calories (but not really), throwing off your calorie count for the day. You can delete meals that you‚Äôd had, so why not exercises?
response: Thank you for giving MyPlate a try, and sorry to hear about the frustration with mistakenly tracked exercises. To delete these incorrect entries, scroll down to your Activity Diary in the track section. Tap the exercise you'd like to delete, then touch the red delete bar in the next menu. If you are still unable to delete exercises following these steps, please contact us at support@livestrong.com, and we'll work on resolving the issue for you as soon as possible. Thanks again!

title: Awesome app
body: With the help of this app, I‚Äôve lost 38 lbs in 3and1/2 months!  Thank you so much! The app has tons of nutritional info on popular places to eat. This has helped me make better choices in food.

title: Needs work
body: I use my Apple Watch, iPad and iPhone to track calories eaten and burned. Sometimes it‚Äôs impossible to sync the iPhone and iPad.

title: love it!!
body: I had to get a food tracking app for a spanish speaking project, and this app worked great!! I just have one question. how do you change the calories you want to eat in a day? I have it at 1200 but I think that is just too low. how do I change it to 1500 calories.
response: Hello Megan! You can adjust your calorie goals easily! Tap the person icon in the upper left corner of the app's home screen. Tap your profile picture. From this screen, you can change your Weight Goal and Activity Level as needed, and your Calorie Goal will change automatically. Or create your own goal by tapping "Calorie & Macronutrient Goals", and then "Calorie Goal". Toggle the button next to Automatic to the off position, then enter the goal you want. Please email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions.

title: Meh
body: I‚Äôve been hearing about this app and am currently using myfitnesspal.. I decided to look into MyPlate and it seems nice, but one big thing is it doesn‚Äôt have a recipe builder option in which you can input ingredients for multiple servings and then showing you how many calories one serving makes, and then tracking it.

title: recommendation
body: i love this app, it helps maintain my weight as a growing student athlete. this app helps me calculate how many calories i should be eating, as i‚Äôve had problems with losing weight. my one recomendation to make this app better is if there was an option to track my sugar intake too in grams/teaspoons. it would be really cool if you could add this feature! of course, if people don‚Äôt have use for this feature maybe they could turn it off, but personally i would find this helpful.

title: Great app
body: I‚Äôve tried it a few months ago and lost about 10 in 2 weeks, but now I‚Äôm trying it again. I‚Äôve only been using it for 3 days and have already lost 4 pounds.

title: One of the best
body: I totally recommend this app!! Is one of the best app I encounter in the market and believe me I tried many more. Even the free version is totally amazing! I been using this app for more than a year now and I have no complaints.

title: LOVE THIS APP
body: MyPlate has kept me accountable and motivated. It is super user friendly and convenient (I am using the paid version). I love getting reminders to log my meals.  I have been following my healthy eating plan for 6 weeks and have dropped 23 pounds.

title: Love this app! Minor adjustments needed
body: Love this app but it would really be the best tracker app if they added time stamps for meals and notes section for specific foods (for example watermelon chunks register as 1 cup for the serving size but I measure mine by grams so I‚Äôd like to place a note with the watermelon input that I‚Äôm measuring 1 cup = 154g). Other than that üëçüèΩüëçüèΩ
response: Hi there! Thanks for the review and feedback. Our team is aware of an issue with grams and other measurement units not being displayed as a serving size option. The team is working on a fix for this issue. If you have additional feedback we encourage you to reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Censorship
body: This app censors content and stifles human discussion. It deleted my comments in the community about eating less than their algorithms recommendation. If they want to include a section in the app for people to offer advice to other people then it shouldn‚Äôt be censored or regulated. As an American I can only support organizations that practice relentless free speech. This app is not qualified to decide what can be considered ‚Äúunsafe‚Äù advice. Either allow people to speak freely or remove that feature on the app entirely.
response: Hi there. Our Community Guidelines state that we will not allow promotion of unsafe methods. Our app does not allow calorie goals lower than 1,200 per day, as this is widely considered the lowest amount of calories a person can safely eat without consulting a doctor. Therefore we uphold this rule in the community for the safety of anyone who is not able to consult with a doctor. We wish you the very best on your journey!

title: Macro divisions
body: I love this app and it is super helpful that it gives meals based on your left over macro division. My only problem is that I have a pretty specific division of Marcos that I am trying to meet and they aren‚Äôt perfect 5% splits, it‚Äôs not a deal breaker by any means but it would be nice if I could split it more exactly.

title: Love this app !!
body: Love everything about this app, the only thing I would ask for is the capability to be able to save recipes !! I see so many great things on here and if I don‚Äôt screenshot them or write them down there is no way to find them again !!
response: Hello! We're working on this for a future update. Stay tuned :)

title: Great app !
body: This app is the easiest to  navigate and best for keeping on track with calorie count. I started using this app after trying to use WW on line app which was horrible to navigate! Then I had a heck of a time getting reimbursed! This app is great!

title: Struggling lately
body: I used to love this app but now it crashes all the time and when I get notifications I get like 55 of the same notification.....the app is up to date a long with my phone. I also feel like the scanning of items has become more limited....I‚Äôm inputting my own more and more all the time.
response: Hey lizzybee13! Thanks for your feedback! We have been continuously working toward offering a better experience for our users. You should not be seeing crashes. Please contact us at support@livestrong.com with any specific issues and we will look into them for you!

title: Useless
body: This app is completely useless when it comes to meal prepping. You have no choice in foods you like or dislike. They give a lot of food I would never eat, with no alternative options. Additionally, buying all of that food would be very expensive. It would be great if they have meal option for breakfast lunch and dinner, make the app feel more personal. If I could give it a lower star than 1, I would. Highly disappointed.

title: The Best I Found
body: I have tried a lot of other food tracking apps and this is definitely the best one. It is supper easy to track your food and exercise as well as your water and weight. I love it!

title: Perfect healthy easy to use calorie counter and more!
body: I love this app. Use your barcode scan common food. It also list restaurant food. Has meal plans and exercises! Love it! Perfect way to get fit and stay on track for healthy.

title: You need this app

response: Hi corym2! We appreciate you leaving a review. We're happy to hear you like the app.

title: Friendly User App
body: Easy to use, accurate and even has recipes and workouts to help you reach your goal. Love the barcode scanner and I‚Äôve lost 7 pounds so far with calorie counting. Really recommend this app.

title: Excellent app

body: I‚Äôve been trying to track how many calories and protein I consume and this app is so helpful, especially love the scan option, makes everything 10x easier

title: Great app, super user friendly
body: I have been using this app to control how much I eat everyday. It has a wide variety food and you can change the portions of food you eat. This app is great and really helps me to not overeat.

title: Best app to keep track of what you eat
body: my favorite part is that the app has everything you need, so you don‚Äôt have to buy ‚Äúpackages‚Äù in order to properly document your progress

title: Great food journal!
body: I had loved my Jawbone food journal and could never find anything I liked since. I also love my Apple Watch. This food journal app is the best I‚Äôve ever used. It syncs perfectly with my watch activity. This is all I‚Äôve ever dreamed of!

title: Needs update

response: Thank you for installing MyPlate, and thanks for your review! We have recently issued a background fix (No Update Required) for the bug causing users to crash when tracking Meals. We encourage you to test it out and let us know at support@livestrong.com if you're still experiencing any issues with meal tracking. Thanks again for the report, and thanks for tracking with MyPlate!

title: Best Tracking App
body: I‚Äôve used several of the popular apps and this is by far the best. It is user friendly. Tracking is a must if you want to lose weight and keep it off.

title: Way better than Noom

title: App needs help

response: Hello and thank you for reporting this! Our team is looking into this issue right now. Can you please email us at support@livestrong.com so we can confirm a few details? Thanks again!

title: Awesome app!

To view your sugar intake, tap the "chart my" button and change to sugar. Please email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions.

title: Needs work

The exercises are for young in shape people only. Need some easy exercises for seniors. I mostly create my own foods and need to search elsewhere for nutritional information needed to track

title: Awareness

title: 8 years going strong!

response: Hi there! Thanks for your review and feedback.

title: 5 Star üòäüëçüåü‚ú®üí´‚≠êÔ∏è
body: I said this app is a 5 star ‚≠êÔ∏è because it helps track your eating and it tells you how many weight you lost and how much you have to lose or gain. This app is incredible and I am so happy üòÅ I got it

body: This app really helped me stay accountable for my calories taken in and realize when I had not taken enough and when. Big database and able to add food as well.

title: Just started using

title: Definitely worth it
body: They are able to search almost every food product from any brand and calculate you calories they even have unknown vegetarian brand foods

title: Double Dipping on Burned Calories
body: Unless I am completely missing something, the app is tracking my burned calories from both my Apple Watch and my iPhone. This effectively doubles the amount of calories I have actually burned. I can go in and manually delete, but then it comes right back every time it syncs. This app has so much potential, but this is quite a big deal.
response: Hi gregalawnjee, we apologize for the double counting. Our team is aware of this and is working on a solution. In the meantime, we recommend turning off activity tracking in the MyPlate app. This will allow the app to sync only with your Apple Watch. To do this, please do the following:

title: Works.
body: This really works best when you are actually trying to lose the weight. Yea people say they are but then get lazy with the app, any app really I have a few times but I have recently started back on it and IVE GOT THIS!

title: Just getting started
body: So far it has been easy to use and most foods are already in the database. I have not added any specific brand foods that are not in the database, just used the generic foods. It has been helpful to track my balance of carbs, fat, protein and water intake.

title: Just  a little tweak and it‚Äôll be perfect
body: I love most of the things offered on this app! The encouragement from others, and reminders to log in your food. My biggest problem is the barcode scanner it works sparingly. But when it does it is amazing.

response: Hi Alisa! Thanks for the review and congratulations on your success. We're glad MyPlate is helping you to achieve your goals.

title: So helpful

response: Hi sjkff9! Thank you for the review and feedback. That does sound like a cool idea. I will pass it to our product team. If you have additional suggestions or feedback, don't hesitate to reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: App counts calories wrong
body: I have tracked my food and had a consumed total calories of 2324 although it‚Äôs actually 2491 fats:87 carbs:247 protein:180 witch totaled up equals 2491 not 2324 so if you actually care about your calories being correctly added up you should definitely go with a different app. Would love a response on why this system is messed up only noticed it because I was over on all of my macros but still under my calorie limit
response: Hi there! Thanks for the review and feedback. We'd love to look into this. Please contact us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Can‚Äôt go lower than 1200
body: I am on a medically supervised weight loss plan that currently has me consuming fewer than 1200 per day making this app totally worthless to me at this point. I wish it could use it because I like the layout better than my current app and the interface is simpler. Will be deleting.
response: Hi mrssarahstewart! For safety reasons, 1200 calories per day is the minimum caloric goal allowed by the MyPlate calculator. This is commonly considered the lowest a number of calories a person can eat in a day without doctor supervision. Since most of our users do not check with a doctor before taking on such a goal, or are unable to do, we implemented this as a safety feature.

title: This app is legit and awesome

title: I think will work for me
body: So I am new to this app but have been using enough to see its benefits. Tracking food, exercise and water all in the same place is great. The community is friendly, supportive and helpful. I like the extras that I don‚Äôt have to pay for.

title: Not a bad app
body: The app does not allow to turn off notifications and when you turn them off it automatically turns them back on. It doesn‚Äôt have a lot of food to search from to add to your diary.

title: Great App

title: Works great
