title: Easy to Use
body: I‚Äôve lost 30lbs with this app. I custom entered the foods that I eat on a regular basis into their database and now when I log my food I can log everything with a single click. So easy and efficient.

title: EASY AND CONVENIENT

title: New update has issues
body: Changing portion size doesn‚Äôt show impact on calories consumed until you add the food. It should show you what the various portion sizes mean in terms of calories prior to adding.  Also, the new weight tracking is off. Y axis starts at 0 lbs, meaning even a 10% weight loss over time doesn‚Äôt look like much graphically. Please change this back.
response: Thanks for your review and feedback. We‚Äôve just released an update to the app addressing these concerns. Please update to version 5.31.0. If you still have questions or concerns, please send us an email at¬†support@livestrong.com.

title: Room for improvement
body: This app wasn‚Äôt the greatest and could use a major remodeling. It is great for tracking calories, but there is literally millions of calorie tracking apps. I feel like the community is way to toxic and judgmental and I just think that the app needs to look more modernly appealing, improve community and be more unique. I would love to give it a higher rating, but I was always told to be honest, so here‚Äôs my non-sugarcoated, harsh truth.
response: Hi there. We're so sorry you've had this experience. We work hard to create a community that is open and supportive of everyone. If you feel that our guidelines have been violated, please send us an email at support@livestrong.com.

title: Love it!

title: Love it

title: Best Calorie Tracking App By Far

response: Hi Sarah! Thanks for your feedback! We‚Äôre glad you are enjoying MyPlate. We're constantly looking for new ways to improve our site and apps, and we love getting feedback as it helps guide our process moving forward.

title: Love this app!

title: üëåüèªüëåüèªüëåüèª

title: Could not even create a login
body: Filled in everything right but it retuned an error from the server. Tried to start over again but says my email address is in use (it wasn‚Äôt when I first started so it registered but wouldn‚Äôt complete). Cannot get to a login screen. Clicked on the support button in the App Store and it took me to the website support which does not list app support as an option.
response: Hi donmarvin! Please email us directly at support@livestrong.com so that we can resolve this for you.

title: Won‚Äôt work
body: I absolutely loved this app. I deleted because I hadn‚Äôt used it for a while, but when I tried to redoenload it for the first time about a year ago it wouldn‚Äôt let me log it. It was ‚Äòworking‚Äô all night once. Nothing. I have tried multiple times to get it to work. I‚Äôve tried everything, making a new account, logging into a new one, restarting my phone. I don‚Äôt know what to do & I'm livid because I loved this app.
response: Please email us at support@livestrong.com so that we can assist you with this!

title: Can‚Äôt Register??? FIXED!!!!
body: I‚Äôm on an iPhone 8.
response: Thank you for your updated review, Soapguy808!

title: Love it
body: I love this app and use it every day. It took me a long time to find an app that I could track my macro nutrients in that was free and I also had a lot of foods already in its ‚Äúlibrary.‚Äù I definitely recommend it!

title: Lost Over 30 Pounds
body: I lost over 30 pounds using this app. It totally works and it helps me keep the weight off.  You will be shocked to find out how many calories you are actually eating.

title: Great app
body: I love tracking using this app, the only thing I wish they would add is being able to type in how many grams/ounces a food is, instead of trying to convert your serving with the suggested serving size. If they could add this I‚Äôd easily give them 5 stars!

title: Most helpful app I have ever had!
body: I have used this app (and the online website version) for years to help me gain and maintain weight. I love that it is so easy to use and the format is very user friendly.

title: Keep Coming Back
body: I‚Äôve tried other calorie counting apps and always come back to this one! Easy to use interface. I love that I can filter recipe ideas  to diet, for example, I am a vegan and am now able to see only vegan recipes. Super awesome; love that it syncs with my Apple Watch.

title: Honestly Amazing
body: It‚Äôs incredibly intuitive to use and even the free version has absolutely everything I need. Love scanning the food. No judgement either, tell it what you want and it calculates what you need. Perfect.
response: Hi there! Thank you so much for your review. We're glad MyPlate can be a part of your fitness goals.

title: Love
body: I am terrible at committing to a diet when I start it and since downloading this app and allowing notifications I am never able to forget. It doesn‚Äôt give up on you üòä
response: We'll never give up on you!! :)

title: Hard to track calories
body: Really nice app, but I can‚Äôt figure out how to just get the app to only count activity from my Apple watch. It‚Äôs counting activity from my phone‚Äôs step counter and my watch, so it‚Äôs saying I‚Äôm burning about twice as many calories.
response: Hi Matt! Thanks for your review! We apologize for the double counting. Our team is aware of this and is working on a solution. In the meantime, we recommend turning off activity tracking in the MyPlate app. This will allow the app to sync only with your Apple Watch. To do this, please do the following:

title: It isn‚Äôt 4+ :/
body: When I first downloaded this app, it said 4+. But, anybody who is born after the year 2008 or later would not be aloud. Why does it say 4+ then? Maybe you‚Äôll actually change the birthdate to 4+? I hope you do, though. Please respond to this! -Izzie
response: Hello Izzie! Sorry for any confusion, you must be 13 or older to use MyPlate. The 4+ rating is a rating given by Apple which indicates that the app contains no objectionable material, it does not indicate the age limit for the app.

title: Slightly cluttered UI
body: It's an alright app.
response: Hi there! Thanks for your review and feedback. If you have any additional suggestions, we encourage you to reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Very damaging
body: I‚Äôm 16 and this app helped me develop an eating disorder that hospitalized me. Using this app gives you a VERY poor relationship with food. If you are searching to loose weight this is not the way. There needs to be a disclaimer that it promotes ED behaviors (such as calorie counting). This app should only be used by people who have been told by their doctor they need to lose weight. Too many perfectly healthy people are using it to become slimmer.
response: Hello. We're so sorry to hear this. MyPlate does not promote eating disorders, and we work very hard to direct users in our community who are suffering from this to the appropriate resources. We strive to offer tools to help people live their lives in the healthiest way possible.

title: Who Verified These Foods?
body: I have enjoyed this app for the most part. However, many of the foods that are labelled as verified are thousands of grams off for macronutrients. I can find no way to correct or report this reoccurring issue. I often don‚Äôt notice until the end of the day, when my numbers are very off.  It is very annoying to have to look through every food I logged to find the incorrect data.
response: Hello! We apologize for the inconvenience and would love to investigate this. Please send us an email at support@livestrong.com. Thank you!

title: Great App, could be better
body: MyPlate is definitely a good competitor for Lifesum, although I wish that there were more units of measure added, such as grams for all food and not just some. I‚Äòd also prefer to input my own amounts rather than it being fixed numbers.
response: Hi Yuki, thanks so much for this valuable feedback!

title: Two thumbs up
body: This app makes tracking a breeze, the ability to enter your own data or scan an item is a game changer.

title: Perfect!
body: This app is amazing! It has motivated me to track what I and my weight is right on track! I am now on a healthy diet, living with a happy, healthy body! You should definitely try this because it is amazing!

title: No longer able to track my food :(
body: I loved this app for a sold 5 days. Now it will no longer allow me to track my food unless it is something I had previously tracked . This makes it now useless as I am not eating the same thing every day! I have received no response as of yet from the customer service team on the app.
response: Hello Bellebeast15! We are so sorry you faced this issue. We have been experiencing some technical difficulties on our servers. The team has been working hard to get it back up. Thanks so much for your patience. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Server has crashed and nobody is fixing it
body: I can‚Äôt even get past the registration page. I try to create an account and I get an error message. A search on Twitter shows that nobody is able to use the app. It appears their server has crashed and has been out for several days. Absolutely zero communication from Livestrong. No clue if they are even aware their app is dead. Pretty embarrassing for a big name organization.
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage on our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Activity tracker configuration
body: It would be great to link the app with my new activity tracker and be able to disable the iphone health app. Right now my step/calorie burned count is double since it tracks both at the same time. Otherwise great app!

title: My Plate
body: Doing the free plan just to start. Seems like a good way to track calories. The exercise plans are only 10 minute and let‚Äôs face it who doesn‚Äôt have 10 minutes.

title: Very useful
body: It‚Äôs so easy to organize and monitor my food intake and count calories more accurately. Lots of options on measurement options and many brands of items. I love the scan capability as well. Very handy.

title: No ads, no gimmicks, truly seem to care
body: I use this app in conjunction with my quit coach and am most impressed with how the support group is monitored and cared for by real people who care. If you want to succeed and need a booster club come here! 100% perfection.üëäüèª

title: My daily app
body: I love this app, I use it everyday just to keep track of what I eat! I‚Äôve also used it before for calorie counting and lost about 20 pounds quickly! Does the job in every way! :)

title: Best Calorie Tracker on the App Storw
body: I‚Äôve tried plenty of calorie trackers (from MyFitnessPal to Lifesum) and I can say that this is by far my favorite. They don‚Äôt try to shove their subscription down your throat and are overall super chill. Keep up the great work guys! :)

title: Great Tracker
body: I love this app to total my intake and macros for the day. It helps me make sure I get enough protein daily and balance my daily calories. Obtaining fuel from food is important to me, and this app helps me make sure I have a good variety.

title: Almost great...
body: I would really like to see the Frequently Eaten foods be more accurate. There are a lot of food I eat that simply never appear in the frequent list.
response: Thanks for tracking with MyPlate, and thanks for the review! We appreciate the feedback, as it helps us make each update better than the last. We hope you'll stick around to try any future updates as we continue to refine the app. Thanks again for the recommendations, and thanks for trying out MyPlate!

title: Good program with one flaw
body: I would like the option to move foods from, for example, lunch to dinner without having to delete and then enter it again at a different meal. I hope that makes sense.
response: Hi Jsb2! Thanks for your feedback! We have passed your comments on to our developers for consideration!

title: Helpful & straight to the point
body: Does what it says it will do and more. Also has options for workouts, which is extremely convenient. :)

title: Lacking confidence
body: At first I likes this app until the second day using it, it would be nice to add multiple items to the diary with a simple check box by previously enter items or even in search. This feature or lack there of will force me to continue to use MyFitnessPal.
response: Hi Ozllc, thanks for your feedback! If you're eating the same foods every day, you can create custom Meals for faster tracking. It‚Äôs easy to group foods you eat together frequently. Select Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner, or Snack, and then tap "My Meals". Select "Create a New Meal" and enter the foods you would like to group together.

title: Brain Saver
body: The easy to use calorie counter/activity tracker is awesome. I love how it counts my steps and shares the calories I‚Äôve burned. I also love that you can track your water intake, it helps me remember to drink more too. It‚Äôs been a lot of fun, new fave app!

title: iPhone daily activity
body: For some reason, a couple days ago the app stopped reading off my activity from iPhone‚Äôs Health. I didn‚Äôt change any settings before that and tried to turn on and off again some privacy settings. Nothing worked. Please help fix it!!
response: Hi! Please make sure that activity tracking is turned on in the MyPlate app. Please tap the white silhouette icon in the upper left corner of the screen. Then tap "App Preferences". Be sure that the button next to "Track My Activity" is toggled to the green on position. Please email us at support@livestrong.com for further assistance.

title: Protein goals too high?
body: Love the app but I'm confused. I weigh 115 lb and want to maintain my weight, just become more toned. The app suggests I eat 130g of protein a day but everything I read on the internet suggests 50g of protein is adequate for the average person. Why is there such a discrepancy?
response: Hi there! Please email us at support@livestrong.com so that we can explain!

title: The got to app for this personal trainer!
body: Easy to use and extremely helpful. As a private contract personal trainer, every first session involves introducing and recommending this app. The go to app for easy macro and calorie counting, water consumption, and exercise tracking.

user_name: happybut piss at the same time
title: Like it
body: Very easy to use but it could be even better if it could track restaurants in my city like that it would be way better for me to know how much calories i can track through the regular places i go

title: Great Tool!
body: I have had great success using this app. It has everything I need to track my foods and exercise and support from other participants with similar goals. Highly recommend!
response: Hi there! Thank you so much for your review. We're glad MyPlate has been helpful.

title: So far so awesome
body: The is app has made it so easy to create the meals that I eat, give me an actual calorie and serving amount and chart my progress with ease.  Best part I have to say is I‚Äôm not even on the ‚Äúgold‚Äù whatsoever.
response: Hi there! We appreciate you leaving a review. We're glad you are enjoying the MyPlate app.

title: Loving it so far free to use
body: I normally don‚Äôt leave reviews but I am genuinely impressed with this app because it‚Äôs extremely useful and completely free which I have been looking for, for a while.
response: Hi there! Thank you for your review. We're so happy to hear you like the app.

title: Limited recognition of products
body: I downloaded the app and 80 percent of the items that I have tried to scan in of items that I use or plan on using to get them into ‚Äúmy meals‚Äù or ‚Äúmy foods‚Äù, the scanner does not recognize the bar codes. These are health food items I have purchased from Sam‚Äôs club such as purified water, carrots, eggs and cheese not even the bread. It recognized the bacon.. very frustrating and too time consuming for me!
response: Hi talyqu! Thank you for taking the time to leave a review and feedback. MyPlate uses a comprehensive third-party food database, which is a collection of listings from the USDA and some food manufacturers. Unfortunately, we're not able to add or remove items from this database as it is managed by Nutritionix. If the item you'd like to track is not in our database, we recommend creating a custom food entry in the app.  If you have any questions, we're happy to help. Please reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Very functional
body: I like that the app is clean straight forward and customizable. It tracks everything I need and is free. I may consider upgrading. I don‚Äôt feel I need to upgrade only want to.
response: Hi there! Thanks for the review. We're happy to hear you've found the app user friendly.

title: Great for accountability
body: Great tool for staying on top of you goals and meeting your needs. It also passively tracks your caloric burn with an Apple Watch. If you‚Äôre honest about the info you put in you‚Äôll see FANTASTIC results.
response: Hi Kevhenny! Thank you for your feedback! We‚Äôre glad you are enjoying MyPlate. We're constantly looking for new ways to improve our site and apps, and we love getting feedback as it helps guide our process moving forward.

title: Good but can improve
body: I enjoy this app but I drink a lot of smoothies and with there was a combine button instead of having to add everything up individually and putting it into create. But other then that everything else is super easy.
response: Hi there! Thanks for the review. If there are combinations you eat frequently you may want to make them into Custom Meals. If you have any questions feel free to reach out to us at support@livestrong.com

title: Scan Barcode option doesn‚Äôt work
body: I like the app and it does help me keep track of my calories but the scan barcode option which would really help does not work. It scans the barcode and then never loads anything and it‚Äôs sort of frustrating.

title: Amazing
body: This app has been my saving grace. Although I‚Äôm not down 10 pounds it‚Äôs only been around two weeks. It‚Äôs helps to visualize and what you guys are doing with changing lives. Thank you!
response: Thank you for the wonderful review! We're thrilled that MyPlate is helping you. Keep up the great work!

title: Great App, one suggestion
body: Really good food tracker with an easy to use interface. My only request is an option to track net carbs. I do keto and would love to be able to back fiber out of my carb could.
response: Thank you for your review! We'd love to add a net carbs feature. Stay tuned :)

title: Recipes That Don‚Äôt Measure Up
body: I really like the app and the recipes are great. But I‚Äôm wondering why many of the recipes call for 1/5 of a tablespoon of an item such as vegan mayo. This particular recipe is for tofu ‚Äúegg‚Äù salad. 1/5 T for 7 oz of tofu can‚Äôt be right.  A 1/5 T measurement is not even a standard measurement. Is there an error?
response: Hi there! We'd love to check on this for you. Can you please send us an email at support@livestrong.com with these details? Thank you!

title: Too slow
body: Last update for this app made it really slow. It used to be fast and now I am not really enjoying it as much as it takes more time to input food items. I have used this app for years and I am seriously considering to drop it and find another app.

title: Was excited about this app

This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Great, easy to use interface and food search
body: My Plate is perfect for tracking calories & your macro nutrients (fat, protein, carbs). Easy to use interface & search make this a great tool for weight loss and self-maintenance.

title: Apple Health Link Issues
body: MyPlate is great to keep track of meals and weight. However, somewhere along the last couple of months the link with Apple‚Äôs Health app went wrong. Steps are automatically sent to MyPlate, but the weight no longer goes from MyPlate to Health. Additionally, three years of weight history were zapped.

title: Awesome app for logging calories
body: Pros:

title: Great, probably the best of the ones I‚Äôve tried
body: Easy to use, nice design, everything you need - almost: would be great if I could add a status like ‚Äúpregnant‚Äù or ‚Äúbreastfeeding‚Äù, so the calorie count would adjust accordingly. Also, I‚Äôm missing the morning snack, but no biggie! Love this app.
response: Thanks for the feedback! We're glad you're enjoying MyPlate!

title: Not working properly
body: I just downloaded it last night. Filled in everything, breakfast, lunch, dinner, snack, exercise and water. When I get out the app and go back into it breakfast and snack were gone like I didn‚Äôt even do it. So did it again this morning and the same thing happened.
response: Sorry to hear about the difficulty tracking caused by this glitch! While we work on finding the solution, we'd like you to try one more thing:

title: Great App
body: Easy to find the food you eat and add to you daily tracking. Love the support and exercise in the app and via email. All-around great app for tracking you weight goals, food, and exercise.

title: Easy to track Keto diet.
body: I‚Äôve had the app for 2-3yrs using it on and off for calorie tracking but now using it to help manage my Keto diet it‚Äôs been a real big help and makes it easy to track carbs, fats and proteins.

title: Not as detailed as I wanted.....
body: Payed for the 6 months and regret it. My Fitness Pal is so much better. I wanted to try a new app and it is ok and I‚Äôm sure will be great for some people. I want to know the calcium and iron in my diet. Many don‚Äôt care, but I do for medical reasons. So back to My Fitness Pal. It was fun trying something new. I just shouldn‚Äôt have paid for goal membership as it offers so little.

title: Love it!
body: I absolute love this app. I was using multiple apps prior to this but someone recommended this app and I ended up deleting all the other apps. This one not only lets me scan my meals but it tracks my water intake!

title: Easy to Use
body: Love this App!  So easy to use! Easy to add, change, modify all foods, recipes, exercises and personal information. Graphs and charts are great visuals too! Ridiculous, but look forward to putting in my data.

title: Love this app!
body: Makes tracking my dieting and exercise a lot easier! I love how it‚Äôs so easy to use! Very helpful to those who are having trouble keeping track of everything.

title: Perfect!
body: I have an Apple iPhone and it syncs with my health app and adds my steps in for exercise automatically. Has work outs and you can scan the food‚Äôs barcode to see the calories!

title: Issues
body: Love the app except when I put in exercise, it put it in twice.  I cannot find a way to delete one of them.  The app would get 5 stars if there was a way to delete exercise activity or just not put it in twice.
response: Hi NanaRaeto3! To edit or delete a tracked exercise, please scroll down the main page of the app, tap on the exercise you've mistakenly entered. The option to edit or delete that tracked item will appear. If you need to do this for another day, just tap on the calendar first and choose the day that needs to be altered, then follow the same directions.

title: Amazing!!!
body: This app is so helpful!! I love that I can scan food, it makes everything easier. Since my husband, my son, and I have started using this app, I‚Äôve lost 16lbs, my husband-8, and my son 7. Thank you!!!

title: Keeps resetting logins
body: When this app works it is great.
response: Hi plaaindxh, please email us at support@livestrong.com for assistance with this!

title: Quick Results
body: Ok, no long motivational speech so, to some it up I was 5‚Äô3‚Äù 123 but after almost a month I am now 118. There is a very noticeable difference in my physique as well. Just count your calories and do a little cardio. Great app :)

title: Pretty good!
body: I really enjoy the ease of usimg it. It omly takes a moment to put imfo in.
response: Hey Mary the Scott! Thanks for your feedback! We've been considering adding some features along the lines of notes and measurements. Hope to deliver them to you soon!

title: Nice way to keep on track
body: Need to improve on their food directory as in more quick food options to log.. but luckily it can be logged in manually.. other then that no complaints. It‚Äôs very simple and easy to use..

title: Amazing app!
body: This app is easy to use and has so many features it makes it easy to record what you‚Äôve eaten, not to mention the expansive database of foods. I wish I‚Äôd found you sooner. Thank you!
response: Hi there! We appreciate you taking the time to leave a review. We're glad you are enjoying the app.

title: CHECKList
body: Love the update where I can move an item from breakfast to dinner. Thank you. But may we now have a feature where we can move more than one item at a time. Like a checklist?

title: Great improvements
body: I use this app everyday to tell me the cold hard truth! The updates make for easy use of this app. I can easily change which meal I ate certain foods in, for example. I love the Dr. Rhonda Patrick interview‚Äîshe‚Äôs my favorite scientist!

title: Amazing!!
body: I have just started and I am already losing weight! It tells you smart meals to eat in order for you to get to your weight loss/gain goal and also shows workouts!! 5 stars ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Amazing!
body: I recently started a 21 day Herbalife challenge and really needed to keep track of my intake and burn off. This app is so helpful! I‚Äôm able to enter what food I am eating and it tells me about how much protein I am getting!

title: I like it
body: I like how it has all carbs and protein. They need to fix scan . Maybe add a beverage. When it‚Äôs a zero calorie item you can‚Äôt put it in.

title: Loosing weight
body: This app is incredible...! I absolutely love it.
response: Hi healthyforever! Thank you for leaving a review. We're happy to hear you are loving MyPlate.

title: My plate is a super Pro app, but also simple for begginers
body: I love the Pro System of tracking the food, the variety of recipes and how the graphics make look simple the whole calculation process. Have fun and rise your GOALS!
response: Hi andymerlo! Thank you for your feedback. We‚Äôre glad you are enjoying MyPlate. We're constantly looking for new ways to improve our app, and we love getting feedback as it helps guide our process moving forward.

title: Easy to use
body: Keeping track of daily calories is easy with this app, and it gives you the ability to log portions in multiples of 1/4 to 1 and more. It does the math.

title: So far so good!
body: The only thing I would change is being able to add different drinks as well. Because different drinks have sugars, etc.
response: Hi DeWashington! Thanks for reaching out. You can create custom foods/drinks within the app. Select the meal you'd like to track the custom food to (Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner, or Snack), tap "My Food", and select "Create New Food" to create a custom food item.  Enter the specifics of the food, and tap "Done" in the upper right corner. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out at support@livestrong.com.

title: Needs some fixes
body: Not a terrible app but it is hard to find some items by searching a lot of the time, and MANY items do not match up with what their actual labels say nutrition-wise. Often overstates calories etc. This is good for basic tracking but it is very limiting
response: Thank you for your feedback! The discrepancies are occurring because of new mandatory dietary guidelines from the FDA, in particular changes around nutrition labels.

title: Life changing..
body: Learned so much and the advice,nutrition, and everything it tells you is just great facts if you want to lose weight or gain even maintain your weight this is a great app. Simple and easy to use.

title: Best Tracking App I've used
body: The calorie tracker has a large library of popular foods & brands. The exercise tracker has more options than other apps I've tried.
response: Thank you for the review and feedback, Nana Tet! Currently the MyPlate app can sync with Apple's Healthkit app and can import any tracking information from devices you've synced to that app already.

title: Where‚Äôs the expected weight loss information?
body: The desktop version has a daily calorie section and one line that‚Äôs motivational: ‚ÄúAt this rate you‚Äôll lose (number of pounds) in X weeks.‚Äù That would be helpful on this app.

title: Quite good
body: This macro and calorie counter has helped me maintain the amount calories needed to build muscle since I have downloaded it. However, recently for some reason I can‚Äôt find foods that I want to add and am only able to add foods that I have eaten before. Please fix this or help me figure out why this is the case.
response: Hello Andrew! We are so sorry you faced this issue. We have been experiencing some technical difficulties on our servers. The team has been working hard to get it back up. Thanks so much for your patience. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Not Loading
body: I‚Äôve been using the free version for just under two weeks and everything‚Äòs been great, up until yesterday, when the app seemed stop working. I can‚Äôt search for a new foods anymore to track my eating, every time I searched a meal it says ‚Äúno results found‚Äù.
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage at our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Helpful food tracking, frustrating exercise tracking
body: I‚Äôve enjoyed learning more about nutrition with this app and how to reach my goals. The exercise tracking does not currently have the option to delete an exercise if added or make modifications to it.
response: Hello!  To edit or delete a tracked exercise, please scroll down the main page of the app, tap on the exercise you've mistakenly entered. The option to edit or delete that tracked item will appear. If you need to do this for another day, just tap on the calendar first and choose the day that needs to be altered, then follow the same directions. Please email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions.

title: Very helpful
body: This app make it easy for me to track my calories and there are so many options to choose from to help you lose weight!

title: Love this app!
body: I love this app. It helps me stay on track to a healthier lifestyle. I love that you can customize your calories and macros. It‚Äôs very easy to use and you can even create your own foods if they are not in the preexisting foods.

title: Not Accurate
body: Been using this app for two days. Thought it would be something worthwhile. The biggest problem is the inaccuracy of the info (listed) for certain foods. I compare the info to the actual label and notice both don‚Äôt match up. I‚Äôm not too keen about using an app that gives me inaccurate readings. Will be deleting after my review.
response: Thanks for giving MyPlate a shot! Sorry to hear about the frustration from inaccurate nutritional info on food in our database. Formulas and recipes of foods are subject to changes, and a lot of changes happen before we have time to make corrections in our database! Creating custom foods and meals can help to alleviate this issue while we work on updating our database. Thanks for the review, and thanks again for trying MyPlate!

title: Redesign Removes Feature
body: Before this app was updated, you could see total calories as you changed serving sizes. Now if you select, say 1 3/4 servings, you have to navigate away to see the number of calories...not ideal when an app sacrifices a function for the sake of a different interface.
response: Thanks for trying the update, and thanks for the review! With certain screen sizes, the window that rises from the bottom when editing foods will cover the bottom half of the screen. You can scroll and bring the calorie count into view by sliding up or down on the top half of the screen. Hopefully this was coherent, but if you have any other questions or concerns regarding the app, feel free to send us a message at support@livestrong.com !

title: I love it!
body: Lots of food options to choose from. The app hels me to record my eating habit which allows me to control my daily calorie intake.

title: Well done

title: Love it!
body: Very good app to track macros. Super easy to use and since it scans the barcodes of foods to pull up the information you can be very precise with servings. I only use the macro-tracking feature but absolutely love it.

title: Good but not great
body: I am currently using this app and i love it but when i signed up for gold membership it said 3.75 a month not you pay upfront the whole year. Really took me by surprise when i all the sudden didn't have enough money to buy my son formula. Would really work on being clear.

title: Does it work to gain muscle not lose fat
body: Hi am 155 pounds I want to increase my weight to 200 pounds of muscle . the app says it can help me gain weight but I'm not looking to gain fat I'm looking in muscle . I'm worried that if I use it i am gonna end up  gaining fat and not muscle.(plz Respond

title: Easy

response: Hi there! Thank you for your review. We're so glad to hear you are enjoying the app.

title: Great Resource.

title: Progress Tracker
body: Love the app. Have been a MyPlate user for years, but I‚Äôm not a fan of the new progress tracking. Looking at averages is not what I need to see, especially on weight tracking. It would be nice to see progress tracked like it was previously.
response: Thanks for your review and feedback. We‚Äôve just released an update to the app addressing these concerns. Please update to version 5.31.0. If you still have questions or concerns, please send us an email at¬†support@livestrong.com.

title: Good app
body: I like this app as I have tried others as well. I wish this one would allow to write your own recipes in the system and they could give you the break down of the nutritional values as other apps do.
response: Hi Chefnickgunn! Thanks for the review and feedback. We are working on bringing a custom Recipe function to the app and hope to include this in a future update.

title: Almost perfect
body: I like to mix and match some foods and they don‚Äôt always have it. Also a list of what you had would be good to instead of having to click into breakfast, lunch, etc. othe than that it‚Äôs good! On my way to gaining weight üí™üèæ
response: Hi MrEditz! Thank you for contacting us! We very much appreciate your feedback and I have passed along your comments to our product development team.  As we are always adding new content and features to the site and app, we love getting feedback as it helps guide our designs and tools moving forward.

title: Easy
body: I like how extensive of a food list plus restaurant foods. Easy to add new foods or meals as well. Easy to track activities and calories burned by each activity or by steps using the smartphone. Thank you.

title: Buggy
body: Love the app but settings reset themselves constantly. Motion tracking gets turned off very often. But more annoying was my goal was switched from lose weight to maintain weight. I blew past my calorie goal without realizing it thinking I had plenty of calories to spare.

title: Fitbit Compatibility
body: Hello! I started using this app and I had just gotten a new Fitbit for Black Friday sales. Once I started using it, I realized that it didn‚Äôt connect with the Fitbit app. If it‚Äôs possible, can you all add some sort of functionality with the Fitbit app? If so, that would be great.

title: only one thing !
body: i absolutely love this app! it's so simple and easy to understand, and the simplicity of it is what makes me actually want to continue to track my food ! the oooonly thing i wish i could do is connect it with my fitbit so i wouldnt have to manually enter my daily excercizes , although it does track iphone steps which is nice! but unfortunately i dont run with my phone so it wont track those. but otherwise this app is perfect!üíõ

title: Down 25
body: Awesome app. Has helped me a lot. Just make sure you are honest about your tracking. Always guess high if your not sure about the calories and serving size. Halfway to my goal.

title: Best app
body: I‚Äôve used a lot of calorie counting apps and this one is by far the best! It gives you nice reminders without being too pushy and it‚Äôs so easy to use and it‚Äôs helped so much with weight loss

title: Amazing App
body: I have started using this app not too long ago, I have definitely started seeing results. I recommend this app to anyone trying to lose or gain weight.

title: Great app!
body: i was told by my mom that i needed to start watching calories to gain weight since i‚Äôm like a stick. it‚Äôs honestly the easiest app i‚Äôve used and you don‚Äôt have to pay so win=win.
response: Hi there! Thanks for the review. We're glad you like MyPlate.

title: Decent app, tracking could be a lot easier
body: I‚Äôve been using the YAZIO app for a few weeks and wanted to see what other apps were offering. In YAZIO I have the option to enter the weight in grams of each of my foods. This is much more accurate and easier to do than try to take the serving amount and add or subtract fractions like MyPlate wants you to do.
response: Hi there! Thank you for the review and feedback. Our team is aware of an issue with grams and other measurement units not being displayed as a serving size option. The team is working on a fix for this issue. If you have any questions please reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Sudden change? No longer counts calories!?
body: I opened the app, plugging in breakfast when I saw 0 calories burned. I thought that was odd, because my partner was having trouble with it yesterday. I looked and it seems now you need gold just for the app to use the health app and count calories burned. Honestly, its just disappointing. Already thinking of switching.
response: Hey there! It is still completely free to sync MyPlate with Apple Health and track your calories burned. Please send us an email at support@livestrong.com if you're having trouble with this.

title: Great app but UI redesign made some things worse in the latest version
body: This is a great app I'm using for tracking my calorie and macronutrient intake.
response: Glad to hear you're enjoying the app! Thank you for voicing your concern regarding the UI changes. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will help us provide an improved tracking experience to our users. Thank you again for your review!

title: Does the job
body: All I use is the calorie tracker but there‚Äôs some other features that I‚Äôm sure if I knew more about macronutrients and other things would be pretty gnarly
response: Hi PoeticKetchup! Thank you for taking the time to give us a review. We're happy to hear you are liking MyPlate.

title: Wonderful app.
body: This app has been amazing!  With this app I have been able to get closer to my goal weight. I am losing the last 10 extra lbs that I wanted!  114 now going to lose more!!
response: Hi there! Thank you for your feedback. We‚Äôre glad you are enjoying MyPlate and happy to be a part of your continued success.

title: 20 lbs... gone!
body: Easy tracking allows me to choose what I want to eat and how much exercise I need to loose weight. I tried so many things prior to this and this worked. The best thing, it‚Äôs soooo easy!

title: Great app for losing weight

response: Hi RABfan! We're glad you are enjoying the app. Unfortunately, at this time, FitBit integration is not an available feature. Currently the MyPlate app can sync with Apple's Health app. If you have your FitBit synced to the Health app your activity can be logged that way.

title: Good app

response: Hello and thank you for your review! You can view progress past 1 year by logging into your account on our website at www.livestrong.com/myplate. Please email us at support@livestrong.co with any questions!

title: Awesome app!
body: Easy to use, straight forward, and has almost everything on there when you scan the barcode.

title: Love
body: My Dr suggested I lose weight.  She said find an app and just track what you eat.....no diets.

title: Love it!
body: I love the app. Just wish it can be more athlete friendly also and add crossfit as a workout option when you plug in your exercise in the search bar

title: Great app!
body: This is a great app to check up and ensure that you‚Äôre eating correctly and works well with intermittent fast. One or two glitches, but not enough to make me regret using it every day.

title: Impressed
body: This app has a very extensive data of packaged and fresh food which includes how much protein, fat and carbs are in each serving. It's easy to track and see on a chart, exactly what goes in my belly.

title: In love with the app
body: I would suggest an alarm for snack as well or make it so we can add more alarms to be reminded to eat. I have to eat 5 times a day to gain the weight I want. Other than that I LOVE THE APP! Downloaded it about an hour ago.
response: Hi Kotalove! Thanks for your feedback! Will definitely pass this along to the team!

title: Get App
body: My plate is a great app I love scanning the things I eat and I can change the portions it helped me realize how much you should eat in one day and how it connected to my iPhone activity it‚Äôs been wonderful

title: Great , easy, and to the point

title: Needs greater Sync Opportunities

The cost of upgrading a watch and a phone annually is just out of reach for most active people hat would prefer to rake fitness classes, go to the gym or simply enjoy their dollars elsewhere.

title: Another updated is needed!!!!!
body: The app keeps freezing up. For example, when I click to enter a meal nothing happens. I have to close the app and reopen. Very frustrating!!!! This has been happening since the previous update (before the one from 2 days ago).
response: Hi there, we're so sorry for this frustration! Our team is working on a fix for this and hopes to have it resolved soon. In the meantime, we very much appreciate your patience. Please email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions.

title: Last update broke scanner
body: Great app to track food but most recent update broke scanning function. Often, the scanner is unable to read a barcode and/or it takes a lot of wiggling until the app does a successful scan. Before the update, scanning was very fast.

title: Good app but one major problem
body: Every day at least 10 times a day my app randomly will log me out. I have to re-log in and then sometimes it has deleted things I ate or my exercises. It will even wipe past days you have logged sometimes. Fix this issue livestrong. I‚Äôm a few errors away from switching to my fitness pal
response: Hi Mitch, we're so sorry for the frustration. Our team is working hard on a fix for this and we hope to have this resolved soon. Thank you for your patience.

title: Easy to use
body: I like the app. I use it to double track with Weight Watchers. I'm at a slow down, which is common when you lose a lot of weight but I want to make sure I'm not overeating. This app is helping me figure things out.

title: Amazing app
body: Amazing app well organized love it the first time I used MyPlate to arrange my eating habits was 8 years ago
response: Hi there! Thanks for the review. We're glad you like the app.

title: Changing daily calorie intake
body: I‚Äôve started using this app but I must have entered the wrong daily calorie intake. It needs to be 500 calories less  please please tell me how to change it.
response: Hi there! Thanks for the review. To adjust your calorie goal:

title: Just as good as NOOM but no cost

response: We're so glad to hear you're finding success with MyPlate. Feel free to reach out to us at support@livestrong.com with any questions about our Gold membership.

title: Love it
body: I love this app! It makes tracking everything really easy, and seeing the profiles of how much fat carbs and protein you have eaten is really helpful! I paid for premium and I don't regret it
response: Hi Zoosk2! Thank you for that glowing review. We're glad you are finding MyPlate so useful.

response: Hi there! Thanks for the review and feedback. We're glad you are enjoying the app. You're welcome to, and we encourage you to, make any substitutions or additions you feel necessary to meet your needs. If you have any additional questions or suggestions, feel free to reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: I truly like this app!
body: I truly like this app!! It makes it easy to track your food and retrieve your burned calories, so that you have a better control of your status.
response: Hi there! Thank you for your feedback. We‚Äôre glad you are enjoying MyPlate. We're constantly looking for new ways to improve our app, and we love getting feedback as it helps guide our process moving forward.

title: Great app for tracking food
body: Only been using this app for a couple days but so far it does everything I need it to and more. I just have the free version for now. It‚Äôs great.

title: Great
body: Something that has been hard for me is when I need to log a food and it‚Äôs not there. That‚Äôs been hard to guess or just look up things but it has slowly helped me become more healthy!
response: Hi Dewey! MyPlate uses a comprehensive third-party food database, which is a collection of listings from the USDA and some food manufacturers. Unfortunately, we're not able to add or remove items from this database as it is managed by Nutritionix. If the item you'd like to track is not in our database, we recommend creating a custom food entry in the app.

title: Does not work!
body: I would love to use this app.  It every time I want to add some calories like a banana or something, first off it takes like 3 minutes just to process that I‚Äôm adding something. Then, it doesn‚Äôt even add, it just spits out an error saying either timed out or it was in the wrong format. What do you mean wrong format? I‚Äôm just adding it the way the app tells me too. Seriously what the heck here?
response: Hi there! We'd love to help you with this issue. Please send us an email at support@livestrong.com so we can get some more details and assist you.

title: Just Amazing
body: This app helps me so much to control what I eat. Something you will think that some things have so much cal but then with this appüò±üò±

title: Bugs
body: It has been having tons of bugs lately, as in it won‚Äôt let me delete anything in the ‚Äúmy meals‚Äù section which is getting really frustrating. And not letting me create lots of stuff in the my meals also. I really hope this gets fixed soon
response: Hello! We're so sorry for the frustration. We'd love to help you resolve these issues. Please email us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Keto friendly!
body: I love this app for keto. Easy to monitor carb and protein levels, plus monitor weight progress. I love ability to scan in food versus looking up. Made the process so much easier for me!! Thank you!!

title: Keeps me informed
body: You‚Äôd be surprised how quickly nutrition can get away from you. This app helps me keep track of my intake. I just had jaw surgery and this app has been irreplaceable in my nutrition attempts. Love it!!!

title: Easy and quick to use
body: Has many cool features but still user friendly and well organized app

title: Difficult to edit food name
body: The cursor keeps getting moved to the front whenever I try to edit the food name. I try to add a word or anything to the front of the name and every letter it moves the cursor to the front. It‚Äôs frustrating. Do your input validation on submittal not while I‚Äôm typing. Get a better UI dev.

title: Loosing
body: I started using the app a week ago. I‚Äôve lost 3 pounds in one week. I‚Äôve joined other programs and paid for them. I find this just as easy and it has reminders.

title: So easy and effective
body: I love it! They made it super simple to use and although I get what I need with the free version, I can totally see the value in the paid version! Well thought out & executed!

title: So Easy!
body: I use this App everyday - it keeps me at the weight I want.  It keeps track of my calories burned and if I‚Äôm eating too many carbs.  It is an easy habit to start to keep yourself on track.

title: Simply it‚Äôs a great app
body: I have been using this apps since January 2019. During this time apps help me to reduce 25lb weight. Thanks to Developers. I would like to request to add some common foods which use in sub continent like Bangladesh, India

title: Almost perfect
body: Exactly what I was looking for. Simple and easy to you. Love the interface. Only thing that would make it perfect is if there was an intermittent fasting option.

title: Avoid the community section
body: People in the community section provide bad advice and will tell you not to use the app to track what you are eating (it‚Äôs intended purpose). These people act like nutrition professionals but they have no qualifications to provide nutritional advice. If you listen to them you will most likely put on more weight rather than lose weight. Track what you are eating for success.
response: Hi there! We're so sorry you've had this experience. We'd like to investigate this for you and take the appropriate action. Please email us at support@livestrong.com. Thank you!

title: What it needs!!!
body: This is a great app. I feel like I'm loosing weight but it needs to have different types of exercises like benching and squat!! It would be great to have all the exercises and the calories that I burn. I don't know how many calories I burn for every exercise I do.

title: Will not track my steps

title: Healthy, Motivational App
body: This app allows me to get just what I want. Lots of food information, workout ideas, motivational wallpapers, a community and so much more. Only issue I have is it‚Äôs kinda slow with downloads, but that‚Äôs my only complaint.

title: Calorie count inaccurate
body: I really loved the look and ease of this app until I realized that many of my calorie counts were inaccurate. Even with scanning the barcode on products this app was bringing up inaccurate information. Very disappointed & hope they can get that fixed.

title: Great App But...
body: I love this app. But I have to log in every time I open the app or even check a text mid entry. It doesn‚Äôt allow me to save my password and won‚Äôt log me in through Facebook. I have a bran new phone which is fully updated so I really don‚Äôt understand this. It‚Äôs really inconvenient.
response: Hi Alicia, can you please email us at support@livestrong.com so that we can check on this for you? Thanks!

title: Good start but needs some basics
body: Ability to edit a serving size to something different than the packages default serving size in nutritional values on packaging.

title: Not Finding New Food
body: I‚Äôve been using MyPlate to track my calorie intake for a few weeks now, and before today, I would‚Äôve given it 5 stars. Today, I tried searching for a food that I haven‚Äôt tracked yet and it only searches through the recently tracked list! I‚Äôve tried force quitting, restarting the phone, searching for other things, etc.... This makes this app totally unusable!
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage at our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Informative app
body: I went through three different apps to find the one that would show me macros. None of them showed what I wanted, until I got this one loaded up. Great app.
response: Hi there! Thank you for leaving a review. We're happy to hear you like the app.

title: Best free version Ive found
body: This app has the most extensive free version I personally have found without having to upgrade. Its super easy to use and super informative, I love the barcode scanner
response: Hi there! Thank you for leaving a review. We're pleased to hear you are enjoying the app.

title: Nearly impossible to cancel your subscription
body: You have to lookup how to cancel (which is different by payment method) and then email their support email address. There is no way to cancel within the app or online.
response: Hi there! Thanks for the review and feedback. Subscriptions purchased through the App Store are managed and billed by Apple. Because of this you need to contact Apple for cancellations and refunds. If you have questions regarding Gold subscriptions purchased elsewhere, we're more than happy to help. Please reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: I wish this app could have an update to found calcium.
body: I love this app very much, but one thing that would be a great update is the calcium. I would love it this could count my calcium to know how much calcium I get a day.
response: Hi there! Our Gold membership allows you to count a number of vitamins and minerals, including calcium! Please send us an email at support@livestrong.com if you have any questions.

title: Awesome for macros
body: Going for low carb and this is incredibly helpful. The barcode scanner is useful, and overall it‚Äôs easy and actually addictive to track food. It‚Äôs an eye opener and puts into perspective your eating habits.

title: Great app except for search
body: Been using it for years and it does keep getting better.  PROS: huge database of foods; pleasant interface.  CONS: Still too slow on entering foods; search is still bad after years (they clearly don‚Äôt care).
response: Hi there! Thanks for the review. We very much appreciate your feedback and I have passed along your comments to our product development team.

title: 1200 calories or less a day and I‚Äôm already down 3lbs
body: Been using app for 5 days and keeping myself under 1200 calories has already done wonders. Already back down 3lbs !!!!

title: Good app
body: The app is great. Just one issue. It doesn‚Äôt count sugar.
response: Hi there! You can easily track your sugar intake with MyPlate. Please email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions.

title: Marvellous app
body: I‚Äôm using this app recently and it is really helpful and I‚Äôm learning every day so many recipes and I‚Äôm trying to do my best regarding workouts.
response: Hello! We'd be happy to help you change your email address. Please send us an email at support@livestrong.com and be sure to include the current email address associated with your account and the new email address you'd like associated. Thanks!

title: Disappointed
body: Was really expecting more from Live strong. I hope it‚Äôs user error but I was blown away when I ‚Äúupgraded‚Äù to gold and got about 6 macros added to view. Yes, I get to look at people taking about what they are eating and what they are doing and recipes but it would be very nice to give us more to chart our daily requirements.
response: Hi there! Your Gold membership includes advanced tracking options such as viewing macros by meal, viewing top food sources so you can see which nutrient you're eating too much or too little of, a daily nutrition chart personalized to your goals, our Clean Eating Guide and extra in-app workouts. Please send us an email at support@livestrong.com if you have any questions about your membership.

title: Easy to use
body: Great app very user friendly. Helps track everything I put into my body and makes losing weight easier.

title: Pretty good but....
body: This is a pretty good tracking app BUT for some reason the calories on my Apple Watch from working out always doubles on the app so therefore my calories are always wrong and the app is not working for me.  I can‚Äôt for the life of me figure out how to fix the issue or how to alter the calories ‚òπÔ∏è
response: Hello! Please send us an email at support@livestrong.com so that we can assist you with this!

title: Excellent
body: Easy to use. I use it every time I get serious about my eating habits. It makes a huge difference when I track my food and keep myself honest.

title: Good but could be better
body: I like this app for tracking calories but it would be nice if it would let you check off everything you ate instead of going one at a time.

title: I love this app!
body: This app is great because it not only tracking what you eat, but has workouts that you can do!!! Sometimes the app can be slow, but or else it is great!!!

title: Amazing
body: This app is amazing!! I love it, it had workouts and different recipes that look absolutely amazing (I haven‚Äôt tried any of them YET) it‚Äôs super easy to use.

title: Support tool
body: MyPlate has been a great tool helping me stay cognizant of my food choices and because it‚Äôs an app on my phone, I am certainly more active with keeping to my fitness goals.

title: Issues
body: When trying to scan my food the scanner doesn‚Äôt work it keeps saying trying to locate I have another app that scan with no problems would love for this issue be fix other than that app is good

title: Great calorie tracking app
body: My husband and I both use this app. I‚Äôve lost 30 lbs. and he‚Äôs lost 20 lbs. since we got it. This app makes watching what you eat easy. So glad I gave it a try!

title: I love this app!
body: I honestly downloaded 19 apps today to get a feel for them and see what would work best for me. I love this app! So easy to use and I really like that it links to my Apple Watch effortlessly.

title: My Plate Great App
body: My plate is so easy to use and educational at the same time.

title: Great app
body: As I‚Äôam fairly new to counting calories and dieting this app has made it incredibly easy for me to track any of my meals and snacks. Since I‚Äôve began to use the app and a nice mix of exercise I‚Äôm currently down 11 pounds.

title: Must use!
body: I found out the hard way that I have to continue to use this...when I try on my own I gain weight, as I am guesstimating and not doing a very good job, or a very objective one!

title: Perfect
body: I have tried to track my food intake for fitness and to manage my j-pouch (UC).  I always ended up losing track of my notes.  This app is convenient and easy to use. Thank you!

title: Tech issues
body: I cannot believe this app was rated 4.5. I‚Äôve had issues with exercise tracking where if you look at exercise it adds it in and the calories burned is way too generous. It adds the calories burned to available calories for the day which will not help to keep track of what‚Äôs truly available.

title: Pretty solid diet tracker.

body: The app is very easy is to use, input and navigate. So far the best calorie counter I have used to date. If the app continues to work well without a fubar update I will definitely purchase it in the near future

title: Overly busy
body: Great app, but the UI is far too busy and contains a lot of unnecessary extras that I find annoying. I would pay for the ability to completely remove the recipe section and user community. Just give me the food diary and macro tracking functionality and I‚Äôd be extremely happy with the tool and sing your praises to everyone at the gym.
response: Hi there! Thank you for the review and feedback. I have passed your comments to our Product Team. If you have any questions regarding the app, or additional feedback you would like to provide, please reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Helping me get across the finish line!
body: This is truly a great app. It has taken the guess work out of figuring out what percentages I‚Äôve eaten for the day as well as offering more accountability. Thank you!
response: Hi there! Thanks for the review. We're happy to be a part of your fitness journey.

title: Best Free Membership!
body: I had been looking for a calorie tracker to help manage my calorie intake daily. This takes the cake. It also syncs up to my apple watch during my daily workouts!!
response: Hi Amoret1700! Thanks for the review. We're happy to be a part of your fitness journey.

title: Great App
body: I‚Äôm on a weight loss journey but I have to limit my fat and sodium for medical reasons. My Plate does a great job of calculating all these numbers and helps me plan ahead so I can try to stay under my limits. Thanks!
response: Hi there! Thank you for leaving a review. We're pleased to hear you like the app.

title: Restore the original weight graph! Please
body: The updated version barely shows no difference! Bring back the graph with better visuals for real progress also for motivation.
response: Thanks for your review and feedback. We‚Äôve just released an update to the app addressing these concerns. Please update to version 5.31.0. If you still have questions or concerns, please send us an email at¬†support@livestrong.com.

title: Works
body: I started using this app in December of 2019, it‚Äôs now September of 2020 and with walking 10K steps or more every day and tracking my calories at 1750 per day I am down 50lbs and now weight training. It works great!
response: Hi NYSQUISHMAN! That's amazing! We‚Äôre glad you are enjoying MyPlate and happy for what you have achieved.

title: Hate New Progress View
body: I really do not like the new progress view for weight. Is it possible to be able to toggle between the two views, to have the line chart and the bar graph available? I‚Äôve been gaining such positivity from the more incremental view available in the line chart. The bar chart doesn‚Äôt show as much detail and is kind of depressing when dealing with major goals.
response: Thanks for your review and feedback. We‚Äôve just released an update to the app addressing these concerns. Please update to version 5.31.0. If you still have questions or concerns, please send us an email at¬†support@livestrong.com.

title: Newest update
body: Need a option to toggle back to the old weight chart layout.  Do not like the view relative to my goal weight.  The old chart format was much more beneficial and motivational.  Also calories do not move when adjusting serving size.  Makes it difficult to calculate.
response: Thanks for your review and feedback. We‚Äôve just released an update to the app addressing these concerns. Please update to version 5.31.0. If you still have questions or concerns, please send us an email at¬†support@livestrong.com.

title: Lost 11 lbs in one month!

title: Not for people trying to gain as much weight as possible
body: I was trying to gain a bunch of weight. My goal was 215lbs and right now I‚Äôm 170lbs. But the calorie goal won‚Äôt let me go past 5,000. This is something I hope gets changed so you can put as many calories as you want.
response: Hey there! Thanks for providing this feedback! Our team is investigating this and we hope to have a fix soon. Please send us an email at support@livestrong.com with any questions!

title: Easy to use!

title: Love this app!

title: Fitness tracking
body: Under activity diary it says iPhone daily steps calories and my Apple Watch calories. Is this double counting the calories I am burning? If so how do I turn off the iPhone daily steps because this gives an inaccurate description of the calories I am burning
response: Hello! We're sorry for the confusion! Our team is aware of the double counting and is working on a solution. In the meantime, we recommend turning off activity tracking in the MyPlate app. This will allow the app to sync only with your Apple Watch. To do this, please do the following:

title: Love this app
body: Like anything else, it works if you stick with it! On it for about a week, easy to use and is the key to helping me loose weight. My goal is to get off my medications.

title: Lousy performance
body: Search for food yields results in very odd order. I typed in ‚Äòbutter‚Äô and it listed peanut butter at the top, followed by various foods with peanuts before I scrolled down to find butter. Very few restaurant menu items, and the restaurant names get confused as food names in the search regularly. Spring the extra $5 for a premium annual subscription to my fitness pal by under armour.

title: My preferred health app

title: Great app

title: Problems Fixed

response: Thank you for the updated review, cj62480! We're so happy to hear that MyPlate has been working well for you.

title: Great App
body: I have been using the App for about two weeks. There has not been any food that I‚Äôve not been able to find. I put it to the test tonight with Ky Legend ham but it was there.

title: Definitely helpful.

title: Calorie Burner Tracker Incorrect
body: I love the app and every aspect of it except for one. One day I walked 5 miles and it said I only lost 365 calories, and then another day I walked 7.5 miles and said I only burnt 315!? There has to be a big problem with this or a bug atleast.

title: Dropped 50
body: Followed calorie recommendations Entering them in the app is motivational and when you take a few days off it‚Äôs easier to get back to it

title: Loud and obnoxious ads
body: This might be ok if it weren‚Äôt for the LOUD and obnoxious ads that play. My baby is asleep, I‚Äôm trying this out and BAM! LOUD music that I can‚Äôt figure out where it‚Äôs coming from the. I closed this crappy app and it stops. Hey, thanks for waking up the baby and for being just like all the others and shoving crappy advertisements in our faces. Greed. Always greed!

title: Great App, But...
body: Been using this app for one day. Generally, I‚Äôm digging it. Save one huge issue- when my food item needs to be manually entered, the amount I enter is changed. So I enter 2.0 grams protein, but the app saves it as .002. And i can‚Äôt figure out how to fix that. Luckily, all my barcodes have been found so far. But when I don‚Äôt have a barcode, what to do?!
response: Hi mevans24! Thank you so much for your feedback! Our team is aware of this issue with the green pop up button. We're working on a fix! In the meantime, you can create a custom food item by tapping the meal period you'd like to add to, My Food, and then Create New Food. Please email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions!

title: Maintaining is Not an Option
body: I recently downloaded the app and was disappointed to only see an option from losing or gaining weight. I was looking for a tracker that would be able to tell me that I could maintain my current image. I guess I‚Äôll have to install a different application. I understand what your target audience might be but it might be helpful to help people maintain a balanced diet as well.
response: Hello! Thank you for your review and feedback. Once your profile is created, you have the option to change your goal to maintain. To do this, just tap Account > Edit Profile > Weekly Target. Maintain my weight will be listed at the top. Please email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions!

title: Choosing between apps
body: I like the graphics of this app. It engages very well. Wish more food was already listed. My biggest draw back is that my Fitbit does not sync. I don‚Äôt carry my phone with me all the time. So I don‚Äôt capture steps.

title: Generally a good app, with minor annoyances.
body: I wanted a calorie and fitness tracker, and while the app is good with the prior, it does a poor job with the latter. For some reason, it keeps turning off the fitness tracker at midnight, which means that if I forget to turn it on the moment I wake up, it won‚Äôt track my steps.

title: YEARS of tracking data deleted
body: This app has been a bit clunky when it comes to syncing with other health apps, but overall I‚Äôve been happy with it. I‚Äôve recorded close to 8 years of weight, calorie, and exercise data. Today it updates, I log in, and discover that ALL that data is gone!!!! Talk about amateur hour!! Time to move on to a different tracking app.
response: Hello brianmg5, we're so sorry for this inconvenience. Our team is working hard on a fix for this issue and we hope to have it resolved soon. Please email us at support@livestrong.com for assistance with recovering your data.

title: Great app

title: This app is beautiful.

response: Hi ashboy96! Thanks for the review. We're happy to hear you are loving the app. Thanks for the support.

title: it prioritizes weight over health
body: this app does everything it‚Äôs supposed to do. you can easily track calories and workouts, and it recommends recipes. however, it‚Äôs extremely focused on losing weight. the chat section of the app is filled with people with extreme eating disorders talking about how they are eating less then 800 calories a day. it‚Äôs extremely triggering especially for people who are on the app to gain weight and recover from an eating disorder. i recommend they add chat sections for eating disorder recovery and weight gain. there‚Äôs no option to report posts that encourage disordered eating, and there‚Äôs no mention of body positivity. it‚Äôs entirely focused on weight instead of health.
response: Hi Kristine! I'm pleased to hear you believe the MyPlate app is easy to use and functions well. I'm sorry you did not get to fully utilize the app before providing a review. MyPlate allows you to customize it to lose, gain, or maintain weight. Additionally, there certainly is an option to report posts that encourage unhealthy methods. There is a chat thread titled "Community Concerns" made specifically for reporting such things or you can reach out to us directly at support@livestrong.com. Additionally, the community is filled with body positivity and users cheering each other on. It is important to us that we create an environment that is healthy and welcoming for our users.

title: Even does housework
body: Doesn‚Äôt correct for age but otherwise very complete data base and easy to use. Create custom meal and food features simple yet versatile. Huge exercise database which includes activities like forestry and, yes, general housekeeping.
response: Hi there! Thank you for your review and feedback. I will pass your comments to our product team. If you have any questions or additional feedback you would like to provide, please feel free to reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

response: Thanks for your review and feedback. We‚Äôve just released an update to the app addressing these concerns. Please update to version 5.31.0. If you still have questions or concerns, please send us an email at¬†support@livestrong.com.

title: I recommend the app

response: Hi Andrea_Marie05! You do not need a subscription to update your goals. In the app, tap on the person icon located in the upper left corner of the app's home screen. Then, tap your profile picture. There will be tabs that allow you to change your Calorie and Macronutrient Goals towards the bottom of the page. If you need additional assistance with this please feel free to reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Annoying

response: Hi Naurelll. Thank you for your honest feedback. We are working on cleaning up these inconsistencies and apologize for the inconvenience. We also understand the importance of tracking your weight exactly. We're working on this as well. Please don't hesitate to reach out to us at support@livestrong.com with any other questions or concerns.

title: Great app

We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Food Logging and Nutrition Issues
body: Used to be a lot easier to search food database. Doesn‚Äôt work or scan anymore. Went to log a food and can only add carbs, calories, fat, protein- what‚Äôs the point? People who understand nutrition know that there‚Äôs more to a balanced and successful diet than ‚Äòcounting carbs‚Äô. Switching to another app. Good in theory.

title: Great!
body: Found out I had exceedingly high cholesterol. I needed an app to keep track of my dietary intake so I can monitor. This app is so easy. Love that it scans bar codes on food packages. Seemlessly merges with my Apple health app.
response: Hi there! Thank you for providing that amazing review. We're happy MyPlate is such a valuable tool for you.

title: Best app for losing weight
body: I‚Äôve used this app for five years. Excellent for anyone looking to count not only calories, but all nutrients. Great app to coordinate my workouts and activities.
response: Hi there! Thank you for that awesome review. We're really happy to hear MyPlate is working so well for you.

title: MY PLATE ROCKS
body: It‚Äôs been so helpful in me reaching my fitness and nutritional goals! I use it daily. I‚Äôm happy when it gives me reminders-it helps me stay conscious of what I‚Äôm putting in my body!
response: Hi Dana! Thanks for the review. We're happy to be a part of your fitness journey.

title: Calorie Counting Highly Inaccurate
body: I tried to utilize MyPlate versus My Fitness Pal for a new experience. The system does not have a variety of foods already built into it and when I scan certain foods in the ‚Äúverified‚Äù nutritional information is inaccurate. I‚Äôve made the decision to terminate and utilize another calorie counter system.
response: Hi there! Thank you for the review and feedback. MyPlate uses a comprehensive third-party food database, which is a collection of listings from the USDA and some food manufacturers. Unfortunately, we're not able to add or remove items from this database as it is managed by Nutritionix. If the item you'd like to track is not in our database, we recommend creating a custom food entry in the app.

title: Use to be good, but they got greedy
body: I‚Äôve been using the free app for years and it has progressively gotten worse. If you pay maybe it‚Äôs worth it, but they‚Äôve really switched up the measurement tools so there‚Äôs limited visibility if you‚Äôre using the free version. More recently they‚Äôve made significant changes and I think I‚Äôm going to have to find a new tool.
response: Hi MackTwister! Thanks for the review. There have been no changes made to what measurement tools are available in the free version. If you are having trouble finding something, we're happy to help you. Please contact us at support@livestrong.com

title: Figured It Out
body: I dig this app. I was able to ask about deleting things i  their comments/community section.
response: Hello! We're so sorry that you're having trouble deleting exercises. You should be able to tap on the exercise from your activity diary and select the delete button. Please send us an email at support@livestrong.com if you have any questions!

title: Useless app

response: Hi Devinebritches! Thank you for your feedback. We are aware of an issue wherein the barcode scanner does not produce feedback to indicate that the barcode is not in the database. We are working to resolve this. MyPlate uses a comprehensive third-party food database, which is a collection of listings from the USDA and some food manufacturers. Unfortunately, we're not able to add or remove items from this database as it is managed by Nutritionix. If you have additional questions feel free to reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

Then, give your exercise a name and enter hourly calorie burn rate.

title: Great app

response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage on our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

I have tried this for 5 days.
response: Hello! We'd be happy to help you get started with the app. You can add custom exercises easily by tapping "Exercise" from the Track tab. Select ‚ÄúCustom Exercises‚Äù, and tap the ‚Äú+‚Äù symbol. Then, give your exercise a name and enter hourly calorie burn rate.

Be careful if you‚Äôre watching sodium...it says mg, but the number you‚Äôre seeing is in grams (so the percent always says zero). If it gets fixed, I‚Äôll increase my rating.

response: Thanks for your review and feedback. We‚Äôve just released an update to the app addressing these concerns. Please update to version 5.31.0. If you still have questions or concerns, please send us an email at¬†support@livestrong.com.

title: Search feature needs work
body: Very difficult and time consuming trying to find a food in the database.
response: Hi there! Thanks for reaching out. MyPlate uses a comprehensive third-party food database, which is a collection of listings from the USDA and some food manufacturers. Unfortunately, we're not able to add or remove items from this database as it is managed by Nutritionix. If the item you'd like to track is not in our database, we recommend creating a custom food entry in the app. If you have any questions regarding how to do this, or anything else, please feel free to reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Can‚Äôt set up a calorie deficit as a goal

response: HI there! For safety reasons, 1200 calories per day is the minimum caloric goal allowed by the MyPlate calculator. This is commonly considered the lowest number of calories a person can eat in a day without doctor supervision. Since most of our users do not check with a doctor before taking on such a goal, or are unable to do, we implemented this as a safety feature. Please email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions.

title: Need a nursing option
