However I work out regularly and I'm trying to lose some weight so I wanted a way of tracking it. Also if I lie about my age it then won't work right because it's not true. I appreciate that MyPlate let's me on at 17 tremendously also it awesome! This app is perfect and allows a lot for free.

title: Easy, concise, exactly what I was looking for
body: The ability to scan barcodes to add to my food diary is such a great plus. I love the ease of the main interface. You touch Lunch, you log lunch and hit done. Now you see you lunch button change color and you calorie consumption right under it. Such a intelligent way of tracking. My favorite app in this category by far.

title: Really good
body: I have used FitnessPal, Calorie Count and this app to track my food and water. This meets all my needs in regards to adding  nutrition for special foods a well as keeping track of water consumption. I wis it ha a barcode reader like FitnessPal, but I love the options to see a pie chart of the nutritional breakdown I've eaten that day as well as being able to set my daily calorie intake lower than 1200 (I was gaining weight w the other apps that didn't track lower than 1200).

title: The features need some updates
body: I love the app because when it finds my exercise or food I ate, it accurately puts it in. However, it doesn't have any weight lifting calorie counters or plyometric/HIIT calorie counters so its hard to estimate my own calorie burning. Love how you can add a food or sandwich in and refer to it later in the week if you consume it again without having to go through each and every food in that sandwich or meal. Great app, helpful tips And tools, great for anyone with a New Years weight losing resolution!

title: Good app
body: Overall like the app. A few bugs-sometimes foods you eat all the time are not listed in frequently or recently eaten. Example romaine lettuce. But foods that I had once are listed. Also on the lite version you cannot go back on previous days and check out your nutrient breakdown. Again overall I like the app and it has helped me lose weight and have a better grasp of my diet and its components. Easy to use!

title: Convenient & easy to use
body: This app really helps me keep track of my diet and exercise. Most foods are already loaded so all you have to do is sometimes adjust the serving you ate. I like the fact that this also has Livestrong verified calorie counts which makes me more confident than random people adding calorie counts and not being sure if they are accurate.

title: It used to be great!  Now it's just okay.
body: I love the fact that this app is a one stop shop for tracking food, exercise and water!!  It also boasts a huge database of food for you to search which I love!  But - it crashes, it changes the custom foods I have in there in terms if calories/fat/protein/carbs, and the custom recipes function is not used friendly. The scan function only finds my foods like a quarter of the time but I eat paleo so most of my foods don't have a label. Overall, I still use it but I don't expect much and don't rely on custom foods or recipes.

title: Good app with potential to be great
body: I've been using this app for about a month. It has been a great help in managing the calories I take in as well as to see what eating patterns I have. A few suggestions - it would be nice to be able to convert 'manual' foods into custom foods. I would also like a more flexible exercise section to put in exercise intensity. As states in other reviews, is like the option to omit exercise calorie burn from my total intake.

title: Great App!
body: I've been using this App for two years. It helped me lose 32 pounds when I first started two years ago. Now, it helps me maintain my weight, and when things get a little wonky, like right after the holidays, it helps me get back on track eating the way I should. It's easy to use, and almost all the food I've needed to list has been found!

title: Great, but needs tweaks
body: I think it's a great app, more and more foods are added which makes it more attractive for use. Couple improvements I'd like to see: for notifications, I like them, but it's frustrating to keep getting "track your breakfast" etc. several times after I've already done so. Secondly, motion sensors are getting better for running, but could use fine tuning :) thanks and keep up the good work!

title: Great except "community"
body: This ap is great for tracking! It's EZ, fast & accurate. But the "community" is full of negative know it alls who will blatantly post put-downs as an answer to your question. Only about half the people are actually supportive. The rest act like their the sh!t. The worst part is there is no way to block these posters. If that was possible I'd give it a 5 star! Beware people, there's plenty of novice haters in the "community!" Thumbs down to their social support!

title: Great Tracker
body: I'm a personal trainer and I recommend this app to my clients all the time to help them keep track of their daily nutrition.  It keeps them accountable and also helps me see what their eating on a day to day basis without making things overly complicated. Only thing that I wished this app had is a feature for my clients to message their daily intake to me without having to screenshot it. Otherwise great and easy to use app.

title: Awesome - much easier than expected!
body: This is exactly what I was looking for.  Every fitness guru will tell you how important it is to write down what you eat, but it feels like such a hassle.  Now we have no excuse -- a cell phone is always at the table! Counts the calories for you... really always you to see where you are struggling in your daily diet. Love and recommend this app!

title: Best App for keeping in track.
body: This is the best app for me because I've been loosing weight since I've started two weeks ago. Even if I don't exercise like I used to. Turns out I'm just having mindless snacking. This apps made me aware of that and helps me plan my food in a day so that I won't over eat.i It is very easy to use. and I have lost at least 5 lbs. since I've started.

title: Best calorie counting app!!!!!!
body: I've tried this app and the Calorie Counter app and this one is far better! It has a clean simple fun design and great features like progress and achievements and a scanner for foods. It knows the nutrition for every food I eat and it shows a pie chart of each thing for its protein, carbs, and fat so I'm learning about what I eat too! This really helps me keep motivated, thanks livestrong!

title: Love so far! However...
body: UPDATE!! (14 March '14)

title: Excellent
body: Even with mentioned limitations by other users, as a web developer, I'm astounded by its simplicity and beautiful clean interface. It's an excellent app for its maturity stage! Once I got it, I intuitively knew what to do. And I immediately felt like I had found the best approach for me to count daily calorie intake without having to write it down a piece of paper. Fun to use, makes you want to use it!

title: Used to be awesome... Not anymore
body: I have used this app for six months. I've been very happy with the tracking that I can do with this application. About two months ago it begin to freeze up and I would have to reboot my iPad to get the app to work. Today the app froze and I lost six months worth of data. It did keep my profile information but food custom food menus and past records are gone. At the end of the day today I reentered on my daily information it froze and I lost today's information. This app is a goner, sorry to say.

title: Recommend to all my patients
body: App is flawless and easy to use without prior instructions.  I am an internist and recommend calorie tracking to all of my overweight patients who struggle or give up out of frustration if they can't lose weight with just good intention to simply eat less. Put some numbers to it!  Guaranteed to work!  Engineers and accountants love this sort of thing.

title: Best all encompassing health app
body: It tracks exercise and calories, pairs with apps and data from your phone. So when I go for a walk or jog I don't even need to enter it... It's automatic. The calorie counter is easy and clean and pretty... But it tracks so much more and gives me info to see when and how I'm eating more carbs, fats, proteins.. It breaks it down into visually appealing graphs. It's a great tool for a healthy life.

title: Fantastic app, two issues
body: Love this app, it helped me loose 20lbs (I'm 5'4", so that was 4 dress sizes) two years ago.  I still use it whenever I need to get my eating back on track.

title: Won't even let me sign in.
body: I used to use this app all the time. I decided to start a diet this week and got back on today. I tried to log in to my account all morning, but it just got stuck on "syncing" forever and never went anywhere. I tried re-downloading the app, logging in through Facebook, and even tried setting up a new account because I really need the app ASAP. But alas, it had this same issue with "registering" and wouldn't let me register. I loved this app before, but I'm not going to waste my time all day on this stupid thing anymore. I'm finding something else.

title: Good app just one error
body: Really enjoy this app! Easy to track and reminders are helpful. Just one problem I've run into, when I reduced the amount to a fraction of the singular portion, sometimes it doesn't divide the calories correctly. On a couple occasions, I've ended up tracking less calories than I was supposed to. Also, I haven't yet figured out how to edit something once it's logged, but maybe that's just me.

title: An awesome app!
body: I have used this app for the last three weeks and absolutely love it! It is very easy to use, and helps you track calories, weight, and daily exercise. The only thing that could make this app better is if it helped track daily servings of veggies, fruit, protein, etc, along with calorie intake. I would definitely recommend this app to a friend!

title: I love this app.
body: This app is amazing. It tracks food, exercises, water intake, and even has a point system within the app to earn fitness gear. (It takes a while though to rack those points!) I am in love with it. The only thing I would change is the accuracy of nutritional facts. I had to change and manually put in a lot of foods because most facts were not accurate. Other than that, it's really fun and great.

title: Awesome
body: Awesome app (from the view of a fourteen year old) the best part is that you can just scan items instead of searching for them.....I chose the lose 1.5 lbs per week option and basically lost like 0.5 pounds a day....Also, I didn't do this thing on weekends an already lost like 6 pounds in two weeks. Seriously, get this app to lose weight.

title: Love this app!
body: I am usually terrible at tracking my calories and I've never been able to maintain good balance but when a friend recommended this app, I immediately fell in love. It tracks everything from meals to basic exercise and I notice results every time I use it. Whether you're dieting or trying to maintain a healthy lifestyle, you can't go wrong.

title: Best format for me!
body: I have been using two other apps to track food consumption but find that My Plate has the perfect format for me!  Food search, calories calculations and overall display and ease of use are just  perfect for me. Have not yet found any issues, but am confident that many of the previous issues noted by users have been resolved!

title: So Good
body: This app is probably the best for counting calories and keeping track of weight. I love how easy it is to use and the built in workouts are awesome! I would definitely recommend this to anyone who is just starting out and doesn't know where to start. I have been using this for over a year and I haven't found anything better!

title: Good....In Theory
body: This app appeared to offer everything I was looking for. However, when it came time to add a custom food item, that feature only worked about one third of the time. When it did work? Great! But for the most part it didn't and I was met with repeated error messages or I would input all of the necessary data but only a couple of values (i.e. fat, carbs) would show up while the other info I entered wasn't processed. I've probably burned 100 calories by just yelling at this app. Despite that, I'll be deleting it now.

title: Comprehensive App
body: You get a lot of features for free with this app.  What won me over was the exercise feature.  It can tell how many calories you burned anywhere from daily activities like mowing the lawn and gardening to focused exercise like running, walking, and biking.  Plus it includes workout videos.
response: Hi Swelligan - Thank you for your review! To edit or delete a tracked exercise, please scroll down the main page of the app, tap on the exercise you've mistakenly entered. The option to edit or delete that tracked item will appear. If you need to do this for another day, just tap on the calendar first and choose the day that needs to be altered, then follow the same directions.

title: Easy Tracker, but...
body: This is a great app and makes it easy to track calories in and out. My only criticism is that my weight is always front and center on the home screen. If I'm tracking in public, someone could easily see this bit of personal information that I would rather leave private. I feel uncomfortable using this app with others around for this reason.
response: Hi Melbelio- thank you so much for your feedback! We will definitely pass this on to our developers.

title: Very good
body: I've downloaded a few calorie trackers and decided on this one because it was the obly one that didn't require an account to use it.

title: Loves it!
body: This is great for a nice realistic look at what one is consuming in a given day.  If I sat back and guessed how many calories, fats, proteins, carbs, etc. I consumed in a day, I would definitely underestimate the amount and wonder why my weight isn't budging.  This gives me a clear view from day to day and even meal to meal.  If I overdid it at breakfast--lunch, dinner and snacks would be adjusted to meet my goal for the day.  The down side, yes, it crashes from time to time.

title: Not bad
body: Pretty good app. Has most food items when you search. If they don't have it within the search you can simply add it yourself easily. The only downside so far is the app crashes a lot! At least once or more times a day.

title: Worth the effort
body: At first it takes some time to get all of your favorite foods input but once you have, it's a very worthwhile tool. helps keep you on track although a little clunky when trying to edit your food list. A few other features work intermittently but overall it is a good app I think I will upgrade to the paid version after I use it more‚Ä¶but day 5 & I'm enjoying it a lot.

title: Okay but has some usability issues, needs fine tuning
body: I have tested this app out for about a week. For me to use something like this on a regular basis, usability is key. I feel that the food items are not listed in the most intuitive/ efficient way. Also-the ability to delete and correct entries is confusing, if not impossible.  I do like the interface and it is fairly easy to navigate- however chunky on the development/ user side of things.

title: Great app...
body: ...but, there should be the ability to create a meal and then eat half of that whole meal, or 1/3 of that whole meal etc. For ex., say I make my own pizza from scratch, and I create a meal for the whole pizza listing all of its ingredients. I should be able to track 1/8 of that meal or 1/4 of that meal etc. each time I want to track it. Currently, I can create a meal for the whole pizza but have to manually reset each ingredient to 1/4, for example.

title: Much better!!!
body: The new interface in the May update is a significant improvement! Great job on it! I really like the ability to see my status across all the different dimensions in one easy screen.

title: Wish I could select devices to link for activity tracking
body: I love this app and the website, but it keeps counting activity from my Apple watch AND my iPhone, which is a duplication. I keep deleting the iPhone activity, but it just keeps coming back, even days later I can go back to delete and it will resync and shoe up again. I can't find any place to select what devices will be synced/tracked.
response: Hi Twin Cities Fan! We're sorry for the trouble you're having. Please email us at support@livestrong.com so we can help you out!

title: Great app!
body: The app is more simple to use and more user friendly than my fitness pal. It has most foods in it that I have needed and it's growing!

title: Track my diet
body: After reading all these reviews I noticed there are more negative than positive ones. I decided to try it out and came to the conclusion that I will continue to track my diet the old school way. A simple notepad and a good pencil. I'm very good at math so there's no way I can go wrong. Anyway I'm glad I tried your app it only goes to show there is nothing like the old school way to get things done right. Thank you. Good luck trying to get it to work right.

title: MyPlate is full
body: I've been using the Livestrong site since myplate was its own separate website. When there was finally an app, I was thrilled! This app will keep one in check and let you know how you're doing as far as nutrients. If you're trying to cut sugar - see exactly where you stand. Need less sodium? Know exactly what you've had. It's excellent.

title: Everything I need
body: This app does everything I need.  The food library is extensive and many items are verified for nutritional content.  I have an Apple Watch and it automatically syncs my activity.  You also have access to a active community of users all with various levels of experience.  What more could you want.

title: Nutrition
body: The best tracking app, never fails, able to track calories, weight, body measurements and I love the graphs. You can see your weight change trends over the years and you can also track physical activity. Very accurate and useful for weight loss and maintenance.

title: Great app!
body: I think the search for food types is so much better here than on other competitors. The ui is also better. I wish there were more options for adding workouts though. All it does is keep track of steps. I wish it had something for miles cycled or miles rowed etc! Maybe for a future release?

title: Great app
body: I really like this app! I just wanted something to help me track my food that was convenient and easy to use. I don't like how you can't track your weight in a graphical sense you can only see it per day. You also have to scan everything in. Searching doesn't bring up the selection or even a lot of products I was looking for, but if you scan it its comes out great. I'm happy :)

title: Great App
body: We found out my son had quite a few food allergies and when we were introducing new foods that he can actually eat, he lost quite a bit of weight. I needed an app that would help us reach a certain # of calories a day so he would gain weight. This app has worked great for that! It's very easy to use. It helps me and I'm so glad I found it!

title: Easy to start. Powerful and clear usage.
body: I love it! I am going to loss weight and this app is excellent to record the calories of my daily diet. I could record and track all the food I ate. I do not have to search how much calories I take. Instead, plenty of species of the food calories amount is easy to search. I will use this app to loss weight! Fight for love!

title: Lost 44 pounds
body: I have been using this app since June and I have lost 44 pounds.  It helps to keep me on track and aware of what I'm eating. I have a much better understanding of the calories food have. The scan feature is great! Sometimes it is difficult to determine a food's calorie when there are many choices and the calories vary. Overall, a great app!

title: Recent Update Ruined App
body: This app had previously worked wonderfully for me. I used it to lose over 50lbs. Loved the way you could track calories, macronutrients, water, and have everything right there. With the recent update, that has all changed. It is very difficult to track macronutrients now, and in order to see everything, you have to scroll through the app. It used to all be in a box at the top of the screen. I'm not sure why they felt the need to change the app, but they completely ruined it. I will be looking for a new app to use.

title: Hate latest version
body: I have been using this app for over 2 years and I used to love it. They just updated the UI and now it's terrible. Takes extra taps to track, used to see %of carbs, protein, and Fat. Now you only see what's left and the total you've consumed....much preferred percentage. After using this app religiously, I sad to say I am going to look for a new one that works the way this app used to work. Why fix what wasn't broken. Seems like they made this switch in trying to get people to subscribe and PAY for an app that used to work great. Thanks for being greedy.

title: Easy to use, and it works
body: App makes it very easy to track calories  by entering what you eat and how much you exercise. It automatically can figure out a target calorie amount based on a goal (eg lose 2 pounds per week).

title: Making corrections
body: I recently are at a subway and when I entered the sandwhich I put 1 serving

title: Easy to use and great variety of foods
body: I have used other programs online that did not have such a great variety of the actual foods and brands. The nutritional information never matched. This is not the case here. There has been very few foods that I have come across that did not match.

title: Awesom
body: This is an amazing way to track the food you eat and really take into perspective exactly what you are putting into your body ! I have been trying to lose weight by exercising, which doesn't work alone!  Monitoring your food you eat really helps you see the bigger picture and help you move towards your weight loss goals!

title: Almost perfect
body: I like everything about it except for the scanner, the caloric break down, and the exercises. The scanner doesn't scan a lot of my foods and sometimes the calories are wrong also. The thing i dont like about the caloric breakdown, do the foods that you enter ( like if it was home made) does it just go on carbs? And the exercises.... There isn't very many. I do tons of exercises but they dont have them on here.

title: Weight
body: Love the app! As a physical therapist I hate fad diets and believe in lifestyle change. Personally I have lost 24 pounds the right way and this app has been the key to tracking exercise and food intake. I have become better at making good food choices. Should hit my goal in a couple more months and plan to continue using the app to maintain a healthy weight.

title: 7days
body: This is a good app. Yes it does have some cinks but it really helps you watch what you eat. Once I type in what I am about to eat and the protein fat and carb circle comes up I realized that I was eating a lot of carbs so I started eating protein and healthier and I have exercised only a little like 10 minutes every other day and I have always lost 3 pounds in about a week this app is a good app for people that don't want to diet and exercise I love it. :)

title: Fun app, less than precise
body: I really enjoy using myplate, it brings awareness to my snacking habits and how overrating  impacts me. I like that you can select your level of activity. It would be helpful if the exercise was precise in the same way, custom calculating the calories burned for the body type and level of exertion. When I add foods I always have to round because their is no decimal point, which is irritating. It's a great app and I will stick with it until I find something more accurate.

title: Not recommended for tracking macros
body: I have been using this app for about 5 months to track my macronutrients and I don't recommend using this app for that purpose.

title: So very helpful!
body: Hello! I just started my journey to better eating and also exercising, this app helps you keep track of your goals and helps you keep motivated! It's really cool because it calculates your steps and exercises! You can scan or search for foods that you eat and it does all of the math for you! Super easy and convenient for everyone! Just give it a try!

title: Very good esp for freebie
body: This is not a bad app at all.  Very nice searchable database of foods so you can enter what you actually ate including from name chains or restaurants.  Nice pie chart of nutrients and nice graph of daily weight over time.  Lets you set calorie goal too.  I have the free version not sure what else you get if you buy it.  I've seen others and a coworker brags of one that reads bar does at the supermarket but whatever this lets you track nicely day by day.

title: Love it!
body: I use it everyday. It helps so much to keep track of what I'm consuming and since I always have my phone on me, it's easier than ever! I wish it would let you go lower than 800 calories as I could only consume 500 calories/day for awhile. Also wish it would let you track your proteins, veggies and fruits separately and not just by meal and caloric intake.

title: Helping with weight loss
body: This app has helped me follow a weight loss program, keeping track of food, exercise, and water consumption.  I've lost 6 lbs in a little over a week. Every food I've looked up could be found. My only complaint is that it doesn't sync with 2 devices, still great

title: User friendly!
body: I have been using this app for the past 12 months. I used the free version and liked it so much I purchased the full version, which provides detailed data on what I eat every day. It is helpful to look back a week. A month or longer to see how you are doing with calories, carbs, fat, protein etc.

title: It's a great app, but...
body: I love it so far, the only downside, you have to pay. I know, I know, I'm complaining about paying for something. Like "what the heck did I expect?!", but if you really want people in the country, or even the world, to get healthy, then don't have them pay for stuff like this. I'm all for capitalism, but it'd be a nice change of pace if it was free.

title: IT HELPS!!! I'm down 30lbs!!!
body: Hi there, this app helps keep me in line with my dieting needs as far as helping me learn how many Calories are in what I'm eating. What an eye opener! I never knew (or cared) how many calories I was eating in a day... But now, that I'm interested in these things, My Plate is helping me make the changes I need to get to where I want to be. And, don't forget the water!!! I never knew I was dehydrated!

title: If the glitch is fixed, I would rate this 5 star
body: I've been using this app for 6+ months now with great success! I've lost 40 lbs and now I'm almost back to my high school weight! I've loved that using it allowed me to earn points for my cricket rewards too but ever since I updated to the latest iOS, it has glitched out and I can't claim any of the points I've earned through it. This isn't going to stop me from using MyPlate but it is a definite frustration of mine!!

title: Good, but mpoints is broken
body: The app is great and really helpful but the mpoints functionality has been broken for months now. You can't cash in your achievements to get mpoints. I wrote support at livestrong about this at least 3 times and got no response. The mpoints team told me that livestrong needs to update to a new SDK to fix it in their app.

title: Does what I need it to
body: Perfect app for tracking your calories, carbs, protein. Two things I love the most is how it connects to my iPhone health tracker for my steps and records how many calories I've burned. Another thing is that it has so much food already stored on there. I don't have to look up calories or ask someone how many are in certain things.

title: Nice app! üòÅüëèüèΩ but few suggestions?
body: It's a great app, but it's a bit jungled up everywhere? And it'd be nice to show how much you would weigh if you continued doing what you're doing like how they do in MyFitnessPal. But I love the scanning idea, it's so much easier for me! Other than those 2 things, this app is great! üòÅ now that I have something to "motivate" me and keeps me on track to gain weight, I've been reaching my calorie goal more and more üòáüòÅüëèüèΩ

title: Good App
body: This app is very helpful and easy to use. You earn points for keeping up with your tracking, which is also motivational.... But on the same note, it's a little annoying that the "claim your points" icon pops up, for you to ok them, every time. It would be nice for this to be done automatically. Other than that, I really enjoy having this tool during this eating lifestyle change. Cheers!

title: Derlin'
body: Great tool, keeps me motivated and on track, don't want to eat wrong because I don't want to have to enter a foolish spend on calories. It's like a game I play with myself all day and keeps me aware of what I eat instead of mindless random stress grazing. I like seeing my progress charted it feels like some accomplishment was kept in order even if the rest of my life that day is chaos. A big LIKE on this one. I only use the lite version so far

title: Fantastic App!
body: This application is helping me lose weight because I'm tracking everything. There are numerous options to choose from while tracking the food which makes it that much easier. Also the option of adding my own custom meals and recipes allows me to add the food that I eat at home. Thank you Livestrong!

title: Customer care team lives strong
body: Had a problem saving my profile; contacted their customer care online tech support team and they (Krist Klingler and Shelby Pratt) not only replied but followed up with me to ensure I got resolve.

title: Great app!
body: Simple to use! Anyone could use this app. It has a large selection of foods and exercise, and if you can't find the one you need you can add your own! I would recommend this to anyone who wants to lose, maintain, or gain weight! It also has a progress chart so you an easily track your progress whenever you want. 5/5 stars!

title: WORKS THE BEST!
body: This app has done wonders for me. All I have to do is plug in every exercise I do and everything I eat and this amazing app figures it all out for me! If you are looking for a calorie app or a food tracker app, this is definitely my top pick! It even had a graph to show you what percentage you eat of what, for example 20% fat. This app is truly the best. I very highly recommend it. I love it!

title: Excellent tool!
body: Having tried several calorie trackers and activity trackers, this is one of the best all-around lifestyle tools available. The food lists and exercises are updated frequently and entering weight and activity is automatically updated in the iPhone health app.  This app has been a great tool to achieve effective weight loss and increase activity.

title: Love this app!
body: I love this app.  I am having specific health issues that requires that I eat at least 90 grams of protein and 1500 calories each day.  I had been struggling to try and figure everything out before.  But with this app it does it all for you, and it's database of different foods both generic and name brand is incredible.  Thank you or creating this app!

title: Great
body: Great app.    Communicates with Withings electronic scale and app through Apple Health as well as Human activity tracker. With these three you have automatic weight and step activity in addition to dietary tracking that is just as good or better than Withings official partner myfitnesspal which does not communicate with Human app.

title: Lost weight
body: This app is very helpful. I didn't realize how many calories I was supposed to be eating before. I just stared a month ago and lost 9 lbs already! This app makes it fun to track and stay within my goal, also I find that I'm exercising more because I like seeing the calories go back down :) I even got my husband to try it.

title: Love it!!!
body: I love this app!! I use it everyday almost constantly it I ezily the most used app only phone! It has helped me lose weight and stay focused on staying  on track.

title: I wish it had recommendations
body: The app lets you add ounces of water you've drank, but it gives you no idea what is recommended for you. It breaks down caloric metrics in a graph of ratio carbs, protein, and fats but gives you no idea I what is good or bad (recommended) I know that's different for everyone and often debatable but I'll take a rough guideline over nothing. Otherwise it's pretty easy and useful, searchable foods are very limited but you can always add ur own and it saves them which is helpful.

title: Useful, but prone to crashes
body: Originally downloaded this app just to get a handle on how many calories I was consuming during the day, which motivated me to begin eating better and exercising more. I like being able to input my own recipes and calorie counts.

title: The best app ever
body: I've been using this app for over three years and I lost over 45lbs the first year and kept every bit of it off the last two years. My only advise is trust the app and don't over exaggerate your daily activity. Most people are sedentary. Always under estimate your exercise. Most people don't realize how minimal there caloric burn is.

title: Amazing
body: I love this app because I can keep track of everything I eat and I am able to put the amounts of the product instead of them assuming the amount that your support to eat.  Also I love that it counts your calories and that you can put the exercise information into the app. I recommend getting this app, it is excellent!!!

title: Confused/misleading
body: I've been using this app a couple of weeks now. I like the food tracking capabilities, especially the ability to add foods not in the database. The recent update added some serious bugs, though. The app keeps changing my weight, adding 100 lbs or more, and this morning, turned me into a man. Syncing every day, or more often, isn't helping, and this is definitely going to mess up the trends. Adding custom exercises is an improvement, but only if the basic app functionality works.

title: Too many issues
body: Loved this app when I first started using it and lost 20 lbs, but everytime they run an update it doesn't work anymore which is getting tiresome. Have also discovered when scanning barcodes, the calorie counts are frequently wrong compared to what the package says. Thinking its time to find a more reliable app. The last update caused problems again. Followed their advice to delete and reload the app and lost every bit of data from all my hard work the past 6 months. Changing my review to one star and finding a better app.

title: Very disappointing.
body: I can't get past the sign up page. I enter all the information correctly. When I get to screen to register by Facebook or email I choose email. I put in my legitimate and correct email...I choose an 8-character long password. I keep getting a "oops you need to enter a correct email". Over and over. I deleted ap and re downloaded 3 times but this is still happening. Can u please fix this email signup glitch?  I do not have a Facebook acct nor do I want one.  The email I entered and password choice is appropriate and correct, so why isn't it working?

title: One of the best I've tried
body: Only difficulty has been with adding foods in a certain way.  The info I input doesn't always save correctly and I've seen this consistently so I don't believe it's a user error.  I've also noticed some verified entries which have incorrect information.  Usually these are not large inconsistencies and not enough to squabble over a few calories here and there!

title: Awesome app
body: Overall a great app but there is a flaw that I do hope does get fixed hopefully in an update in the future. The problem I have is when I try to create a new food the only information that I'm allowed to put is JUST the carbs, protein, and fats.... Nothing else... Not the sugar not the sodium or the trans fat or any thing else. I wish I could be able to put more detail when I create a new food.
response: Hi Omarel11! Thank you for the review! We are working on an update that will allow more micronutrients to be added to your custom foods. Please watch the app store and our community for news on future releases!

title: Best tracker
body: This is by far the best tracker I have used. It is easy to keep track of your food and exercise. It is also very easy to search for certain food an unlike other apps they have most things you can think of. I highly recommend this app and after using this will upgrade to the full version.

title: Decent app
body: I would have given this app 5 stars if it had more choices for tracking workouts. I do a lot of hiit training and my hrm monitor isn't working so I wanted to track cals burned using this site, however there are no categories for hiit, cardio, or high intensity interval training yet there are tons of articles on the site about it so there should be a category under exercise search base to accommodate these workouts.

title: Mrs. Emile's daughter
body: Finding this app helpful and user friendly. Now I can stay on track as I try to drop those last ten pounds and keep at my goal weight.  Less pain and health benefits Are my motivation.  Skinny jeans will be a perk.  Can't wait to add a friend circle to share ideas and encouragement with!  Wish there were more pre-stored food items.  Could not find barley beef soup for example but worked my way through that.

title: Great app
body: If you're looking to lose this weight, this is a great help because it allows you to keep a diary of not only your food intake but also your daily exercise routines. You can enter how many pounds you want to lose a week and base on your height and weight, the app will calculate how many calories a day you should consume to reach your goals. Try it out!

title: Makes me accountable
body: Works well for people who want a sustainable way of losing weight. It has a community forum for support, mPoint system that rewards you gift cards if you log consistently for 5 or 6 months. However, it crashes way too often for my liking and I've lost some mPoints due to this problem. So far no updates or efforts from the company to correct this problem. :(

title: Love the App, not the last version
body: I have had this App for around six months now and it works perfectly. Nevertheless the last update is terrible: the advertisement falls on top of the screen making it difficult to navigate, the colors are very similar creating difficulties in differentiating information, and the nutrition chart is hard to understand with the extra information.

title: This is a great app
body: I've only had this app for 5 days now but I'm in love with it. I have lost almost 2 pounds. I can also see if I eat carbs or protein or fats the most. It also lets me track my exercise which is really important to me. If I were you I would download this app it is turning m life around by losing weight and having more energy. Download it now.

title: Pleased
body: I have used this app for a while now and am pleased with it. While it doesn't recognize some food products you scan, you can find the equivalent or alternative when you type the description in. It makes me feel more confident in portioning and choosing foods, and I highly recommend others try it.

title: Better than MFP
body: So far, I'm liking this better than MFP. I've used MFP for so many YEARS, but I've become sick of being a slave to the stupid streaks and newsfeeds. I'm not worried about the exercise tracking - if that's even still an issue for My Plate? - because counting exercise calories back into one's daily goal is a slippery and dangerous slope, anyways. I don't even bother.

title: Best calorie tracker
body: I have been using this app off and on a few years. I love it ! It's has helped me to lose weight. I can have many lunch choices in front of me, & I can put in what I think I want, it gives me calories, fats ect helping me to make better choices for myself .. download it, try it, if you don't like it , you lost nothing .

title: Useful
body: Overall good app, I've been using it a couple years and it works for me. One complaint with the most recent update: for tracking water intake you now update your new *total* throughout the day, which means you have to add up the ounces yourself. I can do the math but the whole point of using a tracker is to have the app do the math for you. Hope this gets adjusted in the next update.

title: I'm obsessed.
body: I've been searching for an easy way to keep track of my daily food intake. I'm not necessarily looking to lose weight, but this app almost forces me to eat healthier, which in turn, causes me to lose unwanted pounds. I would recommend this app to anyone, it's so simple. I LOVE that they even have all of the vegan food brands in their food bank.

title: Absolutely wonderful app
body: I originally downloaded just to try and journal my food intake. Over time, I've taken advantage of all the app (and website) has to offer. The app itself is reliable and easy to use. I highly recommend trying this app if you are looking to track your intake and try to live and eat healthy.

title: Good but could be more
body: I've tried several food & exercise frackers and overall, this is my favorite. However, there were some features on others I wish this one had. For instance, I would love it if it would incorporate and display my pedometer from the Apple health app. And it could use some more exercises (barre, Aqua Zumba for example). Overall, good! Just could be better :)

title: Works great on iPad
body: I've used MyPlate for several years and find it easy and helpful to track the food I eat. The App and the LiveStrong website have been a wonderful way to loose weight and keep it off!  I especially like tracking my exercise and seeing how many calories I burn off.  This latest version works great on my iPad.

title: Very reliable app
body: It took me two years of using this app to finally write a review. This has been a go-to app for tracking my exercise, food intake, and weight. This app has bee easy to use and I would recommend it to anyone. I do wish the developers would update the app to work with other exercise apps much better

title: Deleted it
body: Very pretty app, love all the settings and how easy it is to search for food. However, when looking for a calorie and fitness tracking app, I want to be able to track my own workouts. I think the workouts given are great but if I can't track my own workouts that I do at home or at the gym, I think it's pointless to have this app for food and another for fitness. Thanks anyway! On the hunt for one that does both still....

title: Wonderful Tracker
body: I track everything. I'm improving my physical health by what I can see and feel. My doctors are able so see nutritionally what my habits are. I'm off any cholesterol medicine and my numbers are great. Stopping to enter makes me see, and therefore think about my nutritional needs. Scanner is tops and the database of products beats any other app I've tried.

title: Out with the new, in with the old!
body: The old app was so intuitive and easy to use, and I loved it because the pie chart was RIGHT THERE and everything I used was RIGHT THERE. Now you've made it stupid, like like MyFitnessPal, which makes you take multiple steps to input anything. I'd rather be out exercising than tapping on my phone to use this app.
response: Hi Stella- thank you for your review regarding our latest update. Our team is making changes based off of user comments, so we greatly appreciate your feedback! Please watch the app store and our community boards on LIVESTRONG.COM for news on future releases!

title: GR8 interface. Only okay for ketogenic
body: I love the interface and graphs on MyPlate. It's the reason I've been using it for a couple years. But I removed 2 stars because I'm dying for the day the developers realize that not everyone is calorie-centric!

title: Great app!
body: I love being able to track my food, weight & exercise so easily. The ability to earn points to use for things I use every day is an added bonus, I just wish the points were added automatically without me having to go back and click to add them for each item individually. If that were fixed it would definitely be a 5 star rating.

title: Love it.
body: This is such a great way to keep track of your daily meals and exercise. Keeps a record of what you ate each day and i love that it shows you the % of each group you ate each day (CHO, Pro, Fat). This helps me see what i need to get more of a less of the next day! Also i love how it tells you how to loose a certain amt of lbs per week. Sometimes I can't find the exact food I ate but other than that I really love it.

title: Just ok
body: This app is helpful for a general idea of calorie count. It's not detailed enough in my opinion for example if you type "turkey sandwich" it gives you a set calorie count of 350 or so. It doesn't say "turkey sandwich with wheat bread, lettuce, mayo, no cheese" so I'm never sure how close the calories are. But again for a general idea it's helpful. Also for "activity level" it doesn't give descriptions like "very active means you workout 6-7 days a week for __ amt of time" so you have to guess.

title: Live strong my plate lite
body: This is a great app; easy to use and full of food choices to track calorie intake.  There so many food combinations that you can always find a substitute if exactly what you ate is not on the food search system.  The addition of exercise and calories burned in you total helps to incentivize activity.  I have found it very useful.

title: The BEST app for your health!
body: This is a simple design, and easy to use. Many of the foods you eat are already in the database, so a quick search lets you accurately record everything you eat. If you are looking for a way to record your exercise, food, water.... This is by far the best and most user friendly option out there!

title: Great
body: Awesome App... I think this app is a motivation for people who are a little lazy like me and this app has got me working like crazy and I have seen the improvement in myself I have lost couple of pounds.. I heard about this app from a friends of mine who was over weighted but now is perfectly thin and I wanted to be like her.. So I downloaded this app to see what she really sees in this app!!!

title: Great to keep track. But...
body: It's a great simple app to use, keep track of your food intake. Unfortunately, to add exercises you've got to estimate what was your calorie burn if you do not use a gym exercise machine and to input also food you prepare at home. The scanning of foods is great you just have to scan the barcode from the box you have purchased it from.

title: Lost 15 pounds
body: I wanted to celebrate my 60th birthday by participating in the Seattle-to-Portland ride, a 2-day 204-mile bicycle ride.  Pounds had crept up over the years and I really didn't want to haul all that weight with me on the ride.  I lost 15 pounds with this app.  I'm still not racing material but I did the ride easily, in a decent amount of time.  I'm going to use the app to maintain my weight (and ride more centuries).

title: Excellent app
body: I have had very few problems with it.  The things I like most are that it links up with my exercise app (Human).  It automatically deducts the calories that I burn through exercising.  It also keeps a record for several months and tracks my progress for me.  Great little app in my opinion, especially like that it is free!!!

title: Great app
body: This app makes it easy to track calories! I really like how it shows the amount of protein, carbs and fat are in the meals you have eaten and it even shows an overall daily amount for each! I downloaded this app just to track calories, but I think it's a nice touch that exercises are included! Thumbs up to this app

title: Useful app
body: I've found this very helpful in tracking calories. I'm on week 3 and lost 10 lbs so far. I like the my plate view, it seemed clearer than the other apps. I can't get it to scan barcodes, but it's not hard to input info manually. Don't trust the gym machines to tell you how many calories you've burnt - get a heart monitor, it's much more reliable.

title: Awesome!
body: I love this app! It's really easy to use.. You can just scan the barcode of what you are eating! I especially love the community that it creates! You can post if you are feeling discouraged, and almost instantly people are commenting on your post to help motivate you! You can also get some good advice, recipes, and workouts from others on here! Really awesome!

title: Great app, works well
body: I have been using this app now for approximately four months. I have been able to effectively manage my calorie intake and adjust as needed based on the results. I have noticed approximately 15 pound weight loss since starting and have recommended this too many of my patients in my clinic. Great work, thanks for a great app!

title: I like it but..
body: I have used this app in the past and I've loved it. but I had recently downloaded it again due to getting a new phone and i now have a IPhone6s and I log into my account but once I leave the app, it signs me out. I have to constantly be signing back in to my account every time I go into the app and that's very annoying. I was hoping for it to be convenient like it was before but I constantly having to put my log in info.

title: This app keeps me on track
body: I love this app because I can track my food intake as well as my exercise. It helps me balance calories in vs calories out. It also has (almost) every food product I eat and every type of exercise that I do. I would recommend this app to anyone wanting to lose or maintain their weight.

title: User friendly!
body: I have used my fitness pal for years and was tired of all the adds and media I had sort through to find my diary. I love the fact that I can get rid of all of that for .99 and enjoy the benefits of my plate without feeling assaulted by adds every time I open it! I'll update my post once I've used it longer.

title: Great app!!
body: Have been using this app for two years almost, off and on, when i need to lose some weight. It's help me!! Not exact calories to workout ratios but it doesn't need to be, because it helps me be mindful of what I'm eating. When I use it everyday I do stick to my goals. Will probably keep using it, off and on, forever.

title: Use every it day! (One issue with update)
body: Great app! I use it all the time! Love the different ways it breaks down your nutrition intake over the day! But the update just made it so if you go over your calorie goal the bar no longer turns red. Please bring that back! Love the added instant feed back saying "wait, rethink- this would make you go over!" Keeping the bar green isn't as intuitive.

title: It once was great but
body: Since the November 16 update, app hangs up when claiming mpoints.  Support said it's a mpoint portal issue.  The latter says it's MyPlate.   Strangely enough, there wasn't a problem until the apps November update even with latest iOS 10.1.  Now I have to use my iPod with iOS 9 to claim mpoints   Sure wish developers would talk to each outer instead of giving users useless circular logic or blaming each other!

title: Good, But Irritating!
body: I had a simple food and medicine logger, but it stopped working with an OS upgrade, so I switched.

title: Very good and easy
body: I am impressed at the variety of foods and the availability of brands and restaurant items on the tracker.  It has really made me aware of what I am eating and how much.  The first week, my life sucked and I was hungry all the time, but stuck it out and am down 10lbs in 1.5 months. And feel so much better. And best of all, it's free.  This app was the wake up call that I needed!

title: Great
body: I really like this app. Because i track my food and exercise and how much water i drank. It tells you if you go over your calorie goal for the day and it also shows you how many calories you have left for the day. I really do recommend this app. You can talk to others using the app and see their progress as well.

title: Great App
body: This app is easy to use and helps me keep track of my calorie intake ... I set a goal to lose 2 lbs a week and have lost 8 lbs in the first month. I've become addicted to using the app ... its fun to track your calorie intake and calories burned through exercise and I've become discouraged to eat certain foods and snacks because they contain high amounts of calories.

title: Makes watching what I eat so easy!
body: This app is even more user friendly than the online website! Makes counting calories, exercise, & water use so easy to keep up with! I've already started eating better because of the results I can see tracked on my progress. Love how it reminds you if you haven't tracked for the day!

title: A suggestion:
body: I quite sure maybe other user suggest that the awesome developers, have  consider adding a camera. Secondly be able to email and print right from the application. Secondly behind able to record blood pressure, heart rate and oxygen level before a exercise activity and after completing a activity.  Thank you I loved the app. it's awesome.

title: Wonderful!!!
body: This app is the perfect fitness tool!! You get to track what you've eaten, it tells you how many calories in the day you have left, it sets the calories each day based on your goal, and you get to join in on conversations/questions from the community with similar fitness goals, so it's like a support system.

title: Love this app!! Hate the ads
body: I've been using this app for months and I absolutely love it. User-friendly, quick, easy, and still allows you to track everything you need. However recently I've been seeing a lot of ads for mcdonalds,chili places, etc. Not the best choice of ads for a nutrition and fitness management app. I also have the non-ad version, but the mpoints don't transfer.

title: Feature Rich
body: This app is feature rich, easy to get started, and effective in helping you track your nutritional goals. In the future, if you could check your nutritional history (carbs/fats/proteins) rather than just the current day that would be an improvement. Also, setting goals for carbs/fats/proteins would also be useful in gauging if what you ate was "good" or "bad" overall for the day.

title: Subject:  Review
body: I was doing really well and loving this site. But since the update a week or two ago, I have not been happy. Before I hit "recently eaten foods" while inputting lunch and lunch items came up. Now every thing is all mixed together. Please tell me there is a way to go back to the last version. I have already lost 18 lbs and would love to keep this going. Right now you have me searching for other sites. PLEASE!  Go back to the 5 stars I would have given you before the update but didn't take the time. Marge Barham

title: Eh...it gets the job done
body: It's good to track however inputting your food is a little tough. The scanning option doesn't pick up on labels. I like how it tracks my steps but I can't input a workout. Like I wanted to put like an "elliptical" as my exercise but it didn't have that option which was shocking. So I entered it manually but it only allowed me to type calories burned.  I don't know not what I expected. I'm still in the hunt for a good weight tracking app

title: Keeps me on track and honest
body: This app is great. I've always struggled with my food intake portion of my weight loss. I hate writing down, and manually counting my calories. This app makes it much easier. I love that it automatically sets my goals according to my profile. I've used it since April of this year, and I'm 20lbs down. I plan to keep going strong.

title: Pretty Good App
body: This app has a lot, but it does not let me trend the data for intuitional make put of each day.  Bummer.  It also would be better if when a food is selected, the text box in the pop out window would be large enough so that it allowed you to read the entire text description of the food.  Other than those two issues, I really like the app.

title: Not too shabby ;)
body: I like the simplicity and the user friendly setup of the app. I'm from Texas and I shop at HEB, maybe y'all could get some HEB products in your scanning bank too! :) This app has definitely helped me realize how awful and inconsistently I eat. It took me about a week until I could successfully meet my calorie goal, and I hope I can manage to meet my future goals with the help of this app! :)

title: Pretty awesome & very helpful
body: If you don't know where to start or your looking at different calorie apps to choose from I think this one is your best bet.  Very helpful and inspiring community for either maintaining, losing, or gaining weight. You got question they have answers. Plus the app is very to use making it less stressful in my opinion. Well good luck to you and hope you achieve your goal.

title: Life-Changing :-)
body: I love this app very much because it gives me a goal to reach for protein, carbs, etc. and helps me to keep track of what I need to consume more and less of. This app is very convenient for people who have the desire to either gain or lose weight, and who want to constantly check their calorie intake. Thank you for this app, keep it up :-)

title: Great App gone wrong
body: To make it short and sweet, they took a great app, and a great feature "Recently Done" for exercises, and jacked it all up (thanks iPhone steps). It could be simple to shut off the steps... But I'd like to keep things as tracked as I can. However with it tracking steps, when you go into recently done exercises, you will be hard pressed to find anything BUT steps no matter how often you do an exercise or how long ago you tracked it.

title: Extensive database/ easy to use
body: This is the best calorie and activity tracker around in my opinion. Lots of foods already in the database plus a barcode scanner to easily add more. Plus your recently eaten foods pop up for easy access. Activity tracking is easy. Wish it worked with my Fitbit, but that's easy enough to add manually also.

title: Best app ever
body: I'm not an expert counting calories and this app has helped me a lot! It's perfect if you want to keep track of your food and perfect if you are trying to loose weight. Yo can scan the codes of your food and it will automatically tell you the calories, protein, fat and carbs you don't have to enter any information. Definitely worth it

title: Lost 4.4lbs the first full week!
body: This app has saved my life! I was spiraling out of control with my weight until I found Livestrong & My Plate! Counting calories via my cellphone is soooo much easier than I ever imagined. I lost 4.4 lbs the very first full week after trying this out. I'm so pleased and anxious to see what the next few weeks will take off!

title: The review
body: This is a perfect app even if you are trying to gain weight because it sends  notifications motivating you to add more calories into your body which will help. I can't imagine what it can do for you if you are trying to lose weight. All I know is this app can't get any better this is definitely a 5 star app.üòÑüòÑ

title: MyPlate Calorie Tracker
body: I just downloaded this app a few days ago and am already addicted. It gives you the option to enter your meals/calories manually or select from a list of popular venders. The community support seems to be very positive and gives that little bit of extra reinforcement we all need. So far it is a great find!

title: Makes journaling a breeze!
body: I just started a lifestyle change and had a difficult time making the transition. This app has made the toughest part, journaling, so easy. What I love about it is being able to preplan meals and enter them a day ahead. I look forward to using it every day. Thinking about upgrading...just not clear about what the extras are for the price. Absolutely recommend!

title: AWESOME APP!!!
body: I am beyond happy with this app! I've already lost 5 lb and it's only been a week! I never realized how much I was eating before and now it's right here in the palm of my hand. No journal. No hassle. It also tracks my water intake. That is always shockingly low. I never realized how much I need to drink to get in my 8 glasses! Wow!!! My eyes have been opened and I'm getting on track!

title: Love this app!
body: I've been using this app for about two years mainly to maintain my weight and keep up with what I'm eating. I recommended it to my two grown sons and they both love it also. One son has lost 40 pounds logging his food in religiously. I also love the huge database of food already in the app and the ability to scan in foods. It works great!

title: Nice to look at, but with the wrong information
body: Upon downloading the app I was pleasantly surprised with the user interface and how easy it was to input information. But problems quickly arose when I entered the first two things I'd eaten for the day and doublechecked their nutrition against the actual product's nutritional labels. They were wrong. What's worse, there's no way to change the information in the app. And if your entire app is based on inputting nutrition which is wrong, then the app becomes useless.

title: Great App
body: This is a handy app to use if you're trying to keep track of the foods you eat, calories burned & your water intake. It can also work with the health app on the iPhone. The step tracker is great to keep you moving because you don't have to open the app to see how many steps you've taken; they show right on the app. If you have an apple watch it works with that as well. I love it!

title: Easy to Use
body: This app allows you to scan barcodes so you have your nutrition information already calculated for whatever you ate. There is a huge database of nutritional information for all types of foods and exercises. This is a very easy, nice looking app that makes tracking calories easy enough to stick to it.

title: The only health app there should be
body: The first fitness app to actually help me with my goals. It has an accurate calorie counter on foods I eat and helps me stay on track. I love tracking my water intake & seeing my progress. I recommend it to everyone I know whether they're just starting out or already into the fitness lifestyle.

title: Great App - Suggested Update
body: This is a very good app. I particularly like how the macros are displayed on the main page...including the pie chart of percentages.

title: Good but needs a bit of refining
body: I use tracker every day, and I look up information about fitness and diet on the livestrong site. I would like to see a sodium tally at least. Rather than seeing "recently performed" exercise options I would like to see for instance "elliptical trainer" with an hourly rate and an opportunity to enter the minutes performed, at least as an option every time.

title: Holy Smokes!
body: This app is really fantastic! It lets you set calorie goals and everything! Not a single problem with it! It has pretty much every food in its data base (or whatever you call it). All you have to do is search what you ate and it'll tell you the calories and everything! If you don't buy this free app you are crazy!

title: The Perfect Fitness App
body: This is an app that motivates you to keep tracking by giving you mPOINTS, letting you exchange your points for gift cars and contest, is like a prize for trying diet and maintain your healthy lifestyle! It's super simple to use, and it does tracking for you. I wish it had a barcode scanner to make tracking simple and easy though.

title: Awesome but crashes sometimes
body: I love it. Basically any food is in here, however some of the same foods might differ in calorie count but you can use your best judgement. I like the layout, although it would be cool if it had a little option bar to locate different features instantly. It just tends to crash more than most apps I use. Not every time, but enough to take notice.

title: More than calories
body: The app is great for more than calorie counting. The sugar, sodium and cholesterol tracking is awesome. It is a great way to truly understand balance. I am able to see how my choices affect my levels. My calorie count was down but my sugar was up. I am in the process of making the necessary adjustments to stay on track. Great resource.

title: Love this app!
body: Best app I've ever tried to use for monitoring my dietary intake. I'm a long-distance runner and it has taught me a lot about the breakdown of what I'm eating and how it affects my workouts. I will definitely recommend it to friends and family who are trying to lose weight. It's easy to use and I don't get frustrated trying to document. Love it!

title: Perfect
body: It's perfect like it is but please add the feature of showing current daily calories consumed as a notification on the app icon (the red bubble) please make it say how many calories you've eaten today so far. I am a premium member and I think this one small tweak would make this app a true 10/10 perfect. Thanks for the great app

title: Great for food
body: Love the food tracker & the label scanner has a large  index of food. Wish it had a better way to determine how many calories you've burned doing different activities or workout programs. This is where it falls short. I do BeachBody  & feel it should be easy enough to load these workouts into the system so you can choose them just like the food tracker.

title: Not as user friendly
body: Previous version was much easier to navigate, and pleasing to view. Also, many foods entered need to be verified and/or deleted. Too many incorrect foods created and left in the system. When entering content grams, the final product entered ends up being wrong. Ex: 4g protein ends up reading .004g.

title: The tool is only as good as the user
body: I have found this app to be a huge help in tracking food, weight goals and tying into Apple Health to pull from my Apple Watch. This app won't help you lose weight, it will help you track your metrics and if your mentality is right, this is all the tools you need to improve you.

title: Thank you
body: With this app, and enough exercise I lost 43lbs !!! I never thought someone like me ( a huge procrastinator ) would be able to achieve such a thing, you need motivation and concentration, and with this app and those two important characteristics you'll achieve anything ! Believe in yourself, and love yourself regardless ‚ô°

title: So easy to stick with!
body: What a great way to hold myself accountable. I can't believe this is free!

title: Gives you a little help!
body: This app is a little help to those who wants to track their calorie intake per day. It gives you an idea on how much you need to eat and how much calorie there is in a certain food. The only negative thing is, it has a limited lists of food in the library. I hope livestrong can give us more accurate and more food lists available. Thanks!

title: Great features....
body: I reviewed several similar apps and found them to lack critical features that I was looking for or the app was tied to a pay service in order to access the features that I was looking for...

title: The best one I've used so far!
body: I really like this app compared to all the other ones I've used for counting calories and keeping track of my meals and exercise, but it would be nice if I could edit my custom meals after I've made them so I don't have to make a new one and start all over every time I input the wrong data.

title: PigletRae's Review
body: I like this app, bc u can put what you've ate or what you've done that day.  Most apps only give u a few choices and u have to say yes or no and sometimes you have to say more than yes and or no! This app has a big variety of choices, which is good when you're trying to find anything to get u off track of your diet!

title: Really handy
body: Thus far really love this app, has most of the food I'm looking for in the search menu, can automatically calculate, what I ate and how much I ate of it. it's like a whole lot easier. The only complaint I have is on the scanner part, you have to take a look at the barcode it doesn't work, The only thing I would suggest is a way to fix the scanner and modify your caloric intake.

title: A Real Eye-opener!!
body: So I've been using the app for a week and from the progress charts could see after 3 days that I was overdoing carbs and was skimping on protein. I notice the app doesn't seem to track dietary fibre... This would be a great addition as it would result in a true picture of one's eating patterns.

title: Love it!
body: Best app created! Keeping track of my weight and nutrition was not something that interested me, after downloading this app I'm more motivated than ever :) gives all information needed to gain, lose or maintain weight, even found dish  info from my own country....great calorie and nutrition tracker!! As well as exercise. Definitely worthy of 5 stars!!

title: Love it!!!
body: I love this app so much! Especially the scanning option, it makes things that much easier. I love it so much that I upgraded, something I've never done with other apps. It's hard to stay consistent with tracking macros and I find this app to be very helpful with that. Definitely worth giving it a shot!

title: Disappointing
body: Out of date or inaccurate food database, and manually adding new foods is limited by not allowing enough characters for a precise name, it has a cumbersome user interface, there is not enough info in-app about the features and prices before upgrading, and also there is no way I will ever pay recurring monthly or annual fees to fully access my account.  A reasonably priced one-time fee might be acceptable, but I can't tell if that's even an option.  I will continue to use CalorieKing's desktop software and delete this frustrating app.

title: best app I've ever used!!!
body: have been using this app for 2 weeks now, & have already lost 8 lbs! I've used other apps to keep track of calories, & gave up after a few days. this app is much simpler 2 use, bc of less clicks 2 input calories/water/intake.. it's become my most used app.. I would give the app 10 stars if I could!!:)

title: Love this app
body: Considering this app is free, it is excellent. It offers a lot in way of food options and tracking workouts. This app is much more user friendly with greater accuracy compared to other similar apps I have used. Definitely, the one which costs money offers more but the free app offers all I want and need.

title: Pretty good
body: I like the way it has so many foods already logged into the system. However, it can crash at times unexpectedly. It's never lost my input after crashing, though, so it's more just an inconvenience. I think the calorie reductions of the exercise is somewhat inflated too, but that could be the difference between their version of "vigorous" and mine, lol. Overall pretty good.

title: Love it
body: I've found this to help me immensely truly know what I'm eating and drinking. It's a good visual of your day. You have to really look at the foods you're choosing to add because people can add them in and the nutritional content may not be correct. Only improvement I would make is to see a complete nutritional breakdown on one screen at the end of the day. My fitness pal does this. Overall HUGE help to me.

title: Love this app!
body: This app is so incredible! Have been using it for two weeks to track my exercising with it. Have lost almost 8 pounds, and have been more aware of the calories, fat, protein, and carbohydrates i have been eating with every meal. I highly recommend this app. Even the light version. If I use this for a couple more weeks, I will definitely invest in the full version of the app.

title: Working on it :)
body: This app so far has been helpful. I like that I can enter items manually. But one thing I think would be beneficial would be that if an item is not found by scanning the barcode it Gould save the barcode an ask for then info on the product. Then have it update the overall system. That way everybody can benefit from the new things

title: Very nice
body: I like it. Simple yet intelligent. Easy to use easy to understand. Very extensive food list.  Keeps a history of your favorite/recent meal types making it easier to find and enter.  Tracking simple exercise using the accelerometer is wonderful, gives you an idea of just how active you are during the day.

title: Great Tool, Sync Problem...
body: Second time that I have used this app to lose in excess of 20 pounds and I think that it is great.  Might overestimate exercise calories a bit, but close.  I would give it five stars if it synced with my Galaxy Note 3 like it did with my Apple phones.  Still have my IPad, but I have to wait to get home to update.  Still, a great database of food and drink!  Please solve the sync problem.

title: Works great, all my info came over perfectly
body: Was not happy at first finding out my favorite app was being switched to this.., but it's better and all my info transferred over perfectly. No ads that I can see coming from the old paid app, glad to see they did the switch right. Thanks üëç

title: Thanks!
body: Tracking meals over the past year has helped limit extra calories and track weight progress, as well as share this info with medical professionals.

title: Almost Perfect
body: This is the best weight loss program I have ever used. Two years ago I lost 25 pounds in three months by tracking every morsel of food but more importantly it tracks the work out so the calorie intake balances and it's easy to drop the weight. If it could do the work out for me it would be perfect but what fun would that be.

title: Great App!
body: This app is very easy to use and has tons of stored food info, so I rarely have to input anything manually! Despite what most reviews say it does break up percent daily intake of fat, carbs and protein. I love that it reminds you if you forget to track that day. I wish that you could track fruit veggie intake though, but overall it's a great app!

title: WAY easier than Weight Watchers!
body: This app is far more comprehensive. You learn more about food, exercise, calories, and body fat by tracking with this app than you do with the WW app! I have used WW for over a year and found success. But I feel like I have had more success with this app the past few months. Deleting my WW tonight!

title: It Helps You Keep Track
body: I honestly have to say that this is THE best calorie and exercise tracker out there (and trust me, I've tried ALOT). Period. It helps you keep track of everything but not in an overly complicated manner like most do. They do ask you to Sign Up but that shouldn't matter. The results are worth it and it shows.

title: Needs to be fixed
body: I use an iPhone 4 so maybe that's the issue. When I got the new app instead of the old my plate it asked if I wanted to transfer in the data from the old app. I said yes. After 4 attempts (from both the old and new app) it has crashed multiple times and all it transferred in was exercise. Didn't transfer in weights or calories or anything.

title: Love it!
body: I love this app!! So easy to use and has a very extensive catalog of food items, I love to scan, and this works very well for me!

title: Its worth it!
body: I was going to give 3 stars @ first but after taking a simple more in depth look into all the features it offers, for non gold members especially, it is refreshing. I love the support pages and the recipe forum. This app seems like it really cares about each of our individual  weight loss and fitness goals. The search for foods could be amped up a bit but besides that BRAVO!

title: Good but bad syncing
body: Update: have lost 20 pounds but this continues to be buggy with syncing and the app creating duplicate entries from reoccurring food items that I have to remove several times throughout the day.

title: Keeps you mindful
body: This app makes you think before you eat. Reading the nutritional information is valuable and can shock you when it comes to certain foods. Great way to "diet" without letting go off your favorite foods. It even includes workouts and calories you've burned. It helps to keep you going in the right direction towards your desired weight/health/goal. ‚ú®‚ú®

title: Love this app
body: I use it everyday and it isn't a hassle because it's easy to use. Great for my low carb diet because I can see the amount of calories, protein, fat, and carbs for each food entry. The app also has workout tutorials, I use the '10 min total body workout' while working out at home and it gets a good sweat going.

title: Helpful and Realistic
body: After doing a lot of research to keep my weight down I found the correct amount of calories. I got this app, and plugged it in with all of my other information and used it. I have lost several pounds and plan to lose more.  This is a very helpful and realistic app. I hope other people find it for their benefits as well, thank you for your help.

title: So-So
body: Better than some, but like others, this app uses BMI instrad of body fat percentage. However, you can manually enter your calorie goal and disable its calculations based on BMI.

title: Huge Database of Foods!
body: Love this app! I use MyPlate on my desktop computer, and I use the Livestrong "lite" app on my tablet. Both are so easy and helpful. They have the most complete database of foods I've ever seen in a program like this. I can always find the food I'm looking for, from grocery store items to restaurants. I recommend this app highly!

title: My Plate
body: Has never made it so easy to track what I eat! Through all of the mess and the hassle of the day the last thing I want to to worry about is dragging a notebook along with me everywhere just to track every little thing I eat. My Plate makes it 100 times easier and then some. Overall a very useful app.

title: Just what I need!
body: I didn't know until I got this app that I eat mostly carbohydrates. It's great that you can see everything. They have most foods on their list, but for exercise you kind of just have to know how many calories burned. But if you google how to do that it's easy. It would be helpful if this app had some normal exercises and how many calories they burn (approximately).

title: Easy losing
body: After a little over a week, I've lost about 5 pounds. This really helps because you see how beneficial it is to eat fruits and veggies. You can still eat fun stuff, but you can control the calories by having a goal. It's so easy to look up different kinds of foods. I'm loving it! I'm 65 years old.  You can do this!

title: Awesome!! Best app ever
body: I love this app !
