It is a great app I'm going to upgrade to the full version soon it's the same but no ads so if u don't want to pay this Is the best app out there u can easy track exersize and diet all u do is enter the food in the search bar and it gives u the amount if calories u can set goals and watch your progress ! :)

title: i dare you!
body: u WILL lose wait on this app if you use the app every day...when i use the app, i lose &continue to lose... when i get lazy & don't use the app. i gain.  It works even if you just track & watch your foods a little bit... u dont have to exercise, but it's a little faster if u exercise even a little.

title: This new update is awful
body: The older layout of this app was much better. The update from week of 3/10 made the interface really hard to navigate.  If you are trying to track macros(protein, carb, fat percentage) this update will not work easily for you because the pie chart that shows % of those things is gone. (App Store images show the old layout) now there are gram markers to show your intake but it doesn't do much good unless you are a math wiz while trying to keep 40% of your intake at proteins or what not. Currently looking for a new app!

title: Not a friendly app
body: This app leaves a lot to be desired. there are very few options available to choose grams, oz,etc.  I can choose a serving and then a portion of a serving.  I would prefer to be able to add grams or oz. by the number.  I weigh most of my food and to be able to add the amount by weight would be a great help.  in addition, when I change my profile weight and receive a recommended daily calorie  intake the app does not change to the new allowances even though I saved the changed.  That said, I'll keep looking.

title: Motives Me!!
body: Love this app. Easy to use. Works great for someone that wants a minimally invasive system. I thought this would be me, but I actually find it fun to keep track. If it's getting later in the day & I want something that's just over my calorie limit it makes me want to workout! I feel like I've earned my snack after a good run.

title: Best database so far, nice interface
body: The database is expensive and somehow fairly manages international foods.  This is quite important when deciding for a tool like this one.

user_name: Hot mama of give and counting
title: Love this app
body: Easy to use the updated version has so much more resources to enter your information to help you learn to eat right and lose weight. I had an unexpected baby at the age of 34 but with some will power and help from this app. I got back to my pre-baby weight in less time then when I was much younger.

title: Very Good Aid in Tracking Calories, Burned & Eaten
body: I have been tracking my exercise and food intake since 4/9/14.  This app has been very helpful in meeting my weight loss goal and my daily exercise goal.  I wish that they had more of the food products and restaurant items for my area of the country, but it is very easy to enter items and dishes into the app.  Well worth the small price.

title: Seems to be helping
body: My daughter suggested this app since it is one that she uses too.  I find it helpful because it makes you aware of your eating habits which then you can change.  Have actually lost some weight and will continue to see if I can reach my goals. Very easy to use so far.

title: Love this app!
body: I've used it off and on for several years and it seems to be better every time I do. It may not be 100% accurate on calories for all foods, but it's close enough for me. I definitely recommend for ease of tracking your daily calories, water intake, weight, and much more!

title: Loving the app
body: Today is my first day of a long journey! I found this app on my phone and so far it's helping me track everything I eat and my first routine at the gym. Which is also my first day there!! I'm putting small goals to eventually get to the finish line.. I'm doing a 30 day challenge! Let's see how it turns out :)

title: Great app
body: The best part is being able to scan barcodes and have them go right into your tracker after you say the quantity you consumed.  The app is actually better than the website, which gets a C at best, but since they synch, it's not a problem. Synchs with my iPad & computer & with my iPhones health app. Wish it synced with FitBit!

title: Sooo easy. Great results
body: Lost 15 lbs in 1 year. You need to be honest,track "Everything"

title: Fun app
body: I really like this app! It is easy to track food and water intake. I love the extensive library it has. It seems like adding foods is pretty easy.

title: Exactly what I've needed to be more accountable
body: Anytime I search online for nutritional value, I end up on the livestrong website. So, why not use the app?! Its the most thorough resource I've found - and super easy to add custom foods/ meals. The mPoints thing is a little annoying but I'm guessing that would go away if I upgraded to the pay version.

title: Love it
body: I have just started using this app and I'm already hooked. The calorie counter is easy to use and looking up food quick and easy, and if you can't find a particular food you can input it manually. I can track my weight and calories per day - just what I need.

title: Best Calorie Counter App!
body: I've never seen an app allow you to adjust your calories to whatever you want. This app rewards you with points when you do healthy things to achieve your health goals. It allows you to feel instant gratification, which holds you over until you achieve the big goals! :)

title: Great app!
body: Such an easy to use app that allows you to WANT to record what you've eaten and your workout of the day so you can watch your progress in front of your eyes! I look forward to using it every day and learning how bad some foods that I used to put in my body were! The calorie tracker is so great, I wouldn't use any other app.

title: Decent
body: This is a decent app, but not great. I love the look, it's easy to read and not overwhelming with tons of info like some apps.  I wish it had the option to scan barcodes like other apps. Instead of hunting down a list of items to find the closest match, it would be helpful to scan a barcode of my actual groceries to get the most accurate numbers. Ill have to find the app I had a few phones ago.

title: LOVE it!
body: So easy to use and keeps me on track. I especially love tracking my water intake with the Sync app MyWater. I'm really bad about drinking enough water each day. Using the additional app with reminder settings, I have managed to drink more than the recommended daily water intake. It's way easier to use than the Weight Watchers app.

title: LiveStrong
body: Have used this app for almost a year. Very pleased with app. Been very useful. Keeps me on track when I slip a little. Just wish I could edit my food list through app. Have doubles on several foods and would like to delete some food items.

title: Was so much better before the recent updates
body: I would have given the app 5 stars if it were the same as before the recent updates. It was so simple and user friendly, yet it allowed me to do so much! Now it's not so simple and it doesn't sync my steps from my health app like it used to!

title: Pretty Good
body: This app is pretty good. Not only does it have some of its own exercises, but you can track your burned calories/calorie intake, pretty easily. You can also track your breakfast, lunch, and dinner, easily. The only problem I have with this app is it's "Scanning" process. If I want to scan the barcode of an item I'm going to eat, it will not work. Otherwise, this app is great.
response: Hi Stella46712- thanks for your review! We're glad you are finding the MyPlate app easy to use.

title: Great app!
body: I really like the ease of finding foods on this app. Was confused at first because I was looking at the day's total for carbs etc. Then got the upgraded version so it split for each meal. Also wish that when people post a serving size for an item you knew what that serving size was.  Would like to see sodium added to nutrition total. Barcode doesn't always work

title: Good fitness diary
body: Works well without crashes, good food database, keeps track of standard workouts.  Doesn't track TotalGym workouts or other gravity based workouts due to the number of variables involved but you can substitute some of the example workouts.  Walking, running, etc are easy to track.  Good app and free.

title: Nice, but key pieces are broken
body: I originally loaded the app on my phone and loved it, except for some of the food descriptions, minor. Then I loaded the app on my iPad and synced it with my phone and found that it changed my weight without asking. I loved how skinny the app thought I was, but I'm not there yet. Nevertheless it changed all of my daily calorie goals and I can't seem to go back and fix it. It's made one of the core features of the app unusable and I will now probably delete it. Bummer! Please fix.

title: Useful, not flawless
body: I use this app religiously, and 90% of the time it is great. What keeps me from giving this app 5 stars is the fact that it wont always function when creating a new food. It is exceedingly frustrating to copy all this data from the nutrition facts only to have your progress erased. When this app works it is really quite useful.

title: Mr
body: This app has some very nice features but also some drips flaws. First, its implementation of the Harris-Benedict equations for basal metabolic rate is incomplete, out of date and inaccurate, especially for seniors. As a result, calculation of calorie requirements can be significantly inaccurate. Second, the food caloric data base contains many user inputs which can be grossly inaccurate and not identified as such. Third, there is a history of serious bugs leading to the corruption and loss user records and settings.

title: Great help
body: This is a very useful and SIMPLE app. I've only used for one day so far but am impressed especially with the preloaded fast food and packaged foods to keep me honest.

title: Wish I could hide my weight and sync Fitbit
body: I like this app and the scan works very well. Everything is intuitive but I don't like that my weight shows on the days I update and I wish I could sync my fit bit steps instead of my iPhone. I do not use my iPhone steps. But I will still use this tracker as it correlates with ChooseMyPlate. I did upgrade for no ads.

title: Love it!
body: I like that you can scan barcodes of food and it logs it in for you!  So easy and fun to use.  It really shows what and how much you are eating, a great way to get control of your diet. Calories add up fast in daily life, and this app allows you to keep yourself in the daily calorie range to lose or maintain your weight.

title: Best food app there is
body: I've tried a lot of the food apps and usually I get discouraged due to the lack of variety of foods provided by the app but this one has all the foods and if it doesn't I can use the scan and it works great. There's also a water tracker and exercise tracker. It's all easily accessible and presented really well.

title: Awesome
body: This app is awesome. I love how interactive and how easy it is to use. The UI is very user friendly. So far it's much better to use than My Fitness Pal, which was just straight up annoying to count my calories. I'm glad I found this app, it's going to make counting calories and losing weight that much easier now.

title: Love it but there's annoying bugs.
body: The calories burned number goes up and down. No rhyme or reason I can find. Very frustrating to see Im 90 calories under my goal and then see that its 63 over, when I haven't eaten anything. Its gotta be some issue with reading the health movement data.

title: Fantastic, Easy, and fun app!
body: This app actually made me look forward to tracking my calories and putting in my exercise for the day! To make it even better, I wish I could track my walking with a pedometer through this app!  But all in all I love how many varieties of food options you have. It made it fast and easy to keep track of my calories!

title: Livestrong
body: I like the app & I want to keep using it, but there are some issues that need to be fixed. Such as inaccurate math sums. This app adds and subtracts incorrectly. The other thing is the scan feature. It doesn't scan anything. If these things could be fixed I will change my rating to a 5 and tell many others to use it. Thanks.

title: Torn between 3 and 4 stars
body: I absolutely LOVE this app. But one thing a really struggle with is the barcode scanner. It hardly ever knows what I've scanned and when it does the calories/contents are usually incorrect. I would love to have the option to scan a barcode and either edit the values or enter in my own for future reference. It would make tracking so much easier!

title: Love the app, but . . .
body: A couple of things.  With the upgrade before today's, you moved and shrank the scan button. It is way too tiny on my phone screen now.

title: Great presentation - easy to use
body: I've been a user for about 3 months. It's easy to use, and there is a large database of food so that I rarely need to enter data manually. I like the presentation of graphs and stats.  More than once App has lost all data and I've had to uninstall and reinstall to recover the data - I think it's pulling my archived info from the Livestrong website.

title: Never give up
body: I love this app it helps me stay on track daily, it helps me not give up on my daily intakes it even reminds me to update my breakfast when I wake up, I highly recommend this to anyone, though it's taking me a while to lose weight.. This app keeps me not to ever give up I'm down 7 pounds ... Yippi thank you Sandra

title: This app helps me stay consistent with my diet!
body: I use this app everyday. Now that I can track all of the foods I eat and set a calorie goal according to my exercise, I actually think I've lost a few pounds! I highly recommend this app because it's convenient and easy to use plus helps you stay on track.

title: Better than My Fitness Pal
body: I just got this app this week and already I like it much better than the My Fitness Pal app. I actually deleted My Fitness Pal and this one has replaced it. Not that this has anything to do with function, but I also like he layout better. It looks more appealing and less boring.

title: Love it
body: Love this app! Very easy to use large data Bank of food items in the scan feature when those don't appear. Seems like there might be some glitch with the new OS 9, but hopefully that will be corrected soon - search features are not working right. Knowing live Strong, they will have the problem corrected quickly.

title: Great app
body: This app is the perfect way to help you track your meals and makes you aware of not just what you are eating, but how much and portion size as well.  I find myself making better choices, including choosing not to have something if I am too close to my goal for the day. Very pleased with this app.

title: Great app
body: I love this app.  It's easy to use and helps me stay accountable.  I especially love the reminder it gives if I forget to log my activity for the day.  Since using this app, I have learned that I have been undereating and over exercising.  I must have app for anyone looking to make a connection between food intake and energy output.

title: Not Bad...Some bugs
body: Not a bad app, especially the database of foods. Speeds entry of daily calories. Some annoying bugs though cause the program to close spontaneously. Haven't used other similar programs, so I can't compare, but this one meets my needs for now. If you want to keep track of what your eating and lose weight based on calories, this might work for you.

title: Very surprised
body: I work out everyday and try to watch what I eat...but the way this app breaks down your intake it showed me things I wouldn't have expected in relation to what I was eating. Looking forward to seeing results of better managed meals on my health and fitness. I only wish there were suggested foods and meals to meet your goals.

title: It's ok
body: It's just an ok app.. As for the app it works well, but doesn't have a lot of features as myfittnesspal.. And the gold membership is a complete rip off! You pay for nothing! They offer a refund in the first 30days, however if you purchase through iTunes or google play you can't get the refund! And there is no way to just purchase a month membership it automatically makes you buy the one year! There are other better apps that offer more for free!!

title: Two years and counting
body: Great app. I have used this app to track my caloric intake on-and-off for over two years. When I use it, I am much more aware of my food intake and generally lose weight successfully. I like the app and especially appreciate the "scan" feature. The only problem is me. I get lazy or busy and quit using it. Yeah, it's a personal problem.

title: Great app
body: I use the free version and I love it. It keeps track off all my carbs, calories and protein. Which for a post op bariatric it's very important. It also connects with my iPhone steps and keeps track of calories burned. It has almost every food that you can eat in there, and if they don't you can add it. Super simple design!!

title: I'm about to give this app up
body: It used to be that I could identify what I ate and pick from that list for breakfast lunch or dinner. Now with recent updates, if I eat something at lunch and scan it in,  it's not available in the list when I go to enter what I had for dinner the next day... only for lunch. Don't the people that write this software used the app? Why would I have to put something in multiple times?

title: Outstanding
body: Was awesome before. They just changed the format and now there is no pie chart to track macros. It isn't nearly as attractive and user friendly as before. I don't know why these apps can't leave well enough alone. I contacted them on twitter and said if the pie chart does not return i am bailing to myfitnesspal

title: Easy to use and keep track of eating habits
body: Very easy to track calories and foods Or meals I eat and the app also has demo exercises one can do in the confort of home only sometimes can be hard to count calories based on foods that do not have barcodes so have to weight and or measure your food

title: Awesome app.
body: Amazing app. Helps track essential calories and by doing so I've lost weight!!! I also appreciate being able to add calories from other exercising.

title: Very helpful app
body: This app has certainly opened my eyes to the amount of calories I consume in a day, resulting in more mindful decisions about what I choose to eat. The list of foods programmed in the menus to select from are very impressive. I would definitely recommend this app to anyone looking for a non-cumbersome way to track their calories.

title: Super easy
body: Very simple to use,  large database of foods, scanning bar codes very useful. Like  that you can add in your exercise, and of course use on smartphone as well as home computer. Didn't see much value in the water tracker.  Found the nutrient analysis a little off, when I knew I had eaten the RDA of Vitamin A the daily summary showed I had only eaten a fraction of the RDA, hence was not altogether convinced of accuracy.

title: All info gone!
body: Grr!!! Been tracking for over a year now. Have had no problems. Loved the most recent update too. Was adding my lunch today when the app froze then closed. When I reopened it all info was gone. Not just from today, but from the entire history. So p*ssed. Guess I will be switching to FitDay.

title: Love
body: Love everything about this app! My only complaint is that I wish there was a larger database for fast foods...panera etc and more items from Walmart and Aldi to scan from...just takes a long time to fine the information and out it in manually...overall this is the best app I've come across and it's not annoying and is very user friendly!

title: I wanted to love it but‚Ä¶
body: The concept of having a calorie counter with an integrated exercise tracker is a wonderful idea but Livestrong missed the mark with this app. It crashes, freezes and even worse, loses previous entered data from previous days. Very frustrating! It works well with Apple's Health app but it inaccurately adds ALL of the calories from all the other exercise apps you may be using, including iPhone's own tracker.

title: My plate review
body: Works very well.  Would be even better if the apps in iPad and iPhones would interconnect.  Now you can keep up with information in one but you must enter at least the totals in the other since they don't communicate.  I end up keeping data on the iPhone and entering totals only in the iPad.

title: Excellent tool
body: I have used this app in conjunction with running and now also strength training for the past year...I've used it for every single day, every bite- I've  lost 40 pounds! 168 lbs to 128 lbs.

title: Solid App
body: I am a very active athlete with extremely high protein, carb, and fat needs. I workout in the gym and I play ice hockey everyday. MyPlate helps me be on top of everything I eat throughout the day and let's me see the good and bad sides of all the foods I eat. Also very convenient being that it's on my phone and I can scan or add the foods not on here. Great app.

title: Love this but please add fruit & vegetable servings tracker
body: I love that Live Strong's MyPlate is a great resource with an extensive food listing. Health is not just about calories and that's addressed somewhat. I would LOVE to see servings of fruits and vegetables in the daily summary. Not all carbs are the same and so much research show how vitally important these are. It would be a perfect app with this simple addition!

title: Asking for more information to get into my app my  email
body: Is correct they're saying email is in used how is this possible this the second time this as giving me problems this app is helpful now it's acting up!!!! If it's not resolve I will move to another one. #FIXIT

title: Wow!  Easy and Easy
body: I have been a real fan of Livestrong and have been a member for over two years, but I stopped using the calorie tracker because it took effort to go to the computer, remember to do it, etc. I recently got an iPhone and thought I'd see if there was a Livestrong app and what a simple, intuitive one it is!  Good job!

title: Love This App!
body: This app makes calorie counting fun! I love that it keeps a running count of the calories that I have left to consume if I want to stick with my goal! Many times, I have gone out to exercise so that I could eat a eat a little more. This app definitely keeps me on task when it comes to keeping my weight in check!

title: Live strong App
body: Glitchy.  I rated it as glitchy months ago and it is still the same.  Crashes every time I try to use it.  Makes it not even worth using!

title: Great but can be better
body: I LOVE this app! Makes it super easy for me to track my calories. It has been a lot of help with my weight loss but I feel like there can still be some improvements. I would love it even more if it could scan the barcodes for some of my food. It's easier for me to track the calories that way. Either way it's still a great app.

title: Best Dieting App Ever!
body: I have been using this app for over a week and it is so easy to use and is so accurate when you can scan a label and it automatically reads the nutritional information and allows for adjustment of serving, plus it is so easy to use because of the scanning option. Best App for dieting... Love it!!! üíìüíìüíì

title: MyPlate
body: This is an amazing app! It is a great way to track what you eat. It even has reminders that remind you to track your food. Not only does it track food, but also how much water you drink, your weight, your calories and more. I've been using this app for four years and I love it!

title: Really great!!
body: I love this app. As someone who is really active it is helpful to track how much I'm eating because I usually don't eat enough to sustain how much i work out. I really like that you can add how much water and how much of a serving you have. And the scanning feature is really convenient. Anyone can benefit from this app.

title: BIG flaw
body: The app SHOULDN'T ask for user submitted calories, it should do the math. All these idiots adding calories for us to plug in don't do the math and apparently can't read. They put 290g of fat instead of 29 and completely threw me off when I was trying to figure out how things didn't add up.

title: Reliable and user friendly
body: Haven't had any issues with this app. I switch between app and website frequently and the forced sync lets me know that my info has transferred. A little irritating that servings can only be logged in 1/4 increments on the app, but a minor complaint.

title: Has potential but issues
body: App does not easily allow you to add your own food with all of the nutritional facts.  It makes you look through a list with entries that are loaded with errors (especially the user submitted entries).  When I've tried to enter my own the "quick add" is too simple and the create new food feature does not save the information I've entered correctly. Food adding issues aside, it's a basic calorie and macro tracker, not fancy.

title: Love the Web extras but...
body: I love the Stronger workouts and the meals look interesting. But I think the app is missing an over all daily nutrition total in grams as well as percentage. I'd like to see more than just my macro nutrient intake. Also, I had issue scanning a few simple items like oat meal and honey. Overall, I love the Stronger web workouts and love how it is all integrated with the app. I just think that the app could use a few extra things. :)

title: Love it, but there is room for improvements
body: I love this app, the only thing that need improvement is the scanner. Most of the time it cannot recognize the items that I scan. And I haven't found a way to send the info to livestrong so they can add it to there system. I end up adding it, but I'm not sure if that information is added to their database.

title: I love this app
body: Did I say I love this app.  Maybe I just haven't figured it out yet...but there is only one thing I would love more...if you could click on breakfast (each individual meal) for that day and see exactly what you entered that day. Recently eaten didnt show multiple entries of the same item in each category.

title: Good tracker
body: I've been using MyPlate for a little over 3 months. It's not perfect, but it's very good. The interface is easy to use, the mobile app gives me all the information I need to keep a reasonable accurate calorie/macro count. The food database is OK, it would be good if it was more comprehensive, but if allows customization, so it works well enough.

title: Great App, Very Helpful
body: I have wanted to lose weight for a while and this app really helps. You can look up most if not all the food you can see on a daily basis. Has most dining locations and movie theaters. Even has a slot for water recording. Would recommend if you don't mind recording every meal.

title: Favorite Calorie, Water, & Workout Tracker
body: It hits all the marks. The charts are useful and the food library has never failed me. The recently added membership option also seems very affordable, but isn't obtrusive if you don't have it. I recommend this one to most of my family and friends!

title: Great app, easy to use but still very powerful/helpful
body: This app once I had it set-up with my apple health and interacting correctly with my exercise apps I loved it. The reminders are great and nonintrusive but help keep you on track. Of all the calorie trackers I've used is the best one with the largest library of food info I've seen!

title: Great!
body: I love this app!! It's everything I want to keep track of what I'm eating to keep me on a healthy diet. I haven't even gone gold but I love how it has pre-entered food items or how you can scan the barcode on your food to get the nutrient info. Setting up a personalized diet and checking your progress is super easy.

title: Bad updates
body: I love this app in general, but the new water recording update is awful. It used to be so easy to record each glass or bottle I drank at a time. Now I need to compute my entire daily intake??? That usually consists of various size glasses with varying amounts and varying sport bottles. Am I missing something? I can't figure out how to just add on to an amount I've already consumed. Please bring back the ability to simply type in an ounce amount.

title: Great program, needs a tweak
body: I have been using this for about six months and like how easy it is to track food, water, exercise and weight.  The one thing I would ask is to be able to create meals from foods already on my list.  I have not been able to do this.

title: User friendly, great app
body: I absolutely love this app. It makes tracking my diet so easy. It's set up in a really user friendly manner too.

title: Great App!
body: I just got an iPad 2 and wanted a way to keep on track with my diet.  Saw this one on LiveStrong and decided to give it a try.  Very impressed with how easy it is to use and really impressed with the food database.  I thought I would have to put in a lot of custom items.  But I've been using it for a couple of weeks and so far everything I've eaten is in the database.

title: Awesome
body: This app helps you identify what's in the food you are eating or you can enter it yourself.  I really like how you can choose your general activity level.  I had a week where I was medically confined to the couch and it identified the difference in the calories I needed!   This has helped keep me honest and keep my weight from trending up!

title: Good tracker but also disappointing
body: I purchased the app for my phone but it doesn't sync with the online site . . decided to look at it for my iPad and again . . no syncing between devices.  This is one area that needs attention. Other calorie trackers I looked at do sync but I chose Livestrong because the social media has to be clicked on special to access. I hope they'd fix this lack of syncing between devices.

title: Excellent App
body: I have used My Plate on the computer and liked it, and this app is even better! It's easy to use and you don't have to set up an account, your info is right there when you open the app. I like that you can track food, exercise, water, weight, nutrients, etc all in one place

title: Love this app
body: This app is great! Not only is it helping you keep track of your calorie intake and weight but it also gives you rewards for that. I would suggested it to anyone! The only thing that could be improved is the small amount of exercises they track but overall its great!

title: Excellent food database
body: Best database I've dealt with on my iPhone.  Has foods from most chain restaurants (ate at CPK yesterday and my entree was in the database already).  I've been able to add my own homemade stuff to my database.  I do wish there were more ethnic dishes tho as I eat Thai and Vietnamese frequently.  Also, this Lite verion crashes on me several times a day (throws me out of program or just freezes up).

title: B
body: I started using my fitness pal and this at the same time to see which one I liked better. Unexpectedly, I choice this because I was awarded achievements.  I haven't used the points earned from the achievements but it motivates me to track everything and stay on course.  Six pounds lost and 25 - 30 pounds to go!

title: It's amazing!
body: After only about 2 days I started to get the hang of it but it was amazing when I first started. It actually DOES keep you accountable of the food that you eat, the drinks that you drink and even the exercise. If you truly want to do better and want to have a better diet, this is the app for you :)

title: Superb
body: This app has been a tremendous help in keeping on track with all my diet goals, it tracks all my macros, makes entering or even scanning food extremely easy. I don't know how it could get any easier or better to use.

title: Excellent
body: I am really enjoying using this app. I like how it has every food you could think pre-entered so it is easy to log your meals. Also, I am really like the notifications the app sends you at every mealtime to remind you to log what you ate. It is a very reliable and handy tool that I am really enjoying.

title: Great app
body: This app is great and so easy to use. The only thing I would add would be a feature that allows you to see how many fruits, vegetables, protein foods, etc. you are getting each day and have that track over time (to see progress) and in comparison to what nutritionists recommend.

title: Very good app, great look
body: Tracking is very easy, visually appealing and easy to read.  Of the various food diary apps, I like this design best because all the entries are at the top of the page, no scrolling down or opening other pages needed. Plus the design looks great. I'd love more foods and restaurants listed, though, as well as an easier option for creating recipes.

title: Helped me lose a lot of weight
body: I‚Äôve been tracking my calories for well over a year and have lost about 100 lbs.  The app helped me realize how much food I was consuming and assisted me in making healthier choices.  Thank you so much, livestrong!  For providing an app that has changed my life.

title: Amazing
body: I love this app because it works and it helps hold me accountable for what goes in my mouth! It is always a daily reminder that I need to drink more water! I've been using it for about 2 weeks now and every time I want to eat something, I look up the calories and see if it is worth it!

title: Excellent lifestyle app!
body: I've been using this app for years and it keeps getting better. Add a food or activity and instantly see your progress. Want to eat that doughnut? Input it and instantly see how it will impact your goals. This brings clarity to the saying, "You can't exercise your way out of a poor diet".

title: Great App!
body: This helped me gain nearly 4 pounds in only a few weeks! This is a great app and i will definitely be using this again. Adding the food you eat is easy, and you can even scan the barcode to be even more efficient! 99% recommend this app for anyone who wants to gain, lose, or maintain weigt.

title: 5 stars!
body: Really easy to use and I like the layout and scheme of the app itself. I chose it over FitnessPal because it was more colorful and looked more friendly. I do wish the barcode scanner read things easier sometimes but I don't mind just typing it in so really no complaints! I love it!

title: I love this app
body: This app really helps with keeping track of your calories, even if you don't have the full version. I love how you can scan items in and search for them and even make your own if you really can't find it, it's super helpful I highly recommend it

title: If you take it seriously
body: This will help you to eat healthier and lose weight (if that is your goal).  I think if most people were truthful about what they put in their bodies every day, they would be amazed at what crap they are eating.   If you take it seriously, this app will assist you in your goals.

title: Great app
body: Just downloaded and have been using for two days.  Easy to use. Saves all your recent and frequently eaten food which is a nice feature for quickness and easiness. You may think your eating healthy, but until you break it down to the numbers, you really don't know.

title: So this is love
body: Dadadadaa~

title: Loved the old version better
body: I love this app; use it everyday and have for a long time... But this new update changed my calorie goal and won't allow me to set it as low as it was. I won't eat any more calories than before but the information won't be accurate (it will always tell me I have calories to spare) and I'm annoyed that it won't let me decide for myself the number of calories I should eat. It was perfect the way it was. Not happy with the update.

title: Better and better
body: I've been using this app since it came out. Every update makes the app better and better. Every time u see something that can be improved, you guys are on it before I even bring it to your attention. Thanks for staying in too if things. Awesome app!!

title: Follow it and you will lose lbs!
body: Yes you actually have to be truthful and track your actives, calories and weight and it will work, I've lost about 10lbs so far! Get to see what had tons of calories and what has next to none and can pig out on.  Great way to make healthy choices. I also use the nike plus app!

title: Great But Needs More Work!
body: What a great app. The simplicity of the interface is brilliant. I love opening this app. LiveStrong should put more effort into cleaning up the nutritional info. on the foods that users have logged. Less repeat items and more verification. Example: I logged 5 cherry tomatoes and my sodium levels went from 68% to 128%. What? Fix some things like this and it'll be an amazing app.

title: Lost 48 lbs in less than 4 months
body: I started out at 247 lbs and I am now 199 as I write this review. I was using 4 apps at the same time and I stuck with this one because it has almost all the foods out there to track, even local foods. This app has helped me watch what I put into my body and control what to eat. AWESOME, LOVE IT!

title: Many issues, but still works
body: Please: load faster. The 90 seconds it takes to load actually make me want to put my phone down.

title: I love it!
body: I love the fact that it syncs the calories from the health app, as the others I've tried only monitor steps. Those are useless when you do cross training where there or more to it than just steps.

title: Love it! Just what I need
body: This app makes it super easy to keep track of calories and other nutritional intakes. Years ago when I tracked my food I used a manual spreadsheet... This app is amazing. Also has tons of preprogrammed food options with lots of brands to make adding your food easy. I would recommend!

title: Great app!
body: I've only been using it for a week and I have lost almost a pound. I know as I continue to struggle with my eating habits I will be able to lose the weight I want to by using this app! It's great to see the calories I'm taking it because it really makes me aware of what I'm eating and how it will affect me. Highly recommended!!!

title: Fun ap for watching over yourself
body: It had been easy to keep track of my meals and calories through this ap. And it is motivating/interesting to see how the meals and snacks play out. The only thing I don't like is that it isn't detailed in monitoring my nutrients. I would like to see my levels of wellness and not only count calorie/fat. Maybe the upgrade shows this?

title: Needs updates
body: Its a great app with a huge database when searching foods you've eaten. I like being able to see my calories and protein, but saturated fat would be nice!  My biggest complain is that there isn't a big enough database for the exercises. Maybe they can change it to look like Nexercise so we know what exercises are available to record.

title: I'm assuming the paid version is better...
body: This app doesn't let you select any preset exercises. How would I know how many calories I've burnt from walking/jogging/swimming??  Other apps like this usually allow you to select the amount of time and the intensity with which you worked out and then gives an estimate of calories burned.  I'm glad it does give breakdowns for what percent of carbs/fat/protein you have in your diet.

title: Most comprehensive and easy to use
body: I have tried several.  MyPlate seems to be more comprehensive than others to lead W the food diary which seems to have just about every dish in multiple cuisines.  The more comprehensive workout section makes it a complete one stop shop

title: Awesome for food tracking
body: There are so many great capabilities of this app that I don't use but the thing I do use is the food tracker. Almost every food I scan the barcode of comes up! If the barcode isn't registered I can almost always still find it by searching. I love this app!

title: Love this app
body: I have used many other calorie tracking apps and they never seem to be accurate. This app tracks your steps and everything through your iPhone and it makes it so much easier to log the food you eat. I highly recommend!!

title: Great app to help keep track of literally everything!
body: This is a great app and not hard to use either!! I had problems in the past with in app purchase or can't find my way around the application it's self but MyPlate has a minimalist set up and has everything you NEED for free !

title: Great app
body: In the past 2 months this app has helped me track my meals and activity quite easily. I've lost 11 pounds! This is much easier to use than the Weight Watchers app. I have no trouble finding the foods I want to add. It reminds me to track meals, but it doesn't nag me incessantly. I like that the app is free. Thank you, Livestrong!

title: Great for food awareness
body: I'm using this to log my meals, and it really helps me focus on good things to eat.  I'm packing my lunch and healthful snacks, and I'm motivated to make a well balanced dinner to keep within my goal.  Wasn't sure how it was working, haven't been weighing myself, but, a pair of pants that were too tight just weeks ago slipped on easily this morning!  So, it is definitely working!

title: Thank you!
body: I'm so excited this app exists as it has been a wonderful tool for helping to keep my improving health on track! One minor thing, if I could see my the cumulative number of steps and calories burned as that could help me plan how much activity is needed to accomplish my goal. Is it there? Did I miss it?

title: FANTASTIC
body: I have used other meal and  calorie trackers before but none of them have been as good as this one. It is easy to use and fun. Simple and gives you a lot of options for food and exercise. The barcode scanner is fantastic. I have used this app for a year and I won't ever go to a different one. It is the best.

title: Great for tracking for weight gain
body: The app has most the foods I look for and has helped to make sure I get enough calories to bulk.  The exercise isn't as helpful and I often can't find the lifts I do (basic lifts: squat, bench press, overhead press). I just stopped using the exercises and only track my calories.

title: Great app!
body: This is a great app! I love that I can get in quick workouts and it will give me ideas! Also, it lets you track ahead of time and set meals automatically, which is great! Thanks to whomever made this app. I use it a lot and it makes me realize how many calories I eat each day, so I stay on track.

title: Complete and helpful!
body: I've used other calorie counters before but got so frustrated because the food I ate and the brands I buy weren't listed. This app has everything! It's only four stars instead of five because I wish the weekly averages were included on the free app instead of the gold app you have to pay for, but otherwise it's a stellar app.

title: lost 15 lbs and gained muscles
body: I started using the App in June. It was recommended by Equinox. I have lost 15 lbs and kept training sonI gained muscles. I feel sexy and confident. I have the knowledge of nutritional values & to balance my day between protein, carbs & fat.

title: Easy to Use
body: I got so frustrated with "Eat This Way" app I came back to this easy to use app! LIVESTRONG provides all the macronutrient info I need, the only thing I'd change is the 1200 minimum calorie setting. I'm doing the Fat Fast and don't want more than 1000 calories a day for the next 4 days. We should be able to do that, as I don't upload apps to be dictated to, ya know?

title: Love this app
body: I really love this app. I don't usually do reviews but I gotta say I love the one stop shop feel this app has. I can track my food and weight and even see how I'm doing on my Apple Watch. I can even add items from my watch if I wanted. Overall I like this out of the thousand options out there.

title: Awesome App
body: Recommend to all. Just follow your calorie intake and be honest and it will work.  Don't be on a hurry, as if you are picking 2 pounds a week it will work. If you cheat you will gain. However do not blame the app you are the one who is eating the wrong foods or Not recording your food and liquid intake. This app lets you take charge of your life.

title: I love this app :)
body: I've been using this for a few months now, and it has really helped me stay on task with calorie and weight goals. If I don't have a good day, I can see that and work harder the next day. This little app has really changed my life and helped me work on being healthier, and ultimately, happier :)

title: Food üëç Exercise üëé
body: I've been using the app for a few weeks. It great on tracking food, but it doesn't recognize a lot of the exercises I do. I'm in a CrossFit class and it would be nice to know how many calories I burn doing basic things pull ups and dead weight snatches. I've been having to Google the calories burned and input them manually into the app.

title: You will love it!
body: This is a great tool for anyone who is

title: Get Smart About What You Eat
body: When I started losing weight in January of This year I was never gaining ground because I didn't understand what was going into my body. Well 48 pounds later (as of this morning) and thanks to this app, I am a changed person, and I still have a ways to go before I am done.

title: LOVE IT!!!
body: I love this app so much! I gained 10 pounds and thanks to this app, I've been able to track what I'm consuming & how many calories I'm consuming. I love how this app takes exercise into account so I can get an accurate amount of calories consumed. I couldn't think of any ways to improve it even if I tried!

title: I did it!
body: With the app I was able to lose over 30 lbs! I never thought just tracking my calories could help me lose the weight. I was 169 lbs and now I'm 138! Take your life into your back into your own hands. I plan to lose another 10 but that will come with exercise!

title: Great
body: I really love this app, the main screen shows everything i wanna see with great colors . It tracks food and water intakes, calories burned and footsteps , has a community  which I enjoy reading . Until now i find it

title: Great tracking tool!
body: The only thing missing would be a place for notes.   It certainly makes you think about what you eat and shows you how many more calories you consume tan you think.  Another thing that would be good is if it showed how much sodium, fat, nutrients, etc. you consume.

title: My plate
body: I love this app. It is so helpful and convenient. It has most restaurants programmed in, so all you have to do is type in the name and it brings up the food they sell. It really takes the guess work out of counting your calories.

title: Great app for tracking food intake!
body: Extensive list of foods with picture of manufacturer that makes it very easy to add up daily intake. Started using this for my son that had cancer and needed to track calories to gain weight. Now I use it in combination with Map My Run and I move over calories burnt in workouts.

title: Good App...But Needs Work
body: The original MyPlate browser based tracker on Livestrong has tracking of insulin and blood glucose readings, making it ideal for Diabetes management.

title: A great help
body: Love it! Much easier than Weight Watchers & other tools I've used. Only change I'd make is when searching food, it would go back to list so you can add more, instead of going back to main menu for frequent foods, recently eaten, etc. However, it's so good, I'm shocked it's free! Thanks for helping me get healthy.

title: I'm a believer
body: This app has helped me out a great deal. It's my first time weighing myself since I started with the app last week and I lost 3.2 lbs. while this app alone won't physically make you loose weight, it will track what you put in which means you are more likely to be held accountable. It's working for me.  I am loving livestrong

title: Good start
body: I wrote everything down on paper the last three months and surf the net to get calories info.  I was resistance to using app. After 3months I got tired of looking up and through my handwritten journal.  Now I began using this free trial app and it's a good start.  It saves the foods I ate for future resources.  It is easy to use and I can track easily. Thanks for this APP. I would recommend it.

title: Best solution
body: Love the rewards system. Searchable database is community built, so keep an eye out for discrepancies, but typically reliable. Easy way to keep a food+calorie log! Put in your usual workout regimen and weigh yourself regularly, and you'll see and FEEL results! It won't do it for you, but it's a handy tool to help you get it done!

title: Wow! really helpful!
body: This app is really helping me to be aware of what I am eating. I'm losing weight for the first time in years and learning a lot about packaged foods. Now I eat more fresh foods but can still have my sweets by learning proportions . I have also started water aerobics which is a huge help, and I feel so much better physically.

title: Great app
body: This app is great. I use it everyday, and it's really cool to earn points while I'm tracking my food/exercise. I live being able to see my carb/protein/fat ratios for training. The only thing I don't like is the fact that I can't see those ratios after midnight. I work late, so sometimes I can't see my ratios by the end if the night, and then they're gone forever.

title: Better than paper
body: This app is much like how I record my calories on paper with the convince

title: Awesome!
body: This is a five star app, not only does it allow you to take advantage of what and how you eat. But, will dramatically change your life if your serious about wanting to lose weight or stay physically fit! Now download this app if your up for a challenge, you won't be disappointed.

title: All the features!
body: This app has it all, and segues perfectly with all kinds of diets. Love that I can manually enter what isn't in the database. Syncs my account and the rewards are easy to accumulate and easy to spend. Only complaint is that it tends to crash when watching sponsor videos for bonus points.

title: Great tool
body: Hi all! I want to let you know how helpful this app has been. I've lost 4 pounds in just over a week by counting calories and working out. I've tried other apps in the past but this has proven most effective for me. Give it a try! There's nothing to lose besides those pesky unwanted pounds!
response: Woohoo! So glad to hear that MyPlate is helping you achieve your goals fitmom02!

title: It WAS my favorite but they completely destroyed it with the last update
body: I was a real fan of this app. I even paid for a premium subscription. I went to log my dinner last night only to discover that they had mixed my logs with someon else's! All my logs are now useless! I contacted support only to be told they were working on it and to log into the website as that was still OK... Well, it happened there too... This was not just a little bug it was a HUGE bug that made the app useless... Back to the old stand by I go.

title: Needs more work
body: This app is great! But it needs tweaking.  It now forces me to login every time instead of remembering me. Needs a option to stay logged in always. Won't login using Facebook even though it's been authorized connected. It's a hassle. When searching foods need the ability to browse by name of food but also by vendor. Foods should identify the brand separated from food name in a consistent way so the database isn't cluttered or hard to find the right food

title: Great app
body: This is a great app. You can track your calories, food eaten, and weight with it, get short, full body workouts with it, and lose, gain, or stay at the same weight depending on what you want. I recommend it to anyone trying to lose weight, get in shape, and or trying to build muscle

title: Creates Better Habits
body: Reminders keep you on track with logging food. It's nice to be able to look up items before you eat them. It really makes you think twice before overeating. I like the tie in with the Apple Watch's activity monitor. Great app for anyone who wants to develop better habits.

title: Couldn't have done it without it
body: I've been trying to lose weight since I gave birth to my two boys but didn't know where to start. This app helped me track what I eat and exercise. It's been two weeks and already lost 5 lbs. very happy.. Couldn't have done it without it

title: Love it!
body: MyPlate keeps me in check. This app has almost everything I eat in order to log the correct amount of calories. If the food isn't already in the system I can add it. To me that is amazing. The Reminders help me to remember to stay disciplined and drink enough water. I'm totally seeing results!!!

title: Very good and easy to use
body: Love the scanner feature, hard to find food that isn't on there

title: Love this app
body: I downloaded 3 different meal tracking apps before this one and was super annoyed that the macro counting option was only available with a monthly subscription. This app does it all and is quite comprehensive to use. I especially like the scan option to input new foods.

title: It's a great app once again
body: This app is again very useful and user-friendly, now that they have added back the pie chart (showing daily cumulative protein/ carb/ fat ratio) that they deleted last week.
response: Hi - The pie chart is still available! You can view by clicking the mini pie chart icon in the right hand corner of your Food Diary.

title: Horrible
body: This app is just so horrible Every time I go on the app it tells me the calories I've lost and it just keeps losing calories by itself every time I log in on the app the calories change it's so annoying even when I am not moving it changes by itself it's so stupid and also I tried to edit an exercise I did I tried changing the number of minutes I did it for and it just kept adding more and more calories this app needs work!!!! I am just very unhappy with this app
response: Hi there. We are so sorry for the experience you've had! We would love to assist you with the issues you have reported. Please email us at support@livestrong.com so that we can help you out!

title: So far so good.
body: Everything is really easy to use for iPhone. Samsung has some missing materials such as the barcode reader. Maybe I'm not use to Samsung. But iPhone the app is fantastic. Havin numerous workouts and their calories per hour and what seems like millions of foods, this app is easy to keep track of your intake.

title: Great app, could use improvement in calorie burn count
body: This is a great and easy to use app. The only problem I have is that I don't know how it calculates burned calories. Is it just a simple pedometer? It would be nice if you could use it in conjunction with another app that has a more accurate way of calorie burn calculation- like one that is able to measure pulse, speed, etc.

title: Easy to use & effective
body: Over 50 and trying to get my fitness leave improved w diet and exercise. This app is so easy to use and the database has such an extensive variety of food and exercise making input so simple, truly helping me keep track and be aware - thank you for a great app!

title: Easy to use with scanner
body: I'm so excited that this app (and others) started using the scanner to find what food you eat. Otherwise it had always been a hassle and a guessing game. Smooth and you don't even have to use an account if you don't want to. Super easy to use.

title: Never paying for WW again..
body: Great app, I haven come across any food I haven't been able to find. One week in an 5lbs down! Great feature is the reminder to put on your meals that come right as you are eating so you don't forget. Also it tracks my motion as long as I keep my phone on me.

title: Good App - Small Bugs
body: The food database has duplicates, some with different calorie counts for the same items.  On the iPad version, changing the right side window to a prior date does not bring up the summary for that date in the left side window.

title: I love this App
body: It is really amazing App. Really helpful to get you familiar with what you consume each day and help you to choose better options. It also works with apple watch and automatically counts calories you burn. I love this app. It helped me to loose 20 lbs and correct my bad eating habits. I recommend it to everyone.

title: Enjoy the app, makes it easy
body: Been using Livestrong for six years. Makes it super easy to track all my progress in one spot. If they could add anything it would be a way to log "days off" like vacations & special events so the app doesn't nag me when I'm just not gonna track.

title: Awesome App
body: This app really helps me keep track of everything I eat to the T. The fact that it allows you to scan the bar codes of items you consume gives you the power to know the exact amount of Protein, Fats, Carbs, etc. to keep on you the money with your diet or healthy eating habits!

title: Love it, love it, love it!
body: Love this app!  Was using this app then switched to NUMI when I started the Nutrisystem program but have switched back. The other app won't even scan their own foods which this app does!  The only bummer is that it doesn't break out the morning snacks, afternoon snacks, and evening snacks; which is helpful for me.

title: A 4.5 really
body: Love the app.  Teaches you more than you thought possible about your own intake.  Also good for an elimination diet.  App has a few glitches at times.  But so far restarting usually does the trick.  Would probably buy upgrade if more to it than just no ads.  Ads don't bother me at all.

title: The info's all wrong
body: You actually burn most of your calories while sleeping, so there's no reason to make a fuss about how many calories you burned and/or consumed.

title: Amazing! Must have app!
body: No one will know if I sneak a candy bar...ohhh I will have to log it...no thanks! Is that Pepsi really worth 200 calories...ummmm no way! Well I don't really feel like exercising today...but I really like to see it logged! Ummm...love this app...so easy to use...holds me accountable...so proud of myself...seeing results after only 2 weeks!

title: No QR Scanner
body: I liked the setup of this journal- it's very easy to use and adding food takes just a moment. However, I do prefer the apps that let you scan the barcode on packaging like My Fitness Pal. If they added that feature (maybe it's in the paid version, I didn't check) then I would definitely stay with this one.

title: Livestrong: My Plate
body: Great app for tracking calories! Tons of foods in the database and the app is very easy to use. Could use some updates to the exercise database and I'd like to see and RDA chart along with the calories goal so you can track your RDA for things such as fat, cholesterol, sodium, etc. like you can on the online site.

title: Solid app
body: So after using MFP last year I switched to this one, I really like it so far and would recommend it to anyone looking to track what they are consuming, their exercises and goals. it is nice to have a clear breakdown of what's happening so you can progress towards a happier and healthier life.

title: Easy to use and great features!
body: I have been using this app for two weeks. The scan feature is awesome, and the search feature is very detailed. I am really enjoying the app, and being able to track keeps me motivated. It even reminds me if I haven't tracked for the day.

title: Great app
body: The only thing I wish was a little better is the exercise tracking. I would prefer to put in the time and distance for running or walking. The treadmill calories seem a little off. It would be nice to scroll through a list of activities.

title: Ahhhh STOP the annoying moving ads!!
body: I was going to rate this higher but some annoying moving ads have been showing up. I cannot make them go away and I'm not buying the app now just in spite of these ads.

title: Suggestions
body: I love this app, especially the automatic exercise tracker for the 5s.  I have a couple of suggestions. I like to track my vitamins and meds. It would be great if there was a section for this that would take "0" for the calories for some meds. Also, please allow decimals when entering nutrition values. I round but it bugs me that it's not precise. Otherwise, great app!

title: Great way to stay on track
body: Without keeping a journal of how much you eat during the day, you're unaware of jut how many calories you intake. This app allows you to quickly enter frequently eaten foods or even customized meals while you sit down to eat, making you stay on track with your calories in-calories out! Very convenient and easy to use.

title: Many uses
body: Although I don't use it to track my caloric intake, I do use it for (1) knowing roughly how many calories I need in a day to maintain my current weight, (2) knowing how many calories in junk food (it has entries for fast food), (3) estimating "healthy" proportions so I don't overeat/indulge unknowingly. And it works without wifi and is free. Yay!

title: Simplest Format! Keeps me motivated
body: I've used other food/fitness apps but I always come back to MyPlate. No other app has more food brands stored in their system so you don't have to manually enter all the nutrient facts. Same with fitness activities. Everything from different mileage speeds to circuit training. I will never stray!

title: Needs improvement
body: Initially I thought this app was great the first couple days. Then I realized that you cannot add a custom meal to it. Example if you ate a tuna sandwich at home, you cannot put what type of bread you ate it with or how much condiments you added to it. They have a database of food that is already in there and you can only choose from their list which is stupid!! Unless I am doing something wrong...

title: Very Useable!
body: I wanted some easy to use and I got it.  Just watch out because people put products and their input doesn't match the labels.  I like how it remembers foods I've eaten.  I don't use the exercise monitoring feature as it increases my calorie allowance, I do wish I could track what I do though.  I have tried many food trackers, this one is the best for me!

title: Better than the web site
body: I find that this iOS app is faster and easier to use then the corresponding functionality on their website. It's almost effortless keeping track of your intake and exercise using this nicely done app.

title: I want old one back too
body: I read all reviews posted after the latest update and I agree every one of them. It is not as useful and convenient as before.  I wanted to have display of my daily macro at glance but it's no longer visually available.  I have to calculate it by myself after logging meals, which defeats the purpose of having this app. I am a bit disturbed. If I had known this, I wouldn't have upgraded my app... I want the old version back.

title: Still not what it used to be!
body: So they just released this latest version within a week of the last one to address the bad reviews... and guess what? Still not as good as it used to be! C'mon, do they even read these? Just roll it back two versions and give us back the pie chart and the familiar and user-friendly interface that we used to have and love (and is still used on everything but the front page of the app)!

title: Love it!
body: I downloaded this app so I can track my macros -- and the literal fact that it already has my Taco Bell cheesy Gordita crunch breakdown available just melts my heart. The app is super easy to use - I've scanned the barcode for my other foods (Greek yogurt, nuts, granola) and it has everything so far! I love that I can track my water too. Super cool!

title: Looks pretty, low functionality
body: Pro: Easy visuals for weight loss, looks nicer and is more motivating to use than MyFitnessPal.

title: Barcode Scan - No Camera Access (turn on)
body: Can not properly access camera on iPhone 6 plus. Scrolling but no activated camera. Reloaded, reset several times. Other apps ok with camera access. Wife's iPhone 6 works fine with barcode scan & camera access.

title: Excellent!
body: As someone who is in the health and fitness field, I find this app very user friendly. It's a very simplified version of calorie counting and that's what most people want! I recommend this app to friends and colleagues who want to roughly bs quickly keep track of progress and log information!

title: Great app!
body: I've tried a couple of other calorie counting apps. Each had strengths but usually the weaknesses left them unused. This one? This one is amazing!  I really like how easy it is to scan food items into my daily meals. How do they do it?!  It is as advertised and keeping me on the path to achieving my goal.

title: Like the app but so many bugs.
body: I really like the app but m facing so many bugs especially related to calories burned. Today it was earlier showing that 390 calories burned. I went for workout and then checked afterwards it was showing 290. It was supposed to be more than 390. Please do something.

title: Great App
body: Really easy to use interface and most foods are easy to find. The barcode scanner also works very well. If you stay on top of tracking everything you eat, this app shows very clearly how you're doing. I love looking at the charts and graphs. Funny how Saturday and Sunday are always in the red for me!

title: Custom food macronutrients not showing up at all?
body: So this is a really great app, though sometimes the calories and daily value percentages aren't very accurate.

title: EXTREMELY CONVENIENT
body: I downloaded this app to help keep track of calories and everything apart of my daily diet. My Plate works so well and has all the foods you will ever eat in its database. It is the most convenient app to use because it reminds me everyday to begin tracking! I love it and it has help make my life healthier!

title: Love the app, but it's glitchy now
body: Love this app! It's helped me gain a healthy weight, since I've always struggled with that. But since this morning , It's not scanning barcodes and pulling up search results for the food. Super irritating. I've restarted my phone and the app three times now so I know it's the app. I've been using this app for months now so this is the first issue I've had, it's a total bummer ... Please fix this!

title: Very helpful in weight loss!
body: I love the accountability that this app provides! I enter everything I eat everyday. The only issues I have are that it freezes a lot when I'm searching for my food and that a lot of the items in the list are incorrect so I am sometimes confused at which one to choose. Other than that, it's great!

title: Easy to use
body: Like this app a lot- it is easy to use and I can access it from my iPhone as well as my laptop. Great pre-existing menu to track food from and the ability to create your own recipes and track is wonderful. I would recommend this app.

title: Love to track :)
body: I love this app! It is great to see the weight come off and keep track of what I eat. My husband has also started to use it and is also doing great...the mpoints are defiantly an added bonus to get rewarded for tracking! I highly recommend this app to any and everyone!!

title: I like it.
body: I just downloaded this app and 5 minutes into using it, I really like it. The calorie counter tracks meals/ and foods as well. The content it tracks is going to really help me see where I can make changes and increase the chance I will be successful. I also like the bonus rewards.

title: I don't understand the points system
body: When an achievement is unlocked, I get 10 points but nothing accrues higher than 200 points. I don't understand that concept, but otherwise the app is very useful. Even better would be to include more forms of exercise, such as lawn work, household chores, and other ways we can burn calories outside of a gym.

title: Trying to Gain!
body: So many food tracking apps don't let you even use them if you are underweight like myself.  Thank you for considering those of us with the opposite problem!  It's a challenge for me as much as it is a challenge for those that are trying to lose, Trust me.

title: Keeps track but could do more.
body: It does a good job at keeping track of your meals and letting you know your percentages throughout the day of fat and protein. One thing I would like to know is the specifics such as how many grams of protein have I taken in. How many grams of fat have I taken in. The percentages are good but I think it could add the actual. Maybe in an update.

title: Fantabulous!
body: I really like it! It's pretty user-friendly and quick to use. I also enjoy the scan feature for food items with barcodes. It'd be nice if more items were in the system (when scanning) but the content is pretty extensive as it is.

title: Great app. Needs some updates
body: Really love this app. One of the best food trackers. I also utilize the online page with meal suggestions and exercise. Wish they had wider variety of food items when scanning items. Other apps allow you to submit pictures of labels and info and actually adds the item to the database.

title: Good with a little glitch.
body: I have enjoyed using this ap.  It has helped me keep track of my eating habits and has helped me loose weight.  It has given me new hope.  However, the program does not allow me to correct entries I have put into previous foods and exercises. I also have found that it sometimes changes my entries.

title: Perfect
body: A coworker introduced me to this app and I can't thank her enough. I knew I was over eating but I did not know to what extent. I don't eat at restaurants everyday anymore but when I do I look up the nutritional information. I have lost 12 pounds and I am going strong. I hadn't exercised in 11 years! Now I do. Good luck to everyone.

title: Needs work
body: So I just got the app and I like it/love it

title: Amazing app!
body: I give 5 stars. This app will guide you to how many calories to eat per day, shows nutritional value of how much carbs/ protein you have eaten, graph of your weight going down. Also counts all calories and tracks how many you have remaining for the day. Including if you have exercised, etc. by far my favorite app.

title: I'm loving it!!
body: Started using it just three days ago in combination with exercise and lots of water and lost two pounds. Being able to keep track of your food and calorie intake is so effective. All. Foods are listed  and the exercise track is also an awesome feature. It missing the option to track inches lost so I give it a four.

title: Good, but needs work
body: I think this app is easy to use, but I'm missing the ability to enter the type of work activity I do. normally I sit at a desk all day, but last weekend I was tiling my bathroom at scraping paint from the house. I know I burned a lot of calories doing this, but have to try and enter it manually as exercise. Please add a category for work in the next version.

title: Great App!!
body: Awesome app to help keep you on track for your weight loss goals! For those having issues inputting your starting weight go to the progress tab and tap the track weight button. It will record your starting weight, if you just downloaded the app.

title: Just OK
body: Has a good database of foods with users adding all the time. The exercise feature that subtracts calories burned annoys me since calories are burned just walking across the room but not counted in the calcs. Fortunately this feature can be turned off. My biggest complaint is the poor sync between my iPhone info and my iPad info. I find I must enter data again on the phone after entering it in the iPad.

title: Great!
body: Very cool layout and I can find the exact food m looking for every time so far. My only gripe is that if I leave the app in any way, or my phone sleeps, it logs me out automatically and there's no way to stay logged on. So annoying if I'm looking something up quick then want to go back üòÅ if this gets fixed then it's 5 stars from me!!!

title: This is a Fantastic App
body: This app has done so much for me in the week that I have used it! I recommend it to everyone I know. I am even willing to say that students should have a weeks course of tracking their own calories! This would be best way to increase national lowered obesity.

title: It's the little things!
body: To calculate amounts of macronutrients this app only allows percentages in 5% increments. The amounts can jump more than 10 grams from one option to another. It would be really nice to have the numbers remaining instead of showing only what is consumed. The scan option is so small you can hardly see it. The choices for amount consumed is also very limited.

title: Love this app.
body: I've been using this app for almost 4 months and it's been an excellent tool in my weight loss. I'm down 52 pounds by following the app guidelines and the tracker is so helpful in seeing what's actually going into my body. Highly recommend if you are looking for a tracking app!

title: Redrider
body: My doctor told me to start watching my sugar and carb intake. This app has helped me tremendously in doing that. I am eating better and feeling better. This app is easy to use and I love scanning the barcodes for easy entry. I have only found a couple of items not in the database. Keep up the great work!

title: Crashes
body: Old version never crashed, this one crashes when I try to portion the servings, when i am adding new custom foods and sometimes when I am just adding an already existing custom food to my meals. And it doesn't save the nutrition info before it crashes. So I enter all the info and then try to portion it or add it and it crashes. Opening it back up, the info I just entered is not there. Great app and mostly easy to use but needs a few fixes.

title: Live strong
body: Excellent app. It's so easy to track your calories. Helpful if you are trying to lose weight. It even helps you track calories if you are trying to gain weight. It's lists pretty much every food. You can even track your drinks. I recommend this app.

title: Easy to Use & Versatile
body: I've tried a few different apps. I like this one because it compares your exercise to your food intake. It is the easiest to use that i've seen. It has specific foods from restraunts or generic such as a general cup of fruit. You can also enter you're own exercise or food intake.

title: Awesome App
body: I'm so happy with this app. It helps me track things easily, and the auto populate feature is time saving and helpful. The only critique is that you don't have a decimal point option. If you are inputting calories manually, it's only in whole numbers. Otherwise, this app is perfect.

title: Just what I needed
body: All I wanted was a calorie tracker that I can put in custom meals because I have a consistent diet. I got that, plus a very slick interface, protein, carbs, and fat percent intakes for the day, and bunch more neat features that would've been a pain to keep track. Without hurting the core purpose with a bunch of gimmicky calculators.

title: Love
body: This app works wonderfully there's so many food options and ways to track your food. One thing that needs to be improved is the exercise options! otherwise the app is the perfect for tracking your food and knowing exactly what to eat!

title: Good app
body: Keeps things simple.  I like the fact it connects to the health app.  I just wish there was a way you could link to other people who you are friends with to help encourage them or even motivate.

title: great app!!
body: I LOVE this app!! the only downside is that it doesn't have some of the really off brand foods, and the scanner feature is a bit hard to use. it also doesn't predict what you'd weigh the next day or whatever like another app I used did, but that's okay. overall this app is super great!

title: Loving this app!
body: I have tried many, MANY apps and they've all been so complicated to set up to be able to use effectively that I would give up on them after the first week! Love this app! The scanner is helpful and there are very few foods that are not already on the app.

title: An Amazing App!
body: I love this app! I've had no issues with it whatsoever and it has helped me lose 20 pounds. My favorite feature is the chart where you can see the amount of weight you've gained/lost in the past week, month, etc. I can't wait to try the new workouts!

title: Perfect Tool to track it all!
body: There is not a food or exercise that I have not been able to find in this app.  It's user friendly which makes it easy to do.  The daily reminder is great and keeps you on track to input your information.

title: Easy and useful
body: This app is perfect for a college student who is trying to eat healthier! It makes it easy to keep track of what you are eating and drinking, as well as see where your biggest calorie intake is. I defiantly recumbent this app. Only problem I have found is some exercises are not in the tracker, but you can enter things manually, so it's all good!

title: Great!
body: I love this app! It is easy to use and it is nice being able to search for calorie content and not have to search through my cupboards. The easier it is for me to track my food the more likely i am to do it, and think many people are the same way.

title: Love This
body: This is a great way to keep actual track of what you're putting in and takes the guess work out of it. Here you have real, empirical data and can keep a running total throughout your workout phase, whether bulking, losing weight or just trying to get healthy!

title: So far, so good
body: Not sure I know how to navigate all of it, but what I use works well and was quick and easy to figure out. Down a few lbs. already. This is a good tool to keep me focused. I'd give it 5 stars, but I have no standard of comparison, and I'm sure there are aspects that I haven't accessed yet. Does not crash for me as it apparently does for a few others.

title: Awesome app!
body: Keeps me accountable with my eating habits and makes it easy to quickly log my food and exercise for the day. It also keeps track of how many calories I need to be eating to lose, gain, or maintain my weight. It will tell me how many I have left to eat and if I go over. Totally addicted for life :)

title: Works!
body: Just a simple and easy to use tool to track your calorie intake. It has taught me a lot about the food I had been eating and has helped me to change my eating and exercise habits. I have lost 12 lbs in a little over a month, and plan to keep going till I lose 25. After that this will be a great tool to help me maintain my desired weight.

title: I am a fan
