body: Pro: I find this app very useful for tracking calories. It helped me understand how many calories I was typically eating so now I can monitor what I consume. If you stick to this app, your goals, and exercise you will see results.

title: Livestrong Calorie Tracker
body: This app is amazing! It keeps all your meaks tracked and tells you how many calories you can consume if you want to reach a certain goal and tells you when to stop. It also will give you a reminder each day, so you can remember to track your meals!

title: Very Easy and Convenient!
body: This app has made a HUGE difference in my eating habits! I find it much easier to track and stick with my diet. I don't like the fact you need wi-fi (I use an iPod) but it lets you pick previous meals when you don't have a connection, which is nice. It's very easy to operate and understand, and I would recommend it to anyone!

title: REALLY GREAT...DOWN 16 pounds
body: I love this app. I was using the previous version and was really worried when this new one replaced it. It is even better!

title: Good and Bad
body: I like the fact that this app easily since with Apple Health and this is why I'm using it. But I wish the food entry database was as big as myfitnesspal.

title: Fantastic! It works!
body: Been using it for 3 weeks. I've lost 10 lbs. Love it's easy interface, I'm learning caloric intake; that's been amazingly useful. I can easily see myself continue this eating pattern and enjoy using this app. Absolutely enjoy that it takes into consideration my caloric expenditure. Great job guys!

title: Makes it fun
body: I'm having fun with this app so far. It's not a chore to enter your food intake and if you forget to track a meal it lightly nudges you with a notification. I like stats and I've been using this a week and it's given me good statistics to look at, can't wait to see a month of data.

title: Good app with a couple of issues
body: User interface is good. I like the app except for 2 issues:

title: The support is awesome
body: I have had other apps that just count calories or measure excercise but having such kind and supportive users makes this worthwhile. They share recipes, what works and what doesnt. Most importantly they are positive. I love that i cam track water and excercise and that it reminds me to eat! Lol i recommend it!

title: Best So Far
body: This is by far the best calorie/food tracker app I've used at this point. The interface is so user friendly, I love it! I'm able to find foods so quick and easy. The scanner has worked great for me. I can enter my fitness info fast. I've tried several other food trackers, this one is best! All the others I've found to be cumbersome.

title: Great update!
body: Thank you for getting rid of the pull down menu interface to access individual meals! Going back to the previous version with all the buttons on one home screen is so much more streamlined and increases my motivation to log meals.

title: Great fitness app
body: This recent update really stepped up this app. It shows you all the breakdowns you need to keep track of your diet goals. It is so helpful I am curious about what the premium package has to offer. Definitely worth using whether you are new to fitness or an experienced athlete.

title: Can't input micros.
body: How do I delete mistakes in "My Exercises" in the iPhone app? I'm sad I can't fix my mistakes. Now I have to scroll too much because the lists are cluttered. Also, I can't input micros. I wanted to use the app to also track my sugars, but all of the decimals get divided by 1,000 (I haven't tried it in a few months. I don't want to further clutter my menus.)
response: Hi Dash Cam, to delete or edit a custom food or meal, select ‚ÄúBreakfast‚Äù, ‚ÄúLunch‚Äù, ‚ÄúDinner‚Äù or ‚ÄúSnack‚Äù from the Track tab. Tap on "My Food" or ‚ÄúMy Meals‚Äù at the top of the screen, depending on the type of item you would like to edit. Tap ‚ÄúEdit‚Äù next to any your created items to edit the information within. Delete foods in meals by swiping from right to left and tapping ‚ÄúDelete‚Äù. To add items to a meal, click ‚ÄúAdd food‚Äù at the top of the edit screen. Be sure to tap ‚ÄúDone‚Äù at the top to save your changes.

title: Pretty good
body: This app is pretty convenient for what it does. I like the interface and it has a lot of foods to choose from. The scan feature has been hit and miss. My main complaint is about the lack of exercise options. There aren't any options for tracking trail runs or hiking which is the majority of what I do.

title: Perfection
body: My doctor told me I had to watch what I eat in my last trimester since in gaining weight too fast. I downloaded this app and it really helps me count my calories and be more conscious of my intake. This app and also the water app is a life saver. Love love love it. I'm still going to use it after I give birth.

title: Fast and Effective
body: Much improved over the years. Food database has grown tremendously. Brand name foods and a ton of restaurant fare can be found quickly and easily, making food tracking that much easier. Also sets daily calorie goals and can track activity.

title: Lost 50 pounds
body: I used this app non-stop for six months straight and lost 50 pounds! It makes calorie counting so easy. It keeps your most often eaten food accessible for quick and easy tracking. I love how it helps you keep track of your Macros too! I HIGHLY recommend using this app!

title: Great app
body: It helps me be more mindful of what I put into my system. The percentage pie chart is also awesome so I can be even more conscious of the makeup of my daily intake. I'm not overweight but I've been using the app for two weeks and working out and I lost six pounds and you can already see my abs again üëçüèºüëçüèºüòò

title: Best App of my life!!!
body: This app has changed my life. I never thought I'd be willing to count calories and keep track of my food, but this app makes it all so easy! It coordinates with my Runkeeper & Withings apps & I am officially a much healthier and active person since using them. I absolutely love it so much!!!

title: Incredible
body: I was never able to keep up with food journals until now.  Very easy and simple to use.  Only thing that would make it better is if I could email or text the information (for my trainer to review).  Otherwise fantastic!

title: Great way to track food
body: I live this app it makes everything that I eat so easy to track! I use it daily and have been using for one week and so far I love it!! I can also measure my weight loss.

title: Whoever wrote this update should be fired!
body: Totally agree with Brendarino - useless!  I too had random info pre-added today.  Upon deleting each item individually I discovered the only 'recent' exercises available were 'iPhone Steps'.  Hey guys-not everyone uses an Apple Watch!   Also, there's no delete for the amount of water.  You get negative stars from me even if I have to give at least one to get this posted.    This used to be one of the best fitness apps, but with this update it's getting DELETED from my devices.

title: Updated and now does not work at all
body: This is a great app that worked really well. The last update made the app unusable. I just deleted the app and reinstalled and now it works just fine. I did not lose any data.

title: Love it!
body: I only have the lite version, but so far I find it very helpful in keeping me on track. If you are very new to "healthy" and have questions or need advice from other members, then the full version might useful. But you can walkways upgrade when you need too.

title: Worthwhile
body: I have tried all the tracking apps out there, seriously. Over the years, I have come to discover that THIS is the easiest and most fun to use. It is simple enough but it has all the right components to make it worth your time. This is definitely worth it! (Good thing it's free).   :)

title: Pretty good but no barcode scanner
body: Pretty good app.  Wish the Lite version had a barcode scanner. But once you've entered a few of your "regularly eaten" food items it's easy to select them again. The point collection system is a little annoying.  At first I thought it would be a good incentive to stay on track but the pop ups just drive me crazy and I close them right away.

title: Awesome
body: Awesome! I love the fact that it has a place to keep up with your water intake that is huge on my list!! I wish it had more exercises programmed because I am currently doing the 30 day shred and they don't have it but it is amazing for a free app much more than expected!! Recommended by Carrie underwood site

title: I absolutely love this app :)
body: The app is so simple and has helped me so much :) it really is a good way to make counting calories simpler. I definitely recommend this app! It's easy to use and makes you feel great about your progress! It organizes everything so well! Definitely a must have for all!!!

title: Simple and Easy!
body: This app is phenomenal! It tracks all my meals and helps me keep track of my caloric goals. I used it while I was in New Orleans for vacation accompanied with a lot of walking and I did not gain a pound! I've already recommended to other friends. This app will help me maintain my size 5 frame for my upcoming wedding. Thanks!

title: So easy to count calories & track workouts
body: I have yet to find a food that was not listed. Not only does it tell you calories, it tells you how many carbs, fat, and protein you're getting each day. I can also enter my workouts and how much water I drink each day.

title: Love keeping track with mpoints
body: This app is 1 of my most used apps. I use it everyday to keep track of my food intake. You can also keep track of your weight, track exercise  & water intake. The really cool thing is you can collect mpoints (which can get you giftcards). A must try!

title: Amazing
body: Simply amazing, useful tool for tracking calories and keeping you motivated to achieve your goals throughout the day. Also the tracker shows long term progress to help show you whether you are keeping on track or not. Then the scanning food is just too fun.

title: Great App
body: I just needed a quick and easy way to make sure I was creating a calorie deficit each day. My goal as a 50+ woman going through menopause now for about 7 years-is building muscle and burning fat. Calorie counting is a necessary part of my weight loss journey and this has fit the bill!

title: Well designed App
body: Very helpful for day to day meal planning and weight control. The nutrient tracker during the day is great for learning about balancing food groups. The only thing keeping it from four stars is the lack of source information as to who submitted the calorie choice and how the food was prepared to make the calorie count different from other like foods.

title: Set a goal & CRUSH IT!
body: Since I've started using this app in June I've lost 14lbs. In less than 2 months!! Just counting calories & all thanks to this app for making it so simple! You can scan any barcode to see nutritional information or manually input it yourself!  Thankful I found this!

title: My Plate Calorie Tracker
body: This App is terrific - based upon sensible nutritional principals it gives you a very handy option for tracking what goes in your mouth each day.  No matter what your goals until you know where you are presently at you can't make meaningful changes.

title: Excellent App!
body: I absolutely love their database, very precise and diverse! By far one of the best apps I've used! It comes in handy to anyone trying to figure out how to lose weight, eating better, getting plenty of liquids and keeping track of used calories as well! Highly recommended! Thank you!

title: Great App - Please add water goal setting
body: This is a really terrific app. Easy to use and understand. Very functional and takes the hassle out of calorie tracking. Wish that there was a way to change the water intake goal, though. Definitely recommend.

title: I LOVE IT!
body: Perfect! I can easily see what is going on with my body and food consumption, some apps are full of media advertisements but this one gets straight to the point! Tracks my steps and automatically changes my daily intakes based on how much Ive been losing. Exactly what I was looking for.

title: THANK YOU FOR THIS APP
body: After a frustrating month with a different point tracking app, I am so grateful to find this easy to use program. I am able to, once again, get on with the business of losing fat and staying fit. And my UP Jawbone fitness tracker even syncs consistently.

title: Double-tracks calories from Apple Watch and iPhone
body: I like using this app to track calories consumed, but it currently tracks daily Calories burned from both Apple Watch (more accurate) and iPhone daily steps (less accurate), causing a duplicate Calorie count.

title: Doesn't track steps accurately
body: I enjoy the food and water tracking on this app but it doesn't track my steps from the iPhone accurately.  One day I'll walk 10,000 steps and it shows 51 calories burned next day the same number of steps it will show 300 calories burned.  It's not consistent at all which is disappointing because I enjoy the rest of the features on the app.

title: Amazing
body: The biggest thing I love is that it syncs with the health app to get data from exercise from your Apple Watch and adjust your calorie intake accordingly. The only thing I would love to see is pull weight data from the health app as well in a future update. This app is truly amazing and I love it

title: Great Tool
body: I've used this app everyday for the last two weeks. I couldn't be happier. I've lost 4 pound so far and most of the battle for me is keeping an accurate count on what I'm eating, and that's exactly what this app helps me do. I would highly recommend giving it a try!

title: Was perfect before the update!
body: I use this app every single day. I will log in what I have planned to eat and add/delete things the next day if things change. I'm also following a weight loss paleo keto diet and seeing the ((percentages)) of my caloric breakdown is vital. Since you changed it to grams vs percentage, it's practically useless. I might switch to my fitness pal because they still break it down in percentages. If anything, break it down by % but list actual grams as well.

title: OMG Amazing
body: This app is amazing. I was looking for something with a sleek interface to track workouts and calories. This does that and more. Extremely easy to use and the barcode scanner actually makes tracking meals fun. The fact that you can save meals is a huge time saver too.

title: It's OK
body: The tracker is ok. They do not have all of the brands of food or drinks that you may buy, so you have to either look up your item online to find the calories or you have to pick something from the trackers list. Even if you have to input the items yourself, it does not remember the input if you try to find it the next day. Other than that, the application is good.

title: App with collaboration and inspiration
body: This app enables you to keep track of your calories intake and keep you mindful of what is going in so that one can adjust next meal based on daily goal. One will certainly love the reporting and trending of various health measure. Simply said, best free app out there for weight loss conscious program.

title: Not user friendly
body: I like that it will track food and activity. I don't like that it is so hard to find the foods or activities you do. I failed to use it several days due to frustration. Come up with a better way to search for your foods and activities.  Make so you just type in 2 slices home made banana bread. Biked 2  miles  etc.  I like what your attempting but if it's too frustrating nobody  will recommend it to friends. And your out

title: Great App
body: I have been looking for a food tracking app for awhile now. I used Myfitness pal for a few years but the whole "social media" aspect was too much to take. This app is perfect!!  No social media feel and it synchs with the health app on my iPhone so it can automatically track my exercise.

title: Superb updates
body: I love the new updates adding portrait view and the ability to easily update previous days when you missed something.

title: The best calorie tracking/weight loss app
body: Good job with this new version. I love this new version! Their water tracking experience is awesome, try it, and I also like the fact that I can set a food to repeat in the future! I have tried many but MyPlate is definitely the best calorie tracker app!

title: Great calorie tracking app!!!
body: This app really helps me track my calorie intake and thus helping me manage my weight. I m an Indian and i cook Indian food. It has all the calorie count of the food i eat and I haven't found any other app which does that or even has indian recipes counted for calories. Great app!!! Must have !!!

title: Excellent!
body: Love this App! I track my walking/running route on my phone than plug my mph and time into this App and it tells me calories burned. Have lost weight and feel SO much better since putting this App to use. Will continue to use and hopefully continue to lose weight!

title: Love this app.
body: It is way easier to use than the web site in my opinion. I love it, it is so fast and simple. Makes counting calories so much easier. I wish it had a notes section for each day but really it is a great app. Definitely recommend it.

title: My plate
body: I love this app! I've only been using it less than a week and I'm already sold. It helps me keep track throughout the day without crash dieting or crazy work outs. It's perfect for my lifestyle. I only  wish it had a notes section because I keep track of other things like how many fruits and vegetables I consume each day.

title: Calorie cautious
body: I didn't realize how little I should be eating compared to my husband.  I literally got advised to eat half of his portions to lose the same amount.  It was an eye opener.  The program has every food imaginable calorie count, even candy.  I have lost weight just by watching my intake.

title: I Use It Every Day
body: It's a great app.  I use it daily to track my weight and calories.  Easy & actually kind of fun.  I have lost about 6 pounds in the last couple weeks just from calorie awareness.  The food database is pretty robust.  The exercise database could use a little work.  But still a great app.

title: Really cool app
body: I really like this app. I'm able to keep track of the calories I intake on a daily basis. The food I eat is easy to find on the app. I really enjoy the mpoints as well, they are easy to earn and you can get rewards if you stay dedicated to it. This app is awesome and user-friendly. It's a must try

title: Easy and supportive
body: This app is visually interesting and easy to use. Its a nice habit to get into for day to day tracking. Im not a hardcore calorie counter, but this app is a nice little private place to go to and be able to visually see what each food means to your body and how simple exercising can make a difference.

title: Love it
body: Used to use it online (way back in the day) and found it useful. When apps came out I tried another source and had so many issues. Found the LiveStrong app and find it easy to use, and so very helpful to get me to my fitness goals- in a healthy way!

title: Calorie counter ‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§
body: Great and easy way to count your calories and keep track of your water intake. I just wish there were more barcodes because some of my foods will not scan so they have to be hand keyed. Other than that the app is so very helpful and the communities board is a great way for many of us to share strives, struggles, and some tasty meal iseas. ‚ò∫‚ù§üçè

title: Better than most.
body: I like this app and I have used many of its kind. I like the sync it does with my PC LS account. I like the way you can add foods and workouts manually. The barcode scanner rarely works for me. Also, I did have to delete and re-install twice because of crashing. Other than that, no complaints! I recommend it.

title: Thank you!!
body: Saved me from myself

title: Great diet tracker and rewards!
body: This app is easy to use and encourages you to keep track of your diet through rewards.  Lately have been getting bonus points from watching a commercial when claiming achievements, so I was able to get rewards quicker.

title: Easy to use
body: From the other apps I have used this is by far the easiest. If you work out as much as I do though, it could be a little more difficult for you. The workout selection is very limited but you can put in your calories burned easy enough. I would definitely recommend.

title: Love this app
body: It's the best option for anything out there! So helpful, so easy, I love love it. I spend about 5 min a day watching and tracking. I feel good when I splurge on a glass of wine or ice cream cause I'm aware and I know I'm regularly doing so many good things for my health with good food choices and exercise. It's the best

title: Best There Is
body: I've paid a lot of money and have spent a lot of time with these kinds of app, and I think this is the best one I've found. The freemium version is comprehensive and useful, and the paid version has even more useful tools. I love it. I also love how easy it is to use!

title: Calorie tracking is awful, this app is pretty OK
body: Calorie tracking is the worst.  I pretty much hate every app I've ever tried to use for it. I happen to have hated this app the least of all the ones I've tried, by a decent margin.

title: Workout bug
body: Not sure how to notify the app designer so i figured I'd try this. In the middle of a workout, the countdown stopped. The video demonstration continued with a slight skip every second, but the timer never changed. If i paused and played it again, it would run for a second, the duration of the video, and then freeze again. I could not continue the workout. Please fix this.

title: Newest update is a mess
body: The newest update completely changed the look of the app. It is no longer user friendly. The app is clunky and it is hard to read your stats at a glance. Additionally, you can no longer collect your mPoints. I have over 1,000 mPoints that I cannot collect bc they refuse to resolve whatever issue prevents me from connecting to collect them. It's time for a new app. After nearly 9 years using MyPlate and 5 years using the app, it has become completely useless.
response: Hi Dannie- we wanted to let you know that we've emailed you via our support desk to give you an update on your issue! Please check it out!

title: Great App!
body: This is a really great app! The changes that were recently made with the interface have made it super easy to add food for the day. It is also one of the only apps I've found that syncs flawlessly with the Apple Watch, which was why I originally strayed from the my fitness pal app.

title: Issues when using multiple devices
body: I need to force sync anytime i switch between my ipad and iphone to make updates. It worked initially but now I can't update my ipad version of the app. It should just work - no forced sync needed. Auto sync when opening or refreshing the app is recommended

title: Fitness app with community
body: I really like the LS app because I can easily track my meals and exercise but they also have an active community which is really nice as a support when you are trying to loose weight! I tried other apps but finally gave them up for LS. Give it a shot!

title: Live strong Tracker
body: I like the concept of this app and wish It would work right but I've even removed it and reinstalled it and it still doesn't work right.  When I enter my calories for one day and later start to enter my calories for the current day, I find that it has mapped over yesterday's calories so my entries are never correct. Oh, how I wish it would wor pm right though.

title: My Plate
body: All  and all it's a pretty good system. I've had a few problems with the amount of calories you say are in a few things. But then on other things, I've learned that things I thought were  good for you really aren't at all.

title: Drops Tracked Exercise Data
body: App continues to drop exercise data written from other apps for current day and previous days.  I love the app but it can be very frustrating when you  review previous days and find your data is not there.  Then you move between the days and suddenly pops back up...

title: The info you need
body: If you know how many calories you need to eat then you can lose weight.  It really is that simple and this app makes it easy to stay organized and informed about calories.

title: For your consideration.
body: I really like this app, I find it very useful. I would have given it a 5 but I really want for an alternative beverage tracker too, juice, tea, coffee and even though I drink nothing carbonated beer and soda too. I think if you are really tracking EVERYTHING you eat or drink you have to be honest but it's easier to have a place to track it BESIDES a meal or snack area.

title: Gold Member
body: I'm a gold member and have loved this app from the start. The app helps you take a good look at what your eating and what your portion sizes are. I also love that it can be linked to my workout app and subtracts those calories to overall tell me how many calories I have left to consume.

title: Great App
body: If you are a serious health foodie or a casual one trying to get serious about what goes into their body (like me) you will love this app.

title: So easy!
body: Fantastic app- idiot proof, extremely efficient way to track daily caloric ins and outs.  The program will find the calorie count of each item you consume, so you don't have to look it up or "guesstimate".  Same with your workouts.  It even provides a daily % protein/carbs/fat pie chart.  Very cool.

title: Perfect and easy to use.
body: Well my title says it all but for serious, this is a really well done app with an easy user interface. The online database for food is above par (especially since most the things I eat come from a local small end grocery store) great job!

title: Really basic
body: I had high hopes for this app as the Livestrong web site is phenomenal.  But sadly, the app is really, really basic.  No nutritional info beyond fat, carbohydrates, and protein pie chart.  Also, food search window is cumbersome, non intuitive and hard to use.  It is unnecessarily small and cuts off long food names and then closes unexpectedly while you are searching.  It literally took me 3 tries to look up greek yogurt.  Maybe the paid version is better?

title: Awesome
body: I like how I can track myself and see where I need to improve and my habits it's so easy I believe it's the best in understanding your eating habits and a must for anyone who is interested in long term weight loss and health. I wish I could add custom meal and it automatically figure out the calories instead of me figuring out on my own. Other than that awesome app.

title: Essential to Weight Management
body: My daily consumption has drastically changed for the better after I began using this application on a regular basis. I am more cautious of what I am eating thanks to the nutrition facts of each meal. I recommend this application to anyone who is interested in taking themselves seriously.

title: Post baby
body: Gained 56 pounds during my pregnancy. I have lost 40 pounds and plan on losing the rest with the help of this app. I have already been using it for a month or so and it has really been helping! I really like it. I just put breast feeding down as an exercise, since it burns so many calories :)

title: Why I like it.
body: I give this app 5 stars cause of the any options it gives you. Keeping track of water intake and calories burned is beneficial. The beat part is the ability to scan products. It's a great app if you're serious about what you put in your body.

title: Handy and Easy to use
body: Very intuitive. Sinks well with my PC. When I can't find a food in the huge library, I can easily add it myself, or just track the calories. I'm not a fan of adding back in the calories I just worked off, but that's a personal preference. I love that I can see all my meals, exercise and water all at the same time.

title: My favorite calorie counter
body: I love this app. I use it off and on whenever I need to get back on track. Just documenting my intake makes me more conscious of what I'm eating so I make better choices. I like the exercise video suggestions, too. I always lose weight when using this.

title: Great way to lose weight!
body: This app is pretty nice. You can search for all sorts of foods that you ate and it will track how many calories you're eating and how much you can eat for the rest of the day, according to your weight loss goal. Also has a cool barcode scanner for foods if it has one.

title: Perfect
body: This app is the go to calorie tracker in my opinion. It works well with tracking calories burned and with my Nike run app I usually don't have to worry about that too much. Majority of foods are already on there so tracking intake shouldn't be difficult for anyone. Highly recommended!

title: Good app! Just needs some tweaks :)!
body: I love this app, I check it and use it every day for like three weeks. Best app I ever got!

title: Great app
body: I have used this app for thee weeks and love it! I track all the food I eat, the drinks I consume, and the exercise I perform. It has a huge database for saved foods and exercise to choose from that have saved calorie information. It also tracks your food that you eat often. For a free app it's great!

title: Helpful and simple
body: This app is easy to use and can be a great tool to track calories and exercise.

title: Great app
body: Love this app.  Very easy to use and the food diary is extensive.  Have also used my fitness pal which is a great app too.  Wish this app had the scanner.  However, that is really the only complaint.   This app makes tracking easy and the rewards from mpoints keeps me motivated.

title: Amazing!
body: Love this app have lost 10 pounds. Keeps you honest. And it's only between you and your phone. Not like joining a weightless group. I started it with the biggest loser this season (not that I'm over weight at all jut gained 15 lbs) and feel so much better I weigh in during my favorite show of the week!

title: A little glitchy
body: This app has been really good for tracking my food intake and controlling what I eat. However, I wish it didn't continue adding on "Calories Left" because of the calories I've burned. It's still very useful, although it tends to close out of the app and is kind of glitchy. Overall, great macro/calorie tracker!

title: Disappointed
body: Update:

title: Great daily nutritional health tool!
body: Been using the "free" version of this app for one month, and its ability to track and record nutritional information is incredible. I'm now going to "upgrade" to the Gold level app. It's certainly worth the very minor investment. Absolutely a "5-STAR" app!

title: Simply Awesome
body: This App is Awesome.. I am this my last 1 week and feels good.. it has lot of food items... mainly if any one is like ok if for Indian items.. you will get the food items, it's cals and other details..

title: Awesome
body: This really helps Count your calories! I haven't came across this yet but the only problem is you might have a hard time finding the specific food. Other than that I really like it and would recommend it!

title: This app records your calories burned but...
body: It will record your calories burned then randomly it will lose all the progress and has you restart halfway through the day when it happened today I added an exercise equal to the amount I had lost, it added it twice so I tried to delete it and you can't so I spent so much time trying to delete it and it only added it more so now It ruined the amount of calories I've burned today and has become a real pain
response: Hello! We are so sorry for the trouble you've had with this. Our team is aware of this bug and is working on a fix. We'd love to walk you through deleting these incorrect exercises. Please email us at support@livestrong.com. Apologies again for the inconvenience!

title: Helped me lose 30 pounds!
body: This app helped me track what I was eating (almost exactly what I was eating every time) and it has the awesome option to track your steps so I can see how many calories I'm actually burning while running around at work. 10/10

title: Awesome
body: Super easy to use! The daily reminders help with motivation and accountability. If you are diligent in tracking your food, then you will lose the weight. The app allows you to see all your data (e.g. Carb, protein and fat intake), so you can tweak meals to meet your needs for weight loss or maintenance.

title: Good, but could be better
body: I've been using this app and its predecessors for years. Overall it is a good, albeit often cumbersome way to track calories. But why on earth can't users edit their exercise just like they can edit their caloric intake? It's a huge pain when I enter my exercise only to notice that I made an error. This should be a very simple feature to add. In fact, I'm almost certain that earlier versions had it.

title: Awesome!
body: Super convenient to have this app to stay fit. I love that it gets my workout info (miles ran, calories burned, etc) and weight info from the Health app that comes with the iPhone. And it's easy to check progress without having pesky notifications 24/7. Love it!

title: Lost over 100lbs!
body: I lost over 100lbs only using Myplate. I used it to track my food, exercise, & water for a couple of years until I got pregnant. Now that I recently had my baby I am using it to get back in shape again. I will never stop using it again.

title: Perfect, practical, and Extremely useful for those interested in getting fit
body: Perfect, practical, and Extremely useful for those interested in getting fit. I think I discovered it too late. May be the best app for tracking your calories!

title: Excellent
body: Excellent app.  I lost a ton of weight- almost met my goal.  I've backslid a bit since then, but that's not an app problem, it's a me problem.  If you are prepared to get really serious and honest, this is a powerful tool to track weight, calories, exercise, and water very accurately.

title: Best app for tracking what you eat
body: This is the best app by far for tracking calories and macros. It makes your tracking stress-free, smooth and easy!  I've tried other apps, and this one gives you so much more without having to pay for it!

title: Great Traker
body: I have been keeping track with this app for about 4 years.

title: Great Tool
body: This is a simple way to track your calories, exercise and nutrition. I am using the free version, so I am missing a bit of information from the analysis, but it is adequate for me.  After you get the gist of it, it only takes moments to add your data.  Awesome tool.

title: The Good, The, Bad, and The Ugly
body: I honestly love everything about this app.  It helps me to stay focus on my fitness goals by helping me to track my calories and to make good logical food choices.

title: Helpful and easy
body: This has helped me so much, and is really easy to use, I'm able to see my progress, and look up hundreds of different food brands and restaurants and all the nutritional info comes right up ready to track! Well worth it

title: Wow! Great app!
body: This app kick started my diet and really helped me become a healthier person! It's extremely easy to use and super convenient. You can track your calories, exercise, and water intake anywhere, anytime. Almost every food I eat is in the database too!

title: Doesn't actually sync to desktop!
body: I love the new look and feel of the my plate desktop and apps - much easier to use, but since the app on my iPad or iPhone only syncs food and exercise that's over a week old, I can't use it to track food that day - some is on my phone/ipad and some is  in the desktop and I have no idea if it will come together.  I hope they'll fix this soon, since they claim that it syncs in all their promotions!

title: Loses all data frequently
body: I'd normally recommend this app, but lately it had been freezing and erasing all of my data. This has happened twice; once before I had synced my web account and once after. That's over a year worth of data gone. Using Myfitnesspal as a source of nutritional information and writing it down in a book seems more reliable. I only mention the other app because myplate doesn't have as much food items in its database as the other.

title: Moderately successful
body: This app is easy to use and uses fewer clicks or taps than many calorie/exercise counters.  It would be nice if you could put in the exact amount in ounces/grams of the food you consumed rather than having to adjust the serving size when recording.  The exercise recording function is pretty good, but I wish it were possible to put in mileage for running as well as time elapsed.

title: Keeps me on track
body: Every time I use this app I am on track, as soon as I get lazy about entering my meals I gain weight. It is so easy to use- especially the scan feature. There are so many foods in the library which makes it super easy to track your food.

title: Excellent Food Tracker
body: It's simple, has a great barcode scanner, a large variety of food items with pictures, a food intake reminder, and you can track your carb intake for low carb dieters. These are just a few of the great features found on this app. Oh, and did I mention, it's free?

title: Perfect
body: This app is perfect for tracking your overall nutrition! Would love to be able to view detailed information such as vitamin/minerals consumed through certain whole foods right in the app instead of having to look them up

title: Could use more
body: I love it to track my food, weight and calories burned walking but I wish we could put other exercises in for calories burnt. I go to the gym every once in a while and would love to put other things like running, biking or weight lifting in.

title: Great in many ways but lacks in 4ways
body: Great app but,  i dont need to eat above 1,000 cals per day number 1, and 2: i would also like to know how many callories to burn a day and 3: a goal line of what i'd like for wieght loss. Yes it has loose 1lb a week an so forth but dosnt ask for a goal wieght such as 130lbs and 4: how many days it could take if you burn so many cals a day. :(

title: EASY TO USE!!!
body: Great app. and so easy to use. I really like the "daily reminder" but most of all, the counting down of Calories I have left for the day!! I can eat whatever  I like just so long as I don't go over my daily allotted  calories. I feel like I am not on a diet but just controlling my over eating!!!

title: Best calorie tracker app
body: I've tried several of these apps & this one is by far the best.  It can find almost any food, restaurant item, etc.

title: Pretty great, has room to improve
body: Custom tracking is nice but needs improving:

title: Crashes often
body: I love this app except for a few problems. It often crashes on iOS 6 ( very annoying) and, if you forget to track the day before, you can't go back and update your meal. I don't know if you can do this in the full version, but I sure wish u could do that here. It looks like I only have 909 calories yesterday and I want to track accurately!

title: Suggestion
body: I just wrote in a lengthy suggestion, but didn't chose an original name so it's gone. Annoying!  My suggestion is to indicate RDA recommendations in nutrient tracker, along with options for the recommendations for disease states and option to set ones own. Deviations from normal should offer option to see general possible results of said deviations.

title: Food lover/hater
body: I lost 4 pds in 2 weeks. I didn't adjust my diet like I should have at first but I did count calories. I also exercised minimally. It's hard but it's working. Seeing what I eat each day helps me eliminate empty calories. I've started exercising more and changed my eating habits. I'm still working hard but I'm almost there with help from this app.

title: What I needed to Lose weight!!
body: Counting calories, seeing my eating trends on the monthly calendar, tracking exercise has all helped me enjoy getting on the scale every morning and watch the numbers drop!

title: Easy to use but needs a library of foods to choose from
body: I have used this app for a month now and love how easy it is to use.   The scanner is very easy to use.  The only thing I would like to see is a library of good to choose nutritional information from.  That would make this app get a five star rating.

title: Much Better Than the Older Version!
body: I had previously used an older version of this app. I was a little disappointed when I could not find the older version but decided to give this one a shot. I absolutely love it! I am so glad that I gave it a chance!

title: Love it!
body: I love this app. There are so many foods in the search that I haven't had to enter anything manually. It is also easy to use. The only thing I wish they would add is to the profile section. I'm a nursing mom and need more calories a day than what my settings suggest. I wish nursing was an option. I know WW points take it. Into account.

title: Best fitness app yet
body: I have tried many others. This one is so user friendly and well laid out that it makes it fun to keep logging in to update my diary and exercise and monitor my progress. It's motivating!  I have lost over 15 pounds since I started using it 6 weeks ago.

title: Better than Calorie counter
body: I've used this for years. It's way better than Calorie counter because of the interface and because you can easily track exercise. They also give you workouts! It's all here in one app.

title: Needs Work
body: This AP just changed my food lists adding foods I'd never eat. Now I can no longer scan the list for the foods I've added. Additionally, all exercises I programmed in are gone. Now an endless list of iPhone Daily exercises with different calories burned. When you add an exercise, then try to change it, it only adds more. No editing allowed. Why???  Please fix this.

title: No longer can log in
body: After using this app for over a year I find myself locked out. I have sent emails to the support people and even they cannot figure out why I can't log in. They changed my password and kept telling me try again. Nothing! I have deleted and reinstalled, turned my phone off completely and tried using a different email address. Still I can't log in. Time to throw in the towel and find a new app. I'm disappointed bc this was a really great app.

title: Love this app!
body: I love this app, never had a problem with it after about a year of using it. It's honestly great. Super easy to use. The only annoying this is how it won't work at all unless you're connected to wifi, but other than that it's great.

title: Great app
body: As part of the Nutrisystem program, my husband and I have been tracking our food and activities with their application, NuMi. It was pretty obvious that they didn't put a lot of effort into their system so we decided to find something else. We really like MyPlate, it interfaces with Apple health and has a very large database of food.

title: Amazing App ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è
body: I just jumped on this app May 20th and have been pleased massively! Keeping track of calories, exercise, and ingredient intakes is a major plus for me.

title: Awesome app
body: Update and fixes are great! But there are two problems. I track my weight in kg, but it goes crazy almost every single day! With lbs it worked perfectly. And another problem is water intake. Why I can't make my own size of glass? I buy only 500 ml bottles in order to drink no less than 2 liters per day! So how can I log 250 ml glass?

title: OK, but if good is available - why use this?
body: The search function is terrible, unlike the most well known app of this type. The search doesn't eliminate possibilities with multiple words, but rather includes all options with any of your words.  Listed restaurant options are also too few.

title: Wonderful app
body: This app is great and so easy to use. I love how you can save meals and it has a list of your recently eaten foods so you don't have to search for the same foods every time. It makes keeping track of calories so simple and easy. Not time consuming or tedious at all.

title: Great to keep you on track
body: Finding the right calories count is not easy, specially for complicated dishes, but you can find good approximations. This app gives you a very good idea of what and how much you eat so you can stop at the right time, and balance it better.

title: Very helpful
body: I started using this at the beginning of the year and I have lost 58lbs by using it. I went from a size 40 to a 34. Very few bugs since the last update. They have a large food database but I wish they had a larger database for exercises

title: Easy and it works!
body: Great app! Easy and even fun to use. Educational and it works. Tells you info about your intake. Keeps track of carbs, protein and fat. Track your exercise and progress too. Been dieting forever but finally, this might get me to my goals. Get this app!

title: Incorrect calorie/nutrition counts
body: I have only been using faithfully for a few days. Already I have found several items I have scanned have an incorrect calorie count. And a couple have had the green verified check but it does not match the count on the product. But having to log makes me think before I eat even though I can't rely on the calorie count.

title: Great app
body: Great app! I started using this to keep track of my macros. It's extremely easy to use.  The only thing I wish it had is a way to email your food log to someone. I just started training  and my personal trainer would like me to keep a food diary.  So please make a way where u can send your whole log to someone!

title: The work out bug
body: Ok it's very similar to my fitness pal and I don't even see any extra feature that would stand out so I don't get why it has more ratings... But even if you somehow prefer this one over my fitness pal don't you get the bug with syncing your workouts from other apps? I used it for 3 days and every time the data from the last day somehow disappears which is super annoying! They better fix that

title: Great app! Ive lost 26lbs
body: Love this app its made counting calories and keeping track of my progress a breeze! In about 2 1/2 months I have lost 26 lbs. I feel I am at the perfect weight so now I use it to maintain my weight. I like all the features of the app and have had very few problems.

title: Great for US residents
body: I love this app and have used it to track my eating habits and weight over the last 2 years. I travel a lot, though, and have lived abroad for more than half of the 2 years. I know it would be difficult to carry a more comprehensive food database but the current one is pretty limited to US and European foods.

title: Simple but helpful
body: I love this app. I've only been using it for a little while but it's simple and easy to figure out, it lets you add food you ate if you can't find it, and it provides you with a water tracker and exercises a as well. Generally just a really helpful app.

title: Great App VERY easy to use
body: As work from home dad looking to lose 20lbs as quickly & safely as possible it's  great to have such an easy tool to help monitor my caloric intake. Now I have to think ahead & budget my calories. Never realized how many extra calories I had been consuming.

title: Great app!
body: This app is really great to keep track of how many calories you have consumed and how much exercise you get, you can give your self a certain amount of calories and if your over the calories you want to intake then exercise and lose some.

title: Would go back a screen when I multitasked
body: If I tried to look a food item up on my browser then jump back to the app, I'd lose my data.

title: It works!
body: Lost almost 30 lbs with this app in a few month. Use it correctly and you'll see results too. This is the first time I successfully lost weight! I wish the app had other features (some of which come in the paid for version) but the important thing is I got the results I wanted.

title: Simple and easy to use
body: I have tried 2 other calorie counting apps and this one is my favorite. It is simple and very easy to use. It takes only a couple of minutes at most to log the days intake. It eave gives a reminder if I forget. I like it a lot.

title: Amazing!!!!
body: This app has to be the most amazing thing I've ever used! It's very easy to use, you can either scan the barcode on the food or you can input it manually!! It also has a reminder on it if I forget to input my food for the day!! I absolutely love this!!

title: Love it!
body: I love being able to track my calories and workouts throughout the day with this app, the only downside to it are finding things such as sit ups and pull ups aren't found in their own category. I never know how many calories I'm actually burning unless I can find the workout to be exact.

title: Love it!
body: I love being able to track my calories and workouts throughout the day with this app, the only downside to it are finding things such as sit ups and pull ups aren't found in their own category. I never know how many calories I'm actually burning unless I can find the workout to be exact.

title: Fantastic app!
body: I lost 4lbs in one week. This app helps me think twice about everything I eat. And I use it when I work out too. I have also been drinking a lot of water. No problems with the app itself. I recommend to anyone who is trying to live healthier.

title: Great app
body: I've lost more weight using this app and eating healthily then any other app but I have one other suggestion a note section on each day so the person could write good things and bad thing that influenced eating or exercise that day like weather or emotions etc.

title: What I needed to Lose weight!!
body: Counting calories, seeing my eating trends on the monthly calendar, tracking exercise has all helped me enjoy getting on the scale every morning and watch the numbers drop!

title: Calorie tracker
body: I have never liked counting carbs, and always end up quitting after a couple of weeks.  With this calorie tracker, it is the easiest and most manageable way to keep track.  It has made the difference of me staying on this way of eating.

title: Use it a lot, but the interface isn't great
body: There are a lot of elements missing from the app version of MyPlate. What really knocked it down for me was that I paid for Gold and it said I could turn of auto-renewing in the settings, but they actually hid that setting out of the app. There are several design decisions like this that give the user less control than desired.

title: Recent updates crashing
body: I loved this app and have used Livestrong/My Plate since before apps were even thing (back in the old days of websites). I hadn't used it for a while, and when I tried today, the app kept crashing. I deleted and reinstalled it, and now I can't stay logged in. All my foods and meals are gone, and my calorie goal is wrong. I hope it gets fixed -- in the meantime, I need to use another app that I like less.

title: Love this app!
body: This app has improved so much! The tracking is better and the nutrition tracking has significantly improved over the last two years. I couldn't be more thrilled. I'm achieving my weight loss and fitness goals with great success!

title: Makes Eating Healthy Fun
body: I recently downloaded this app and it helped me keep track of what I ate/drank. (My favorite part is filling up the water cup :) So far this app is great and I haven't experienced any technical difficulties yet. Overall, it's a fun way to lose weight/keep track of your calorie intake.

title: Great app but wish it tracked fiber...
body: I have enjoyed using this app! It has been very thorough, and it offers everything I need in daily tracking except for one important factor - fiber. I'm a former Weight Watcher follower, and fiber was considered very important in tracking for points values. I would love to be able to keep track of it here too.

title: User-friendly, excellent tool
body: Love this app. It is incredibly user friendly and easy to input data. The food database is surprisingly good, at least for the foods I've had to input. Would recommend over and other calorie-tracking app.

title: Really nice app
body: This app has many foods in the database. The scan feature is nice and handy. I like how you can see the coordination of your calories and exercise. It seems to have just about everything you would want to track.

title: Good
body: App is all in all pretty good, and straightforward. 2 things I wish could be fixed. I weigh everything I eat, so I wish I could input exact numbers in. Also I wish the barcode scanner worked a little bit better. Takes forever for anything to scan. Other than that it's a good app.
response: Hi Craigers83! Thank you for your review and feedback. We have passed your comments to our development team!

title: It's good
body: This app is good. It has almost all of the foods I eat and if it doesn't, I can simply enter the nutrition facts in it. It has great goals for specific diets and how you want your body to transform. My complaint is that there is always an add in front of where it lists my macronutrients for the day. Seeing as how I count my macros, this is quite annoying. If this is fixed, then I would rate this app 5 stars.

title: Love it...but
body: Ok this is a great app, it's easy and straight to the point...but it needs some fixes here and there.

title: Easy and intuitive
body: I like this app very much. It's really easy to find the food and exercise and add it to your daily tracker. The only thing I think it's missing is a chart of water consumption. Not really a big deal, but I would love to know how much water I'm drinking on a day-to-day basis.

title: Great app!!
body: I just started using this app and had to write a review. Great graphics, easy to use format, really keeps me on track. It's organized nice and neat and reminds me when to fill in my calories. It even helps motivate me to exercise if I see I'm going beyond my calorie limit! Best app of its kind.

title: Love this app!
body: I tried many and even paying $10 for one and none come close to this app! Easy to use and track, scans barcodes and shows you a chart of protein, carbs and fat so you know where you are getting your calories from.

title: My nutrition
body: This is the best app I ever used to count and track my calories intake . The best part is it divides my food intake into protein , fat and carbs. As I'm using this app to reduce my weight so it helps me to measure my grams of carbs in daily routine. It would be so good if you add more food from India / Pakistan so I can track them easily .

title: Great app but would like to see more features
body: I use the iPhone app every day to stay on course and love it.  I also wear a Fitbit wrist band and would like to see this app read the info off of it to keep my exercise accurately and up to date.  That would be a great addition. Great app.  I love it.

title: My Plate
body: I've been using this app for a few years and truly vouch that this system has helped me lose weight and track everything that I eat. When not near my phone app I can go online and track food/calories as well. Great app!

title: Incredibly useful
body: This app is so easy to use and detailed. I love being able to see more than just what calories Ive eaten, and that Im able to keep track of sugars, protein, etc. I just wish the food list was a bit more extensive, but it isnt a problem.

title: Only if u r serious...
body: Now that I am 63 I have been looking for an app to track and focused me on maintaining my goal weight. I downloaded this app a while ago but it kept me to accountable. Well folks I'm back because it's the best thing I've found. Calculates daily, monthly, yearly, breakfast, lunch, dinner snacks, calories, nutrition, water, and exercise. Let's do this thangüí™üèΩüçΩüôèüèΩ

title: Awesome!
body: This app is so very easy and has so much food to choose from! I love seeing the progress I'm making, and having a visual of what my diet consists of in terms of carbs, proteins and fats is great motivation as well! My only wish is that I had more exercises to choose from, but again I love this app!

title: Convenient
body: A good app, but the website is better.  This doesn't do everything the website does, plus the website rarely gives "no results" as this app often does.  A food scanner would be an improvement for both the app & the website.

title: Obsessed!
body: I've lost a little over 10 lbs since using this ap. i love it because i can keep track of my calories in the palm of my hand all day long, no pencil/paper and no adding. Plus i reallyyy like how just about every food i look up is searchable. Great ap all around.

title: Weight loss round 2 made easy
body: After my 2nd kid the website helped me lose over 30 lbs. I'm using the app now after my 4th kid & I love it! Looking forward to another success story in 20 weeks :) once you commit to tracking your calories this app is so convenient

title: Great!!
body: Really easy to navigate and super user friendly! Has almost every brand I have needed and is very easy to create a new category if needed. Only thing lacking is space to leave notes to self on progress or certain meals. Bet calorie tracker I've used yet!

title: Fantastic app!
body: It's so easy to use and really keeps me on track. Lots of foods to choose from which I never found in other similar apps. I used to have to manually enter most meals but this one has a much better selection and displays tracked info clearly.

title: Great app. So helpful!
body: I've gone through a transformation since I downloaded this app and I've only had it a week. It is SO amazingly helpful to track calories, especially for emotional and stress eaters. My stomach is shrinking and I am being very mindful of what I've even eating since I got it.

title: Great app
body: Very useful for tracking diet, exercise, weight, and even water consumption. Fix to adjust for older OS users was prompt and much appreciated. Like the mixing of recently eaten items although longer list can be tedious.

title: Love for the most part
body: This app is great for tracking calories & keeping track of exercise/calories burned! I love that most foods I eat can be found when entering food & several are verified! I had some difficulty linking it to my website & I don't like that I can't edit the foods I ate if I make a mistake, or I can't figure out how to do it.

title: Great for tracking calories while pregnant
body: I've been using this so help track my weight gain (30 lbs max target) and it's been very helpful. Great library of foods. Scanner doesn't always work. Would love to know how to contribute a rating to be verified to help expand the food library.

title: Easy to use
body: I've tried other calorie count apps & have found this to be best. It's easy to use, has many food options to choose from & the nutrition info is accurate. Other ones that I tried would give you incorrect calorie info so you never really  knew if you were eating too much!

title: Easy to use and great benefits!
body: Only been using this ap a few days and am very impressed with the ease of use! Definitely an eye opener to hold myself accountable for what I eat and exercise. I also think the m-rewards help encourage use and good habits! I think I am truly going to benefit from this!

title: Supplement/vitamin record
body: This ap is great! Its very fun to use as well.

title: Good tracker on the go
body: Decent app. Allows me to track everything I need to - food, water, exercise. I like that it syncs with your iPhone's step monitor, however, I find that it keeps going back down to 0 calories burned or smaller number after I've seen it track 700 caliries burned from exercise. Fix this bug and I'd give it a 4. The food entry part isn't perfect, but it's good enough.

title: Only 3 main meals?
body: I can not make comparition since is the only one I tried but I can say I would like to see 4 meals per day plus snacks and not three main meals. Maybe is somethings cultural I mean in the US they have dinner at 18:00, Latin's,  much later and at 17/18 "merienda". Positive is it has many dishes in Spanish too, does not means only translation but the kind of meals.

title: Would be 5 stars but...
body: Really annoying advertisement for gold membership every time I open the app, even though I paid to remove ads. That combined with the inability to type in grams manually makes this app less than perfect. Fix these issues and you've really got something. Great interface and features otherwise.

title: Great Daily Intake Tracker
body: This is a great app to help track what you are eating and calorie intake. I would recommend it for people who do not good eating habits. I love that you can look up calories or scan to get the information you need about the nutritional value of what you are eating.

title: Needs some work
body: Really like the scan option, and fairly good options for finding the right count of foods. VERY GLITCHY, especially with the calorie burner. Doesn't remotely match how much exercise I know I did, and occasionally show "burned" as 0 for a while, and eventually corrects itself hours later. Bottom line, not bad but needs the bugs worked out.

title: Better than MFP
body: I have used my fitness pal for over a year, and finally there is another app that is just as good if not better.  This app does not keep annoying you with buying premium and has many very useful features.

title: In like with this app
body: I've used this app off and on for several years. If you click on the "i" the sodium and other info pops up (if the food is verified).

title: Brutally honest snapshot tool
body: My wife suggested that my challenge for weight loss was simple...eat MORE CALORIES, thus, she suggested this tool to help me track -- this thing is great...I can scan food in at the store (it's ready got a deep database), but it also manages water intake (we all struggle with that).  I highly recommend.

title: Amazing tool for weight loss
body: I used this app to lose ten pounds and continue to use it to stay on track. It gives you calorie goal based on your weight loss plan and measurements. It also comes with a database calorie estimates for just about anything! From McDonald's burgers to beet salad. Awesome app.

title: Good but not the be all and end all
body: Loved this app at first and still like it. However it would mean a lot for me if I could track my BG here as well as I dislike most of the diabetic apps. It does what I now consider the basics which is more than I ever realized was necessary but it is not in depth or customizable enough. And the app doesn't have all the features of the online version!?!?!?

title: 30 down more to go!
body: I credit this app to every pound I've lost. I couldn't do it without it. At first it was anxiety inducing counting everything but I found balance and I've never been happier or healthier. I recommend happy scale for more detailed weight tracking.

title: Great and Easy!
body: I have tried out many apps in this realm and this one is the hands-down winner. It is super user-friendly and provides all of the info I need in a beautifully presented and concise manner. Plus, I LOVE the scan function which makes food-item entry a cinch.

title: Beyond disappointed
body: My account was taken over and so one else's data was written into my account with the latest crappy update they released earlier this week.  I followed customer service instructions to log off remove and reinstall the app and the four months of my data was deleted and the crap was still there.  Six and a half months of hard work records gone!  And now they taken down all the customer reviews about that issue.

title: Helpful for daily tracking
body: Easy to use. Helpful.

title: Great app but needs a little tweaking
body: I think this is a great app, but there should be an option to track the TIME you ate. This will help with seeing personal eating patterns. Also, being able to edit/delete workouts. I would recommend to someone who wants a basic tracking app, but not a client.

title: My favorite and most used app
body: MyPlate has become my favorite and most used app I have. I love the ease of tracking your food. I love that my activity tracks automatically to my Apple Watch! Tracking nutrition and physical activity has never been easier!

title: THE SEARCH FUNCTION IS TOTALLY USELESS!
body: Since the latest update the search function DOES NOT WORK AT ALL!  Not to mention the scan function isn't either.  Now, the only food I can only log is food previously stored in my recent foods!  What good is this app if I can't search food I would like to log?  Please fix this ASAP!  I have been very disappointed that for MONTHS this app worked perfectly fine for my everyday needs and with the latest a updates there has been nothing but glitches!

title: Live strong helped me!
body: This app has really helped me this is perfect for people for people that just want to stay fit or if u want to lose. I have lost 3 lbs in the last 3 weeks! The only thing I will criticize about this app is that there is not much access to the info about previous days, but besides that this app is great!

title: Great tool but ..
body: I wish the caloric data was checked against restaurant / manufacturer info instead of user based. I just started using the app and have already found several major errors. Other than that it is easy to use and a great tool for keeping track of calories consumed and burned.

title: Love it!!!
body: I have the updated iOS on my iPhone and I haven't had a single problem with this app. I love that they added the scan feature - I have used it for a long time - before scanning was available! My husband and I both use it and love it.

title: Amazing!!
body: I never realized how many calories I was taking in every day until I started using this app. Now I stay under 2,000 a day or right at 2,000. This app has helped me to drop a few pounds and I plan to continue to use it until I reach my goal weight!

title: Excellent app
body: I have tried several of these types of applications and would highly recommend this one.  It is easy to use and understand and is supported with excellent information about food intake and fitness

title: Great app
body: This is a great app and easy to track you food intake. One needed feature I would like to see added is in the daily diary at the boot on it totals calories. It should also give you a total number of fat, protein and carbs in grams. I hope to see that added or add it to the progress tab so you see % and grams of each.

title: Really enjoy this app.
body: Easy to use. Nice interface. Appealing offerings, and design. My favorite feature is being able to enter a homemade recipe, then the total number of servings. The app can calculate a single serving value. Now when I eat leftovers, I can just use that recorded data.

title: Very good
body: I was surprised how thorough their food/calorie data base was when I tried the app.  It had close to everything I eat already laid out and it made me think twice about what I eat as I watched the remaining calories dwindle down for the day. Definitely recommend.

title: Easy to see where I go wrong & go right
body: Easy to use app!!!!!! So great it's free !!!!! Makes you want to keep using it! It's the only thing I've ever done that I've been able to stick with. I think it's because there is true perceived value in what your doing every day!

title: Great app but...
body: This is probably my favorite app!  it works great allowing me to keep track of diet in controlling my diabetes. My only wish is that I could enter my glucose readings on the mobile app the same way I can on the full website and I could see glucose readings on my mobile tracking graph on the mobile app as well.

title: Took a little while to figure it out! But now it's a great belonged useful in my weight loss program
body: Took a little while to figure out but now it is a great tool very helpful in keeping track of my calories and keeping me focused!! I can tell the days my weight doesn't drop I can look back and adjust my eating!!!

title: Love it!!!
body: Im always trying different diets and they never work. I came across this and thought healthy eating and exercise might work lol I lost  4 pound my first week and am almost done with my second week. Super easy to use and works. I'm excited to see me in few months!!!

title: Live strong app
body: I've been a fan of live strong for a few years now. Recently started using the app. Not as comprehensive in terms of finding food and exercise options but still hugely helpful in keeping on track with your goals. Love having easy instant access to the tracking mechanism.

title: Awesome!
body: It pushes me to eat more, exercise more, and I actually enjoy it! This app makes it more fun to eat, drink, and exercise, it's also a lot easier to make sure you're eating enough.

title: Excellent Tracker and Database of Foods and Exercise
body: I have used this tracker for years and find it to be an excellent way to track food and exercise. It has a great database and helpful chart for tracking nutritional content, weight, etc. it is easy to set and track realistic goals.

title: Keeps me in line
body: I absolutely love this app. I use it to track the calories I consume and the calories I burn. The app has helped me maintain a healthy weight for over 5 years now. Most of the foods I eat are already logged in the app and I can scan a UPC  to add items that don't exist.

title: Love it!
body: Love this app. Very easy to use not everything is correctly labeled so just look out for that. Other than that you can just scan your foods which makes it a lot easier and I love that it tracks your workouts and steps!!!

title: Better than fitnesspal
body: No articles in the way, just document food. Easy to favorite foods and even make it apart of a regular daily schedule food. And still make own meals or new recipe. But they things are easy but not in the way either, love it!

title: I have been using plate tracker for years
body: I love the app as well as the website.  It seems like it just keeps getting and better, I've been using it for about 5 years.  I trust their calorie and nutrient information, seems right on target.

title: Fantastic app!
body: It does everything I've manually been keeping track of in my quest to eat the proper ratio of calories to my activity level, in order to lose a few pounds and generally be fit and healthy. And it's super easy to use.

title: Very Helpful
body: I've been using this app for over a month and it's helped me lose 8 pounds. Counting calories really does work! The interface is very easy to use, and I really like the feature that lets you monitor your progress over time.

title: Excellent easy to use daily tracker
body: I have been using the Livestrong app for several years now and it has become a daily habit that keeps me focused.  My only wish is that it could sync effectively with my other fitness apps such as Strava, My Fitness Buddy and Wahoo.  Great job!

title: Keeps me on track!
body: I love this app because you can use it at your own pace. It helps me keep an accurate diary of what I eat, and makes it easy to find each item. I would recommend this app to anyone looking to track their diet.

title: It's easy
body: I've found this app to be very easy to use and it is definitely helping me reach my goals. There are a large number of items in the food database and growing daily. And, if it's not there, create your own entries from the nutrition information. Definitely makes the diet easier.

title: Essential for easy calorie counting
body: I've been using this app for the last 3 1/2 years. I absolutely love the ease and convenience. I lost 12 pounds in the first year and have been able to stay right where I want by consistently using the livestrong calorie counter.

title: Lots of options!
body: Great app. I love how many options there are to track my diet. Other apps are difficult to follow because they lack the dietary options that I'm accustomed to (gluten free, lactose free) but this app has everything which makes it super easy to stay healthy!

title: It really does help!
body: Incredibly useful app with huge database of foods/nutrition info. There's not as much in the exercise category but those calories burned vary widely so it's best to input your personal numbers anyway. I like this app a lot. Easy to use and I haven't had any problems with it!

title: Love!!
body: I love this app!!! I've tried other food tracking apps but this one is definitely the BEST! It's so easy to use. There is a lot of flexibility to add your own exercise and meals. It has helped me loose weight and when I need motivation and to get back on track I use it.

title: Fantastic Functional App
body: I have used this app to help lose and maintain my weight for years. The developers keep making it better and better and adding ever more functionality (love the scanner) and foods. This is by far my most used app.

title: Best one I've tried!
body: I love the design. It's easy to use and the layout is really nice. I love that it automatically calculates the protein, carbs and fat when I enter what I eat and drink. I've used others before and this is the one I stuck with. Thanks for such an AWEOME app to help me on my weight loss journey.

title: Awesome App
body: Helps record calories, water, and exercise. Tracks weight changes and nutrient percentages. Would be nice if it had a carb counter that let you know how many grams of carbs have been consumed. Has a TON of foods to choose from. I haven't found one thing that I couldn't find.

title: Great app!
body: I love this app. It has really helped me to stay on track and be focused. I have tried the other popular tracking apps and this is much better, because you can find a ton of different types of food and they offer so many different brands, which has made it that much more easy for me!

title: Fabulous app!
body: I love this app. Keeps me on track and helps me to maintain my food & exercise journals. I can't think of anything negative to say about it. Has a ton of foods listed and if there isn't one there you just add it yourself and then it will be there the next time you eat it.

title: Close but not quite
body: Love the design and layout. Chose this one over my fitness pro because of that and because it counts the calories you burn when you lift weights. When entering your meals, the search results are confusing and, a lot of the time, wrong. Would be nice if it also calculated your fiber intake and you could use the decimal point when entering in foods manually.

title: Great app
body: Using this to track my diabetic diet as I make post partum adjustments.  This is a great app.  It's easy to personalize and I've had no trouble with it crashing or bogging down my phone.  The reason I'm not giving 5 stars is because some of the food listings are not correct or do not agree with the industry standard in the diabetic and diatetic meal planning guide.

title: Add Water Amounts!
body: Overall I love this app. Really helps me decide what to eat and see the exercise pay off. But the water tracker is pretty pointless cause you can either choose mL or oz. I mean really... I either have to do the math with ounces or have something like 5000 milliliters. How about quarts or liters being an option for the non-sippers to use please?

title: Helpful and Educational
body: While I think it's neurotic and crazy to track every single thing you eat, I decided to do it for a month or so to learn portion control and healthy rating habits (like rethinking side dishes when the main dish is balanced on its own). This app makes it easy!

title: Good app, some problems
body: The app and community are solid. I've been using this to track for a month.

title: Helpful.
body: The app is very helpful in health. It helps you in calories. Also you can enter the things you eat at breakfast, lunch, dinner, and snacks. It also helps you by you putting in your exercise and how much you drink water. Also it is very simple and modern and helpful in health.

title: Awesome!!!
body: I just got this app, and so far I find it absolutely awesome and very easy to use. It seems as there is a great support system which is very important when trying to loose or maintain a healthy weight. Iam looking forward to get more involved and reach my weight goals!!

title: Great way to make food choices
body: Great app. The reason I like this so much is that you can track everything that you need to in order to make healthy, weight loss producing choices. Or if you need to gain weight this can also work well for you

title: Awesome App
body: Tracks calories, carbs, fats and proteins. Tracks weight and water. Search works well for finding foods (including brands i.e. Boars Head Turkey). Exercise searches are good as well. Uses Benedict Harris formula for calorie need tracking which is well respected. No bugs, no glitches, no issues. Truly enjoy working with the app.

title: I think this is the one!
body: I have repeatedly installed and deleted all the calorie counter apps I've tried. The one I stuck to the longest and re-installed the most was my fitness pal. This one however does not make me feel like it's a chore. I am rather happy with it!

title: Don't update!!!
body: I normally love this app. I updated this morning, now the whole app is unusable. Some weird bug kills all your info and adds tons of crazy foods into your tracker that you didn't add. If they don't fix this right away I'm going to start using a different app. I hate to lose all my info, but even months of my historical data is screwed up now. HELP!!!

title: Great, but missing one thing
body: Everything about the app is really cool. I just wish it had a calorie calculator show up when you go to input your exercise. It asks if you did one of the exercises it recommends or to input your calories burned. So I have to use a different website to figure that out.

title: I Love This App!
body: I love this app! It's a great app for tracking the intake of daily calories with each meal, including snacks. It also syncs well with the Apple Health app to give you a complete and integrated tracking tool to keep on top of your diet or fitness routine. I highly recommend the download.

title: OBSESSED
body: This is by far the best meal tracking app I've ever used. It's so simple and user-friendly but comes with so many capabilities. I love that it tells you calories in, calories out, and your net calories for the day. It's really helpful in achieving weight loss or clean eating goals. I love this app!

title: Started counting calories again
body: I started out using several different apps and ended up liking this one the most.  Easy to use and hopefully will help me lose a few pounds.  I like that I can use the Apple Watch to enter food I've eaten.
