title: Wish I could give it half a star
body: This app was great about 2 weeks ago before the new update turned everything to crap. So many issues with the new updates. Everything is slow, sometimes the app glitches and there are no other buttons when you press track. The bar to show how many calories is constantly incorrect, and overall just horrible. Will be deleting this app after this.
response: Hi Gengen9- We apologize that you're not happy, and thank you for your feedback regarding out latest update. The team is working on making changes based on user responses. We appreciate you reaching out and encourage you to email us at support@livestrong.com so we can help you out with the issues you're experiencing.

title: Disappointed
body: I was told this was the better app to navigate through, but there is no place to download a recipe off the web to be calculated. Nor can you download your own recipe to be calculated without putting every food item in individually.  For that reason, I rate it a 3. It's very important to me to use a recipe from the web especially.
response: Hi Beaoct29, we're so sorry that you're not happy with the app. We will definitely pass your feedback on to our team for consideration in future updates! Thank you for reaching out.

title: Decent
body: The functionality of this app is nice however I find that some of the foods are missing pertinent nutritional information.  This could be due to the inability to enter some nutritional values when using this app to enter new foods.  This is important to me in particular because I need to track sodium intake and that is one of the values that are not available when adding items.

title: Keepin me honest
body: This app is really amazing and is helping me reach my goals. If it weren't 4 this app I may not have ever been losing the weight I have. Of course food isn't everything. Exercise is the very important as well. Good luck with whatever your trying to achieve and most of all

title: Easy way to monitor calories
body: The food search works pretty well, keeping things simple. I would like to see a way to build 'meals' since I tend to eat the same thing for breakfast and lunch. Also a way to build entrees from ingredients since I like to cook my own food rather than eat packaged & processed food.

title: Very Helpful!
body: I am finally getting on top of my weight management, and I was looking for a simple & effective food journal. This is clean & simple & the points are a cool incentive :3 I love this! Definitely have me clarity on how much I was consuming per day. Now, by evening time, my calorie consumption is under 1400 :) great tool!

title: Best one out there!
body: I love this app! It has really helped me realize what is going in my body. I have tried most of the other food track apps out there and this one is the best (atleast for me and my circumstances). I would definitely recommend this one!

title: Great app but not like the website
body: This is a great app don't get me wrong, just not what I was hoping for. I was expecting an option to count my servings not calories. The website seems to base your intake more on nutrients and servings of food groups. I'd rather track that way without having to view the calories. It's a nice app but I'm disappointed in terms of what I was looking for.

title: Love.
body: I've been using livestrong's myplate for years as a tool to not only track net calories, but carb/fat/protein ratio. I love the mobile app because it lets you plan meals day ahead and had the scanner that scans barcodes on food packaging so it's quick. I like the recipe feature too!

title: Very bossy but good.
body: This app can be annoying because it's so demanding when it sends push notifications with demands that finish in exclamation points that I know I can turn off, to remind me to log what I eat throughout each day. Keeps me in check.

title: Gold Version
body: I got this app to track my carb consumption and to set daily goals and it's working beautifully. I've found many of the things I eat are not in their database so have needed to add them but it does everything I hoped it would.

title: Best tracking app everüëå
body: It works like a Fitbit to track how much calories I burned walking daily and have the system for you to put your workout burned calories calculated. Moreover the prop for scanning the food you eaten. And widely search of food for different dishes' caloriesüëç

title: I love this app.
body: It tracks fat, sugar, weight, calorie input and output.  I have reduced my fat consumption and managed my sugar intake with this app since November 2015 and have lost 9 lbs by just working to be healthier. I highly recommend this app for people who want to improve their health and or loose a few pounds.

title: Update
body: This is the second time that I've had to delete the app and lose all of my data for an update. Once I updated the app it would no longer open, even after restarting my phone and ensuring that I had the latest Apple software update. I really like using this app, but this is extremely frustrating.

title: Got to my goal
body: What more can you ask for?   This has so much already stored in its database, that you can just scan a lot of the barcodes to log your food.   I love this and it gives me the feeling of control that I crave.   It's one of my favorite apps.

title: Great.. But missing something
body: So many use this app as a way to help lose their baby weight, I just wish that they would factor into my calorie intake that I am nursing and need more to sustain supply. So many moms would find it helpful even with a community group for mothers and breastfeeding moms. Can we all hop on the ban wagon already?!

title: Love it!
body: I've been using this app for about 3 years and it's ever evolving and so helpful in meeting your macro goals! I also would like to see a setting for pregnant and breastfeeding mothers to help us meet our goals as well...not sure if they can figure out a good measure of additional calories for us but it would be really awesome!

title: Great App
body: It's a wonderful app! Great for dieting or even just trying to stay healthy. It has a lot of food options, I haven't ever eaten something that isn't listed. I think that it could add amount of carbs, fat, and protein in each food but other than that it's awesome!

title: Awesome
body: This is great app because it allows you to log in food, look up food nutrients, use workout sessions and get a graphic picture of your weight loss journey. The best feature I like is that I can plan my meal ahead and keep count of my calorie intake for the day.

title: Useful app
body: Useful for tracking calories, weight, exercise, etc. Reasonably easy to figure out and use. Like the graphs!

title: Thankful
body: I'm so glad this application exists bc it makes everything easier. I can log in and record from what I eat to what exercises I'm doing in real time. It saves me time & money paying for itself over and over again.

title: Using it now...
body: I started to use this app to track my nutrition when I started to lose weight carrying twins. Its very user friendly and has many food choices programmed in. Would recommend this app completely.

title: App crashed twice since new "upgrade"
body: I started using this app over six months ago. The other day when they did the upgrades I lost all of my data. Over six months of tracking was completely erased! I decided to look at it optimistically as a fresh start and began tracking again. Today when I opened the app to track my lunch all of my data was erased again. This used to be a great app; it is terrible now. I hope they can fix it fast.

title: Helped me
body: The purpose of using an app is to manage my weight, of course. Self-discipline is always the problem. Obedience to the app is a substitute for self-discipline. It just took more energy that I had to manage my weight without outside help, the app.  This app proved easy to use.

title: Fantastic App!
body: This is a highly effective way to lose weight if you're vigilant about tracking. I used to pay for Weight Watchers (which is nearly identical) until I found Live Strong, and I like this better. Highly recommended!

title: Easy & Convenient
body: I love this app!  I've never found counting calories so easy.

title: Couple of fixes needed
body: Generally impressed with the large database and simplicity,but at least two things need fixing:

title: I jumped ship
body: I've used this app and the website for a very long time. However, I am an avid food prepper, and make a lot of healthy recipes. I abhor having to get on the full site to input new recipes. I've gone to a competitor app for the sole ability to input recipes directly in-app. Should Livestrong add that ability, I'll likely return as a user. Otherwise, it's An awesome app and I'll miss it.

title: App keeps freezing
body: I've had the app for less than three weeks, and it has frozen up twice. When it restores itself, all entered data is lost. As well, it counts my iPhone steps and my calories burned from my Human app as separate calories. Because of this, it logs twice as many calories as what is actually burned. If I delete one, it's temporary. Very frustrating and I'm moving on when I find another app.

title: So far So sweet
body: This has been great the last couple days. I take what I eat with ease. If it had s barcode, this can ID it and enter the info. Would like to figure out how to add my own stuff or modify some foods already entered. But over all, I've been impressed with this.

title: Love the app!
body: I have spent a lot of time finding the right app that will track all of things I need! For example they track water, food, weight, and so much more! This is definitely my favorite app that includes those things!

title: Luv It!
body: This app keeps me focused and on the right path on my dietary wellness journey. It has helped me with beneficial changes by making it easy to get nutritional information on various food choices and then to be able to make better selection decisions.

title: Great app!
body: I cook a lot o Japanese food, and I'm always amazed when the calorie tracker recognizes the Japanese name and knows how many calories a serving would be. I love the fact that it tracks food, exercise, weight, water, and nutrition. It also pops up a reminder  when I forget to track. Love this app!

title: Really like this App!!
body: It is a very convenient and kinda fun way to track your calories!! Plus it tells you what the calories remaining are and all kinds of things. It really helps you pay attention to what you're eating without writing it down and even reminds you when you haven't tracked.

title: Love it!
body: This app has really kept me on track. At first it would not show foods automatically then I tried again and it should up. It has a nice database of foods to choose from. The downfall is that their is no way to access you profile online unless you buy the full version.

title: Its Good.
body: This app works well for me. It helps monitor my water and caloric intake and I can easily keep up with how many calories i have left to eat that day. I also love the point sytem where you can possibly earn rewards. The only thing I dislike is that it randomly closes all the time. Otherwise good simple app!!

title: Easy to use!
body: Helps you keep track of what you eat each day, and how many calories that you have taken in each day. Shows you a pie breakdown on % of proteins, fats, etc... that you are in that day. Helps you remember how much water you have had in each day, and many other features.

title: Great!
body: I have been using this app for about 2 weeks now, I am already down 5 lbs!! It is easy to use, only drawback I can see (personal preference) is it will only allow you to view the nutrients page for the day you are tracking. Otherwise I would highly recommend this app!

title: Easy, Fun, and Helpful
body: I love this app.

title: Excellent for calorie monitoring/wt loss
body: Using this has helped me to lose a considerable amount of wt bc it made me aware of how many calories were in my food choices. This allowed me to modify the amount or find an alternative. It also lets me keep track of cals burned working out!!! Great!!!

title: Ok but could use some fixes
body: Some basic foods are searchable in the app but others require the user to input the calorie, fat, and protein content. It's a little extra work than I was looking for. Also, if you don't get all of your food info input the same day, the app doesn't have the option to go back. It only shows the current day.

title: Latest update crashes on launch every time.
body: I've been using this app for a while and I love it, but the latest update has caused constant crashing. Every time (and I mean literally every single time) I launch the app it freezes for 3 seconds then crashes. Then when I relaunch it it works. It doesn't make the app unusable but it's aggravating.

title: Love it!
body: I started using this app about two weeks ago. I have lost six pounds just by being accountable for what I eat. The food diary is so easy to use and has just about everything I have put in pops up. I have been recommending it to everyone.

title: Simple & works
body: I've been using it for months and I've lost weight each week. As a vegan I'm impressed at the extensive database of foods. I've quit other similar apps because I was tired of always entering my vegan food manually. That rarely happens with this app.

title: Great app
body: Over the last three years I have lost 110 pounds!  This app has been the best I have found at tracking nutrition and exercise.  Would have given a 5 star rating if it was more current with video exercises like the Beachbody line.  They are the most modern form of exercise for busy parents.

title: Couldn't be happier
body: 1 week and I lost 4 lbs., haven't counted calories in a while and I was surprise how much my diet had changed.

title: iPhone daily step issue
body: I think this app has an issue with recording steps from the iPhone health app, it can't keep it consistent has it says I burned 800 calories from walking form the iPhone health app to this app but then the next minute it says i burned 20 calories from the iPhone health app, please fix this ASAP

title: Needs to let us edit and add food
body: While i love this app, it has limits. You cant change calorie info if its no longer correct. You can't add a restaurant item if you can't find it. Also a lot of the images are totally random! Chips have ramen pics, tuna just has a weightwatchers logo, etc.

title: I like the reminders
body: I like to use the push noticed because it's super helpful in reminding me to track food. I feel like there should be more "homemade" food options I don't eat out or cook from a box or package very often so I feel my meals are less salt and fat than is being recorded. But I do like the app.

title: Mpoints broken, they don't care
body: This is supposed to be an mpoints app, which was its only plus.

title: Hate the update
body: As many previous reviews have stated, I used to love this app before the update. I loved the way I could track my carbs, protein and fat for the day on a user friendly pie chart. Now the app only tells me what I have left for the day, which means I have no way of quickly knowing how many grams I've eaten if I go over. I'm guessing they switched so people would upgrade to gold but it's ridiculously overpriced. I'll be deleting this and switching to something else.

title: Great App
body: This app is the best fitness tracking app I've used. I did not like the clunky myFitPal counter. This app is simplistic and has a great UI. Barcode scanners really wowed me.

title: Very user friendly
body: I switched to this one after the everyday health app crashed on me.  It is much easier to use, but I would like to see a sugar tracking feature with all the other nutritional info.  And that is the only reason for four stars instead of five.

title: MyPlate is inexplicably the best!
body: This calorie tracker not only has every single food available in its inventory, but it also modifies calories based on your exercise activity! Such a great app! I highly recommend it for any purpose, whether it's to maintain, gain or lose weight

title: Best tracker for anybody just wanting to keep track of the things that they eat
body: I love that it doesn't just keep up with calories and exercise but it also tells you what percent is carbs, fats, etc plus you can track your water intake.

title: It's okay.
body: What really holds this back for me is the inability to keep track of average caloric intake.  You can do it, for a price.  Otherwise I'd still be using the app.  It works as well as the others, but I just can't get past a developer showing that an option is available (greyed out option) for a monthly fee.  Yes, I know they're trying to make money.

title: The App is Back
body: I had given up on the app earlier this year. Multiple issue made it unusable. Now that I am back I am loving it. I really like the automatic tie in with the apple health app. Tracking my workouts automatically is an amazingly helpful feature!

title: Easy and fun to use
body: This has always been my favorite calorie counting/ nutrition app. It has and easy and fun to use interface. The only complaint I had was not enough foods in the data base but it looks like they have improved much. Great app!

title: Like it but...
body: I wish adding food were easier.. Like I have to wait for the little green box to pop up when Ive searched the food 3 different times and it's clearly not in the system.. There should be a button for me to add my food right away.. Other than that I really love it.

title: Easy and Accurate
body: Love having this app on the phone. very useful for being aware of where you are at for daily nutrition.  you can find most anything you eat here and track progress accurately with ease.

title: Good but...
body: The application works for me.  I like that it is easier to use than other applications of its type but the page to sign in is frustrating.  If I've not logged out why do I have click in to log in and then get re-directed to Facebook?  Eliminate a step or two.

title: Best App Available- Especially for the Value!!!
body: I've used this app for approximately 8 years and LOVE it!! The frequency of updates ensure the users needs are met without any problems, malfunctions or loss of information!! AWESOME WAY TO TRACK YOUR PROGRESS & celebrate your achievements that are easily verifiable!!

title: Motivation
body: I am a very competitive person, and this app has my friends and I working to eat better and work out more than each other. It's a very good app and the fact that it has food dishes from specific restaurants is awesome too.

title: Not sure Yet
body: I just started today and my goal is gain 10lbs so that I can get back to my pre-pregnancy weight. Not too many calorie counters have it set up so easily for weight gainers like myself. I am starting today and will give another review in 4 weeks

title: User friendly
body: It's easy to use, I like the graphs and ways you can track. I wish there was a bigger index of food to pick from so I could use less manual food plug ins. Also wish I could view graphs for more than just the day like the one explaining how much protein, carbs, etc you consumed. Overall great app

title: Great Motivation
body: This app has many foods and brands that I frequently use to make it easier for me to count calories. This app also motivates me, because of the great rewards. Thank you for helping give me the push I need to go on the road to eating better.

title: My review
body: I Just had a baby 2 weeks ago and am really pushing myself to lose weight. I've only had this app for a week and so far I like it. I watch everything g I eat now and tell myself no. I would recommend this app to others.

title: Easy to use
body: This app is easy to use on the go. I love being able to immediately input calories burned while exercising. All calculations are done by the program so your time is not wasted. I would recommend this to friends.

title: Semi functional
body: Works okay... Crashes a lot. Lacks certain basic functionality when it comes to editing entries or custom foods. Didn't recognize many scannable goods. Lacked feature explanation (i.e. How much is moderate activity? Had to look it up on their website, which also was glitchy.).

title: Needs two additions!
body: Love this app, but needs two additional features to make it complete: 1) needs a daily vitamin/supplement tracker, and 2) I would love to be able to track the specific time of day that I ate each item! Hope I've been heard so I can enjoy the app more than I already do!!!

title: Love this app
body: I really love this app.

title: Sensational
body: I couldn't be more pleased. It helps me manage my fitness and track results that motivate me forward. So far with the help of this app I have lost 65+ pounds!

title: Very helpful ap
body: I have found this tracker easier to use than some others I have tried. It is quick & simple...just what I need without a lot of trouble keeping up with it. Thank you for a tool that is helping me to be healthier :))

title: Helpful app
body: Very easy to use. I'm surprised at just how many of the foods I search for are already in the list (even from restaurants)! There's not quite as much detail available on the app, for free at least, as on the website but the mobility makes up for it! Definitely recommend this app.

title: Love this app
body: I never thought I would keep track of calories, but this app makes it so easy, and dare I say, fun! This is a big part of my health and fitness journey. It is well done and a thousand times more useful than a food journal app I paid for. Give it a try!

title: Good app but could use some improvements
body: I like the app in general it does occasionally freeze up. It would be nice if they added more options as far as exercising like leg lifts, and a few others. Overall it has helped me to keep my food choices/daily calories in check.

title: Mother of the Bride
body: Have been a die hard Weight Watcher for years, but can't seem to keep on track.  My daughter showed me My Plate and I love it.  It is with me all the time and tracking gets results. Lost 11 pounds in 3 weeks, am very happy.  Feel like I am on my way to a heathy weight.

title: Super easy!
body: This is so easy to use! I've generally stayed away from tracking my calorie intake, simply because of the time it takes to measure portions and figure out actual calories consumed, but this app with its search capabilities makes it  so effortless.

title: Great app!
body: This app has helped me a lot! I've eaten better than before. It's simple to use. You just have to make sure as you're searching what you ate, that the nutrition facts are correct. This app made me think wisely of what I eat. Would recommend!

title: I love it
body: The visuals and graphic design make it so easy and comfortable to use. It's even fun to log in my food when I can see the colors and shapes marking my progress. I love the water setting because it shows the cup being filled more and more!

title: Has any food
body: What I love about this app so much (and I have been using it for many years) is the variety of foods I can look up and the detail with which the nutritional aspect is broken down. I highly recommend it!

title: üëåüèº
body: I use this app a lot. I like it because it's good at keeping track of what you eat AND drink. I also like that it gives you little work outs to do. That is a really helpful feature. Honestly, the only thing keeping it from a five star rating is the difficulty of logging home-cooked meals...

title: Very Simple Not Complicated
body: I have used the app so far for two days. This is really great to track my carbs especially being diabetic.  The only thing that is annoying is the ads but it works great and links with the iPhone heart app

title: Easiest food tracker ever!
body: I've tried several. This one is so easy to use, especially because of the barcode scanner. Other programs were too complicated and I stopped using them after awhile. This one's great!

title: Useful
body: It keeps track of several things at the same time and there are many options to track several aspects of your health.

title: Scrolling
body: I use this app everyday and have been for about 5 years and overall, I have been happy with its performance.  Recently though, I have been unhappy because it takes forever to scroll up and down. Perhaps it's because the delete feature can now be performed on the main page but in any event, this delay is so annoying I'm contemplating getting a different app.

title: Great app
body: Comprehensively manages nutrition, calories, water, and exercise. Can share data with other iPhone apps. I'd like to see the list of recently tracked foods put newest items first and allow very old items to eventually disappear.

title: Love this app!!!
body: This app is awesome!  It doesn't have every food I eat in it but with the ability to scan the barcodes, and enter in the nutrition info, I can still keep track of foods not in the database with accuracy!  Love it and highly recommend!

title: Gets me back on track
body: This app is fantastic! I always go back to this when I need to get back on track with what I'm eating and make sure that I'm getting the right nutrients and protein throughout the day. I love that I can scan what I eat also

title: Love it! Lost 6 pounds in 2 weeks
body: Really easy to use! As mostly everything I eat! Keeps me on track with water and everything. Been using it for 2 weeks almost 3 I've lost 6 pounds (I also work out 5 times a week)

title: Hate new colors.
body: Love, love, love the app. I've lost 95 lbs using it. I absolutely hate the new colors. I can't stand looking at the app now. Add a feature for users to choose their own color theme. In the meantime bring back the old standard colors.  Sadly if it stays pastels I'm going to find another app. That's how much I hate the new colors. Pleeeeease help!

title: So easy!!
body: MyPlate has a ton of foods in their bank. It makes tracking your food so easy. It quickly lets you know what you've eaten, what's left, and tracks your water, too. I wish I could track 2 people on here, as hubby won't!!

title: Glitches
body: Nice app but plenty of glitches pop up. Haven't been able to post comments for over a week now. Sometimes won't scan, others won't update input and crashes frequently.

title: Live Strong Calorie Tracker
body: Never dieted before, never tracked anything for nutritional value, pre-diabetic, obese still learning about good nutrition, have lost 10 pounds in three weeks, goal to reach 1 pound weight loss per week for 52 weeks ‚Äì I am on my way with this great program.

title: Very practical app!
body: So far I like this app. Used it for 2 weeks now; keeps you honest with what you are eating. This app is simple, has your common foods stored for easy access on a daily basis. I like it because the calorie is still the unit of measure for weight loss. Very nice free app.

title: MyPlate App
body: Best Calorie/Exercise tracker I've ever used! It motivates you! It connects with other apps you most likely already have and use! It lets you share your progress. The app lets you track water intake, weight, calories, protein and carbs! You won't regret downloading.

title: Ipad app vs iphone app
body: I love myplate but only use it on my ipad because the iphone Force sync does not work. The iPhone app does not have your current to date profile like the ipad. This needs fixing. I don't want to enter information on two different apps. Also the Scan the meal does not work.

title: Too many things to track from different sources
body: Ok so I got the link from livestrong, but does not track nor list the workouts that come from that site "stronger"  I have to manually track calories and enter all exercises.  Like the food functionality, but need to improve to use one app for all. Make it easy

title: Easy and Fun to Use
body: Very easy to use, this app actually made the calorie tracking experience fun. Right now, I'm taking advantage of the app's free offerings before upgrading to Gold. I'd definitely recommend to anyone serious about sticking with calorie tracking.

title: MyPlate
body: I absolutely LOVE MyPlate. It is such an easy way to log my calories and to keep track of everything! It is also a good motivator to eat only good things cause I just hate having to log a whole bunch of calories! MyPlate has helped me a lot in my weight loss journey!

title: Extremely helpful tool
body: I use this app on a daily basis and it really helps me honest with my progress towards a healthier life. Having barcode scanning capability to assist with food tracking is very helpful and the database is compressive. I highly recommend this application.

title: Really helps me keep focus
body: I enjoy the way the app helps me focus on what I eat. It's also really helping me loose a couple of excess kg's.

title: Great app
body: Does exactly what it is supposed to do. Tracks what  you eat and lets you know if you are under or over the number of calories you are to eat to either lose weight , maintain, or god forbid gain weight. Keeps me on the straight and narrow LOL Works beautifully.

title: Fan
body: Loving the app...didn't realize just how much I'm not getting in a day. I also live that you can search the foods you are eating and it can help calculate the nutritional facts and it shows you broken down in charts how your daily diet is looking (carbs, protein,etc).

title: Great app!
body: This app is pretty good- it has most of the foods I'm looking for which is a plus, although sometimes I have to manually search for and enter the info. The only thing is it takes up a lot of time. But in the end it's worth it.

title: Good app!
body: Love the app - it has tons of food to choose from when counting calories. Only draw back is that it kicks me out sometimes and when searching, it seems if you don't type in the exact words it won't do a "similar" search, instead just says "no matches".

title: Love It
body: I just started using this app and love it thus far.  There are some calorie counts a are slightly off but it doesn't bother me too much.  Anything you can't find you can simply create and add yourself.  Make sleeping track of everything simple!

title: Food description
body: I like this app.  I have an iPhone 4S.  The down side is that some of the food names are too long and the text does not wrap to second line.  I tried turning phone and it did not change orientation.     When I select that item it does not show the rest of the name.

title: Unreal and easy
body: Always had a hard time to count calories and remember what I was eating through the day. But now I have no excuse made easy and simple. Aloha livestrong great tool for fitness. I'm 277.8 lbs right now I'll see in 30 days and let you know how I do. Mahalo from Hawaii nei!!!

title: My Plate
body: My attachment to My Plate is my very "good friend" in support of my staying and trying to stay healthy. Please keep up the good job for all of us. Thanks guys and gals!!!!!! Only one downfall for seniors; it is hard to read because the fats carbs and protein is VERY hard to see in the nutrients print is so tiny .

title: Very Easy to Use
body: This app is great for keeping helping to keep yourself in track .. Has also helped me with the caloric value of many foods that everyone commonly eats. Helps me keep track if my water intake as well which I have always been bad at. Wish there was a percentage breakdown between fat, proteins, and carbs ...

title: Great!
body: the app is great but i think they need to include the body mass index, body water and muscle should also be included into the weight progress.  the scan bar should pick up more items. some or most of the items i scanned couldnt be found. the force syncing is also great as well!

title: Good for tracking what you ate
body: I am trying to determine what foods I'm allergic to. This is easy to use because it's always with me. I wish there were a notes section with the daily foods view. I especially like that many brand names are there to help take the guess work out of tracking.

title: Wonderful tool
body: I had tried to use trackers before but this one has everything in it so all you have to do is search then choose. Graphs progress, pie charts your fat/carb/protein percentages. It's been an essential part to me understanding where my diet is taking me.

title: great app - except for one thing
body: this app is exactly what i was looking for.  its forced closed a few times, but no biggie.  my only gripe is the fact that there are MCDONALD'S ADS on a fitness app.  i don't know how much control they have with the ads but they should really try to look into it.  kind of messed up in my opinion.

title: Good calorie counting App
body: I've only been using this app for a few days and I'm really starting to get the hang of tracking everyday. The reminder feature is also a nice perk so you're reminded to put everything in even if you're busy.

title: Progress
body: It has been a great tool for me to track and be accountable of my daily choices. My only suggestion would be that there would be a spell check option or suggestions even if spelling is a bit off. I am a horrible speller, so it would be a huge time saver.

title: Great tool
body: Love this app. Used it my last two years in college and from time to time thereafter. It definitely helps keep you aware of what you put in your body and how much. Great tool! I use it on my laptop which is a lot more detailed...and now on my phone which is extremely convenient.

title: Awesome
body: This app is fantastic so far. I was on Weight Watchers but no longer could afford it. They had an app similar to this that I was so disappointed to lose. This definitely makes up for it and in some aspects I think it is better.

title: Good, not the best
body: I really want to make this switch. However, 40% of the UPC scans are wrong. That's a big problem. A feature that would definitely make me switch (if the above were fixed) is clicking done and telling me what I would weigh if I kept this up. I love that feature in MFP.

title: Making life easier
body: I've gone off and on more diets than I can count, and calorie counting used to be an overly complex chore. This app makes slimming down so much easier, and it's nice to have calories burned by walking tracked along side it. My highest regards to this app.
response: We're so happy to hear that MyPlate is making your life easier!

title: Change it back!!
body: Please change the interface back to what it looked like before. The current interface is too cartoon-like. The previous was much better!

title: Easy Motivation
body: I had the WW app.  When their upgrade made it hard to use I slowly quit using it and proceeded to gain 11 pounds in six months.  This app easy easy easy to use and I'm now back on track with healthy eating and an active lifestyle.

title: Great new features
body: I used to use this a while back but didn't think it was that great. I came back and they have added a bunch of cool things. The only thing I don't like are the amount of calories you are supposed to take in each day. It just seems really high

title: Awesome so far!
body: I just started this app yesterday and so far it has helped a lot with calorie counting. I have such a bad habit with not eating as much as i should a day, so now that I'm eating well this app is helping towards my goal. Also it has workouts which is a B I G help!

title: Great app
body: It an overall great app for tracking I have a goal of gaining wait and this app gives me motivation to keep of wat goes into my body as well as ma output. Only reason I didn't give it five stars is because I just wish it let u create the meal if it was just something you threw today for a meal or snacks

title: Helpful App
body: It works great. It has almost all of the foods I eat and if it doesn't the app makes it extremely easy to enter the food you eat. If you're trying to watch your calories this is a great app that helps you a lot.

title: Great protein-tracking app!
body: This app is awesome for tracking what I eat! I'm not as concerned about tracking calories as I am my protein intake but this app is great for both. I like that I don't have to input the calories each food item contains; the app has those recorded! Good job, MyPlate! :)

title: Healthy living has improved
body: I've been using the app for a week, already see the results because I've been really aware of my eating style and I've made a lot of changes in my diet and this app really keeps me motivated

title: They've got bugs right now.
body: I've been using this regularly for the last three weeks. It was getting the job done. However, the app has become glitchy recently. The portion of the app that tracks calories burned has gone haywire and adds 100s-1000s of calories burned out of thin air and there's no way to delete them once they're added making the app far less useful.

title: Best App
body: I love this app!  It helps me to stay on target with my macronutrients!  It is the best!  I lost over 25lbs; however, I gained back 5lbs when I stopped tracking. I'm back to it now and will diligently use this app to consistently track my daily food intake.

title: Loved before- not happy with update!
body: I am ready to get back on track with my eating healthy and drinking more water and LOVED using this app before. I know it takes a while to get used to updates but I absolutely do NOT like the new front page look. :(:( PLEASE let me go back to the old look! Easier for me to look, know and navigate with ease!
response: Hi! Thank you for your review! Our team is working on making changes based on user feedback, so your comments are much appreciated. Please watch the app store and our community boards for news on the next update!

title: I want to give 5 stars BUT
body: I wanted to start the NY off right.  I downloaded this app and set myself up, including goal to loose 2LBs a week.  Calorie allotment is great feature and the count is awesome, easy to add foods including scanning, easy to track exercise and water in take.  The one FATAL flaw is every time you login it resets you daily allotment of calories back to "maintain weight".  PLEASE fix this!!!!

title: Great aid
body: Have been using this app on my journey to lose weight and become healthier and it has been a great aid in counting calories, tracking my diet, eating healthier and making better health decisions. Would definitely recommend this app to others.

title: Love it....
body: Decent app with all I need. Almost too many options to choice from when logging my meals. Wish more of my stuff was "Livestrong Verified". Love the ability to track my movements through the day and covert to "net calories ".....need iPhone 5 with the motion chip. All-in-all, this is a good app and I hope it works for me !

title: Love it!
body: This is a great app, I have used a few other calorie trackers and this one is my favourite. The only thing I don't like is there are like no pre set exercises, and when I try to scan food it almost never finds it. Still love it though :)

title: Amazing
body: Tells me exactly how much I can eat or cannot eat and links with my physical activity apps to subtract calories without me figuring it myself makes my day to day so much simpler! The reminders on the phone keep up to the challenge with less cheating haha

title: Latest version has turned into a nag
body: All I want this for is to keep track of my weight, since I skate on the edge of underweight. I don't want it to keep track of food, but every time I enter a weight, that seems to encourage it to nag me to enter my meals. I haven't figured out how many days of inaction it takes for it to quit nagging. The old version didn't nag like this.

title: Great tracker app!!!
body: For someone starting over and having set weight loss, water consumption, and muscle gain goals, this app is awesome! I love that it calculates your BMI and offers tracking of weight loss, caloric consumption, etc over time. So you can see how you're actually doing.

title: YES!!!
body: I love this app! It's much easier to maneuver and enter food in manually than the myfitnesspal one. It honestly really helps me see what I'm eating and allows me to manage my diet in a quick efficient way. 10/10 would recommend to others.

title: Love it!
body: I have been using it for years an even thou I have tried several other apps out of curiosity... This one by far is the best. It always has the foods I am looking for and if it doesn't, you just scan it with the upc scanner!

title: I love this app
body: I love the design, the graphics and how easy it is to use. I cancelled my acct on weight watchers because this app is better to track your foods. I only wish they will allow people to integrate your workouts from activities tracker like Fitbit.

title: Gets the job done
body: Easy to use, well organized.  Helped me to start thinking about what I was eating and really jump started my diet.

title: Life changing
body: Seriously had made it easier to keep track of exercise and calories. I used to do it online but I would always forget to log on and track.  This is always in your palm

title: Wow! I'm Impressed!!
body: I've been using this app lite for about a month now and I'm loving how I can track and view my data! Great layout, so easy to use and very helpful! I recommend this for everyone to use its amazing how those calories sneak up on one. Good luck!!

title: Great app!
body: This app is extremely useful for anyone trying to keep a better eye on their food intake and for setting weight goals. It crashes sometimes, but it's easy to start back up without a lot of time wasted.

title: Works Perfectly, Needs Content
body: This app tracks calories perfectly. One thing that could really use improvement is the selection of exercises and ability to use the preset food/exercise scores without being connected to the internet.

title: Fantastic App
body: I just started using this app two days ago and I can see all the mistakes I have been making in my weight lose. I feel sure that I am going to lose weight now by using it. My daughter in law used it and lost 49 pounds! A FIVE STAR APP for sure!

title: Already a huge help!
body: I just got this app, literally, and I love the fact that there isn't a lot questions or I have to put a lot info into it. My favorite part is that it gives you the amount of calories you have to consume. Love!

title: Love this app!
body: This is a great app for tracking calories and workouts. It's very easy to use and has so many options for food...I can always find the calorie amounts for what I eat. I've tried other apps like this but this one beats them all!

title: Love it
body: Been stalled for months, first day using this super easy app I lost a pound. I believe I can get my probably body back again! It is so easy, I tracked calories before by hand and i was successful but it was a brutal process.  This is the easiest thing in the world, love it, love it, love it!

title: Nicely Done
body: Finally the app links across different platforms. The scan option is a nice addition. Doesn't always work as the item isn't on file. There should be an easy way to update items. The information is on the food item.

title: This app. Has changed my life.
body: I like the tip that tells you to be honest. As soon as I came to terms with my snacking and fat intake by using the calorie tracker, I have a whole new outlook on dieting. Eat healthy and in the right proportions, the weight comes off with minimal exercise. It is the perfect app!

title: Love it!!
body: This app is great for keeping a healthy weight. It has just about any food you can think of. I love the fact you don't have to be over 18 to use it, as most other calorie trackers are. Some teenagers actually care about their weight!

title: Great app to lose or maintain weight
body: I love this app! I can keep track of all the calories I consume and the ones I burn easily with this app. I can also track my progress, weight, and nutritional intake for the day. Plus mPoints are a great bonus to this already fantastic app!

title: Pretty good but...
body: I think this app is prob more useful if you eat a lot of prepackaged food. It's kind of a lot of work to enter in all your ingredients if you do most of yr cooking from scratch. However, the exercise tracker is super useful and overall it's pretty user-friendly. I don't really use the food tracker anymore for the reason above but will keep it for the exercise tracker.

title: Exactly what I needed
body: The daily reminder function is nice when it's been a busy day. After tracking my calories for a few weeks it became second nature. I knew what I was taking in and could self-monitor my intake and progress. Perfect for me!

title: amazing
body: I love this app, unlike other diet tracking apps, this one is quick and easy. there's not complicating measuring or anything, just put what you ate and your done! I love how easy it is to see how many calories I still need or need to lose! I love it! :)

title: Best food tracker
body: I've used trackers before that were a complete pain, this one on the other hand has been easy and helped me tremendously. Everything from the setup to the alerts is perfect. This has been the easiest cut for me thanks to this app.

title: Personal Reflection
body: If nothing else this app has been a great help for me in keeping track of everything that goes into my body. As long as I am always aware of that my health will always improve, thanks for this help it's been a huge help!

title: Love the barcode option!
body: This app is awesome, and I love that you can scan the barcode of almost any food and all of the nutrition facts are already i their system! This app has been super helpful in tracking my calories!

title: Good tracking app
body: I like the fact that you can find lots of food in the database so it takes away the extra work of constantly enter each individual food value

title: Great so far
body: I've only been using the app a couple of days but so far it is great. No cliches notice. Accurate reading. If it continues to proof itself worthy I will pay the five dollars for commercial free, and the additional service it provides.

title: Great app!
body: I do really like this app especially the ability to scan the bar codes, makes it really easy to track your food intake. I wish it was that kind of easy adding a simple workouts like elliptical, etc..

title: Complete Tracker
body: This app has a really complete list of foods including brand names to accurately track calories and all nutrition.

title: I LOVE THIS APP!!‚ù§‚ù§
body: Simply put:  this app is saving my life. I needed something to help keep tabs on myself and its far better than me counting my own calories for sure! It helps me be accountable. And in one month I'll have lost at least 5 lbs!!!  I'm on my way!  Thank you My Plate!‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§Much Love

title: Do not like the update
body: When I first installed this app it would easily give me the total carbs of each meal beside the calories. Now they have taken away my ability to track carbs for each meal which is important for a diabetic. It's not all about calories. I do like their database of information and ability to add my own information

title: So cute
body: I for one love this app. It feels a lot less clinical and condescending than MyFitnessPal and other calorie tracking apps that I've tried. It's somehow comforting with the softer color palette and fun interface. But it's simple and easy to use and that's what matters the most. :)

title: Amazing app
body: This is one of the most helpful apps I've ever worked with.

title: Pure Awesome üëèüôå
body: The ONLY reason I didn't use this app before was the barcode wasn't working. Now it works flawlessly after the update. Beautiful graphic design, simple user interface, nice colors and just all around beautiful and simple üëå

title: Liking it so far!
body: I'm liking it so far. It's very easy to use, which I like a lot. I also like the fact that it keeps track of my water intake, as I really needed that. I like to have it a bit longer before I give it a 5 star. At that time I will give my honest opinion on the app. üòÅ

title: No hard work
body: This app has almost food already for you which makes it super convenient! You can also scan a label for higher accuracy of an item.

title: Great Tracker
body: This is a great app! I use it everyday to track my macros. I particularly like the pie chart. I will give it 5 stars when the ability to customize the amounts in more ways other than fractions. I can't be as accurate with fractions. I would like to be able to put the exact amount in.

title: YOU NEED THIS APP
body: Even though I am very young, I wanted to keep track of my eating habits and how much water I drink. This definitely controlled my intake on junk foods, worked out more and drink so much water. This definitely is a huge help to starting and keeping a healthy lifestyle!

title: Love this app
body: This app helps me maintain accountability and helps me to keep a good perspective on my daily calorie intake as well as water and exercise. I am loving how much better I feel. The app helped me loose about 18 lbs at the end of the year and has helped me maintain that in a healthy way

title: 5-Stars until lately
body: I've always loved this app. Great selections of food to choose from, all kinds of info calculated for you... Perfect. Until lately. Always before it synced between my PC, iPhone and iPad seamlessly. Now it takes fits. Sometimes it syncs, sometimes it doesn't. No consistency between devices. Really really annoying and can't even force it to sync! Looking at other apps to replace it now. :((

title: Love this app
body: I love the way this app keeps us with my calories, weight, etc as well as the history. The reminders are wonderful as they help me get back on track when I am too busy or tired and stop entering my info.

title: Simply THE BEST
body: Simply THE BEST - User friendly, all-in-one app. Simplicity in meal, water, and weight tracking; exercise videos right on the app. Scanner is one of the best; food product database is huge. Just the right amount and type of reminders. Thank you Livestrong My Plate App

title: Not accurate
body: The free macros and calorie counter is nice, but this is by no means a weight loss tool. I asked it to track my activity, I went on a 40 minute run, and it put me at -8,000 calories. If I eat 8,000 calories today I'm definitely going to gain weight. There's no way that adds up. 3 stars because it's helpful for macros, but not 5 because it's unreliable.

title: Good app, but needs improvement.
body: I like the app. I don't feel there are enough preloaded food items from which to choose. Especially when It comes to restaurant menu items.  It is getting better though.  I find the reminders to be a bit annoying, although I guess they serve their purpose.

title: So easy and pretty accurate!
body: This app is amazing if you are serious about keeping the track of your diet and goals! I love how I get points for putting the info and I get to spend them! It is rewarding but it takes time

title: Great Idea. Very Useful
body: Great idea and format. It probably serves most purposes for calorie tracking and even exercise tracking. It also allows you to create and track your own meals, however the saturated fat always reads zero.

title: I like it BUT,
body: If only it were possible to view other days' caloric breakdown. Would if we could compare the caloric breakdown between days. Maybe even have it on the home page, instead of having to dig for it! That little detail would make this app SOOO much better! üëçüá∫üá∏

title: Handy Dandy
body: This is the most handy dandy app for tracking what you ate. Its really smart and has just about everything you might think of for tracking. I love the speed of the label scanner and my favorite button the "I ate this" button.

title: It's great but....
body: I love this app, although recently downloading it. It inspired me to drink more water and eat healthier. Upon adding the water, I find that it already has 8 ounces set as a default. I usually drink my water from a 24 ounce bottle. I end up forgetting to delete it and it says I drank 824 ounces. I suggest implementing some way to edit this.

title: Fix the glitches
body: I've been using this for a long time so I was happy to upgrade app on my iPhone.

title: Serious eye opener!
body: I'm not a health nut, But I have learned so much about what my intake is from this app. I have learned that maybe I'm not so gluten-free as I thought? LOL. But this is a good app for those who wish to know what their intake is and what their daily exercise is worth in reference to calories. Strong recommend from me, happy living and good health!

title: Great
body: Great app. Very handy. I live the scan function. Is a little off on some food but close enough to make sure I'm keeping track of things. It's easy to change if you make a mistake or add more later. Has plenty of exercise types too. All in all very worth having.

title: Great app for tracking calories
body: This app has the calorie info of many different foods so it makes it really easy to track calorie intake. There are still some foods that I eat that are missing tho, but even then, it is easy to add custom foods. I also use the MyWater app with this, which works well.

title: Love this exercise/calorie tracking app
body: I've only been using this app, but I love it. It's easy to use. So far I haven't had any trouble finding the food that I eat in this app. It gives you the option to enter calories manually. Great app!

title: Really Useful App
body: I really like this app. It helps me to remain on track by logging everything that goes into my mouth. It is not perfect and therefore needs tweaking. It does not calculate accurately and it would be really beneficial to be able to see the items that turns the categories Red.

title: Easy!
body: This app is great and so easy to use.  Think of your calorie intake like a budget, when you are out of money you stop spending, when you are out if daily calories, stop eating!  It makes it so easy to track.

title: Great app
body: Easy to use, has lots of foods in the database already. Not sure if this is already possible but would like to be able to check nutrition info for previous days as well as current

title: Good app
body: This app is easy to use and has a great database of foods. I can imagine some people find it annoying, but I like that it reminds me to track my food.  I also just like the appearance of the screen, and I like the chart of my weight progress.

title: SO Happy I downloaded this!
body: This app is great in so many ways. Not only is it free- BUT it has points you earn and redeem for gift cards, giveaways etc! I did weight watchers for months with a fee of $50 a month. Basically the same app but better

title: Transfer tracker
body: I was previously using the Spark People app but decided to try something new. Came across this highly rated app and decided to give it a try. Really liking it so far.

title: Good app
body: This is quite addictive and really helps tracking calories, nutrition, exercise and weight. Makes it easy to reflect back on your history as well... And has a good, varied database of food entries which is hard to find usually.

title: Good, useful fitness app
body: You can always just go through the day guessing how many calories you've consumed, or with this app you can KNOW how many calories you've consumed. Sometimes it will surprise you. Great for keeping on track.

title: Horribleness
body: This app makes you feel really bad about your self even though it helps you lose wait don't think about yourself fat think of how great everyone is and you are better than a stupid app

title: Finally
body: This is finally the method I can use to help me lose some weight; I've already lost 5 pounds! I saw a different program but it is not as easy to use as this one. With self control and this app helping me, I know I will reach my goal!!!

title: Reaching goals
body: This is a great app to keep you focused on your health goals. I call it my app app (for appetite app) because it is a reality check as I get through the day. It's amazing how much you can control by monitoring your intake. It also makes the occasional misses less troubling. :)

title: It makes losing weight easier!
body: It's really nice to be able to scan in items. There are a few things that could be better such as putting in carbs and fat with decimals.

title: Great way to keep track of nutrient breakdown and remain mindful of calorie intake!
body: I really like how the app stores a history of foods consumed so you can easily find and record what you consume the most without having to connect to wifi to search

title: I really like it so far!
body: I've been using this app for about a week now. I really like how hit minds me to keep track of my meals, the search has a great variety of food brands and restaurants. I like the community. I wish it had workout suggestions but it's all good so far. I like the living well tips. So far so good.

title: Love Livestrong
body: I have used the Livestrong website for over a year and it has helped me lose 80 pounds. The app is a great and easy addition (or replacement) to the site. It is easy to navigate, easy to learn, well-designed as far as looks go. I love it.

title: Useful Calorie Tracking App
body: Use as a tool for tracking calories. Has helped me start achieving health and fitness goals.

title: Pretty useful app
body: Good app, I would've like to see a couple additional features such as setting goals on nutrient breakdown, seeing the actual amounts (grams) consumed along with percentages and tracking body fat on a daily basis along with weight seeing as BMI is an essentially useless number for those with any kind of muscle mass.

title: Awesome and useful!
body: I use this app everyday to track my diet and exercise while gaining points for gifts ends through their point system... What a win-win! Highly suggestive to anyone who appreciates accountability and rewards while trying to get healthy.

title: Great ap on the go
body: This ap is great when on the go, no writing down your meals and calories and calculating them at the end of the day. You can look at your progress with a quick glance. I especially like the portion selector, 1/2 cup one day 1 cup the next, no recalculating.

title: Useful, but the ads are annoying
body: I like the app and find it easy to track my calories.  However, the ads are constantly popping up and getting in the way. (Thus, the loss of a star). Yes, I realize this is a free app and I don't mind some advertising, but these ads interrupt the use of the app.

title: Track Your Calories
body: Great app for trying to understand your caloric intake.  It's always surprising how much/little a meal provides.  This app has a lot of popular meals preprogrammed making it easy to see how much you are truly taking in.

title: My Plate review
body: This is a user friendly application.  Very straight forward and helpful to giving me insight on my calorie intake and number of calories burned.  Very easy to access and monitor calorie intake.

title: Love it
body: I love this app.  It's so far the best app that I have seen.  I have to watch my carbs and this app tells you how many carbs you have consumed per meal.  Also when I scan item I say 98% of the time they are listed.  Even off brands.  I recommend this app.

title: What went wrong?
body: I too had been loving this app. Then today it seems I've lost all of my tracking from the last couple of months. Everything is way off.

title: MyPlate App
body: I really liked this program until I got an offer for a $1000 gift card.  It looked real but it was a scam after 15 minutes of answering question, I still did not get the card.  I thought the people that designed this app should screen there advertisers better.  I feel really deceived and plan to find another app the does not scam their customers. Just think what do they do with the information we input to this program.

title: Love this app!
body: It's easy to record what I ate, how much water I drank and how I exercised! I like that it's simple and quick to use. The work outs are good too, I enjoy them! I like how it shows me how many calories I burned and what my calorie goal is vs how much I actually ate. Love this app!

title: Great app with some glitches
body: I've really some great strides in losing weight using this app to track my calories. The data base is vast and up until today quick to log entries. All of a sudden whenever I open the app I have to login every time. The committee is a great resource for info

title: Keeping myself healthy
body: This is by far one of the best apps I have tried in keeping track of my health habits. I normally wouldn't rate apps but I felt this one deserved the five stars. I feel as though it's supporting me in being healthier and livening better.

title: Lost 23 lbs!
body: I've been tracking my calories and including my workouts so I get even more calories and I've lost 23 pounds in the past two months. I eat whatever I want and just count calories. This app works.

title: Awesome Easy to Use
body: This has been the most helpful food tracker I have ever used. I love that it is so easy and clear to read calories, carbs, and protein. The only downfall is I am not having much luck finding any of the foods from the restaurants near means it's hard to calculate those calories myself

title: Love this app
body: I really love this app I use it every day. It keeps me honest. I document everything and it is fun to see how it interfaces with my iPhone and I watch on my exercise! Not crazy about the upgrades but I think they are working on them.

title: So far, so good!
body: I have been using this app to track my calories and daily intake for about a week now. It has been very good and has a wide variety of products and brands available to choose from!

title: Beautiful update
body: Moving the macro info and pie chart to the main view was a brilliant move. Thank you thank you. Love this app. I've tried lots and this has the most thorough database of barcodes I can find. And just makes tracking food fun.

title: On track
body: This app is very good. I love how it reminds you to log in you meals for the day. It also allows you to scan your food and all the information about it is displayed. I would definitely recommend it.

title: Excellent !
body: This is actually my first day using it & it looks like it's gonna be a reliable app to help me manage what I eat and how much calories I burn after I eat... Especially after I just found out I have high blood pressure & diabetes üòï .. Very good resource !

title: Best macro tracker out there!!
body: Love this app so much! It has almost every kind of food you can think of in the database, if it's not there it's simple to create your own. I love the pie graph that shows percentages of daily caloric intake so i don't have to do the math conversion myself :) awesome

title: Good app, helps keep me on track
body: I like this app.   It gives a great breakdown as to what you think your eating vs. what your actually eating. It can be a little intimidating entering all the food, but they have a great search feature, & once your basics are in, it gets easy.  I would recommend.

title: Even more than I bargained for
body: There are more features in this app than I initially thought. It's detailed, user-friendly, clean, etc. I recommend it to people starting out with keeping track of what they eat (me).

title: Does not sync
body: "I like the app and it's helped me to lose 25 pounds but what was helpful in that endeavor was the ability to sync across devices. This no longer happens. Very frustrating."

title: Great way to track your data and progress
body: I've used other apps before but this app is very comprehensive even if it isn't the paid version.  The only thing that I would suggest is broadening the exercise options such as including CrossFit exercises.  Besides that 4‚≠êÔ∏è app!

title: Terrific Tracking Tool
body: This tracking app is so easy to use and helpful for managing macro nutrients. The database is fairly extensive with current market foods. The app allows for portion and caloric accountability. I highly recommend to all my clients for motivation and successful results.

title: Been using this app for over three year!
body: Been using this app for over three year and love it! I lost 110 lbs two years ago and this App has helped me keep off the weight by tracking what I eat and how much I exercise.

title: Love this App...so easy!!
body: Love this app...the others I tried you have to manually put in your foods...this one you just type in the food and it brings up a list with a pic and the brand ...makes it so easy to get more accurate counts!!!

title: My favorite app!
body: I love this app. I hope to loose 20 pounds and I have made great progress. This app keeps me accountable and motivated. The rewards are fun to get and the calorie tracker makes this app feel like a game. This has been the only weight loss aide that has really helped!

title: Excellent Weight-Loss Tool
body: A great app-has helped me steadily lose 1-2 lbs a week without starving! Even my husband got on the bandwagon and has already lost 10+ pounds! I especially love that I can set a reminder so I don't forget to track each day.

title: Everything you need.
body: I have always liked to track my diet.  This makes it very easy.  The only thing I would like to see improved is the  size or variety of the food data base.

title: Just three days in
body: I have only been using this app three days, but it really has helped me kick start my diet/exercise plan. I find the calorie counter helpful and the different sections are all laid out very user friendly ! Thank you!

title: Great app but needs more exercise choices
body: This is a very good app for tracking your calorie intake and weight.. This would have been a five star rating. However, I was disappointed in the fact that there were not hardly any exercise choices such as sit-ups, crunches, etc. When livestrong fixes this problem I will rate this a five star app.

title: Great platform...but it crashes
body: This app is great for tracking food and calories but when I tried to create a custom meal to enter as my lunch it froze so I exited the app only to find when I come back that everything I recorded that day was gone. And that was my first day using this app. When I tried to start over and re-record my food, the app crashed again. I won't be using this anymore -.-

title: New version is glitchy
body: The app in its last version was fine. This latest version is like the earlier ones in that I cannot get it to sync automatically with my account that I use on my laptop. Even when I force sync, the app will not connect to my account. If I can't update it in the app, it's not very mobile currently.

title: Keeps getting worse with every update!
body: This app keeps going from bad to worse! Every time you update the app it's worse. It has lost functionality and now it doesn't calculate our calories? Bring that feature back! I don't wanna do the math! Also, it's full of glitches now. Every exercise I enter keeps registering at 0 calories. Disappointed and it's getting worse. I will most likely jump ship to another app if this isn't remedied.

title: HealthKit support makes this app indispensable!
body: I‚Äôve always been impressed with the ease of use of the MyPlate app. With the addition of HealthKit the app becomes much more useful, able to integrate with the Apple Health app and provide data to other apps installed on the system. It‚Äôs GREAT!

title: Great except for one little thing...
body: I would give this 5 stars and buy the app if it had an option to scan barcodes

title: Combat Medic/MMA Heavyweight
body: Great app! Keeps you as accountable as you want to be for what you put in your body. Whether you need to count every carb and drop of water you intake to make your body into a machine of destruction or you just want to control your portions this is the app for you!

title: Live strong calories
body: I really like this app.. Haven't found a food that's now I there, helps me keep track of everything .. Recommend it to anyone that needs to track calories food intake and help you loose weight.

title: So so helpful
body: I really enjoy this app. If you're a visual person like myself the charts and graphs make it a really fun way to lose weight. I also like the water tracker. Reminds me to stay hydrated. It does seem limited as far as exercises you can put in but you can always put them in manually.

title: Fantastic tracker!
body: I use this app every single day. It has the best collection of food information of any app I've tried before. It is a great reminder for my daily water intake and I like being able to look at the weight graph. Great motivator!

title: Pretty Darn Cool!
body: This app is addicting and makes it fun to track your food, exercise and weight.  It makes you more AWARE and personally, being aware helps me to choose better foods and avoid that late night snack...b/c I don't want to see it on my food diary, lol!  If you stay true to yourself, this app really can help...good luck to all!

title: Not bad, could be better
body: Overall it is an easy way to track your food consumption, but not having a QR scanner or any restaurants' nutrition menu makes it hard to track everyday since I don't have time to eat at home. The exercise values don't make sense since time is not a very accurate measure of how hard you worked.

title: I Lost 20lbs in 1month!
body: I love this app! I went from 225lbs to 205lbs in 1month LITERALLY! It's very convenient to count calories and even provides a search bar to locate calories from large variety of foods and resturants.  Helps count water intake and exercise. I went from obese to obsessed! Lol

title: Best thing for tracking your diet
body: It has info of so many different food in the data pool, and you also can be one of them to making the pool bigger. Very convenient and professional.

title: Great App!
body: It's true there is a lot of workouts and foods that aren't here but you can add them one time and reuse them whenever you need. It's a great app to calculate your daily calories and reach your goal. It's not 100% accurate but it pretty close. It's Great!!!

title: Great help
body: I've lost one hundred pounds and did it with the help of this app. Helps tremendously to keep track of my calories each day. I am not a "dieter". I alter my eating habits, quantities and when I want to have a special treat or a special occasion, this helps me adjust for that.

title: Great application works amazing
body: Dr. recommended a 1500 cal diet with a minimum of 80 g of protein per day. This is a great tool for me to keep track of everything. The only thing I would add is a way to listen to your music when you're doing your work out.

title: Dee
body: A great app so far. It helps you to be more aware of what your eating and how much you can eat and burn off. It needs more food selection to choose from. You have to enter each item in separately instead of adding homemade chicken fried rice.

title: Excellent!
body: Easy to use and so many good items are already in database when scanned. I love being able to see my calorie and nutrition count and I've already lost weight in 3 days because of it!!

title: Great App for Tracking calories!
body: This app is so easy, self-explanatory, and has basically every single food you'd want to track. I also love that it saves foods you eat regularly, making them easy to find.

title: Whatnapp
body: Only just started using this but so far it's a great app. Even has 'odd' foods that most apps haven't.

title: Best app iv seen but wish it was more accurate
body: Only thing keeping it away from being a 5 star is that it should have more accurate info and more restaurants info on the app. I should be able to sit down anywhere and log that info into the app with ease. Other than that it helps out a lot

title: Good but...
body: This app is good for tracking my weight, calorie intake, and exercise, but I've noticed a lot of scammy pop-ups that you usually get right before you get a virus... also, recently when I go to the workout page, it force closes every time. Please fix!

title: Amazing App
body: This app is amazing!! I normally don't write reviews but the world needs to know about this app. This app has helped me track what makes me gain weight and I lost 5 pounds in a week! Which is more than I what I thought that I could lose.

title: This app is amazing the free version gives you everything you need I LOVE THIS üíñüíñ
body: I just stared using it today and I've been using multiple apps that I didn't like until I stumbled to this one I logged one meal to actually love this app honestly

title: Amazing
body: Love to us this app and has help me loss weight. You just keep track on what you eat and your amazed of how much calories things have and you make changes and the results are few less pounds a week.

title: Love it
body: It's so great to have an app which makes you accountable for your diet.  1 month in and I've lost 12 pounds of fat, while gaining muscle.  Recommend it to everyone, my friends and wife are now using the app as well!!  Super easy to use, fun as well.

title: Finally!
body: My first few days were an eye opener not just on the food consumed but actually everything actively done in a day!

title: Fantastic App!
body: Great for tracking everything! Food water weight & to be able to scan the label of what you eat and get the info of the package is great! However, you don't always get the correct info and you have to put it in yourself anyway. Otherwise 5‚≠êÔ∏è!üëçüòÄ

title: Love it!
body: I've been looking for a fitness app for months! They're all so hard to use and over complicated. I love this app! It's super easy to use and understand. I recommend this app to anyone looking to track there diet and stay in shape!

title: No idea
body: You have no idea what you are putting in your body till you track it with this app. With an actual display of protein,fat, and carbs you can also track your macros. This is one of the best apps on my phone!

title: Please add fiber!!!!
body: LOVE that this actually adds all the nutrition values up for each meal, even for the foods that I add in manually

title: Perfect for beginners
body: This app is great!  Easy to use. Love the scanner feature and all the portion options.  Exercise can be added they the live strong website. The first workout nearly killed us. But was very doable. Can't wait till tomorrow!

title: Great app.  Have used for years.
body: There are many things I could say about this app but to me the most important is the developer's commitment to improvement. They just keep figuring out ways to make it better.

title: Great app!!
body: I love this app! It's so easy to use but lately it has been deleting my daily iPhone steps randomly throughout the day. It's not a big deal that it does that but if I'm walking a lot I would like to know how many calories I'm actually burning off and not just a fraction of them

title: Amazing app
body: This app is so awesome. I lost 10 pounds in 2 1/2 weeks of using this app. I am able to control my caloric intake and working out allows me to eat more. I will continue to use this app even after I have met my weight loss goal.

title: Pretty good app
body: Not a fan of the latest update but this app is pretty good. The previous version kept track of water consumption a little better than current version. All you had to do was update, now you have to make sure you remember what you currently have logged in and add to it. Over all I am satisfied with this app.

title: My Favorite Tracker
body: Pros: beautiful design, easy to use, breaks down your macros (fat, carbs, protein) and daily/weekly intake into easy to read graphs and charts. Love the app.

title: Use all the time
body: Great app.  Just recently a little ad bar was added to bottom of screen, which is distracting, but I still use daily.  It would be cool to be able to see on a screen how many days/month or week a workout was completed.

title: Calories vs. Exercise
body: I get to track food easily and adding your own food is easy, but there is very limited choices of exercise. Sit ups for example is ONLY sit ups, there's no variation you can put in like oblique crunch, plank, leg lifts none of those are options. Also you can only put in the amount of time you workout, not reps or sets.

title: Great database
body: Makes food and water tracking easy because I can open up the app and record something with a few taps. Huge food database to help me get an idea of what I'm really eating every day. Other good features too.

title: Excellent
body: I use this every single day. Great way to keep track of your eating and workout lifestyle. It includes a lot of foods already out there. The scanning feature works really well. Definitely recommend this app.

title: Love
body: Clean simple design. Easy to use. You can chose to have it send you alerts when it's time to log your calories. Huge food database. Makes calorie counting quick and easy. I prefer over my fitness pal and calorie king.

title: 3 years and counting
body: I've been using this app for so long. I've tried others, not the same. Free of annoying ads. Always upgrading and getting better. Organized, easy to use, overall great app.

title: Most Reliable App
body: This app is very reliable. I have it synced with Health App for iPhone and this automatically calculates my daily steps and exercises into the app. All of the verified calculations are accurate to my knowledge. This is the best calorie counting app I've used- and the best health app in general!

title: So helpful!
body: I've been using this app for almost 2 weeks and it is great! I'm using it to lose a few pounds since exercising alone wasn't quite doing it. I needed to become more aware of how much I was eating and this is a great solution for me.

title: I really like it
body: It allows to search most foods and even  shows the distribution of macronutrients ( proteins, fats & carbs ) which is helpful when trying to aim for a particular ratio I just wish they had a section that added up your total macronutrients for you for example total proteins, fats & carbs

title: I lost 34 lbs w this app
body: Great app. Helped me lose 34 lbs. This app will not go to the gym for you or put the right foods in your system. This app will help you track how many calories you intake but it's up to you to burn those calories and eat right! It's simple as A B C. Always Burn Calories! Good luck!

title: Great help!
body: I realy like how the app is easy to miniver through. But let's you use all the info that you need to enter to track the calories you had. I really recumbent this app to any one who needs to take more control in what they eat.

title: Live strong
body: Really a nice app to help keep myself motivated. Love seeing my progress! No technical issues that I have found. Would be nice if we knew the odds of possibly winning one of the sweepstakes. If it's one in a gazillion I don't want to waste my time with it.
