title: Better than FitnessPal
body: I love this app! Beautiful layout and simple to use. I've used several calorie/weight loss apps and this one takes the cake. I love the water app! I drink so much more water when I have a visual to keep track of my water intake.

title: Great little app
body: Love this app. I have tried others and always come back to this one. Very user friendly. If food isn't in data bank it's very easy to add. Love it. Have loss 20 lbs using this handy little app. Helps you realize just how many extra calories you are eating a day!

title: Great app for keeping track!
body: Really easy to use. The barcode database is not as extensive as other apps I've used in the past but it is so easy to manually enter the data I don't mind. Helps me to stay mindful of the foods I eat and my exercise. And that is the whole point. Recommend!!!

title: Helps you eat better
body: Outstanding. Helps you eat better even if you don't need to lose weight. Has a few minor flaws that don't detract from what it does. Hope they continue to improve without making it complicated. Well done.

title: Should be better
body: Data entry is very easy. However goal setting is not up to speed.  Can't set personal goals for carb/protein/and fat.  That really hurts the usefulness of an otherwise excellent app.  Also would be nice to be able to set a weight goal of an amount and a date, and then track if on goal or behind goal.

title: Review
body: Good program but could be made easier to work with. Such as having the apps we choose to use in conjunction with the parent app fill in automatically when the like info is added to the p/a. Why is it necessary to log exercise into 2 separate places?

title: Gives motivation
body: The best thing about this app is that it gives you points towards gift cards for tracking calories. It's extra motivation to keep track of your food intake and weight.

title: Love this app
body: Absolutely love this app.  The goals are very realistic compare to other apps that I've used before.  I'm able to watch what I eat and see the effects.  I love that it breaks down what I've eaten for the day, so I know what to eat and avoid next time.

title: Very nice app
body: Just started using this app to track my calorie intake. I like it very much. It has access to a large database of food items with calorie counts at your fingertips. A real timesaver, easy to use, will elp me stay on track with my weight loss.

title: Rate this app
body: I really appreciate this app. I had created a tracking doc in Excel . It was working for me. I had to look up foods i eat on the internet to get values so i can track them. This Aap is so convenient. I do better at tracking consistently because the information needed is at my finger tips.

title: Love it
body: Super easy to use and it's very cool the way that they track everything...great because I use a combination of apps to track my food and excercise and this adds another dimension with neat information about my health that I wasn't aware of.

title: Eater of food
body: Easy to use with not a lot of clutter or information you don't need. Also, I have been able to locate all my food choices on the calorie search, which is great since I eat a variety of ethnic food.

title: Livestrong calorie counter
body: All I set out for was a calorie counter, but upon finding and downloading this app, I have received much more than a calorie count. It counts fats and carbs too. It also takes into account exercise. Overall a great little app.

title: Great App
body: I've only been using it for 2 weeks and I see the difference already...there's something about seeing how many calories you're taking in that makes you want to eat right.

title: It works!
body: I highly recommend this app...it works flawlessly and is easy to use. Also; it keeps you thinking about what you eat and what you will have to add later to the tracker (accountability in a way).

title: Love it
body: Started using this two weeks ago...really great idea to track what you eating. Thru keeping my cals under recommended levels and exercising I've dropped 9 pounds already. Very easy to use and most things u eat are already Loaded.

title: My LIVESTRONG
body: Great App. It work well to track your daily intake of the meals you ate. And it track the amount of water you drank. The only down fall to it is that it doesn't allow you to go back to the previous day to record your intake for that day .just in case you were to busy that day to do so

title: Love it!
body: To be completely honest, I was a little skeptical to purchase the app. I didn't know if it would actually work, but once I started tracking, a whole world of possibilities opened up! This app DOES work, I've lost about 3 pounds in 3 weeks! Amazing!

title: Helpful App
body: I've been using this app for about a month now, and have lost 8 pounds. I find tracking food and exercise helpful in keeping me on track, and this is really user-friendly. No problems so far.

title: Barcode Scanner
body: Love this App. I feel good knowing everything is accurate.  But please add a Barcode Scanner, it would be much easier and quicker if I could just bleep and scan my product instead if searching for it.

title: Work at UPS
body: Love the app so far. The only thing I don't like is that I can't sign into my actual account with the lite version.  I also had to go to another app to track

title: Pretty good
body: It's very easy to use and convenient. The only downside is that you can't link it to the website. I have an account and love to be able to sync them but you can't (that I know of). It seems like it would be very simple for them to do this. Otherwise I like it.

title: Great app..just don't know how to log out
body: I like this app. I've used livestrong in the past and lost weight. Looking forward to using this app everyday. Would like to log out but app says will delete local data and reset application settings to default settings.
response: Hi! Before logging out, just make sure to perform a Force Sync with our servers. That will save your data and prevent it from being lost when you log out! To Force Sync, go to Account > Edit Profile > scroll down to the bottom of the page and click the Force Sync button.

title: Why is 'joining' required?
body: Deleted right after install and first attempt at using it. I just want to count calories, not become a 'member' of yet another group. I'd probably pay a few bucks to use without registering or signing in. I have been told by the developer that registering is so I 'can accurately track and save [my] progress!' to which I call BS; plenty of apps store data locally without my registering. Registering is so THEY can track ME!
response: Hello! We require you to register so that you can accurately track and save your progress!

title: Best I've tried
body: Better than Argus, better than My Fitness Pal, better than Fatsecret.  Great interface.  Useful information and charts.  I haven't run into a good or an exercise the app fidnt know about.  Also love that it tracks my steps too!

title: Great app
body: Love how they already basically have all the foods programmed and how I can see my progress in calories weekly/monthly/3months. Wish there were a little more options for people trying to gain. But overall a great app

title: My Plate - Knowledge is power
body: Knowledge is power and this app gives all that knowledge you need. Losing weight is all about being honest with yourself about how much you eat and how much you burn and this allows you to track that information so you can be  just that.

title: Very Good
body: The app is easy to work and can be very helpful. However I wish it could connect with my workout tracker because I do not always have my phone on me when working out. This is only a matter of getting more accurate results.

title: Awesome app
body: The reason I think this app is so great is the fact that it has workouts for you that shows how many calories you burned. Its an easy way to know where you are sitting in terms of calories for the day.

title: This is wonderful!
body: I have never been more aware with what I'm putting in my mouth! I weight lift, and getting enough protein is a little hard for me if I want to gain muscle, (I'm a vegetarian) but this app really helps me pay attention to protein especially!

title: Love this app
body: Cannot say much more. I like how it is integrated with Apple health. Keeps track of all my steps and cross integrates with other health apps as well. The food tracker works really well. I have the upgraded version and am really happy with it.

title: This latest update is AWFUL
body: It is ugly but more important it makes it very hard to see or edit what you have eaten - or plan to eat. I generally enter all my daily planned foods in the morning but sometimes plans change - this makes it impossible. Please bring back the interface that you actually show on the app webpage. The new one is ugly and not user friendly at all!

title: I liked the last version better
body: Having a hard time getting used to new graphics and organization, but like the app a lot. Helps give perspective and true nutritional amounts. In the medical Community people use it for weight gain and maintenance too. Super easy to use

title: Not good for meals made from scratch
body: I like how this app tracks your fats, proteins, and carbs along with calories. However I made spaghetti from scratch and tried to enter into the app. To enter it you need to know the calories, protein, sugar, fats, carbs... Most of that I don't know. So I searched for what others have used for spaghetti and there was a hundred different options. Where I cook most meals from scratch this app doesn't work for me.

title: Easy to use!
body: Very natural usage, excellent to track calories and quick to use. Had some trouble at first  with iPhone and Apple Watch both recording the same exercises, but disconnected watch and all good.

title: Best Calorie App
body: I used this app awhile back and it was instrumental in me losing over 20lbs. After a year I came back to it and it's even better! I love how now it gives you daily goals and tracking of protein, sugar, fat,cholesterol, and carbs!! I love it even more!!!

title: Perfect!
body: It has everything you need to help you complete your goals, I've lost 16 pounds in just a few months & I'm continuing to lose more!

title: Great app!
body: Super interface, easy to use, complete. Because it is so good I look forward to using it throughout the day. I've used and paid for others, but this app outshines anything I have tried to date.

title: The best app for tracking health
body: The only health tracking app I rely on. The calorie tracker is the best I've found, with many more entry options for specific food and beverage items than any other that I've tried.

title: Best calorie app in the store
body: I have used many calorie apps over the years and this is by far the best one out there. The layout is clean and the info you want is not hidden among loads of garbage. The barcode scan is a neat feature.

title: Great, but two major flaws
body: I've lost 4 pounds in the last week and I do believe it is partially thanks to this app. It's a great app. It works.

title: Love it
body: This app has been a huge help in restructuring my lifestyle so I can feel healthier.  I have lost 25 pounds just through being more aware of what I am eating. This app and its gentle reminders have helped me form better habits for me and my family.

title: Just OK
body: Just started using the app but right away the barcode scanner feature is terrible. It takes 5 minutes of holding the phone over a barcode before it is recognized and a search begins. When it finally searches half the time I'm told it's not in the database. I have other scanner apps that work instantly so something is wrong with the programming of this app.

title: Good app, could be better
body: It's not a bad app.  Where it is weak is in the nutrition breakdown of foods.  So if you are trying to carefully track you macro diet be prepared that not all foods have all the information.  Same issue when you create a food or meal, can't add all of the macro detail of nutrition information.

title: Wonderful
body: This is by far the best calorie tracker out there for me. It is so insanely easy to use. I've used it Since April 2016 and have actually lost 70 pounds! I'm really thankful that this app has helped me keep track of my stuff and help me keep on top of my health :).

title: App really works
body: I started using this app 6 months ago and have lost 35.5 pounds.  It is really easy to use. My biggest complaint is every time my phone upgrades or livestrong upgrades I lose all my mpoints.  I have contacted livestrong and mpoints, but both companies pretty much just say "oh well" and they won't correct the problem

title: Has worked really well for me!!
body: I love this app!  It has worked really well for me and I really don't have any complaints.  I've only had for 2 weeks, but it has really helped me to track my intake.  I've lost 4lbs so far and hoping I can continue that until I hit that plateau.

title: More than what I expected!
body: I eat a lot of specialty foods and this app actually has some on the search tab, was totally blown away! Love the setup for this app, I don't even need to think much to put in my calories for the meal. Keep it up guys!

title: Weight on home screen
body: Not a fan of the weight on the home screen. I'm not likely to show anyone my app, while my weight is splashed all over the front page!

title: Love this but it's missing one thing...
body: I love this app A LOT! But I wish there was someway you could sync it with Nike Fuel band! I wear my fuel band to keep up with calories burned and I wish I could sync those calories with the app. Other than that it is awesome and so easy to use!!

title: Good but not user friendly
body: Needs better editing features. I like scanning foods for my meals but I can't delete anything which is quite frustrating. The text entering is also a little bit odd, and you can't include decimals when entering macro values. Unfortunately these things all make the app somewhat unusable for myself.

title: Easy to use
body: This app makes tracking your meals easy. It has reminders that you can set throughout the day to remind you to track. It also tracks exercise and weight.

title: PERFECT APP TO HELP STAY ON TRACK
body: In the past, I've used this app to lose 70+ lbs. Started using again when I was diagnosed with pre-diabetes. Sooooo helpful in keeping you in the know, not only your caloric and fat intake, but also your carbs, sodium, water intake, exercise...... Everything!!!

title: Love this app but
body: It lost all of my data for the past few days?? Not sure what happened to it! Went to my trainer this week to see where I was and it was all gone! And I can't remember what I ate every day! Such a bummer because I expected it to all be there! Super disappointed!

title: Buggy after latest update
body: Noticed that calories burned is not calculating correctly lately. Burned 275 on a brisk jog then went for a walk later and calories burned show 178. How can that be? Other than that this is a great app and have been using it for the last 3 years.

title: Good so far
body: I ahead the views about crashing, but haven't experienced it yet. I've only had it a day, so maybe that will change

title: Nice Watchdog!!
body: Great tool to keep you aware of your consumption.  Currently I only track calories, but will start tracking fat as well in the coming weeks!  Really happy with this free app.  Only wish it had a better list of food to pick from vs having to manually input most foods.

title: Helping loose weight
body: This is a great app, helps me to track my calorie intake in a fun way, m points are a great form of reward! Makes me w ant to check the up often and thus keep s me reminded of tracking my calories... Just my 5th day and loss 2lbs already :)

title: Great App!
body: This app encourages me to track my calories with daily reminders. It shows me how much I'm really putting into my body. The mPoints are also a great motivation when it comes to getting more points if I work out. Overall great app!

title: Simplicity is the key!
body: This MyPlate app is so easy to use that I actually use it! That's what makes it so valuable. I didn't find a place that tells me what the daily % goals are for the carb/fat/protein pie chart or for water consumption. Overall, a life-saving tool for me.

title: Love it
body: Great way to track weight, calorie consumption and see car/protein/fat breakdown.  Helps to stay motivated.  Would love to be able to turn off exercise reduction of calories or have it track separate, but not a big deal.  Also needs a sleep tracker since sleep greatly impacts health.

title: Fantastic tool!!!
body: I would highly recommend this app for those looking to lose weight. Whether you only need to lose a few pounds or a hundred or more, this app will help keep you on track!

title: Great
body: This app has really helped me be more conscientious about what I eat and I am less likely to over eat, so far I've lost 10 pounds with better nutrition and portion control, and sometimes indulging but in healthy quantities that allows you to enjoy what you are eating but not creating bad habits

title: Critically hampered
body: The latest update puts a banner ad directly over the "Track weight" button, completely preventing you from tracking your weight. That's kind of important for the daily calorie budgeting feature. The settings menu doesn't have a "report bug" option to tell them about it either.

title: Great app
body: I just started using it. So far, so good. Interface is intuitive and pretty. And I like the fact that you can choose either gain or lose weight (different from the other app I tried). Now it only depends on me.

title: Measurements
body: This is a great tool and is working well for me!  The only thing I would find helpful is to also be able to record measurements in my profile...  I think it is common for people to track this in addition to, or instead of, weight.  Thanks!

title: This app is great
body: I have never found an app as intuitive or as easy to count calories as this one.  Some of the other nutritional information is not correct (100 calorie light yogurt does not have 30 grams of fat!), which is why I dropped this to 4 stars.  As a calorie and exercise tracker, this is great.

title: Live strong my plate free
body: Easy to use and the search finds almost everything I enter and calculates the calories in or out/food or exercise. I have iPhone 4s. Really helps me to see what I'm eating and keeps me responsible to my training. A must have.

title: So far so good
body: Live this app! A few negatives - can't scan food labels to enter nutrition info., and there is no way (that I know of) to have a private friends list for messages (only read stuff by people I do not know). Other than those minor flaws I think it is user friendly!

title: Pretty good!
body: This app is pretty good, I mostly like how it's set up. I wish that I could scroll through a list of exercises, though. It has also crashed multiple times since the IOS update, but hasn't at all when using it since the new update for the app!!

title: Better than the rest
body: I've tried a few calorie/exercise trackers and this one is the easiest, and funniest to use. Every food I've tried to enter is in the system...no making up for missing details. Awesome!

title: Amazing üî•
body: Really simple clean and easy tracking my calories was all i wanted in this app but it offered even more. I meet my goals using this app and highly recommend it to anyone that is interested

title: Awesome!!
body: Great tool. However it should Better take into weight goal and weekly target. If I reach my goal and still select weekly target to loose pounds previously, it should address the calories to maintain not lose.

title: Great with Apple Watch
body: I love this app it's great. I have an Apple Watch and the calories and activity I do sync with it. If you don't have an Apple Watch it can be tricky logging activity but it's still a great way to see what you eat and it's easy to use

title: Okay
body: It's okay I can track food and weight but I only use the free version it needs improvements if you ask me like a better way to track activities steps tracker would be nice

title: Amazing
body: This app is very good if you have health class like I do and your assignment is to track how much calories and exercise and the amounts and quantities of the foods and fats thing like that! But I prefer you to use this app it's amazing and the best I have ever saw in my life!

title: Not syncing between any device...???
body: I wish this app to be syncing with iCloud between iPhone and iPad.  It's very inconvenient for me...

title: One Month Challenage
body: My wife and I use the app for the past month, and we both lost our goal weight each week. It's an easy app, with many

title: Great.. But watch closely
body: Great app, but be aware of the scan feature. The data in the system sometimes doesn't match the label of the product scanned. It's not often, but it makes me read each label to compare after each scan.

title: iPhone health keeps crashing
body: I like the app but my daily steps using iPhone health will zero out all the time. Then I am forced to re start the app and sometimes it comes back. Adding a recipe failed every time I tried it. For basics it's ok but needs some work to be functional as a standalone that doesn't require standard web entries.

title: Works, but ads still pop up after paying.
body: The app itself is fantastic overall and worth using. Just beware if you pay to remove ads you will still get popups plugging their Gold subscription service. Would be four stars if not for that. It does affect the experience for me.

title: Good so far!
body: My husband has used this for months and really enjoys it, so I decided to give it a try. So far it's been great! It's super easy to track everything I eat/drink and so far all of the things I've eaten have been scannable. Pretty cool!

title: Easy to use
body: This app is so easy to use. It has all the major brand foods already in it and it's very simple to add your own custom foods as needed. Perhaps the best review is that I have use this to independently lose 50 pounds. Go me and thanks to myplate.

title: New version slightly better
body: I love that they now allow my account to be linked to my apple health app. I wish apple would allow the recoded activity to transfer in and not just out.

title: Great with some drawbacks
body: Love it. The app accounts for the steps I take and helps suggest a work out routine
response: Hi, thank you for your review and feedback! Our team is aware of this and is working to resolve.

title: Sugar and salt calculations are way incorrect !
body: This app is great for tracking calories, but the nutrition calculations are suspect.  I eat an oatmeal breakfast with no sodium but end up with 65% of my sodium allotment used up.  I checked each item I ate and there is no sodium in anything I entered.  So, where does all that sodium come from?  The program also adds sugar when there isn't any.

title: Awesome app. I wish...
body: This app is great! I use it to track my meals, fats/protein/carbs, Kcals consumed & burnt. I just wish it would also include vitamins and minerals. I'm low on Iron and Calcium. I wish this app would tell me how many of these vital nutrients I consume in my food!! Then this app would be  everything I need to keep track of my health.

title: Fantastic!!!
body: I'm being held accountable for what I eat. I didn't realize how many calories certain things had. To see it all right before my eyes and able to make the right decisions on what to eat is very helpful.

title: Great App for food!!
body: You can look up calories for almost any food or scan the barcode! Unfortunately you have to know how many calories you burned for the exercise things. Overall great app

title: Great tracking and reminders
body: Only been using the app for a few days, but it is the easiest app I have ever used to track what you are eating.

title: Best app yet for tracking calories and activity!
body: This app seems to have the largest database for scanning in food items - in most apps most food has to be out in. I like the way it picks up activity from my UP band too.

title: Great app... Keeps me on track for my health and diet goals;daily
body: Great app... Keeps me on track for my health and diet goals;daily. The free version is excellent and runs well. No errors experienced.  The paid version is neat and offers some cool features. Recommended.

title: Keeps you accountable
body: But only if you use it. Easy to use. Problem is it is easy to ignore but that is not the app's fault!!!

title: Very easy
body: The app is extremely easy to use. It remembers foods you eat often, making tracking much easier. I have yet to find a food that is not in the library. Thanks livestrong

title: Great!
body: The BEST way I've successfully lost weight is by calorie counting and exercise combined. This app really helps me a lot. But you HAVE to keep on it daily for it to bedroom useful. And don't cheat (too much) and estimate up not down. You'll thank yourself for it :)

title: Trying to watch myself
body: Love this app for calorie tracking. I can keep up quickly and know where I stand. I'm able to plan my meals for the day better and it keeps me motivated. I love that water intake and exercise are included. Awesome!

title: Works great!
body: Very useful.  I find lots of foods (many organic) through the barcode scan or search feature.  Great to track daily calories plus exercise and see your daily history.

title: Solid
body: Easy to use.  Keeps me accountable and I'm losing weight so it's great. I wish there were descriptions for the foods because I don't know which option for say a chop salad best fits what I'm eating and end up doing each item individually which is a bit of a pain. I'd recommend it to friends.

title: Great app!
body: This app is so easy to use, however, the calories it told me I need to eat everyday to lose 1.5lbs per week was incorrect. It was too high. So if you are using this app just double check the calculations and adjust the calorie tracker manually. Besides this minor issue I live this app!

title: Very useful
body: I wanted a way to track my calories. This gave me that, gave me a goal for number of calories per day and takes account of my current weight and how much exercise I did. I find it very useful.

title: Love This App!
body: I started using this app about two weeks ago and I love it. I previously used Weight Watchers but I prefer counting my calories. It shows my progress and most of all I have a community if supporters cheering me on and when I need some encouragement they are also there for support.

title: My favorite calorie tracker.
body: I've used a lot of calorie trackers. This one has been the easiest and most simple one to use. It makes being healthy easy. A must have for someone tracking nutrition and/or calories.

title: Exercise issues can't edit
body: The counting of nutrition is great and is helping me lose weight.  I'm frustrated with the exercise portion- it synced with health (iphone) and counted exercise from health, thus adding much more than I did. (Health app is not good at this at all).  One can not edit exercise not see what exercise they did.

title: Great App!
body: This app is awesome! Very helpful, accurate and easy to use! I've dropped 20lbs in three months just by watching my calories. You never realize how much you eat until it's in front of you in black and white.

title: Great Tracker
body: Being a newly vegan, it's important for me to make sure I'm getting enough calories with my active lifestyle. This apps helps me stay on track. It also confirmed for me that you can get your daily recommended amount of protein on a vegan diet.

title: Older female
body: This app is easy to use and it helped me see the real value of food I was eating and decide whether to switch to something else or do more exercise to stay within my calorie limit. I've list about 8 pounds in 6 months which is a good pace for me because I cheat a lot.

title: Great App
body: I can't believe this is a "Lite" version. Shows my calories, gives me points for logging my info. AND despite what another person said, it DOES tell you % breakup of fat, protein and carbs. I have a feeling in gonna lose some weight!

title: Good app to have!
body: No complaints I would definitely get this if you're looking for a calorie tracker/food log app. Easy to use and has good little additions to keep you motivated and wanting to continue tracking :)

title: Great but missing one thing
body: This is a great app, has almost everything but it should have a scanner for easier tracking of products we use instead of just trying to go through a huge list of products.

title: Fixing and suggestion
body: It's a great app but when I search for Naples it returns automatically to the home screen. Please fix!

title: Easy
body: This app is great and so user friendly...  Haven't had any issues finding my foods and keeping track of my calories.  It really is amazing how many calories you can consume if not paying attention.

title: Worth downloading
body: Does a good job keeping track of your calories and helps you watch out whether you had to many or not. Keeps a record of your gain or loss of weight which is a plus. Great app!!!

title: Great app
body: Me and my family has been trying to eat healthy and exercise! This has been a great app to track my calories, food intake. It's been 3 days and with all the veggies I have incorporate into my daily diet, I feel so much better. Great app!

title: Awesome!!
body: Only been using it for 2 weeks and I'm already down 3 pounds. This app is super helpful to help you control how much you eat. Tons of food in the database and also very easy to add your own custom food. Definitely use this app!

title: 800 calories?.
body: I entered all of my information and this app suggested that I eat 800 calories a day??  That is a ridiculously low amount especially if I am exercising as well.  I want to lose weight but I want to be healthy as well and that is no way to do it.  I uninstalled it.  Even though I know that I can change that number, I found the thought that it recommended it to be a big turnoff.

title: Soon helpful, like a coach!
body: I use it daily to track calories, nutrients (I track carb, fat and protein percentages) and weight. Really keeps you focused! So easy and fun to use! Showed me where I was going wrong in weight loss goals! Now I am right on track and looking great!

title: Really helps!
body: This was the nudge I needed to drop the extra pounds I've been carrying for too long. I've lost three pounds in the first eight days I've been using it without any real effort. It's amazing what a difference just knowing how many calories you're consuming makes in your eating habits.

title: Huge Help
body: Sometimes we think we are eating less than we really are.   This helps you to see the calories more clearly.  It helps you make smarter food choices. Like deciding between a three hundred calorie cookie or a ninety calorie apple.   Also, I like the reminder if you haven't tracked.

title: Great app
body: This app is wonderful! It I very easy and quick to input my food and exercise I also love that there are SO many food options, brands, etc. It's been a great tool to help me see how I'm doing and keep me accountable. I highly recommend it!!!

title: Great App design!
body: The design and layout of this app make it incredibly easy for me to track my calorie information.  Rewards built in for making yourself a healthier person.  I use this app every day and couldn't be happier :-)

title: Update ruined my favorite food tracking app
body: I thought I had finally found the perfect food tracker...that is until it was updated. Please bring back the old version or at least give us an option to use it. Loved the app before the update because It was functional and intuitive. This update is absolutely awful and clunky. Now I'm on the hunt yet again for the perfect food tracking app.

title: Great tracker for healthy eating!
body: I love this tracker. It's made it really easy to keep track of calories and macronutrients daily. I've used it for different goals - losing weight, maintaining, gaining safely (during pregnancy) and it's been a great tool in every case.

title: So far so good
body: Well, I've been meaning to get in shape recently and this app just might make it easier to do so. So far I've had a easy enough time using the app and it's main page and not much else. But, what I have used has been great. I would recommend this app to people who want to watch what they eat and slim down.

title: Was good until update.
body: New update: 5/3/17

title: Does everything I need
body: Great app - easy to use, keeps track of my most frequent meals, weight, workouts in a format that takes just seconds to use every meal.  Love it and use it every single day!

title: Nice watch app when it works
body: It's definitely the best calorie track that supports the watch, but there is a lot of times where the search or adding items just don't work. Hope they can fix that in an update soon.

title: Is it heaven?
body: This app is freakin awesome the refreshing is fast each and everything is organized in a different/awesome way .i think the company or person or whatever made deserves a million dollars I am getting fitüíìüíìüíì

title: Very good to me
body: I have been able to loose 5 lbs. counting calories, activity and carbs.  I'm amazed of how little is one serving and how fast calories pile. I love the step tracking & activity tracker.  Without this app. I'd still be wondering, why I can't loose weight?

title: Used app for 9 months
body: I absolutely love this app. It has a big variety of foods stored. I can put my own recipes nutrition facts in. I log everything I eat from healthy to unhealthy foods. I've lost 50 lbs so far and this app has kept me accountable.

title: Great!
body: Love this app. I've been using it to meet calorie goals for 4-5 months and it's been a great help

title: Loving it.
body: Just started to use this app and find it so useful on my weight loss journey!!! A must if you are stocked on a weight and can't find the reason, you'll find your answer here, not enough protein or too much carbs, etc. LOVE IT!!!

title: This will change your life!
body: If you are losing weight, trying to gain weight from weight lifting, or an athlete...this app is amazing! It gives you everything you would want to track what you eat. I love it!

title: Love it!
body: I literally could not be any happier with this app.  Easy to use, tons of functionality (even without gold but I upgraded anyway).  If you're looking for a food/exercise journal - look no further.  This is it!

title: Glad I found this!
body: This is a really great app and I'm glad I found it. I've been using it for a little over a month and I have lost 10lbs!! I'm excited to see how far I can keep going down on the scale. This app helps me make better choices about what I decide to eat.

title: Great !
body: Love this app! Easy to use and can be very custom. Holds you accountable with notifications at breakfast lunch and dinner. Great variety of food selections and you can scan the barcode on your snack or parts of your meal to track them. Defiantly recommend.

title: I'm loving it!!!
body: This app is so wonderful. I must attribute part of my 25lb weight lost success to being able to track what I eat and know how many calories are available at any given time.  Thank you LIVESTRONG! My plate is lighter because of you.

title: Love this!
body: I use this everyday to track my meals & snacks on the go!  Not to mention my water intake to make sure I stay completely hydrated. I've been keeping a food journal for 6 years. It helps me to make healthier choices on the road. Love it! Xoxo, Carrie

title: Perfect!
body: This is exactly what I was looking for in a food journal. It does all of the tracking for food, water and exercise. You can set reminders to keep up with it, and the community support is great! I highly recommend!!!

title: Perfection!!
body: It's what I needed. I love the fact that it has so many of my foods in the library and makes it easier for me to monitor my intake on a daily basis . I particularly like the daily breakdown into carbs, protein etc.......  Thanks big time to whoever created this app.... I love it :)

title: Great App
body: I really like this app, and I love that I can track my water intake as well as what I eat. The only change I would recommend is that when you post a question on the community board, that you would recieve an alert when somebody posts a reply to it.

title: Helps with accountability!
body: This a new app for me as I start becoming more responsible about what I eat and how active I am. It's easy to use and I'm finding it very helpful in motivating me. Still learning how to use to the fullest advantage. But so far it's been great!

title: Great app for eating better
body: I recommend this app to anyone who is struggling with weight loss or anyone who wants to gain weight. It's a great tool to keep you on track and it helps you stray away from over eating and eating the wrong things.

title: Awesome!
body: This app is awesome!! Very user friendly! The food database is big, and you can scan anything with a barcode! The push notifications help remind me to track my breakfast, lunch, and dinner! Would definitely recommend!

title: Great tool for tracking
body: Great tool for tracking and for motivation to exercise and eat well. Syncs online, iPad and iPhone easily. The scan on iPhone is convenient. The database has just about everything I eat

title: It works for me
body: I wanted to track how much food I eat in a day to figure out why I am not losing any weight but too lazy to count calories. This app does it all for me. I am making better choices in what I eat and drink. I am loving this app.

title: Love it!
body: Love it! Easy to use. Many food items makes it easy to add to what I ate. I was surprised to find not so typical ethnic food items like the ones I prepare at home. This is the App everyone should get if they are serious about healthy life style.

title: Wonderful!!!
body: I used to keep a written food journal and I would go crazy trying to figure out  how many calories I've consumed. This app makes my life easier. Not only am I keeping to my calorie goal, but I've gained back waisted time!

title: Awesome
body: Let's me keep track of my daily intake of food n also helps me earn points for rewards. Only downfall is that it doesn't have a scanner for food labels which would make it easier to track food intake

title: Great motivator!
body: I wanted to get back in shape and actually start watching what I ate. My husband told me about this app so I downloaded it right away. I LOVE it!! It motivates me to work out and watch what I eat. The calorie goal may not what I want it to be, but it gets me to where I need to be!

title: Needs ability to edit...
body: I just started using this app. Searching through the list of available foods is nice, but if you do not click the correct item there isn't an option for deleting. This means that my calorie count now is inaccurate. The whole point of entering in my food and calories is to keep track of what I'm eating as accurately as possible.

title: Great app.  Could do more
body: This is a great app with a great data base of food.  I wish it also provided fiber and sodium content in foods and permitted the user to specify when a new day begins, rather than at midnight. When I eat after midnight, the food is included in the next days food rather than the day I'm eating it.

title: Useful!
body: My goal is to loose a pound a week and my first week I lost just that! It's exciting to log, not only to find the nutritional information, but water intake and exercises as well! I log every time I consume something or work out! Great App!

title: Could be an amazing app
body: Loved loved loved this app, until one of the most recent updates where a lot of the time it won't let you view your achievements! This is insanely obnoxious! The whole reason this app keeps me on track is because of the incentives I get from using it and now I can hardly access them! Low rating for now, but use to be a 5 star in my book!

title: Frustrated
body: 1... Hard to get calorie count - I have to go into another diet app site to obtain and it is not always there either so now I will have to purchase a calorie counter book... We shouldn't have to guess !!!

title: Music During Workout
body: Hi so far this app is pretty good I was just wondering if you can listen to music with Apple Music during workouts. Whenever I start to work on my music stops, is there a way to fix this?

title: Awesome
body: This app is great! So much better and way more fun than writing in a journal! It has all the calorie counting done for you, mostly. And it's just a lot more fun to do! It makes watching what you eat and what to not eat easier!  I love it!

title: Awesome app,  could be better
body: I love this app. It's design is minimalist and easy to use, but the catalogue of foods to choose from is pretty lacking. Some large chains aren't represented like Chik-fil-a and when you do a search it's pretty cluttered with user submissions rather than verified calorie counts. Same with exercise.

title: Love this app!
body: Great user interface, easy to use, and nice aesthetics. I've tried many others, including paid apps, and couldn't find the right fit until this one. I use it all the time!

title: Breastfeeding
body: I wish this took into account breastfeeding. I exclusively breastfeed and burn loads of calories, but I'm constantly hungry and need to eat the "right" foods to keep up my supply. It would be nice if this app could take that into account when helping me define my nutrition and weight loss goals.

title: Great simple calorie counter
body: Love this app. It's very easy to use with the nutritional information of a huge number of foods preprogrammed.

title: Like the previous version better
body: I liked the previous version better. It showed total allowed calories at the top. Now it doesn't. Also- they spelled exercise wrong on the "track" feature. Only one "c" folks. I know everyone is human but I would think spell check would be a priority.

title: Love!
body: I've been using the app since New Years and it's been fabulous to help keep me on track. I would recommend this to anyone wanting to track calories and weight.

title: Awesome App
body: I downloaded this app with plans of trying to pay attention to what I was eating/putting in my body. It has been such an eye opener! It's so easy to use and it's great that it links with calories burned using my running and yoga apps!!! Love love love.

title: Quick and easy
body: Easy tracking of food, water, and exercise. I like the feature that gives you the option to add your own entries.

title: Daily steps being weird
body: The daily steps is adding more calories burned than the actual burned amount. I had to turn off the tracking. But other than that, it's my favorite app! Hope it gets fixed
response: Hi Haley, we're so sorry! Our team is aware of this issue and is working on a fix. Thank you for your patience!

title: Can't Live Without
body: Are you kidding me?!? If you are serious about DIET and exercise a MUST! I've lost 28 lbs in 4 months and track my diet EVERY MEAL! I'm crossfitting 5 times a week and diet is essential! Don't get on a diet plan, but diet is just what we eat! Couldn't do it without this APP!!!!!

title: Incredibly functional
body: I can't speak to how well the other trackers compare because I've never had to use any other tracker!

title: Good one
body: This is fairly close to myfitnesspal, which is an app I really enjoy. I like how they are similar but different at the same time. I do wish that there was a way to track and automatically add my calories burned though. That would be a great feature to add!

title: Fantastic!
body: I give this app so much credit for my weight loss. I recommend it every time someone says they want to lose weight. Thanks for all the effort that went into this app to make it so helpful!

title: My Plate App 5 Stars
body: I've tried others and found that this app is the best and most helpful. It is an excellent tool for tracking good nutrition, weight loss, weight management, and healthy living. I couldn't get along without it.

title: Great App
body: I was recently diagnosed with type-ll diabetes and put on a very strict diet.  The app is very helpful in finding the right foods to put on my plate.  I've already lost 13-pounds in a little over two weeks with exercise and eating right! Love the app!!!!!!!

title: Easy to use, very helpful!
body: I've been using this app to track what I eat, including how much sugar I eat each day. It's eye-opening to see what's in the food I eat. I've definitely made changes to my diet, thanks to this app.

title: The best got even better!
body: Ive been using this app for a while now. I love all of the variables it allows you to track. I love the goal setting and meal building features. The food database is the most extensive one I've seen. Bravo!

title: I'm in love!
body: I love this app:)! It helps keep me on track and accountable with the choices I make. Only complaint is that it doesn't allow me to input my daily calorie intake that I choose if it's lower than their suggested amount.

title: I use it everyday.
body: Best way to track calories. I rely on this app everyday to keep my cal intake under control. If you can't find the food you just ate, you can scan the barcode and add it into the database. 2 thumbs up üëçüëç

title: Great app that gets better with each update
body: This is easy to use and not too time consuming.  Ability to search/scan a barcode is a great feature.

title: Awesome app
body: Def a great app I track your eating habits and count calories, def recom this app, it has allot of foods and even if you go out to eat at a rest. They have specific meals on the menu that have all the nutrition information already...thumbs up!

title: Fantastic!!
body: This is a very easy to use app that has a lot of flexibility. It truly helps guide you on the track you want to go. I recommend this app to anyone who has weight goals both for loosing or gaining weight

title: What I'm hoping for
body: The only thing I'm looking for in this app is losing weight I hate my body and I want a healthier lifestyle so for now this is a 5 star, but if I don't get results I'm looking for before bikini season then I will give you low ratings.

title: Good app overall
body: I've had a good experience using this app to track my food intake. As others have said, the database for foods could definitely use some cleaning up to get rid of the incorrect or poorly made entries. But overall easy to use and helpful.

title: Used to love. Crash issues!
body: I've been using this app for almost 2 months and have lost 19 lbs. tonight it started delay opening then crashing. None of the buttons actually work and all I see is today's screen and no data plugged in! Afraid it erased my last 2 months of data! Not happy right now!

title: Easiest to use
body: Great app you pick calories and enter it in

title: Customizable calorie goals
body: Great app, but would be ideal if you could allow the user to manually enter a lower calorie goal than 1,200 per day. Previous versions of this app allowed the user to do so. I've been using this app for several years now because I've found it to be the best one in the App Store to monitor daily food and exercise tracking. Could we see an update in the near future to allow this again? Thanks!

title: Easy to use
body: Just started using this app and am finding it very easy to use. The way it is laid out makes it very easy to move between days, meals and other information.

title: Great app!
body: This app has such a large variety of food and exercise to track (unlike some other apps I've tried). It even tracks your progress over time as long as you continue to use the app. It's really easy to use and I absolutely love it.

title: Easy to Use
body: I generally find apps like this tedious and difficult   But this app is extremely user friendly and intuitive.  I like that it breaks down nutrients consumed and gives me information I can use.

title: Love It!
body: I've had this app for a day now and it works much better than other calorie counting apps that I used before. It's very easy to navigate through and it seems to be accurate. Over all great app!

title: Love this program!
body: This program helps me keep on track with my weight loss. When you can see where you stand during the day it helps you adjust your eating.

title: Only had it for a day..
body: I only had it for a day so I can't say too much about it. But this is an amazing app for those of us who have trouble with weight. It so easy to use and I think it's just all around helpful.

title: A must do!
body: What I like most is the wide variety of foods that are available to choose from to track each meal.  I have tried other calorie tracker apps and they have limited choices. Will continue to use and see how well it assists me in my weight loss goals!

title: Does its job
body: Serves its purpose well. I would like to see a recipe calculator/ creator in app (as opposed to the website) and also it would be nice of nutritional info included more than calories, fat and carbs. Those are the improvements it would need for 5 stars... And I'd pay for those, too!

title: Missing piece
body: I just changed to this from another tracking tool that uses points, not calories, but they have a barcode scanner. I really miss being able to make quick decisions when shopping for food. Please add this!!

title: Yes!
body: I've been trying to go on a diet but nothing was helpin me do the right thing until I found this app! Weight watchers is $50  & it don't even do great like this does. YES! If you are looking for an app to help you lose weight this IS the app for you!

title: Easy & Fun
body: All the foods I entered were found in the directory.  It makes a game out of tracking calories and only takes a few minutes a day.  When I reach the limit, I stop eating, it's that simple!

title: Need bug fix
body: The app is solid although when you go into the recently eaten foods, the icons don't match up with the product eaten.

title: Great App
body: This app is incredibly easy to use. It provides all the tools necessary to take control of your weight loss or maintenance plan. I am amazed at how tracking my meals and snacks has simplified my meal decisions. The online community offers fantastic support.

title: Miss
body: Finally! A quick easy way to keep track of what calories actually go in and out!! Even if I don't lose another pound I am learning to be aware of serving sizes, calorie counts, and most importantly how active I am and need to be!!

title: Highly Recommend
body: Really like the free version of this app & it's helped me watch my calories. Especially like the chart that breaks down the fat, protein, and carbs consumed each day. Downside is the exercise calories burned in the search are always off so I usually manually enter mine. Great app overall.

title: Great app!
body: Really love this... Easy to use. I use it to keep track of my protein intake and it has a great graph to show that percentage daily. Only thing else that might make it better is to have a tally of protein grams daily and maybe a weekly summary of the nutrients we ate as well. Overall great app though! Very helpful!

title: A decent start.
body: The user interface is great. The memory features are great for frequent additions. The problem is with the nutritional information, being a user updated system they're too many conflicting entries.  The data base needs to be verified and consolidated. Overall a get, but annoying at times.

title: Amazing!!
body: It keeps track and of everything it also reminds me to eat hah for me it has done a lot for me it keeps track of all the calories I have burned and how many I consume and has me at my limit! I love it!!!

title: Better than lose it or MyFitnessPal
body: Everything you need to know is right there at a glance.  No scrolling even needed.  No clumsy menus.  This app flows nicely.  Easy to find items.  Easy to track water.  Great graph display for visual learners.

title: Best fitness/food diary app
body: I've tried a lot of apps with a similar purpose but this is by far the best. Easy to use, highly informative, and beautiful graphics. The pro version is definitely worth it.

title: Good app
body: So far this works great! Just started yesterday. Scanning foods barcodes is a breeze, as well as adding whole foods. Hoping this will help me stay to stay on track with nutrition. As a side note, I'm using their premium service.

title: Helpful and Easy
body: I love that you can scan the barcode of foods that you consume. It makes tracking your meals a lot easier, especially when you're consuming more processed foods.

title: Amazing App
body: This app is amazing. It shows me how many calories I should have each day. Great thing to start a new year! It even has some exercises I can do for a short period of time since I'm a busy person .

title: Absolutely Love!!!
body: This app is absolutely amazing!!! I only started to use it because I was counting calories on my own and wanted to see the comparison in any accuracy. I would highly recommend everyone use this app.

title: So far so good
body: I like being able to keep track and have this tool at the palm of my hands. A lot of the foods are in the database. It gets trickier inputting homemade foods but at least you get an idea of where you are.

title: Great app
body: I can easily track my calories and meals and exercise. I can personalize my weight loss goals and receive advice from many other users. This advice is neatly categorized from health nutrition to exercise etc. A great sense of community :)

title: Better than WW online
body: I love this app. So far every single food I've searched for I have. It has helped me lose and maintain. Been having issues with the scan feature since the new update, it doesn't work at all. Other than that I love it!

title: Laura
body: Update: had the same problems as others scan or search wouldn't work. Help suggested I delete and download again. Hated to lose all my data but did delete. Now the app has too many ad pop ups. Average calories and highest calorie foods are not free anymore. You get that info only with the gold program. I will be looking for another app to use.

title: Love this app... One of the best.
body: Easy to use... Motivates you to eat healthier.  I don't believe in diets... But I do believe in enjoying what you love in moderation.  This app gives you a simple break down of your diet.  If adjustments are needed this app makes it simple to do so.

title: New changes
body: This WAS a really great app but now you have changed the interface colors and I can't tell the difference between what I have already posted and what I want to post. We need more contrast between the colors. You gave ruined a perfectly good app. But all is not lost, you can change it back!

title: Awesome App
body: This is an awesome App it works great super user friendly. I am not the best with technology but this was so easy the ability to scan bar codes makes it even easier/quick (so happy I found this App)

title: Best so far
body: I've used a lot of weight and calorie apps so far and this one I like the best and can easily stick to it. I understand everything, can easily input food, and I like how it breaks out what your eating by carbs fat ect.

title: Must Have!
body: This is a really good app. It sends reminders for when I need to eat a meal and also encouraging message as well. You can also see the progress you've made throughout the week.

title: Great fitness tracker app
body: This is easy to use and very intuitive. The previous app seemed to have more pre-loaded exercise activities, but this one allows for better weight tracking. Continued improvements in the app have improved it across time.

title: Excellent
body: I felt obligated to write a review for this app because of how quickly it impressed me. Of all the choices of calorie counter apps, this seems to be the best option. Very informative, and overall a well written app.

title: Great app!
body: This app has been wonderful!  It has helped me to lose 20 lbs.  I am currently pregnant and so now instead of to lose weight it is great at helping me track nutrition.  I love that workouts have been added to this!

title: So easy to use!
body: This has helped me track my calories and food intake. Alerts remind me it's time to eat. Love that I can scan my foods that have bar codes and can easily search everything else!

title: Very well developed - great app
body: I just started using this to help me monitor calories.  The GUI is excellent.  Easy to use and intuitive. I have not had any major issues. It froze couple times but my data was fine.  I

title: Easy to use and it works!
body: The more you use it the easier it is to log your food. You can preset with things you eat or drink everyday like coffee which saves time. I'm losing weight so it works !!

title: Not always accurate but works with you
body: Not always accurate with foods when you input them so if there is a good you are eating that you know is listed wrong just add it in- but works great other than that. Helps me stay on track!

title: The reviews speak for themselves
body: The previous reviews speak for the app. It is great and it interacts/shares data with the health app.

title: Great App
body: I love this app, just about everything I eat already has the nutritional information. The only thing that needs work is the scanner, it only works on name brand items. Over all, great app.

title: Really good app
body: Great little app. Had a problem remembering my info/particulars at first even with forcing a server sync. It has taught me to be mindful of what I eat even when I laze out and don't record my food intake. I now possess a better understanding of how many calories I actually take in.

title: The glitches..
body: This app is amazing and can help you to loose weight, but the glitches.. Once it happens you lose all your saved info- Your weight, tracked food, water consumption.. All of it.:(. This happened to me twice already. It could possibly be my iPod touch but you'll be better off using the actual website until it is all fixed up.

title: New UI rocks!
body: The new version is sooooo much better. They work out the kinks in the UI for tracking missed days and made it so much easier. I'm back to tracking... The frequent foods is also super accessible now.

title: Like it
body: Fairly easy to use and a match for what I needed

title: GREAT APP
body: This app has really helped me to become more vigilant about what I eat.  It's very easy to use! I love that the % of protein to fat to carb is automatically calculated each day for you and that you can track your weight and progress. :-)

title: As Good as Weight Watchers and FREE
body: I got tired of paying weight watchers for something anyone could do with a little common sense and some will power. Stumbled upon this app and dropped my online membership and I'm still on track!

title: Love the latest update
body: I've been using this app for the last three years, and with the last update the app feels faster and more intuitive. Also, really portrait mode support on the iPad. Great stuff!

title: Solid and Easy to use.
body: Easy to use not only for keeping track but to also find calories for any type of food quickly.

title: Food Tracker
body: This app really helps you visualize how much you're eating throughout the day without even realizing it. It helps you set goals that you can see everyday when you open up the app.

title: Better and better
body: This app keeps getting better and better. Now I prefer using the app rather than tracking calories and exercise on the website. And the app talks to my Fitbit!

title: Very disappointing
body: I expect more from Livestrong brand. This app is glitchy! I couldn't change my weight in settings. It was stuck at the default 145, even after closing and opening/retrying several times. Couldn't find Step Aerobics to track my morning gym class no matter what key words I used. I deleted this app 5 minutes after downloading it and I'm not usually one to be extremely strict on apps. Big disappointment!!!

title: Great way to help control your eating
body: This app is a great way to start gaining control of your eating. Not only are their meals that you can search for like restaurant food but you can also manually import caloric information

title: Fantastic!
body: Great app! Has food you can imagine, even specific brands. Makes tracking easy. It makes losing weight easy. I actually am enjoying being able to track what I eat.

title: Simple & Quick!
body: I was looking for something simple to help me track my water intake. Im not one to count calories or "points", but I tried the meal tracker in addition to water and it's so easy! I've shared it with many of my friends.

title: Easiest app yet
body: I have tried 4 other apps and this one is by far the most user friendly! Been using it 2 weeks and am not annoyed by tracking...and I love the daily reminder

title: Positive reinforcement!
body: Great positive reinforcement. Some of the calorie counts are off. But I love tracking how many calories are left each day. Logging keeps you honest. The reward points are a good incentive. It feels good to donate them to charity. I do wish the program could tell me how to tweak my diet for optimal performance though.

title: Kind of a let down
body: When I saw the easy interface and the overall very positive reviews I thought this app would be better. The calorie estimates for the foods were pretty good and there was a good amount of variety but the calorie estimates for the exercises had no variety...95% of the types of exercise I do were not listed

title: Love it but
body: I use this app everyday.  I have lost 20 pounds using this app, BUT the drop down box of foods is too narrow.  There are enough choices now that there are 5+ in the drop down that show the same thing.  Please make it wider.  Thanks

title: Good
body: Good search options for both exercise and food. Only thing I would change would be how the graph of your weight shows over time, but what exists is still acceptable.

title: Love this app
body: I've only been using this app for 2 weeks in addition to really cranking up workouts in a serious effort to lose weight. This app holds you accountable to what you can take in calorie wise. It works for me!

title: Has helped BUT...
body: It needs a more detailed selection for home cooked foods. I don't know the caloric count for the foods I make like beef stew, BBQ chicken thighs, etc. I always see name brand but that is about it. Sometimes there are too many choices! Ok anyway it has helped me to see what I am putting in my face each day. Good luck to everyone one this weight loss journey!

title: This Livestrong app ROCKS!!
body: This is the easiest and best app I've tried.  I've lost 5 lbs in 10 days when nothing else was working.  I have 6 other friends that are now using it and finding success.  I'm so glad I found this!

title: Great app
body: This is a great app. Ive lost 6 pounds in the last three weeks just by using this. There may be some changes I would make to make things simpler, but overall a great app and one that helps you, thanks again

title: Working great!
body: I've only had this about a week but I already feel like I'm on the right track. I'm about to leave for college so I think this will be my key to avoiding the Freshmen 15.

title: Calorie tracker
body: This app is so helpful in the fact that I stop and think about what I'm about to consume. I have easily dropped weight without starving myself and I can eat regular meals. I now think about how many calories my foods hold.

title: Great app!!
body: I love this app. I've been using it faithfully for 10 days and already lost 4 lbs. I am learning to control my eating and increase my activity. Thanks livestrong! I look forward to continue our working relationship!!! :)

title: Great way to track food consumption
body: Great way for me to track my caloric intake as well as what food items I'm actually eating.  I also like the feature that imports my calories I burn on my Apple Watch into the app.

title: Cool time saving features!
body: I love the scan function where I can scan the barcode of certain food items. The database of foods is pretty extensive now. This is a handy little app to track your intake and exercise. Worth more than the price! :)

title: It's easy.
body: There's not much to using this. Like anything else that  produces results though, it's up to the person with the goals to put the time in to make it work for them.

title: Love it
body: I really like the app I used it for sometimes before I was pregnant and during my pregnancy. But now that I'm breast feeding it harder to use, trying to lose pregnancy fat but still having to take in more calories makes it hard too use.

title: Pretty easy tracker
body: This food tracker is easy to use and has lots of accurate info. It has nice reminders and simple goal setters. The only issue I have had with it is freezing up when using the scan option.

title: My Plate
body: Great app, easy to use, lets you actually see at a glance how your intake compares with weight control goals. What would make it perfect for me is being able to track fiber and teaspoons of sugar. I have found this a great app to give me a full view of goals, intake and exercise.

title: Awesome Food Tracker!
body: This is a great app for anyone who wants to see the breakdown of carbs, fat and protein of the foods you're eating. I love how huge the database is, I can always find the exact brand of food I'm eating. The design is incredibly clean and easy to use too.

title: Mixed review
body: Looks great, but maybe I'm missing something - Force synch but still different info on iPhone vs iPad. Logged in on both - different calorie goals, entries don't synch.

title: The motivation üòç
body: I am a really like really lazy person and I "try" to eat healthy but I usually give up after like a day or two but with the motivational alerts I get from this app It really made a difference

title: Deleting app...
body: Deleting app as soon as this review is accepted.

title: Best Food Tracking App!
body: I ‚ù§Ô∏è this app! It really helps keep me on track and very easy to use. I especially love the cute alerts that are sent if you do not log meals like " it's okay, we won't judge". Highly recommend.

title: Bad Update
body: I have been using this App everyday for 18 months. This update is not good.  You cannot see your macros. All it tells you is that you have 0 left.  Ok - how much did I go over?  No idea.  If this feature is not fixed ASAP I will switch apps.

title: Hate the update
body: I used to love this ap for the main purpose of tracking how many grams of protein, fat and carbs I've eaten for the day. The new version only tells you how many you have left to eat for the day based on a percentage that relates to your goal calorie intake. So I'll be looking for a new macro tracker that allows me to track it, the original way. I'm a trainer and used to recommend this ap to every client on their very first day. Not anymore.

title: Latest Version Ruined the App for Me
body: I'm a fitness professional. I switched from other food- and fitness-tracking apps to My Plate mostly for its user interface and its more extensive food catalog (a greater variety of recognized foods, including restaurant dishes and a variety of cuisines). This latest version of the app is not counterintuitive for users and is mostly frustrating. Please change back. (If not, I'll find a new app!)
response: Hi- thank you for your review! Our team is testing a few variations of this update and is working on making changes based on user feedback. Please feel free to email us support@livestrong.com with any specific comments!

title: Great App
body: Love this app! Easy to learn and use. The amount of food that can be tracked is huge plus the UPC scan feature is my favorite. Tracks water & exercise too. Only thing that would make it a 5 star is having a total for protein, carbs, etc. instead of a percentage.

title: Great App
body: I never counted calories before. With the need to lose weight, this app was suggested as a help tool. It works great and has been very helpful.

title: Amazing
body: Can't live without it! Helping me lose weight by letting me be honest about my food and exercise, even tracks my Water intake, Syncs ALL my favorite useful apps together to help me lose weight on a large 'Scale' !! Lol Cant thank you enough!!!

title: Awesome!!
body: Help me lose about 10lbs in a 1.5 weeks. Losing weight is as easy as ensuring a caloric deficit. A lot of people are complaining about the accuracy. But counting calories will never be precise. Round about numbers takes the pressure away.

title: Very Helpful
body: It has been very helpful to keep me on top of my intake, percentage of carbs vs protein and fat and motivates me to exercise to burn calories. They need to check the accuracy for the foods and exercises they have listed, but you are able to put your calorie intake in yourself as well as calories burned.

title: Love it!!!
body: Absolutely love this app. Not only has it helped me to maintain a weight it makes me feel more accountable for what and how I am eating. I have already recommended to friends and family and will continue to do so!

title: Lots of positives
body: This is a better app than my fitness pal with only one thing that it's missing and that is that it doesn't allow you to input your homemade recipes to add to your log..... Unless there is something that I'm missing here. Overall a good app.

title: Really Really Helps
body: This tracker is easy to use and really helps me stay on track with my eating goals. I love the reminders and that its integrated with the fitness tracker so I don't need do the math myself. I can easily tell where I'm at. Love it.

title: Very good app for weight loss and control
body: I've been using this app for 3 yrs. I slowly loss 20 lbs (9.1Kg) over the course of 6 months. This app is what allowed me to keep it off for the past 2.5 yrs. The only issue that I have with this app is that the UPC (food barcode) database isn't that large.

title: Great app
body: Easy to use, charts really help me progress towards my goal. I've always worked out, couldn't lose a single lb all month, but 3 days into using this app to track my macros & eating clean & I'm down 4 lbs already.

title: Great App
body: This app is amazing! I have been addicted to it since the day I downloaded it. If your a fan of Livestrong and the Livestrong website, you have to have this. It's truly the best witness and well being app on the market today.

title: Easy to track foods
body: I love the ease with which I can enter foods, serving sizes, water and exercise . The only thing that would make it better would be to have a daily motivational quote added to give you encouragement.

title: An A+
body: Very great app! Easy to use and i love that it stores ur food, so if u eat same thing u won't have to look it up again. Lost 5lbs in less than 2 weeks by tracking calories i've eaten n burned with exercise!

title: Live strong my plate
body: I love it.  It makes me watch what I am eating, especially on my bad days when I get close to going over my total.  I also like how you get points that you can use towards gift cards.

title: What an Eye Opener
body: Just use this app for 1 day and you will be hooked!  I thought I knew how many calories I was eating every day; little did I know that at lunch alone I ate 1400+ calories! Required me to eat a salad for dinner to come in under my allotted calories!

title: Livestrong
body: Average program. It has some great highlights like the scan feature however it doesn't have enough products loaded to make useful. It also needs preloaded food items instead of making you load all the information yourself.

title: Good
body: This has worked well for me. It is easy and has a lot of information a my finger tips. I have used it for 10 days so far. It has helped my keep track and keep my eye on the ball.

title: Simple and love mpoints!
body: Quick and easy to use and find foods I eat. Keeps me motivated to stick to my eating plan and I love the integration with mpoints and the water tracker. Most helpful weight tracker I've used. Would recommend to anyone.

title: Scan database needs work
body: I love this app and it has helped me lose weight, but the scan items option still needs work. 1 out of every 10 items I eat are in the database. It's a work in progress, I'm sure, so will love watching it evolve into another user friendly option.

title: Scan database needs work
body: I love this app and it has helped me lose weight, but the scan items option still needs work. 1 out of every 10 items I eat are in the database. It's a work in progress, I'm sure, so will love watching it evolve into another user friendly option.

title: Crashes alot
body: For a free App it's very functional and easy to use. However the ads and the more wards are very irritating. They show up every time you enter something. Also the recently and frequently eaten lists are inaccurate and seemed to be arranged in alphabetic order and once on the list don't change

title: Great app that crashes a little too frequently
body: Though this app is prone to closing for no reason it has one of the best tracking systems I have seen. The food database is huge and includes many speciality and health brands that are so often missing from calorie counting apps.

title: Easy to use
body: There are tons of food and exercise choices which makes the app user friendly. Obviously it is not 100% (no app is) but I can always find items that are close enough. Highly recommend this app.

title: Easy to use
body: This is a great app that is super easy to use. I can track my weight, foods and exercise all in one place.  Free one works great, I see no need to upgrade. Nearly all my foods are already preloaded so I makes it simple to use.

title: Livestring
body: I haven't Exactley lost weight doing this because I stay in the calorie limit but it isn't always with healthy foods! But I still love being able to know how many calories are in all my food! It's extremely useful and it makes me drink more water!

title: On my way to a healthy ME
body: I didn't know how to navigate thru it at first. (I.e., manually adding calories , etc.)   But after using it several days its become easy.   I look forward to tracking my strides.   Great app.

title: Great app! However, am having not a great time w/coins
body: I'm trying to do the coin redemption & it's not working for me at all. I've got am iPhone 6S plus w/the recent update (10) & still I'm not able to redeem my coins. Please help üòî

title: Minor bugs but excellent app
body: The only issue I have with it is that sometimes when I track my weight, the weight I input is forgotten later and replaced by the weight tracked before it. Other than that, it's a wonderful app.

title: Best food tracker ever
body: I love this app it alows me to track my food and create my own or scan the item I love how I can lose weight from this program if you haven't downloaded this app yet you should - mia

title: Step count showing as calories burned
body: It's really annoying that the step count from the iPhone health app is automatically included. If you delete it it will just re-add. Also the steps are showing up as calories. I took 3,000 steps today and it's saying I burned 3,000 calories which is nowhere near true since all I did was a slow 3 mile run.
response: Hi Lizzie! We're working on a fix for this and apologize for the inconvenience! In the meantime, you can turn off activity tracking by going to Account > Settings > Track My Activity. Please email us support@livestrong.com if you have any questions!

title: Great app!
body: Great to keep track of calories! I love the barcode scan for the food. Even though it's not always the correct amount of calories so make sure to check that.

title: Great app!
body: This app really helped me and it is so well organized. What I like most about this app is that you can search or scan what you ate so that the calories and sugars automatically go into your log.

title: Best feature / Disliked  feature
body: Love : It calculates my daily protein requirement ‚ù£

title: Was great unit they "fixed it."
body: Pretty great app. The only glitch is that you can't correct exercises. Once you input it it is done. You also can't see the exercises so if you're putting in multiple exercises you might double enter it. Otherwise it's good.

title: Love this app!
body: I have used this app for over 3 years and it is so easy to find the food. Especially my special diet food. It is such an easy and helpful tool to keep track of daily calories.

title: Yup
body: It's pretty good. The free options on this bad boy are pretty much all you need to keep track of how many calories you are consuming. If you have a fitness tracker, it even calculates how many calories you've burned.

title: Better than the rest!
body: Definitely the best application that I have ever used in tracking my food. Easy to use, easy to understand, easily customize your meals.

title: HELP
body: I love this app soo much but I have no idea how to search food! It was working fine and now when I click what did you eat today? It doesn't search at all. Only things I've eaten before.

title: New update is not as functional
body: With the new update you can not see everything you ate that day at a glance. I have to click to view what I had for breakfast and then it shows all these other foods from food database when you click into breakfast. I was excited about new look but it's bad design. Way too focused on calories instead of what you ate.

title: Awesome
body: This app is easy to use. Easy to track what I eat, calories, syncs with my iwatch perfectly. I would highly recommend. Love the scanning function too. Larger food database then my daily burn app I used to use.

title: Good app in general
body: Compared to some other apps...

title: I give this app 10 stars!!
body: I've following this app for awhile and lost 60 lbs in less than six months !! I am now able to run farther and longer. Now if they had an app that would yell at me every time I crave a cookie, jk. Lol

title: I absolutely love this app
body: This app is so useful! I have always had a problem with keeping track of my calories, and this makes everything so much easier. üëçüèº

title: No complaints so far!
body: I've been using the app for the last 30 days and it's been great. I cancelled my weight watchers and started using this to track my food and exercise.

title: Fun!
body: Really enjoy how upbeat this app is. I use it mostly for calorie tracking and it's a breeze. The interface is a lot more user friendly than my fitness pal, which I was using previously.

title: Great app but suggestions
