body: Love this app. Really help. but! Wish they had a settings / more setting options for goal.

title: Good but...
body: I began using this instead of my fitness pal because the exercises available for my hiit training were superior. Unfortunately, the scanner doesn't work well and often doesn't have the food in its database. This was fine for awhile but eventually became cumbersome and I switched to myfitnesspal.

title: It worky now
body: Glad to see they released a fix to the previous update. This has been my favorite tracking app for years and still is.

title: Just right
body: Hi, I was using noon but the free version kept nagging me about upgrading when I just wanted the exercise and food tracker. This app has all those things plus a couple of workouts and a water tracker. It also only cost a buck to remove the ads too.

title: Handy app!
body: This is a fast and convenient app for tracking what I eat. I weightlift and want to make sure that I get the right ratio of macros without getting chubby and this app makes it easy! I especially love the barcode scanning and HUGE library of foods, including tons of Korean food!

title: Perfect motivator!!!
body: As a child I was always terrible about drinking water. I grew up around just coca-cola and pog juice. Not good. And it's been hard trying to drink more water but this app helped motivate me by its water feature. I'm at 64 oz everyday now and I feel great!

title: Love it!
body: I love how user friendly this app is! Almost makes me feel like I can't wait to track my food! And I need all the reminders I can get!

title: Exercise section needs edit ability
body: Really like this app, but would like the exercise section to work more like the meal section.  I would like to see what I logged for the day and be able to edit it.  Also, add fiber to the manual calorie entry section.

title: Great Weight Loss Aid
body: Has many great features to assist you with weight loss and nutrition goals!  Definitely recommended if you are committed to getting results.  Helps you be persistent and cognizant of the dangers of momentary indulgence.  Has a few flaws & deficiencies, but overall a very useful tool!

title: Love this app! Very simple & quick...
body: This has been a huge help in staying on track with my diet and water intake. Love the scan feature for foods!

title: Very useful App
body: I really enjoy this App. It has a lot of features. I have run across a few foods not on their database. I think it would be helpful if the App identified wheat in the food you eat. Also it could add a field to record any extra vitamins and supplements you take.

title: Good but not the best
body: I've been using this app for my iPad for the past 7 weeks or so and I must say I do love it. This latest update has fixed some of the issues but with the latest update there are ads and so that's why I decided to give it 4 stars

title: Helpful!!!
body: This app is extremly helpful!!! Even though I do

title: Outstanding App
body: Tracking is made simple, and makes food selection choices much easier. Also scan function for UPC works flawlessly

title: THE BEST FOOD TRACKER APP!!!
body: This app is very easy to use.  The scan option makes it convenient and it takes little time to post meals. Also love the layout; you know exactly how many calories you have left for the day.

title: Great
body: Love that it has a manual calories entry. I use it when I know how many calories I'm eating but I don't feel like searching for a food. Also has a large data base for food searches and exercise input. Great app!

title: Easy and helpful
body: Makes it easy to set goals, track calories, and track progress! Easy to look up foods and exercises too. Would recommend!

title: Super easy to use
body: I love it!! I've used fitness pal in the past and it didn't really suit me, but this app is SO easy to use and track your progress and it's helped me stay on ...track down 20 lbs and I'm not done yet!!!

title: Awesome!! ...however
body: This app is the best. However I wish there were more items in the scan database because when I used myfitnesspal, nearly everything was in.

title: It works!
body: I‚Äôve been using this app since 2013 and every new release is better than the previous one. I keep tracking what I eat, what I do and it helps to achieve my goal.

title: Very useful
body: It is a great way to track food and exercise. I don't rely on calories burned (use my own hr monitor to track my numbers).  I also try to use calorie intake off of the package in front of me... It is a handy free way to track calories and water!!!  I really like using it.

title: Awesome app
body: This app has helped me take back responsibility for my diet. It has calorie content for every food you would ever need to know. It's super easy to use, & I'm actually having fun tracking my diet & exercise! Try it!!

title: Great app...could use more features
body: I've loved using this app. It is so easy to learn and use that in two months I still use it everyday. That said, I would love it if I could make notes on different days and also track vitamin/sugar intake in the graphs.

title: Dietetics Student
body: Fine app! The activity level is tricky-- most of us tend to assume that we're far more active than the settings that the app suggests. A high school athlete, for example, is most accurately moderately active, as most of their time is spent in desks. Otherwise, it increases wellness awareness, and that is positive.

title: Do not
body: Don't get this app if your under 20. They will deem you a child and everything you do, say, or ask will disregarded. That or people will talk down to you and team up to bully you. It's quite sad actually. These people have been there so long that if you don't praise what they say, your wrong and will be humiliated. It's not worth it community wise. Also, the app itself recommends too low of a calorie count, it made me physically sick.

title: Great app
body: So easy to use. Sometimes finding exercises in the tracker can be tricky unless you word it just the right way. Example spin class or biking can only be found if you type in indoor cycling

title: Know your numbers!
body: In order to lose weight or maintain current weight, you only need to exercise and eat right. With many of us living busy lives, this tracker is a great help to track your caloric intake, exercise, water and more! I use it every day!

title: Helps you lose weight
body: The app is easy to use helps you keep track of calories you eat and exercise away.  It helps you set goals and keep track of them.

title: Barcode scanner??
body: This app is very helpful & easy to use! I've been trying to gain healthy weight and this allows me to keep track of my calorie intake while earning points toward rewards at the same time.

title: Bugs
body: This app is a great start, moreover the design is quite ugly and many details are missing for users experience (if you make a mistake in the food selection you can not cancel it and if you try to overwrite by choosing again it won't work ).

title: Useful
body: I do like this app, HOWEVER I wish this app had a barcode reader so I could scan the barcode and it would automatically input the nutrition information and calories of the product. I currently have another food tracker app that does that and LOVE it.

title: Great!
body: The only thing I wish it would do is to show me my daily breakdown chart history. Otherwise, everything else is amazing! It's very easy to enter your meals. Most of mine already exist in the system and if they don't it's very easy for me to add! Thanks for a great product!

title: Great app
body: I love this app. Been using it for awhile and i love how easy it is to track everything in one simple to use app. A must have if you're just getting started or been working out a while.

title: Great App
body: Helps you realize the amount of calories being consumed in a typical day. Just with this information you can make better dietary choices and actually loose weight. It works!

title: Needs more options!
body: It's an ok app, it does what it says it does and I like the community wall where people share experiences. I would have given it a better rate if you had more foods and exercises in the data base! There really aren't a lot of foods there and I think that that would make for a better app

title: Very useful app!
body: This app has given me everything I need to jump start my weight loss program.. Gives me needed incentive by being able to easily track my progress..

title: Not multiple user
body: Easy to use.  I'd like to be able to set up multiple account on the same app so my girlfriend could use it and we could work together to get healthy.  She doesn't have a smart phone so we write her progress in a notebook.

title: Amazing app
body: I have been using this app for about 6 months. I have lost 40 lbs and am in the best shape of my life. I use it daily and there is rarely a time that I can't find a food to track.  I highly recommend this app!!

title: Love it!
body: This app is one of my favorites. Easy to use, informative and great database of food to chose from. WISH LIST: I wish I could print the journal at the end of the day, I wish it recognized physical tasks, i.e gardening, lawn mowning, window washing as exercise too. Priceless for getting on track with journal food choices.

title: So far so good
body: It's good to see what your eating daily. I like how you can update the servings of items once they are logged. There is also a point system to keep you motivated to keep tracking

title: Excellent
body: It has made me a lot more aware of what I am eating and has improved my discipline. The application also has a very good archive of various foods so I very rarely have to input food I eat manually.  In summary, an excellent and useful application.

title: Pretty good
body: Easy to use. Effective for managing/losing weight.  Two things should be improved/fixed: 1) remove the ads ( I know.  It will never happen but you can ask.) 2)  the graph of your weight needs work - it displays to the pound not the fraction of a pound.

title: Almost great
body: Very good ap. good features and works smoothly. You get reward points for using the ap and doing certain things. Wish you could set up rewards in the ap so based on your points you could reward yourself with a desert, or other such treats.

title: Luv the Lite!
body: Using the lite version to start and it's really helping me keep track of my day.  The best part is the food diary that's making me more aware of my choices, so everyday I can improve and reach my goals.

title: Great app
body: It's awesome I love it! Only thing I would change is the fact that when I log my exercises it subtracts the amount of calories I burned. I rather it just tell me instead of allowing me to eat more calories.

title: Helpful app but...
body: Very helpful app. This is the first serious calorie tracker app I have stuck with. Just wish there were more free exercises and an exercise calendar, like a 30 abs challenge calendar or similar in the app itself instead of the website

title: Better than any other tracker
body: This one is simple to use and it is honest and doesn't have "upgrade to see" certain aspects. It also can sync to your health app

title: Well put together
body: Very nice app. Has a lot of features in the free version. I have my doubts about some of the calorie counts on some of the food, but a lot of it is user submitted, so it's up to the user to be accurate.

title: Love it
body: Honestly I don't have anything bad to say about it cause it's easy to do things, but sometimes the scanner thingy doesn't recognize the food so it's a little hard to get that up.

title: Love it but...
body: This app is great! I love the great variety of foods and that it keeps track of everything. However when I try to use my points that I've earned, it never gives them to me... it just has the loading button. üòï

title: Making a difference
body: I've been struggling with sticking to my health goals. I'm not a calorie counter nor do I favor the word "diet." I DO need a change, for health reasons.  Using this app has helped me to be accountable for my intake and thus more consistent in moving towards my goals.
response: Thank you for the review! We're so happy to hear that MyPlate is making a difference in your life. We'd love to hear what we could do to make this a 5 star experience for you!

title: Very automatic!
body: I'm new to this app but so far it's making it very easy to count calories. The scan is great!  The only improvement I would make is to add a 1/2 serving size. For example, I scanned my bread which indicated 1 serving as 2 slices and I only had one slice. All in all a good app!

title: Quite Pleased
body: I down loaded this app to use for tracking calories for weight gain. Very easy to use and I like the ability to use my own descriptions adjusted for my food combinations. All good.

title: Love it, found a bug
body: I switched from fitnesspal to myplate. I like its simplicity, and all the function is sufficient to me. The only issue I have is the syncing between myplate and iPhone Health. It always has issue to get my daily step data. Very annoying.

title: Easy and nice looking
body: I just started using this app and find it very easy to use with a range rabe of nutrition data and lovely to look at. I'll recommend to others who may be looking for something other than myfitnesspal.

title: Totally disappointed
body: I spent several months tracking what ate each day.

title: Same as above
body: I woke up this morning as a 5'6, 140 lb woman. (If I was a 5'6, 140 lb woman, I wouldn't be trying to lose weight.) Then I got a message thanking me for signing up for premium which I didn't. I'm waiting to hear back about whether or not I got charged for this. Anyway, I agree with the person above me. How does my information get mixed up with someone else's? And I feel bad for whoever got my stats because they probably gained 100 lbs overnight.

title: Used to be good
body: I've used this app for years and was generally pleased. However, within the past week it has stopped working correctly. Random data (food, exercise, weight, etc.) from who knows where appears and the tracking function doesn't do more than a week. Very disappointed with it right now.

title: Glitchy after update
body: I used this for two weeks and it worked ok. Interface was good and it was easy to enter food.

title: Please fix the bugs
body: I love this app, but as of the most recent update it's been very buggy. Specifically, won't let me stay logged in anymore, I lose data I have already entered, and sometimes it won't launch and just shuts down. Please fix or revert back to the old version, because I didn't have any issues with that version.

title: Love this app!
body: I love that I can pull up carb and calorie counts for most foods - including major restaurant chains. This app has helped manage my portions and also keeps track of steps. Great app for those willing to log their food intake. Love it!!

title: Not what I'm looking for...
body: As a newly-minted vegetarian (and a runner), I am looking to keep an eye on my protein intake and calorie intake. So when this app asked me right off the bat if I was looking to lose weight or gain weight, a little red flag went up. It's a really pretty app, and if you're dieting this is the thing for you, but for me, it just wasn't focused on what I need.

title: Best tracker ever
body: Truly a great app to be able to keep track of what you eat. Love the barcode selector that pulls up anything you eat instead of you having to do it yourself. Great great app. Would recommend it to anyone.

title: Love it
body: I've been using this app for years and it's great because I can look back on so much data. It's fast and easy and has almost every food you could eat in it.

title: Needs some work
body: I like this tracker a lot, and wanted to upgrade to be a gold member. However, every time I try to log on with my iPhone it kicks me off. I tried with my iPad and it told me I had the wrong user name/password. I requested to have it reset but have not received an email yet. A little frustrated!

title: Excellent app for meal tracking
body: This app is great it has so many different foods in their database and my favorite thing it the scanner ! I've tried a few different apps and this is the one I have defaulted too!

title: I LOVE this app!
body: This app help me stay on track with my health by tracking everything easily in one location. I have used this app to help me lose 50 pounds. Now I use it to help in maintaining my current weight.

title: Love this!
body: Counting calories is the only thing that ever helps me get myself on track. This app makes it that much easier to calculate as quickly as possible. Love the scanner feature.

title: Very easy to use!
body: They have all, if not almost, the food you eat. They even keep track of the calories you burn by walking with the phone. However, I wish the calorie and nutritional facts were more accurate.

title: Gooodbye too all the other apps on here ‚úãüèº
body: This app is truly amazingggggüòµüòµüòµüòµüòµüíØ

title: Love it!
body: So easy to use and the articles they send out are really informative! Must have for those trying to track their macros, get recipe/workout ideas and overall health tips!

title: Much improved
body: The mobile versions make it so much easier for me to track throughout the day. Wish there were some way to switch measurements (cups instead of oz, for example) like on the website.

title: I've used this for years
body: It's a great way to teach yourself self control. As long as you're continuously tracking everything you will reach your goals in no time.

title: Phe Clarke
body: I love this app... It's easy to use, help me count my calories in a snap, monitors my exercise steps from my iPhone and I can put in my recent activities as well. It's very user friendly and it helps to keep me on track. Love, love, love it!

title: Perfect!
body: I have literally zero complaints about this app! I've been looking for a good food tracker app for literally a month now and I finally found the perfect one. It's so easy to do and so quick!

title: Great app!
body: This is a great app! I've only had a crashing problem once or twice, but overall, there is nothing you can't do with this. Amazingly helpful with weight loss goals

title: Irritating app.
body: Half the time it doesn't have the food listed to track so you have to enter it manually and when you try to do the exercise either it says no match or your offline when your not and if you don't know how many calories you burned you can't list it manually. I find this app. More aggravating than helpful.

title: Frustrating with potential
body: Looks like a great app but my personal settings keep going back to default settings. I want to lose a pound a week and it keeps resetting that as well as the corresponding calories. Fix the bug or I am deleting the app and certainly not buying the one you keep pushing on me.

title: Great but could be better...
body: I agree with the previous comment- this app is super helpful but would be even better if it took breastfeeding mothers into consideration. I just added an extra 300 calories to the recommended intake and will make adjustments accordingly i guess.

title: Amazing!!!!
body: This app has helped take control of my calorie in take and the amount of calories I burn.... It has helped me lose weight fast... I really recommend it if your serious about your health...

title: Daily Value
body: On the tracking chart have a daily value list! That would make this app even so much better than it already is

title: Awesome
body: I really like this app.  Just wish the oz were a little smaller and I didn't have to compute. Also the tracking calories isn't quite accurate.  Anytime you move it deducts calories.

title: Easy, intuitive, great reporting
body: I had bariatric surgery 3 years ago.  This app helps keep me on track by helping me hit protein goals and empowering smart choices.  I love the scanner and food database!  I would recommend this app to anyone.

title: It has come a long way
body: I had this app and deleted it because it wasn't user friendly and a lot of foods wasn't available.  Now this app is the BEST app for tracking food.

title: Fast and easy to use
body: Reminders to track are helpful and tracking can be done quickly

title: Helps you be accountable
body: Allows you to easily see the true picture of your actual daily intake and absolutely helps you be accountable.  Easy to use and if you use it, it works!

title: Terrific!
body: I just started using this app and I am surprised at how I actually keep track of what I eat! You can set a reminder at the end of each day to remind you if you haven't tracked your calories for the day. It's simple and really helps me stay organized.

title: Love it!!
body: I am a workout nut and plan on becoming a physical therapist after graduating. This app is perfect for helping me keep track of my meals and protein intake. Also tells you how many calories you need to consume to meet your goal. This is an awesome app!!

title: Easy, comprehensive & motivating
body: The tracker makes it very easy to find nutritional values for food and track what you eat throughout the day. The mPoints gamify the whole experience and is a great motivational tool to keep checking in.

title: Love it!
body: This is a great app. It's very user friendly and helps me stay on track with my weightloss goals. Earning points for gift cards helps me to stay motivated. If you want to shed some weight, definitely try out this app.

title: Great app
body: Really enjoy this app. Good way to keep track and think before you eat! Like the interactive mpoint, makes tracking calories fun! Like the progress bar, lets you see how you're improving.

title: Food items are easy to log!
body: Love that almost all my foods are found in the search. It also has restaurant items that can be easily found.

title: Great functionality, easy to use!
body: Makes tracking calories and weight fun.  Easy to find or estimate all kinds of food, meals, as well as estimate number of calories burned in different types of exercise.

title: Awesome - lost 32 lbs with this
body: Absolutely the only thing that helped me lose weight and get in shape. Went from 212 to 180 in a few months and I did it eating the normal foods I love - just being more aware of calories in and calories out.

title: Love this app
body: I wanted to lose weight after having baby and found this app that I can eat what I like just cutting back by using this app can track everything I love this app thank you

title: Perfect devise to help lead a healthily life?
body: At first it was a bit intimidating, seeing how many calories I put in my body, and that are in what I thought to be decent foods. It's easy to use and will help you lose weight easier.

title: Amazing you will lose weifht
body: This app is great. I can track all my calories on my phone w/out trouble. It reminds me every day if I forget and there is a community you can talk to. Its like weight watchers, just ten times more cheap!

title: Awesome!
body: This tool makes it so easy to see where my calories are coming from... It is very helpful when trying to study on track in a restricted calorie diet!  I highly recommend using it... Be honest!!

title: My Plate and Live Strong
body: LiveStrong is the whole package. It doesn't get any better than this.  I always lose weight and learn how to make lifestyle chances, not just "diet". Also receive lots of encouragement from other members.

title: Old app was WAY better...
body: Before I downloaded the updated app, I could choose from many more exercises...there were simple everyday things we do in that database that told us how many calories it burned. I have found myself never using the app since I downloaded the updated one. I am very disappointed at the changes made. Some foods aren't as easy to find.

title: Live strong
body: Love it!  It has helped me keep track of what I should (and should not) eat.  I highly recommend this app for anyone trying to lose weight or just be healthy and mindful of what they eat!

title: I love it!
body: It allows you to track your diet and exercise regimen. Which is perfect for me because I'm a calorie counter. I used the old livestong app to lose 20lbs. This new one is even easier to use! And I love earning my m-points.

title: Becoming buggy?
body: Love(ed) this app. Recently the mPoints portion has become buggy. Sometimes your achievements are there sometimes not. When you click on them they don't register, then they are gone, and then back again. iPhone 5

title: Great!!
body: They've got an amazing community of people giving you support on your journey, and set out workouts for you to do to burn calories. The app also tracks what you eat, and can track your activity. AMAZING APP!

title: So easy!
body: Such a great tool for tracking my food, water, exercise all in one place - and it keeps track of how many calories I can have & still achieve my goal üëçüèª

title: Very helpful!
body: I love this app very, very much! It truly helped keep me on the right track. I believe this app boost my motivation level because now I'm extremely cautious of the foods I eat. I recommend this app to everyone!

title: Hannah: losing weight
body: This app is awesome! Love all the features. I love it gives you many choices to choose from. Gives you reminders & it has really helped me so far! I recommend this app!:)

title: Just what I was looking for
body: Loving this app this is exactly the type of thing I was looking for , glad I found it. Just wish u didn't have to be "gold member" for certain features. Overall I recommend it

title: MyPlate Works
body: It does everything well. If only they would push their paid subscription less.

title: I love this app!!
body: It keeps you on track with being mindful of what you are eating AND it is specific and easy to use! I would love to see them make an update that recommends what you need more of in terms of nutrition as you log though

title: Average
body: This app is average for free. I don't know what the upgraded version is like but it's bare minimum food app. The exercise is limited and they don't cross with any other apps. I've had to add about 25% of what I eat. Surprised by some of the calorie count has so much variety. All in all is okay for a basic food tracking app

title: Great App!
body: Been using this app for 2 days. And so far it's been great. You can track all your calorie intake as well as calories burned with exercises.

title: What a terrible downgrade!
body: The new Today format is awful, with far less information visible at a glance (iPad) and massive whitespace that just screams poor design. There appears to be no way to see all your individual food intake for the day in one view. Please, please, please...put it back, design it better, or give us the option to switch to something more useful. This new design is extremely disappointing.
response: Hi Victoria, we're sorry that you are not happy with our latest update. After gathering feedback from our users, we designed what we think is the best version of our app. We understand that our users want to have the option to view their food for the day at a glance and we are working on bringing this feature back!

title: Improving
body: I wish the desktop and app would sync my "calories burned" better. My iPhone app will indicate 315 calories burned yesterday via Apple Watch, but the desktop app doesn't.

title: Added foods have incorrect micro-nutrients
body: I've added food twice using the updated app and it converts the micro-nutrients to super-micro-nutrients! 20 grams of protein became 0.02g and so on. And there's no way to edit the entry using the app. This needs fixing. Otherwise a good app for food tracking. Much more extensive than other food tracking apps.
response: Hello and thanks for your review! Our team is working hard to resolve the decimal issue and we hope to have this fixed soon!

title: Great app
body: Great app overall, there are some  issues with some of food you create, sometimes when you change the portions for 1 meal in particular it affects the original creates product; hope you can fix this

title: Macronutrient Profile!
body: I love that I can view my macro-nutrient profile, I was using another popular tracking app (now owned by under armour) but they wanted to charge me $10/month for this information. Thanks Livestrong!

title: Excellent App
body: Logical, well-laid out interface; good customization options; satisfactory food searching capabilities; and great updates and customer care. No account required to use, works great for a high-level athlete.

title: Used to like this now I hate it
body: Where should I start. How about imputing new foods. Info straight from the package in, garbage out. When info saved it's not even close to what I imputed. If you create a meal don't try fix it, adjust it or change an item after you save it. You can't edit it, you can't delete it. It's like they own it now. You don't have access to your own info. I'm done!!!! Looking for another app.

title: Love this app!!
body: I use this app just for food tracking and it is quick and easy to use. I would highly recommend to others.

title: Rely on this daily
body: I've been using this app daily for a year. Great tool to manage macros. Sometimes a glitch here and there but they're usually fixed quickly and it's free!

title: Ads and no macros?, Fail
body: I got sick of myfitnesspal after the ad free lite version turned into a garbage heap plagued with ads.

title: Been using app for 15 minutes...so far it's great!
body: I love the features, the ease of use, automatic settings. Especially love that I can simply scan a food barcode to add it to my meal. The database even had Dollar General brand loaf bread. Awesome!

title: Motivating
body: A perfect tool to keep myself on track with what I'm eating and my exercise.  Not all of their foods are listed correctly, so you may have to double check quickly, but the scanner for the barcode works every time.

title: One of the better trackers
body: I've been trying out a bunch of different meal trackers as I work at losing weight. This one doesn't nag (too much) and the graphics are wonderfully clear.

title: Amazing!
body: Helped me get myself on track, with the help of tracking what I eat and light exercise I accomplished my goal of reaching 40 pounds lost. Some more to go, but it's still working like a charm after 6 months!

title: Very helpful
body: Really like this app. Use it to track my calories exercise and weight loss. I have lost over 10 pounds in less than three weeks. I recommend this app.

title: I LOVE this app! But...
body: This app is absolutely fantastic. The only reason I took off a star was because after you put a meal together, you can't see its nutrition facts as a whole. I wish there was an easier way to see this with the pie chart and everything.

title: Great app
body: This is my favorite calorie tracker.

title: My Plate
body: Very impressed with this app. It automatically calculates calories used (even scans food packaging for values) & calculates remaining available calories for ea day &tracks  ongoing progress.  Easy & time saving way to manage weight loss.  Best app!

title: Helped me get healthy
body: My wife and I love this app. It is easy to use, has and seemingly unlimited data base of food, and integrates well with other Apple and third-party apps. I use this app more than any other on my iPhone.

title: IN LOVE with app.
body: I adore this app. It helps me maintain accountability for my diet and exercise while reminding me to keep at it!

title: Love the app, one tip for update
body: I love the app, but I wish there was an option to adjust the serving size on the My Meals section. It would be nice to be able to input all ingredients from a recipe and then say, I ate 1/4 of this recipe, rather then dividing up each individual ingredient by the amount eaten.

title: Overall great app
body: Works great. Wish there were more measurements to choose from and wish it would pick up exercise from all my apps but overall excellent app

title: Great App
body: I have used the online version of thedailyplate for a while.  Switched recently to this app.  It is awesome.  Let's me track much more easily as I go through the day.

title: Highly recommend
body: I highly recommend this app because its easy to use and it helps me realize how much i ate before using this. It helps me keep my goals in reach and brings me closer to them.

title: Better than before!
body: Loved this app before and now it's time to diet again and it's been a year and the app is better than ever! I am really excited to lose weight!!! Thanks livestrong!

title: App update disappointing
body: The app is great overall. I rely on it daily for tracking my intake. The latest update changed the balance of carbs/protein/fat from showing in percentages to grams now. I really need the percentages! Also, iPhone users can't read posts in the community...they're all cut off. Great app, but needs work.

title: Great app!
body: Super helpful! Keeps you on track! The daily alert if you don't track is annoying, but if you go into settings you can turn it off. My favorite lifestyle app by far!

title: Best I've tried
body: This app is great for tracking calories and exercise. The food library is huge and you can even scan the barcodes of lots of packaged foods. It's helped me greatly and I use it everyday.

title: Good interface but nutritional info is wrong
body: First the good:

title: Useful App
body: So far so good.  I have only used this app for a week, but I have yet found a food that is not on their lists.  It allows you to add custom meals which certainly should save time down the road.

title: Easy to use
body: Good app, easy to locate and enter food / menu items, as well as activities. The new update added a better breakdown of daily nutrition categories. All in all, very pleased with this app, it makes it simple to monitor my calorie goals.

title: Continuous improvement
body: They keep doing some good work on this app. Love how it now feeds daily step data automatically into exercise calculation.

title: Great for losing weight
body: With my busy schedule I was still able to drop 6 lbs in the right places! Very easy app that makes you think before you shove food in your face

title: Awesome!
body: My roommate and I are in a biggest loser competition together and we both use this to keep track I our diets! Really user friendly and helpful when you're not sure how to classify food!

title: Can't wait to lose weight!
body: Sportstracker was my favorite app until I started using this today! So easy, so user-friendly to be conscious of what you eat. So much fun to lose weight... I hope.

title: M
body: I really like this app. so easy to use. It is easy to find the foods you've eaten, or input food information of foods not listed yet. I also like the points you earn that you can use for gift cards.

title: Absolutely love this app!
body: Very helpful and love the points for adding my meals! Plus I used my rewards points towards entering giveaways! Keeps me motivated! Just wish I could ADD exercises. I don't know how many calories I burn in certain exercises.

title: Awesome tracking system
body: I track my calories almost everyday. I just started using this app a week ago though but this app has already helped me maintain my dietary needs.

title: Easy and clear
body: This makes tracking calories easy. The immediate calorie feedback when changing serving sizes is perfect. Great app and switching to this away from another very popular calorie tracker app.

title: Only one complaint.
body: The app is easy to use. I like the homepage - easy to see your meals at a glance. I jut wish it had a barcode scanner. If you never eat food from a box, this would be great. I still use some convenience foods, though, so it would be nice.

title: Can't find foods
body: Great app but after I search a food it won't "find" them. Example: search cottage cheese. All the different kinda show up but then when I click on one, the list is blank. Anyone else having this problem?

title: Awesome!!
body: It's definitely one of the best calorie tracking apps out there. I love the new scanner, so I can just scan food packages without having to look them up. :) Definitely worth getting

title: Can't even get a profile saved
body: This app sounds great but I can't even get started. After downloading it I tried several times to save my profile information to get started and it wouldn't work. I even closed out of the app and made sure my OS was updated and it still didn't work. After 6 times of trying to get a profile saved, I think I burned a few calories so at least there's that.

title: Awesome!
body: Awesome app! makes calorie counting easy with an incredibly huge database of foods plus it saves your frequently and recently eaten foods to make them easy to find and log. I would definitely recommend this app!

title: Love it
body: I think this app has everything I am looking for. It has a way to track calories, exercise, and water consumption. It even tells me how many calories I can eat to reach my goal!

title: Nice App
body: I like the large food database. It makes tracking calories so much easier. The exercise calorie information being part of tracking calories is also really nice.

title: Pretty good, but lacking a few things
body: Food tracking -

title: Love the online version, HATE! The app.
body: I've been using the online version for a while now and love it. I just got a new phone last week so this was the first app I bought because I thought it would be like the online one. Boy oh boy was I wrong.

title: Livestrong
body: I Loooove it! Not only because it's easy to use and track my daily intake but it also had the nutritional information on many of the brands and multicultural items. It's just great!

title: Great app
body: It's great to be able to be more mindful of what I am eating.  I wish that the frequently eaten items and recently eaten items were sorted alphabetically, that I could enter measurements (1tbsp vs. 1/4 of a 1 cup serving) as well a the servings it currently allows, and to save the diary of what I have eaten each day.

title: Easy to use, great for monitoring your diet.
body: Certain things you have to pay for, but as far as your caloric intake and macros, what I feel most people need to monitor anyway, it's great. Easy as hell to use.

title: Best Logging app
body: I've had this for a few days and I'm in love with it!!! It has every product you can think of, and is so organized. I highly recommend it :)

title: Great app
body: I use it daily and it has helped me see my caloric intake.

title: Best calorie counting app out there
body: This is my third calorie counting app and so far my favorite. The daily layout is clean and well organized and it has the largest list of searchable foods. I also like the different graph views. So far, so good.

title: Love!!
body: This app has made my type 1 diabetes management so much easier because I can see the carbs and fiber in my food in one place all added up. I am addicted to planning and counting thanks to livestrong!

title: MyPlate MyFriend
body: My doctor recommended I track my food.  I tried a few other apps but Myplate exceeds all.  Easy to use; a great inventory of food listings.  Most importantly, it is compatible with my iOS devices.  I absolutely love this app!

title: Can't erase a mistake with performed exercise adder?
body: I love this app but there is no way to erase an entry made by mistake when entering recently performed exercise.  If you press a exercise by mistake it counts it permanently and you can not change it.   Please this needs to be fixed.  It works with the health app just fine.  Just beware when entering performed exercises!

title: Adding your own food
body: I wish you could add the amount of cholesterol, sugar, sodium, saturated fat, etc. when you add your own food. I never really know how much I've had of these when looking at the graphs because I cannot log it in the meals I made myself. Otherwise, the app is nice and easy to use.

title: Love this app!
body: I really like everything about this app. Love the way you can scan barcodes to get nutritional information and calories. It's great! Makes me very aware of food consumption throughout the day.

title: So far so good
body: I've been using this for 3 days. It's easy and almost fun. I love the way it tracks your water. I use a second ap to figure out how many calories I've burned, it'd be nice if that was built in but hey it's free!!
response: Hello thank you for your review! MyPlate syncs with the Apple HealthKit to track calories burned through steps. You can also enter calories burned by clicking on the Exercise tab of your Tracker! Please feel free to email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions :)

title: Great tracker app!
body: Love this app! The only thing that I would change would be the earlier versions ability to see what you have eaten for the at a glance/quick scroll.

title: Awesome app
body: I used this app to keep track of food while trying to lose weight. It was great. Started at 207 and dropped to 167. Granted the app wasn't the direct reason for this, but it helped me maintain my focus and goals.

title: Best app ever!
body: Does everything I need! Thank you ! Try this app! The only app that I actually stick with! Way to go finally! I can keep track of my health and make healthier choices ! And enjoy doing it!

title: Was an excellent app, now crashes everyday
body: It has a good database and very good health app integration.

title: It works!!
body: I'm not a fan of eating really healthy. But I was able to use this app to help me along. With discipline to exercise and follow the app I lost wright and look amazing for 40 years old. I would suggest this app to anyone. Thanks.

title: Newbie, but seems simple and helpful so far
body: Just loaded but it already seems way easier than the weight watchers app.  And it does not cost me every month to be a member.  Thanks Livestrong!

title: Really good but could be better
body: Really good but could be better because not all types of food are added on this app. The app has improved dramatically over the past 6 months and soon might be worth 5 stars.

title: Great app
body: Great way to stay on track without the worries, keeps everything up to date for you, friendly reminders, progress reports to keep you motivated.

title: Useful well thought out app
body: The app is straightforward. It allows going back and filling in meals you missed. You tell it the food and it tells you the carbs, calories, fat and protein. It is easy to use

title: Awesome!!
body: This app has been a great aid in my weight-loss journey. Being able to track calories, food, exercises, and even water intake is so beneficial. Must have if you are serious about weight shedding.

title: Great app for diets
body: Use this to count calories and record my exercises, totally solid and works great...they fixed the crazy thing that was going on with the switching accounts, it's back to normal!

title: Loved this app for a long time, won't work on iphone 6 now :(
body: The app designers really need to get to fixing the app....it wont even open on my iphone 6. I can't be the only one dealing with this problem, and it has happened before with a previous update too. Please fix it again!

title: So Simple!
body: This app is such an easy way to track your dietary intake. Regardless of whether you want to lose, gain, maintain, or track macros. My Plate is a simple tool that is easy to use as well as convenient.

title: Great for tracking
body: I've just started using this app last week but it has made me way more conscious about my food and calorie intake. The community is great also for support and advice :)

title: Quick and easy
body: So far so good...just having this app keeps me on track...fairly easy and simple to use - but the barcode scanner is missing quite a few foods...or it may be because I use store brand products.

title: Love. It!
body: Makes a difference in trying to live a healthy lifestyle - when you are able to track your day. Then you can see how what you do & eat actually affects you!

title: Love this app!!
body: This is a great app. Very user friendly and I love that it is backed up to the internet site. Many if the foods I eat are on the calorie tracker already.  I gave it 4 stars because I wish it had a way to track measurements on the app or on the website.

title: Awesome, AWEsome, AWESOME APP!!!
body: Accountability!!  This app makes it so convenient to track your choices!  You start paying attention to what you're eating and before you know it, you've lost 10lbs!

title: Very helpful
body: This app has helped me stay on track with my goals. it remembers everything for me which makes it a lot easier to know what you've eaten, how many calories it had, and how many you have left for the day.

Been using the livestrong interface since 2011. It's part of my daily routine. However, make it to where we can remove our community posts and type in the sized serving or portion for it to be more accurate. Thanks

title: Been using myplate for a while
body: Best food and fitness tracker. Been using the desktop version and now will be tracking on my phone. Live strong and be healthy!

title: Great app for tracking foods
body: I am New to the app but so far it is a great app to track your food consumption and exercise log. I have high cholesterol and high blood sugar and needing a life charger and this is a great way for me to start tracking my intake.

title: Great app
body: This app is so easy to use and it is so convenient! I have really liked it. You can get as much or little community support as you want. I am pretty excited to use this to help me stay healthy

title: GREAT!
body: amazing app! helps keep track of all the calories you eat, snacks, and helps you realize the value of getting in exercise! has a little bit of thinking involved, but that's the best part!

title: Awesome App!
body: I love the easiness of using this app! It has just the right amount of stuff you need! Not too much! A few crash bugs could be fixed but it only happens occasionally!

title: Needs work
body: I had high hopes for this app but unfortunately it fell short of my expectations. The dietary facts on several items are actually wrong, and not just slightly. Some of the calculated mutational values are off by immense amounts. There is no option to manually scan the barcodes on food items, leading me to believe Livestrong's food database isn't as large as it should be.

title: This app was once awesome...
body: I loved this app when it first came out - it was simple and concise. It helped me count and track calories (based on brand and portion size), breaking the calories down into carbs, fats, and protein. But the "upgrades" made this app OVERLY complicated - only someone with NO life could spend so much time focused on so many details. I check back in periodically to see if they've made improvements to this app, but sadly they haven't...

title: Easiest Way to keep track:)
body: Ive downloaded alot of apps like this and all of them were either complicated or you had to buy stuff! This is the best app Ive ever used for calorie tracking! I RECOMMEND it!‚ù§‚ù§üëå‚ù§‚ù§

title: Amazing
body: I love it

title: Yay!!
body: This app it the best! I've lost most of the mommy weight after my 3rd child. Finally I can track my calories and eat what I want, and avoid what I need to! 5 pounds to go and I'm at high school weight! Make sure you exercise though, it's what's really keeping it off!

title: Needs tweaking
body: I love the app and how easy it is to put my food choices in the system, but EVERY day I have to reset my goal. It keeps putting me back to maintain my weight when I want to loose two pounds. Please fix this and then I will upgrade.

title: Live strong
body: I'm actually gaining weight and going through my bulking stage and this app is a really big help with watching my calories , carbs and protein !!! Plus you can chat with other people about fitness. Great app love it 5 stars

title: Great incentives!
body: Has small tasks to complete every day for points, main goals for over time and tools like the actual website, plus the buddy system support! Love it so far!

title: Love it!
body: I use this app everyday because it helps to keep me accountable for what I am and am not doing. The only thing I wish were different would be the addition of a carb counter. Being diabetic, carb counting is crucial.

title: Love app, a few suggestions.
body: This is a great app for monitoring your diet. Its reallylly, it's the best one I've used. However, as a avid user, I think it could use a few changes including:

title: Easy
body: This app makes keeping a food diary very easy.  Lets you see your weight progress and automatically shows in pie graph your percentage of fats, proteins, and carbs.  Nearly every food (including Aldi brands!) included in database.

title: Great Job!!!!
body: I have to admit this app is so helpful, never in my life I have ever paid attention or was aware of what I put in my body. With this tool it helps me stay aware and keeps me accountable. Track, Track, Track is the key to weight loss success along with moderate exercise.

title: LOVE THIS APP!!!!
body: This app has helped me hydrate more because I am a swimmer and need to keep my hydration in tact. I love how it shows your progress and gives you new points almost everyday. I would definitely recommend this app for anyone trying to keep in shape or just any athlete.

title: Good app
body: So far i like the app! I have only used it for a day but im hoping to lose enough weight before the ball im going too! Only problem is( i know this because my bf uses this) is it sounds like you will lose two pounds a week but thats jut a goal not a guarantee.

title: In love
body: Just downloaded the app today and it is so easy to use. Looking forward to daily use! Tried other apps but they weren't nearly as convenient to use.

title: Great start
body: If you want to start eating healthy and be aware of your calorie intake, this is a great first step. However, it still requires will and self awareness, this isn't a personal trainer app or a miracle maker.  Some foods are missing but the is a big  variety in the options.

title: mPoints bug needs fixed
body: I love being able to track what I eat, but whenever I go to "more" and try to view my achievements under mPoints it won't let me. Please fix this so I can actually access my mPoints achievements.

title: Inconsistent data
body: I love fitness pal. I have already lost 9 pounds in the past month with it. However, it bothers me that there are multiple items with different calorie values, so I don't know which one to use. Sometimes I have to go to the restaurant's website to make the last call. Please fix!

title: Awesome
body: Awesome program  has helped me stay on track with my goals. If i go over my calories i work out a little longer am seeing results after two weeks is great

title: Super easy to use!
body: My one complaint is that there's not a "scan" feature like other calorie tracking apps have; other than that, it's by far the easiest to use and has the most extensive food database!

title: Great app!
body: Used the online version for some time now, but the app makes it easier and faster to track calories away from home and stick to your diet while on vacation!  Easy to use, love the layout, and the rewards!

title: Excellent!
body: Was concerned about starting a new online with loss program, but the amount of foods in the database and the ease of finding exercises has made the transition SO easy.

title: Live Strong
body: This ap is really great! I've been using it for a week and it has so much information. It makes things really easy to track and understand.

title: Pretty good for food tracking
body: Graphics are nice and the library of foods is nice. It will find pretty much anything i search. Basic food info comes with each food item. The graph of carb/fat/protein % for each day is great too. But, it doesn't add up total carb/fat/protein by grams for the day so you'll have to do some adding. All in all a good app.

title: Easy
body: Like this app more than others to track exercise and calories. Easy to use and the database of foods and beverages has just about everything you need!

title: Great app
body: This app has helped me lower my intake and lose weight. The simplicity of it is perfect. Too many reviewers are slamming it for not tracking carbs, fat... If you want more, get one of the apps you pay for. For a free app, this is perfect.

title: Love this app. Helped me lose ten pounds
body: Easy to use and effective. I didn't realize how many empty calories I was eating. Using this helped me lose more weight than any confining diet or exercise plan has in the past.

title: Great App
body: The app is excellent to capture what you eat with a good database for food sources. I would like to see the capabilities to include the type of vitamins in the selected food, better graphs, and little icons next to the food selected.

title: Used it for years
body: I've used this site/app for years. I like that from the website, you can enter complete recipes and meals that are regularly eaten. It doesn't have everything but you can enter manually.

title: Great....but
body: All around great app the only issue I have is for the app is that when I go to manually enter calories burn they never save. When I go to renter the app it will have the name of the workout I entered but it will drop to zero. Please fix so I can be accurate!

title: Great App
body: This app has a great interface and is simple to use. If used faithfully, it will help you lose weight in a healthy and sustainable way. This app actually makes it fun to track progress.

title: Awesome app
body: Very wonderful app, everything you need , easy to navigate. Has every food you can think of , and the barcode scanner is amazing! Works best with good internet/wifi signal .

title: LOVE this app!!
body: My Plate is great not only for keeping track of calories, but you can track how much water you drink, your weight, and your daily exercise/activity! It's so great to have all of that in one app :)

title: Pretty good
body: Have tried a few of these calorie tracking apps... like the look of this one but wish you could add more easily add reoccurring items... also wish you could search nearby restaurants for foods.

title: Works well for me.
body: I've used the app off and on over the years and it has been very consistent.  I think the changes in the most recent update are fine.  Everything I need the app to do for me, it does.

title: Frustrating to use and poor UI
body: First, a recent redesign ended up NOT presenting the total protein, fat, and carb intake each day. Very frustrating, and why I'm choosing a different app.

title: So far so good
body: I've been pleasantly surprised at the amount of data that it provides. This application competes quite well with others that track calorie count.

title: Love this app but check everything
body: So I input everything I intake, but I noticed that most barcodes that I scan isn't associated with the actual product or the portion sizes & calories.

title: Love it
body: This is really going to help me not only lose weight but maintain my weight. I can't wait to continue my on going mission to eat healthier this app is great for all those goals. I highly recommend it. :)

title: Why keep deleting?
body: I love this app cuz I am actually losing weight, but all my previous day's food charting deletes at the start of the next day (when I look at stats for yesterday, stats are gone).  Am I the only one this happens to (5S). Has only been happening since the apple watch update. That's why the 3 stars...

title: Down 50lbs in 6 months!
body: Great app! Lost 50 lbs since November by making myself accountable for what I eat and learning what an actual serving size really is. Easy to use and now is just a part of my day!

title: Pretty great, needs a few extra good options
body: I love using this. I sometimes eat something I can't find and I wish the database had a few more options. But overall it's a great tool to keep myself on track!

title: Great app
body: Really helps keep your diet in line and on track. Easy to track foods and it saves your recent foods so you don't have to search for the same things every day.

title: Best app ever!!
body: I never write reviews for apps simply because they never deserve one! But not this app! This app is phenomenal! Better than "My Fitness Pal" in my opinion! Very clean and easy to use. I will be using this app for a long time.

title: Complete
body: Everything you need for a basic tracking program and more.

title: I needed this
body: This is what I've needed for the past few years, have been trying to be very conscious of intake but on my own it is too hard. It's easy to use so far

title: Best cal counting app
body: Very easy to use, and takes a lot of the work out of calorie counting. I really enjoy the words of encouragement reminders that pop up. Would give 5 stars but the log water requires a separate app which is annoying.

title: Awesome tracker!
body: This is my favorite tracking app. Love the nutritional breakdown and the ability to customize nutrient and weight goals. I have the paid version and it is completely worth the small annual fee.

title: Cannot delete recorded food items?
body: Overall decent app, it's laid out nicely and is easy to use, but it's frustrating that I cannot delete foods that I've already recorded from my phone. Often I end up not eating the full serving or a meal plan changes, so this makes it hard to plan my calories for the day from my mobile device.

title: Handy
body: I really like having the app to take with me everywhere. It keeps my calories in check. WISHING they could read all barcodes but love that feature anyhow. I would recommend it.

title: I like this app
body: I haven't used it for very long but so far I like it. It keeps changing my goals by itself but that might be my network causing it not to be able to sync! Otherwise this app is good for visuality of calorie control! Thumbs up

title: Love!
body: I'm trying to stick to 1200 cal a day and so far it's so helpful even want to go out to eat I can quickly search meals to find the calorie count and I stay on track I'm in love with this new app it's great!

title: Handy and helpful
body: Over the past few weeks I‚Äôve totally changed the way I eat, and I‚Äôve got to attribute it to this app. Well-designed and useful to my life, and at an unbeatable price.

title: App crash caused discouragement
body: App was good (not perfect because nutrition information was flawed at times & the scanner was hit or miss) and made it easy to track my fitness & nutrition daily. However then the app crashed and everything was wiped out - weeks of daily logging and input of my  meals. This is discouraging - hope they fix the issues soon.

title: Great app!!!
body: Recommend this app for gaining/losing weight. Helps to track weight, calorie intake, exercise, and water intake. The online community is very helpful, which is another feature...the ability to message others or respond.

title: The best
body: There are few rivals to this fantastic ecosystem that LiveStrong has created. An exceptional community backs this app which boasts a top-notch interface and many features that aren't quite there with other trackers.

title: Helpful for someone who is lost
body: I'm really pleased with all the foods

title: Very Good
body: Great interface. Good library. Notifications are not smart, for example even after breakfast is entered sometime during the morning it will remind me to enter breakfast. Same for lunch and dinner. App should know an item is entered instead of sending a needless reminder.

title: Love this app
body: Don't know if there are better apps out there for tracking calories, at this point however, I don't care about the rest. Livestrong's app is literally changing my life.

title: Perfect
body: Exactly what I needed to start working out and eating right and be able to see the numbers and charts in black and white. The community is awesome too and is always really supportive along the way!!

title: Awesome
body: This app is easy to use, and keeps you honest! I feel guilty when I have not tracked and my alarm goes off!! After using this app for a a while it becomes habit to control your portions! Love it!

title: Worth It!!!!
body: This app works well, huge food database, is very effective in helping meet personal goals by objectively tracking what I eat helping me see flawed patterns in my daily eating habits that I can easily fix!!

title: Great!!
body: I'm new to using this app but I love it. It doesn't give me caloric intake off my basic height & weight but also factors in my activity level. I can't wait to see to see the additional benefits of this app.

title: Watch what you eat
body: This app is very handy to watch your weight and measure the calories and exercise and you get m points, which are nice, but they inundate me with commercials and surveys.  You get m points for watching or responding to them and they are short compared to TV.

title: Great App!
body: I love this app. Anything that makes me more aware of my calorie intake is beneficial. I love the database for foods also.  So far I have been able to find the values for everything!

title: I don't know how this got such high ratings
body: Basically, this app is absolutely terrible. The serving sizes are all very hard to understand, as in measuring steak in cups, etc. Also, it is very hard to find homemade food on here, all there is restaurants, food, and if I'm trying to lose weight, I'm gonna eat homemade food! If you eat at restaurants every meal, then this app will be useful, but if you ever have homemade food, then you're out of luck!

title: Latest upgrade - fail
body: I've used this for 3 years, lost and kept off 30 pounds. The new upgrades need to be fixed. It won't change my intake as I change my weight. When my weight creeps up and I switch from maintain to lose - It tells me my weight goals are unhealthy (one lb/wk), and it also changed my gender to male!!  Please change it back!

title: Great App!
body: I have been using the app for almost a year now. I started using the website first. It has been very helpful in making me more aware of my food choices.

title: A few ideas
body: I mostly like this app and find it really useful and encouraging. Improvements would be a barcode scanner, more exercise options, and more verifiable calorie counts - most seem accurate but some seem off.

title: Wonderfully free & Great.
body: WeightWatchers mobile was what I was doing, but sometimes people can't always afford what they want. This has been a blessing for me. Thank you for this app. I'm enjoying all it has to offer.

title: Great incentives!
body: Has small tasks to complete every day for points, main goals for over time and tools like the actual website, plus the buddy system support! Love it so far!

title: Review
body: Great , lot of help if you are trying to loose weight. It is very useful!!                     Now that I am getting the hang of this,it is one of the best ways to keep up with your calories,weight,exercise etc. Fantastic!!!!

title: Aware
body: This app really makes you aware of what you're eating and not eating, as well as how active you are.

title: Awesome
body: It's clean simple and works. Nothing better than an easy to use, straightforward app to keep you on track without feeling like a chore or hassle. Perfect for all levels of health and fitness.

title: Trying to Lose Weight
body: It's a really great app(: It helps with counting calories, and it even helps keep track of excercise. So you can eat and lose calories and know how much you lose. (:

title: Too narrow of focus for me
body: Great app if you have one goal: to lose or gain weight. But other goals can't be tracked. I am on a fast/feed diet and cannot track that kind of diet with the app. Every other day I consume 550 calories. This app won't allow any day under 800.  Silly!

title: Must have!!
body: This app is perfect for all shapes and sizes looking to lose weight, maintain weight and even gain weight! I would so recommend it to anyone, it works for me and it will most likely work for you!

title: Great App
body: This app is terrific! Easy to use, has the calorie content of almost everything and has given me a reality check on my eating habits so I could make the changes I needed to meet my goals.

title: Awesome App!!
body: Awesome App! Allows you to hold yourself accountable while rewarding you for your efforts! For those of us trying to lose weight, maintain workout goals, or just keep track of your healthy lifestyle, this is THE App for you!!!
Very easy to use. Color coding on monthly calendar allows me to see how often I stick to my daily goal. Being able to set a daily reminder time is great as well.

title: Who change the app
body: I did love this app, and used it faithfully. But yesterday somebody changed the app. It is a horrible change. It is not easier to use, It looks like a child may have put it together. Please change it back so I do not have to find another tracker for my meals.

title: I'll really miss this app
body: I used this app for almost a year and I really loved the layout and UI- having the pie chart in the forefront was great. However, in the past couple updates it has been completely changed and no longer even allows you to see a basic summary of all your nutrients that includes sugar or saturated fats. I've moved over to LoseIt now but I'll still miss the old version of this app.

title: The best I found
body: I tried 3 or 4 different calorie counters and this is by far the best. Full library of look ups to search, easy to use and nice graphics. Good interface with Apple health apps.

title: Love it
body: I love this app!! My son is a trainer told me to use this. My Fitbit died got a Fitbit watch that I love but it's dying too & I don't have money to replace it. So this is perfect!! Won't keep track of my steps but makes me mindful of what I eat & do!!

title: Great free app!
body: So easy to keep track of food, water and exercise. I really love the scan options. It makes it so easy to record daily intake. Give it a try! It's free, you can't go wrong with that!

title: Great free app
body: I use this app everyday and love how I can easily keep track of how many calories I consume. The only issue I have with the app is the upgrade price. If this was a one time upgrade purchase, I would happily pay. However, the options vary from $3.75-$9.99/month. That's ridiculous.

title: Makes it easy
body: Tracking the quantity and type of calories was too much time and effort. Not any more. The ability to dial in on percentages for fat carbs and protein are terrific. This is a must have app.

title: Can't Customize Well
body: The scanner feature with this app definitely needs some work. The first time it got the food plain wrong, and the second time it uploaded the stats saying that 1/2 cup of oatmeal had over 4,800 calories. The app looks nice and seems easy to interface with, but this upload feature pales in comparison to MyFitnessPal's.
response: Hello! Thank you for your review and feedback! We will certainly pass this on to our development team.

title: Good app, getting better all of the time
body: I would love to see an interface with Endomondo and other activity trackers like Fit Bit. The library of foods continues to expand. Love the barcode scanning capability is wonderful and usually works well.

title: Promising, needs bug fixes
body: I prefer the interface of this app to the others I've tried as it is attractive and easy to use, and the main functionality I need is free. Unfortunately it has some bugs like not remembering my login and writing duplicate data to the Health app.

title: Crashes when opening
body: I've been using this app for months and I absolutely love it, but for the past 2 weeks I haven't been able to track anything because it crashes every time I try to open it. Just needs a bug fix

title: Very helpful
body: This app has been useful in tracking calories and nutrition.  I like the product scanner, and the ability to adjust macronutrients.  It would be cool to be able to set cholesterol to zero, though...not all of us consume it :)

title: Great!
body: Easy to use. Very in depth tracking day by day. I notice I get the best weight loss results using this App because it tracks my eating and exercise habits/choices and helps me make better choices.

title: Easy to use
body: This app is a great tool! It def got me thinking about what I'm eating and how much water I get. Tracking food is so easy especially when you can scan a barcode.

title: Doctor recommended
body: Actually my doctor recommended this app to me. He uses it as well. I love the simplicity of this app and it is perfect for me. Easy to track and find the menu items.

title: It could be better
body: I wish it allowed me to enter 1.43 oz of chicken. It only allows fractions as small as 1/4. I also wished it would remember  the values I use. I.e. that when I enter salad, I use 1.5 cups of lettuce. These two features would make this a 5-star app.

title: So helpful
body: Super simple well designed app to help manage what you eat. A month into using it I'm down 10lbs because I am more aware of what I eat. Helps me say no to treats if I've already had enough.

title: Searching
body: I love this app. However lately I haven't been able to search anything. As you can imagine this makes it hard to track anything. I would love to continue using this app.

title: Perfect
body: I've used app for one week.  Perfect for tracking calories - not an exercise program.  While you can create/record exercises, they are not all stored already like foods are.

title: Better than others
body: Unlike other food tracking apps it makes me feel accomplished that I have eaten a good meal and encourages me to eat better, live better and thrive wile doing it !

title: Annoying Ads... Great App
body: This app has been great. I've been using My Plate for 2 years now and just recently added the app to my phone. The problem is the ads are the bottoms of the screen on my phone. I would pay for a non-ad app!!

title: Pretty Great Overall
body: The only suggestion I would make is to allow the widget to scan food items. Otherwise I prefer it to Lose It app

title: Totally worth it!
body: I like how user friendly and non-complicated it is. Especially when you just want it basic and straight forward.

title: Great app.  Use to track my Diet
body: Love this app.  Use it everyday to track my calories.  Funny how you eat less when you do the Math and see what you are eating.  Easy to use.  Comprehensive list of Foods. Helping me get to my Running Weight.  Highly recommend.

title: Great food tracker app
body: Great app at first I was a bit confuse but with in a week I got the hang of it. It has a great extensive amount of foods to chose from and allows you to see information on their nutritional value. üëå

title: Great app for the everyday girl
body: I'm not trying to lose nor gain any weight but this app does keep me aware of my nutrition and what I put in my body everyday . Been using it for almost 2 years now ! ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Love
body: I love this app, it helps keep me on track and focusing on my goal! There are a huge variety of foods to already chose from so it's pretty convenient when trying to calorie count

title: Great tool
body: Has most of the things I look for and is really easy to use and keep up with with reminders. I live he scan option. Helps me really log what I eat.

title: Great app!
body: This app has been so beneficial! It has really helped me become more aware of what I'm eating, how much nutrition it really has and portion sizes! I would recommend to anyone trying to change their eating habits.

title: Love This App
body: Live Strong is great.  It's easier to use than many similar programs and the scan feature is so convenient!  I would highly recommend this app.

title: Rating
body: This app is awesome it works really well. The thing i like the most is that it reminds you to keep track of what you eat. You will never forget to write it down.

title: Genius
body: I cannot believe how amazing and easy to use this app is, the reminder really comes in handy when you forget to track, I am so happy I discovered this wonderful app

title: Wow
body: Really good I haven't seen this good if a calorie tracker and there is a little social area but no one really tries to show off their body and make otherwise people feel intimidated. This is just all around a great app with just a few minor flaws!

title: Lost data after app crashed
body: Lost all my data after the app crashed. A force sync did not restore the data. Had read similar complaints by other users but the latest version does not seem to have fixed the issue. Am going to discontinue using the app until the bug is fixed.

title: Excellent
body: Excellent app, but it would be nice if there could be a lock on it. Lots of my friends go on my phone, and it would be nice to keep this app secure and having a passcode only allows me to access it.

title: Really like this app.
body: I've been using this app for a month, and I really like it. I like that I can track different aspects of my diet. Carbohydrates and calories are two I use. Being able to add exercise is a big plus for me too. A really good app.

title: Great for some things- needs a little improvement
body: I dig the app for basic calorie and nutrition tracking, however I wish they'd improve upon the daily percentages for protein, carbs and fat. The exercise tracker is a bit inflexible but I can deal with it.

title: Can't create account
body: Every time I try to create an account it tells me that "the email already in use"... But it's not because it's my email. So I do the "reset password" and it doesn't send to my email. Have been trying to log in for twenty minutes and doesn't do anything. I've also tried another email and same thing. So dumb

title: Great app, has helped
body: Makes calorie counting easy for me, and in turn useful. There's a progress chart on here that shows your day to day weight. Feels good to keep track of your weight loss

title: Awesome food tracker
body: This app is easy to use and calculates your calories automatically. There is a search button for foods which makes entering your meals fast and easy. Over all I love this app!

title: Best diet app
body: This is easily the best diet app I've ever used. Easy to use, giant database, weight tracker, and everything you could need to hold yourself accountable for what you eat. Helped me lose 30 pounds in the last seven weeks.

title: Great!
body: Works great! Could have better weight lose options like 5 in one month instead of per week but good way to keep track anyways

title: Wow!
body: I haven't used apps like this before, but couldn't be happier I stumbled upon this one. You set your goals, and it reminds you if you haven't logged anything for the day. Awesome app, I highly recommend!

title: Addiction
body: WOW! I love it! This is so much fun. It's rather addicting. This app helps you become more aware of what your putting into you body and the amount. It helps if you weigh or measure everything to get an idea how much amounts are.  GOOD LUCK, and enjoy.

title: Please fix
body: I like it but it keeps resetting  my goal of losing 2 lbs a week back to maintaining my weight. It dose it every day and it's getting annoying. I don't want to but I'm thinking about using another app if it's not fixed soon.

title: Great help
body: I'm someone out of the usual, an by that I mean I've been struggling to gain weight without tracking my meals. This app is seemingly by far the most useful calorie tracker I downloaded, and I'm hoping to see great results

title: Perfect app for keeping track of your calories!!
body: Alright this app is amazing! Really easy to keep track of your calories from breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Simply put, just get this app. You know you want to.

title: Freezes, then crashed
body: Helpful app, gives you history of weight and calories but not nutrients. Freezes frequently and then crashed last night, lost weeks of info. Food data base is close to useless, check out My Fitness Pal for a really good one.

title: Good app but still room for improvements
body: Seems to be more foods and meals listed on main web page than the app, however it is easy to navigate and allows me to easily track my foods, exercise and water intake

title: Good app. Easy to use
body: Overall good app to track intake and exercise calories. Hope food search feature improves with guessing based on spelling and not erasing what you typed when going back to the search page.

title: So simple! Fast!
body: This is the best tracker out there! I've tried many and this one is the fastest and easiest to use, plus the points allow you to earn gift cards to local merchants. Perfect!!

title: Great app!
body: This app is very easy to use and has helped me keep track of both my calories and exercise all in once place! I would recommend it to everyone.

title: Wonderful App!!
body: I love this app because it is easy and very useful! Log your food everyday and the app does the rests! It's working wonders  keeping me on the right track. Would highly recommend :) !

title: Good.
body: The older version of the app had calorie entries for activities like, "raking" or "vacuuming,". The updates version doesn't and I miss it.  Other than that it works great.  I just use it to count calories.  I can't give feedback on the networking features.

title: This app is neat!!!
body: I personally enjoy this app better than the rest for tracking my calories and progress. The layout is really neat and the ease of it is even better strongly recommend it!

title: Overall it's fine, but DEFINITELY needs fixes
body: I like the layout, the rewards, and the community feel. However, the darned thing crashes so much, and when I try to click on the achievements tab, it crashes again. Please fix these bugs!

title: Amazing
body: It has really helped me realize how much I was over eating... It is also great how you can chat with people in your community about what they like to eat to keep the calories down üëç

title: Love this app
body: This is a great app! So easy to use!!! I love how everything is in just a click, you don't have to scroll through to find where you need to be :) plus you earn prizes!

title: Livestrong
body: Great way to track your calories without trying to add them up at the end of the day.  You have better control so you will be less likely to overeat.

title: Can't believe it's free!!!
body: It has every food you can think of listed with calories; brand name foods, popular restaurants, and unique recipes. I love that even the free version reminds you to track your food.

title: Accessible & Practical
body: This program allows users to input their goals and personal stats. It uses these stats to create a calorie per day plan. The caveat: you must be honest about your activity levels and food consumption or it will fail you.

title: Great app
