body: This has been a great free way for me to diary my food and water intake. It was a real eye opener as to true calories and nutrient percentages. I am considering signing up for the 6months for more info. I have recommended to several others.

title: Great tracker but needs a wider food database
body: It's a great way to track what you're eating. I found out though that I still have to enter the calorie count manually for most common food items. The entries should also be accurate enough.

title: Finally!
body: There's finally a macronutrient breakdown page that allows us to see everything. Thank you for this. Great improvement.

title: No thanks
body: I have myfitnesspal and really like it. I thought I would this one a shot. I couldn't even get registered! Every time I put an email in, it said one already existed. So, I requested a password reset. I kept getting an error message and when it finally processed, I never received an email for a password reset. If I can't even get started, it's not worth it. I deleted the app within the hour.
response: Hi there, we're so sorry for the inconvenience. We've resolved this issue and you should have no trouble registering! Please feel free to email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions.

title: Good, except calories burned are all wrong
body: I began using this app today and am surprised that it's mis-adding the calories burned from HealthKit. It's taking the updates as new days, e.g. I burn 500, it's fine. But I burn another 50 (HealthKit shows 550) and this app adds them all so I'm up to 1050. (I wish I could exercise with so little effort!).
response: Hi Matthew! We're sorry for the trouble you're having with Healthkit! If you are noticing Healthkit is sending over a large number of calories burned, you will need to reset the sync with MyPlate:

title: Love it
body: I like it because I have an event tracking my food ever since I signed up and I have been making food noon and he's been really good and I hope they enjoyed it some more

title: Down 40 headed to BMI of 24
body: Without the discipline afforded by this app, we would not have had this successful result. Last time at this weight...over 30 years ago!!! Thank you!

title: Great at tracking calories
body: Easy to use and very complete. Only took a star off because the calories burned calculator sometimes doesn't pull in data from other apps like it is supposed to.

title: Love this app!
body: Very user-friendly, much easier than my fit pal. Exercises are great, but I really love the tracking. Have lost 8 pounds simply by logging the food and see The amount of protein, carbs, and fat!

title: Used to be great until it chewed up my data
body: I've been using this app for two years and as a fitness coach, I've recommended it to many. Before last week, I would have given this app 5 stars......

title: Tracking
body: There have been many days where I take 5000 or more steps and the app says I have burned zero calories from that. Also when I go to open the app it will say I've burned 1000 when I've done nothing that day, other than that the app it pretty useful.

title: Great tool!
body: I'm 38 years old, using the tool with my Apple Watch, I've managed to get the body I want  in one year! It's easy to loose wait when you know how much your eating and exercising.

title: Great app overall!
body: Great for recording meals daily and water consumption . Love how you can scan the item if you can find them by searching the name . I would recommend!

title: So far so good
body: Love that I can even tell the app what sandwich I ordered from a restaurant and it pulls all the correct info. Super easy to use and a nice look interface on my the phone and the watch. Love it.

title: Scanner
body: Every time I try to scan something it always comes up as an error. Don't want to use this app if I have to manually enter everything. Needs some updates or something

title: Great app!
body: App is very easy to use and it's helping my track my goal weight. You can track your water, snacks, and you can also follow work out videos too.

title: Apple watch activity
body: Love the update that now mimics the calories burned on the apple watch. That was my biggest complaint before. Now I have no complaints about the app. Thank you!

title: Pretty good
body: This is an easy way for me to keep track of my calories and weight management. Although I find it difficult to find certain foods that a restaurant has, or track foods that MyPlate doesn't have registered (yet).

title: Great app. Easy to use.
body: I have used several other food trackers and this is by far the easiest to use and has a user friendly interface.

title: Awesome!!
body: Super easy way to track your calories and your success! The reminders definetly help to keep you on track of logging your food so you can reach your goal!

title: Love the new force touch feature
body: The new force touch feature makes it so much more convenient to log foods.  One request...can you please add snacks to force touch as well.

title: It makes me log in every time!
body: You would think a sophisticated app would be able to remember who I am once it's on my phone. But I have to log in and type my email and password every. single. time I open the app. SO annoying.

title: Great App
body: I have been using this app for 2 days it is great has all the food I have eaten already in the app!! Also I was able to change my profile to fit my need.

title: Awesome app
body: I love that if they don't have what your looking for on there already, you can add it or scan it. Using this in conjunction with the weight watchers app makes a big difference!

title: THE BEST!!
body: This app is great! It's smooth, it's sleek and simple. I love how easy it is to do a search even for something I wouldn't think they would have and be able to track my calories

title: My Plate
body: Love The app has helped me lose weight and my emotional eating is under control need to upgrade to full version just don't have the money at this time Thank you so much üòòüòò

title: *update
body: Was unable to use because of continuous syncing... I thought I'd try logging into the online site as a last effort...it worked and now we're golden üëç

title: Great app. But.
body: When I have to manually put in a food it doesn't ask about fiber or suger or sodium. All things I like to track. Please fix this. Thanks. Other then that great app. Also I would love to see a recipe section to break down a recipe into servings.

title: Best health app
body: Best health app to progress your

title: Freezes
body: I love the app but this is the third time that the app has frozen for good and forced me to uninstall & reinstall! This causes me to lose all my data & have to restart all over again. This is a consistent problem that is occurring through multiple updates. I'm being forced to switch to MyFitnessPal because of this. Don't waste your time until the devs actually fix it!

title: Great app!
body: I've been using this app for years to track my intake. Hands down it has the best food database and it's easy to add new items. Love that it tracks my water and allows me to set custom targets.

title: Imperative!!!!!
body: Whether you're trying to lose, gain or maintain this app shows you just how the calories vs your activity level add up--I'm learning so much about my daily intake and output and its Gold!!!!!!!!

title: Great calorie tracker, like the updates
body: Great calorie tracker--has just about everything you might eat. Exercise expenditure calculations seem off--higher than they should be.

title: Easy Easy
body: This app is a great way to track your intake!!  Easy to use and enjoy the reminders to keep tracking.  If you want to measure your calories this is the app for you.

title: Love the graph each day!
body: I only wish in the free version that you could input measurements especially for bust, hips, and waste.

title: Thanks for the workouts!
body: Been using this app on and off for the past couple years. I love the nutritional breakdown and the new workouts have me using this app more regularly.

title: It forgets?
body: This is a wonderful app, and it tracks my macros really well. However, at times it seems to 'forget' the correct proteins and fats. I plan my meals ahead of time, so this isn't a huge problem, but I would like it to be fixed.

title: Great app!
body: This is a great app for tracking calories, weight and exercise.  Easy to input data and easy to understand.  Ability to scan barcodes of product for quick entry.  Helps keep you on track!!

title: Deleted all my saved history
body: Worked great & this was my favorite calorie, weight, & exercise tracker app until the most recent update. After the update all of my stored history & custom foods were deleted. Now when I try to add items from the search to my plate it won't add them unless I add it to my custom foods first & then add it to my plate from my custom foods. Too time consuming to enter everything I eat manually.

title: So easy!!!
body: I started using this app by a suggestion from a friend about 2wks ago. I've already lost 4lbs! I am a mother of 3 and in the Army and I find this so easy to use. It keeps me on track with my busy life and remembering not only to eat but eat right. I love this app!!!

title: Great app
body: This app is excellent at keeping me on track and helping me reach my goals. It's quick and easy to use. The only thing that needs improvement is entering in the serving sizes. Sometimes the correct measurements are not available.

title: Very useful!
body: Really does a good job of helping me track my weight loss. It has a few minor shortcomings that are described in the other reviews (e.g., inconsistencies with calories burned based on exercise), but the pros far outweigh (see what I did there?) the cons. Overall great and useful app!

title: Crashing every time I open it
body: I've been using this app to log my meals, snacks, etc., but the app keeps freezing and crashing when it opens. It becomes extremely sluggish. One time, the iPhone 6 Plus clock/battery/etc. assets loaded underneath this app's in-optimized assets. That's with all other apps force closed, so it doesn't have to do with not enough RAM.

title: Better than my fitness pal
body: I love the break downs of fats, carbs, and proteins. It makes my Low carb diet much easier to follow. One suggestion, please easily show fiber, and make previous day's able to view the graph.

title: Great App
body: I've been using this App for 3weeks now and love it. It's easy to use, has a full library of food to choose from and is great for tracking. I would suggest it to everyone.

title: Amazing!
body: Since a botched surgery in 2009 I have gained a total of 90lbs. Since I've down loaded the myplate app I've lost 10 lbs in my first week! I find I'm a lot more aware of what I eat & today I refuse to drink my calories! Thanks myplate!

title: Easiest
body: Easiest asp to use, I tried using the fit bit asp but it doesn't have a fraction of the food that is in this. The only problem I have with it is when entering food in. It switches back to letters every number I push on Ipad

title: Love it !!
body: I love this app keeps me on track I have lost 2 pounds so far and just started less than a couple weeks ago . Also easy to find calories for food !

title: Very useful tracking app
body: Great tool!  Easy to look up nutrition info while tracking your daily total. I like the tracking for water as well. Great app that suits my needs.

title: Just a mom
body: Love this app! It makes me pay more attention to what types of foods I'm eating. I also don't want to put a high calorie food in my tracker so it helps me to eat healthier foods to keep my numbers down!

title: Feeling good
body: I absolutely love this app! It helps me see where I am at during the day with the layout If the app. Plus it makes me feel good. And it is helping me lose the weight that I need to lose:)

title: Awesome can barely describe it
body: With the most recent update, the addition of the scanner, the charts (turn side wards for added featured), and the trackers. The only improvements I can suggest is keep building the database and add more exercises.

title: Helpful
body: I have always struggled with diets. I would start strong but fizzle out towards the end of the first week. I feel with this app I can maintain and it doesn't feel so hard. I love this app!

title: One feature that I wish it had
body: It would Be nice to have your friends on the actual app. So we can see their progress on the app and see what they are doing to improve there health... I don't want to be searching throught all my Facebook comment to see what they are doing.

title: Alright
body: I like this app but it glitches with the goal calories. Every time I set the calories lower for my own purposes but it changes the setting back to automatic whenever I leave the app. This is the simplest thing it should not do. Without this frustrating glitch I'd give it a 5 but I'm afraid I might even delete it now with such a problem.

title: Excellent app!
body: Great app! Very happy with results. Lost 3 pounds in 2 weeks. Love the ability to input exercise. Has excellent database on foods and exercises including ethnic foods. Easy to use. Recommending to all of my patients, friends, and family.

title: Calorie Tracker
body: It is handy to have on my phone but there are two problems. It is hard to delete duplicate items and frequent and recent food lists need to be alphabetical (if desired). After awhile long lists are time consuming to look through.

title: Great tool!
body: Very helpful and easy to use. Has a large library of foods already loaded from many restaurants. Many options to customize as well.

title: Great App
body: I love using this app to track what I eat every day. It really keeps me accountable and has even helped me shed some weight!

title: Calorie tracker review
body: I have had this app for a few days now and it does a really good job of allowing you to reach your goals. It has a simple interface and is very handy.

title: Great tracker!
body: Been using for just a few days and thoroughly enjoy how easy this app is to use. I do wish I could see an overview of each meal recorded and be able to edit...sometimes I forget to change which meal I recording.

title: Great, Easy, Quick üòç
body: Love this. Really easy to use. You can even type in brand names and it will pop up. Set quantity. Tracks water/exercise Too!!! Must have for anyone losing weight! üòç

title: Love it
body: I absolutely love this app it helps me keep track of everything that I eat that way I'm aware of how many calories I am intaking which I never could keep track of before.

title: Great app
body: I'm new to actually counting calories and this has made it fairly quick and easy! Loads of stuff are already in so that you don't have to enter it manually!

title: Great
body: This app is great when it comes to counting calories and will help me be healthier. The only drawback I've found is with the exercise plate. I type in crunches and it has no matches. I thought it was a well known exercise, but I don't know. Maybe I'm wrong. The app is great anyways.

title: Great simple food tracker
body: This is a great simple food tracker. I only wish it had a daily journal option to enter how we feel after eating meals to help track our body's reaction to certain foods ... to learn if we have allergies or intolerance to certain foods.

title: Very convenient! They have everything!
body: Love how they have mostly all the choices even from popular restaurants and grocery stores! Makes it very easy :)

title: Needs more exercises!
body: Great app! I only wish there were more exercises in the data base! Has almost every food you can think of. The stats for the food are mostly accurate. Overall a great app to track intake!

title: Livestrong MyPlate
body: I love this app!  It sends me reminders when I don't log anything for the day to help keep me on track.  You can add calories manually but it has a database of most everything already!

title: Great app.
body: I have only been using this app. For a week and have lost 3lbs already! I recommend this for a great way to see how many calories you are eating and the nutrition break down.

title: Great
body: Great, just what I needed. Wish I knew better what the for fee upgrade included, more than the lite version.

title: Great App!
body: So far has found all the foods I eat to give a good calculation. Easy to use. Would recommend this for everyone who is trying to keep track of their diet and exercise!

title: Love this app
body: This is a great app.  There are so many more items in the food database to choose from than the app I used to use.  Highly recommend this to anyone looking for a calorie tracker.

title: There are better options
body: If this was the only calorie tracker I would rate it higher. However mynetdiary gets a couple of features right that livestrong flubs.

title: Easy to use
body: Logging food is easy and love the progress chart. It keeps the motivation up! I wish there were more categories in the nutrition chart though, like grams of sugar tracked too.

title: Great app
body: This is a very helpful app for tracking your daily intake. I especially appreciate the reminders to log in for the day because for me, forgetting is generally where I fail at food journaling.

title: Great App!
body: Makes it so easy to track your calorie intake and maintain/lose weight. Already has a large library of different foods and exercises. I really recommend this for a healthy lifestyle.

title: Easier than web version
body: Makes keeping track of calories easy

title: Just Started
body: I just decided to get  serious about losing weight. I have been using this App for one week now and I love it! I have dropped 6 lbs already. Great tool to keep you on track.

title: Great App!
body: I love this app! I have tried to keep food journals several times but never succeeded. This app really help me track what I am eating and how many calories I am taking in. It's a must for any health conscious person!

title: Gain or Loose - you must choose
body: Downloaded the app just to be more aware of my food choices but the very first thing you must choose is if you want to loose or gain weight. What if it's neither? I ended up uninstalling and will see if I can find something different that meets my needs.

title: Lost 25lbs
body: I absolutely love this app!

title: Time to go
body: I have used this site for over 5 years and this latest update is the last I will tolerate.  After changing devices and losing all historical data, not being able to switch between app/website, and now making the app harder to enter and review information I am done.  Will shop for new way to log information.

title: Fairly good app
body: Decent library of foods.  Enough flexibility to enter own recipes.  But, sync w watch and desktop is hit or miss.  Some foods have errors - i.e. 12,000 grams of cargo instead of 12 because the euro label used a comma as decimal separator.

title: Good for tracking
body: Simple put. It does what it should. The barcode scanner is a great help and the manual input for anything that you can't find is very detailed as well.

title: I'd give 4.9 if I could, it's almost perfect!
body: Easy to use, great community, I love it, except that you can't add notes. I have severe food allergies and track that too, so the only thing I'd want to add is a way to add notes about how I feel or react after a meal.
response: Hi! Thank you for the awesome review! We've definitely heard this request for notes before and it is something we hope to add in the future!

title: Great tool for losing weight
body: Lost 25lbs using this tool. I find myself really watching what I eat knowing that I need to enter it into this app. Plus, the scan feature is great convenience for entering foods.

title: Pretty good
body: The app is easy to use but I found the food database frustrating. Lots of entries for the same food (specific items from a restaurant or boxed food) and it was difficult to decide which entry to use. Nutrition data varied even when the serving size was the same.

title: Great!
body: The progress graphs have helped tremendously. It's not just about the calories, being able to see my percentage of carbohydrates and protein and fats made the difference in my weight loss.

title: Amazing
body: This app is helping me track my calorie intake and it has a barcode to scan what you've eaten. This app can be used to gain, lose, or maintain weight and overall is 5 stars.

title: Finally the help I need!
body: Love the app & all the information it gives me.  Found out I needed more protein!  Only one issue... Wish I could sync between devices!  I don't want to log meals more than one place.  Can you fix that?

title: Awesome app!
body: Love it! Super easy to use, has all the necessary components to track your daily food intake. Let's you scan what you've eaten and it will automatically input the nutritional facts for you.

title: Love the barcode option!
body: This app includes a barcode option so you just scan the item you are eating and it automatically pulls most up. Best app so far that I've tried to track what I eat in a day.

title: Useless with Apple Watch
body: The calorie tracking is great.  However it's useless with an Apple Watch.  The activity tracker seems to only work with activity recorded by your phone.  None of my workouts on the Apple Watch are recognized in the app despite allowing access to the data in the app settings.  Shame - looked promising but deleting the app.

title: Awesome, but..
body: Really cool app but their pricing structure is completely bogus. There is no option to purchase the app, only a cost to pay a little monthly or a little more monthly as if it is a gym membership.

title: Best way to track
body: This app provides all you need to track in order to manage a healthier lifestyle. Easy to use. Highly recommend

title: Is it worth it to pay for upgrade?
body: I'm very happy with this app.  What exactly would've the benefits to upgrade?  More controls?  Better exercising tracking?

title: Good stuff
body: I don't like how you would have to purchase a subscription just to get the added features but it works for me. Very accurate with calories count from restaurants and grocery items.

title: Great Interface
body: Super easy to use with beautiful interface. I prefer this over the other app I have been using but continuing to use both apps as I test it out!

title: Awesome!
body: I use this app on and off to make sure I'm making good choices and working towards my goals. Someday, I'd love to see an option to also upload photos of the foods I eat as well:)

title: Great app
body: Very easy to use, tons of searchable foods preloaded into this app. Love the features that allow you to set your perfect calorie allotment for weight loss. Tracking your meals, I've found, is essential for weight loss and this app makes it super easy to do.

title: Works better than MyFitnessPal
body: Super easy to use. Really nice app over all. The barcode scanner function often pulls up nutrition facts that are just a little bit off though, by a couple calories or one gram of protein and or a gram of carbs

title: Great for dieting!
body: I use this in combination with my jawbone. This app is great for helping you pin point weakness in your diet. I have been trying to lose weight, and no luck. Once seeing how much of my diet was carbs, I reworked my diet.

title: AMAZING!
body: I'm a skinny teen girl looking to gain weight, and this app is perfect. It helps track your calories, including how many you lost and how muc you must eat to lose or gain weight, exercise, etc. It's combined with the Apple Health app. I love it!

title: This app is really great
body: If your looking for a new app to track foods and workout this is for you it's free but you can upgrade it gives you some workouts to do and is very motivating!

title: Livestrong App
body: I purchased this app when it first came out and I'm pleased with how far it's come! I absolutely love this app!!! It now syncs with phone to calculate steps and has a lot more foods embedded for logging in food!

title: Great app
body: Only a few day into this made me push myself to eat healthier things. This app is so up to date with the current technology and is so useful and requires little effort.

title: Good app
body: Nutrition data base is more accurate than any other fitness app. I struggle with my weight and being good at sticking to heathy eats but my husband has lost 14 lbs using this app in last two months

title: The force that made me be
body: Most of my life improvement has come as the result of pure spite. This app's ability to constantly nag me pulls the best and worst out of me, and my health has notably improved because of its persistence to annoy me.

title: Really great
body: I have really appreciated how well this app has been designed and how easy it is to use. I've counted on it for 8 weeks now. Great base of known nutritional info and easy to add new items.

title: Super Handy
body: I love Daily Plate - really easy to use. The new "repeat" food item is excellent and makes it less repetitive to use when you know you always eat the same things at certain times of the day.

title: Wonderful
body: I've been using this app for just under year, and it's helped me lose 32 pounds. If nothing but good things to say about it, and it's on the improved over time.

title: Love it! Better than MFP
body: I'm really bummed that I found out my boyfriend has bought me a Fitbit for Christmas (shhhhh) and it only jives with MFP :-/ I tried MFP twice and just didn't dig it. My Plate is just so easy to use! Please make it work with Fitbit!!

title: Useful and Easy
body: It's very easy to use this app. So far I really like it!

title: It's amazing (not a fake review)
body: I had this for two days and I just feel better about the choices I'm making and how many calories I'm using Its the best app out here

title: Satisfaction
body: Great source of organization. Really helps keep track and show personal progress. Also helps indicate areas that might need improvement.

title: Very pleased with this app!
body: There's a saying that you can measure what you don't track! This app is great to track nutritional & activity information and helps me stay on track!

title: Daily log
body: I just switched today from another app because

title: Female 5'6"
body: This app is perfect for me. I was over eating an over indulging when I didn't realize it. This app has taken me from 136 to 122 lbs. I feel less heavy and weighed down. I have changed my habits and now know how much I should be eating for my height an weight.

title: Keeps Track of Everything!!!!
body: It does its best when it keeps track of my food. I've been trying to gain some weight and it seems to be helping. It's awesome.

title: Love this app!
body: I have tried a few similar apps as well as this one a while ago and was not satisfied with any of them.  However, the new version of this app rocks!

title: My new friend
body: lol I like the alerts and reminders .. The navigation for logging in your food and exercise is pretty easy, especially the monitoring of your dietary intake is a huge plus.. Thumbs up!!

title: LOVED LOVED LOVED
body: This app is easy to work with. It allows you to truly see the calories you're consuming, set goals for yourself, and get support through a community of users. I immediately fell in love with this app!!!

title: Very good
body: Great overall app. Entering food can be tricky since there are multiple versions of the same food item (different user submissions?) but very well worth the use.

title: Needed to stay in top shape.
body: I am a very active person and use this app daily to help ensure I get the Macro nutrients I need and don't go over it on sodium and cholesterol.  It's great and every one on a diet or workout plan should use it.

title: So Easy to Use!
body: I absolutely love this free app! I can locate every food that i have eaten at home or in a restaurant from the database. It has really made me more aware of calorie and carb count. I recommend this to everyone!

title: It has helped me
body: I am currently down 32 pounds.  The tracking holds me accountable.  The scan feature is also extremely helpful.  There isn't much that I cannot find.  It has been helpful for me and so I give it a 4/5 stars.

title: It's ok
body: I like the overall set up of the app, the one big complaint I have though is the exercise section, the list of exercises is terrible, every time I search for an exercise I did it says no matches. If you do anything other than running, sit-ups, or jumping jacks, it's not in there.

title: Great app
body: Has popular foods from restaurants and  portion size. So you can eat until you are full and save calories to use for the day until later if you desire.

title: Great app but...
body: I love this app. Does exactly what you want it to. Makes eating fun and opens your eyes about what you eat and drink. I only hope they make the ability to edit manually entered foods available.

title: Love it!
body: I've been using this app for a little over a week and I've lost 3 pounds! And I still get to eat what I want so I don't have the urge to binge! It would be nice if they had more name brand foods in the log memory but I love that they have any to begin with.

title: Love it
body: Been doing it for a week and its a great accessory for weight loss. It doesn't have the insanity work out calculated tho. Would like to see that added in the exercises complete section.

title: Highly recommend it!!
body: It's an awesome app. It really helps you stay on top of your game. I was surprised to see how much I had to run in order for me to get rid of an extra piece of chocolate cake. The  cool thing is that you can actually design it to your goal. Fantastic!

title: Life changer
body: I wouldn't have been able to lose the weight without this app. Really made me think about what I was putting in my body and how it was going to affect me!

title: No title
body: This the first calorie counting I've ever done. Since starting in June I've gone from 215 to 195. Logging calories and exercise everyday takes conscientious discipline. The results speak for themselves - thank you Live-strong!

title: Ok but needs some work.
body: Entering food is clunky.  List of recent should be alphabetized.  It would be nice to go to a previous day and select and item, copy and paste. Wish MyPlate showed more than current day. Wish percent carb, fat, & protein were visible for ore than current day. I like that it syncs to the web.

title: MRewards??
body: Sez donate to charity but nowhere can I find what points translate to???

title: Eye opener!
body: This app has helped me really see how much I wasn't accounting for! I am excited to see how this will help me in my weight lose goal. Very easy and has all kinda of foods already preset in the system.

title: Convenient, does what I need it to do.
body: Love the calorie tracker app. Definitely more convenient than paper and pencil.  I like all the pre-programmed food search option too. Makes it easy!

title: Great App
body: I have been waiting forever for this to be an app.  It is better than I could have hoped they have improved a lot from the desktop based application.

title: Made the difference.
body: This app helped me track my calories to make my weight loss goal. Makes it easy because it has so many foods with the calorie count.

title: Glitchy
body: I love this app but it has been malfunctioning, and restarting the app does no good. It shows all exercise as burning 0 calories and my weight tracker is messed up too. I'd really rather not have to uninstall and reinstall it! Hope this gets fixed; it's a really useful tool for getting in shape.

title: A reply to "making corrections"
body: Open MyPlate. Go to Diary. Use arrows to go to the day you need to fix. Select your subway, change the serving, then click update. This will change your entry not add to it. I had to figure this out too. :-)

title: This app provides me with tools to meet my goals
body: I enjoy the app! I wish that more generic excercises we in database and I also wish I could save recipes and be able to share! I do love this app tho!

title: Easy and convenient
body: It's free.  It has an extensive search function.  It makes logging calories fun.  It has helped me to think more about what I put in my mouth.  So it works for me.

title: So so
body: Other apps allow scanning of bar codes and have more realistic calorie info also exercises revert to default 30 min instead of remembering your last input which is annoying

title: Good for tracking but could be improved
body: Lots of foods, good for daily tracking  but cannot create meals online or have any flexibility in what the graphics show. You can only see 1 day of the carb/fat/protein chart and no variability of the other charts.

title: Astounding
body: This app is a great tool to make you aware of what you're putting in your body and how much of it... I used the regular website on my computer but this one works pretty great too!

title: Very helpful app
body: Easy to use. Does its job right. The new version is much improved. Wish I could still  edit entries without deleting them and re-entering though.

title: Woke me up
body: Didn't realize how many calories in a minor order of a 'McSkillet burrito with sausage' until the lite Livestrong app told me it was over 600!  This app is very helpful in identifying problems with food choices!

title: Great app for food diary
body: This app communicates with other apps I have and it helps keep me on track while eating a healthy amount of food and encourages exercise and shows the importance of nutritional values.

title: Simplicity makes this great
body: This app is simple and effective. I love that I can scan almost any barcode and it automatically programs in the nutrition information.

title: luv
body: love this tracker! I keep getting disappointed because I think the food I eat won't be on there, but so far everything has been. So happy!

title: Awesome!!
body: This app is great!! It takes away the guessing and it helps you stay in track!! It has a vast "food bank" so you always know how many calories you are eating... I love it!

title: I love it so far
body: I'm a supporter of the LiveStrong website so when seeing that the had an app for calorie counter, of course I downloaded it. I will say it was one of three that I downloaded for my food diary BUT of the three I am keeping this app!!
response: We're so glad to hear that you chose us Suga Lady!! Thanks for the review.

title: The best app ever
body: This app is so amazing i tried millions of app to try to loose weight but never works but this really does if you are trying to get fitter or lose weight this app is for you

title: Best UI of the trackers
body: Tried out My Fitness Pal and Lose It alongside this app for a few days and this was the winner. Best interface by far.
response: Hi Josh!! We are aware of this issue and we're working on a fix! In the meantime, please click My Foods and then Create New Food to create a custom item instead of using the green pop up button. Email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions!

title: Great app
body: This app only tracks nutrition facts in foods- it can do other things but it would be a little more difficult. Perfect for people trying to watch what they eat

title: Good but could be better
body: Good calorie counter, however there is no way, that I have found, to make a favorite food selection. There are many foods which I eat/drink on a regular basis. No way to make them a favorite or regular item.

title: Great app!
body: It is extremely useful for gaining weight! It is also more useful than other calorie counter apps because it already has foods set up!

title: Good Start!
body: This app is useful for tracking consumption and the three main caloric categories. It's easy to use and most foods exist in the records so you can easily track and record the foods.

title: Amazing
body: Never one for these type of things but it really helps as long as you put the time and effort you will be fine

title: Use everyday
body: Great app. Very accurate. I would suggest some kind of activity tracker because the one through the cell phone doesn't do just ice for calories burned.

title: So far so good
body: It seems very complete at the moment. Plenty of features and user submitted information that makes it easier to use

title: Thanks for the platform!
body: I enjoy tracking my food instead of journaling it, and trying to calculate by myself. Then records are clean and easy to find! Upgrading today.

title: Perfect
body: This app is really what I've been looking for, meal plans, work outs, and great tracking. Buying Gold is worth it best $10 ur ever going to spend. Better than $15 at a fast food place ya know?

title: Best App for Tracking
body: Great for tracking calories consumed and burned. Also for weight. Graph shows progress. Easy to use. Right on your phone. Highly recommend.

title: I love it.
body: I've never lost weight with one of these apps. I get frustrated and give up. But this one is different and I've hit my target goal every week. In a simple and concise way.

user_name: Notifications when u are out of the app
title: My best tool or calories count
body: I'm doing a weight loss plan, and they set me a 1,000 calories daily.  This is the only app helping me to stay on track and showing me the calories burned.  Excellent app.

title: Best app ever
body: This app shouldn't be free! It counts your calories and graphs its and really helps for if you want to lose weight or keep the same weight like I did so I could make my high school hockey team

title: Best for tracking intake!
body: I have used this app off and on for many years. Whenever anyone says that they are starting a diet or food diary, I suggest this app. Has the most food and restaurant foods!

title: Pretty good, faster than others
body: Limited in quantity of portion sizing which is annoying, however I like the linking of exercise, less upgrade requests than other apps and it's helped me lose 15lbs so far.

title: Best app!!
body: I went through a few apps looking for the right one. I chose this app because it allows me to track water by the ounce.   It's also really easy to use.    Love it!!

title: Great app for tracking calories and fitness.
body: I've been using this app for years. It has made some very good progress over the years. Keep up the good work.

title: I'm a fan
body: My husband and I have used this app for about 18 months and have collectively lost 120lbs. We have used this as a jump start to a whole new healthy life. Thank you.

title: So great!!
body: Very helpful way to manage what you're eating and keep track of your calorie intake!! Plus it helps keep track of what you're burning and how much water you're drinking! Love it!

title: Awesome tracker
body: Helps keeps my food journal as well as provide nutritional information regarding intake of protein, carbs and fats.  I have used this tracker for about one year and it has helped me in my weight loss journey.

title: David246@
body: Great app, easy to use. Has many of the common foods I eat already listed. Easy to change target based on my activity level for the day. I recommend it.

title: Love It!
body: It keeps track of my calories! and I love it! It's one of the best apps ever. One bug though is you cannot take off items u put in by accident but that rarely happens.

title: Like it, but...
body: Like the format, easy to enter what you've eaten, but it keeps changing back to the automatic daily allotted calories, and I have to keep changing it.  Also, it doesn't have a lot of different excercise workouts in the app.

title: Love it
body: Easy to use, user friendly, there is an amazing online community and everyone is really helpful and supportive. This is just over all amazing and it's the best tracker that I have ever used!!

title: Body Fat Loss
body: Not only is this app helpful for weight, but it tells you the amount of fat you are eating as well, and protein is also available. This is helping me burn fat and build muscle.

title: You should try it
body: I don't keep lots of apps on my phone, I only have few. This app is one of them. It is one of the best calorie tracker out there :) .. You should really download it :)

title: Crashed..
body: I love this app so much and I've been using it for months now! The only thing is that today, whenever I open the app, I can't click anything and it just crashes. Please please fix it! Besides that I love the community and it has really helped me stay fit!

title: Amazing App
body: This app has everything and it's really good at keeping track of how much vampires you intake and I love that it keeps track of your water intake and your weight. Get the app it's worth it

title: Brilliant
body: Similar to others of its kind, this app seems to be just what I need and wanted out of making food tracking easy and simple!

title: Love this app!
body: Easy to track and calculate calorie intake and output. I rarely eat or drink something that's not in the database. So many food options!  And it prompts you if you haven't entered data yet. I just love it!

title: Wonderful
body: I'm a young athlete who loves this app, because it helps me track my weight. I love it and recommend it to whoever needs to loose weight. I went from a size 18 in women's to a size 12. I feel wonderful!

title: ?lol
body: This app is great for everyone. Doesn't matter if one is new to the calorie thing or experienced. I just started working out again after many years, this app helps me know what my limits are always. Easy to use!

title: Good app
body: Been using this for a week and its been a great help for journaling what you eat and tracking. Would like a few more exersize-like weight machines to be added, but that's about it!

title: Weight loss made easy
body: Since I downloaded this app I have lost just over 30lbs in 2 months. Anyone who wants to lose weight should download this app in my opinion.

title: Giving it a try
body: Me and my daughter are trying she needs to lose a few pounds and I can stand to lose a few too!

title: Love it!
body: It is so much easier to look weight using this simple app. I love being able to track my calories, water, and exercise all in one place!

title: I love it!
body: The only problem I've had is if i put in the wrong item I haven't seen were you can edit it. That would be great if it were more  obvious.

title: Finally
body: So far I am loving it! It is helping me learn how to monitor how much crap I put into my body and its super easy to use. So far I've been able to maintain motivation with it and not give up!

title: Worth the download!
body: Great app! Been using since November 2012 and have lost and kept off 35 lbs. Earning points towards gift cards is cool and helps keep you motivated. It's only crashed a few times on me, other than that no complaints!

title: Live strong or lifesaver?
body: I downloaded this app about 10 days ago and have already lost 7 lbs just by watching what I eat! This app is amazing and I highly recommend it! :)

title: Pretty good
body: I like this, except I would like a fiber breakdown, not just carbs, proteins, and fats.  Also,the "frequently eaten foods" and the "recently eaten foods" lists don't work very well - it never seems to have the foods in either that I'm eating daily.  I haven't lost any weight in the weekive been tracking, but so far, I think that's my fault...

title: Calorie counter great but...
body: Can't use anything for working out.  I do some cardio and lift weights.  It would be nice if they gave an option for sets and weight.  It gave me squats, but doesn't recognize lat pulldown.  And when I try to input it, it only wants to know how much time I did it for.  Same with other exercises I do at the gym.

title: Health
body: This is a great way to really see what you eat everyday and opens your eyes. I like anything that is fun and gives a reward in return even if it takes a while it is worth it!

title: Weight Loss Made Easy!
body: It's easy and fun to track what you eat! I used to just keep track of my calories, but now I know my daily carbs, fat, and protein too! The only thing I would change, is the variety in the exercises.

title: Works well
body: It's good to be able to track the calorie intake and use, but the database needs some clean up, there are many entries that look like they are supposed to be the same but the calories are totally different.

title: Great App!
body: This app has helped me keep up with my calories and water intake. Where in the past I had several apps to keep up with everything, now it is all in one app. Great convenience!

title: Great Diet Tool
body: I use this in conjunction with another app. Together, they calculate the calories burned in an exercise, hold and compare the calorie information with the information calculated in my profile on a daily basis.

title: Good App, Some Bugs
body: This app is great for tracking food, weight, exercise and keeping it handy on the go. Large food database! It crashes a lot though and can run slowly at times. I wish it would allow you to save meals/recipes, but you have to upgrade for that I think.

title: Great app but...
body: Great app but can't manually enter calories  For example if I ate something I know is 500 calories I cannot enter it manually. I have to use the search engine to find something that has that number of cals. Pain!!!
response: Hi Aimee! You can enter manual calories by clicking on My Food which is available in each meal period. Then, click Create New Food. On the following page, you can enter the item and it's calorie information. You have the option to enter the macronutrient information as well, but it is not required.

title: my plate
body: great for calorie , carb counting. Scanner works great. Personal foods could be easier to access. agree that the exercise library could be much stronger. still find the app easy to use , well laid out and effective in losing weight

title: The best in tracking!
body: I've used them all, including everyone's favorite MyFitnessPal. This one offers you so much as a basic. Do yourself a favor-download this app!

title: Fantastic
body: Way better than my fitness pal or any other app I've tried. I've been using it since the first week on January and lost 20 pounds already. I love it.

title: Great!!!
body: Really great at keeping up with everything!!! Would highly recommend for anyone looking to loose weight or just watch what goes into your mouth!!!

title: Great!
body: I don't know how it could be better unless you could just take a picture of your plate and it calculate it for you, which it almost does.

title: Great app
body: Overall really solid. I like that the foods you've recently eaten are readily available each time you enter your meals for the day. The layout is good and user friendly

title: Awesome
body: I'm 13 and extremely underweight. My goal was to gain a few pounds each week and within a few days I already gained 2 pounds. This app is definitely a helpful one.

title: What were you thinking
body: I was right in the middle of preparing for a body building competition and using your app to cycle Carbs when this new update came out. It's HORRIBLE now you no longer provide any breakdown information on fiber or sugar. The app is so focused on calories but now it's pretty unusable for any other type of tracking/ plan.

title: Terrible Update
body: I've used this app for years and loved the pie chart and macronutrient listing from the previous version. But this new update is terrible. The pie chart is gone and instead of showing your intake of macronutrients there is a countdown of your remaining grams in each category. If they continue with this update, my suggestion for those reading this is to get a different food logging app.

title: Great app
body: Nice database of food items, good way of keeping tabs on nutritional value of things you eat instead of just calories. Not too invasive on notifications.

title: My Exercise is tracking wrong.
body: I really like be this app but today it says I have burned 4598 calories today (which I have Not, I assure you) but how do I fix this problem? HELP

title: I Lost 75 Pounds
body: I took the simple step of using this app to track my daily calories and I lost 75 pounds in 6 months. It is a tool that works very well.

title: No longer working on my SE.
body: Used to adore this app until I got an iPhone SE. Then it crashed and lost all my data. Like my entire profile doesn't exist on the app. Website is fine. But I can't even log in.

title: Good app for tracking
body: I love that the app is easy to use and you're able to easily log exercise and track water intake. One disappointment is that some foods indicate "recipe" but you have no opportunity to view the recipe.

title: I like this app overall
body: I like the features a great deal. The scanning of certain foods does not come back exactly accurate. My fitness pal app does a much better scan of items. Overall this is a good app.

title: Wonderful !!!!
body: This app is amazing! I keep my best to track my weight and this helps me a lot. Plus you can exercise to burn it off and this app helps u do it. I recommend it to anyone.

title: Best calorie tracking app
body: This is by far the easiest calorie tracker I have found. It allows for me to manually enter food and exercises which is my preference. Very simple to read.

title: Love this app
body: It helps educate me on the nutrition information of common foods I eat. It helps me make better choices. As a result, I've lost a little weight and I feel better about myself.

title: Mr.
body: I've used the app for a week and it is helping me be accountable for the number of calories I eat. It's simple and straight forward. Would recommend this app without reservation.

title: Very easy to track meals
body: Well thought out app that makes it easy to track calories, protein, etc. I was surprised at how easy it makes it.

title: Best app
body: Just got this app. It's so great it tracks how many calories you burn. How many calories you can eat before u go over your limit. It really is a very great app and is made well.

title: Confused
body: Okay so I'm really confused.. So I have been using this app for a long time now. But the percentage chart has got me very confused. For example, if I had 20g of fat, 20g of protien and 30g of carbs... It says that I have like 10% protien, 30% fat and 60% carbs. Can this app just take percentages that are right? Why are they all so crazy? Help

title: best tracking app there is.
body: this app has helped so much. I have tried other apps but none of them come close to this one. I totally suggest downloading this app!

title: Nutrition data missing on this version
body: I am severely disappointed by this last update.  I depended on the nutrition facts to check for sodium, sugar, and other nutrients.  Calories, fat, protein, and carbohydrates is not adequate for my needs.

title: So easy to use!
body: This app is easy to use and understand.  Also, there is a paid version, but I don't feel like I'm missing out without it.

title: Tracks chart of calorie intake
body: I don't weight myself everyday, so this app is great because it's one of the only ones that shows you a chart of your calorie intake. I want to know if I'm eating more or less than previously so this is great

title: So helpful!
body: With this app I lost 30 pounds and reached my goal weight.  I am keeping it off!  The searchable database of food calories is the best feature although the carb/fat/protein amounts could be improved.

title: Not perfect, but awesome!
body: I so appreciate this inexpensive app! The tracking is not always as accurate as it could be, but it's pretty good. Especially considering the website is free! And the community is a great forum for support, and very conveniently accessible from my phone!

title: Changed my life!
body: I've been using it for a couple weeks already and it's been amazing. I've already lost weight and I feel much healthier.

title: THE TRUTH
body: ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è sends reminders, very accurate, and keeps track of my progress not to mention the workouts that are included on days I'm not able to get to the gym

title: The best calorie tracker
body: I have been using this app for 5 months now and I have lost over 30 lbs.  I cannot believe how easy this app is to use and how happy I am with this calorie tracker.

title: My plate
body: Good app. Easy to use. If scan doesn't work, you type in food. Many choices and option to put in exercise and calculates calories.

title: I love it!
body: I use it! I need to have a quick way to estimate my protein. I use discretion (my amazing brain) to choose correct entries. Thank you for putting together a great app. Btw, I rarely use apps. This is perfect for me.

title: Perfect.!
body: The only thing this app Is missing is, some of the features that the website offers.

title: Earned a spot on my bottom bar!
body: A countdown to one's goal weight date would be nice, ala LoseIt. Also, the ability to delete exercises and to log/track body fat, bone mass, etc

title: Handy
body: Great app! It's so easy to keep track of what you eat. Especially with the scan option. The scanner recognizes almost everything!

title: Helpful
body: This app has been so helpful for tracking daily calorie intake. User friendly and simple to get the hang of. Not all food has correct portion sizes but easily adjustable.

title: Great app!
body: I like this app as it is very easy to use! Bar scan option is excellent! Only complaint is there should be an option to enter sodium when entering a food manually for those of us on a low sodium diet!

title: Excellent app
body: I would have given it 5 stars but the calories don't always match the food when scanning. Some times it's 20 or 30 calories off whether it is up or down.  Please fix.

title: It's fine
body: It's good, very helpful in staying on track. I recommend it, but there are some bugs, like it sends push notifications telling me to track my breakfast in the late afternoon (and way after I had already done so). But definitely a useful tool

title: User friendly
body: I downloaded 10 apps when I started working out but this one stuck out the most. Easy to use great functions, great stats, has most restaurant food nutrition guides built in the system.

title: Manual food option, what happened?
body: Why can't we rename the 'name your own food' title just by clicking on an 'x' to the right of the name anymore? Forcing people to select all instead is a really bad UX decision. Also? The M Points thing popping up at the top of the screen while you're trying to exit a page is bad form, also.

title: Awesome app
body: Great app- makes it easy to track progress. When I'm tempted to snack at night, I plan the next day's meals instead. I eat around 1500 and ex to get it down to around 1200. Losing weight and not hungry. Great helpful app.

title: Fabulous
body: Great app. I use it everyday and it really helps me stay on track with my goals. Very convenient to be able to record both good and exercise in one app.

title: Love this app
body: I have been using it for now 2 months and I am thankful for all the tools and resources it offers. I recommended to anyone that wants to get serious about their health.

title: Great app
body: Good selection of foods, some restaurants could have more options and less duplication. Wish I could track my nutrients over time also.

title: Love this app... But...
body: I do wish they would show how many calories more exercises burn.  Like various housework chores and such.  We are not all in our 20's and can't all jog and such.  Other than that, it is fantastic for helping me stay good about eating. Love it,

title: Bug report
body: Great app. If you go to community then reply to a message. Don't go to camera with picking a picture or it will delete all you have typed and you will gave to type it all over again.

title: Love buuuuut...
body: I really wish you could view the same progress charts on the mobile app that are available via the website. I hate having to log in to the website to view what my daily macronutrients intake should be in comparison to my actual intake.

title: Better than weight watchers
body: I canceled my online subscription w/ weight watchers and started using this app and I love it! It focuses on your health not just your weight, I love it and it's really easy to use!

title: Love it!
body: Easy to use and so many food resources to draw from when establishing calories - there is always a close approximation to what I've eaten.

title: love it
body: I really like this app. it's easy to use it's helpful I lost 3 pounds my first week tracking my calories plus cardio. I'm very happy with it. as for searching for foods it could improve a little more there wit the selections other than that great app!

title: Love the App
body: Like that you can look to see how many proteins and carbs and fats you have eaten during the day it would really be helpful if it had barcode readings. Will keep using this!

title: Great
body: Easy - great list of foods and easy food tracking. Use the recent section often. Tracking weight should be easier.

title: Great app!
body: Easy to use with a good database of foods to search. I like that it gives me the exact number of calories I'm aiming for each day. It's helpful to have the water tracker too. Really useful!

title: Great app
body: I've only been using the tracker for about a month, but it has been helpful in keeping me on track with eating healthier to reach my overall goal.

title: Wonderful!
body: It has so many options for food, wow! And it automatically calculated the amount of calories you should have, and the percent of fat, protein, and carbs that you've eaten in a day. Crazy good!

title: Love it so far may buy full version
body: I love it and I am using it daily. So far perfect for me. A real helpful tool and eye opener. When you count every calorie you shove in your mouth. Thank you for this great app.

title: Works!
body: I like this app, it has helped me track my calories much more closely than I have ever done before. I like that it has a category just for water because water is clearly the most important part of a diet.

title: Awesome
body: This is an awesome app. Has the nutritional info for just about anything you could ever eat. I have made some great gains in the 2 weeks I have used this app. I would def recommend it.

title: Easy!
body: My biggest problem with tracking calories was that it was so complicated I dreaded logging my calories. But this app is clear and straight to the point. I luv it!

title: Good
body: It's alright. I like the rewards features though I haven't cashed any in yet. It seems to have way more foods available than the other calorie apps. One thing that absolutely bugs me is that it doesn't have a scanner.

title: Compared to fitnesspal
body: I have used myplate for the last week but usually use fitness pal.  They are both free and very good.  Fitnesspal can be hard to get the password to work but no ads.

title: Awesome app!
body: You can search for foods, track calories, see protein fat carb ratios all at a glance. It also recommends daily calories based on height weight and activity level. My most used and favorite app! :)

title: Great app
body: I really like how easy Livestrong is to use.  It's so fast to find my food using the search engine.  Livestrong keeps me on track with my diet working to achieve my weight loss goal.

title: Awesome
body: This helps me keep my eating in check. I have lost 12 lbs. in 30 days eating right and exercise. This app is a good way to keep everything I eat and work out in order.

title: Calorie tracker
body: This is a great way to help me keep track of how many calories i ate and lost, while being able to work in a certain goal for myself.

title: Great app
body: Great features, excellent ui/ux. I use this religiously and it's treated me well. My only complaint would be that item searching needs some work, search results are often spotty at best. Still love it and recommend it

title: Good start, needs work
body: Nice clean interface, limited options. In particular, it really needs more options for food "amount."  Generally the only option is "how many servings". "Weight" and "volume" are much more useful most of the time.

title: Workouts and Measurements üëéüèªüëéüèªüëéüèª
body: As soon as you click on a workout to see more about it it automatically takes it as if you did it with doesn't make sense bc it has a button that says "I did this" but doesn't matter if you click that button bc it'll take it as if I did it, so I burned 2200 calories in 5min
response: Hello! We are aware of this bug and are working on a fix. Apologies for the inconvenience. While we work on this, please follow the steps below to remove these incorrect entries from your Activity Diary:

title: Like it but
body: It would be great if this app integrated with the health app on iPhones so you didn't have to input everything manually but other than that I love this appüòçüôãüèªüòÅ
response: Hi lboles! Thank you for your review! MyPlate actually does integrate with Apple Health! You should see a button on the home page of the MyPlate app that asks you to sync with Apple Health. Please email us at support@livestrong.com if you have any questions!

title: Best App for Tracking
body: Used this app before to lose weight and came back to it to help get back on track. Like the new updates.

title: Easy way to track
body: This is an easy way to track your food & exercise on your weight loss

title: What were they thinking?
body: What were they thinking when they added keystrokes to the interface without any added functionality? For an app like this to be actually used, it has to facilitate fast data entry. The new version slows data entry by adding completely unnecessary keystrokes, so it's less useful.

title: An Amazing Update!!
body: Thank you for the new update! Much easier to track and look at a glance, and includes the pie chart. You guys rock!! Thank you!! It includes macro breakdown and goals and I am in LOVE with the app again!

title: Easy to track
body: Very easy app to track food, exercise and weight. Love the update that

title: Fixed with ios update
body: I cannot open the app it will not allow me to open it on current version.
response: Hi there- we're so sorry for the trouble you're having! Please email us at support@livestrong.com so we can assist you.

title: User friendly
body: Having the ability to scan labels to enter food, track steps, burned calories, overall progress and use workout videos in one app is great!

title: Worried about the food database
body: I really like the barcode reader - it greatly simplifies the job of tracking my meals. However, I also wanted to track my sodium consumption. In many foods in the MyPlate database the sodium levels for such things as roasted SALTED cashews is zero! Meal tracking isn't useful unless it's accurate.

title: Pretty AND useful
body: Love that you can easily track food, water, and exercises. Other apps are harder to use. Makes me excited to keep track of my health!

title: Way Better Than My Fitness Pal
body: I like this app a lot. Super easy to use and the free version gives you everything you need. My Fitness Pal didn't have a good free version.

title: Great tracker app!
body: I love how easy this is to use. I wish it had every restaurant on here so it's easier to track going out to eat, but they do have a decent selection. I also wish it was easier to see the sodium.

title: Fitbit
body: I have really enjoyed this app but I wish it would sync to Fitbit and the amount of steps on that. I don't carry my phone around a lot so It's cant take account for how much I am actually moving throughout the day

title: Yummm
body: I love this app it makes it easy for me to count my calories... I haven't yet see what all it offers however it makes me super excited for my weight lost journey

title: Organized and easy to use
body: I love how it shows how much in detail the calories you're taking in. I also like how it tracks my steps. Very cool app. I recommend it!

title: User Friendly
body: Works really well and very easy to use. If you use free version the ads are not very noticeable nor distracting. Over all a good calorie tracking app.

title: It was good but
body: Then the app started not tracking my steps. I've gone to privacy and made sure it could track my steps through the health app. I checked the health app to see if it was counting my steps. Both of those work, the app is just not registering them now.

title: Great app
body: Just getting started, but app is a great way to track calories as well as good composition. Like this app a lot better in comparison to some of the other tracking apps

title: I Love This App!!
body: Its really helps you a lot on setting your goals to lose or gain weight :D . Also has work outs for you and you can scan the food you eat!

title: Zero star
body: I do not like the new update. It is inefficient and you need to go more places to view EVERYTHING. I now have to go to progress and separately  click on my my macros to view them. Why couldn't we just keep them on the main screen with PERCENTAGES which are very important and the amount of grams not grams left. I will leave this app from using it since August of 2016. I am disappointed.

title: Excellent
body: Very impressed with this app. Helps track macronutrients which is important when trying for weight loss, muscle gain or just being healthy.

title: Easy to use and intelligent!
body: I love this app better than the other ones because being vegetarian, I like to see the breakdown of fats/carbs/protein everyday to keep me on track.

title: Looveeee it ‚ù£
body: I have lost 6 pounds in a week and a half , i love this app its familiar with alot of different foods and you can scan the barcode of the food your eating which is very convenient .

title: AMAZING :-)
body: this is an overall amazing app! it's got exercises for you to do, either at home, in the office or wherever!! you simply track your meals throughout the day and you've got yourself a "diet" :-)

title: Best app
body: I had tried several apps before this one. This is the best one I have tried. It's easy to use and keep track. I highly recommend it.

title: Add your favorite restaurant orders
body: I go to few restaurants often and I love that this app allows me to add custom meals which makes tracking calories when I go to my regular spots easy.

title: Excellent App
body: I love that it helps me to keep track of my calorie intake. It also has exercise videos that you do almost anywhere. I'm so glad I found this app.

title: So disappointed....
body: This app is awesome in theory. I like to use it when it actually doesn't crash. The app makes me log into my account EVERY time I try to use it. Very, very annoying. Logging in every single time just makes the entire process of logging food very slow and inconvenient. Please fix this bug!!!!

title: Update creating false data
body: Up until the last couple of days, I would have rated this app as 5-star. But the recent update has started randomly adding exercises that I didn't perform. And adding weight measurements that I didn't enter. Please fix this soon!! I don't want to have to start over with a new app. I have an iPhone 5s with the latest iOS. Please please fix soon, thanks!!

title: Redownload the app!!!!
body: If the app doesn't open after the update, delete and redownload it!! Mine did the same thing but after I redownloaded it it worked!!

title: Entered info disappears
body: Since the bug fix the info that I enter disappears and this is very frustrating.  I enter breakfast, lunch and when I go to enter dinner all the previous entered data is gone.  Also, every time I engage the app it asks me to log in.  The prior version Kept me logged in.  I hope this gets fixed because I will go to another app.

title: Very useful/ effective
body: This app really works by showing you your calorie intake everyday, and showing you the calorie amount in everything you eat. Great app

title: Tracking calories etc...
body: Great for tracking meals/ calories, fat, carbs etc... Even sodium! Impressed! My only issue is the "blog" section... Wish it was more user friendly... And had more options for responding etc...

title: Compatability
body: I gave it four stars because I think my plate and fit bit should work together so the fit bit app will pull the calories entered into my plate and my plate should pull the excersize/activity from fit bit.

title: Best Weight Loss Tool
body: This app is the best tool I've used to help keep me on track with my weight loss!  It's simple, and provides a lot of useful information to guide me in the overwhelming task of losing weight.

title: Replaces Weigh Watches
body: I dropped my membership with weight watchers. I now use this along with I health and I can track my calorie intake, steps, carbs, etc. all in one place. Also there is no $20 a month fee.

title: Amazing Application
body: This app is easy very user friendly and a great way to document your food and stay on track with your daily activity. Thank you to the creator of MyPlate.

title: Food tracker
body: This food tracker has made it easy to keep track of what I eat in a day. It's amazing to see how much more a person eats than they think they do. Good selection of pre-entered foods.

title: I LOVE THIS APP
body: I adore this app, I've been trying to lose weight and this help keeps track of the calories. I love it, and I highly suggest it to anyone who's trying to lose weight and not starve themselves.

title: Awesome app!
body: This app is crazy awesome! I can't believe it's this easy to keep track of everything and really helps me stay up on fuel for starting this new workout I'm doing (body beast)

title: A must for daily tracking!
body: This app is awesome!  I love how easy it is to use.  I have tried other apps such as my fitness pal, but this one is my new go to app for calorie counting.  I absolutely love it!

title: My review
body: This is the best app I ever downloaded 1.you will save a lot of money 2. You can eat junk food but not a lot 3. It counts your weight 3. It is very easy to make so I suggest that you download this app !!!!!!

title: Great App
body: Compared to other apps that assist in managing your daily calories, this app is well designed and doesn't crash!  A great tool to keep you on track to a healthy eating habits.

title: Great!
body: I love this app. I didn't realize how many calories I took in each day until I started using this app it's wonderful.

title: Success!
body: I am new to attempting management of my weight. This app, along with cycling, has enabled me to reduce my weight in a healthy manner. The app provides easy record keeping to identify trends and monitor my progress.

title: Very useful and helpful
body: I find the reminder system to be the most useful tool so far- it pokes me into tracking my foods, reminding me to eat right and track. A very handy tool.

title: Works for me!
body: No other app or weight loss/maintenance plan has worked better than this app. Easy and the input of consumed food really helps me to control my intake.

title: Lack of editing, results too vague.
body: This app is good in theory, but when there are ten others just like it that will allow you to edit the things you put in, delete if you make a mistake and gives you helpful tips... Why would you use this app? There are no suggestions or nutritional guidelines to help you determine what types of food are making up your diet. Second rate I'd say.

title: Awesome!
body: I love this app! Especially since the update. It's so easy to track calories, water, exercise and weight with this. Totally worth buying if you need to track.

title: Love!
body: This is the best calorie counter ever. It really makes it as simple as possible and it marks your progress so you can keep your goal in mind. I've already lost 5 lbs! Keep up the good work!

title: Great app
body: This app is intuitively easy to use and contains a huge database of foods

title: My Best Friend
body: I've lost 10 lbs in a week and a half and couldn't have done it without My Plate. The App keeps me honest and has me working harder than ever to see my weight progress spiral downward.

title: Price is right.
body: I prefer this one to myfitnesspal, but that's likely just a familiarity thing. Good food database, works without glitches. Too many ads, but if you're not feeling frugal, you could do something about that.

title: Great app
body: This app is great for keeping track of calories for those of us who don't like to keep pulling up a calculator or look up calories of certain foods. I use it everyday and I'm doing great!

title: Not enough data
body: Great app. Doesn't track my weight the way I wish it would. And I wish it had more foods already in the system so I don't have to program so many. But other than that, I love this app.

title: 1 week
body: I have only had this for a week, but so far so good. No complaints whatsoever.  I am really enjoying the points u can earn too. That's an even greater motivated to stay on tract.

title: Awesome
body: This app is by far the best one at keeping my eating to a minimum. It has almost every food you can think to help count your calories. I'm never deleting it!!

title: Awesome
body: The best calorie tracker app ive used. I downloaded various ones to see which one i liked better. And here is the winner :). I recommend this app to anyone who is serious about loosing weight. I love this app

title: Love it!
body: Been trying for years to lose weight and feel that this app is finally making it seem attainable.

title: Awesome
body: Really helps me keep track of what I eat. I do add a couple more calories to the food that is already given cause I found sometimes it actually gives less calories. I still love it though!

title: Success!
body: Been using this app for less than 2 weeks & am very pleased with it. Very easy to use. Have lost 2 lbs already and have a slow loss goal of 1 lb per week.

title: Absolutely Love it!!!
body: Great app. Lost 5 pounds in first week. Helps me to know what I eat and how many calories. It has made me much more aware of my diet. Hoping to hit my first goal of 20 lbs off. This will definitely help.

title: Missing important features
body: Doesn't provide enough info on how much of each macro nutrient you should be eating, & doesn't track micro nutrients at all. Just straight up calories and fat/carb/protein balance. If you aren't worried about sugars vs other carbs, or different types of fat, or how many grams of protein, it would be ok, but those matter to me.  I do like the mPoints system.

title: Great tracking program
body: By tracking what you eat it gives you a heads up of your calorie intake and makes you think twice about what you are eating or what you at about to eat.  Really nice program.

title: Just starting...
body: I just started using this app and I think it will really help to motivate me. The only thing I had an issue with was deleting a diary item if I needed to or editing a food item after entering the information in.

title: Very good, a few drawbacks.
body: Excellent app, easy to use. Wish that there were some kind of recipe-math option so I didn't have to do it all myself when I cook. Would also be nice if they separated whole-grain carbs from their more processed cousins.

title: Helpful
body: I think this program is helpful

title: It really helped me to see where i was overeating & how snacks add up. I've lost 30 lbs since April.
body: Easy to use-has really helped me cut down on bad snacking habits & make better food choices-just started but have dropped a few pounds already!

title: App user
body: I think this app is great! Very user friendly, mpoints provide incentive and motivation to track daily and it automatically calculates your recommended calorie intake for your goals!!

title: Good
body: I'm enjoying using this app. It's a little slow, but at least I'm not having to put all the calorie counts in manually, although I do have to do some! After a few days I will probably upgrade!

title: Wonderful!
body: Great and intuitive. Crashes too often otherwise I would give it a 5. I was able to find virtually everything I looked for as a food item for quick entry.

title: This App is Great
body: They need to keep up with new foods from the fast food industry a little better. But the App is great. And they have 99% of all of the foods available & it's easy to add foods not in their database. Thumbs Up!!!

title: Working great so far
body: Are used to have calorie count app, but it seems like it's been replaced by something else.

title: Zero stars
body: I was excited to get this app and start using it!  Unfortunately there is no way to even sign up. I get thru all the steps and and then choose a user name and then it says "there was a problem with the returned data from the server". Super frustrating and I've tried about 10 times to create an account.  Will be deleting and never re-downloading.
response: Hi there! This message means that you already have a LIVESTRONG.COM account with us under the email address you're using to register. Please email us at support@livestrong.com so we can sort this out!

title: Favorite tracker app
body: Super easy to use and there are a lot of features available that are not behind the pay wall.

title: Quick, Simple, Helpful
body: Easy interface with plenty of food options to help track your eating habits.

title: So helpful!
body: I use this app daily to track my progress. I just the way it keeps up with my daily intake and exercise, even my water amounts!

title: Not for me
body: The first thing the app asked me when I opened it up was if I wanted to gain weight or lose weight. I'm at a healthy weight as it is, I want to maintain it! I just want a way to track my diet. This seems like an awesome app other than that... I just wish it had more options.
response: Hi! Thank you for your review! Once you've set up a profile, you can edit your settings to maintain your weight. To do this, click Account > Edit Profile > Weekly Target. Please email us at support@livestrong.com if you have any questions!

title: Awesome app
body: Love this app and the fact that not only is it open source where users can upload info on foods but it also has medical organizations backing it

title: Pretty easy to use
body: This app is pretty user friendly. Some items are harder to find than others. I haven't figured out the recipe part. But for a free app, pretty good

title: So far so good.
body: The app prompts you to rate it before you even have a chance to document your first meal.. that's pretty annoying but other than that üòí

title: Easy
body: This food tracking app is so easy to use unlike the other ones i tried using

title: Simply works
body: Tracking your food keeps you on track and keeps you balanced!! Like checking in with nutritionist

title: I used to love this app, until June 29 update.
