body: I use this app daily. It keeps me on track with my weight loss program. However, with the June 29th update the scanner function no longer works. It will not sync any longer with UPC codes on packaging. I rated the app a 5, until now.

title: Fav tap and track app
body: Like this one way better than fitness pal. Makes tracking my macros easy and has a huge library.

title: Ehhhhhh
body: It's great for tracking food but the activity tracker has glitches- one minute it tells me my actual calories burned then it disappears and goes back to 0.

title: I like this app
body: I've been using this app for a few months now and I like how it interfaces with my IWatch and IPhone. The one negative is that it does not read many of the barcodes of store brand products that I use.

title: Really helpful and easy to use!
body: honestly i downloaded this yesterday and it has a lot of functions. it really helps you stay healthy and motivated, i love it.

title: Used to love - now it's terrible
body: This was my favorite nutrition app - I've used it daily for the last 5 months. But since the upgrade last week it is terrible. The dailyMacros chart is gone and the progress feature is less useful. Very poor decision making to change the features. I don't plan on continuing to use it if it does not revert back or improve

title: Best food tracking app!!!!
body: I love this app!! It had the best graphics, it's easy to use and has the best and more comprehensive food database!!

title: Nice app
body: The update makes the app look so much nicer and less of my personal business just out on a screen. I do wish it had an option for higher weight loss and extra free tips on how to shed pounds.

title: Awesome app
body: Only thing they could do is maybe add a daily motivation quote and add exercises to pick from like walking and running up steps..... I want to log it but I have no clue how many cals I burn

title: One month in
body: I have lost 6 lbs and I use this app everyday. I'm able to track everything and it keeps track of my I-phone steps. Love it!

title: Great way to keep focused on goals!
body: This app is easy to use and has many options so you're reminded to keep track of so many lifestyle moves.

title: Love but disagree with it (sometimes)
body: Don't get me wrong I love this app, I don't believe their daily calorie goals are realistic.  I feel like this app doesn't take your age and current weight into account to calculate your daily calorie goal.

title: Nice alternative
body: Been using myfitnesspal for a while but really prefer the interface of this app. Easy to enter food intake and track daily macros. Wish the food database was a little bigger but overall very good!

user_name: I love and it's so beautiful
title: Awesome
body: I like charting down my good and making sure that I don't reach past my limit. This app helps a lot and is a bonus because it's a new year!

title: Like but not love
body: I like the app and its simplicity, however the library of food items needs increased also, when scanning barcodes I receive error messages that the scanner is having an issue. I updated the app and I am using a iPhone 6plus. Please fix.

title: Newest update destroyed my profile
body: I previously loves this app. It has helped me lose around 35 lbs in the past few months. The newest update deleted all my information and added in other people's. I found so much motivation in watching my weight, nutrition and bmi drop in the chart. Now it is all over the place and months of data is lost. Very upset and disappointed.

title: Nice to have!
body: I love having this app, and have been using it over two years.  Use it, but know it has many features I haven't even explored.  üëçüèº

title: Great App
body: I love this app it is one of the few apps that uses the iWatch information correctly... The only thing I would recommend is adding more workout variations.

title: Great!
body: Wonderful app to track calories and other things... you can even track Water! The app also works on Windows 8 (which is good for me)!

title: Very Hood
body: Very Good, Not excellent. Calorie count is lower than the real count. It's a bit 'dodgy'  to learn. I will try to learn and work with it to save $.  It requires more time and patience to use than South Beach, but I may end up switching to save a few bucks.  Thanks,

title: Outstanding App!
body: This app is a plus for anyone who is serious about staying on track when dieting or maintaining their weight! Reminders are a real plus!

title: Opens your eyes & keeps you honest
body: Good app. The difference between what you think you consume versus what you actually consume by recording it is eye opening. I'm not at my fitness goals yet but this app has put me on the right track.

title: love it
body: I love this app cause I can scan almost everything it's a little of sometimes but its better that other ones that I used thanks!!!

title: Very helpful
body: This app is incredibly easy to use and is the best at what it does. It makes living healthy easy and simple. I highly recommend this

title: Wonderfully Annoying
body: This app will remind you at every meal to track and has every food you can possibly consume. Wonderful little app

title: Amazing app
body: Makes counting nutrients and calories, protein and everything so freaking simple!! Using the scanner is effortless and so convenient. Saves a huge amount of time. Thank you so much.

title: Amazing Weight Loss Tool
body: Link this app with your health app built in your iPhone and it tracks how many calories you've burned on top of how many calories you've consumed . It's great !

title: Love this App
body: This app makes it so easy to count calories and lose weight.  I've used it for 4 weeks and have lost over 10 lbs steadily and eating really well.

title: Ok, needs improvement
body: I really like this app- the calorie tracker and weight tracker are good.

title: Awesome app
body: Since I been tracking my food I been able to lose 5 lbs in less than 2 weeks eating healthier and following calories

title: Glad I've got this one!
body: I really like how easy this app is to use. Helps me see the amount of water I've been drinking in addition to the nutrition. Glad I've got this one!

title: Great app
body: I track my food, my weight it just makes it a lot easier to track everything all in one app

title: Bug issue
body: Left panel that includes calories eaten for each meal does not change with the day. I can only change the date with the diary. But  the left panel is remaining my first day of tracking. Frustrating to not see how many calories I have left

title: Very useful for tracking food, water, and exercise.
body: Most all the foods I look up are available. I like the macro nutrient tracker and weight goals functions too.

title: Simply intuitive
body: The app allows for quick and easy tracking of what you eat. This is due primarily to the extensive database of food stuff. Click type and you're tracked.

title: Tortega
body: I have used this app got about 2 years and I really like it. Very easy to use and very insightful with what I eat daily, and what I burn daily. It had help me with my daily routine and it had help me be more conscious with my activity level.

title: Data are Incorrect
body: While the app seems to track items fairly well, I have found many instances where the nutrition data are incorrect. It would be very useful if end users could customize or edit the nutritional information for any item in their meals. This is a major headache.

title: Good for weight loss
body: This app makes calorie counting easy with several nice visual representations of the data. Large food library and scan tool are excellent features in tis app.

title: Great App
body: Good app.  I gave it four stars because when adding in exercise, I would still like to see the total calories left for the day without adding in the exercise calories burned.  Other than that live the App!

title: Love it!
body: I just got the app last night, and I put in all my calories for the day. I was under the goal to lose 2 lbs per week! Can't wait to start losing!!

title: Loving it
body: Makes it so easy to track my calories. Never been great at tracking them before and it's no problem now!

title: Love it!
body: Love it! So much food to choose from and love the exercise and water intake tracker. Keeps me in check with my caloric intake definitely recommend I'm a personal trainer and have clients using it too awesome tool

title: Live strong Great ap!!!
body: Love this ap.  Very simple and having the exercise calories really makes it easy.  Can find every food or at least something comparable.

title: Helpful to a degree
body: The scanner does not scan all the time unless is perfectly flat, any little thing and it does not work. Is useful for searching foods though and keeping track.

title: Love this app!
body: It makes it super easy to eat healthy, which is more of a challenge at college. Very pleased with this app! For the exercises, the calories burned are different than what the machine tells me so I'm not sure which is more accurate.

title: Awesome app
body: I use this app everyday. Very useful for people who are serious of watching their weight and calorie intake. Use this app! You wont regret it! It takes dedication but you get used to it!

title: Pretty good
body: This app is pretty good, but has a way to go to build its' food library.  There are a lot of foods missing compared to other similar apps I've used.  I do like the fact that it's part of the mPoints rewards system.

title: Fix things!
body: The app LOOKS good and has an easy layout, but it only works half the time! I'm having to delete it and go with another calorie tracker because some days I can't even use it. Today the search function isn't working and the community tab is being glitchy.

title: Awesome
body: Love this app! I have never had to manually enter a food, even things you wouldn't expect! I think they went to a grocery store and entered everything!

title: Mes
body: Calorie tracker for exercise is not accurate. Not many exercises to choose from, no dance to choose. Constant reminders and pop ups to claim points, I don't care about points, I want the app, which is easy to use, not all the add on mess.

title: Tech support analyst
body: I love this app! It helps me track my calories, shows me my protein/carb/fat ratios and allows me to track my weight. It even texts me a reminder if I forget to track my eating!

title: LOVE THIS!
body: This app helps me control & track my cal + water + protein intake in a very easy & efficient manner which i love :)

title: Love it!
body: Great App! I started using this App couple days ago. It help me track what I eat and is easy to use. I already lost 3pds just eating a little bit more healthy and working out. Love this App!!!

title: Nice!
body: Is a wonderful tool for tracking calories on a daily basis. Excercise feature isn't very accurate tho, and it needs a bigger variety of excercises to choose from so that you can track more accurately.

title: Great app!!!
body: Really works, I've used it for a week and I already see results. If you stick with it and are very honest with the points you will see progress.

title: Organizer
body: Fast never crashes every food is listed never eat all my calories lets me know when I forgot it love it calculates calories burning when I exercise

title: Amazing
body: I love this app, and the features on this app is great. Helps me track everything and keeps me under my 1200 calories a day. Totally would recommend this!

title: Great
body: This app has been really helpful in that it helps me keep track of how many calories I eat during the day. I've already lost weight!

title: Mom/Wife/Employee/Volunteer/Jack of all Trades
body: I am a very black & white person - I need to lose a lot of weight and needed a simple straightforward calorie counter and weight tracker - livestrong lite has been exactly what I needed. Love it!

title: My favorite app
body: They have everything and you can customize. I've tried a lot of these and the lite version has it all.

title: I only it would exercise for me too ...
body: Informative app, makes it easy to tack food and progress. Easy to use and understand. Overall very helpful with eating better and helping me to realize what I consume in a day.

title: This really works.
body: I've been using this app for about a month now and so far I haven't experienced any technical difficulties. This is the best calorie tracker app that I've used yet.

title: Very good
body: Tracking exercise is a tad annoying with things like push ups and sit ups, but it's easy enough to look up. Otherwise, very good. Helps keep me accountable.

title: Weight Loss Must Have
body: The easiest way for me to lose weight is to measure my food and keep a daily log of what I eat. I couldn't stay on track without this app!

title: Great...
body: App! Works perfectly alongside my work health challenge. It does not work sometimes but only when I don't have 3G in some places but other than that it's great.

title: Helpful
body: This app is very user friendly and helpful when counting calories. The added incentives with the point system helps too! With there was a barcode scanner for food on this version

title: Wow great app
body: Not all foods yet but almost everything. Like that I can enter food when not on Internet as long as they are already register. Full off line would be nice.

title: Love it!!!
body: This is a very simple app to keep track of your weight tracking needs! It's not too complicated that you don't have time to use.

title: Great App!
body: I love the search function for food and exercise! It helps me plan my day and reach my calorie goal for that day. I have the lite version, and it works just fine for me!

title: Great
body: It keeps track of your weight. It is a great app. But, some of the items seem inaccurate in fat content. Plus, you have to search for the item you are looking for. You can't get a list to choose from. If u make these improvements, I will totally give 5 stars!!

title: Great tool

title: Useful

title: Great free calorie app

title: Love it

title: Thank you!
body: Thanks for fixing the issues I had with the last update I love this design so much better and the pie graph is far better thanks!

title: Awesome program
body: The only thing it can't give you like any other weight loss program is discipline. But I certainly prefer counting calories and eating what I want. Love this!

title: Easy to use calorie counter
body: This is my favorite calorie counter app out of the numerous ones I've tried. It's easy to use and is very helpful in locating weight.

title: Why have the ability to manually set goals
body: Why have the ability to manually set goals if the app won't let me keep what I set.   I have been to my doctor who told me that I should have 1100 calories but it won't allow that. Also my protein, carb and fats are different.  Canceling my gold subscription.   Very disappointed that I can't taylor this to my needs
response: Hi Mombrowning. For safety reasons, 1200 calories per day is the minimum caloric goal allowed by the MyPlate calculator. This is commonly considered the lowest a number of calories a person can eat in a day without doctor supervision. Since most of our users do not check with a doctor before taking on such a goal, or are unable to do, we implemented this as a safety feature.

title: Handy and Healthful Helper!
body: This app is a tremendous boon to those trying to change their dieting habits. It allows you to see how what you eat/drink affects your goals and informs you of how your exercise contributes.

title: I ‚ù§Ô∏è this app!

title: I LOVE IT!!!
body: This is an awesome app I love because when we exercise to burn calories we get to see someone on screen do it and you can make sure your doing the exercise rightüëçüèº

title: Mr

title: My go-to

title: FANTASTIC!!!!!
body: This app is simply amazing!! I used to track everything by pen and paper in a small notebook. You all dont know how easy you have it with this app!!! Incredible job developers!

title: Simple

title: Awesome!

title: Update

Very glitchy and not easy and clean. I wish you would change it back. I was going to go gold because I've lost 5 pounds! But I'm very disappointed and need to look for a new app

title: What is going on?
body: I downloaded this app thinking it was going to be better than lose it, because it deducted the calories you burn from you steps! But it won't record all of them. Also I just spent extra money to upgrade so I could see the clean eating guide AND ITS NOT THERE!!!! ANYWHERE!!! I'm not happy. And I'm hoping I can get my money back.
response: Hi Freddy Love- we're so sorry you've had this experience. Please email us at support@livestrong.com so we can help you out!

title: Love it

title: fabulous!

title: LOVE IT

title: Such a great app!

title: Love this App!

title: I like it but ...

title: Needs is, needs to sun w/Fitbit, needs to catch up

title: My favorite food tracker

title: A great long term aid for eating well!

title: Accountability

title: A Great Alternative!

title: Almost all foods are in diary

title: Constant Syncing Problems
body: I have been using various versions of Livestrong apps for a long time. And I have always had problems with it syncing. I enter data in the app and I enter data on the webpage. When I enter the data on the webpage there's a good chance it's not going to show up on the app. I have opened numerous support tickets about this, and they have never fixed it.

title: Very easy to use

body: Great app as far as convenience, although serving size should include weight along with volume. Volume gets you a good ballpark idea but for the people like myself that measure each serving this added feature would be nice

title: Handy app

title: Awesome

title: Easy and useful

title: It's OK -
body: Useful and easy to navigate, but some of the "LS verified" items are NOT correct! Ex: cheez-it snack crackers fat and carbs are way off, but calories are listed correctly. I still use it, but have to double check everything which is a pain! And probably why I don't track everyday.

title: Easy to Use But Inaccurate Calorie Limit

title: iPad doesn't sync

title: Great app

title: Great
body: Numbers don't lie thanks for remaining calorie tracking bar brilliant and motivating please expand exercise base so we can stay in app than surf  all this and mPoints too really powerful motivation!

title: Perfect!

Love this app! Super easy to use and track calories on. I only wish there were a way to email your daily food log out!

Will be deleting from my iPhone ASAP.

title: Very helpful app

title: Not accurate

Somehow it shows I consumed over 1,600mg of sodium. Readings on carbs and fat don't add up either. I only ate 1,400 calories on a vegetarian diet, so how could I surpass the RDA for fat, carbs and protein? Not very useful.
response: Hello- thank you for your feedback! Our team is aware of this issue and is working to resolve.

body: Why not just say your not
response: Hi Paul! Unfortunately, mPoints is shutting down their rewards program and has cancelled all agreements with the publishers in their network. We have removed mPoints from our MyPlate app as it is no longer a functional program.
