body: I absolutely love this app!! Whether you're trying to lose weight or just eat healthier I highly recommend it! It's super easy to use & I love all the features on it!!

title: Great app!
body: Helps put calories, carbs, protein etc. consumed into perspective and is a great motivating tool. Also, has been a good reminder to stay hydrated and log my water intake. I recommend this app.

title: Review from Savilla
body: I think it is really good to have because you know what you have ate helps you reach your goal in the most simple way

title: Best calorie counting app I can imagine
body: Even has a lot of the local restaurants in it or easily can find a similar item to keep track of what I'm eating.

title: The only thing keeps me eating healthy!
body: I tried other apps. Simply not as good. This one is comprehensive, easy to use, straightforward.

title: Great app!
body: So easy to use! I love the reminders to keep me on track. It's got everything you need to get healthy at your fingertips. All you need to do is get the app!

title: Great Food Index
body: This app has an amazing variety of foods you can choose from to track your calories. It is the best tracking app I have found yet.

title: Awesome app
body: They are really great about reminders and encouraging you to keep tracking! I think it's an amazing app, definitely great for tracking calories and weight

title: Easy to integrate. Text alerts helpful
body: Alerts are annoying but motivating. Most food items present.  Water app great. Like it and easy to use

title: Great app
body: I gave this app a very low rating initially however I found all the things I needed to add and delete things. Great app play with it before you give it a rating.

title: Super helpful
body: This app is very helpful. The main problem is just keeping yourself on track and remembering to enter your information.

title: Easy to use
body: This app is great for finding the calories of what you are eating. Very easy to use and helpful to track your food.

title: What a disaster
body: This used to be my favorite app but TWICE now glitches have happened and erased my tracked data. This has happened during the past 6 months. I opened it today and even my profile was switched. Different weight, height, gender and goals. This so a disaster and I'm very disappointed. I cannot count on this app to hold and keep my data.  They need a new team.

title: Love the Edits!
body: Love the improvements to the app, especially the food finder - much easier to find the actual foods, and no longer have to input! Very helpful, and beautiful design.

title: My Plate
body: I started using this app a week ago and have lost 5 pounds in that week..I would suggest this app to anyone who is ready and willing to start dropping the pounds

title: Macros not updating correctly.
body: Macros don't update when you enter multiple servings. The calorie count updates correctly but the macros won't increase with multiple servings. This causes confusion when you reach your caloric intake for the day but the macros are low according to the nutrition section. The only work around is to add multiple servings individually. You really need to fix your app.

title: Much improve!
body: I used the earlier version of the app and this is a huge improvement.  Very easy to use. Much more user friendly!!!

title: My plate
body: Great app for tracking calories and losing weight. Only complaint is that there is no way to cancel water intake if you mistakenly state you drank a certain amount.

title: Love it! Now if only UP24 worked w/it.
body: The community is awesome and helpful! I have tried MyFitnessPal and others, but come back to MyPlate because it's just simply BETTER! Just needs to be able to work with my UP24 tracker to be near perfection for me.

title: Good except..
body: Tracking food is good but there are not enough options for tracking exercise unless you are using the exercise programs specific to this site.

title: So much better than MyFitness Pal
body: Really like the whole app experience especially the latest updates. All of the extra stuff is great

title: Have you tried turning it off and then back on again?
body: The app crashed all over the place after the update.

title: Best App so far!!!
body: I like this app better then the a few others that I've tried.  This one seems to have more if the food choices that I eat.

title: Helpful
body: This app is helpful in keeping track of my goals and helping me figure out where my food choices are lacking!

title: Awesome!!
body: Great app with lots of support from the community. I have lost weight using this app a couple years ago, and I mean a good amount (100lbs). I have put some back on and so I'm back at it. Thanks LS!!

title: Accountability!
body: If you want to lose weight and eat healthy, this app is designed to track your food intake and your exercise.

title: Definitely makes you aware of what you eat!!!
body: I like this app definitely need to think about what you eat. I have thought twice about eating a few foods for fear of going over my daily intake...

title: Great app
body: Love this app. With it's help on tracking calories and weight, I have lost 6 lbs in 10 days. The only thing I don't really like is how it doesn't calculate the exercise calories lost too well. But other than that I love it.

title: Love this app!
body: This app has actually helped me a lot! I've lost 8lbs since I started using it a month ago. Great app & very easy to use. Definitely worth the download!

title: Pretty Good
body: I like a bright colors and how there is a pic to go with the food, but some of the pics don't match the item and I wish it had additional measurements like 1/8.  Also, I'm finding that their calorie counts are sometimes higher than what's on the actual package.

title: Ok
body: App is easy to use, but I wish it were easier to change the amount of water after it has already been logged. And there needs to be different options for exercises

title: Decent app, annoying frequent/recent food lists
body: I liked this app, but the latest version crashes frequently and wipes all the data each time so you lose all you history, custom foods, etc. I won't use it again till they get an update out to address the crashing

title: Great app!!
body: I've already lost weight using this app. I originally just downloaded it for the mPoints, but it's turned out to be fantastic!! Highly recommend!!

title: Great app
body: Great app! Helped me control my diabetes 2 and my overweight. Lost 76 lbs in 9 months by journaling with My Plate my food intake and exercise. Easy to use to yourself accountable and motivated as you log your progress.

title: Wide Directory
body: I love the diversity of the foods that are listed in their directory.

title: Very Useful
body: I like this App. It is not perfect but it gets the job done by helping me track my calories. I would definitely recommend it to someone who is keeping track of their nutrition.

title: Best thing EVER!
body: This has helped me so much on how much I eat and it's basically given me a great conscious on what I'm eating! I've lost 10 lbs so far and only using for 2-3 weeks! This helps so much!!!!

title: Just started
body: I love this app I can easily track what I eat what exercise I do and I find it very easy to follow. I'm on day 2 and so no weight loss as of yet but I'm feeling good about this.

title: Good. I recommend it.
body: I've been using the app for a couple weeks. It's easy to use / learn. I like that I can scan items for the calorie counter.

title: Love it so far!
body: MyFitnessPal may or may not be the #1 app for counting calories but found it confusing, plus it stalled a couple times. Livestrong is so much clearer and easier to use.

title: Pretty easy to work with
body: I like this app. Breaks everything down and is very easy to use. Needs some work though. I try scanning a lot of things but don't seem to Be in their system.

title: Love it!
body: This is one of my favorite tracking app and I love the rewards, I have several mpoint apps :) I haven't had any problems with the current version

title: Helps keep track
body: This app is great to keep calories at a certain level and stick to it. It might not be perfectly accurate, but most foods are here and can be tracked. Keeps it easy!

title: Just started
body: I like it a lot! I gave it a 4 because my calorie goal adjusted on its own and I can't change it. Other than that, it is close to perfect. I like how it has my Herbalife products pre-populated. Thanks Livestrong!

title: Great
body: It's a great app that reminds you if you haven't tracked today or something but there needs to be more exercise things to chose from.  But over all a great app.

title: Excellent excellent app
body: Live strong has one of the best food data bases out there. Thanks for this free app.  Detroiters:  Its data base is so specific, it lists the JL Hudson Maurice Salad (now at Macy's).  You know the history!  More: Sam's rotisserie chicken. Stuff like that.

title: Keeps it Simple
body: I've never been a calorie counter, so this works because its simple and not this big process. All I want is quick feedback and this does the trick. Major shortcoming is no UPC scanner though.

title: Delightful!
body: Such a good tracker! It reminds me at 2 o'clock everyday to track and it has almost every food and exercises listed its just perfect!!! I'm so happy:) finally losing weight is somewhat "EASY";)

title: Nice app
body: Easy to use and has a large database of foods with caloric contents. Would be an upgrade if you could scan the package with your phone and the exact nutritional values popped up.

title: Nice
body: Quick and convenient way to keep track of calories. A definite must for anyone trying to lose weight on a self-made diet plan.

title: Great app!!!
body: It is helping me keep a track of what I eat (even when dining out) which is one of my problems to obesity. I use it along with another app for exercising.

title: awesome
body: this is great I can track my calories and write it down even just being on the program I have a six pack now and not of beer

title: Great App
body: I love this App. It helps me stay on track with not only my calories but also carbs and protein. I have been using this app for 2 weeks and have lost 10 lbs. It's really a great app!

title: Great app
body: I've been using it for a few weeks now and it has helped me lose 5 pounds...I never realized how much junk I was putting in my body!!!

title: Needs better initial instruction
body: Great for tracking caloric intake and burn. Would help to have more instruction when beginning. Gets easier to use after 2 days. I love the ability to monitor all of the details.

title: Best calorie app out there!!!
body: This is such an amazing app!! Best one I have tried, all others were deleted!! Can't believe it's free. Get it while it still is, I bet it won't be for long

title: Easy & Exciting
body: The ease of this apps gives me no excuse not to use it to track progress. I actually get excited to log weight and food!

title: Love it!
body: This is a much better set-up than the old Livestrong App. It doesn't seem to have all the exercises the old one did though. It is still awesome.

title: Good!!
body: I like the app for what it is. Calories are very easy to track along with your exercise. Only thing I really don't understand is the mpoints. Really unsure about those.

title: My plate
body: This has been a great way for me to track my foods!! Makes you very aware of what is going in your mouth. My only wish is if they would integrate a recipe nutrition calculator!

title: Feels like a game!
body: This app makes tracking exercise and diet a little more fun and feel less like a chore. It's like a game with points and rewards. I recommend it highly.

title: Very helpful
body: Every time I eat something all I have to do is search what I ate how much I ate and it counts all the calories for me and let's me know how much I have left its super easy and majorly helpful!! ^_^

title: Love It!
body: I'm on the road to eat healthier and start exercising, and this app is free and so easy to use! I've been staying within my daily caloric intake goal because of the ease of this app.

title: Does not track ALL food nutrition
body: I bought this app after reading some reviews that you could enter food nutrition easily. Immediately when opened the app and began, it only has several things you can enter about the food. I bought it to track all my nutritional needs and minerals Daily, so I wasted 1.99 and am now looking for another app.
response: Hello! We apologize for the experience you've had! Our team is working on an update that will allow you to enter macro as well as micronutrients for custom foods. Also, the app is free so you should not have been charged $1.99. We don't offer any features at this price. Please email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions!

title: Way better than alternatives.
body: When the diet app I was using previously decided to not be free any longer, I moved to this one and I could not be happier.

title: Keeps Me Focused
body: Very easy to use and it helps me when it comes to kidding myself about my caloric intake even when I am not dieting. Highly recommended.

title: Awesome App!
body: This has helped me stay focused and keep myself accountable in my eating/health goals. Very easy to use so it does not add stress in any way, just a lot of very useful information.

title: Love this!
body: Couldn't find an all in one diet app that I could actually use. This one has extensive food lists, notifications and so much more...

title: Keeps me in track and is easy to use
body: The scanning barcode feature makes this app a breeze

title: Great App
body: Tried it out to keep track of eating and exercise and it works great I can find all the foods I eat too. Download it now plus it's easy to use

title: Great free app
body: Love a lot of features of this app. The meal tracking is easy to use and see your data. The only feature I find is missing is he ability to input your own macro nutrients.

title: Thank you for the update.
body: This version now allows you to see macros.  This is better than the version that didn't list them.

title: Easy to use
body: I love this app.  I use it especially to track calories, cholesterol, carbs and sugar. This is a fabulous way to track eating!  The scanner makes eating packaged foods so easy!

title: Good tracker
body: I said out to eat healthier and exercise more. The barcode scanner makes it easy to feed the program household foods. Works best on larger (than iPhone 4s) format screens. Actually kind of enjoy the community aspect.

title: Update has killed this app
body: I like the app and the ease of use, but the recent update has left me looking for a different app.... Won't stay logged in, lost all my info, changed my personal info, changed my calorie intake, now app won't open at all üò§

title: Lost everything!
body: I have had this app for over a year & the latest update frozen on the front page with no way to access. I had to download it again and it lost all my history. Even though I have the same sign in & password! Super annoying!

title: Keeps crashing with new update
body: I used to have no problems with this app, but the latest update has made it so every time I open it- it just crashes and closes. I still get notifications but I just can't open it anymore. Please fix this or I'll have to use another app.

title: Helpful, but...
body: Anytime I gain some weight (most recently after a loss... Or a rough and lazy winter) this app helps me shed... but lately I've noticed it doesn't seem to store my exercise properly and that is annoying ! But otherwise ok!!!

title: Used to work great
body: I had been using this app for a while and loved how it tracked what I ate, however a new update came out and it had me resign in every time I exited the app. This was very annoying and time consuming. What's worse is now all the app does is crash before I'm even able to sign in. Please fix!

title: Amazing
body: 10 out of 10 but I wish you didn't have to pay premium

title: Great app
body: I use it to track my carbs.  I scan items in and it comes right up. I only have one problem and it's not being able to add in the fiber and alcohol sugar so I can subtract it from total carbs I consume. I love this app! It's great!

title: Great app!
body: It works like you want it to work! It's simple. How you use it makes sense and you will be proficient sooner than you might expect. I like this app a lot.

title: A MIRACLE !!!
body: It is truly an eye opener to "see" what and the quantity eaten.  I have not lost much weight in two weeks, but I have managed to keep my diabetic blood sugar under 150.  I'm on my way to steady numbers

title: Great app, works just like the site
body: Great app, integrates with iPhone health functionality to track movements and has wide amount of foods to track what you are eating.

title: Good-Eh
body: I like this app for tracking food and weight, but I don't like that if you type in the wrong amount of water you drank that day it won't let you fix it. Currently it has 8 oz preset in the water tracker, so if you forget to delete that 8 it thinks you drank 832 oz of water instead of 32 oz.

title: Good App
body: This is a really good app but I agree with other reviewers that the calorie count and nutrition information for a lot of the foods is not correct. You have to really be careful about choosing, even ones that say they are verified.

title: Great app
body: Great app. User friendly interface. A wealth of options for tracking food and fitness. My preferred app after trying several.

title: Great Tool
body: Have tried several apps for macronutrient tracking, and this is the best by far. Love the scanning capability, and the library is well established, so most scans work.

title: Excellent app for tracking nutrition
body: Almost every common food item is listed and it's now very easy to add a new item from the app.

title: So easy to use!!!
body: Omg I love his app and they have everything on here like food wise it's amazing and you can track your workouts and weight!!! Thanks live strong!

title: It's a great app!
body: I try to hard to lose weight. It's been a struggle. But this app has made the progress easier! This app has the most extensive list of foods! !!!Yay no more guessing !!

title: Glitches
body: I really like this app, but they really need to update it. You can't erase a food item if you entered it incorrectly. You can't change your weight loss goal. It's just stays the way it is. Then, on the message boards, if you make a mistake, you can't erase your e-mail. It's very frustrating. They need to fix it.

title: Update won't open?
body: I've been using this app for almost two years and never had an issue. After the latest update, I'm unable to open it. I'll soon be switching to myfitnesspal if it's not fixed...

title: My Plate App
body: Love this app.  After day 3, my data also was compromised.  I was frustrated.  However, I logged out of the app, then logged backed in, and my data was back.

title: Great App!
body: Best App out there for tracking calories - simple, clean design makes losing weight less of a mystery - calories in, calories out thats all there is to it

title: Pretty good...
body: Has a wide variety of foods to choose, üòä but not exercises üòï. And I don't like that you can't use it offline. I like that you can enter in your own foods, too. I rate it an 87%

title: Great App!!
body: Great app! Helped me to manage my calorie intake and coupled with My Fitness app helped me to loose from 267 to 187 in 9 months. I have maintained my weight for almost a year now using this app. Thank you!

title: Almost Good
body: I really want to like this app and use it consistently, because I like the web version, but the killer for me is the scan feature. It doesn't work. It can't seem to find anything I try to scan, and I'm talking about Costco items. For now, I'll be sticking with the other big fitness app.

title: Easy to use
body: This app is easy to use which is great because I use it a lot. Great food database. This app has helped me keep my food intake down and I have lost 19 pounds.

title: Coming from Myfitnesspal
body: I love the look and feel of this so much better than Myfitnesspal. It's accurate and the layout is nice to look at.

title: Using with my NB Body TNRr
body: So far this App has included all of the food info I have needed. By including info from my fitness tracker it is really helping me meet my weight loss goals.

title: Happy with this app.
body: Great app for most of what I need following the dash diet. Wish it told me how many servings I have had of each food group at the end of each day.

title: Awesome App!
body: I enjoy the ease of food tracking and the app's capacity for calculating specific menu items both at fast food and fine restaurants.

title: User friendly
body: A very easy tool to use to keep track of all of your fitness progress

title: Favorite App
body: I wish I found this app sooner.  I deleted all my other health apps after this was downloaded.  It covered all and I can customize it for me

title: Mrs
body: I really like this app but there doesn't seem to be a lot of foods that I eat in the data base when I scan barcodes. No big deal to add food manually though!

title: This App is a huge help!!
body: I truly love this app! It's easy to use and very accurate. I love all the features! It's helps

title: Works well, easy to use
body: I've been using this app for two weeks and am seeing results already. Thanks!

title: Amazing app
body: This app works wonders!! Only wish it had more offline support instead of being connected to the internet the whole time.

title: Everything I expected
body: App is just what I expected but I don't like how much the cal count fluctuates for same foods (at times in really odd ways, ie. a Cutie orange was everything from 35 each to 200 for 2!?!). But overall I am happy w/it.

title: Very satisfied
body: Command central for weight loss. Extremely happy with it. Use it everyday. Very eye opening to see just how many calories I am actually consuming.

title: Does not sync with website
body: It says it is syncing but then it just closes the app (crashes).  When I reopen it I can see that it recognizes my profile but it does not show the correct goals or logged items that I did on my PC.  If I go to PC I can see mobile entries but not the other way around.

title: I like it!
body: I like this program a lot.  It spares conversion to points.  The only dislike is multiple listings of the same food with large variations in the calorie count.  Livestrong should verify more.  Overall it's very useful!

title: Working good and easy
body: I too would like more options for tracking exercise. I am an equestrian  but can't track rides

title: Awesome
body: When I started taking this app seriously I lost 3 pounds in a week. I have a friend who is a personal trainer and he explained how it is supposed to wrk in detail ad I just follow it. This also teaches eating discipline.

title: Love this app....just need food scan capability
body: love this app!!!!  Already lost 7 lbs.....just wish there was a way to scan foods so you don't have to enter them manually...then it would be 5 stars....keep up the good work!!

title: Amazing and Easy!
body: Go on, search what you ate/drank and track it! It's really easy. If you forget to to track it has a reminder that says you forgot. I highly recommend the app for anyone. :) ( Highly Satisfied)

title: Great for an active vegan!
body: This app has really helped me track my calories and protein to ensure I'm feeding my body to match my workouts. It's a bit tedious but worth it. The points are good too!!

title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
body: It's super easy to use! Practical and has everything I need to stay focused and decide if I will eat that chocolate or not lol.. But I do wish it's exercise and food search was more expanded. Still give it 5 üåüüåüüåüüåüüåü

title: Invaluable!
body: This app has changed my life. It has made it so easy to lose weight by keeping myself easily accountable and occupying my mind with a goal. Love it!

title: Yay!
body: This app is amazing. It lets you track all of your food and exercise and keeps track of it for you. Helps keep you accountable. No guess work. Finally!

title: Disappointed
body: I absolutely loved this app...ever since the update I have seriously thought about finding a different app. The scan function only worked on the day of the update and it no longer pulls up food that I search for. Maybe it should downgrade back to how it was before!!!!

title: Love this app...but...
body: I love this app and have lost 10lbs just counting calories. I just wish scanning was more consistent. Many products won't scan. Other than that-love it.

title: Add this please
body: There should be an option to just enter the number of calories you burned without having to create a custom workout since my treadmill shows the number of calorie I burn.

title: Major bug
body: You cannot change your starting weight. At least in the lite version you cannot change the starting weight. For me it is stays at 145 pounds. Also in the lite version it seems like there isn't a huge selection of food or meals to choose so you have to hope you get the details right if you input them yourself.

title: Good app
body: It's good for keeping track of what you eat, however, it keeps lowering my limits with each lost pound. 800 calories is kind of a problem, I wonder what my limits will be when I lose 20 or 30 pounds.

title: Kandy Lyons
body: I love this app. It really keeps me on track. I stopped using it for a month and gain weight back. It really does help. Just try it out for a month you'll see.

title: Keeps me on track
body: This has helped me stay on track.  I don't keep track of water, but I use everything else.

title: Completely awesome!
body: This app makes it so easy to keep track of what km eating and what I'm losing from exercise. It's very accurate and even reminds me if I forget to log!

title: Love love love!
body: This app has helped me sooooo much! I had a hard time staying in my range and this app told me how to do it and how to create new eating habits! I definitely recommend this app to anyone!

title: Favorite App EVER.
body: I love that you can get rewards, even for simple things like filling out a two question survey! Definitely motivates you to eat healthy, work out, and live a healthier life.

title: Excellent for tracking calories and exercise
body: I use this program and recommend it for my patients.

title: Love it
body: Excellent app! Easy to use and understand and really shows you how you've been doing. Nothing like seeing results unfold before your very eyes :)

title: Awesome!
body: Great app! Have been using it the past 3 weeks, had a few cheat days here and there but am already down 5.6lbs! Sticking to it until I lose 20lbs.

title: Great app!
body: This app has helped me keep track of my food intake as well as my exercise.  I've tried a number of these apps, and I like the interface on this one the best.  And it's free!

title: Love
body: I'm not the type of person to do this weight loss stuff and this app sucked me in. It customizes how many calories u should have based on ur body type

title: Great learning tool
body: Not only helps me stay on track, But I have learned so much about the foods I eat.  Helped friends with carb info who are diabetic.  Happy all around.  And losing weight!

title: Great app!
body: I have used my plate for years on the computer.  The phone app exceeds in many ways!  I have lost weight by keeping track of calories.  Thanks!

title: My plate
body: Great tool to keep you accountable to what is going in your mouth vs exercise and calories burned!  I also really like the articles. They are very motivating to staying on track!

title: Easy to use.
body: I have found this program to be very helpful - it keeps me honest and helps me plan my meals. I suppose that's what it's supposed to do, but it sure does it well!

title: I'll never use another!!! :)
body: Easiest, most effective app! No need to download several others, because this one has it all in one.

title: Reception
body: I LOVE this app. It is way more convenient than using my computer. My only issue is that when you have poor cell service you cannot search for foods. But very good otherwise. Thanks Livestrong.

title: Amazing
body: Absolute PERFECT way to track calories and set a weight loss goal- the app TELLS YOU how many more calories you can eat that day and is very aesthetically pleasing. MUST GET. I've already lost 2 pounds!

title: Nutrition graph - bad results
body: Decent looking app.  Functionality is nice.  The nutrition pie chart has no relationship to the reality of what you've eaten.  Try it with one or two food items and calculate the percentage of fat, carbs, and protein.  The response from support was to uninstall / reinstall.  Nope still doesn't report properly.  Fail in my opinion.  Basic functionality that isn't working in ver 3?  Unacceptable.

title: So far so good
body: I just started using the app. It's user friendly and a great number of choices. Looking forward to using it everyday.

title: Love this App!
body: MyPlate has helped me track my carbs. I have been able to lose 88 pounds thus far!  I also have PKU and I have to watch my protein intake and MyPlate helps me with this as well. I love this app!

title: Good
body: I appreciate this app when your write down what you eat it usually helps you lose wait because you won't eat desserts because you don't want to write it down

title: Better
body: Thank you for adding back in the circle graph and how many out of total of individual items used. Now if I could see everything I eat in a day in one list...we will be back to a 5 star app.

title: So great!
body: I very much enjoy the ease with which this application allows me to track calories, weight, and the percentage breakdown of my carbs/fat/protein ratio. Extremely helpful for losing weight!

title: Great App
body: I've used it for years! Really like it! Simple to use and has a huge book bank to choose from.

title: Love the app
body: I've always been bad at tracking what I eat. The possibility of scanning bar codes simplifies everything and lets me track all I eat.

title: Keeps me on track!
body: I love this app. It is very visually appealing and easy to use. I mostly use it to keep track of my calories and I've lost 8 lbs in a month.

title: Big help in losing weight
body: Keeps track of my food intake and exercise and lets me know how many calories I can consume (based on weight, age, etc) while still maintaining my weight loss goal.

title: Amazing
body: I love this app!! For someone who wants to track their progress all in one app this is great. I've already lost 5 pounds just being aware of my calorie intake :)

title: Healthy4life
body: This app is a great tool for taking account of the calories consumed. I am more conscious of the intake thus I have been able to loose weight without much effort.

title: Works very well
body: I like it. Searching for food usually nets results. Even local business sometimes. This app is helping learn to track my macros and reminds me to drink enough water. I do recommend!

title: App
body: This app is really helpful and easy to use.

title: Best Calorie Tracker
body: The UI is much cleaner and nicer to look at than my fitness pal. It also has an option for $.99 to remove all ads so you don't have to subscribe.

title: It's good
body: I love this app- it has so many of the foods I eat, is easy to use, and is accurate. I like that it links to a website that is equally helpful.

title: Must have app
body: This is a great app for keeping track of what and how much food is eaten. It's an easy simple app with a great list of foods available.  It keeps me on track!

title: The best 10/10 would recommend
body: I honestly have had so many of these apps and this one is by far the best

title: Keeping Balanced
body: Keeps me in check. I am a post op weight loss surgery patient and this app helps me with my journey of getting back to being healthy again.

title: Love Love Love!!
body: Easy to use, simple way of keeping track of your calorie intake, with just seconds of your day! I've lost 5 pounds in two weeks with this app.

title: Most valuable tool
body: This has quickly become my favorite way and easiest way to keep track of my nutrition!!!  I love it!!

title: Live strong
body: Best calorie tracking app out there.  Used it to lose all postpartum baby weight within 6 months.  Now using it to maintain.

title: Better than non-mobile website
body: Efficient, easy

title: Needs improvement
body: I like the mPoints but it could be more user friendly.  I have found several other Calorie Trackers much more accurate and easy to use.

title: Solid for tracking results. A MUST!
body: I love to keep track of my results. This app hells me to do so in a very easy and well laid out manner. The app helps to keep me motivated! Thank you so much.

title: The right steps
body: This app makes it really easy to make the right steps to making progressions with your health.  Really helps me get to where I am now.

title: Frustrating!
body: App does not fully sync between iPad and iPhone   It leaves out some meals but not others. Also I accidentally pressed Do Not Allow for scanning and have been trying for weeks to get it to allow it.  Even deleted and stared over and it won't work!  I hate uncooperative apps!

title: Practical app with lots of useful tools
body: I use this app daily.üòÄ

title: Spot-On
body: This is a very straightforward and well though-out calorie-intake and -output tracker.  It has a very thorough database of calorie counts, including from some seemingly obscure sources, even the cafeteria at work (run by a fair-sized concessions company).

title: Seems To Be The Best
body: I have not been able to fully dedicate daily yet, but I am definitely learning where the fat foods are. The reminders to enter meals is great as well.

title: Easiest yet
body: I've tried a couple apps and many attempts at journaling. It always took forever to find the exact food I ate. This makes it easy to find and organize.

title: Great app but missing one thing
body: The only thing this app is missing is the option to rate ones nutritional level instead of just focusing on calorie intake. Other then that this app is perfect!

title: Love!!!
body: This is a great app when trying to watch your calorie intake!  I lost 25 lbs using it! I recommend this app to everyone I know... Just to see how much you really eat!

title: Great
body: Nice app, I have been using it for a while now.

title: Sync finally fixed!
body: Been using MyPlate daily for 4 months. Love it... But big syncing issues between my iPhone & iPad were very frustrating... Until today's update that fixed it.  Yay! Thanks

title: Add Medicine Feature
body: Just downloaded and seems great so far! Would be great to be able to track medicine/ pill doses too, since many times those need to be taken with food.

title: Great health and fitness app!
body: This app is very easy to use, provides estimated calories burned for various activities, calculates total calorie consumption as well as net calories, and even provides graph of macronutrients.  I love it!

title: Impressive but
body: Every thing in this app is impressive except the exercises section. Also it's need some refreshing to know some food that didn't exist with picture. Otherwise it is great app

title: Really intuitive
body: I really like using it, and the push notification encouragement. The scanning is great, so far it's located every product I've tried. Great job LS team!

title: IM OUT.
body: Decent app, lots of good information. But the rudeness of people that act like they are the "bosses" of the site are beyond ridiculous. I've never seen so many rude people on there! Honestly, it's always been like that though. This app has been around for awhile. I will not suggest it to any friends anymore. I was going too, but not now. Whoever actually does run the app, get it together!

title: Some good, limited
body: Old program had better portion controls. One could create a meal and then eat a portion of other than 1/4 or 2/3 like 1/16 or 1/24. Other than that it's great

title: Great App !!!! Love it.....
body: Been using this app to track my food on my way to weight loss. Really helpful in helping you see exactly what you are putting in your mouth. Easy to search food & add it to your daily intake.

title: Great and easy to use
body: Must have if you track your daily intake. Huge database of almost everything we eat

title: Item Removal
body: The App is a great way to track what you've eaten, but when I've enter a food from the search bar and its now entered into the frequently eaten folder I can't remove it if I entered the wrong item.

title: Very handy
body: I now no longer have a single excuse for *not* being mindful of what I eat. Easy to use; now integrates with the main website.

title: SC
body: I have lost 75 pounds so far using this app. I still have another 40 pounds to go but "I got this" as my nephew would say. Love reading the Community even though I do not participate.

title: Great
body: I really like how many food choices they have they even have protein shakes on here too so that's great just wish they broke down how many protein/carb/fat grams you take in each day except for just percentages

title: Great app!
body: VERY easy to use. Great interface and smooth use. Although the mpoints can be a but annoying but the core app is doing what's it meant to do and it's easy

title: Mixed Problems
body: I'm sure the app is good for tracking and what not, but I haven't had the chance it utilize the tracking functionality because it continues to crash in my searches. Search Bacon...crash. Reset app and search bacon again...crash. Needs to be fixed. I'm using my iPad mini by the way.

title: Great App
body: This app has been very helpful. Thinking about what I am eating and the amount of calories I am consuming is just the tool I needed to kick off my healthier eating plan.

title: Weight loss and support from peers
body: I love the interface and design.  It's so easy to use this app and stay connected with support from other members.

title: Very Clean and user friendly app!
body: I've been looking for a quality app to help my Girlfriend track and lose weight. This seems to be an amazing app and very easy to use. Definitly one of the best available!

title: Ehh not bad
body: It's a decent app. I didn't pay for the full version so I can only give my opinion for the free version. Its a decent app, the basics are covered. What you ate, how many calories, exercise tracker, built in reminders. It just needs to be a little more user friendly.

title: Useful
body: It's practical and very easy to use. Enjoyable to see the results day by day and easy to stay on track with simple reminders.

title: Great app
body: Great app with several different food choices. Wish it had other info on food items besides calories. Exercise selection is pretty limited. Really easy to use

title: Great for simplicity
body: Great app if you just want to track calories not where your calories are coming from (fat,carbs,protein ect) love the m points its a nice fun motivator. The food selection is one of the easiest and wide range I've found!

title: Awesome app!
body: I love this app it's super easy to use and when you don't have time to use the computer you can take the food tracker on the go!! Overall I LOVE this app!

title: Helpful
body: Simple and easy way to keep track of calories, carbs, proteins, and fats, exercise and water. At the end of the day, this gives you a pie chart showing percentages.  Best of all, you can customize the food and portions.  Good app.

title: Amazing
body: I can keep myself on track instantly with this app. It also helps to calculate for me which means I can walk an track at the same time. I love it!!!

title: Love it!
body: This app is amazing! I love how it reminds me to track and it helps me so much! Great for me since I am always on the go, trying to watch what i eat and it helps calculate in my fitness activites!

title: Really convenient!
body: I really prefer this to myfitnesspal, though I wish it had the option to see what you'd weigh in 5 weeks according to caloric intake (like MFP does).

title: Janet Rivero
body: I like this program except I made a mistake with an entry and could not figure how to cancel it.  Would like to know how in case I do it again, which is likely until I get more proficient with the program.

title: Awesome!
body: I love this app! It's very helpful. I would like to figure out the 'meals' part though. I can't figure out how to create them. It's a great calorie tracker and has every food I search for!

title: Great app!
body: This is a fantastic app from a true leader in fitness. At very first glance it seemed to be lacking. But, with just a second look, everything you need is right there.

title: Awesome, just wish it would show more nutritional things
body: If this had more info on my personal needs for protein, carbs, and fats, I would love to upgrade to the next version. I also woulD love it if inc. more on minerals and vitamins.

title: Awesome
body: Great app. Easy to use and convenient. I particularly like that it reminds you to track your meals if you've forgotten to do it by the end of the day. This is a great feature.

title: Favorite App
body: I wish I found this app sooner.  I deleted all my other health apps after this was downloaded.  It covered all and I can customize it for me

title: New user
body: Just started using the application, trying to get everything set up. So far so good. Only a few glitches and frustrations. If it works as described will upgrade. Not sure why it asks for a rating when I'm just getting things set up.

title: I dig it
body: I'm really enjoying the light version! Had it for about a week and getting ready to buy the full version soon.

title: Helpful!
body: I like calorie tracker because it helps me have a good estimate about what I'm eating. However, sometimes it doesn't have foods on there that I eat, or there are so many options to select that I never know which one is right. Overall, really helpful.

title: Mixed
body: Great concept. But...

title: Great interface
body: Plenty of features and very easy to use. Great for Food journaling which has been proven as one of the most successful practices for weight loss.

title: Love this app!!!
body: This app it easy to use and it rewards you for using it :) !! Breaks your diet down and shows you when youve been over your calories for the day.

title: Must Have!!!!!!!
body: I've download several of these apps and this one is BY FAR the BEST out there.  Has everything you need and I mean everything!

title: Activity Tracking
body: The activity tracking feature no longer works after the last update.

title: Great app that has been updated frequently.
body: Must have free app. Easy to use and very handy. Just be careful food has been verified and not entered by someone.

title: Hate the new interface üëéüèºüëéüèºüëéüèº
body: I've been using the app for just over a year and have always told people they should use this app. Not anymore.  I do not like the look or functionality of the new interface. Time to start trying new tracking tools... boo.

title: Good job listening to your customers
body: Almost everyone wanted it back to the old one. Nice update

title: Awesome food tracker
body: Love the ability to track nutrition by food/meal. App makes it super easy. The only downside is the calories burned is often very incorrect, and consequently makes calculating net calories burned almost impossible.

title: Lacks sync
body: Good app, but disappointed doesn't sync with Fitbit! I don't carry my iPhone with me everywhere but I always have my Fitbit. I would get be it 5 stars otherwise. I've tried to use FitSync to sync Fitbit and MyPlate but it is overwritten by ihealth iPhone steps. Very frustrating.

title: Works perfect!
body: Exactly what I needed for my south beach plan! Thank you! And all the foods I look up are there and if not I scan them. Very accurate in calories and fat!

title: Please fix this app!
body: I have been using this app for the past month, and using it had helped me to improve my eating habits and lose 4 pounds! Sadly, the app has not been working for the past couple of days. I hope they fix it!

title: Update deleted my data
body: After the update, I lost all of my data. The food and pounds I had been tracking was deleted. The app even shut down every time I logged on, had to put my password in every time. I wish the company would of left it the way it was.

title: Never deleting this app
body: Easy, convenient, and highly effective. It is motivating to reach goals and to see progress everyday.

title: Used to be good until the glitches
body: I went for a 45 minute walk, burned 150 calories; then I opened up the app and it said I only burned 50. Closed and opened the app a few more times and got different numbers (50,90,150,180, etc.) Now I'm not sure exactly how much I burned. Don't recommend until the fix it.

title: Very good!
body: This app is amazing. I've been using it, especially when I'm looking to cut and make weight. It's a really good way to keep track of your macros.

title: Exercise problem
body: Works ok except exercise option sometimes screws up. Can't delete an exercise. You delete exercise and restart app and that exercise is back.

title: Does what you need.
body: Get this app to track your net calories intake and nutrition and simply does that.  There are extra feathers like exercises but that's not a factor for me.  Decent app.

title: Good App but...
body: I really wish there was a way to pay for the ads to go away completely. Not just a monthly or yearly fee with extra features. Other than that I love the app, it works great!

title: Business entrepreneur
body: Great app. Helps track every meal you can possibly think of.

title: More than 5 stars!!!
body: This app is incredible! It is extremely helpful. I would give it more than 5 stars if I could.

title: Great app & website
body: The tracking features help to lose weight and keep it off

title: Easy to use and help me do better
body: It's easy to use it and really works when I want to calculate the foods' energy. Helping me to form a habit more easily.

title: Well organized and easy to use
body: This is the best option out of all the other calorie counting apps

title: All of a sudden...
body: This app was working great for me when all of a sudden it no longer tracks my exercise. It used to track my steps and calorie burn while walking and now it doesn't. I went over all the settings and even deleted and reinstalled the app and I can't get it to work. Please help!

title: Moves app integration
body: I see the app tracks steps taken. However I find the moves app has more accurate tracking. Any way for this information to be integrated? Thanks

title: Great for tracking
body: User friendly interface and easy to log food, drinks and snacks that I eat. Good reminder about dinner as well, as I always forget lol

title: Works perfect!
body: As long as you can keep up with it, it works perfectly! It also works well with the Apple Watch.

title: App
body: Awesome app just wish they would update the barcodes and make it more local for Kroger and things maybe a device that connected with this

title: Stay on track
body: It's a wonderful app that has really helped me stick to my goals and it's easy to use. I have enjoyed this app tremendously

title: Buggy now
body: I used to love this app. Now for some reason it keeps logging me out every time I close it, so I have to type my login info in every time I use.

title: Even better!
body: I have been using this app for over 4 years. I have lost 36lbs!!!!

title: Getting greedy
body: Great app, almost back to the original look and feel after many generations of not so good try's, but pay a monthly fee to upgrade....a little greedy I think.

title: Doubles up calories burned
body: Pretty buggy app.  Plus it doubles up calories burned from the health app.  Parts of the user interface is buggy and has an odd feel.  The apple watch app crashes and freezes the iPhone app when you access it.  Just not well tested.   Good start but doesn't feel complete.

title: Lost my data again.
body: The app is great when it works but once in a while and totally at random it will freeze. Tried all iOS documented methods to get it going. Eventually had to delete and reinstall, losing all my data. This has happened twice now in the first 2 weeks of use ( iPhone 6+ ). I hope they fix it soon.

title: Speed of database = WOW
body: Entering food items is fast, whether you are using recent items, or adding new items.

title: Very Helpful!
body: Easy to use . The database is accurate and I like the exercise tracker! If this is something you are looking for , I recommend it.

title: Love this app
body: I have been more aware of what I put in my body and have lost weight tracking my calories and work outs

title: MyPlate is Great!
body: I'm loving using this on my iPhone.  It is really helping me to get fit and lose weight.

title: Fireman262
body: Easy app to use. And really helps to keep count of your calories each day. Highly recommend for anyone.

title: Love it! BETTER!
body: Loving it even MORE as I get more familiar with it!

title: Pretty good
body: More than anything this app forces you to think about everything you eat. And as long as you give a little thought about what your eating you'll fin that you eat a lot healthier.

title: Love it!
body: Using this app as a tool, I've went from 153 down to 137 in 3 months. It is fantastic. It encourages healthy choices and keeps you on track

title: fine until today
body: though not perfect, i was very happy with this app for the last month that i've been using it. then today, it crashed while i was trying to create a custom food and now my month of data is entirely gone. ENTIRELY. what's the point of an app if it can lose all your data in less than a second? garbage.

title: I like it
body: I like how you can enter the calories manually and the food is saved for the next time you eat it. I have lost 42 lbs so far.

title: User friendly
body: Detailed database of foods and easy to use.  Allows for quick data entry and has helped me be more mindful about what I eat.

title: Excellent App
body: This app works great and is very easy to use.  It has virtually every food you could eat in its data base with the associated caloric breakdown.  Exercise calories as well.

title: A great food and exercise tracking app
body: Food tracking is very easy, with most recent and frequent foods easily accessible.

title: Love the reminders
body: The notifications are very helpful to remind you to log your food. Only real complaint is that some of my food cannot be found even with the upc.

title: Overall nutrition!
body: This is a great app if you are not just worried about losing weight and calories, but want to meet your nutritional needs and be healthy!

title: New version rocks!
body: Love the new details in the latest release -- like the new logo. I've been using this app forever and it really helps me stay fit. Thanks!

title: The best
body: I love this app it is encouraging to track food. Which tracking food always makes me eat less so it helps a lot!

title: Great app
body: This is easy to use and really helps keep track of meals and snacks. I have found every food that I have been looking for in the database.

title: Love this App
body: Excellent way to record and track daily calories! I have used several other calorie tracker apps and this one is by far the best!

title: I usually never write a review, but
body: As I was going in my bodybuilding and Martial Arts pathway I was in a bulking season and whoo- this helped me maintain my body fat at 9% while I got 7lbs of muscle. I also like the pie chart thing, it really helps in the 40%carbs, 40%protein, and 20%fat maintenance :)

title: Great app
body: Really helps me stay on track, balancing activity and intake.   Easy to find most dietary options, can customize when necessary.

title: Wrecked
body: Fix the update. Been using this app for months and loved it. With the recent upgrade banners now prevent entering/tracking weight. Buy the .99 upgrade just to continue using the app as usual? No thanks.

title: Great & easy
body: I was just playing around and found this application. It is so easy and such a great tool that I started dieting when I found it.

title: Great record keeper
body: I really enjoy this app. It assists me to keep up with everything I eat, how much water I drink, daily exercise, & weight. It motivates me to see how many calories I'm allowed & how many I've had throughout the day.

title: Great!!!!
body: This is a great app. It works great all the foods I eat are on here and I have been losing weight an still eating what I want I just can control it now because of knowledge of calorie intake. Great app!!!

title: Love this app!
body: This app was suggested to me by the nutritionist at my job. I love everything about this app. I just wish it could recognize more items when you try to scan it.

title: Slightly better than pen and paper
body: It's convenient to track on my phone, but the search function is terrible- it can't decipher even the slightest typo- and the "recently eaten" option is worthless. I would never pay money to upgrade because the free features don't work well.

title: It works!
body: I have lost 12 pounds in 3 weeks. I am just staying below my calories every day and the weight is coming off.

title: My new favorite app!!
body: This is so easy to use and it makes such a difference to be able to track your calorie intake and exercise!  I love it!!

title: It works
body: Using it helps a lot. Don't like how they subtract your exercise calories from your overall "available to eat " calories - otherwise , a wonderful invention & very useful - thanks

title: So Far So Good
body: I can see this app helping me hit my goal.  The mpoints incentive gives you just a little reward for logging your progress which is key.

title: One problem
body: I really like this app! It is very easy to use! Although I wish when entering my calories in manually there was a place to put the fat calories. Overall it is a great app.

title: Think b4 you eat
body: The app has definitely helped keep me on track. I feel accountable for everything I eat. For us stress eaters, it's think b4 you eat. Works great.

title: Best diet app!
body: This app is the best health and fitness app!

title: So far so good
body: Easy to use and keep track of things to start on the lifestyle change up a healthier person.

title: Almost perfect:)
body: Only thing better would be someone to walk around With me and prevent me from eating extra food and make me go for a run... :)

title: Finally!
body: So glad they made a free version of this :) I love the online one and this one works just as well! Great set up and very useful...you won't regret downloading it

title: Motivational!
body: The gift cards you can redeem with your good "behavior" provides an added incentive to keep going. Also very organized and straightforward. No ads. Amazing.

title: LiveStrong app
body: A co-worker told me about the Live Strong app.  I use it daily and I have lost 12lbs is 2 weeks.  Tracking my calories and activities daily have transformed my life!

title: Informative app
body: I didn't know how much i ate in a day until i started using this app. No wonder i gain weight. Watching what i eat and how much I exercise now that I have app. I like it.

title: Great app
body: I have been using this app for over a year off and on. It tracks my weight and caloric count. I think this app is great and a good tool for my fitness and health plan.

title: Does the job but could use some work on the UI
body: Overall it could be slicker of an app. Offline mode should ideally crash less and be faster. Recently eaten foods and frequency eaten foods has some funky logic for the order in which it keeps the food items.

title: Much easier at work than writing and logging when I get home!
body: Will prob buy full version

title: livestong getting worse
body: This app is getting worse and worse.  It worked great for a while.  Then it stopped letting me claim points.  Then it deleted over 5000 mpoints I'd already accumulated.  Then it stopped letting me log in.  The support team either can't or won't bother to respond.  Recommend you avoid this until the tech team gets its act together again.

title: Great App
body: Kept me on track with my daily calories.  It won't lose the weight for you but you'll stay on top of everything. Great app.

title: Track'n Made Easier
body: App is intuitive, user friendly and it is nice being able to have everything on one device.

title: User unfriendly
body: This app for me was a really great way to keep track of everything efficiently. With the new update, aesthetically it's appealing but with everyday use, it falls short of the previous version. I really wish they would have combined the old functions and the new look together, as opposed to the new limitations of the functions. Another great app gone downhill

title: Can't Add Food Issue
body: For some reason,it won't let me add a food. Even with all the nutritional facts, it keeps saying  can't add food at this time and it's really annoying. But overall I love how easy it is to use this app. It gives me everything I need.

title: Keep losing iPhone daily steps
body: Every time I open the app it keeps losing iPhone daily steps it went from 101 calories to 33. Other then the daily step problems this app does the job and keeps me on track with my diet.
response: Hi there, we're so sorry for the issue you're having with your daily steps. Our team is aware of this and is working to resolve. Thank you for your patience!

title: Good app
body: I see a lot of reviews on here giving this app five stars and calling it great. While it is a good app, user friendly, overall a great design, it does have a few things to improve upon.

title: Amazing App!
body: I think I'm addicted to it...it helps me to maintain my weight and when I want to lose some weight I adjust the calorie intake...work perfectly

title: Log in
body: I just downloaded and the app isn't even smart enough to store an email or link in with my Facebook app.
response: Hi Peatry! We're sorry for the trouble you've had! We found an account under username peatry31 in our system. Were you able to create an account? Please email us at support@livestrong.com so we can help you get set up!

title: Great for carb tracking, need to customize time
body: I need to be able to track my timing of my meals as well to match on other reports in another app for timing of my insulin. Otherwise, it's been great for me!

title: False exercise readings
body: Nice database of foods, however the app gives false (too much) reading from my exercises. Apple Watch and Mio Alpha 2 show that after 2 hours of deep water bootcamp with the Mio wristband I burned 8856 calories. The Apple Watch seems to be adding excess amounts of calories burned also.
response: Hi there! Thank you for your review! We are working on resolving this issue and apologize for the inconvenience!

title: Adding Exercise
body: When you go to frequent exercises even if you don't add the exercise it adds up to the overall list.
response: Hi cbarberino! We are aware of this bug and we're working hard on a fix! Thanks so much for your patience while we work on this!

title: Awesome and easy to use
body: You can scan anything, type anything, or use others. It's free and high quality! Seriously awesome.

title: Suggestion
body: Have a category within the meal section where you can out what time you ate-like if you wanna keep a schedule or stay away from midnight snacks? Otherwise this apps ok.

title: Easy and great!
body: App has an incredible amount and variety of foods.  I started on Nutrisystem using their app Numi but switched to this Livestrong app because it had more Nutrisystem foods than Numi.

title: I like the app but
body: I really like this app. However, my calories burn section stopped working! It doesn't record any of my walking which is frustrating. Besides that, it's a very good app.

title: Better than weight watchers!
body: I've been using this app with my Apple Watch for over a year and recently put out the money to try WW and this app is so much more fluid than WW. Will continue to use!

title: intuitive UI
body: easy to get started with, just started using it and haven't found all features yet but I like it !

title: Easy to use
body: It's easy to track your calories and water intake. And you can see your goal and calories burned.

title: Great
body: Tracks everything, and even gives you workouts to try

title: Okay
body: Like this app however if you can't carry your phone on you all day there's no way to add additional steps (say from a Fitbit) so tracking your steps is vs calories is wrong. Also find it hard to add homemade recipes to the app (free version).

title: Best food tracker app I've come across so far
body: So far this is the easiest app to track food. Also works well off wifi/internet

title: Great, easy to use app, for tracking food and calories.
body: I've tried several, and this is my favorite!

title: Lost 26 pounds!
body: Best App ever! I use it everyday and have lost 25 pounds and I am keeping it off! It makes me aware of what I'm eating and how many calories are in the food we eat!

title: Excellent app
body: Easy to use with tons of meals and food items already included. Highly recommend

title: 50+ pounds down
body: This app is the absolute best. It's helped me lose over 50 pounds in five months. Don't spend your money on Weight Watchers. I did and this is the best app there is.

title: Very helpful
body: This app is super helpful for me keeping to a 2000 calorie diet. Just because I can see the numbers in black and white and always want to stay in the minus.

title: I love it overall but...
body: I just wish that they had a more open option of choices when you search a place you ate at!  Other than that I love it!!!

title: Awesome app
body: Love this app it gives me motivation an I've lost weight using it!! This is a must have in your phone if your trying to Lose weight!!

title: Very user friendly
body: Really enjoy using this app it's very user-friendly helps calorie count along with macronutrients and a fun but easy way.

title: Agree, has potential
body: But still too many inconsistencies.  I keep getting booted out of the app itself - won't let me stay logged in.  I also have to keep turning on the option to "track my activities".  And doesn't seem like it accurately tracks activities.

title: Works for me
body: The database of foods is good and I like the exercises they have.  Neg reviews seem very nit picky... This is a good all around app for a 40 something executive that needs to trim a few.

title: Good app, not enough entries
body: Not enough entries, I often have to find similar options and guesstimate calories because the items aren't on here and don't have any bar codes. Such a a restaurant meals.

title: Best calorie tracking app
body: It's easy to use, has a massive library of nutrition information, a notification widget, attractive design. Well done!!

title: Great app
body: I find this to be a very easy app to use to track my food. The data base of foods covers my food selections. I follow a low carb diet and like this better than the carb trackers.

title: Great App
body: Love the ease of adding food and tracking your health growth (shrinkage).  As a diabetic I would only hope they could add a glucose reading tracker and then it would be the one stop health app.

title: Amazing app
body: If you are trying to lose weight, you HAVE TO track your calories. This app makes it really easy.

title: Great app
body: I have been trying to watch what I eat lately and I find that this is a way for me to keep what I eat throughout the day in check.

title: Great
body: This app lets you keep track of how many calories you intake and burn , and just allows you to improve on your eating habits

title: Grateful
body: This app has helped me be disciplined when I'm good about tracking. I've lost 12 lbs in about 2 months and have created new and healthier eating habits.

title: Simple and Easy to use
body: I hope the developers continue to add more restaurants and food items.

title: Easy to use
body: I love the scan option!

title: Great app!!
body: I love the user friendliness of this, very thorough! It has so many stored calories counted on almost anything you eat. The workouts are great too! Highly recommend!

title: Livestrong
body: I do not like the new version. It starts off with 1200 and won't adjust like it used to. I used to love it. As much as I don't want to I think I may have to find a new app. Why the change ?

title: Pretty good
body: Would like to see a feature that displays the overall summary of protein/carbs/fat for the day rather than listed only by each individual food item.

title: Glitchy
body: A few things need to be fixed:

title: Lost 10lbs already! I love it!
body: This app is amazing! Made it super easy to track my meals and scan things. After a week of maintaining calories I lost 10 pounds.

title: Great app!
body: This app is incredibly helpful for looking up calories, tracking what you ate, how much water you drank, exercise - everything you need to help you be successful losing weight & becoming more healthy.

title: Glitch
body: Before the app started to mess up I used this app everyday. I loved it and would've given it 5 stars. But now.... It messes up all of the time. I try to input a 5 mile run and it says 0 calories. Before it would be negative 500 or something calories. Now it's just zero. And it has a hard time searching for anything... Every exercise is entered at 0... Ugh

title: Great
body: I use it every day to track my food and weight. I've lost 13 pounds in 2 months and am thinking healthier. It's easy and it works!

title: Going Back to Pencil and Paper
body: Unfortunately, after using this app for 4 days and entering in many foods and my exercise, today the screen froze while I was entering a food.  I had to turn off my Ipod Touch and when I went back into the app, all previous data entered in the last four days is gone.  I'm going back to using a pencil and paper.

title: Keeps me in check
body: I love this app. It's the best out there for calorie and data tracking. Everything you log in displays a circle graph showing a breakdown of fats, carbs and protein per serving. I use this daily & works great.

title: Great for watching your calories!
body: Use it daily, awesome app. Very easy to use and find just about any kind of food in the grocery store.

title: So helpful!
body: I can always find the food I eat in the database, it lets me track food, exercise, and my water intake. PLUS it tells me when I'm lazy and haven't tracked!

title: amazing !
body: this app has really helped me control what I'm eating , it's a great use of storage on my phone! I love how easy it is , and how it tells me exactly how many calories to eat ! it's awesome.

title: Not done with it yet
body: I liked this ap at first but when I enter something incorrectly it does not have the option to remove it.  Once you choose a item under "I ate this" you are stuck with it.  I was going to upgrade but I will be holding off for the the being.

title: Log in
body: I must be crazy. Or either this app is not very user friendly for logging in...  I have an account on my laptop so I thought I would download this app to make it more convenient when I am on the road away from my computer. How the heck do I login to my existing account? I don't see any way to login? And I am not interested in starting all over!!

title: Obsessed
body: The only way I am able to stay on track with my diets is by using this app! I lost 15 pounds by using this, it is a great support system!

title: One problem..
body: All in all it's a great app, it's just that when I go to look up certain exercises..they aren't there like sit ups, leg raises, crunches.. If they are there then it just doesn't bring it up on mine!

title: Tracking good. Scanning bad
body: I was extremely disappointed with the barcode recognition. Another app I've used, Lose It!, does a great job with barcodes and I rarely had to manually enter prepared foods/drinks. I'll only continue using this app because of the mPoints.

title: Easy, convenient
body: I am a fan of this app, simple to use, love the scan function. I use it daily and it really helps me stay on top of my eating habits.

title: My first time counting calories and its a breez

title: Helping me!!!

title: Good so far

title: Calorie tracker

title: Business owner
body: This has been a great help for my lifestyle change.  I've used this app for 10 days and I've lost 10 pounds.  Thank you.

title: Perfect

title: Pretty good tool

title: Love it!
body: This app is great, it really helps keep track of the calories I eat and exercise I do. I just started and have already lost 2lbs. I really recommend this.

title: Better than your viewing on the computer!
body: Quick at the helm; great for  on the go use!

title: Good app

title: Sweet!

title: Review

title: Awesome app

title: Helpful

title: Love this app
body: It really helps you see what type of food your eating as we'll as what you need to do in order to help lose weight. Fantastic App.

title: Great app

title: No thanks
body: The free version of this app is no good (either that or I just don't know how to use it). I'll stick to Spark People. It's free and has food to choose from (like a medium sized egg for example) without having to either manually enter ALL of your food/calories or pay for the luxury of not having to do so.  Sorry I don't share the enthusiasm of the rest of the app raters.

title: Great app!!
body: This is a must have if you're dieting!  It's perfect, easy to use, and so helpful. All you have to do is enter the information and the app does the rest!

title: Great App
body: Using this daily, I am able to balance my calories between meals and snacks.  It has helped me judge how much to eat and keep within my goal.

title: Wonderful fitness tool
body: I have used this app for three months and i started a a weight of 145 i know weigh 130! Excellent 15lbs lost and i used this app to do it! Thank-you live strong!

title: Great app, but...
body: Great app!  Nice interface and user friendly.  Easy to add foods eaten. But wish it could give you total number, not percentage, of total grams of carbs, protein, fat, etc eaten each day.  Overall though, really happen with this app!

title: A big help!
body: My only request is that the update allows you to look at the nutritional breakdown for previous days-otherwise, LoVe It!

title: I'm feeling skinny Tony
body: Love this app. Helps me to manage weight safely- keeps me knowing when I've had enough to eat or when I haven't! Keeps me motivated to eat well and safe.

title: Best health app
body: I've tried a lot of apps but this ones the best, heh I wouldn't be surprised if it saved my life. I like the health Community too it's me favorite part. They gave me grate advice.

title: Works well
body: For me, it fits my personal needs. It keeps track of how many grams of carbs/fat/protein, which is what I am most in need of. It has cute aesthetics and I have not had any problems with it.
response: Thanks so much for the review! We'd love to know what we can do to make this a 5 star app for you! Feel free to email us at support@livestrong.com and let us know!

title: Seems easy enough
body: It has a lot of option it's a fun app compared to the there I've used

title: Easy to use
body: Lots of apps out there - I'm new to this one but have found it easy and helpful. Here's to a long relationship!!!

title: Requires account to track you
body: Requires account to track you.  I downloaded it but it requires you create an account to track you. I don't want my health information held by them and then resold, hacked, etc.
response: Hi there! We require an account so that you can keep track of your progress! We are not sharing your health information at any time, unless you opt to sync with the Apple Health app. Please email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions.

title: Doesn't even work.
body: I cannot even log in 85% of the time. And when I finally get logged in, about 5 minutes pass and I'm kicked back off. It's not even usable anymore which makes me very disappointed considering this used to be my favorite app.
response: Hi Kali! Please email us at support@livestrong.com so that we can assist you! We're so sorry for the trouble you're having.

title: If you follow it, this app works
body: Great app! I have used it for more than a year to help me lose 143 pounds.

title: Loses track of exercise
body: The app has this issue where it either doesn't track, or loses exercise data. Like it'll say -300 calories or whatever and then that'll just disappear permanently and I'll be over my daily limit. Other than that it's a fine app.

title: Useful

title: Great

title: Extremely Helpful

title: 2139 CALORIES???!!!
body: I really like this app until I "forced sync". I'm only 5'4" tall, female, weight loss goal 1 pound a week. Before I synced my devices, my caloric goal was SEVERAL hundred calories less. Note: My settings have stayed the same, they have not changed.

title: Does it all

title: Old UX was much better
body: I really liked having the dashboard of each meal where I could track an item with one click. Now I have to click "track" and then click the meal. And I can't just scroll down and see all my fracked items for the entire day. I like the cleanness of the new UI, but the old UX was SO much better! Bring it back please!!!

title: Bad update
body: I loved this app until it updated. In the old version, it would let me see how many carbs, protein, and fat were in each food item now it just shows the overall macros of all the foods together.
response: Hello, thank you for your review! We have not changed this feature. You can still see macro information for individual items by clicking the item itself.

title: Does what it says

body: This is the first time I'm writing a review on an app. I LOVE being able to track my daily intake BUT this app (after the most recent update) crashes every time I try to go in to the app. It also makes me log in every time I open it. I think it should just stay logged in to my account unless I manually log myself out.

title: I love it but crashing

response: Hi there! Please try closing and reopening the app. If this does not resolve the issue, please email us at support@livestrong.com. Thanks!

title: Pretty accurate

It's changed my records in the past and all the way up to next week. Super annoying especially if you've made this part of your daily routine as the app encourages you to do...

response: Hi TimInSc, thank you for your review! We apologize for the inconvenience, our team is aware of the bug with the step counter and is working on a fix!

title: Needs a maintain weight option
body: When you start the app you have two goal options, gain weight or loose weight. I'm looking to maintain my weight. This bothered me enough that I didn't continue to use the app, so I can comment any further on how well it worked.
response: Hello! We're so sorry that this deterred you from using the app. Once you set up a profile, you can reset your goal to maintain by going to Account > Edit Profile > Weekly Target.

title: Pretty good.

title: Good app

title: Precise!

title: Best calorie tracker

title: Awesome

title: New

My Plate has now worsened to such a degree, and has so disappointed me, that I have deleted it. My Fitness Pal, which I don't particularly care for, is now the better choice.

body: Don't waste your time with this. I spent weeks entering data, logging meals, exercise, weight, water etc. only to watch it all disappear. The weight graphing feature which I thought would be useful, defaults to 118 pounds if you don't mantilla wait on a particular day. Remarkable since I weight 228lbs. To see on a graph 2/1 = 228lbs, 2/2 = 118 lbs, 2/3 = 227lbs.

response: Hi- Thank you for the feedback! We appreciate you reaching out and we've passed your comments on to our development team. If you'd like to track a food that isn't in the database, you can create a custom food! Select the meal you'd like to track the custom food to (Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner, or Snack), tap "My Food", and select "Create New Food" to create a custom food item. Enter the specifics of the food, and tap "Done" in the upper right corner.

When i enter something under any section of meals it puts it down & it goes either my foods or my meals, wherever I put it. But if notice a mistake there's only 1 way to fix it. & that's edit it. There's no way to completely delete it & start over. I noticed that several things are listed exactly the same like 50 x's under my foods as well & there is no way to delete all but 1 of the entries. Under my meals are a few entries that were done when I was 1st learning & I would really like to delete them. But like I said, there's no way, at least not that I know of . The only thing I've been able 2 delete are entries under that day 4 each meal or snack , exercise, etc... Would looovvveeee it if u could make deleting items possible from my foods or my meals. title: Just a few suggestions
body: Today is day 2 of not smoking and this app with the community support helped dramatically. A couple suggestions that would make a world of difference. 1. I was trying reach out for support(trying to get through a rough moment) and apply a personal message, it didn't allow me too, because the keyboard hides the send button and there's no way to scroll it down(to get it out of the way) so it refers to the pre-provided mess. 2. I reached out to support team because the app nor the website(Livestrong) would allow you to add a profile pic, after asking the community, I realized I was able to do so from the Myplate app, would have been less frustrating had I known this. 3. It would be amazing if we could apply emojisüòçüëäüèº‚úäüèº to our post or comments, as this is a smartphoneüì≤ app, most of the worldüåé uses emojis nowadaysüòä, also it would be nice if we could have a like button üëçüèº (Like on Facebook) to allow others to know we enjoyed their comment/comments without having to reply to every person who's commenting some encouragement. 4. It would be nice if we had a tracker to give us the info of how our life/health is improving hour by hour or day by day from not smoking. Other apps supply this info but not this one. But I like this one much better because of the community support. So overall  you guys have invented a great app and if you tweaked it a little, I would definitely consider buying the premium version!!! I hope you guys read these reviews and take into consideration our tips or issues on how to improve the app/apps. Again thank you for making this app, I literally searched and searched trying to figure out which app was best suited for my needs in quitting smoking, I finally decided on this one.
