title: Good app, bad measurement units bug
body: I was using another app and was very happy with it but since I got the Apple Watch I started using MyPlate because it gets the calories burned from the Health app and that is great. The reason I gave it 3 stars is because you cannot enter the food weight in grams for most of the foods and even for the ones you have the option, this app will only give you single digit entry so you would only be able to enter up to 9 grams so I take this to be a bug in the app and it bugs me a lot. Another problem with it is that it does not seem to show much of the nutritional value of what you ate during the day as a summary. It only shows Carbs Fats and Protein. I am contemplating if I should go back to the CalorieCount app that has a very useful nutritional value break down and gives you grades according to how healthy were the foods you ate. While that app does not exchange info with Apple Health, it allows to enter the foods in grams and that is very important when you are using a scale.
response: Hello! Thank you so much for your feedback and review! We will pass all of your suggestions on to our team for consideration!

title: Worth it‚Ä¶maybe
body: UPDATE 06/17/21:
response: Hi Tyler! We appreciate you leaving a review and feedback. MyPlate uses a comprehensive third-party food database, which is a collection of listings from the USDA and some food manufacturers. Unfortunately, we're not able to add or remove items from this database as it is managed by Nutritionix. If you have any questions, please reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Easy to use and straightforward
body: I love this site because it takes almost no time at all to log in my food and my exercise.  I‚Äôm amazed that even restaurant food can be easily registered.  I especially like the bar code feature that allows you to quickly identify and input the calorie count of any grocery store item if you don‚Äôt want to go thru the list.
response: Hi Jenann50! Thanks for the review and congratulations on your success. We are happy to be a part of your fitness journey.

title: This app is 1000000% better than fitness pal
body: It knows all good aND THE UI is way better
response: Hi there! Thank you so much for your review. We're happy to hear you like the app.

title: Absolutely The Best Food Tracking App
body: I have tried every food tracking app out there and MyPlate is hands down the best. Similar to other apps you can search your food or scan a barcode and have the nutrition information auto fill in. If it isn‚Äôt there, you can always manually add it in too. To be honest though, there are some things that the app won‚Äôt recognize by bar code but almost 90% of those things are your local grocery store self made products and not big name brand products they stock on shelves. The app also has a macronutrient tracker which absolutely imperative when you are trying to lose weight. Other apps make you pay for that feature but MyPlate offers it for free!! The app also offers some healthy food recipes that correlate to how many calories you have left in any particular day should you choose to use them. I have not tried the meal plan so I cannot comment on that. MyPlate also lets you set your goal weight and how many pounds you want to lose per week, which is something other apps allow too but just so you know that feature is also here. Like I outlined above, the app though is absolutely perfect and worth more than 5 stars for being free. I‚Äôve lost 45 pounds so far and have another 30 to go and couldn‚Äôt have done it without this app.
response: Hi there! Thank you for your thorough review. We're so excited to hear how well the app has worked for you.

title: It‚Äôs so simple
body: Love this app. Super easy to use. Love that it links with my watch so it tracks my activity at the same time. And the bar code helps a ton when I can‚Äôt find my food item.
response: Hi there! Thank you for leaving a review. We're glad you are enjoying MyPlate.

title: issue with carbs/protein/fat
body: everything is going good, but for some reason, food i logged days ago is showing up as having a wild amount of carbs/protein/fat. this stops happening if i go back and change it to 0 servings and then back to 1, but it‚Äôs annoying and i don‚Äôt understand why my morning banana keeps showing up as having 46284g of protein when it‚Äôs supposed to have 1.
response: Hi Greta! Thank you for the review and feedback. Please log out of the app and then log back in. If this does not resolve the issue, or if you have additional questions, please reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Five stars
body: This is very helpful! I did this for school, because they recommended that you download this app for science class I love it and the tell you everything that you are and how many calories fat sugar sodium and all of the stuff, and the even give you a bar code scanner so you can even just scan the food that you eat!!! ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
response: Hi there! Thank you for that enthusiastic review. We're glad you like the app.

title: Love it
body: So far, I really like using this app. I had tried it along time ago but it was not quite where I needed it to be. Now is a totally different story, it‚Äôs updates are super useful and I like the set up. It‚Äôs super easy to use and very friendly. It‚Äôs pretty accurate with some adjustments needing to be made but that‚Äôs normal for any app.It is good practice to double check that users are putting in the correct information. I recommend this app for anyone who is looking to track their nutrition and really gain understanding of what they‚Äôre putting in their bodies. For me, I was looking for something simple yet comprehensive, and importantly free with the option to upgrade should I want to. This ticks all the boxes for me.
response: Hi there! Thank you for providing a review and feedback. We appreciate your support.

title: My Plate
body: My plate is a great app for weight loss or if you are just looking for a way to track your calories. The app is very user friendly and has so much detailed information on everything you can think of. The great thing about this app is even when you don‚Äôt pay for the membership you can still go in to great detail for every food, meal, and, drink you can imagine.This is by far the best calorie tracking app on the market and is no doubt my first choice.
response: Hi Wackypatty123! Thank you for your awesome review. We're glad you are enjoying the app.

title: won‚Äôt let me sign up
body: every time i try to sign up and i make a username and password it tells me that there is an authorization error and i‚Äôve retried multiple times
response: Hello! We're so sorry for the inconvenience. We experienced a brief outage that has since been resolved by our team. Please email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions or concerns.

title: Exercise calories halved?
body: In the update 1/2021, for some reason the calories per hour are about half of what they were before. This is frustrating because I am trying to track net calories.
response: Hi there! Thanks for the review. This is the first we've heard of what you are describing with the calories. Can you clarify for what and where you are seeing calories per hour? Feel free to reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Everything about this is great!
body: Everything about this is great!  From the bar code scanner, the easy to understand macro chart, to tracking how much water you drink! I‚Äôve been using this for years now and I couldn‚Äôt be happier!
response: Hi there! Thanks for the awesome review. We're glad you are enjoying the app.

title: My plate
body: This app is easy to use. There are so many foods in the library but using the bar code scanner opens just about everything up to keep track of. I have the ahold membership which was a cheap addition and worth it because it gives you so much more info about the foods you eat. It‚Äôs remarkable what you discover when you keep track of things. Also, love how it syncs with your wearables. My only wish is that it didn‚Äôt ‚Äútriple‚Äù count calories used if you‚Äôre wearing more than one wearable. Somehow during the time you exercise it should only use one counter since I get credit for the same workout on my peloton, oura and Fitbit:)
response: Hi DPKMJ5! Thank you for the review and feedback. Our development team is aware of the issue and is working on a solution. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Great for tracking P,C & F, not so much for Na and exercise
body: I like using the app for food input to track calories and macro's. The "My Foods" option is an excellent timesaver for us who eat the same things each day. Unfortunately, the sodium levels of foods in the database is often very far off (e.g, fish sauce, which has 1500mg of Na per Tbsp. is listed as having close to zero even when scanning the bar code of the bottle and when entering a new food manually, only PF and C are options. I tried the exercise input to see net calorie balance but the calories burned seemed excessive: i.e. Many days in a row I had a negative calorie balance but went up in weight.
response: Thanks for your review and feedback. We‚Äôve just released an update to the app addressing these concerns. Please update to version 5.31.0. If you still have questions or concerns, please send us an email at¬†support@livestrong.com.

title: Scanning Ability
body: I overall enjoy this app. I‚Äôve had it for a few days now. Only thing I dislike is for some reason when I scan a certain food with its bar code my phone doesn‚Äôt accept or doesn‚Äôt have it verified. I‚Äôm left with the scanner constantly scanning endless and nothing happening.
response: Hi BoyGainz! Thanks for the review and feedback. The team is aware of an issue wherein if a barcode that is not in the database is scanned, the scanner will freeze.

title: Ok ok it‚Äôs a legit app
body: I did a review on  my own and it‚Äôs something I NEVER do but the app really is full of ‚Äúget your life together ‚Äú tips. It‚Äôs kept me holding my self accountable and to not forget about me with all this stuff I personally got going on ,  the developers are responsive also
response: Hi laurenbeetayl! Thanks for reaching out. We'd be happy to unsubscribe you from the mailing list. Please contact us at support@livestrong.com and we'll take care of that right away.

title: Great diet documentation app
body: This app allows one to keep count of calories, carbs, fat and protein intake with respect to your set calorie intake goal.The convenient thing is one may scan a barcode for quicker nutritional facts, also quickly search for items in their search bar. This allows for documentation to be a breeze. I have really enjoyed using this app and I have lost weight following the recommend amounts of carbs, fats and protein with respect to the set calorie intake goal; and of course with a bit of exercise.
response: Thank you for the review! We're so happy that MyPlate has helped you reach your goals. We'd love to know what we could do to make this a 5 star app for you! Please feel free to write to us at support@livestrong.com. Thanks again!

title: Amazing app!
body: There are only a few items that aren‚Äôt added by barcode, other than that I have no complaints. Everything is so simple to understand. And there are even videos to help on YouTube. I have already gained 2 pounds in just a week, ITS BULKING SEASON. Amazing app, thank you.
response: Hi Minionmaker8751! We appreciate you taking the time to leave a review. We‚Äôre glad you are enjoying MyPlate. We're constantly looking for new ways to improve our app, and we love getting feedback as it helps guide our process moving forward.

title: The Best Food Tracker App
body: Easy to use and very intuitive. The bar code scanner function is great! I‚Äôve tried similar apps, but this is the best!
response: Hi Kingkato! We appreciate you taking the time to leave a review. We‚Äôre glad you are enjoying MyPlate. We're constantly looking for new ways to improve our app, and we love getting feedback as it helps guide our process moving forward.

title: Move sync problem
body: Good app. I was really enjoying it.The main thing I liked about it was that it was synced to my apple watch. It would sync my activity and move.It does not do that anymore... so I am not sure if I will still use this
response: Hello and thank you for your feedback! We're aware of this issue and working hard to find a fix. Please email us at support@livestrong.com for further details and updates.

title: Great for Keto!
body: I started the keto diet a month ago, and I was having a hard time tracking my macronutrients. Someone on youtube recommended this app to help track your fat, protein, and carb intake, and it‚Äôs been incredibly useful! I wish it tracked sugar alcohols in the macros, but other than that it‚Äôs the perfect app for anyone doing keto. I love how easy it is to use. They also let you filter the recipes if you‚Äôre following a pescatarian/vegetarian/vegan diet (I‚Äôm also a vegetarian). Overall 10/10 app to support a more mindful, healthy lifestyle.
response: Hi rachurro! Thank you for your feedback. We‚Äôre excited to be a part of your health routine. We're constantly looking for new ways to improve our app, and we love getting feedback as it helps guide our process moving forward.

title: One of the Best- better than Fitbit
body: I‚Äôve used this app for a number of years mostly for  how many calories I‚Äôve burned. With my iPhone. The more recent addition of decimals makes it an excellent calorie counting app. One can precisely count calories.
response: Hi there! We appreciate your thorough feedback and are happy to hear that, overall, you are pleased with it.

title: Best Calorie and Nutrient Counter App Available
body: I have been using this app for several months now (perhaps a year‚ÄîI cannot remember date I first started), and I find it to be not only the best app but the easiest app for quickly maintaining a log of my daily intake of calories and nutrients. Not only does it allow one to look up items easily by typing their names, but it has a fantastic barcode scanner that will automatically enter the calorie and nutrient. data from the barcode after scanning the code. This allows one quickly to adjust only the portion/servings eaten and be finished. It works extremely well even though not every brand is in its database. Never fear, however, one may add the food to the one‚Äôs own food database, and then it will be available for the next time it is eaten. One may also create special recipes or meal items and add those to one‚Äôs own food database such that all the facts are there for easy entry for on a subsequent use. Moreover, when eating out, one can look up foods in chain restaurants, and they will often already be a part of the food database contained in the app‚Äîan added bonus that makes the app even easier to use.

title: Love the app but...
body: It would be awesome if the calorie count stayed at recommended and not fluctuate once exercise completed. I find it a bit challenging to stay within recommended calories when it looks like I have 200-400 ‚Äúextra‚Äù calories after my workout.
response: Hello! Thank you for this feedback. We've passed your suggestion on to our team for consideration in a future update!

title: Fails at the most basic function
body: To add calories, you have to search for the food or scan the barcode. Not possible to enter calories manually and when choosing a food, you cannot change the amount consumed. This forces you to tell the app that you only consumed the packaged serving size or keep scanning the bar code over and over for additional servings. And if you are simply choosing a food such as ‚Äúcooked rice‚Äù you cannot change the amount consumed. It‚Äôs just a full cup or whatever quantity you clicked on in your search. Very disappointed with this app, it has some other features that are really great like pairing with Apple Watch activity.
response: Hi zAkLeSs! Thank you for writing in! To adjust the serving size of an item you wish to track, you will want to tap on the "Servings" circle of the food item. This will populate the serving options and units of measurement that are available for that food item. Select how much of the food you ate, and then tap "I Ate This" in the top right-corner for the food item to save.

title: Ingenious App
body: The scan bar code option to track foods makes it so easy to work with. Excellent app. Works well for all fitness/health goals

title: Losing Weight - This App + walking
body: 41/M started 2020 at 250. As of Apr 3 2020 I‚Äôm 225 lbs.

title: Balanced diet
body: I always thought I was eating a well balanced diet. I scoffed at the people telling me to meet with a dietician or keep track of what I eat. I was so wrong. My daughter is a nurse and nagged me into using MyPlate. MyPlate is so easy and showed I was not eating nearly enough protein and I was eating way too much fat. My cholesterol has gone from 236 on 9/4/19 to 192 on 3/16/20 with no medication. I am currently still focusing on getting my macros. Thanks for the great app.

title: I LOVE the My Plate App
body: This is simply the easiest way to keep up with my calorie intake.  The bar code reader is awesome.  I also enjoy scanning healthy recipes because when watching calories, it is easy to repeat meals over and over again.  With recipes so easily available, it is easy to explore and try new foods.

title: Tracking hubby DM diet
body: Hi, my hubby is a diabetic who takes pills for his DM. He got discouraged last year and had quit watching his diet and last month when he saw the MD his A1C was 11.5. MD wanted to start insulin but hubby is one of the people who refuse ‚Äúto live on a needle‚Äù.  I gave him a choice either do a diet with my help or the shot plus a few choice words. I am a retired RN and I‚Äôve been giving him advice to help but he was even refusing my help. I downloaded this app and I had used another app a few years ago that was still on my phone. I tracked his diet for 2 days and showed him how much he was eating. 3-4,000 was his normal day. After my ultimatum he agreed to follow a 2000 calorie diet. When I plugged age 60, ht. 5‚Äô10‚Äù, wt. 198 in with his work activity of moderate it showed him needing 2100 +. We went to store together and I made him help pick out stuff instead of me doing it all. Once home I spent afternoon cutting, chopping, and prefixing salads and diving meat into individual freezer bowls. He is even helping to pack his breakfast and snacks to take to work with him. This past week he has done really well and has not strayed. He is down to 193 and staying at 2,000-2,100 calories. He likes seeing the graph that he is in our goal range. His fasting finger stick was 317 the first time he rechecked and this am it was down to 246. He is tickled and I am thrilled. I got a couple of books in DM foods and he actually looked at one and was making comments and suggestions so we are in the right track for first time in year and a half. This app had really helped him. Thank you!
response: This is so awesome! Thank you for sharing. We're glad that MyPlate has been such a big help!

title: Excelent app.
body: The products bar code scanner makes the tracking easy.

title: None of the calories are right
body: Telling me most food I enter (one food item like frozen yogurt) was around 56000 calories from fat
response: Hello! We're so sorry for the momentary inconvenience! This issue should be resolved, but please email us at support@livestrong.com if you're still seeing these numbers.

title: It‚Äôs Free But Nutrition Is All Over The Place
body: I wanted an app that could track calories and nutrients to give me an idea of where my eating is at so I can be more aware of what and how much I eat. First off like most apps they have a bar code scanner but it doesn‚Äôt recognize a lot of the barcodes I use (like other apps) Secondly, of it does recognize the barcode the calories are usually always wrong (like other apps) Which is the main thing I‚Äôm interested in. From personal experience they can be off by 5-180 calories depending on the food and that becomes annoying that means you basically have to manually enter everything even if the barcode is accepted. Third, I was looking at the ‚Äúnutrients‚Äù it claimed I ate and the protein was way off claiming I ate less than I actually did.
response: Hi there! We're sorry to hear that you've had trouble with the app. We'd love to look into this for you and make sure that everything is working as it should. Please send us an email at support@livestrong.com.

title: Excellent except iPhone app missing one key feature
body: I love this app. It‚Äôs so powerful even with the free version. It helps me stay honest and the bar scanning feature makes it so easy. I love building my recipe in meal section, however in the Android version you could out the whole recipe in and then say what portion you ate as a fraction of the recipe in the serving section. In the Apple version you create the recipe but then you say I ate it and can‚Äôt choose what portion of the meal you ate. If that could get fixed it would be awesome!

title: Amazing app üëèüèΩüëèüèΩüëèüèΩ
body: This app really works!!! I know it‚Äôs hard to find apps that work and I know the feeling of being over whelmed on which app to chose from. But ‚Äúmy plate‚Äù really works. I weighed around 200 pounds when I got this app. And in literally 3 months I lost 50 pounds!!! I now weigh 147. The app takes time and you really need to be patient. At some points you‚Äôll feel like you‚Äôve made no progress but trust me, the effects kick in. It‚Äôll take around a month for you to show some progress. The best thing is, I never had to give up any of the foods I love, all I had to do was cut down my food intake. The app is great and it works like a charm üëåüèΩ. I highly recommend this app, 5/5üëèüèΩüëèüèΩüëèüèΩüëèüèΩ. Also check out my Instagram and YouTube @skits.skit

title: Asks me to upgrade
body: I bought the 1 year upgrade and I still get adds and  notifications to upgrade. Nothing like the old Livstrong app. Could be a waste of $45.00
response: Hi there! We're so sorry for the frustration. It sounds like something went wrong here, and we'd love to resolve it for you. Please send us an email at support@livestrong.com. Thank you.

title: Frustrating
body: This app is very frustrating. When adding food 9 of 10 items can not be logged as grams, ounces, mL, etc. It only has an option of servings.
response: Hi Ardibee, thank you for this feedback. We're sorry that this has been so frustrating for you! Would you mind reaching out to us at support@livestrong.com, so we can get a few details and try to help you out? Thanks!

title: weird
body: i used to be able to count my calories burned on here without having to pay for it. i have been using this app for a few years now and recently got back on it. i previously used it on an android device. not sure if that is the difference, but if it isn‚Äôt, why did you take away free features and are now making people pay for them?
response: Hello! We do not charge to count calories burned. This has always been a free part of MyPlate. Please feel free to email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions.

title: This App helps...
body: ... keep track of calories consumed, helps reach goals and accounts for calories burned during exercise. Many restaurants and foods already in the data base and the scan the bar code feature is so helpful!

title: Overall is a good app
body: It got what I need for the free part which is super nice! Only one suggestion: it‚Äôll be nice if there is a share function for the receipts, I love some of the receipts but I want to share them to my friends via text or email or even send it to myself so I can print them out. And share functions for my progress
response: Thank you for your review and feedback! These comments will help guide our decision making for future updates in the app!

title: Good but could be great
body: I was using the free version and it was working pretty good.  I thought I‚Äôd do the free trial for a week 1 yr subscription offer.  The upgrade wasn‚Äôt enough for me to keep it and I cancelled before the trial ended.  I thought it would let me break the macro percentages to fit me specifically.  It could only be set in 5% increments.  Can‚Äôt set it to fit me specifically as I know I need to be 40-33-37.

title: Best App
body: I really like the ease of using this app and all the resources it has! And that is just the Free version!  Only suggestion would be to have an option to add water by entering the number. I drink from a glass that holds 22 ounces, then a water bottle holds 16.9oz. Just more effort to add these.

title: Great app!
body: This app is great so far. Once I realized I could scan in what I eat with the bar code, it made logging food easy and kinda fun! I‚Äôm enjoying the fact that it syncs to my Apple Watch! Makes tracking my calories easy!

title: Makes weight loss easy!
body: I started using this app about a month ago because the wedding dress I bought almost a year ago for my September wedding no longer fit. This app is amazing. By entering basic information like height, weight, and goal, it calculates how many calories I can eat a day to reach my goal. It makes me accountable for everything I eat. It has been an educational experience to learn how many calories are in certain food items and has helped me to make healthier choices. I have not been hungry at all by filling up on healthier food choices while still allowing myself an occasional treat.The barcode scan feature is a wonderful. In just about a months time I am down 15 pounds. My dress not only fits, I might need it taken in by the wedding. As a bonus, I feel healthier and have more energy!
response: Thank you for the great review and congratulations on your success and upcoming wedding!

title: Old fat white guy loving it
body: 72 264 on diet learning because of this app how many calories need to be using and able to add exercises foods water.  Sync with iPad to and my health app. Tracks my food and liquids easily.  If could cooperate with Run Keeper I would not have to enter bicycle rides.  EASY TO USE

title: Does not sync with Android and IPad and PC
body: Very disappointed
response: Hello! When you add to your MyPlate tracking, the device you are working on will automatically sync with the LIVESTRONG.COM servers.

title: Fantastic App!
body: This app has made such a difference for me.  It makes it so easy to track exercise and calories - I have finally lost the 7 lbs I‚Äôve been trying to get rid of for several years now.  I feel so much healthier, too.  The app makes me really think hard about what I‚Äôm eating.  Once I found the bar code scanner for food entry - it got even easier.  I have recommended this app to many friends!

title: Declining Functionality
body: For the time it was fully functional it was great. I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs due to updates but anytime I try to add a food it doesn‚Äôt work anymore. Wether I try scanning a bar code or adding it manually it displays a connecting error and it doesn‚Äôt go through. I‚Äôve tried restarting the app. I‚Äôve tried uninstalling and reinstalling the app (this wasn‚Äôt the first time it was an issue). This was my go to app for tracking all my food. It has great features, but the lack of functionality has made me look elsewhere.
response: Hello! We're sorry to hear that this is happening. Can you please send us an email at support@livestrong.com so that we can investigate?

title: Useless due to poor design decision
body: App can only track foods in the LiveStrong.com database. Since I don‚Äôt consult these randos about every meal I eat it was unable to track my caloric intake which is the only reason I downloaded it in the first place.
response: Thanks for trying out MyPlate! Sorry to hear about the frustration caused by not being able to properly track foods. If a meal or food item isn't found in our database, you can actually create a custom food or meal in the app! Select the meal you'd like to track the custom food to (Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner, or Snack), tap "My Food", and select "Create New Food" to create a custom food item. Enter the specifics of the food, and tap "Done" in the upper right corner. To group custom (or any) foods together, select Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner, or Snack, and then tap "My Meals". Select "Create a New Meal" and enter the foods you would like to group together. Feel free to send us a message at support@livestrong.com with any questions or concerns. Thanks again for trying MyPlate!

title: Better but could be improved.
body: Update- I upgraded this to 3 stars because the developer was good enough to email me and give me some tips on using the bar scanning feature better.  They also told me that some of my complaints are addressed in the web version or by upgrading.  $3.75 or $9.99/month is more than I am willing to pay on a monthly basis, but I appreciate how long it takes to program and develop so they have to make money somehow.  I‚Äôm just used to paying annually for my app upgrades.  I will check out the recipe portioning on the web version.  Thank you for your suggestions LIVESTRONG.  You get an A for support.
response: Thanks for trying MyPlate! Sincerely sorry to hear of your frustration when using the app.

title: I HAVE LOST 7 POUNDS AND STILL GOING
body: This app has made it so easy to keep on top of what I‚Äôm eating and it syncs perfectly with my Apple Watch to track my fitness. I wish I knew losing weight could be this easy years ago. I started out at 149lbs on 2/25/19 and I‚Äôm now at 142lbs less than a month later!

title: My New Normal
body: Absolutely love this app! It‚Äôs like breathing to me now, I eat something and immediately log it in. It‚Äôs so simple because you can search for whatever food you ate and if it‚Äôs not already on there, you can create it. If you only eat half of something, you can adjust serving size. I log my weight, workouts (by exercise) and amount of water I drink as well. It‚Äôs also super convenient for logging combo workouts you‚Äôve done because you can enter ‚Äúcalories burned‚Äù and the name of the workout. I‚Äôve lost 13 pounds and four inches off my waist already because of this app and I don‚Äôt plan to ever stop using it! You can use the entire function of the app without paying anything for a gold membership, aside from a few workout videos (which I don‚Äôt use anyway. I get mine from YouTube.) I highly recommend this for anyone trying to lose weight and get their summer body. A++

title: Lost 23 lbs in 2 1/2 months with MyPlate
body: This is a great app for reminding you just how many calories you can pack away if you‚Äôre not careful. I lost 23 lbs and am now back to what I weighed in high school. Also got my all my cholesterol and other blood stats down into the healthy range and my blood pressure is now 116/60. Not bad for a 67 year old.

title: Great app.  Few things lacking.
body: Great app.  Few things it‚Äôs lacking is recipe builder, searching recipes etc.  I have to do this on my computer on LIVESTRONG.COM

title: best app
body: This app is the best for tracking calories and it tells you the fats, carbs, and proteins in any food for free, unlike other dieting apps.It also has many different amount options for adding water intake not just 16 or 8oz. Really recommend it for anyone trying to watch their diet.

title: Poop
body: Not user friendly.

title: Excellent App
body: Helped me to see how many calories I was eating in a day by tracking those in between snacks that added up over the day. When I thought I was eating around 1800-2000 I was actually eating around 3000. No wonder I couldn‚Äôt lose weight. Just tracking alone helped me lose 40lbs without exercise. Then I was able to tweak my micronutrients to get healthier as well. Love Love Love this app!!!

title: SH*T WORKS
body: This app is sooo amazing!!!! I‚Äôve lost so much weight since downloading it!! Such a good library or food so very easy to track exact meals or something similar! Makes you soo much more aware of what your eating!! PLEASE DOWNLOAD AND USE THIS APP!! You won‚Äôt be sorry

title: Guuuuhhhh-rate!
body: It‚Äôs guhhhhh-rate!

title: App and weight loss program
body: This is easy, fun and challenging all at the same time. Recipes for all kind of food which are fast and easy to make. Love it... entering

title: The QR code scan blows my mind
body: Easy useful

title: Love this app
body: I had bariatric surgery at the end of May. There are a lot of apps out there but MyPlate is easy to use, you are able to use your camera to scan any bar code to add your food and it keeps a running list of the foods you eat the most for breakfast, lunch and dinner.

title: No response from support team
body: I have contacted the support for this App through the app itself as well as the website provided to me by Apple support.
response: First, thank you so much for trying the MyPlate app. Sorry to hear about your frustration with the response from support. Please message me directly at marcel.townsend@leafgroup.com and we'll resolve the issue with subscription right away.

title: Registration Page needs to be fixed
body: Unable to get through registration. Not sure what I‚Äôm missing but there‚Äôs no way to move forward in registration. My username was accepted, there are no other options on the page to accept or input information.
response: Hey, thanks for attempting to give us a try, and sorry to hear about your issues with registration. At your convenience, can you send a message to support@livestrong.com? Please include any screenshots related to the issue, and we'll work with you to solve this problem and get you registered.

title: Glitches
body: Feb 10 2019 the app began glitching and i am unable to add food products that are not saved by the app. If I can‚Äôt add these foods how can I properly track my foods? The app is useless if this does not work
response: Thanks for trying out the MyPlate app! If possible, can you please send a message with a little detail about the custom food creation error to support@livestrong.com ? Feel free to include any related screenshots, and we'll work with you and the dev. team to resolve this issue as soon as possible. Thanks again!

title: Not sure how
body: I started 3/4/2019 and end date is 3/6/2019

title: Very Helpful App!
body: I like the app and have been using it for 2weeks There are some issues from time to time. I have the app installed on both my iPad and my Android phone, so that I always have it available for use. I have noticed the app occasionally gets stuck on the previous day and does not automatically switch over to the current date at midnight. Easy solution is to turn off the device and restart, which always works, but is slightly inconvenient I love, love, love the barcode scanner for my food. Sometimes, the app is slow to sync between the two devices I use. I also like that the app will sends me optional reminders to log my food at meal times.

title: Need more foods added to database!
body: The food database is small, you have to manually enter most foods. Takes too much time!
response: Thanks for trying out MyPlate! Sorry to hear about the frustration when trying to scan items.

title: Food data inaccurate; unreliable
body: Love the interface and the ease of use, but the bar code lookup results are frequently inaccurate.  Eggland‚Äôs Best Eggs have ZERO cholesterol?  A side by side comparison of the nutrition label and information in the app shows holes in the data, which makes me reluctant to use the app as it will not be accurately reporting the food I am meticulously inputting.

title: Solid tracker!
body: UPDATED 08/04/2018
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage at our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Can‚Äôt pass registration
body: I get to the final page to register and the directions ask for a username, when I submit the username, it loads bt doesn‚Äôt go to the next screen. When I hit submit again, it states my username is now taken. If this is a problem before I start to use the app, I‚Äôm goin to have to pass.
response: Hi there, please email us at support@livestrong.com for assistance with this.

title: Meal plan glitch
body: Unfortunately the meal plan that shows up on livestrong.com does not show up in the app. Also I did not receive the shopping list. Every subsequent email refers to the shopping list as if I had received it. It‚Äôs hard to plan like this. I‚Äôm sure it‚Äôs a glitch.
response: Hi Luvdosmovies, all 8 weeks of the meal plan will show in the app on the first day of your challenge! We apologize for the glitch with the shopping list email. Our team is working on fixing this right now. If you can please email us at support@livestrong.com, we can send you your list directly. Thanks!

title: One request.
body: This app is great I just wish I was able to make the goal weight and calorie intake even lower. I dont eat as much as they are wanting me too and im very healthy, so I really dont need the extra 500-1000 calories!!
response: Hi! For safety reasons, 1200 calories per day is the minimum caloric goal allowed by the MyPlate calculator. This is commonly considered the lowest a number of calories a person can eat in a day without doctor supervision. Since most of our users do not check with a doctor before taking on such a goal, or are unable to do, we implemented this as a safety feature.

title: Very good
body: I think this is one of the best apps in the diet tracking category. I keep my weight lower by the simple process of tracking. I have two recommendations. The 1st is that it would better if the UPC code reader would crowd source recorded the information when entered by the user.
response: Thank you for your feedback, Terry! These comments will help our developers improve the app!

title: Great app
body: Good app helps keep good food log.wish there was a way to adjust times on weekends. Tend to not eat as early as thru the week. But very good.

title: Rating
body: I love the app because it keeps everything, amount of fluids you drink through out the day, food you eat, and exercise that you are doing. I would like to see under exercise the counting of steps and the equivalent to the amount of calories burned. This is because when you use the smart watches like Apple it counts the steps but doesn‚Äôt have the amount of calories that it equals.

title: Amazon

title: Amazing
body: This is my second time trying this app for weight gain, most apps only offer help with weight loss. The first time I wasn‚Äôt weighing myself regularly but this time I‚Äôm having to get weighed often due to medical issues I started this app 2 weeks ago at 89lbs and today I‚Äôm 94.4lbs. My goal is 105lbs I gained 5+ pounds in less than 2 weeks and that‚Äôs a lot coming from me because I‚Äôm very thin and I have struggled with keeping my weight on all my life.

title: Not worth it
body: I‚Äôve been doing this for freaking 3 months straight and I‚Äôve stayed under calories and even bought the premium pakage to help and I‚Äôve only lost freaking 3 pounds! And to make it even harder it doesn‚Äôt know ANY FREAKING FOODS and then you try to scan the bar code and guess what it doesn‚Äôt work then you try to do a ‚ÄúQuick add‚Äù or a ‚ÄúCreate your own‚Äù (which is when you put in all the nutrients facts in by your self) AND IT FIESNT WORK!!!

title: Buggy
body: This app is good for tracking calories but It just keeps logging me out of the app so I have to keep entering my username and password to use the app and every time I do that some of my data is lost.
response: Hello! We're so sorry for the inconvenience. Please email us at support@livestrong.com for assistance.

title: Meh
body: Waaaaaaaay better food trackers and macro trackers in other apps. This is seriously lacking. Same with exercise. Recipes are not family friendly and meal plans call for too many weird ingredients. Have had this app less than a week and find it unusable. Want 45.00 back, refunds are not allowed. No way to eliminate meals that are not good from the menu. Most of the trackers don‚Äôt work most of the time. Limited calorie selection for foods. Others are waaaaaaay better. Sorely lacking in exercise choices to track. Says its going to send you you a weekly menu, doesn‚Äôt send until after 5 on Sunday nights, cannot choose specific foods or menus or eliminate others.
response: Hi, if you've purchased our Gold membership via an in app purchase, please reach out to Apple directly to request a refund - http://www.apple.com/contact/. They do not allow us to refund in app purchases.

title: Good concept, but...
body: Good concept, but the app is MAJORLY lacking in a few key areas that are deal-breakers for me. Here are a few pros & cons.

title: Could be great, but premium is missing basic functionality.
body: I like the free version so I paid for premium. I wish I had gone with MyFitnessPal instead. These are my issues:

title: Why can't you search simple foods anymore?
body: I remember being able to search for simple foods like fruit and prepackaged products but now all it shows are foods I recently added back when you COULD search for food items not already recorded.
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage at our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Registration
body: The app wouldn‚Äôt even let me get past registration with an approved username, the correct email, and an approved password.
response: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. Due to an outage at our data center, MyPlate experienced some functionality issues. This has been resolved and the current app version should be 100% functional. Thank you for your patience during the time our team was working on fixing the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your wellness means so much to us and our team is committed to your ongoing health and fitness success. If you have any further questions, please reach us at support@livestrong.com.

title: Piss poor
body: I used to love this app but it has turned into a piss poor quality and money grabbing app
response: Hi Kenpo kid. We're sorry that you've had this experience! We welcome any feedback you'd like to share on why you feel this way. Please feel free to email us at support@livestrong.com.

title: This app rocks!
body: The free version has everything I could ask for - so much so that I might get the paid version just to say thanks and play around with its advanced features. Super easy to use and the scan feature kicks butt.

title: Wow...
body: Update! 3/15/18
response: Hi jessjocelynnn, this is not at all the experience we want for our users. Please reach out to us directly at support@livestrong.com so that we can make this right for you.

title: Neat app but frequent glitches
body: I download ‚ÄòStepz‚Äô last week to track my steps. I found tracking my steps so helpful that I downloaded this app on Friday to track my calories. I like the visual aspect of the dashboard, the variety of the foods already programmed on the app. While I concur with other user reviews that some info for the food items is a little off, I can work around this.  However, I deleted the app twice since the initial download on Friday both have to do with interaction w/ the Stepz app. (1) I liked this app was in sync w/ the Stepz app and calculated the number of calories I burnt - but I found the calories indicated was way too high. I attempted to go in and delete the calories burnt exercising, unfortunately the number just kept increasing (no matter how many times I tried to delete the entry).  I removed & then downloaded this app again. I figured entering my calories burnt manually would be a simple fix.
response: Hi Jnajam1975! Thank you for your review and feedback. At this time, the MyPlate app syncs directly with the Apple Health app and will read step activity tracked from devices you've synced to that app already. It is not meant to sync directly with the Stepz app.

title: Best tracking App
body: I looked at a lot of different ones and for ‚Äú free‚Äù this is by far the best one. Most items are in the system already and if not the bar code works great and the ease of entering and adjusting is perfect. I might even upgrade I‚Äôm so satisfied with it!

title: Nice But Some Problems
body: Doesn‚Äôt track sodium or cholesterol in practice because many ‚Äúverified‚Äù food listings do not include that info. The current ‚Äúverified‚Äù listing for chicken thighs, for example, says they have zero cholesterol - this is not accurate. Also I have had repeated issues with connectivity to iPhone motion and activity data. I have to reset this again and again. Further the program doesn‚Äôt follow progress longer than a year. Good points are that the interface is very friendly, fast, easy and fun. It‚Äôs workable if you don‚Äôt mind paying $44.99 to get basic info like calories.

title: Support people very good
body: Love and life peace and peace for the long time and long time life for the long life peace and peace peace and life peace peace for the life long long and time for the peace peace

title: Loving it BUT....
body: Today, after I added my new weight loss, it had a flashing message icon at the bottom of the app. I thought maybe it was the app congratulating me on a six pound weight loss. Got a pop-up that told me I had won a $1,000 Amazon Gift Card. It would only give me the option of hitting OK to get it off my screen. I called BS and forced the app to close. Was planning on going gold but if you guys are taking money from scammers and giving them access to me...why would I pay you a dime? REALLY loved this app...so REALLY disappointed being targeted by scammers through it. Guess I‚Äôll have to look for something else.

title: Lost data
body: Yesterday 5/29/18 my plate went hay wire and I lost all data. Everything I had saved for the last year. I had to even sign back into my plate and still nothing. Why did this happen? I use this app every day to keep conscious of what I do and eat. I am now leaning towards another app. Is there a way to get my data back and recover all of my saved foods?
response: Hi Amy, we're so sorry for this. Please email us at support@livestrong.com so we can assist you.

title: Its okay
body: It wont let you choose how many calories you WANT to have and I also accidentally put in a workout and it will not let me remove it so its off today
response: UPDATED RESPONSE 12/5/17: There is a manual option. Please email us at support@livestrong.com so that we can explain further.

title: Can‚Äôt get past username screen
body: I have tried many times to create an account, on multiple phones, and it always gets stuck saying it‚Äôs setting up my account. I have never gotten into the actual app before.
response: Hi AbbeyRex! We're so sorry for the trouble you've experienced. It sounds like you may already have an account with us. Please email us at support@livestrong.com so that we can help you get set up!

title: Outstanding (for a long time!)
body: I have had this app for over 5 years. The data bank of foods is HUGE and it has a plethora of serving sizes (1/3c, oz., TBSP.) It is customizable for your favorite recipes, and/or you can scan the item‚Äôs bar code for instant entry.  It has macros breakdowns and it also can sync with your health data on iPhone to track steps. My Plate is an outstanding tool for to keep track of intake and exercise.

title: Good app but subscription incentive is idiotic
body: This app works. It also locks up your data (something as simple as average calories burned) in order to get you to subscribe - $3.75 to $10/month depending on how many months you buy. Is this the future? Subscribing to see your own data?
response: Hi Matt! Thanks for your review and feedback! The app will show your weight loss/gain trends dating back for a year regardless of whether or not you have upgraded to our Gold membership. You can view your entire weight history by logging into your account on our desktop site. Please feel free to email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions!

title: Subscription too high
body: I like the ease of use with this app. But I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs worth $10.00 a month. I notice that some of the features don‚Äôt work.

title: We love it
body: We absolutely love this app! It‚Äôs clean, easy to use and integrates with our Apple Watches. We have lost weight when using this app. My plate has helped us to visually be able to see how many calories, fat, carbs and proteins are in the food we consume. We love that you can scan the bar code on the packages of the food you ate, that makes it a lot easier and faster than having to type it in. Thanks for creating such a great app!
response: Thank you for the review and feedback, Damaris! We're so happy to hear that you are enjoying and have found success with the MyPlate app. Keep up the great work!

title: Love this app
body: Great for keeping track of your calories, I use it everyday. I also love how you can just scan the bar code which saves so much time which is one of the many reasons why I‚Äôm still using it. I have gained a few pounds since I‚Äôve kept up with my calorie goal each day.

title: Great idea but the code is bad
body: The idea is awesome! I had the best start; then it stopped logging the data. I contacted support and received ‚Äúall caps response and !!!‚Äù - not necessary. App didn‚Äôt log burned calories or workouts, didn‚Äôt sync with phone activity. That is the key to this app in my opinion. Getting a refund is difficult and as previously mentioned customer service seemed like I was getting a roid rage response. I tried giving it a second shot and the problem persisted. Over it.
response: Hi there. Thanks for your feedback! We're a little confused by the interaction you've had with customer support, as this is not reflected in our logs. Please email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions or concerns.

title: $3.95 a month is what i want to pay, not $44.99 in one lump sum
body: Why if you advertise $3.95/Mth must I pay $44 upfront lump fee?

title: Easy Peasy
body: This App is easy to navigate, quick to use, has lots of pre entered items, and the bar code scanner helps to get new stuff into it. Well worth it, and it was recommended to me by my Doctor at a weight loss clinic.

title: Unhappy
body: I am extremely unhappy that after 3+ years of using this app I suddenly have to input my birthdate and information and a username to create yet another account just to use the app. I am more than capable of determining my own dietary needs and just want this app to track calories and exercise. I don't need your help to tell me what to eat. Especially since you're taking money from food companies--I'm sure that doesn't factor into anything. I was perfectly happy with this app until I had to go thru and create an account and profile just to use an app I was happily using for the last 3 years. The only reason I went through the process was to leave this review. I'll be finding something else.
response: Hi Mcnulty! We are so sorry for this inconvenience. We completely understand your frustration. Please email us at support@livestrong.com so that we can work with you to make this right.

title: Helped Me Gain Weight
body: This app helped me gain weight and me being 11 and having to track how many calories I eat everyday because of an eating disorder is pretty bad. Overall it's really easy to use and very efficient, it tracks how much water your drinking, how many calories you consume for each meal and a separate column for snacks, it also has 5-10 minute workouts that allow you to burn up to 100-200 calories depending on which one you do. GREAT APP! LOVE IT!!!

title: Awesome
body: Awesome

title: Almost 5-star. Minor workflow changes needed
body: So far, the app has helped me track and manage the important aspects of my new health regimen. We all know how fickle our intentions can be when it comes to health tracking. That‚Äôs why for any app of this kind to be successful, it MUST be nearly effortless. Otherwise, it‚Äôs way too easy to backslide.

title: App Still Needs Work
body: I just switched to lose it app. I then entered data on both apps for 5 days, Lose it had me on 150-300 calories less per day, started dropping weight, used my plate for two months, no weight loss. The overall feel and the methodology of Lose it is better. It‚Äôs media rich, Lose it is a 4K tv and My plate is 1080p. Paid for a whole year upfront...ugh
response: Hi IMAZ thanks for your feedback! Please email us at support@livestrong.com so we can assist further.
