response: Hello! Thank you for your review. We're so sorry that you've had this experience in the community. We're working on developing a way to filter out the less than helpful posts and boost the better ones to the top! If you feel that any of our members have broken our Community Guidelines, please be sure to email us at support@livestrong.com so that we can take appropriate action. We're also happy to answer any questions you may have on how to use the app.

title: So bad!!
body: Everyone on here is so unsupportive if there were no chat rooms it would 10000 times better!! Everyone keeps telling me i am going to die if I don't eat 2000 calories every day like can you all jus leave me alone i did not ask for your advice!!!
response: Hi Dafarren! We're so sorry for the experience you've had! If you feel that a user has violated our Community Guidelines, please email us at support@livestrong.com. Please note that posts promoting unhealthy eating habits will be removed by our moderators!

title: Macro Tracking
body: I like the bar code scanner. Pretty accurate as it allows me to track what I eat and all my macro nutrient which is essential if you want to build muscle.

title: Excellent. Update
body: Have had this app for about a month. Very easy to navigate and find my foods. Pleased at this point and have recommended to several friends. Only 12 lbs lost so far but I am on track.

title: User
body: This is my favorite app, and the most useful one that I have. I use it daily to record my food intake and my exercise. I have been using it for several months and it has helped me lose 42 pounds since January. I love the way it tracks calories consumed and calories burned by exercise all on the same page.

title: Love this app
body: So far lost 14 lbs in a little over 6 weeks using this app. The main thing was I started to realize all the crap I was eating throughout the day because I started logging it. The main thing is to stick with the app and be truthful to yourself when eating!

title: Love this app!
body: Makes it so much easier to lose weight! I'm down 12 lbs in 3 weeks because of it! The bar code scanner is my favorite feature, it makes it so quick just to add what I ate, and I like how the app accesses my pedometer and automatically subtracts how many calories ive burned!

title: Not bad at all
body: I've been using this app for a little over a month now. Overall, it's been a positive experience. I started my workout routine along with a new diet, with the help of this app, I'm able to keep track of my progress successfully. However, there are some cons, hence why I gave it a 4 stars.

title: I want to love this app...
body: However, 90% of the time when I try to add a new food I get an error code - but only after I have taken the time to enter ALL the data. This is maddening. I have used this app on and off over the course of several years now and this problem never gets fixed. I am looking for a better app right now for this very reason. Almost everything else about the app is terrific. I like the scanning feature, I like the number of verified foods (though I do often notice they are slightly inaccurate), I like the charts/tracking feature, the appearance, and the reminders. Not being able to enter new foods though makes me crazy and completely destroys my ability to track accurately what I am eating. Another minor complaint is that the user submitted foods that are shared are often WAY off.  A user submitted baked potato is listed as having 30 grams of protein. Ha! Probably a mistype, but still, if you do not pay close attention to the nutrition content, you could be tracking some very inaccurate protein, fat, sugar, and carb levels.
response: Hi Minjesu, thank you so much for your feedback! We are aware of the issue with decimal points and we're working on a fix! We apologize for this inconvenience and hope to have a resolution soon.

title: Luv it!!
body: Luv it!!!!!!

title: Nice visuals and works good with watch
body: I have used this app since the App Store came out on iOS (yes from 2008). It has served me well and the updates have made it even better. The only issue I have is with the scanner. It's almost not worth the time using it since the success rate of reading barcodes is very low. Most barcodes on food packaging are not on an exactly flush or perfectly flat surface which makes for difficulty reading with an iPhone 7 Plus camera. This could definitely be improved with better app code as the camera optics are more than up to the task of reading barcodes in varied conditions. Also a few of the barcodes are bringing up incorrect nutritional information and there's no obvious method to correct or submit a correction.

title: Can't really log exercises...
body: This would be my go-to health app if it was easier to add custom workouts. For example to add that I did 100 squats in a day would be a pain in the butt. Change this and the app would be perfect! I appreciate the workout programs that come with the app and love everything else though. Please make an update!

title: They took my money
body: I sign up for gold membership and I paid yearly 44.99$
response: Hi- we're so sorry you've had this experience! We haven't received any emails to our customer support desk from your username. We're more than happy to help you with this, so please be sure to email us at support@livestrong.com so we can fix your membership!

title: Great
body: I'm too lazy to go over to a seperate food journaling app, but this app is pretty convenient. Love the bar code.

title: Great food tracker app!!
body: Great app... very user friendly and intuitive.  Food database is impressive and bar code scanner is awesome!  Haven't stumped it yet!

title: Disappointing and weak
body: * Bar code reader does not work -- at all -- ever.

title: Deleted immediately
body: The registration is so long and requires a public username which you cannot skip. I tried half a dozen usernames before giving up and deleting the app. What a mess.
response: Hi there- we're sorry for the experience you've had with registration. All of the information that we ask for is used to best provide you with the most accurate calorie goal for your body type. Please feel free to email us at support@livestrong.com so we can assist you!

title: Fantastic!
body: This a fantastic app to be able to track your daily routine! It definitely keeps me more aware of how I treat myself with my routine. May-4-2017 update, I love this new look in the app! More colorful and still very easy to use.

title: No time for this junk
body: Can't register, email not valid, username server error.  Moving on to something that works. No time for crappy codes apps.
response: Hi Mark, we're so sorry for the inconvenience. We've resolved this issue and you should have no trouble registering! Please feel free to email us at support@livestrong.com with any questions.

title: This App
body: This app is a great app and it helps you lose weight and gain weight.Right now I am around 100 lbs. but with this app I can lose as much weight as I want and be healthy

title: Can't create Username!
body: Downloaded the app but it won't let me create a username. Either says username already exists or data returned from server is no good.

title: Love this!
body: Helps me so much! I didn't realize that I was only eating 500-800 calories a day! I thought i was doing so good but I wasn't loosing weight! I couldn't figure it out without this user-friendly, quick app!

title: A fine way to Log Meals
body: It sends notifications at meal times ,then gets the data from their database,which is really solid.HealthKit integration is good too

title: Can't register
body: It won't let me register. Gets all the way to choosing a username, errors out, then tells me the username is taken (even though it isn't). Uninstalled.

title: My Favorite
body: Finally, a great app for tracking your food intake! This works very well as it scans almost any bar code and you can custom create your own foods and meals. I upgraded to the premium version and it is worth every cent to me. Apps aren't any benefit if you don't use them. This one is easy and I've tracked everything now for 4 months and would definitely buy it again.

title: Helpful
body: I really love this app. Its very helpful in keeping me on track and I really love the circuit work outs. Occasionally the app won't be 100% accurate on the calories for a bar code I scan but it's not a deal breaker!

title: Loved it before... lukewarm now.
body: App functioned beautifully before, strait forward, easy to use, minimal screen jumping.

title: Bring back the old version!!!!!
body: I am very disappointed with the recent upgrade (downgrade)!!!! I used to love this app but it is now useless for my needs. I am on a keto diet and need to see the percentage of calories coming from fat, protein, and carbs. This feature is gone! It looks like you have to pay for this now, but the android app has not changed and it's still available on the free version. The overall look of the app is horrible now too! Please bring back the old version! Until then it's useless to me and I will not be using it.

title: Please bring back the old UI
body: I hope the product team reads these reviews.  Why would you remove existing functionality in an update?  Many of your users are bariatric and keto dieters, who closely monitor their protein, carb and fat intake on a daily basis.  Not only did you remove this functionality, you also changed the interface to require MORE taps before logging meals and water.  WTH?  I've happily used this app for 18 months, but now I had to download MFP so I can track my macros.  I'm sad, hope you bring back the previous functionality.

title: Nutrition facts are all messed up
body: I tried "creating a new food" and when I logged in the nutrition facts instead of my dish having 22g of fat/protein/sugar/etc., it logged it as 0.0022g??? I even tried doing it again as 22.0g and still, it was logged as some ridiculously small amount. Also, I would like an option to see all of the foods I've created and have the option to edit/delete them. I'm fairly new to this app so if the option is already there, it's very hard to find..

title: Pretty good
body: Only thing I would add is a symptoms tracker, a poop tracker, and a place to list supplements taken.

title: Easy to use
body: I really like the scan bar code feature. I also like that it saves previous food as I tend to not eat a huge variety.

title: Easy as pie
body: I love this app. It makes tracking your calories so easy. My favorite feature is the bar code scanner. It's seriously the only thing that can get my lazy butt to track my food!

title: Love this App!!
body: Very accurate and let's you scan a products UPC code to make finding the info quicker!  Love this app!

title: Doesn't transfer from old app
body: Tried to open old app. It told me I had to download the new app & transfer data. It doesn't transfer any data & I cannot click anything in the old app except transfer data. Would be great if I could click on my profile to verify my username in the old app. You're completely useless & I'm done with you. If I'm starting a new profile, I'll do it elsewhere.

title: Want to rate higher but has ONE GLARING PROBLEM...
body: when I go to add a food (after scrolling through the search list two options pop up in green on the bottom... Quick entry and create new food) from create a new food option it won't put in the correct number formatting.  For instance I put in 22gm of carbs and it displays as 0.0022gms of carbs... And it did this to all the nutrional data which makes EVERYTHING INCORRECT.  I saw another reviewer had this same issue so I tried their trick of adding a decimal point... 22.0gm. And it still didn't work.  PLUS.... there's  no way to delete that food entry if you select that option of adding it. You can tell because there are now TWO ENTRIES for caramel cobwebs from universal studios lol.  No way to edit or delete a food... This is TERRIBLE!

title: Pretty Darn Good
body: I downloaded this app about a week ago to track my caloric, protein and fat intake.  Im only utilizing the free part of the app currently.  Its pretty darn good.  It meets my basic needs.  Id like to see a time stamp (that can be over-ridden) so I can know exactly when im consuming what...plus a comment/note input for each entry so that I can keep track about why I chose that particular food item.  Note entries like pre-workout, post-workout, unable to access something more nutritious, traveling, etc...  The food item list also needs some type of common sense order to it.  Just for example, type in Egg McMuffin, and you will have a very difficult time finding the regular McDonalds Egg McMuffin.  It should be listed first. Its the same with most items.  Kudos though to the scanning feature.  That really is a great ability.  Anyways, I highly recommend this app.  Great job LiveStrong.org.

title: Use it lots but I'm not sure about the accuracy
body: The layout of this app is great, and I like using it but it really falls short of Fat Secret's tracker in two major ways. One, most of the food is user submitted and clearly wrong. For example, you can find the same food listed as 200 - 600 calories for the same serving size. Two, the serving selections are really limited. Fat secret let's you measure in many different units but this only gives you one and you have to do a lot of conversions. Finally the paid service gives some useful data but I don't like the way it is calculated (though I haven't found a better option for this so I DO pay for the service and use the app despite that).

title: Great Calorie Tracker
body: I've been using the free version. I've learned over the years that the best way for me to lose weight is to track my caloric intake. This app is fantastic at doing just that. Once you start with the settings and the amount of weight you'd like to lose each week tracking what you eat is simple. There's a vast database of nutritional info and if you can't find it on their database you can enter it manually or scan the UPC code. It sure beats writing stuff down on pieces of paper and looking up the nutritional data in a book or online. It also enables you to account for you fitness regimen as it automatically subtracts calories according to the type of exercise you do. This is a great, easy to use app! You're also not constantly bombarded with requests to upgrade to the premium version.

title: feature poor doesn't sync
body: Wow, look at all these fake reviews...

title: Can't even register
body: Keep getting error after entering a username.

title: Cant register
body: Useless app. Cant register a username so you cant do anything

title: Use to be fine until latest update
body: Since the June 30 update all data prior the current week is now corrupted.  Random large numbers of servings have been entered to many items.  For example, on any given day last week, I was between 132,456 - 272,879 calories over my goal.  I wish!

title: Use it to keep track of food only
body: Love the bar code reading feature! Makes it super simple.

title: Too many errors
body: This app has too many bugs and errors, especially with the bar code scanner, that I will no longer be using this app. Almost every bar code I scan results in inaccurate calorie and fat counts. The box will say 270 calories, and My Plate will say 290 calories for example. This happens almost every time. The app also does not allow you to delete foods from your list that you have eaten in the past. It was a pretty good app until the fiasco of March 2016 when an update caused me to have other users' food and exercise in my app. I still have foods I have never eaten in my life that I can't delete. Although it has improved, the synchronization with the iPhone health app step counter is often skewed and My Plate will show a ridiculous amount of calories burned such as 700 calories by 9 a.m. It also does not sync with the My Plate web site. I am still resentful that my iPhone health app contains other people's weights from the March update. Maybe it will go away since I am about the delete this app. I will use the iPhone health app to track my steps, weight and water intake from here forward. I had used My Plate on PC long before it was taken over by Livestrong and long before it was an app. Say goodbye to a user of 7 years My Plate.

title: Unusable because of ads
body: It started today with a pop up that says "Enter voucher code GORDIE20 20 USD in free rides". Ok, so what? it's a free app and there is going to be ads. I'll click ok, it goes away and then two seconds later it pops up with the same ad. THERE IS NO WAY TO MAKE IT STOP. I can not use this app anymore because every interaction with the interface is prevented by this stupid ad. It won't stop. Make it stop. I just want to count calories and cut weight. I will put 5 stars if you make these idiotic ads stop. Just put a banner at the bottom! That's all you have to do! I just want to ignore it and move on with my life.

title: Great App!
body: I did not think I was calculate calories from Chinese food. But My Plate was able to provide the information.

title: Bar code scanner
body: Overall, the free version of the app is good. Aesthetically appealing and simple to use. Two issues: NOTHING scans so I have to manually search for food(s) and if I'm synced with my Apple Watch and open my Nike app, it will double log.

title: Great weight food tracker but I don't like their scanner
body: I just started using this app and so far I find it very easy to use. Adding /editing/food is very easy to do. They seem to have a decent database of food that has already been calculated. The one thing(so far) I don't like to use is their scanner. I've used plenty of scanners before and this one is a pain to use. It's not intuitive where you hold it over the bar code and it scans like other scanners. It makes you work to get the right position. It takes more time than it should

title: So easy!
body: My favorite feature is scanning a bar code to automatically add commercial product nutrition.

title: Almost Five Stars
body: I like this app a lot. There are only a few improvements that I think would make this a 5star app.

title: Apple IOS 10.00.1. & Paid Upgrade - Bad Combination!!
body: This latest update has changed the way the app works.

title: I really like it.
body: I've been using  his app for over a year and it works for me. Mainly I'm keeping an eye on the percentages of fat, protein and carbs I take in per day, so am not losing or gaining, just maintaining my weight.   I've never had any of the glitches that other users report.

title: Older but stronger
body: I've been using this app since September 2009. I don't know why I hadn't written a review before but here's my 2 cents worth.

title: Fantastic
body: This program has helped me loose 25pounds. And I'm going to keep going.  I feel great

title: Not so great
body: So I did like this app till the bar code scanner stopped working. Not it's useless. Glad I didn't pay any money for this app.

title: Easy!
body: Using to track the five meal replacement shakes and my 120-150oz water intake each day. Does exactly what I need it to do even w/o gold status. Wish it had a timer element.

title: Perfect
body: Best meal tracking app I have come across. Item entry is intuitive and the bar code scanner works well with almost all items. It also works when tracking your macros.

title: App Issue
body: There seems to be an issue within the app which prevents you from registering! I have deleted the app and downloaded numerous times and I'm still getting the same error code. üôÑ

title: Log in error code
body: I can't get the app to go past the username set up. It says log in error failure to connect to server? Disappointed

title: Pick a name
body: Followed the rules sunburned probably 20 names none are available or it sends an error code. Waste of time.

title: Trying to register
body: So I've tried like 10 times to register and I get an error and send me back to choosing a username screen. I used to have this app and it was great. Stopped using it a while back but wanted to use it again and i couldn't remember my old login so I'm just making a new one but how can I make a new one when I I continuously get an error

title: The BEST!!
body: I found this app to be the best and easiest way to keep track of my eating and quest to lose some weight.  The bar code scanner is a GREAT feature. Recognizes every food I've scanned!  The only one problem I have found, is it doesn't sync correctly between, iPad, iPhone, and Apple Watch.

title: Used to be my favorite
body: Myplate used to be my absolute favorite calorie counting app. I love the layout; I love the user-friendliness and simplicity. I used it for several months then fell out of the habit and eventually deleted the app.

title: Not sure i trust it now
body: I have used this app for a long time and thought it was great a few weeks ago when i was adjusting my weight after losing pounds i noticed my weight was back to the old weight the next day, same thing happened he day after that.   Yesterday it recorded i burned 28000 calories and had data from devices belonging to other people on it. I honestly have to question now if any of my information is accurate and if I have wasted my time.  I have been busting my but eating a low calorie diet and exercising and now i have to wonder how long this thing has been corrupting my data i use to keep myself on track.   There has to be a better solution

title: This version is terrible
body: Add me to the list of people whose data was completely overwritten by someone else's today...I have used this app for over two years with a lot of success - today, I deleted it

title: Love this app
body: I use this app for 3 years. Very easy to use, great calorie tracking over longer time, offers useful statistics related to weight loss, nutrient percentage etc. It got even better since they integrated bar code scanner. If you need good tracking that gives you info about your own eating habits this is the app to choose.

title: Was good...
body: This app was great until about a week ago, now my weight is all over the place and I'm burning 17000 calories per day and I'm not sure how the information is getting in there.

title: Excellent app
body: Update  3/12/16:    They did an upgrade a few days ago that seemed to break some things.  After contacting them about it, they responded very quickly and resolved the problem. THANK YOU AND GOOD JOB!   I'll stick with the 5 star rating.   ORIGINAL REVIEW: After discovering that I had Type 2 diabetes, I downloaded this app to track consumed sugar and calories.  I'm now hook on this app.  I use it whenever I eat anything and love the ability to scan food labels.  Although it seems to have a huge database of food items, I sometimes have trouble deciding which of the identically named items I'm eating, e.g., "Medium Apple" at 80 calories or "Medium Apple" at 90 calories (this is a minor complaint).  The other issue is whether the proper adjustment is made to accumulated sugar for eating partial portions - I read someplace that this wasn't handled correctly, but I haven't checked this myself.  I also like the integration with the HEART app.  Allowing a daily entry for measured blood sugar would be interesting.

title: Forcing me register all the time.
body: Used app for years but now I am giving up becouse of new version just forcing to register instead of putting data right away. I dont want to do it.period.

title: There are Still Basis Problems Unsolved
body: Is there a rating lower than one?

title: Fix update please!
body: Normally would give 5 stars but I can't even get on this app anymore with it crashing ever since the March 11 2016 update. Fix this please. I been tracking for almost a year! All my info is on there.

title: Ugh
body: I can't even make a freaking username. And everything I do is a problem. Bye bye app

title: 'Updated' yesterday, inoperative today...
body: I'm sure they're on this but at the moment it doesn't function, gets to the main open screen and locks up.

title: Problems with 01/27/16 update
body: I have been using the app daily for the past 2 years. Unfortunately the 01/27/16 update has broken the app - it will not load/progress past the app startup screen.

title: Broken
body: The latest update on 1/27/2016 broke the app. Now it just hangs at the splash screen. Quality control?

title: Great App
body: Does everything I need it to do.  Tracks my food in take and easy to use with the nice bar code scanner. Love it.

title: App Performance
body: I scanned Chobani Pineapple on the bottom yogurt as 160 calories and the container read 140 calories.  A 20 calorie difference. I have this problem with other products I scan. Not sure if the problem is from the product bar code or the my plate app.

title: Horrible
body: I can't even sign up because every email I put says it's already in use???? Same with any username I put no matter how ransom??? Ughhhh

title: Fabulous ...Very helpful
body: Needed to start watching my sugar and carbs... This app is a very helpful - showing actual nutritional values for everything you eat. My MD was Very impressed seeing this too !!

title: Keeps logging out
body: It keeps logging me out whenever I try to do something. Facebook account doesn't work. I have to manually enter my username and password every time. I had this app a year ago before they added all this BS of premium and advertisements. Way better app back then.

title: I love the app but it keeps logging me out
body: I've used the app in the past but then I forget about it and delete it. Recently I felt motivated to lose weight again and so I downloaded the app. For some stupid reason it decides to log out every time I leave the app (even if it's still active). Also there is no "remember me" option so I feel helpless in the fact I have to type my long username and password every time I need to use it. I think this just might be a glitch but it needs to be fixed.

title: Keeps me on track
body: I love this app, I use it every day and it keeps me on track. The easy to use feature helps you find foods quickly. I love the scanner, you can use it on most foods that have a bar code. Thanks MyPlate, best app ever!üòä

title: Good app
body: Good app, increase the bar code library though.

title: Good tracker
body: The sync problems seem to have been corrected. This is a good tool for tracking calories, exercise, and progress. It has helped me lose 70 pounds in 10 months. Just be sure to record all meals and don't exceed the goal calories and it will work.

title: Wow! This is awesome!
body: I first downloaded a 4.5 star app that was much more used. We were just overwhelmed with the amount of work to enter one food.

title: Easy to use but problematic.
body: I have been using this app for years and it is a great tool for tracking calories but the app often will not sync with the computer, and the recent tracked food list is what I have the biggest problem with. The list on my phone is truly massive from over the years and their is no way to delete it. I can barely find what I want to eat which is relatively the same thing everyday with everything sitting there. The bar code scanner does not work for foods either. Please make these features available in the app. I would love to wipe all of my recently eaten foods and have a clean slate.

title: Love this convenient app
body: This app has made it very easy to track my caloric goals as well and create a plan to eat well. All goods that I have consumed are easy to search and count towards my daily allowance and is super easy with the bar code scanner. Love it and I am suggesting that all of my friends and family download this app.

title: App review
body: This app is really great and helpful .It tells you how much calories ,Fats,sodium levels ,etc you should be getting.It also gives you great workouts that have turned me sore but are define you helping .I haven't lost any pounds yet ,but I'm getting there. I also like how it helps you and reminds you to track your food intake . The food options are unlimited and it has found almost all of the foods I have eaten .This app is great but there are a few things that may make it better .I think it should tell you lists of certain diets that have worked for other people because it may help others .It should also give you workouts that a specifically for certain body parts .That way then the app may work better and people would start seeing results fastest. Fast results=Inspired people. Inspired people = people to keep using the app.

title: Simple, easy to use interface, wish it was easier to add your own recipes
body: I love this app, it's simple, pretty, and very easy to learn and use, and offers a lot of features for free that other apps charge a yearly/monthly fee for.

title: Excellent food journal app
body: This is a great app for keeping up with your food consumption daily, as well as calorie, protein, and fat intake and water intake. You can also add your exercise to show calories burned. They do have a large database so you can search for your food so the nutritional facts will auto populate. The bar code scanner is saves time.

title: MyFitnessPal would have sent me my info...
body: I used to use this app very frequently. However, after reseting my phone, I lost the app and had to sign back in. I had forgotten my username, so I sent a request to get a reminder of what it was. Never received it. That was over two and a half weeks ago.

title: Love it!
body: I was instructed by my MD that I needed to track my meals and weight, in preparation for a consultation with a dietician. He recommended another dietary tracking app but I found it difficult to keep track of my meals.

title: Best Nutrition App ever
body: Easy to use and it has a huge database plus the ability of scanning bar code to load the information or you can enter it easily manually!

title: Awesome
body: Awesome

title: 5 stars but I'm holding back 1
body: This is truly an astonishing app. This is a must have if you want to gain lose or stay the same weight. You will change your routine for the better. They have such a large library of foods you just have to type in if you don't have a bar code (which works ever time in seconds) or you can manually put it in. It's nice knowing what your putting in your body and seeing how your routine affects your health. Again You will change your routine for the better. Only reason I hold one star is bc I see a bright future for this app and I hope the creators will push the limits with its future. But bc I don't want them to have 4 stars I'll post 5. Keep doing your amazing work guys you've set the standards.

title: Excellent
body: I always really liked this app but then yesterday something I ate was not in their system. I noticed I could scan the bar code and voila!!!! Amazing. All the info right there. Fantastic app.

title: Great diet app
body: This app is a Great replacement for a calorie journal, since you probably already have your phone with you. The coolest part is the ability to scan a bar code and automatically pull down nutrient information. And while it doesn't have every food out there, the database is pretty large, especially for a free app.

title: Simple and great
body: So far loving this thing especially the bar code scanner!

title: Excellent
body: Excellent

title: Everything is great but water tracking
body: This app was ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è until they changed water tracking. You used to be able to finish a bottle of water and type in the exact amount and it would add it to the previous glass. Now they chosen coolness over function. "Ooo look the water in the glass moves!" But most bottles are 20 or 22oz and also liters which are 33 making water tracking a pain in the butt. Please change it back!!!!

title: Pjs
body: Great app.Would recommend and it's free!

title: It's not bad
body: It's fairly easy to use. It has pretty much every food item and every brand you can think of. The biggest cons of this app are serving sizes: they don't always coincide with the food label; and the bar code scanner is awful. AWFUL. It doesn't focus right, it rotates the orientation, and it almost looks like the camera is swinging. It will make you dizzy if you try to use it.

title: Works for SAD
body: This app works. Scans even the most odd things that I wouldn't expect it to. However if you are vegan or vegetarian or following an 80-10-10 plan you can't adjust the goal carb, protein, and fat numbers. Too bad since it does help with all other things (like planning meals etc)

title: Pretty good app
body: I like the app...ONLY criticism it should have a barcode reader QR code reader to simplify lookup of foods

title: Love scan & meal features
body: The ability to quickly scan the UPC code for food is great at home. Creating meals for frequent combinations saves me a lot of time, too.

title: Way to keep up with iOS releases (NOT!)
body: Updated iOS on 7/13/15 and now app freezes on launch. Don't buy unless fixed.

title: Love it! ‚ù§Ô∏è
body: Easy to add foods with bar code.

title: Great app!
body: So far so good.  Love the activity tracker feature, bar code scanner & easy-to-use option to add your own food.  Colorful, user friendly display makes it fun to track my food and exercise!

title: GREAT FOR ATHLETES!!
body: Ok so I usually don't write reviews but this one is very useful. I was afraid it wouldn't help with GAINING WEIGHT however it shows how much protein carbs calories etc.This will definitely help for us athletes who have to gain weight for football and I will gain 35 pounds by football season, great app and really recommend

title: Stupid
body: It always found something wrong with my username. Who needs a user name to track their food? I just wanted to make sure my food intake was the same, but no this app wouldn't let it be.

title: No Way
body: My MD suggested for the new year use MyPlate as a tool, along with exercise and new hobbies. It's nice that I'm not alone, cause other people want to gain weight. Nice app!

title: Great app, on iPhone 6
body: The UX is great, the database robust. The addition of myWater is great! Now I love everything about this app.

title: @annetteh81
body: Great App for Calorie Counting

title: Very helpful app
body: Really like this app. Food, water & activity tracking is so helpful. I would like to be able to change or delete items once it's entered. For instance, I forgot that 8 is defaulted in the water intake and I just added 24, was stuck with 824 and couldn't change or remove. Would also love a place to put ingredients in a recipe & it tell me the nutritional info. Currently have to leave the app to do this. Love that there are so many items in the food & activity section to choose from and that I can scan the bar code & it's very up to date. It also syncs with the movement app on my new iPhone 6, hoping it will do so with my Up24 when it comes in.

title: Excellent!
body: No app is perfect, but this one is so easy. If you can't find the food item listed just scan the bar code and presto, it loads it in.  Best app of this kind that I have found

title: Don't upgrade!
body: I just upgraded today 2/15/15 and the only thing that changed is it added ads like "candy crush" games and other things. And It erased all my history and I had to re-do my entire profile!!!!

title: A great way to start your day
body: For those that wish to lose weight this App is a great tool to use. We all need a goal for remember (where the head goes the butt will follow)

title: Excellent: Easy; Detailed
body: Very easy to use and has a lot of detailed information on specific and obscure foods (i.e. Trader Joes). Very nice that it keeps the history of your manual entries for future reference. Bar code scanner is great - although it be nice if you could add the information to the database for bar codes that don't show up.

title: My plate review
body: I love this app! I love how it tracks my calories and daily exercise.It tells me when I need to get more calories and when to burn calories. I recommend this to anyone trying to find a great calorie tracker.

title: Fat and water tracking
body: The fat grams shown on the  daily intake graph is way of the charts, yet when I review the nutrition label from the original scan the info is correct... Please fix this bug. Also the water update requires I do the the math! WTH? It used to let me add ounces drank then the app did the math updating my total intake... Aggravating!  If it crashes one more time loosing all my precious data.... I'll be saying goodbye to this app forever.... And that would be a shame because I really like this app!

title: Awesome and easy!
body: This app has made keeping track of what I eat do easy! It tells you how many calories you need based on weight/height/goal. It also tracks the water you drink, which has helped me drink more. It also tracks how many calories you burn exercising. It also has almost all food/exercise in its database and if not it's easy to enter it manually or scan a bar code.

title: Perfect
body: This just what I needed.It's designed to help you keep track  of what you eat and and the end of the day you want to make more healthy choices.

title: New life
body: I have changed my life around with nutrition, and this app is one of my stepping stones. Tracking food, drinks, and setting up a calorie limit is very easy to follow. Thanks for all the help. I have lost 31lbs in just over one month. 6'2" was 245lbs current 214lbs and on my way to my goal of 200lbs or under.the weight started falling off getting this app and doing cross fit.

title: Could be better, but not too bad
body: I have been using the app for a few months now and there are some glitches when it comes to it not finding certain foods. When I scan the bar code it says it can't be found but then search for it and it pops right up. Also, the app advertises it syncs between all devices and mine never syncs to my iPad. It works properly between my phone and the computer but that's all.

title: Very useful app.
body: Good app. I like the daily protein / fat / whatever break down chart. I wish they had one that showed the break down per meal. A screen that said the overall nutrient break down for each meal would be nice too. As it is though, this app is very useful and the bar code scanning thing is very useful and easy to use.

title: Summertime FINE!!
body: The app does just what it says! I love how it gives me alerts when I go days without tracking gets my butt back on track! I do recommend it to people who are new to the whole healthy thing. Even tho everything isn't in the scan system it's still possible to enter the info of the food. I love it

title: Great app
body: I use this app every day love it.So far I lost five pounds,it's very helpful.

title: Awesome app
body: I have used it for a month nd I have to say that this app is awesome as it helps in gaining weight or losing weight or Jst to stay healthy.People who are reading my review I want to tell u that u must use this app nd INSHALLAH it will help u as it has helped me...

title: Practically perfect
body: This is such an easy-to-use app. The interface is really nice, and it has a lot of food options programmed already. As an added bonus, you can sign up for an mPoints program to earn money for Amazon gift cards (among other options) as an incentive to keep tracking your calories and exercise. My only complaint is that I wish you could save a group of foods as a meal after entering it for one day, rather than choosing the "make new meal" option first, because I'm too forgetful to think to do that before entering my foods.

title: Great Addition - UPC Barcode Scanner
body: This app is great. My wife and I have been using My Plate for years. I love the new app with the ability to scan a UPC code and have the app look up the dietary information. Great app!

title: Great so far
body: I have been using this app only a short while, but have fallen in love with it! It has a few flaws ( like the bar code scan) but all in all a great way for me to not gain holiday weight and keep moving forward in loosing the pregnancy weight! Lets do this !!!

title: Love it
body: Great & easy to track my fat butt!!

title: Scanner update please!
body: I like tracking exercise on this app - more detailed than some apps.  HOWEVER, it would be awesome if when the bar scanner did not recognize a code, it automatically stored the bar code and allowed you to add the food so that next time you ate that particular food, you could scan it in.

title: Excellent App
body: This app is really easy to use and understand. I like most everything about it. The only con is the bar code scanner doesn't recognize very many items.

title: App is good! But crashes TOO much. FIX IT QUCKLY!
body: This app is an awesome app but i noticed it does crash a couple of times. It would hav been 5 if it doesnt... Needs more improvement in food searches.  And i hope they could add the feature in custom foods that we could put the saturated fats and other stuff not just the protein,carbs and fat.mthat would really bring this app to 5 star! So work it out app creator! Ty

title: No complaints
body: I have absolutely no complaints about this app. I've been using it to track my calories and macronutrients (protein, fats, and carbs). It's been 2 weeks now and I've lost 4 pounds of fat while maintaining muscle. This is a straight forward no B.S app that WILL yield results if you track everything and don't go over the calorie intake limit.

title: Super app
body: Great app for tracking weight. Helps keep you honest and really shows what you are eating. Only downside is the exercise section, there aren't any tools to help calculate how many calories you burn say at work, or cleaning the house, everything is preset. However, the bat code scanner really helps match your foods!

title: I love it!
body: As a person who is barely really learning to count calories to lose weight, this is a great app! It's really easy to use and understand.. Only downside is that the bar code scanner doesn't read everything.. But overall I think it's great!

title: Love it!!!
body: Especially love the sensor. Now I don't need to wear a pedometer to track my activity. Motivates me to get off my butt

title: Great app!
body: Absolutely love this app! Makes tracking calories and exercise. The only thing that could use done improvement is the bar code scanner. I have found very few items that actually come up.

title: iOS 7 update needs fixing
body: Results don't show up anymore when searching.. loved the app before the update messed this up.

title: If its not broken
body: I loved this app that is until  the last update. It crashes all the time no matter what you try to do with it. Why they changed to color from the live strong yellow and blue to orange and blue is beyond me. Basically they killed a great app and added a stupid bar code scanner that doesn't work hardly at all its a waste of time . The app is now crap . When it WAS working it was awesome! My advise is - Don't fix it if its not broken !  You better fix it now because you really broke it this time.

title: Issues
body: Used to be really good.  Had to reload for iOS 7. Currently, cannot track weight as the AARP add banner runs right across the track weight button. Too bad, use to be great.  What use is it if you can't track your weight?  Also, graph was better before.

title: Needs Repair
body: I have been using this app for over a month, and was due to rate it about now. I love the app, and after updating my iOS to 7, I got excited when I saw the bar code reader feature. When it decides to connect to any data base, I am sure it will be awesome. There are too many bugs currently to properly rate it at this time.

title: What the heck!!!
body: Since updating to iOS7, it says all exercise burns zero calories. Not cool.

title: Guilty Pleasures!
body: You can't cheat Livestrong. If you honestly track your food intake, you know exactly why you are OR aren't losing weight. Simple to use; love the bar code option!  Cindy

title: Great app, but update needed
body: I have been using the app for the better part of a year to manage my weight. I had no complaints until I updated to iOS 7. I do love the scan option, but the search (scanned/typed) only accesses my recent foods. If I want to add a new food, it simply doesn't show up. The point tracker is really annoying where they moved it. I do like the new color block scheme.

title: Loyal user! :)
body: Have been using for the last two years! Very happy with the selection of foods! I'm so glad they included the bar code scanner! Can't wait to start trying it out!

title: Nice but don't like the ads
body: Very nice app, like the design but it can get confusing and can look cluttered. I  really like how you can interact with others by asking and answering fitness/health related questions

title: Food Search??
body: I don't like the app too much. It's hard because I've only been able to keep track of scanned items, as in only items that have a bar code. Maybe I don't know how to work it but it doesn't really allow me to search for my food. Every time I search it gives me nothing. It would be a better app if I could also search for food with no barcode. I do like how it tracks how much water I drink in the day.

title: I like it!
body: I like it!  I agree with another post.....

title: A REAL HONEST REVIEW
body: 1) the exercise section needs work.

title: Needs bar code scanner
body: Great app. But needs a food bar scanner.

title: Good way to keep track of calories.
body: I use this app as a food journal. It is very easy to use and as you get all your foods picked out it puts them in a list so they are easy to find.It works ok for me.

title: Bye Bye WW
body: I love this app. It's easy to use. I can find all the food I eat.

title: @gym recommended! Great!!!
body: Great app! Large data food base others don't have! Easy to use! Says if you put your own calorie goal rest doesn't recognize it though? Haven't figured that out yet?

title: F#%kn awesome
body: Amazing way to keep track of everything u do n eat

title: Very Good App with Room To Improve
body: This is a very good app that is easy and intuitive to use, but honestly, it has crashed numerous times on my iPhone 5.

title: Great app!
body: This app is fantastic!So easy to use.All your calories are on one screen so it's easy to track.Would def. recommend!

title: iOS 7 update no longer works
body: After updating to the new app designed for iOS 7 it no longer works. Cannot connect to Facebook and the search function does not work. This app use to be great and was excited to see the scanner included.

title: Needs improvement
body: This app is really nice, I wish it had bar code scanning ability, but otherwise nice. Unfortunately I haven't been able to use it since ios6, it opens and shuts immediately before I can enter any foods. Tried deleting and reinstalling but it just won't work. I think I'm going to delete it and try a different app.

title: Please take it from good to great
body: Love the graphics and functionality of this app compared to similar apps!!  However, it's missing a couple of features which would take it from good to great. I wish it had a bar code scanner and option to create personal recipes like "My Fitness Pal."  Entering food data is more time consuming and laborious without those features. Would love to see those changes!!

title: Difficult to navigate
body: Somewhat difficult to navigate, especially when trying to input foods into a different day, or to delete/ modify entries.  A bar code scanner would be nice.

title: Like it
body: I like the app, but it's a bit frustrating w/ all the different calorie mistakes that are logged. It be nice if it had some sort of a scanner so you could just run the bar code.

title: Great App
body: Great app!  Would rate it 5 stars if they add a bar code scanning function to reduce the need to manually search.

title: Like
body: Wish it had the bar code scanner and there is some workouts that it can't find(so more exercise options would be nice) but overall I like it.

title: I really like this!
body: This app has been very helpful to track what I eat and monitor the nutrition ratio. I wish it kept the nutrition pie for all days. Also wish you could select food items directly from your recently eaten list for more.convience. But overall I find this app very useful!

title: So easy!
body: Can't believe how easy this is to use! There are tons of foods already in the database so I don't have to enter much information, which can be a pain in the butt.

title: New user
body: I just started using this.its pretty neat

title: Largest variety of food of any calorie counter!
body: I signed up for this app in January and basically, at first, I slacked.Recently I got back on the wagon!  Not only do they automatically calculate your daily caloric intake goal based on the profile that you fill out with your height, weight, goal weight, age, and gender. One of the greatest features of this application is the database, which contains a plethora of different of foods . I was quite frankly in shock with all of the choices! Let's face it diet is 70% of weight loss  and exercise is the other 30%. That being said we MUST MUST MUST eat healthy, we must never restrict ourselves or use extreme dieting to lose weight. Bottom line is eat when you're hungry and STOP when you're full! This App is a must have !!

title: Helps what I put in my mouth
body: This app is easy to use and helps me stay on track in how much I eat. You never realize how many calories you are consuming until you keep track.This app is helping me lose weight !

title: Great App!
body: This app has a huge selection of food items with various portions that you just pick and click into your daily diary. At any time, you can see your calories consumed and in what portions of carbs, fat, etc. I don' feel the app saves enough of your food items that you have previously eaten.It doesn't allow you to load your own bank of foods that you usually eat. It seems to only register/save about 3 days worth of items previously eaten. It would be very convenient to choose from your own bank. It's an easy to use app that gives you an 'eye opening' look at what you've eaten for the day.Just when you thought you were 'being good', surprise! This app helps you realize the good and bad choices you make during your day and helps you stay on track with your weight loss process. I have been loading my own exercises with calories burned. It doesn't seem to have a lot of choices except walking. Maybe the upgrade would include more exercise choices.

title: Nice App
body: Nice App, Thank You

title: Poop
body: Cool

title: Amazing app
body: I have recently been using the calorie tracker and now with the Spartan workout. Lemme tell you. Perfect combo! Love this app

title: Good App
body: I don't really like the update, but it works well

title: Easy to Track
body: Great way to track against a goal. A lot of food and exercise calories are already in the lists.
